properties.descrption: Loads of plum, dark chocolate, blackberry and exotic spices in this big, dry wine. Oak, too, in the form of exquisite vanilla and caramel. It's absolutely delicious, but maybe a little one-dimensional, showing that Petit Verdot by itself needs some help from other varieties.

properties.title: Penfolds 2007 Bin 389 Cabernet Sauvignon-Shiraz (South Australia)
properties.address: 78 Penfold Rd, Magill SA 5072, Australia
properties.descrption: The most recent release of Penfolds' “Baby Grange” is a beauty, loaded with the chocomint character that has made it famous. Dark berry and cassis take over on the creamy, lushly textured midpalate, finishing long and velvety. Drink now or hold up to 15 years.

properties.title: Peter Franus 2006 Red Wine Red (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: Quite a good wine, with Cabernet-esque blackberries and black currants, and a rich toastiness from charred oak. Feels a little angular and jammy in youth. Give it two or three years in the cellar to soften and mellow.

properties.title: Rodney Strong 2008 Reserve Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 11455 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Made in an immediately appealing style, this Pinot is soft and lush and vast in fruit and oak richness. It floods the palate with cherry and raspberry pie filling, vanilla, cinnamon and sandalwood flavors, and the texture is silky and elegant.

properties.title: Tolosa 2012 Marley Anne Pinot Noir (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 4910 Edna Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.descrption: Earth, mud and wet clay are laid against a ripe black raspberry frame on this bottling from winemaker Larry Brooks. Plenty of life, zest and lift enliven the beautifully spiced palate, with bright red cherries, cranberries and purple flowers cut by a line of pencil-lead minerality and a savory fennel element.

properties.title: Tres Sabores 2012 Zinfandel (Rutherford)
properties.address: 1620 S Whitehall Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: From the producer's dry-farmed estate vineyard, this elegantly powerful wine opens in cracked black pepper, dried herb and cedar, continuing the peppery theme on the palate. Black cherry and high-toned blackberry combine with the more savory elements, with an overall softness of texture and lengthy finish.

properties.title: Allegrini 2011 La Poja Corvina (Veronese)
properties.address: Via della Torre, 25, 37022 Fumane VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Opulent as well as elegant, this structured red boasts aromas of black currant, exotic spice, new oak and fragrant blue flower. Made entirely with native grape Corvina, the velvety palate doles out spiced blackberry, juicy cherry, licorice and black pepper. Firm, polished tannins provide the smooth framework.

properties.title: Château Vignelaure 2010 Red (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.address: Rte de Jouques, 83560 Rians, France
properties.descrption: This serious wine is still developing even after five years. It is rich, dense and concentrated with firm tannins that lie under the ripe black fruits and acidity. From vineyards to the east of Aix-en-Provence, the wine has a mineral, structured character that needs to age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Méo-Camuzet 2013 Les Cras Premier Cru  (Chambolle-Musigny)
properties.address: 11 Rue des Grands Crus, 21700 Vosne-Romanée, France
properties.descrption: A beautifully perfumed wine, this offers a line of fine tannins and brilliant aromatic fruitiness. Cherries and strawberries show strongly against a backdrop of tannins and structure. The aftertaste, still with a hint of dryness, is round with great fragrant fruit. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2013  Clos de Vougeot
properties.address: 49 Rue Henri Challand, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: Big, firm and dense, this is a powerful wine, with dark tannins that give a dry, concentrated character. The juicy plum and damson fruit flavors, along with the fresh aftertaste, will be a delicious balance as the wine develops. Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Joseph Jewell 2012 Appian Way Vineyards Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6542 Front St, Forestville, CA 95436, USA
properties.descrption: From a cool Forestville vineyard once devoted to apples, Appian Way is rich in Goldridge soils, providing a happy home to these grapes that offer a core of pomegranate and cranberry, laced in black tea. Light bodied without being wimpy, the wine is complex and velvety, finishing in nutmeg and ginger.

properties.title: Joseph Phelps 2013 Freestone Vineyards Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 200 Taplin Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Stemmy earth and dark, savory pine give in to sautéed mushroom and cinnamon in this lean, soft and delicious estate-grown wine. A tension of acidity buoys a backdrop of wild strawberry and cranberry on the palate, ending with just the right amount of weight and length, succulent to the end.

properties.title: Chacewater 2013 Made with Organically Grown Grapes Zinfandel (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 5625 Gaddy Ln, Kelseyville, CA 95451, USA
properties.descrption: Simply delicious, this Zin is well mannered and not too full bodied. Aromas of this dry and elegant wine are like cinnamon and cardamom, and flavors are a little smoky and full of cherries. The mouthfeel is good and gripping due to fine tannins and supportive acidity.

properties.title: Lafond 2012 Hilltop Ranch Vineyard Syrah (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 6855 Santa Rosa Rd, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.descrption: Dried raspberries and leathery blackberry fruit get added character from violets on the nose of this single-vineyard bottling from winemaker Bruce McGuire. The palate shows lots of peppercorns and mint in its aromatic core, which is laid across tightly restrained blackberry fruit flavor.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2012 Les Cazetiers Premier Cru  (Gevrey-Chambertin)
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: This wine has a firm structure, solid with tannins and a dense, complex balance between acidity and perfumed red berry flavors. It is juicy, full of freshness as well as considerable tannins. It needs to be aged for several years; drink from 2019.

properties.title: Louis Max 2013 Les Azerottes  (Gevrey-Chambertin)
properties.address: 8 Rue de Chaux, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: Rich and concentrated, this wine shows the firm tannins of a Gevrey-Chambertin. Ripe berry fruits and beautiful acidity contrast with this structure. The fresh aftertaste with its flavors of raspberries and dark cherries will be very fine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Melville 2013 Verna's Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 5185 CA-246, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: There's a very candied red-cherry quality to the nose of this wine from a vineyard that the winery will cease using with this vintage, along with sexy aromas of violet, lilac, clove, cola, peppercorn and rose. A sage-driven character emerges once sipped, giving spice to bright red, slightly sour cranberry fruit.

properties.title: I Saltari 2008  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.address: 24041 S Tamiami Trail, Bonita Springs, FL 34134, USA
properties.descrption: Dried black cherry, pressed violet, tilled soil nutmeg and chopped herb aromas lead the nose on this big, bold red. The round, enveloping palate doles out dried plum, raspberry compote, licorice and black pepper alongside velvety tannins that lend it a polished feel.

properties.title: Terra d'Oro 2013 Teroldego (Amador County)
properties.address: 20680 Shenandoah School Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: A remarkable full-bodied wine, this has great concentration and depth of flavor, with a dense but fine-grained texture to go along with it. The color is virtually black, with a dark red rim, and the flavors are deep and delicious, like dark chocolate and blackberry jam. This is fascinating to taste now, but will be best to drink after 2018.

properties.title: Red Car 2014 Rosé of Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 8400 Graton Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: A deliciously light, bright wine that hits the mark year after year, this cool-climate offering is fresh in zingy acidity and juicy flavors of grapefruit, strawberry and lime. The acidity buoys the experience from first sip to last, backed by enough body to remain in balance. This wine is fermented like a white wine without skin or seed contact.

properties.title: Hook & Ladder 2006 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1127 W Broadway Ave #2505, Minneapolis, MN 55411, USA
properties.descrption: There's enough unripe fruity flavor in this wine to detract from its pleasure. As dry, crisp and silky as it is, its cherry and cola flavors are marred by a sharp, green taste of menthol.

properties.title: Graffigna 2005 Centenario Estate Bottled Malbec (San Juan)
properties.address: Cristóbal Colón Nte. 1342, J5400 San Juan, Argentina
properties.descrption: A little reduced and granular on the nose, with black fruit and licorice aromas filling any gaps. The flavor profile is solid, with black cherry and plum pulling the cart. Where this wine comes up short is in mouthfeel; it's tight almost to the point of sharp, with a strong essence of grape skins and tannin. Imported by Pernod Ricard, USA.

properties.title: Vina Robles 2005 Jardine Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3700 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Ouch. Tough, extremely dry, and acidic-tannic, this wine isn't showing much charm now. There's a suggestion of blackberry, bitter cherry and blueberry fruit, as well as lots of smoky oak. Nowhere near ready, and hard to predict. Try after 2008.

properties.title: White Oak 2004 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7505 CA-128, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: There's too much raisin flavor, and the wine is deficient in acidity, giving the cherry and blackberry flavors a syrupy feel.

properties.title: Campos Góticos 2004 Pecunia  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: 09313 Anguix, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: Leathery and peanutty on the nose; soon the aromas expand to baked plum and stewy berries. The palate is sturdy and tannic, but there's enough flesh and weight to the fruit that it's mostly balanced. Finishes with bacon and leather accents.

properties.title: Finca El Origen 2006 Reserva Malbec (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Clean, fruity and a touch candied on the bouquet. The palate is narrow but saved by ripe black cherry flavors and spice notes. Finishes with a mocha-like flavor and a crisp, clean feel. A basic but more than satisfactory Malbec. Imported by Carolina Wine Brands USA Inc.

properties.title: Grgich Hills 2003 Yountville Selection Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1829 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.descrption: Grgich has struggled with this uneven bottling over the years, and the 2003 shows the problems that have plagued the wine. It combines sharpness with sugary cherry-berry flavors, making for a sweet and sour taste. There are tannins aplenty, but it doesn't seem like an ager.

properties.title: Q 2005 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 4696 King St, Beamsville, ON L0R 1B1, Canada
properties.descrption: Full-bodied and robust, this has the tannicly rustic nature of an old-fashioned red. It is completely dry, with earthy flavors of dark stone fruits, currants, coffee, licorice, herbs and pepper.

properties.title: Rutini 2006 Trumpeter Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Km 10.5, RP89, Tupungato, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Sweet and a little foxy on the nose, with secondary aromas of air freshener. The flavors are a touch brambly and herbal, while the palate is flush and chewy but also a little tannic and choppy. Doesn't seem as thought this is as structured and serious as it was, say, four or five years ago.

properties.title: Abadia Retuerta 2004 Selección Especial Red (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla y León)
properties.address: N-122, km 332, 5, 47340 Sardón de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: At 70% Tempranillo and only 25% Cabernet and Merlot, there's a detectable green core running through the nose and palate. Surrounding that is sizable fruit and oak, the latter of which adds dill to the fray. All in all there's enough body and soul to save the wine, but along the way it's got some issues.

properties.title: Arrow Creek 2005 Vintner's Selection Merlot (California)
properties.address: 13502 E, US-290, Stonewall, TX 78671, USA
properties.descrption: Pretty generic-tasting but basically good, a dry red wine with considerable tannins and acids that frame herbal cherry flavors.

properties.title: Hat in the Ring 2007 Fireman Shiraz (Mendoza)
properties.address: 3861 1st Ave S, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.descrption: Touches of cola, cherry and berry work the jammy bouquet, and the reasonably sturdy body offers up flavors of berry backed by vanilla. There's ample grab and pretty good balance to this fresh wine.

properties.title: Cape May 2005 Merlot (New Jersey)
properties.address: 711 Town Bank Rd, Cape May, NJ 08204, USA
properties.descrption: A nose of enticing blackberry jam is followed by a slightly smoky, spicy blend of savory, earthy flavors. The nose and palate are a touch discordant, but overall the wine is unique and approachable.

properties.title: Casa Rondeña Winery 2004 Cabernet Franc (New Mexico)
properties.address: 733 Chavez Rd, Los Ranchos De Albuquerque, NM 87107, USA
properties.descrption: A very appealing nose of bright cherry and spice is followed by flavors of tea, spice and red berry in the mouth. Good body and tannins and a lingering finish make it a unique choice from a somewhat unknown region.

properties.title: Angove's 2006 Nine Vines Shiraz-Viognier (South Australia)
properties.address: 117 Chalk Hill Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: This wine shows strong barnyard and sulfur notes overwhelming an otherwise appealing nose of herbes de Provence and grilled pork. The palate is juicy, with appealing cherry notes while the smooth finish winds up on an ashy note.

properties.title: Banrock Station 2006 Shiraz-Cabernet Sauvignon (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: Holmes Rd, Kingston on Murray SA 5331, Australia
properties.descrption: This bargain-basement Australian is oddly lacking in fruit, offering up herbaceous and pine scents instead. Flavor is likewise scarce on the crisp palate and the short finish. No tannins in sight.

properties.title: Blue Reef 2007 Shiraz-Cabernet Sauvignon (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: 6835 Great Alpine Rd, Porepunkah VIC 3740, Australia
properties.descrption: The nose is honest and fresh with more herbaceous and mulchy notes than fruit. Strawberry notes infuse the rather weak palate but lead to a hit of alcohol on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Midlife Crisis 2005 Sangiovese (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Too sugary sweet, with jellied flavors of cherries and spices. More like a dessert wine than a dry table one.

properties.title: Montelle 2007 Chambourcin (Missouri)
properties.address: 201 Montelle Dr, Augusta, MO 63332, USA
properties.descrption: The gorgeously opaque ruby color raises high hopes. However, the undistinguished, earthy nose fails to deliver. The lush palate is a step up, with red berry soup flavors interwoven with an odd ashy note. Long finish. Drink up.

properties.title: Keuka Spring 2006 Miller's Cove Red Red (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 243 Route 54, East Lake Rd, Penn Yan, NY 14527, USA
properties.descrption: While not the best Keuka Spring has to offer, this Merlot-dominated Bordeaux blend offers up some pleasant fruit compote notes and a crisp finish. The tannins are a bit grainy, however and the confected fruit flavors are on the simple side. Serve with steak, hamburgers.

properties.title: Espuela del Gaucho 2007 Gaucho Spur Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 21301 Kathy Ln, Spicewood, TX 78669, USA
properties.descrption: A lean, acidic Malbec that defies the tried and true model of richness and lots of flavor. It has rhubarb and green raspberry aromas, while the palate is short, tart and herbal. Not a lot of definition here.

properties.title: Catharine Valley 2005 Reserve Cabernet Franc (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4201 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.descrption: Charming aromas of tobacco leaf and strawberries promise good things to come but the palate does not follow through. While some boysenberry flavors appeal, the wine is thin in the mouth. The tannins are a bit overly gripping now but the wine does not have the fruit ripeness or concentration to benefit from cellaring.

properties.title: McGregor 2006 Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5503 Dutch St, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.descrption: This wine falls short of its rather lofty ambitions with lavish new French oak treatment resulting in a diminished fruit profile. Sawdust notes dominate the nose while the faintest hint of cherry can be detected on the palate. Finishes a bit tart. A good choice for those hankering for a vanilla milkshake.

properties.title: Bocage 2006 Merlot (Monterey)
properties.descrption: Smells vegetal and unripe, with broccoli aromas that turn medicinal sweet in the mouth.

properties.title: Tapiz 2006 Merlot (Mendoza)
properties.address: RP15, Agrelo, Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Not very fruity, with gritty cherry flavors and a hard, edgy, almost sour profile. Does nothing for the reputation of Merlot in Argentina. Overpriced, too.

properties.title: Château Fourcas Dupré 2012 Zenith de Fourcas Dupré  (Listrac-Médoc)
properties.address: 33480 Listrac-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: This is the second wine of Fourcas Dupré. It is soft, full of ripe berry fruits and attractive acidity. The core of the wine is still dry and shows plenty of tannic structure that will allow the wine to age. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Château Pindefleurs 2014  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: Pin de Fleur-Est, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: Strongly dominated by its wood aging, this is a toasty, licorice and dark-coffee-flavored wine. It does have some black-fruit weight that should allow the wine to balance out. So wait until at least 2019 before drinking.

properties.title: Château Saransot-Dupré 2014  Listrac-Médoc
properties.address: entrée 2, avenue de Soulac, 4 Rue Grande Rue, 33480 Listrac-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: From one of the leading estates in Listrac, this is a ripe structured wine. It has firm tannins and a dark core of dry wood aging. Balanced with that is the blackberry fruit and generous superripe Merlot. The wine needs time, so don't drink before 2019.

properties.title: Cristom 2014 Mount Jefferson Cuvée Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6905 Spring Valley Rd NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.descrption: Light raspberry fruit carries a tart punchy edge. It's clean and fresh, though showing little density. Additional bottle age (another couple of years) would be a good idea.

properties.title: Domaine Gerard Charvet 2015 La Réserve d'Amélie  (Moulin-à-Vent)
properties.address: Le Vieux Bourg, 69840 Chénas, France
properties.descrption: While it is still young, the wine is showing great fruit and soft tannins. Juicy black cherries are ripe and full, a sign of the fine vintage. With the acidity and the dry core, the wine should age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Elephant Seven 2014 River Rock Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 134 W Poplar St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from a vineyard down in The Rocks District and at a quite low alcohol level for the state, especially considering the warmth of the vintage, this wine brings aromas of cranberry compote, herb, thistle and mineral. The flavors are light and elegant, almost faint at times, but showing a pleasing purity and a finish that lingers. It piques the interest, with cranberry juice notes lingering on the finish.

properties.title: Dezzani 2012 San Carlo  (Barolo)
properties.address: Corso Pinin Giachino, 140, 14023 Cocconato AT, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with subdued aromas of dark berry, cake spice, espresso and a whiff of pressed violet. On the straightforward palate, hints of white pepper and star anise add depth to dried morello cherry while solid tannins lend support.

properties.title: Finca Sophenia 2015 Synthesis The Blend Red (Tupungato)
properties.address: Km 12.5, Ruta 89, M5561 Tupungato, Gualtallary, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: This Malbec blend is bright, jammy and grapy on the nose. The palate is juicy but bumpy and rough in feel, while fresh-fruit flavors of raspberry and cherry are a little too candied and simple for a wine of this level. A ripe medicinal finish is lush but awkward.

properties.title: Parras Wines 2015 Quinta do Gradil Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: N8-5 2 2460, 2460 Alcobaça, Portugal
properties.descrption: This concentrated wine is dense with black fruits. Dark with chocolate and richness, it is still young and firm. Wood aging has smoothed the tannins and given extra fullness. The smoky aftertaste promises well. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Quinta dos Poços 2014 Colheita Red (Douro)
properties.address: QUINTA dos POÇOS, R. dos Poços nº 1462, 5100-839 Lamego, Portugal
properties.descrption: Wood flavors dominate this young wine. It has structure and tannins, with concentrated toast and chocolate flavors. The extraction of the fruit gives the wine a bitter character. It should soften, so drink from 2019.

properties.title: Robert Perroud 2014 En Saburin Cuvée Romain  (Brouilly)
properties.address: 69460 Odenas, France
properties.descrption: Produced from organically grown grapes, the wine is soft, ripe and full of fruit. Red cherries dominate, with a touch of wood from the 12 months of barrel aging. It has a bright, crisp and juicy aftertaste.

properties.title: Roncão 2014 DR Colheita Red (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta de Catralvos, N 379, Km 19, 2925-708 Azeitão, Portugal
properties.descrption: This wine is ripe and rich, with fine tannins and structure. Great swathes of blackberry fruits come with a mineral edge and some tight tannins. Give this balanced wine until 2019.

properties.title: Rui Roboredo Madeira 2012 Castello d'Alba Limited Edition Red (Douro)
properties.address: Parque Industrial do Lameirão, Lote 12, 5130 São João da Pesqueira, Portugal
properties.descrption: A perfumed wine with soft tannins and juicy red fruits, this offers a concentrated aftertaste, giving spice as well as fruitiness. Drink this accessible wine now.

properties.title: San Lorenzo Vini 2010 Escol Riserva  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane)
properties.address: contrada Plavignano, 2, 64035 Castilenti TE, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of mature plum, French oak and a whiff of exotic spice lead the way. The full-bodied palate offers vanilla, espresso, coconut, sour cherry and grilled herb alongside assertive close-grained tannins that grip the finish. Drink soon to capture the remaining fruit.

properties.title: Valori 2009 Vigna Sant'Angelo  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo Colline Teramane)
properties.address: Via Torquato Al Salinello, 8, 64027 Sant'Omero TE, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with aromas of underbrush, tobacco, espresso and stewed prune. The full-bodied palate offers sour cherry, raisin, licorice and ground pepper alongside fine-grained but rather evolved tannins. It has seen fresher days so drink soon.

properties.title: Love That Red 2014 Stakes Race Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE STE E400, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas seem a bit muddled, with notes of red fruit, herbs, vanilla and flowers. The cherry flavors are tart, with a kick of acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Magness 2013 Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 6148 NY-14, Rock Stream, NY 14878, USA
properties.descrption: There's a lot of good stuff going on in this blend of 43% Cabernet Sauvignon, 37% Syrah and 20% Petit Verdot, with a nose of plump blackberry fruit dosed by scents of smoky vanilla, asphalt and licorice. There are sesame and teriyaki touches to the palate, along with charred blueberries, coffee, chocolate and firm tannins.

properties.title: Parusso 2006 Bussia Riserva  (Barolo)
properties.address: Località Bussia 55, 12065, 12065 Monforte D'alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with aromas of truffle, celery, underbrush, French oak and a whiff of pressed rose. The firm palate offers raw sour cherry, tart cranberry, licorice, powdered sage and oak-driven spice alongside bracing, close-grained tannins that leave a firm finish. Drink through 2026.

properties.title: Domaine Perrot-Minot 2010 La Richemonne Premier Cru  (Nuits-St.-Georges)
properties.address: 54 Rte des Grands Crus, 21220 Morey-Saint-Denis, France
properties.descrption: Made from grapes that were sourced from vines close to Vosne-Romanée, this has all of the structure of a Nuits-St-Georges, with the power and density of Vosne-Vosne-Romanée. Delicious, concentrated black fruits pair with the acidity and the core of tannins.

properties.title: Montecariano 2007  Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
properties.address: Via Valena, 3, 37029 San Pietro in Cariano VR, Italy
properties.descrption: This standout Amarone boasts elegant mineral tones of wet river stone and crushed granite, which are followed by softer layers of ripe fruit and spice. There's a savory note of soy sauce and cured meat, with a smoky barbecue overtone. Let this wine age 10 years or more.

properties.title: Phillips Hill 2010 Two Terroirs Pinot Noir (Mendocino)
properties.descrption: Phillips Hill's Two Terroirs is very subtly marked “AV + MR,” signaling that the fruit was sourced from both the cool Anderson Valley and even cooler Mendocino Ridge. It's lightly earthy and resplendent in bright, just-ripe cherry tones. Gorgeously crisp, with undeniable structure, this is ready to drink, but it would also shine in a few years time.

properties.title: Sleight of Hand 2009 Archimage Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1959 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of 50% Merlot and 50% Cabernet Franc, this has an intriguing spicy accent that's reminiscent of fresh pine. It's front-loaded with generous blueberry fruit that's streaked with an anise note, flowing nicely into the polished tannins. This shows good focus and length.

properties.title: Summers 2009 Petite Sirah (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 10 Clay St #100, Oakland, CA 94607, USA
properties.descrption: Grown in a highlands plateau between Napa Valley and the Russian River Valley, this shows the varietal's bigtime tannins, but it's lighter in body than you might expect. It's delicious in blackberry, currant, grilled meat and sandalwood flavors. This is one of the more elegant and sophisticated Petite Sirahs of the vintage. It's showing its best now and will continue to drink well over the next few years.

properties.title: Cesari 2009 Bosan  (Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso)
properties.address: Località Sorsei, 3, 37010 Cavaion veronese VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Among the most consistently high-scoring Ripassos from Valpolicella, this is a lush, rich and modern rendition that's tightly loaded with cherry, spice, leather, barbecue and tobacco flavors. The moutheel is smooth and round, with touches of sweet cinnamon on the finish. Try pairing it with osso buco.

properties.title: Allegrini 2008  Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
properties.address: Via della Torre, 25, 37022 Fumane VR, Italy
properties.descrption: One of the founding members of the prestigious Amarone Families association who focus on safeguarding the unique winemaking traditions of Valpolicella, Allegrini sets the standard for a new generation of vintners. This opens with sweet tones of Indian spice, ripe fruit and tobacco. The mouthfeel is exceedingly rich, long lasting and intense.

properties.title: Novaia 2008 Corte Vaona  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Via Olmo, 4, 37020 Marano di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: A distinctive expression from Valpolicella, this shows pretty herb notes of oregano and dried mint, with licorice and spice accents. There are also softer tones of coffee, leather and juicy black cherry. Overall, this is elegant, nuanced and powerful.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2010 Santenots Premier Cru  (Volnay)
properties.address: 10 Pl. du Monument, 21190 Puligny-Montrachet, France
properties.descrption: For the moment, the tannins are still firm and the generous red fruits have not yet penetrated the surface. The acidity is present, like a line of brightness that cuts through this richly tannic wine. This is a potentially opulent wine.

properties.title: Prà 2007  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.address: Via della Fontana, 31, 37032 Monteforte d'Alpone VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Elegant and austere, this opens with thick layers of chocolate fudge, toasted espresso bean, Christmas spice and overripe berry fruit. It boasts huge flavor intensity and big alcohol. This is a bold Amarone that's perfect for long weekends at a ski lodge or cozy nights at home..

properties.title: Chanson Père et Fils 2009 Clos des Mouches Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.address: 10 rue Paul Chanson, 10 Rue Collège, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: Opulent and ripe, but at the same time it shows red fruits, fresh acids and a structured core. It has a wonderful, generous finish that showcases the rich fruits and warm tannins.

properties.title: Domaine Faiveley 2010 Les Cazetiers Premier Cru  (Gevrey-Chambertin)
properties.address: 8 Rue du Tribourg, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: This is rich, showing the full-bodied character of a Gevrey-Chambertin Premier Cru. It has a sense of gravity and structure, with a flavor of red-plum jelly. Solid and chunky, this already expresses its fruit, although it does need at least six years to mature.

properties.title: Domaine Perrot-Minot 2010 Champs Perdrix  (Vosne-Romanée)
properties.address: 54 Rte des Grands Crus, 21220 Morey-Saint-Denis, France
properties.descrption: This demonstrates the power, concentration and firm structure that comes from the vintage. The fruit is rich and powered by opulent black fruits, with a dark, intensely textured finish.

properties.title: Jean-Claude Boisset 2009 Lavaut Saint-Jacques Premier Cru  (Gevrey-Chambertin)
properties.descrption: While it has all the structure of Gevrey-Chambertin, it also has the richness of the vintage. This strikes a healthy balance between the two, creating a powerful wine that's full of black fruits and sweet tannins, with a firm, dry core. Age for 5–6 years.

properties.title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2011 Rosé of Sangiovese (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14545 148th Ave NE #211, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The Sangiovese comes from Red Willow Vineyard, and it would be hard to find a more lovely, elegant rosé from this side of the Atlantic. Light strawberry and melon aromas continue onto the palate, with pinpoint detail and precision.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2010  Chambertin
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: Concentrated, dense and powerful, this has all the structure of a Chambertin. As a contrast, the juicy acidity cuts through the texture, luring out black fruits that balance the solid core of tannins. It needs to age for at least seven years.

properties.title: Corte Pavone 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Località Corte Pavone, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of tilled soil, forest floor, leather and wild berry lead the nose on this straightforward red. The vibrant, medium-bodied palate offers juicy black cherry and pipe tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins and racy acidity.

properties.title: Cycles Gladiator 2014 Merlot (Central Coast)
properties.address: 980 Airway Ct, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.descrption: This wine and the entire brand often punch above their weight, in this case showing black cherry, cedar, dried dill, crushed graphite and peppercorns on the nose. The palate offers oregano and dill at first, but proves silky with dried cherry and cranberry fruit.

properties.title: Diliberto 2014 Cantina Merlot-Cabernet Franc (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 250 Manor Ln, Jamesport, NY 11947, USA
properties.descrption: Old World rusticity mark this light-bodied red blend. Its black cherry flavors are restrained and savory, muted by tones of barnyard, bramble and dried mushrooms. Crisply balanced and feathered by a fine fringe of tannins, it's an appealing wine for classic wine lovers.

properties.title: Domaine Costa Lazaridi 2015 Amethystos Rosé Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot (Drama)
properties.address: 2nd km Kapandriti Kalamos road, Kapandriti, 19014, Kapandriti 190 14, Greece
properties.descrption: Earthy spice and red berry aromas lead this sturdy pour from Drama. On the palate, full-bodied flavors are balanced by a mineral edge. A good every day rosé that will match lamb and beef dishes well.

properties.title: Domaine Rotier 2015 Esquisse Red (Gaillac)
properties.address: Petit Nareye, 2833 route de Lagrave, 81600 Cadalen, France
properties.descrption: This is a rich wine made to be drunk young. It has spice, a smoky-bacon flavor and warm-hearted red plum and damson fruitiness. The wood aging shows through in hints of toast. The wine is ready now.

properties.title: Fattoi 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Localita' Capanna, 101, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Stalky underbrush, crushed violet and woodland berry aromas lead the way. The brisk palate offers tart cherry, clove, a hint of chopped herb and an orange zest note alongside racy acidity. Tightly knit tannins leave a firm finish.

properties.title: Francis Ford Coppola 2012 I Mille Cabernet Franc (Knights Valley)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: The inaugural vintage of this 100% varietal wine, this was given two years in French oak, half of it new. It's wide in approach, showing full-bodied richness and concentration, its flavors trafficking in bacon, juicy cherry and vanilla.

properties.title: Francis Ford Coppola 2014 Diamond Collection Silver Label Pinot Noir (Monterey County)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Somewhat restrained aromas of dried cranberry and pomegarante mix with light herbs and spices on the nose of this bottling. It's vibrant, fun and easy-to-drink on the palate, where the simple red-fruit flavors make it perfect for the beach or poolside.

properties.title: Godiolo 2013  Rosso di Montepulciano
properties.address: Via dell'Acquapuzzola, 13, 53045 Montepulciano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with Sangiovese and a touch of Colorino and Canaiolo, this easygoing wine offers pretty aromas of violet and red cherry. The soft, enjoyable palate doles out crushed raspberry, clove and a touch of orange peel. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Zotovich Cellars 2013 Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 300 N 12th St building 1 d, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: The nose on this wine is a little weak and somewhat primary in nature, showing grapeseed, light fennel, cola, pressed olallieberries and raspberry sorbet. Light red-cherry juice is lifted by anise and cinnamon on the palate. It's fresh and quaffable but doesn't come together in an elegant manner.

properties.title: Banfi 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: 1111 Cedar Swamp Rd, Glen Head, NY 11545, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of underbrush, red berry, tilled soil and a whiff of menthol come together on this. The easygoing, vibrant palate offers black cherry, espresso and a hint of star anise alongside zesty acidity and polished tannins.

properties.title: Billsboro 2015 Sawmill Creek Vineyards Rosé of Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4760 W Lake Rd, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.descrption: Delicate sour-cherry and raspberry notes are accented by bramble and smoke in this dry Pinot Noir rosé. High-toned acidity is a bit puckering, but works particularly well to enjoying with food. The finish is brisk but clean.

properties.title: Camigliano 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Via d'Ingresso 2, Loc. Camigliano, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of red berry, underbrush, chopped herb and a toasted note lead the nose. On the rather lean palate, notes of espresso, toasted hazelnut and sage accent a sour cherry core.

properties.title: Capanna 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Loc. Capanna, 333, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of underbrush, espresso, menthol and aromatic herb lead the nose. The straightforward, easy-drinking palate shows red berry, hazelnut, white pepper and a slightly green note of dried sage alongside firm acidity and not very persistent tannins.

properties.title: C&T; 2006 Patio Pinot Noir (Napa-Sonoma)
properties.address: 201 NE De Bell Ave, Bartlesville, OK 74006, USA
properties.descrption: A little harsh in the mouth, with minty, peppery flavors and tart acids, but you'll find enough cherry and cola flavor to satisfy, and the structure is silky and light.

properties.title: Herdade do Esporão 2007 Vinha de Defesa Rosé Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: 9CJR+7GW, 7200, Portugal
properties.descrption: With its grey/pink color, aromas of cherry and raspberry and its fresh fruity flavor, this is a great apèritif rosé. The taste shows some caramel and sweet-ness, crispened with acidity.

properties.title: Companhia das Quintas 2002 Pegos Claros Castelão (Palmela)
properties.address: R. da Fonte Nova, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.descrption: The local variety in Palmela is Castelão, planted in vineyards in the peninsula just south of Lisbon. It is a distinctive flavor of bright red fruits, rhubarb acidity, a core of very dry tannin and vivid mint flavors. The end brings out jam, acidity and sweet juiciness.

properties.title: Finca Sophenia 2007 Altosur Malbec (Tupungato)
properties.address: Km 12.5, Ruta 89, M5561 Tupungato, Gualtallary, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: A bit of dust and leather for openers, with short black-fruit flavors and a big wave of tannins on the palate. So expect some grab and choppiness. Despite moderate hardness, there's good dark fruit and limited herbal intrusion.

properties.title: Obvio 2007 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: Obvio means obvious in Spanish, and this is an obvious yet fairly good Malbec. There's some ground spice, cinnamon and a little bretty cheese to the nose, but the palate is solid, and the berry and cherry flavors are correct for the variety. Best by the glass or in casual settings.

properties.title: Resta 2004 Red (Salice Salentino)
properties.address: 3832 Penn Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15201, USA
properties.descrption: Aromatic accents here include apple cider, chocolate and cherry. The wine has personality but sings out of tune in places, although it could work well with easy pasta or meat dishes. This expression of the wine has 80% Negroamaro and 20% Malvasia Nera.

properties.title: River Star 2004 Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 7450 Estrella Rd, San Miguel, CA 93451, USA
properties.descrption: I like this Merlot for its plush fruit and soft balance. It's bigtime in chocolate-infused blackberries, plums and cherries, with more exotic notes of Asian spices. Yet the finish is totally dry, and the tannins are rich and ripe. Seems at its best now.

properties.title: River Star 2004 Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 7450 Estrella Rd, San Miguel, CA 93451, USA
properties.descrption: The dryness hits you first, then the tannins. This is a Syrah that's hard and astringent, almost aggressive. But then the core of blackberries and cherries kicks in, turning spicy and licorice-like on the finish. Suddenly, the wine is interesting. One to watch, if the winemaker can manage those bigtime tannins.

properties.title: Talisman 2004 Wildcat Mountain Vineyard Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 13651 Arnold Dr, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: This is Steve MacRostie's vineyard, located in the far northwest of the appellation, practically in Sonoma Coast. Their '04 strikes me as a little heavy and obvious now, but that may be a function of its relative youth. The wine is dry and crisp, with jammy raspberry, cherry, cola and spice flavors. Could do interesting things in the next 3–5 years.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2005 Caladoc-Alicante Boushet Red (Estremadura)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.descrption: A big, burly, juicy wine, focusing on powerful red fruits and layers of acidity. The tannins are dense, but the fruit is more dominant. There are smoky flavors, spiked with licorice and blueberries. Caladoc is a cross between Malbec and Grenache, developed in France, rarely planted.

properties.title: Frei Brothers 2005 Reserve Merlot (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 2018 Frei Bros Winery Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Shows off the reasons why Dry Creek has achieved a good reputation for this finicky variety, Merlot. The wine isn't made big, gooey Napa-style. Instead, there's an herbal earthiness to the cherry-berry fruit, and the dry tannins suggest pairing with rich fare.

properties.title: Higueruela 2005 Garnacha (Almansa)
properties.address: C. Baltasar González Sáez, 34, 02694 Higueruela, Albacete, Spain
properties.descrption: Mostly Garnacha (with 12% Syrah), this Mediterranean-styled wine is locked and loaded on the nose: There's a ton of mineral, sunshine and earthy blackberry aromas. The palate is full with cherry and raspberry, and the acidity is strong enough to keep the wine stable. In the end it's almost lean and perky.

properties.title: Veraison 2003 Stagecoach Vineyard Synchrony Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 405 W 1st St, Palisade, CO 81526, USA
properties.descrption: Kudos to the winery for holding back this Cab Franc, Cab Sauvignon, Merlot and Malbec blend until it's had time to turn gently soft and velvety. It's at its peak now, showing a bouquet of blackberries, cherries, raspberries and cedar.

properties.title: J. Portugal Ramos 2003 Marquès de Borba Reserva Red (Alentejo)
properties.address: Adega Vila Santa, Estrada Nacional 4, 7100-149 Estremoz, Portugal
properties.descrption: The huge concentration of this wine reflects the hot 2003 vintage. There are aromas of ripe fruit skins, and flavors of big, juicy, hugely rich black fruits, with dark tannins and a hot texture.

properties.title: Kanonkop 2003 Paul Sauer Red (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: R44, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.descrption: Cigar, coffee and mocha on the nose, followed by smoke and tobacco on the palate, give this ageable wine a masculine, restrained edge. The fruit is soft and integrated but the structure good. Imagine sipping this one by a roaring fire—it has that kind of character.

properties.title: Clos du Val 2004 Reserve Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 5330 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: The '04 is close to the '03 in quality, but falls off in structure, no doubt due to the hot vintage. It's a little too soft to balance the cola and cherry-pie filling flavors. Still, it's elegant.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2004 Merlot (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: The winery did a nice job with this high production (19,000 cases) Merlot, which was assembled from various parts of the county. The wine is dry and spicy, with scoury tannins that frame cherry, tobacco, thyme and dill flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Fess Parker 2012 Bien Nacido Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 6200 Foxen Canyon Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: The late actor-turned-vintner's family keeps producing solid wines, including this bottling that offers earthy scents of beet juice and clove. The flavors are pomegranate-driven, with cardamom and allspice making the wine memorable and lasting on the finish.

properties.title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2012  Corton Vergennes
properties.address: 49 Rue Henri Challand, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: The Corton hill has a number of red Grand Cru sites, including Vergennes, which lies at the western end. The wine has power, although its more dominant character is richness. It's packed with red fruits, laced with dark tannins and spice, and freshened with black currant acidity. It's a wine for aging, drink from 2018.

properties.title: Lynmar 2012 Monastery Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3909 Frei Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: This inaugural vintage of Monastery shows a complex intermingling of herb and briny cheese rind along with soft and generous Asian spice and brambly blackberries. The savory characteristics persist into black tea and subtle black pepper, all the while accented by just-bloomed rose.

properties.title: Vega Sicilia 2009 Valbuena 5°  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Extrarradio Diseminados, 69, 47359 Valbuena de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: This is the best Valbuena since 2005, and it may be better than that. Exotic aromas of leather, lemon peel, sawdust and boysenberry come in front of a tannic but lively and intricate palate. Baked, heady flavors of black fruits, pepper and mocha finish with chocolate and vanilla as well as juicy acidity. Drink now through 2022.

properties.title: Lynmar 2012 Kanzler Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 3909 Frei Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: This is the winery's first Kanzler Vineyard Pinot Noir and its only Sonoma Coast appellation Pinot. The cool-climate vineyard offers ripe cherry and plum around a core of firm, velvety tannins. From there, vibrant cranberry and rhubarb flirt with black tea, while red apple, sage and sandalwood notes round out the flavors on the long finish.

properties.title: Poças 1992 Colheita  (Port)
properties.address: R. Visc. das Devesas 168, 4401-901 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: It may be 22 years old, but this wine is still so young. The long wood aging has brought out a toasty, smoothly textured character while not diminishing the bright acidity and hints of citrus and crispness. It's a beautiful wine that has been bottled at its peak, ready to drink.

properties.title: Poças 1997 Colheita  (Port)
properties.address: R. Visc. das Devesas 168, 4401-901 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: This wood-aged wine shows as much fruit as wood. It's complex and dense, with wonderful acidity and sweet raisin fruits that give richness. Acidity gives the wine a lift, but it's the aromas and silky texture that have the last word.

properties.title: Raúl Pérez 2010 Ultreia de Valtuille Mencía (Bierzo)
properties.address: 24530 Valtuille de Abajo, León, Spain
properties.descrption: Upon opening, this smells oaky and lemony, although airing brings it around. Fresh and mildly astringent on the palate, this tastes oaky and briny at first, then more complex, deep and toasty as it spreads out. Licorice, herb and background berry flavors are woody and still somewhat fiery on the finish. Drink 2015 through 2025.

properties.title: Ruca Malen 2010 Kinien de Don Raúl Red (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta Nacional 7 Km. 1059, Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Balsamic, dark-berry aromas come with notes of crushed minerals, coconut, resiny oak and chocolate. In the mouth, this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec and Petit Verdot is tight, focused and elegant. Spicy, cedary flavors of tobacco and baked black fruits finish long, with lasting touches of tobacco and fig. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Tantara 2012 Brosseau Pinot Noir (Chalone)
properties.address: 2330 Westgate Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: Tantara's take on the historic Chalone AVA, which is full of limestone marl and clay near the Pinnacles National Park, kicks off with dusty aromas of red earth, light menthol and raspberry-flavored Smarties candy. Strawberry, dried cherries, sage and herbs combine for unique, memorable flavors.

properties.title: Torrederos 2009 Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Carrer de Miquel Torres i Carbó, 6, 08720 Vilafranca del Penedès, Barcelona, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of crushed minerals, blackened spices, blackberry and dark cherry are integrated and whole. The palate is ripe and tannic but not fierce, with blackberry, black cherry, toast and spice flavors that finish chocolaty and rich, with nutmeg-like notes and length. Best from 2015 through 2022.

properties.title: Albert Morot 2012 Bressandes Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.address: 20 Av. Charles Jaffelin, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: This firm, dark and still young wine has intense acidity that comes from the red currant and raspberry fruit. The tannins though form the real basis of this concentrated wine. Great juicy fruits at the end will develop well. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Cesari 2010  Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
properties.address: Località Sorsei, 3, 37010 Cavaion veronese VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Smoke, graphite, blue flower, cedar and black pepper aromas take center stage on this bold, structured wine. Velvety tannins support the dense black cherry, plum and blackberry flavors, while notes of freshly ground pepper and nutmeg add depth. Thanks to fresh acidity it's already surprisingly drinkable but it also displays aging potential. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Ken Brown 2012 Garey Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 157 W Hwy 246, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.descrption: From the vineyard Ken Brown planted after a decade of experiments comes this complex wine, whose nose blends sour cherry, pine bark, black clove and pepper. It's lithe and bouncy on the palate, yet deeply flavorful too, with stewed raspberry flavors and a good tannic structure.

properties.title: Lachini 2012 Lachini Family Estate Pinot Noir (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 14455 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE Suite A, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: A deep rose color, this pretty wine seduces with sweet cherry and red plum fruit, rounded out with a dollop of cinnamon spice and buoyed with moderate acidity. Full, forward, flavorful and built for medium-term aging, this should be enjoyed now through 2020.

properties.title: Landmark 2012 Spring Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 101 Adobe Canyon Rd, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: From a vineyard within what locals call the Petaluma Gap, a cool area duly influenced by Pacific Ocean fog, this wine is intense in berry and bright, lush, spicy layers indicative of its cooler leanings. Pleasing, with clove and black tea between the fruit, it's approachable and impressive.

properties.title: Lange 2012 Lange Estate Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 18380 NE Buena Vista Dr, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: A hint of funk and a brambly character enhances this bright, textured wine. The fresh berry flavors carry light touches of baking spice, bark and toast. The tannins remain a bit stiff and should soften up a bit with further bottle age. Every element is in perfect proportion.

properties.title: Lange 2012 Yamhill-Carlton Assemblage Pinot Noir
properties.descrption: Carefully distinguished from the other Lange Pinots, this cuvée marries thick cherry fruit to highlights of cola, anise and earth. The winery's defining trait is crafting wines with impeccable balance, that are already seamless and highly approachable upon release, yet have the style and substance for cellaring over the next 8–10 years.

properties.title: Le Cadeau 2012 Équinoxe Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: Especially rich and complex in this outstanding vintage, this brings bright and deeply flavored cherry fruit front and center. There's a streak of chocolate and a whiff of composted earth—not too much. As the wine lingers through its finish, the luscious fruit impresses the most.

properties.title: Magnum Vinhos 2011 Ribeiro Santo Reserva Red (Dão)
properties.address: Quinta do Ribeiro Santo, 3430 Oliveira do Conde, Portugal
properties.descrption: Dão's local Alfrocheiro grape gives the intense color to this wine that also has Touriga Nacional and Tinta Roriz. The combination is a powerful, rich wine offering solid tannins and equally full black fruits. The wood aging is still showing strongly, so this wine needs to age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Proulx 2007 Black Label Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5424 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: A first-rate, delicious Zinfandel that shows Paso at its best. It offers a flood of blackberries and cherries that have a roasted edge, along with notes of cocoa, cassis, toasted almond, cinnamon and pepper. Very good now and for a few years.

properties.title: Vietti 2004 Tre Vigne  (Barbera d'Alba)
properties.address: Piazza Vittorio Veneto, 5, 12060 Castiglione Falletto CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a gorgeous Barbera d'Alba from the vicinity of Castiglione Falleto with a dark, concentrated ruby color and a multi-layered nose consisting of tar, licorice, blueberry and dried currant rounded off by a lovely accent of white truffle and moist earth. Spicy and tangy in the mouth with excellent acidity, this wine makes a good match to cream or cheese-based pasta sauces.

properties.title: Le Carré 2006 Barrel sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 13920 NY-54, Hammondsport, NY 14840, USA
properties.descrption: 89—91 Barrel sample. A single vineyard wine, from a small parcel right by the city of St-Emilion. This has blackberries, layers of bitter chocolate and dried currants. The fruit aftertaste is sweet.

properties.title: Château Lassègue 2006 Barrel sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.descrption: 89—91 Barrel sample. The top wine produced by Jess Jackson in St-Emilion, Lassègue is soft, ripe, open, packed with dark plums, very opulent.

properties.title: Château Branaire-Ducru 2008 Barrel sample  (Saint-Julien)
properties.descrption: 89-91 Barrel sample. Dark, somewhat austere, a wine that masks the generosity of Saint-Julien. Everything is there, but in grey and white, rather than vivid color.

properties.title: Château Clarke 2008 Barrel sample  (Listrac-Médoc)
properties.address: D208, 33480 Listrac-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: 89-91 Barrel sample. Well balanced, the fruit fresh but ripe. There is an edge of dry tannins which slashes through the fruit, giving a firm, dry aftertaste.

properties.title: Château de Fieuzal 2008 Barrel sample  (Pessac-Léognan)
properties.descrption: 89-91 Barrel sample. A ripe, soft wine, showing the caramel flavors of new wood as well big, blackberry fruits. It is certainly a ripe wine, which shows through well in the fresh juicy aftertaste.

properties.title: Château Margaux 2008 Pavillon Rouge de Château Margaux Barrel sample  (Margaux)
properties.address: 33460 Margaux-Cantenac, France
properties.descrption: 89-91 Barrel sample. A wine that has all the grace of Château Margaux, but just a hint of depth and power. The tannins stay soft, there are hints of spice and a distinct acidity.

properties.title: Goulée 2008 Barrel sample  (Médoc)
properties.descrption: 89-91 Barrel sample. Owned by Cos d'Estournel, this is made in a sumptuous style for a Médoc wine. It is plump, ripe, the fruit the sole event here. It is sweet black and rich. For early drinking.

properties.title: Château la Fleur de Boüard 2006 Barrel sample  (Lalande de Pomerol)
properties.address: route de bertineau - 33500 Neac, 33500 Néac, France
properties.descrption: 89—91 Barrel sample. Owned by Hubert de Bouärd of Château Angélus, this is an example of what can be done in the lesser appellations if money is no object. It is smooth, ripe, with new wood but not too much, powered by top quality, densely dry tannins.

properties.title: Château La Forge 2006 Barrel sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.descrption: 89—91 Barrel sample. A dark, chocolatey wine, with coffee and mocha elements. It's very powerful, the fruit is juicy, generous.

properties.title: Château Smith Haut Lafitte 2006 Barrel sample  (Pessac-Léognan)
properties.descrption: 89—91 Barrel sample. Very spicy wood aromas, but to taste the wine is better balanced. The wood seems to be integrated with the fruit, leaving a sweet, softly rich wine.

properties.title: Bodega Goulart 2007 Reserva Malbec-Cabernet Sauvignon (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.descrption: Attractive, somewhat unusual floral/violet aromas are in the lead, with blueberry, cassis and pastry sitting behind that. The palate is smooth yet lively, with flavors of wild berry, black currant, cola, chocolate and even bacon from the French oak. Tasty, balanced and interesting; 60% Malbec and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon.

properties.title: Château Coufran 2008 Barrel sample  (Haut-Médoc)
properties.descrption: 89-91 Barrel sample. Firm and dry, with powerful blackcurrant acids, a wine that has a strong mineral content, very concentrated and dark.

properties.title: St. Innocent 2015 Zenith Vineyard Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.descrption: Zenith is the winery's estate vineyard, and this wine is a standout among St. Innocent's 2015 Pinots. It's firm, dark and toasty, with full-flavored black-cherry fruit accented with dense veins of espresso, charred nuts and bitter chocolate. The structure supports those dark notes, and the chewy tannins and lengthy finish amplify them. Drink now through 2028.

properties.title: Lost Canyon 2014 Dutton Ranch Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Wafting baked bread aromas create a warm, inviting entry in this wine, which reveals medium-bodied layers of tart, tangy citrus, cranberry and pomegranate as it opens. High-toned yet deep, it offers balance and complexity and lingers on the finish.

properties.title: Rippon 2011 Rippon Mature Vine Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
properties.address: 246 Wanaka Mount Aspiring Road, Wanaka 9381, New Zealand
properties.descrption: This is a sexy wine from one of New Zealand's biodynamic stars. The aroma is a heady blend of cinnamon and earth notes, alongside game, chocolate, ripe red fruits, warm stones, and forrest floor. The palate manages to walk a line between plush and tart, savory and silky, and powerful and elegant. Drink now–2024.

properties.title: Chanin 2015 Duvarita Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 300 N 12th St, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Gavin Chanin has managed to make an Old World-styled wine with this bottling. More delicate than its boisterous Central Coast neighbors, it has an elegance that will appeal to Burgundy nuts. Pepper, pomegranate, cranberry and olive aromas lead into an extremely light palate of candied raspberry, red plum and uncrushed peppercorn flavors.

properties.title: Comartin 2014 Cuvée Cassidy G-S-M (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: Sagebrush, wild cherry, pomegranate, anise and crushed slate notes show on the nose of this blend of 45% Grenache, 50% Syrah and 5% Mourvèdre. Balanced acidity and tannins ensure good drinking both now and deep into the future, with chaparral-laced flavors of ripe raspberry, boysenberry and even watermelon.

properties.title: Dante Robere 2015 Love Ranch Mourvèdre (Madera)
properties.address: 1200 Wetmore Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Winemakers Dan Rosenberg and Bob Bossi have dialed this wine in. While not very deep in color, it packs an incredible amount of spicy, meaty notes into the aroma and an even greater amount of ripe, luscious fruit and spice flavors into the palate. It's a gentle giant that oozes with oak accents recalling cedar, cinnamon and vanilla that sink nicely into its plump cherry and plum flavors.

properties.title: Eradus 2015 Single Vineyard Pinot Noir (Awatere Valley)
properties.address: 1925 Redwood Pass, Rd 4, Blenheim 7274, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Aromas of ripe raspberry, chocolate, black olive, and green herbs all combine in this well put together wine. The palate is taut and focused, with silky tannins, mouth-watering acidity and a long herbal finish. Tightly wound, this is best sipped with food or a few years of bottle age. Drink now–2024.

properties.title: High Pass 2015 Union School Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: Lush dark fruits abound: Blackberries, boysenberries, black cherry and even a suggestion of cassis. This wine has excellent balance and polish, with restrained barrel flavors. The fruit speaks volumes.

properties.title: Duorum 2014 Colheita Red (Douro)
properties.address: 4800 Cox Rd #300, Glen Allen, VA 23060, USA
properties.descrption: Balanced, ripe and structured, this is a fine reflection of the minerality that comes from Douro vineyards. It has firm tannins along with perfumed berry fruit and bright acidity. The wine is ready to drink, although it will be better from 2017.

properties.title: François Buffet 2014 Les Narbantons Premier Cru  (Savigny-lès-Beaune)
properties.address: 7 Pl. de l'Église, 21190 Volnay, France
properties.descrption: This wine is fragrant and ripe while having a balanced, delicate structure. It offers plenty of fruit and acidity, with dusty tannins and sweet berry flavors. It should develop well and quickly. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2014  Morey-Saint-Denis
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: This perfumed wine features ripe tannins and strawberry flavors. It is structured, with good concentration and acidity. The wine is developing well with the richness as well as line of fresher acidity. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Maison Champy 2014 Les Vergelesses Premier Cru  (Savigny-lès-Beaune)
properties.descrption: The fruit and juicy acidity are the focus here, supported by smoky tannins. The wine will develop relatively quickly, full of fruit. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Nada Giuseppe 2013 Marcarini  (Barbaresco)
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of scorched soil, dried herb, leather and underbrush come together in the glass. The straightforward, solid palate offers dried cherry, grilled herb and star anise while fine-grained tannins leave a firm finish.

properties.title: Negretti 2012 Bricco Ambrogio  (Barolo)
properties.descrption: This opens with aromas suggesting toast, menthol, mature berry, coffee and a balsamic note. On the full-bodied palate, notes of white pepper, cinnamon and powdered sage accent dried black cherry while firm, close-grained tannins provide the framework.

properties.title: Pasquale Pelissero 2013 Cascina Crosa  (Barbaresco)
properties.descrption: You'll find earthy aromas of leather, truffle, violet, ripe black cherry and a funky whiff of game on this. The approachable palate offers fleshy dark cherry, cranberry, clove and a hint of licorice alongside firm but not very persistent tannins.

properties.title: Paul O'Brien 2013 Tempranillo (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 609 SE Pine St, Roseburg, OR 97470, USA
properties.descrption: Pure varietal, this was fermented in oak uprights and aged for two years in one-third new French and Hungarian oak. The oak accents complement tart flavors of raspberry and pomegranate. Give this another year or two of bottle age, and drink with pleasure from 2018 to 2025.

properties.title: Poderi Luigi Einaudi 2012 Terlo  (Barolo)
properties.address: Borgata Gombe, 31/32, 12063 Dogliani CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Initially a bit shy, this slowly opens in the glass to reveal aromas of ripe berry, leather, baking spice and a hint of scorched earth. The palate offers suggestions of raspberry compote, dried black cherry, vanilla and licorice alongside tightly wound tannins. A marked espresso note closes the finish. Drink after 2019.

properties.title: Quady North 2011 Arsenal Red (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 255 E California St, Jacksonville, OR 97530, USA
properties.descrption: Quady's Right Bank blend is three-quarters Cabernet Franc and one-quarter Merlot. Smoky and showing a lightly funky scent when opened, it develops into a leathery and tannic red wine, checkered with red and black fruits, hints of tobacco and a vein of graphite.

properties.title: Roadhouse Winery 2014 Purple Label Pinot Noir (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.address: 240 Center St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Big tannin and burly toasted oak make for a full-bodied, robust entry into this concentrated wine. It offers an undeniable hit of Dr. Pepper and wild mushrooms grown on a forest floor.

properties.title: Mendel 2013 Malbec (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.address: Terrada 1863, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Black plum, graphite and herbal tomato aromas are solid but subdued. There's weight to this Malbec but not much depth to the palate, while flavors of berry, cassis and tomato run low on complexity.

properties.title: La Spinetta 2012 Garretti  (Barolo)
properties.descrption: Aromas of toast, underbrush and a whiff of wet fur lead the nose. The structured palate offers hazelnut, crushed raspberry and grilled herb alongside assertive tannins that give it a firm finish.

properties.title: Lamadrid 2014 Single Vineyard Reserva Bonarda (Agrelo)
properties.descrption: Ripe blackberry, blueberry, graphite and toasty oak aromas make for a dark bouquet. This is slightly rough on the palate due to aggressive tartaric acidity, while flavors of ripe black fruits, cola, oak and chocolate finish with coconut and resiny oak notes.

properties.title: Macchia 2014 Lodi Native Maley's Lucas Rd Vineyard Zinfandel (Mokelumne River)
properties.address: 7099 E Peltier Rd, Acampo, CA 95220, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has a spicy allure, with seemingly more oak influence than most of the Lodi Native wines. Attractive nutmeg and cinnamon aromas lead to even more spicy flavors that are backed with moderate fruit flavors and some good tannic grip in the texture.

properties.title: Château Ferrière 2008 Barrel sample  (Margaux)
properties.descrption: 88-90 Barrel sample. With its minty aroma and high proportion of new wood, this is a wine which shows polish, a smooth, wood-laden texture offering a wine that will probably age quickly.

properties.title: Château de Chantegrive 2006 Barrel sample  (Graves)
properties.descrption: 88—90 Barrel sample. A light, fresh wine, with some good blackcurrant flavors. This offers clean, ripe fruit, soft tannins. The hint of dryness to finish is a bonus, suggesting some ageability.

properties.title: Château Tronquoy-Lalande 2008 Barrel sample  (Saint-Estèphe)
properties.address: Lieu-dit, Lalande, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: 88-90 Barrel sample. Smooth and opulent, with great swatches of ripe blackberry frutis. There is some bitterness from the wood but the end is intense.

properties.title: Terre da Vino 2003 Croere  (Barbera d'Alba Superiore)
properties.descrption: This Barbera d'Alba is aged 15 months in oak and boasts well-defined notes of exotic spice, cigar box and shades of sweet vanilla. You'll find the fruit in the mouth, especially on the plum-driven finish. Overall, the use of wood helps shape an attractive, well-structured wine.

properties.title: Michele Chiarlo 2005 La Court  (Barbera d'Asti)
properties.descrption: La Court represents a bigger and meatier style of Barbera d'Asti with good concentration and a parade of wild fruit and smoked bacon aromas. The wine has piquant acidity on the close and would pair with creamy lasagna or asparagus with béchamel sauce.

properties.title: Carica 2007 Kick Ranch Syrah (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: The winery has a good track record with Sauvignon Blancs from this vineyard. Now, they've produced a very good Syrah. It's a big, thick, Aussie Shiraz-style wine, with firm tannins housing flavors of blackberries, currants, mocha, sweet oak and black pepper. Dramatic and delicious.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2007 H3 Merlot (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.descrption: There is plenty of color and extract in this tannic wine. Blackberry fruit is at the core, and though aged in one third new oak, it is not evident in the flavors. A balanced and beautifully proportioned wine, which accurately captures the AVA's strengths.

properties.title: H. & M. Hofer 2007 Vom Kleinen Eichenfass Zweigelt (Niederösterreich)
properties.descrption: A smoothly textured, wood-aged wine, richly flavored with wild red berries and rhubarb, ripe toast giving vanilla and a sweet, licorice finish. This is bold and fruity, open and drinkable now.

properties.title: Château Bertineau Saint-Vincent 2008 Barrel sample  (Lalande de Pomerol)
properties.descrption: 87-89 Barrel sample. With its lovely fresh fruit, gentle tannins, spice and acidity, this is an easy, open, gentle wine. The fruit is ripe and floral.

properties.title: Château Haut-Sarpe 2008 Barrel sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.descrption: 87-89 Barrel sample. Minty aromas give lifted smooth fruit, with an edge of caramel toast. That sweetness seems to cut through the fruit, leaving the fresh acidity behind.

properties.title: Château Lalande-Borie 2008 Barrel sample  (Saint-Julien)
properties.descrption: 87-89 Barrel sample. A pleasurable, perfumed wine, with lovely fresh fruit and sweet flavors. It is relatively light, finishing freshly, with acidity and velvet tannins.

properties.title: Michele Chiarlo 2006 MonTald Albarossa (Monferrato)
properties.address: Strada Nizza-Canelli, 99, 14042 Calamandrana AT, Italy
properties.descrption: If you've never heard of the Albarossa variety before that's because it's a relatively new cross of Barbera and Nebbiolo. This groundbreaking wine is rich and deep with plush notes of Maraschino cherry and black currants backed by leather and spice. Definitely worth a look.

properties.title: Lamoretti 2006 Vinnalunga Red (Emilia-Romagna)
properties.address: Str. della Nave, 8, 43013 Casatico PR, Italy
properties.descrption: You can feel how this wine attempts greatness both in the thickness of the extraction and the intensity of the aromas. But there are those bitter and burnt notes that hold it back just a bit. Otherwise it delivers loads of bright red fruit and prune.

properties.title: Ledson 2009 Reserve Merlot (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7335 CA-12, Kenwood, CA 95409, USA
properties.descrption: A big wine, in the Ledson style, whose power comes at the cost of some elegance. Its dominant note is fruit—ripe and jammy in blackberries and chocolate—as well as sweet oak. Impressive for sheer mass, but would benefit from some restraint.

properties.title: Manuel Olivier 2010  Pommard
properties.address: 7 Rue des Grandes Vignes, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: This is an upright, firm wine that's solidly based around dense tannins as well as ripe red fruits. It has a very dry core giving a concentrated texture that means the wine needs to age. Give it 4–5 years.

properties.title: Elvio Cogno 2010 Vigna del Mandorlo  (Dolcetto d'Alba)
properties.descrption: Fleshy, soft and bright, this pretty Dolcetto offers a smooth quality of dark fruit, tobacco and spice backed by enough acidity to keep your palate refreshed. Pair it with cheesy pasta dishes.

properties.title: Torrevento 2011 Ottagono Riserva Nero di Troia (Castel del Monte)
properties.address: SP234 km 10, 70033 Corato BA, Italy
properties.descrption: Packaged in an extremely heavy bottle, this conveys aromas of underbrush, black berry and cake spice. The sleek palate offers mature black cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and black pepper alongside polished tannins. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: LXV 2012 Secret Craving Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 1306 Pine St B, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This is a very dark wine from the Kama Sutra-inspired winery, with aromas of creosote and blueberry. The flavors are quite thick with blackberry juice, balanced with pangs of acidity yet finishing on the soft side.

properties.title: Millbrook 2012 Proprietor's Special Reserve Cabernet Franc (Hudson River Region)
properties.address: 26 Wing Rd, Millbrook, NY 12545, USA
properties.descrption: Raspberries and cherry blossoms mingle on the nose of this pretty, perfumed wine. The palate is buoyant with fresh berry and cherry flavors, yet touches of forest floor and spice add complexity and depth. It's brisk in acidity and layered with fine, firm tannins.

properties.title: Mullan Road 2012 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: A first-release from this winery founded by Napa Valley's Dennis Cakebread, this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc from Seven Hills Vineyard shows notes of tomato leaf, chocolate, cherry and vanilla. The oak (44% new French and American) initially takes the lead. Fruit flavors are focused and soft, with the oak giving the tannins a slightly astringent feel.

properties.title: Netzl 2012 Edles Tal Red (Carnuntum)
properties.address: Rosenbergstraße 17, 2464 Göttlesbrunn, Austria
properties.descrption: Despite freshness and slenderness, there is something sumptuous about this red that recalls dark red velvet. The palate is crunchy, fresh, full-fruited and made for lighter fare: charcuterie as much as more delicate meat dishes.

properties.title: Ognissole 2013 Negroamaro (Salento)
properties.descrption: A sleek, elegant expression of Negroamaro, this opens with aromas of perfumed berry and exotic spice. The bright, juicy palate doles out ripe red cherry, crushed raspberry, clove and white pepper alongside a backbone of polished tannins and fresh acidity.

properties.title: Judith Beck 2012 Pinot Noir (Burgenland)
properties.address: In Den Reben 1, 7122 Gols, Austria
properties.descrption: Ripe red cherry and smoke aromas eminate from the nose of this wine. In the palate the alcoholic heat sticks out a little, but there is a good streak of acidity and a silky texture. Good to drink now but will also keep and evolve 2018–2019.

properties.title: Kingston Family 2013 Alazan Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Hijuela El Maitén S/N, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Fresh aromas of raspberry and cherry are slightly earthy. This shows purity and balance on the palate, while flavors of strawberry, raspberry and red plum come with chocolaty oak and mild spice. A dry finish tastes of oak-driven chocolate and crushed black pepper.

properties.title: Yeringberg 2012 Pinot Noir (Yarra Valley)
properties.address: 810 Maroondah Hwy, Coldstream VIC 3770, Australia
properties.descrption: This cherry-scented Pinot is straightforward, supple and easy to drink. Complexity comes from hints of cedar and menthol, while the finish is lined with fine, dusty tannins that elegantly linger.

properties.title: Drew 2012 Fog-Eater Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.descrption: This is lively, lean, and agile in style, from the fresh raspberry and cranberry aromas to the tangy raspberry flavors to the insistent tannins and firm acidity that frame it. Light to medium in body, this should soften and broaden in texture with time. Best after 2016.

properties.title: Georges Vigouroux 2011 Château Pech de Jammes Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Route de Toulouse CS20159 Cahors Cedex 9, 46003 Cahors, France
properties.descrption: One of the properties managed by Georges Vigouroux, this is located on the plateau, close to eastern edge of Cahors. The wine is rich, smooth and broad. A strong tannic structure is masked by the big, rounded black fruits and acidity. That makes for a wine that can be drunk soon, although it will be better from 2017.

properties.title: Gorman 2012 Zachary's Ladder Red (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon (50%), Syrah (32%) and Petit Verdot offers notes of blueberries and high-toned herbs that don't entirely seem to marry. Flavors are rich and concentrated with a supple feel.

properties.title: San Pedro 2010 1865 Single Vineyard Syrah (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: Av Vitacura 2670, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Spicy plum and cherry aromas are oaky and smell a bit like freshly laid cement. This is more tight and racy than fat or heavy, evidence of a cool vintage. Lightly herbal flavors of currant and plum are spicy and finish with oak-driven notes of toast as well as green olive and pointed acidity. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Landy Family Vineyards 2009 Estate Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3900 Piner Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: Classically ripe Russian River Pinot Noir, sweet and jammy in raspberries and cherries. Fortunately, fine tannins and acidity provide balance. It's a bit too sweet and rich in fruit, lacking some complexity, but fine for drinking now.

properties.title: Maetierra Dominum 2006 Gavanza  (Rioja)
properties.address: Ctra. de Murillo, 26500 Calahorra, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Subtle berry and rooty aromas create an inviting nose. The palate is full and chunky, with grabby tannins that thicken up cherry, herb and spice flavors. A little bit rich in style, with chocolate and earthiness to the finish.

properties.title: Maison Bleue 2010 Boushey Vineyard Petite Joie Marsanne (Yakima Valley)
properties.descrption: Whole-cluster pressed and fermented in French oak barrels, about one third new, this pure Marsanne is a deep gold, and scented with buttery, oily oak and vanilla. It's full in the mouth, bright and high-toned, with a mix of stone fruits.

properties.title: Ochoa 2009 Tempranillo-Garnacha (Navarra)
properties.address: C. de Miranda de Arga, 35, 31390 Olite, Navarra, Spain
properties.descrption: Dark, dense and nice on the nose, with aromas of dried cheese, blackberry and plum. Fresh, juicy and healthy in the mouth, with blackberry and plum flavors that run long and clean. Freshness and juicy clarity are this wine's chief attributes.

properties.title: Ramirez de la Piscina 2007 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Roasted and rustic smelling, with baked, brushy berry aromas. The palate is fresh, forward and well focused, with briary, roasted flavors of earthy berry and chocolate. Finishes with toasty oak flavors, chocolate and herbs along with heat and spice.
