properties.title: Retzlaff 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot (Livermore Valley)
properties.descrption: A nicely made Cab-Merlot blend with earthy, dark plum, spicy cinnamon and clove and a touch of menthol herby-ness, especially on the finish. The mellow texture on this wine will see that it pairs nicely with a range of fall and wintertime foods.

properties.title: Saviah 2008 Malbec (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Sharp and peppery, this Walla Walla Valley Malbec starts out fruity and forward, then brings in flavors of dried leaf and tea. It's a two-step wine, perhaps caught between youth and maturity.

properties.title: Signaterra 2009 Bella Luna Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4560 Cabernet Way, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: Made in a sweetly ripe, oaky manner, this is a drink-me-now Pinot Noir. Easy to like for its jammy raspberry, cherry and Dr. Pepper cola flavors. The acidity and soft tannins define the modern Russian River style.

properties.title: Vecordia 2009 Roble  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.descrption: A generous example of young Ribera. Dark mint, cola and blackberry aromas get more herbal with airing. The palate is secure and tannic, with ripe blackberry and sweet Bing cherry flavors. Chocolaty and tannic on the finish.

properties.title: Beccarello 2008 Passione Passito Cason Brusà Refosco (Veneto)
properties.address: Via Villabona, 87, 30175 Venezia VE, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a dessert wine made with red Refosco grapes from northern Italy that delivers savory aromas of spice, leather, tobacco and dried berry fruit. You feel the sweetness in the mouth, however, followed by soft tannins.

properties.title: Cameron Hughes 2009 Lot 278 Meritage (Spring Mountain District)
properties.address: 205 Concourse Blvd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.descrption: Good price for a wine this rich and pleasing. With masses of blackberries, cherries, currants, anise and cedar folded into firm tannins, it's ready to drink now. Just might be the best value you'll find in a Spring Mountain wine, red or white.

properties.title: Château Val Joanis 2008 Tradition Syrah (Luberon)
properties.descrption: A very drinkable Syrah that showcases the variety's peppery, herbal, red-fruited side. It's light to medium in body, with silky tannins and a crisp, mouthwatering finish.

properties.title: Sequiot 2008 Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon (Valencia)
properties.address: 719 Commercial St, Emporia, KS 66801, USA
properties.descrption: Smells like spiced fruit cake, prune and licorice. It's ripe and a touch syrupy, but genuine and not cloying or overly heavy. Tastes of baked plum and blackberry along with dark spices and chocolate. Chocolaty and coffee-tinged on the finish. 50% Tempranillo and 50% CS.

properties.title: Red Rock 2014 Reserve Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 3955 W Sunset Rd # 101, Las Vegas, NV 89118, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has ripeness and a kind of sweetness in the aroma. Good fresh cherry flavors glide along nicely on the smooth texture. It is medium bodied and balanced for easy enjoyment.

properties.title: Sketchbook 2013 Pinot Noir (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.descrption: This wine tastes rather light and lean. The aromas are like cherry and apple candy, and the flavors resemble not-quite-ripe red cherries and raspberries. It is dry and medium bodied.

properties.title: Telaya 2013 Turas Red
properties.descrption: This wine is a unique blend of Syrah (55%), Petit Verdot (a whopping 27%) and Malbec. Aromas of firepit, woodspice, dried herbs, lemon and barnyard are followed by surprisingly elegant fruit flavors, with Petit Verdot's often burly tannins nowhere to be found.

properties.title: Sivas-Sonoma 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: Blended with 12% Petite Sirah, this is a hearty, ripe and stewy wine, baked in plum and blackberry. A puckering girth of tannin unwraps itself in the glass as it goes. Cinnamon and black pepper play on the finish, along with a hint of dried herb.

properties.title: Eric Cottat 2014 La Vallée des Vignes  (Sancerre)
properties.address: Le Thou, 18300 Sury-en-Vaux, France
properties.descrption: This wine is ripe, jammy and full of juicy red fruits supported by tannins. The wine is still young, with its bright fruit very much to the fore. Let it round out before drinking, so wait until 2018.

properties.title: Firestone 2012 The Chairman Series Merlot (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: There's not much overt fruit on the nose of this wine, which instead shows plenty of papilla chile and bell-pepper elements. The body is light and peppery, proving easy to sip with red fruit and peppercorns, leading into a vanilla-kissed finish.

properties.title: Les Useres 2013 L'Alcalatén Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon (Vino de la Tierra de Castelló)
properties.descrption: Floral, soapy aromas of tomato, cherry and currant are light and lack commitment. This Tempranillo-blend feels rocky despite being light in body, while candied plum, red currant and rose hip flavors hollow out quickly and finish with scratchy tannins.

properties.title: :Nota Bene 2012 Cabernet Franc (Yakima Valley)
properties.descrption: This wine is 100% Cabernet Franc coming from Dineen (75%) and Ciel du Cheval vineyards. Barnyard, cherry, pencil box and spice aromas are followed by lightly styled game, dried cherry and medicine cabinet flavors.

properties.title: Retorno 2013 Garnacha (Calatayud)
properties.descrption: Spunky, edgy, slightly cheesy cherry and plum aromas come in front of a palate with crisp acidity and firm tannins. Tart plum and pie cherry flavors finish with scraping acidity and a touch of sourness.

properties.title: Joseph Mellot 2014 Les Thureaux  (Menetou-Salon)
properties.descrption: From chalk soil, this wine is textured with tight tannins lying over the red cherry and berry fruits. Not rich, it's more a gentle excursion into Pinot Noir giving freshness as well as that light structure. It offers perfumed acidity at the end.

properties.title: Liberty School 2013 Merlot (Central Coast)
properties.address: 2861 US-20, Sheridan, NY 14135, USA
properties.descrption: Turned earth, coffee grounds, asphalt and dried cherries show on the mushroomy nose of this widely available bottling. Black tea and strong coffee flavors emerge through a thick veil of chunky tannins.

properties.title: Vicente Gandia 2014 Dolmo Roble  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Ctra. Cheste a Godelleta, s/n, 46370 Chiva, Valencia, Spain
properties.descrption: Leather, raw wood and berry aromas start off this young wine. The palate is fairly raw and gripping, while herbal, peppery blackberry flavors finish with a toasty oak note and tannic rub.

properties.title: La Crema 2013 Pinot Noir (Los Carneros)
properties.address: 3575 Slusser Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: This producer continues to up its game with this brand. This wine offers a smoky, luxurious experience defined by black-cherry spice, smoky oak and a thickness of chocolate. Textured and full bodied, it's made for fans of a richer, more concentrated style.

properties.title: L'Ecole No. 41 2013 Estate Grown Merlot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of equal parts Seven Hills and Ferguson fruit. Aromas of raspberry, plum, tobacco and dark fruit lead to flavorful, polished tart fruit flavors. It's undeniable in its appeal.

properties.title: Dusted Valley 2013 Malbec (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 980 Merlot Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This wine announces itself with bright aromas of plum, blueberry, dried herb and spice. The flavors are broad, with espresso and citrus flavors on the finish. It's a prototype for the variety.

properties.title: Villa San Juliette 2013 Reserve Alicante Bouschet (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 6385 Cross Canyons Rd, San Miguel, CA 93451, USA
properties.descrption: Rich caramel and fudge tones mix with inviting crushed purple flowers, baked blackberries and vanilla on the nose of this bottling that features a red-fleshed grape rarely used alone. The palate is sharper than the lavish nose suggests, with fresh crushed elderberries and dried fennel spice.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2014 Domaine des Hospices de Belleville  (Fleurie)
properties.address: 7 Rue d'Enfer, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: This is a ripe wine that's also fresh and fruity. It has some structured tannins, along with a dense texture. At the same time, the red cherry and blueberry fruits have a crisp edge that finishes the wine with fine acidity. While the charity Hospices of Belleville owns land as part of its foundation, the wines are made by Beaune négociant Joseph Drouhin. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Joseph Drouhin 2014 Domaine des Hospices de Belleville  (Morgon)
properties.descrption: The wine is dense and structured. It has concentrated red-berry fruits that are backed up by firm tannins as well as acidity. The wine is ripe, still young and with its structure, it will be better from 2017. The charity Hospices of Belleville owns land as part of its foundation, with the wines being made by Beaune negociant Joseph Drouhin

properties.title: Kingston Family 2014 Lucero Syrah (Casablanca Valley)
properties.descrption: Ripe, earthy black-fruit aromas are spicy and a bit lactic from oak, hence, the palate is full and creamy, but with a good acidic cut. Blackberry, herbal spice and cool toasty oak flavors finish warm and plump.

properties.title: Koehler 2015 Rose of Grenache (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: Pale pink in color, this wine offers nice touches of bubblegum and watermelon, with lively white pepper for a complex twist. Clean and lovely lines of pink strawberry, rocky minerality and more of that intriguing pepper spice continue on the palate that leaves the mouth watering. It's a great pink.

properties.title: Alma Rosa 2013 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: Deep cherry, sagebrush and cola are laid across wet slate and purple flowers on a complex nose in this appellation-wide blend from Richard Sanford's team. Crushed wild herbs, like mint, sage, thyme and pine needle are prominent on the palate, backed up by a splash of red fruit.

properties.title: Ardor 2013 Art Den Hoed Vineyard Mourvèdre (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 4243 SE Belmont St UNIT 400, Portland, OR 97215, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of finely ground black pepper, green herbs, orange peel and cherry are followed by tart, soft, sumptuous cranberry and savory flavors. The finish extends into the distance. It's all about feel and focus.

properties.title: Casa Agricola Alexandre Relvas 2015 Herdade São Miguel Art. Terra Amphora Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Herdade da Pimenta - S. Miguel de Machede 7005 - 752, 7005-752 Évora, Portugal
properties.descrption: Fermented in amphorae, the wine is rich and dense as if it had been fermented in open fermenters. The wine is ripe and very concentrated, full of black plums and generous tannins. It still needs to age, so drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château d'Azur 2014 Tradition Red (Bandol)
properties.address: 1010 Chem. de la Peguière, 83270 Saint-Cyr-sur-Mer, France
properties.descrption: As is right for a Bandol, Mourvèdre is the dominant grape in this rich wine. It is spicy from the same wood aging that also gives a mint-chocolate flavor to the powerful red-plum and berry fruits. The wine is still young, still firm. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Clayhouse 2013 Old VInes Rio Cedar VIneyard Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2180 W Centre St, Shandon, CA 93461, USA
properties.descrption: A solid and nuanced sip of this varietal for a fair price, this bottling of older vines from Paso's eastern flanks shows plump elderberry and cedar on the elegant nose. A smoked-chocolate flavor hits the palate, bolstered by blackberry syrup, white pepper, bay leaf and dried basil, with plenty of both tannin and acid.

properties.title: Clos Troteligotte 2012 K-Lys Malbec (Cahors)
properties.descrption: Produced from 25-year-old vines, the wine was aged in oak for 24 months. It is a concentrated wine that is ripely spicy, full of black fruits and tannins that are still very present. It is a dense wine that will develop well, impressively rich and still balanced. Drink this wine from 2019.

properties.title: Clos Troteligotte 2015 K-Or Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Le Cap Blanc, 46090 Villesèque, France
properties.descrption: The wine is rich with a dusty tannic character. It has black-currant flavors that are packed with both fruitiness and balanced acidity. The organic grapes give a pure line of ripe fruits that are going to integrate well with the tannins. Drink starting from 2018.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2014 Gravas del Maipo Syrah (Buin)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: This ripe, dark Maipo Syrah opens with slightly generic aromas of blackberry and black cherry. Rich, resiny and creamy on the palate, this tastes oaky at first; next come roasted spicy blackberry flavors in front of a minty finish with wood-spice notes and barrel-related tannins. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: Culton 2013 Worth Hill VIneyard Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 480-A Marquita Ave, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Reserved on the nose at first, this wine eventually releases pressed black raspberry and elderberry fruit as well as a peppery teriyaki element. Similar fresh fruit shows on the palate, enhanced by anise, dried sage and other aromatic herbs.

properties.title: Dehlinger 2013 Altamont Syrah (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4101 Vine Hill Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: The second of the producer's estate Syrahs, this one planted in Altamont soils, this full-bodied beauty shows juicy acidity in support of blackberry, blueberry and black licorice. Compost and tea provide an earthy underside, as the finish grips in leather.

properties.title: Doyenne 2013 Grand Ciel Grand Ciel Vineyard Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St Suite 101, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas are brooding, with notes of orange peel, mineral, raspberry and cranberry. The palate is flavorful yet reserved with a lingering fruit-filled finish.

properties.title: Tommasi 2010 Poggio al Tufo Rompi­collo  (Maremma Toscana)
properties.address: Via Ronchetto, 4, 37029 Pedemonte di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: A bright and easy blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon, this would taste great with grilled sausage or barbecued chicken. A vein of fresh acidity is followed by notes of black cherry, dried raspberry and mild spice.

properties.title: Caldora Vini 2011  Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
properties.address: Via Civiltà del Lavoro, SNC, 66026 Ortona CH, Italy
properties.descrption: Perfectly suited for home-cooked comfort meals like lasagna or meatloaf, this is rich, dense and soft, with endnotes of blackberry, cherry and tobacco.

properties.title: Domaine Laurens 2009 Cuvée de Flars  (Marcillac)
properties.descrption: A blend of 20% Cabernet Sauvignon and 80% Fer Servadou, this is the top cuvée from Domaine Laurens. It has a new wood richness and firm tannins, with an herbal character that blends into the blackberry fruit. Age for another year.

properties.title: Fabre Montmayou 2011 Phebus Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Roque Sáenz Peña, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Aromas of dark berry, rubber and a smoky quality define the bouquet. It feels nice, with a slight tannic grab and likable flavors of red berry and pepper. Short on the finish, but it's fresh and clean.

properties.title: Gracianna 2010 Bacigalupi Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: There are massive flavors in this wine, and they're delicious. It just floods the mouth with milk chocolate, raspberry cream and cherry pie-filling flavors. The wine is pretty high in alcohol, but it's a classically rich, ripe Sonoma Zin.

properties.title: Enoport 2013 Vinhas Altas Reserva Syrah (Tejo)
properties.descrption: This is a pleasant fruity wine in a bottle that is too heavy for its attractively light and soft contents. There are red berry fruits followed by rounded tannins and layers of ripe fruits. Drink now.

properties.title: Fattoria di Valiano 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Località Valiano, 53011 Castelnuovo Berardenga SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This bright, easygoing wine is endowed with fragrant violet, iris, red berry and tilled soil aromas. The sleek, no-frills palate offers crushed red berry, white pepper and a hint of coffee alongside lively acidity and limber tannins. It's simple but well made. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Fattoria Montecchio 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Str. Montecchio, 4, 50028 San Donato FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with Sangiovese and 10% Merlot, this opens with aromas of blackberry jam, iris and a whiff of new leather. The zesty palate shows black cherry and a hint of clove alongside brisk acidity and drying tannins that leave a sharp finish.

properties.title: Castello di Selvole 2011 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Localita, 53019 Selvole SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with pretty scents of plum, blue flower, baking spice and a whiff of leather. The lean palate doesn't live up to the nose, showing raw sour cherry, orange peel and a hint of fennel seed accompanied by dusty, fleeting tannins that dry out the finish.

properties.title: Cave du Marmandais 2014 Château Soubiran Red (Côtes du Marmandais)
properties.address: La Cure, 47250 Cocumont, France
properties.descrption: A blend of Merlot and Malbec, this is firm and still tannic, with a rich backdrop of broad fruits. Black currant and black cherry flavors are cut with acidity to give a tight texture. The aftertaste is smoky and ripe. The wine has good aging potential, so drink from 2017.

properties.title: Inconceivable 2014 The Fog Prince Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.descrption: Packaged with a label depicting a colorful if inventive map of the appellation, this wine conveys hibiscus punch, cranberry and cherry notes on the nose, with a touch of lavender and sagebrush. Biting acidity and peppery grip dance on the palate, where cranberry and plum skins are tart and bitter but leveled by fresh oregano herbs.

properties.title: Ken Brown 2013 Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 157 W Hwy 246, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.descrption: An entry-level wine from the pioneering vintner, this works as an everyday sipper, with notes of black cherry, crushed clove and tarry earth on the nose. The medium-bodied palate offers grippy cranberry flavors with dark spice and a tart sizzle.

properties.title: Le Bèrne 2014  Rosso di Montepulciano
properties.address: Via di Poggio Golo, 7, 53045 Cervognano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 100% Sangiovese, this easygoing wine has subdued aromas of blue flower and strawberry. The straightforward palate shows crushed red cherry, leather and a sprinkling of cake spice.

properties.title: Wirra Wirra 2013 Scrubby Rise Shiraz-Cabernet Sauvignon-Petit Verdot Red (Adelaide)
properties.address: 255 Strout Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: This simple, quaffable red is a solid introduction to the Wirra Wirra stable. Ribena-like cassis notes dominate, picking up hints of vanilla on the palate and finishing crisp and dry.

properties.title: Alain Brumont 2015 Brumont Red (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: Château, Montus, 65700 Castelnau-Rivière-Basse, France
properties.descrption: Half Merlot and half Tannat, this is a wine to drink young for its fruitiness. Blackberry flavors dominate over the gentle tannins and intense succulent acidity. The wine is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Maragas 2014 Tootsie Red (Oregon)
properties.address: 15523 US-97, Culver, OR 97734, USA
properties.descrption: One of the most unusual wines you'll ever encounter, this is a field blend of a single vineyard block planted to 25 different varieties. It's a tawny-rose color, off dry and quite fruity, with suggestions of citrus, peaches, stone fruits and more. Though not fortified, it's almost Port-like in color and flavor.

properties.title: Puccioni 2012 Petite Sirah (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: Soft and approachable, this full-bodied wine features classic elements of blueberry, blackberry and leathery chocolate that finish without much ado.

properties.title: Ruffino 2012 Tenuta Santedame  (Chianti Classico)
properties.descrption: Aromas of ripe black-skinned fruit, ground pepper and a whiff of toast lead the nose. The straightforward palate offers dried cherry, pomegranate and roasted coffee bean alongside fine-grained but fleeting tannins that leave a mouth-puckering finish.

properties.title: Season 2012 Phoenix Red (Southern Oregon)
properties.descrption: The winery calls this a Super-Tuscan blend, though the inclusion of 38% Carmenère might have some Italian vintners scratching their heads. The rest is mostly Sangiovese, with bits of Syrah and Cabernet as well. Juicy citrus and purple berries, some pomegranate and dark chocolate can be found, along with the green bean, stemmy flavors of Carmenère.

properties.title: St. Francis 2013 Three Valleys Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: Sweet, ripe tannins are embraced by a soft texture and touches of black pepper in this multiple appellation wine. Robust, if not bordering on crazy ripe, it needs food to find itself fully.

properties.title: Summers 2013 Two Acre Villa Andriana Vineyard Zinfandel (Calistoga)
properties.descrption: A leathery texture gives this wine a rough, roguish edge, around flavors of baked plum and mocha. Medium bodied, it's approachable and ready to enjoy now.

properties.title: Villa Mangiacane 2011 District Z Gran Selezione  (Chianti Classico)
properties.descrption: Packaged in an extremely heavy bottle, this has a muted nose that eventually reveals French oak and menthol. Showing the heat of the vintage, the palate is starting to dry out, offering toast, prune, coffee, raisin and evident alcohol alongside raspy tannins that leave an astringent finish.

properties.title: Viña Requingua 2014 Puerto Viejo Estate Bottled Reserve Carmenère (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: Av. El Cerro 056, Providencia, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Dry, mild, dusty berry aromas are simple but correct for the variety. This feels scattered across the palate, with some stickiness. Resiny, oaky, buttery flavors of generic berry fruits finish short, with a mild but lasting green note.

properties.title: Quivira 2014 Black Boar Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: Measured oak cradles spicy pepper and a richness of vanilla-kissed black cherry and blackberry in this bold, full-bodied wine, that yes, would pair deliciously with wild boar.

properties.title: MontGras 2014 Antu Syrah (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Camino Isla de Yáquil s/N, Palmilla, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Loam, berry, lavender and spice aromas are all welcoming. This is full in body—solidly structured and tannic. Savory to the max flavors of peppery berries finish tight and juicy. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Ott & Murphy 2013 Boushey Vineyard Syrah (Yakima Valley)
properties.descrption: Aromas of mineral, dried herb and plum are followed by fruit flavors that display depth and purity. It shows a lovely sense of elegance.

properties.title: Pianetta 2013 Barbera (Central Coast)
properties.address: 829 13th St, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Allspice, cinnamon cookies and nutmeg kick off the nose of this bottling, then come turned earth and blueberry fruit. Hearty blueberry and blackberry fruits show on the sip alongside coffee grinds and cooked meats. It's quite hearty in structure, but fruity all around.

properties.title: Saddleback 2014 Merlot (Oakville)
properties.descrption: This is a thick, rich and chocolate-laden wine, soft and generously ladened with tannin. Cigar, cedar and dried sage remind one of its varietal intent, while its medium-bodied size allows for plushness on the palate.

properties.title: Smith & Hook 2013 Proprietary Red (Central Coast)
properties.address: 9201 Seawell School Rd, Chapel Hill, NC 27516, USA
properties.descrption: Dark and hearty in the glass, this blend of Merlot, Malbec, Petite Sirah and Cabernet Sauvignon is lush and inviting to the nose, with milk chocolate, caramel, black cherry and crème de cassis aromas. The palate shows tobacco and coffee tones as well as black cherry, black currant and elderberry fruit, with tannins that settle in softly.

properties.title: Sobon Estate 2014 Rocky Top Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.descrption: Rich, spicy aromas and flavors of black cherry and cedar make this full-bodied wine from one of the longest-running wineries in California's Sierra Foothills hard to resist. It has a feeling of breadth and depth on the palate alongside lush layers of tasty fruit.

properties.title: SOLID 2012 Proprietary Red (California)
properties.descrption: Bold, well structured and nicely dry, this wine has plenty of dark-red color, appetizing black-cherry and wild-berry aromas, and ample but not overripe fruit flavors. A full-bodied, grown-up kind of wine, it doesn't overdo anything and will be great at the dinner table.

properties.title: Stéphane Aviron 2014 Vieilles Vignes  (Côte de Brouilly)
properties.address: 1347 Danforth Ave, Toronto, ON M4J 1N1, Canada
properties.descrption: Old vines, at least 40-years-old, are behind this ripely structured wine. It was wood aged to give the extra richness this producer looks for. With concentration and tannins, this cru will age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Tenuta Sette Ponti 2013 Oreno Red (Toscana)
properties.descrption: A blend of 50% Merlot, 40% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Petit Verdot, this opens with aromas of dark plum, tobacco, cooking spice and a balsamic note. The dense palate delivers black currant, licorice and clove set against round, polished tannins.

properties.title: Two Paddocks 2015 Estate Vineyards Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
properties.address: Otago 9391, New Zealand
properties.descrption: The blended wine from Two Paddocks is a crowd-pleaser in 2015, offering medium body, silky tannins and enjoyable notes of baking spices and red cherries. It's a fine introduction to the brand and the region, delicious now, yet capable of aging through at least 2020.

properties.title: Le Macchiole 2013 Rosso  (Bolgheri)
properties.descrption: Made with 50% Merlot, 30% Cabernet Franc and 20% Syrah, this offers aromas of red plum, black currant and clove. The savory palate delivers black cherry, blueberry jam and licorice alongside smooth silky tannins.

properties.title: Podere San Giacomo 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Podere Sangiacomo dei Collodi n60, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with aromas of toast, French oak, chopped mint and coconut. The dense, approachable palate offers dried black cherry, raspberry jam, anise, coffee and a vanilla note alongside chewy tannins. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Poggio Scalette 2013 Il Carbonaione Sangiovese (Alta Valle della Greve)
properties.address: Località Ruffoli, Località Barbiano, 7, 50022 Greve in Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: New leather, blue flower, espresso, chopped herb and mature plum aromas lead the way. The dense palate offers black cherry, blackberry, sage, clove and star anise set against firm fine-grained tannins that leave an assertive finish.

properties.title: Siro Pacenti 2010 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of truffle, underbrush, tilled soil and mature dark-skinned fruit take shape on this full-bodied red. The powerfully structured palate offers macerated black cherry, cassis, espresso and licorice alongside the warmth of alcohol. Firm close-grained tannins provide the gripping framework. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Esperto 2011 Pinot Nero (Delle Venezie)
properties.descrption: This easy-drinking wine offers bright red cherry, wild strawberry and crushed raspberry flavors. Sleek, simple and well made, it should be enjoyed young to capture the fresh fruit.

properties.title: Ram's Gate 2012 Durell Vineyards Syrah (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 28700 Arnold Dr, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Another 100% Syrah from the producer aged in two-thirds new French oak for 18 months, this has a dullness around the fruit, a sourness almost, that is not otherwise sparked by its notes of meat and gunpowder.

properties.title: Adega Cooperativa de Borba 2012 Montes Claros Reserva Red (Alentejo)
properties.address: Largo Gago Coutinho e Sacadura Cabral 25, 7151-913 Borba, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a tough wine, filled with tannins and missing out on the fruit. Its structure is powerful, dark and dry, packing a punch of the hard texture. There is some juicy fruit, although it is not likely to ever soften the wine completely.

properties.title: Antoine Simoneau 2012 Domaine de la Rabelais Touraine Chenonceaux Malbec-Cabernet Franc (Touraine)
properties.address: 21 Rue des Vignes, 41400 Saint-Georges-sur-Cher, France
properties.descrption: In the Loire, while Malbec remains dry, it has a softer profile, giving stalky blackberry fruits and very fresh acidity. This wine is light and likely to mature quickly. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Bailiwick 2012 Sangiacomo Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: Light and ethereal in color, this vineyard-designated wine has a thinness. It's also marked by a funky herbal taste that can best be described as bouquet garni, but especially sage, veering into tomato leaf.

properties.title: Barton & Guestier 2013 Passeport  (Beaujolais)
properties.address: 6161 S Yale Ave, Tulsa, OK 74136, USA
properties.descrption: Aromatic and fruity, this is a soft and ready-to-drink wine. It has the lightest touch of tannins, a fresh wild-strawberry flavor and a finish that is dry and crisp in acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Caves Velhas 2013 Serradayres Red (Tejo)
properties.descrption: Too much wood aging gives this wine a burnt, dry character. Beneath this almost-bitter texture lie hints of ripe red fruits and acidity. Wait until 2016 and the wine may become more fruity.

properties.title: Deering 2011 Maus Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
properties.descrption: Juicy in a slightly overripe way, this sweet, plummy and jammy wine is soft and supple in broad tannins. On the finish, a combination of smoke and vanilla make their point.

properties.title: Reustle 2013 Winemaker's Reserve Syrah (Umpqua Valley)
properties.descrption: Spicy purple fruits come up quickly, followed by flavors of leaf, earth and stem. Tannins are tight and slightly coarse, and it ends suddenly.

properties.title: The Auctor 2013 Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2922 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of 57% Syrah, 35% Grenache, 6% Mourvèdre and 2% Cabernet Sauvignon shows black plums, roasted figs, cinnamon stick, uncrushed clove and star anise on the nose. That great nose doesn't translate yet to the palate, which is sticky with dark plum skin tannins, and proves a bit too leathery for drinking right now. Wait awhile and this one might work better.

properties.title: Bergström 2011 Bergström Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 8115 NE Worden Hill Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: The best of the 2011 Pinots from Bergström, this firm and balanced wine is based upon a solid core of raspberry and cherry fruit. Nicely framing the ripe fruit flavors are streaks of herb, leaf and stem, all in proportion with not a hint of bitterness. A lick of orange peel elevates the finish.

properties.title: Château Lagrézette 2011 Cuvée Dame Honneur Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: lieu dit, Dom. de Lagrezette, 46140 Caillac, France
properties.descrption: This is a big, chocolate and dense fruit flavored wine. It shows strong signs of extraction, giving a bitter character along with licorice flavors. That's balanced by the great weight of fruit, solid fruit tannins and rich smoky flavors. Drink this powerful wine from 2018.

properties.title: Marimar Estate 2010 Don Miguel Vineyard Estate Grown & Bottled Unfiltered Syrah-Tempranillo (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Tempranillo brings its signature delicacy, acidity and cherry fruit. Syrah contributes the weight, black pepper, tannins and, in this case, a cool-climate note of roasted meat. The result is a beautiful and versatile wine, complex and dry, that will go with just about anything calling for a medium-bodied red.

properties.title: Sbragia 2011 La Promessa Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 9990 Dry Creek Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Sbragia's Zinfandels from Dry Creek Valley always are big, lusty but complex, and this '11 is no exception. It's massively concentrated in briary wild mulberries, plums and blackberries, coffee, tobacco and spices, wrapped into a jacket of sweetly toasted oak. The tannins are strong and brilliant. It will age for many, many years.

properties.title: Château Cadet-Piola 2006  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: Au Cadet, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: One of the less well-known classed growths from Saint-Emilion, Cadet-Piola produced a 2006 that is now mature, ripe and smooth. Firm tannins keep the truffle and violet flavors together. It is now ready to drink.

properties.title: Château Nozières 2011 Ambroise de l'Her Malbec (Cahors)
properties.descrption: This big, bold and ripe wine is packed both with tannins and concentrated, ripe fruits. It's smooth, opulent, with a burst of black berry flavors that are shaped by the firm structure. The wood aging shows as spice and smokiness, giving further richness to this powerful wine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Cortes de Cima 2011 Homenagem a Hans Christian Andersen Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: Writer Hans Christian Andersen lived in Portugal for a short time and this is a homage from the Danish owner of Cortes de Cima. It's a powerful wine with a dark side that's very suitable for those fairy stories. Big tannins, black fruits and a dense structure all promise aging. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Benovia 2011 La Pommeraie Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This has been a remarkably consistent bottling from Benovia over the last several vintages. The wine is bone dry and zesty in acidity, with rich layers of raspberries, cranberries and persimmons. Tannic notes of dried tea leaf and exotic baking spices bring extra complexities to this ageworthy wine. Drink 2015–2020.

properties.title: Vicente Gandia 2014 El Miracle by Mariscal Garnacha Tintorera (Valencia)
properties.address: Ctra. Cheste a Godelleta, s/n, 46370 Chiva, Valencia, Spain
properties.descrption: Stalky compost and wilted floral aromas are as present as the underlying basic berry scents. This varietal Alicante Bouschet is tannic and slightly abrasive in feel, while warm, bitter, peppery plum and cherry flavors leave heat and burn on the finish.

properties.title: Convento Oreja 2014 Roble  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: C/ de La Fuente, s/n, 47300 Peñafiel, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Grapy wild blackberry aromas and then a tough, tannic palate tell you most of what you need to know about this hard-knuckled specimen. Flavors of grape skins, plum and blackened spice finish bitter and peppery.

properties.title: El Coto 2012 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: Calle Cmno. Viejo, 26, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Stalky berry aromas lack overt ripeness and pop. This feels pushed to the center, with minimal mouthfeel. Stalky, lightly burnt and leathery berry flavors finish hot and dried out.

properties.title: Chime 2013 Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 7876 WI-188, Prairie Du Sac, WI 53578, USA
properties.descrption: The color is unusually light and brick-red, and this wine as a whole is rather light. Aromas are quite vivid and sharp, like smoke, herbs and rhubarb. The flavor is complex before it turns lean and sharp on the finish.

properties.title: Enoteca Five 2012 Ripken Vineyards Petit Verdot (Lodi)
properties.address: 2111 Research Dr STE 6, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: An unusual floral aroma is matched by a super fruity-floral flavor that dominates the taste. The wine is full bodied, somewhat tannic and seems a bit sweet due to the flavor spectrum.

properties.title: Merriam 2010 Jones Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: This 100% varietal wine was aged 18 months in American oak and is vaguely pharmaceutical in aromas. Its elusive fruit stays wrapped in thick, unforgiving tannin.

properties.title: Owl Ridge 2012 Syrah (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2064 Gravenstein Hwy N Unit 120, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: Juicy at first, this wine begins to dull on the palate, offering not much in terms of flavor, with plenty of powerful tannin.

properties.title: Wellington 2011 Meeks Hilltop Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 11600 Dunbar Rd, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: Somewhat unstructured and overripe, this wine doesn't display much fruit, but has plenty of oak, particularly on the finish.

properties.title: Ochoa 2014 Rosado (Navarra)
properties.address: C. de Miranda de Arga, 35, 31390 Olite, Navarra, Spain
properties.descrption: This rosé lacks freshness from the start. The nose is mealy and smells of red-apple skins. An oily palate is grabby and flat, while briny melon flavors are also flat. Salty tasting on the finish.

properties.title: Cosentino 2012 Reserve Cabernet Franc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7415 St Helena Hwy, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: The eucalyptus in this wine detracts from what else might be going on. It provides a medicinal atmosphere that's hard to shake, leading the way to a lean, bitter finish.

properties.title: Philippe Girard 2014  Sancerre
properties.address: 37 Rue Général Leclerc, 21420 Savigny-lès-Beaune, France
properties.descrption: An earthy tasting wine, this has tannins and hints of soft, perfumed red fruits. Acidity gives the wine freshness although the dry, rustic character is off-putting.

properties.title: Dominio de Eguren 2014 Protocolo Rosado (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
properties.address: Laguardia Enparantza, 2, 01309 Páganos, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Dusty, briny aromas are low on fruit and charm. This has a hollow, flimsy makeup to go with bitter tangerine and raspberry flavors. At this point, it's almost not worth it. It's better to wait for the 2015.

properties.title: Hesvera 2014 Seis Meses  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: VA-101, 5, 47315 Pesquera de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Untamed, foxy aromas of wild berry, bramble bush and olive come in front of a palate with nails for tannins. This tastes highly herbal or mildly green, depending on how you look at it. A raw, hot finish renders this low on charm.

properties.title: Pope Valley Winery 2012 Eakle Ranch Sangiovese (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6613 Pope Valley Rd, Pope Valley, CA 94567, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is all bluster and brawn, pruney in its sweet, prolific tannin and oak. Dried cherry takes on a jammy, baked quality that devolves quickly amid the concentration and power.

properties.title: Thibault 2014 Fernand & Sons Pinot Noir (Coteaux du Giennois)
properties.address: 6 Rue des Moutiers, 51390 Bouilly, France
properties.descrption: This earthy wine presents barnyard flavors over the riper red fruit and licorice flavors. Drink now when the fruit is at its best.

properties.title: Black Box 2014 Red (California)
properties.address: Manteca, CA 95336, USA
properties.descrption: Oaky aromas like smoked bacon and rich, fruity flavors give this wine a lot of personality. It has a soft, thick texture and a hint of sweetness that rounds it out.

properties.title: Borsao 2014 Tres Picos Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
properties.descrption: A blast of burnt wood and sawmill is the greeting on this heavily oaked Garnacha. Specific aromas of wood shavings, creosote and Bourbon barrel amount to a sundae's worth of oak notes. Flavors of char, coffee, chocolate and burnt wood dominate this overly oaked wine that is weak on core fruit.

properties.title: Ébano 2014 6  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: N-122, 299, 47318 Castrillo de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Barnyard aromas atop berry scents make for a nose that's not entirely clean. A clipped, tough palate has hard tannins and short berry flavors. A finish with heat and bitterness makes this a tough go.

properties.title: Quinta de São Sebastião 2009 Reserva Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: Estr. de São Sebastião 9, 2630-288 Arruda dos Vinhos, Portugal
properties.descrption: A powerful, tannic wine, very dry and firm. Underneath the dry exterior, there are great fruits waiting to fully express themselves. It will always be a structured wine, the black fruits a serious component along with the spice from wood aging. Keep for 4–5 more years.

properties.title: Quinta do Portal 2008 Late Bottled Vintage  (Port)
properties.address: Quinta do Portal, 5060, Portugal
properties.descrption: With its stumpy, old fashioned bottle and cork, this is an LBV for aging. It is perfumed and smooth, with a core of solid tannins and a firm texture. Black fruits and just the right amount of sweetness balance the dryness of the spirit. Keep for several years, or drink now.

properties.title: Straight Line 2011 Syrah (Santa Barbara County)
properties.descrption: A very good Syrah that's even better than the 2010 because it's drier and has better structure. It's rich in blackberry jam, dark chocolate, bacon and black pepper flavors, wrapped up in smooth, creamy tannins. Drink now.

properties.title: Chiarello Family Vineyards 2010 Felicia Zinfandel (St. Helena)
properties.address: 6525 Washington St A-2, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.descrption: This is a high-alcohol Zin; it almost tastes like Port, with rich raisin, chocolate, blackberry and nettle flavors. It's admirable for sheer power, but will go to your head after a glass or two.

properties.title: Coastview 2009 Red Wine Red (Monterey County)
properties.address: 35127 Chualar Canyon Rd, Chualar, CA 93925, USA
properties.descrption: This Bordeaux-style blend is nothing like anything from Napa Valley. It's more acidic and tighter, with rustically old-fashioned tannins. Yet the blackberry, cherry, plum and raisin flavors are thoroughly modern. Pleasant now, and should hold for a few years.

properties.title: Georges Duboeuf 2011 Oak-Aged  (Moulin-à-Vent)
properties.address: 836 Rte de Fleurie, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.descrption: A step up from Sélection in the Moulin-à-Vent range from Duboeuf, this wine has been aged in oak for six months. The result is a ripe, smoothly textured wine, its cherry fruits offering an attractive smoky character. It could do with a year, even two, for aging.

properties.title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2010 Les Gourmandes  (Chorey-lès-Beaune)
properties.address: 49 Rue Henri Challand, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: Chorey-lès-Beaune, on the plain just north of Beaune, can offer—as here—good value for Burgundy. This wine, still showing some young austerity, has the potential to develop into a bold, fruity selection that will always have a firmer structured edge.

properties.title: La Tosa 2011 Vignamorello  (Gutturnio Classico Superiore)
properties.address: 6030 W North Ave, Wauwatosa, WI 53213, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Barbera and Bonarda opens with an inky dark appearance and offers fresh aromas of plump cherry fruit, cola and cherry liqueur. The wine is thick, dense and slightly sweet with an almost syrupy finish.

properties.title: Miro 2011 Floodgate Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This delicious Pinot Noir is Miro's best ever. It's ripe in fruit and spices, offering wave after wave of raspberry Newton, brown sugar, Dr. Pepper cola, cinnamon and sandalwood flavors that persist through a long finish. Easy to like now, but it's not an ager.

properties.title: Monteviejo 2007 Malbec-Syrah (Uco Valley)
properties.descrption: This blend of 80% Malbec with 20% Syrah is dense and rich but a touch flat on the nose, with blueberry and cumin accents. The palate feels heavy and tannic, while flavors of blackberry, prune and herbs are nice. A drawing, hard finish harks back to the tannic palate, and given that this is already six years old you might as well drink it now.

properties.title: Bedell 2010 Cabernet Franc (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 36225 Main Rd, Cutchogue, NY 11935, USA
properties.descrption: While it shares the same floral overtones, the 2010 Bedell Cabernet Franc is a marked contrast to the demure 2011 vintage. This one is a bold, concentrated powerhouse of red cherry flavor, with a rich, lavish texture and a dark granite minerality that's penetrating to the finish. Equally good, but fascinating side-by-side.

properties.title: Vista Hills 2010 Piedmont Estate Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6475 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: A distinctive streak of cola runs through this wine, along with a mix of wild strawberries and spice. It's elegant and seamless, doing a lovely, gentle fade into a lightly spicy finish.

properties.title: Paco Garcia 2008 Beautiful Things  (Rioja)
properties.address: Ctra. Ventas Blancas, s/n, 26143 Murillo de Río Leza, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy, oaky, leathery berry and spice aromas come around nicely with airing. This is a plump Rioja with modern leanings; it has good structure and pretty raspberry and cassis flavors. A round finish hints at raisiny maturity but doesn't overdo the ripeness. Drink through 2015.

properties.title: Sonoma-Cutrer 2010 Owsley Vineyard Estate Bottled Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4401 Slusser Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: Sonoma-Cutrer's Pinots have been disappointing in the past, but this release is a huge improvement. It's dry, silky in the mouth, and complex in flavors, offering hints of sour-cherry candy, red licorice, prosciutto, cola and sweet, smoky sandalwood. Best enjoyed now for its richness.

properties.title: Ampelos 2009 Gamma Syrah (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: This Syrah is inky black in color. It explodes on the palate with black currants, herbs and black pepper, with a distinct note of animal and char, like a roasted bone. There's some real complexity, as well as deliberate restraint. Good to drink now, with proper decanting, and could develop interestingly over the next 4–5 years.

properties.title: Château la Coste 2010 Les Pentes Douces Red (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.address: 2750 Route De La Cride, 13610 Le Puy-Sainte-Réparade, France
properties.descrption: The wine has considerable acidity that comes from the balance of Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon in the wine. Bold in tannins and complex in fruit flavors, it's a wine that will develop slowly and well. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Efeste 2010 Ceidleigh Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: Pronounced Kay-lee, this is sourced from Red Mountain, hence the graphite and grain in the tannins. Lush cherry, tobacco and earth flavors combine, with a whiff of smoke wafting through the wine from start to finish.

properties.title: Efeste 2010 Jolie Bouche Boushey Vineyard Syrah (Yakima Valley)
properties.descrption: The Jolie Bouche is dark and brambly, packed with blackberry fruit, baking spices and a dusting of black pepper. The supple tannins carry a streak of graphite and clean earth.

properties.title: Gordon Estate 2010 Estate Grown Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 671 Levey Rd, Pasco, WA 99301, USA
properties.descrption: This round, rich and spicy estate-grown Merlot greets you with all the right stuff (and stuffing) from the first sniff. Clean berry and cherry fruit, with a light touch of peppery herb, rolls into silky tannins and pretty baking spices. A fine value.

properties.title: Nittnaus Hans und Christine 2011 Nit'ana Red (Burgenland)
properties.address: Untere Hauptstraße 49, 7122 Gols, Austria
properties.descrption: Warm, cinnamon-spiced blueberry and plum flood the palate, while approachable and supple tannins charm their way from start to long finish. This has wonderful balance of structure, fruit and medium-full body. This has huge charm right now and is very seductive, but it will also age well, if you can wait.

properties.title: R&A; Pfaffl 2011 Altenberg Reserve St. Laurent (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: 2505 E Pine St, Tulsa, OK 74110, USA
properties.descrption: There is something subliminally medicinal about these aromas—the ethereal lift of herbal tinctures alloyed with dark plum and a generous dash of white pepper. This is not for beginners looking for easy fruit notes, but rather for those who like to converse with their wine. This layered, compelling and balanced glassful will provide food for thought with its finely structured tannins, medium body and bundles of flavor.

properties.title: The Gardener 2012 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This is the richest and most rewarding of the winery's 2012 range of Pinot Noirs. It's classically dry and silky, with brisk acidity and delicious raspberry jam and cherry pie flavors that have the earthiness of pomegranates and persimmons. It's fine to drink now and over the next six years.

properties.title: Iby 2011 Chevalier Blaufränkisch (Mittelburgenland)
properties.address: Am Blaufränkischweg 3, 7312 Horitschon, Austria
properties.descrption: If you expect coquettish flirting you must go elsewhere: this amply layered red will not give up its secrets easily. But engage with it and it will reward with poised, polished structure, subtle pepper spice and ripe but reined-in cherry fruit. The more time you spend with it, the more you'll discover. Ready from 2015.

properties.title: Leth 2011 Gigama Grande Reserve Zweigelt (Wagram-Donauland)
properties.address: Kirchengasse 6, 3481 Fels am Wagram, Austria
properties.descrption: An unusually rounded, fuller-bodied Zweigelt in a rather successful marriage with oak. Cinnamon, clove and vanilla flesh out the fresh cherry and blackberry flavors to result in a harmonious, appetizing wine with supple, ripe tannins and a resonant finish.

properties.title: Mas de la Dame 2009 La Stèle Red (Les Baux de Provence)
properties.address: Route départementale 5, 13520 Les Baux-de-Provence, France
properties.descrption: This wine is still youthful, but solidly structured, dense and concentrated. It's dry in style but laden with fruits that have only begun to show through. Give this impressive wine several more years in the cellar. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Black Kite 2011 Soberanes Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 1200 American Way, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: The new oak on this Pinot Noir dominates now with aromas and flavors of buttered toast and caramel. But underneath all that is a wine rich with raspberries, cherries, red licorice and mocha, and balanced with vital acidity. Give it a few years to let everything integrate.

properties.title: Blue Rock 2011 Baby Blue Red (Alexander Valley)
properties.descrption: This winery has succeeded in producing a lovely Bordeaux-blend wine in this difficult vintage. Based on Cabernet Sauvignon, and including all five classic Bordeaux grapes, this wine is rich and opulent with blackberry jam, blueberry, currant and anise flavors, enhanced with new oak. Give it a decant and enjoy it over the next year or two.

properties.title: Canoe Ridge 2010 Estate Grown Merlot Block 8 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 45 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This 100% varietal wine shows notes of raspberry and chocolate sprinkled with oak spices from time in 50% new French barrels. It's wound up tightly at present, packed to the brim with red fruit flavors and firm, slightly gritty tannins.

properties.title: Esterházy 2011 Estoras Red (Burgenland)
properties.descrption: Structured tannins dominate this blend of Blaufränkisch, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon right now, but dense yet sleeping plummy fruit and oaky spice are waiting in the background for their time to shine. This will relax into something slinky and fruitful if you have the patience to wait a year or two; drink after 2016.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2010 Trésor Red (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: Big-time tannins make this blend of all five classic Bordeaux varieties tight in character. Underneath the astringency are intense flavors of blackberries, cherries and currants that are liberally oaked. Dry and refined, the wine will develop bottle complexity after 2018.

properties.title: JM Cellars 2007 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14404 137th Pl NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Purple-black, with rich scents of bright boysenberry fruit, and an unusual earthy umami note that adds depth to the finish. Sharp, young, acidic and grapy, this drinks like a younger wine.

properties.title: Monte Cinco 2009 Malbec (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.address: 28719 E, WA-224, Benton City, WA 99320, USA
properties.descrption: Cedar and spice are the lead aromas, and beyond that there's blackberry, pepper and floral notes that rain complexity down on the bouquet. The palate is superrich, a bit tannic and deep as night, with black fruit, espresso, syrup and spice flavors. Finishes brawny and long, with toasty richness. Drink now through 2013.

properties.title: Monticello Vineyards 2008 Estate Grown Cabernet Franc (Oak Knoll District)
properties.address: 1211 Waukeenah Hwy, Monticello, FL 32344, USA
properties.descrption: One of the prettier Cab Francs on the market, showing fine Napa structure and intricate flavors that grow more complex as the wine warms in the glass. With red and black cherry, red licorice, teriyaki beef and sweetly smoked cedar flavors, it's a beautiful wine to drink now.

properties.title: Pirouette 2007 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Supple and inviting, from the nose of flowers and dark fruits, to the chocolatey tannins that lick the back of the throat, this is a fully-realized, smooth and most accessible red wine.

properties.title: Samsara 2008 Ampelos Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 2446 Alamo Pintado Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: This rich, spicy wine comes from the eastern part of the valley. It's very full-bodied, almost coarse now, but that's a function of its fresh tannins and brisk acidity. Tastes jammy in cherry-berry pie filling, with a sweet, smoky oak veneer. Needs 4–6 years, but if you drink it now, decant.

properties.title: Seghesio 2008 Old Vine Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 700 Grove St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Extraordinarily rich and complicated in flavors, this wine comes from vineyards that are at least 50 years old. It's dry and spicy, with textbook Zin notes of wild berries and currants, but also exotic minerals that come from the soil. Yes, the alcohol is high, but that is the signature of Seghesio's marvelous Zinfandels.

properties.title: Louis Jadot 2007 Les Suchots Premier Cru  (Vosne-Romanée)
properties.descrption: Very smoky aromas, the fruit ripe with sweet blackberry flavors. The wood is still very present, not yet completely integrated; there is a touch of green perhaps from the wood. At the same time, the wine is developing while keeping a fresh streak of acidity.

properties.title: Matetic 2007 EQ Syrah (San Antonio)
properties.descrption: Pure, inviting and open, with cedar, tobacco, blackberry, earth and cookie dough aromas scattered all over a robust bouquet. Deep but fresh, with fine balance and a bold, jammy set of blackberry and black-pepper flavors. Finishes well, with integration and easygoing tannins. Drink now through 2013.

properties.title: Benovia 2008 La Pommeraie Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3339 Hartman Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: If you're looking for a gorgeous Pinot to drink now, here it is. The wine is dry and silky and complex, offering waves of black cherry jam, red currant, licorice, cola and sandalwood flavors. Tastes elegant and complex. Now–2013.

properties.title: Carlos Basso 2005 Signature Blend Red (Uco Valley)
properties.address: 11 NW Lava Rd, Bend, OR 97703, USA
properties.descrption: Warm and complete, with oak-influenced char and licorice along with black fruits on the bouquet. An elegant Uco Valley specimen with refined, full-force flavors of cola, blackberry, tobacco and chocolate. Turns more complex and satisfying on the finish. Drink this high-quality value now through 2013. A blend of Malbec at 50%, with Cabernet, Petit Verdot and Syrah.

properties.title: Darby 2007 The Dark Side Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14450 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Syrah is a core strength of Darby, and as with previous vintages, this is dense and aromatic, leading from floral scents into a dark, almost broodingly deep core of blackberries, cassis and pepper. Full-bodied and 14.4% alcohol, this captures the essential strengths of Washington Syrah, done as a fruit-driven, berry-laden style.

properties.title: Evening Land 2008 Occidental Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: Tough to appreciate now due to its acidity and tannins, which lock it down behind a cloak of impenetrability. There are exotic wild raspberry and cherry fruit, cola, licorice, Provençal herb, bacon and pepper flavors, but you can't quite get to them, because they're behind bars. Obviously needs time. Give it 3–5 years in the cellar, and it should begin to blossom after that.

properties.title: Failla 2008 Occidental Ridge Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: A strong, powerful Pinot that's nowhere ready to drink. That's despite massive blackberry, cherry, cola, red currant, licorice and sandalwood flavors that dazzle the palate. The tannins are potent, the acidity is tart and the finish is bone dry. Obviously needs time in the bottle. Try after 2013.

properties.title: Yarra Yering 2007 Dry Red Wine No. 1 Red (Yarra Valley)
properties.address: 4 Briarty Rd, Gruyere VIC 3770, Australia
properties.descrption: A Yarra Valley classic, Dry Red No. 1 is a Bordeaux-style blend marked by its restrained alcohol levels yet potent flavors. The 2007 features scents of tobacco, vanilla and cassis, with a hint of tomato emerging on the palate. It's medium-bodied, with a long finish that finishes with firm but silky tannins and lip-smacking cassis. Approachable now, but should age well for 10–15 years.

properties.title: Chester Kidder 2006 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1604 Frenchtown Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The blend in 2006 is 45% Cabernet Sauvignon, 36% Syrah, 10% Petit Verdot and 9% Cabernet Franc. It spent 30 months in 90% new oak. Released a year ago, it has a feminine grace and softness in the aromas, a lovely mix of flowers and spice. The Syrah brightens up the fruit, accenting berry flavors with a hint of pepper, while the Petit Verdot adds clover and violet aromas and density to the tannins.

properties.title: Errazuriz 2007 La Cumbre Syrah (Aconcagua Valley)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: A smooth, modern and rich version of Chilean Syrah that's bringing it. The nose is full of mineral, graphite, coconut and heavenly black fruit, while the palate is bright, pure and delicious as it leans toward black-currant liqueur, blackberry and boysenberry. Fruity to the max, with a meaty finish and plenty of body. Drink now through 2013.

properties.title: Georges Duboeuf 2009 Domaine de la Chaponne  (Morgon)
properties.address: 836 Rte de Fleurie, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.descrption: As rich as it is tannic, this is powerful and concentrated. It shows the rich 2009 fruit at its best, full of sweet berries, deliciously ripe. Enjoyable, while it is also serious.

properties.title: Domaine du Colombier 2009 Cuvée Gaby  (Crozes-Hermitage)
properties.address: 2 Rte de Chantemerle, 26600 Tain-l'Hermitage, France
properties.descrption: Atypically round for a Crozes-Hermitage—a result of the vintage—but immediately attractive, with ample weight backing up the smoky, bacony notes and plummy fruit. Finishes long and richly textured, with hints of oak. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Domaine Fond Croze 2009 Cuvée Shyrus Syrah (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: Route de Cairanne, 84290 Saint-Roman-de-Malegarde, France
properties.descrption: If you haven't puzzled it out from the name, this is a Syrah-based cuvée. Aged 14 months in second-use oak, it features dark, smoky notes on the nose to balance the bright raspberry aromas, then turns darker and meatier on the palate, ending with a hint of coffee. The tannins are supple and impart a rich texture. Drink now–2017.

properties.title: Abad Dom Bueno 2008 Mencía (Bierzo)
properties.descrption: A potent Mencía with concentrated berry aromas along with intense oak, rubber and graphite notes. Full-bodied and sound as a boulder, with balance, tannic grip and rousing flavors of black cherry, blackberry and dark spices. Toasty and black on the finish; top-shelf Bierzo to drink now through 2015.

properties.title: Camaraderie 2008 Reserve Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 334 Benson Rd, Port Angeles, WA 98363, USA
properties.descrption: This reserve spends 30 months in barrel. It has lovely aromatics, with subtle suggestions of tobacco and clove woven through the base of ripe black cherry and cassis. The tannins are polished, and the finish lends a thread of iron.

properties.title: Telmo Rodríguez 2008 Lanzaga  (Rioja)
properties.address: 01308 Lantziego, Álava, Spain
properties.descrption: This is deep, lush and earthy on the nose, with tobacco, broad spice aromas and fair but generous oak. It feels tight and balanced, with toasty, peppery flavors of cassis and black cherry. It's long, toasty and chocolaty on the finish, with layered spice accents. Drink now through 2016.

properties.title: Gernot and Heike Heinrich 2009 Blaufränkisch (Burgenland)
properties.address: Baumgarten 60, 7122 Gols, Austria
properties.descrption: This is a wood-aged wine that shows structure, dense tannins as well as juicy red fruits. The wood is finely integrated, lending a round texture to go with the dry character of the wine. For aging 4–6 years.

properties.title: Watermill 2008 Tempranillo (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: A jump forward in quality for this pure Tempranillo. It opens with a dark, smoky nose—oaky but compelling. The midpalate remains tight and hard, but shows muscular black fruits, good length, and leads nicely into a balanced finish with ripe tannins.

properties.title: Tenuta Klaus Lentsch 2008 Bachgart Riserva Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Reinspergweg, 18A, 39057 Eppan an der Weinstraße., Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.descrption: This is gorgeous, offering intense and complex aromas of wild berry, violet, candied fruit, almond paste and garden herb. The mouthfeel is silky, long and penetrating.

properties.title: Efeste 2009 Jolie Bouche Syrah (Yakima Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a supple, spicy wine, with a core of black cherry fruit. It's complemented with lighter flavors of cola, earth and coffee. At first it seems to fade a little too quickly, but with some breathing time the finish expands and brings in notes of cracker and toast.

properties.title: Fidelitas 2009 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14467 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Merlot is certainly one of the real strengths at Fidélitas, and two different versions are offered. This broad and flavorful effort has pretty cherry fruit backed with pleasing baking spices. The finish is focused and precise, adding streaks of cinnamon and chocolate.

properties.title: Steven Kent 2008 Ghielmetti Vineyard Malbec (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 5443 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Malbec on its own doesn't always express much in California but this wine has a huge personality and a lot of varietal character, with its heady aromatics of blueberry pie and baking spice. Medium in body, it remains spicy across the palate. The finish is long lasting, with a note of dried plum.

properties.title: Johanneshof Reinisch 2007 Ried Holzspur Grande Reserve St. Laurent (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Im Weingarten 1, 2523 Tattendorf, Austria
properties.descrption: Judging by the success of this wine, St. Laurent seems to be this winery's signature grape. It is big, bold and packed with tannins as well as dense fruit. It's a solid- and dark-textured wine. Not yet ready to drink, this is worth aging for a few more years.

properties.title: Easton 2010 Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.address: 1247 Simon Blvd Suite N103, Easton, PA 18042, USA
properties.descrption: An excellent Zin—this has an invitingly soft floral nose, mountainous black-fruit flavors and structure and plenty of depth. This should age nicely over the next 3–5 years, but it is delicious to drink now, too.

properties.title: Recanati 2014 Reserve Petite Sirah (Galilee)
properties.address: פארק תעשיות עמק חפר, Gesher HaEts 16, עמק חפר, Israel
properties.descrption: An enticing nose of cherry pie and vanilla sets the stage for flavors of ripe cherry, blueberry, white chocolate and lilac. Grippy tannins hold their own against a strong vein of acidity, and the finish is notable for its light floral lift.

properties.title: Sandler 2015 Keefer Ranch Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 540 Barneveld Ave ste k, San Francisco, CA 94124, USA
properties.descrption: Candied red cherry fruit meets wild herb and wet slate aromas on the nose of this bottling from a vineyard planted in 1988. Boisterous acidity kicks off the palate, where raspberry and tart strawberry fruit flavors lead to round red plum and a slate-like rockiness. The finish is bright with acidity.

properties.title: Yatir 2012 Forest Red (Judean Hills)
properties.address: Yatir Forest, Israel
properties.descrption: This inky garnet-colored wine delivers aromas of dark plums, blackberry and a soft hint of smoke. There is a good interplay of fruit and spice flavors set into a framework of firm tannins. Expect flavors of blackberry, blueberry, vanilla, anise and coffee with a touch of eucalyptus that dwindles as bright cherry and vanilla notes take over the smooth finish.

properties.title: Don Manuel Villafañe 2011 Gran Malbec Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: This purple saturated Malbec opens with powerful aromas of cola, tree bark and spiced blackberry. A saturated, extracted, highly tannic palate amounts to a heavy load, while baked and blackened berry flavors include a strong shot of chocolate. On the finish, more chocolate along with fig and baked berry flavors seal this rich ripe offering. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Livio Sassetti 2007 Dieci  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Str. Consorziale dei Canali, 329, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This just-released ten-year-old selection opens with inviting aromas of plum, leather, underbrush and tobacco. The approachable enveloping palate doles out mouthfuls of mature black cherry, grilled herb, cured meat, truffle and a hint of licorice framed in supple tannins. It has hit its ideal drinking window so enjoy soon.

properties.title: Louis Jadot 2014 Clos de la Commaraine Premier Cru  (Pommard)
properties.address: 62 Rte de Savigny, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: This rich, firmly structured wine comes from a nine-acre vineyard close to the village of Pommard. Its ripe black fruits are just starting to show through the dry core. Concentrated and powerful, it will be best from 2022.

properties.title: Expression 39 2014 Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 1021 Atlas Peak Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Proving that not only single vineyards can make great wine, this outstanding offering entices with forest floor, black tea, herb and cherry compote flavors. It's full-bodied, laced with fine-grained tannins, expansive in mouthfeel and long-lasting on the finish.

properties.title: Fanti 2012 Vallocchio  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Loc, Località Podere Palazzo, 14, 53024 Castelnuovo dell'Abate SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Forest floor, dark cooking spice, chopped mint, coconut and baked plum aromas lead the way on this full-bodied red. The robust juicy palate doles out black cherry, raisin, espresso, clove and anise while firm fine-grained tannins provide plenty of structure. An espresso note closes the tight finish. Drink after 2020.

properties.title: Giornata 2014 Luna Matta Vineyard Aglianico (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 470 Marquita Ave a, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas in this bottling from Brian and Stephy Terrizzi are densely packed, recalling alpine strawberry, black plum, vanilla, rose and licorice. The structured palate is full of mouth-coating but not overbearing tannins, which reveal deep hibiscus, cinnamon spice and rosewater candy flavors.

properties.title: Herdade Grande 2013 Gerações Colheita Seleccionada Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: A celebration of the generation that has run the estate, this wine is powerful and firmly structured. Made for long-term aging, it's packed with dusty tannins and dense, juicy blackberry fruit and has a concentrated aftertaste. Still developing, it will be ready from 2019.

properties.title: Jaffurs 2013 Larner Vineyard Syrah (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 819 E Montecito St, Santa Barbara, CA 93103, USA
properties.descrption: Savory aromas of black pepper, dried beef, soy, tangy elderberry, fresh boysenberry and deep lavender show on the nose of this single vineyard study. The palate is very floral at first, and then flavors of black currant, vanilla, pencil lead, baking spice, tar and white pepper ride the waves of acidity.

properties.title: Tardieu-Laurent 2013  Hermitage
properties.descrption: The distinctive oak regime at Tardieu-Laurent works better with some wines and in some vintages than others. This Hermitage, from an irregular vintage, has taken to it well, combining muscle and tannin with a rich, luxurious mouthfeel and bold flavors of mulberries, espresso and baking spices. Drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Midnight 2012 Capriccio Italien Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2925 Anderson Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Baked blackberry and licorice show on the nose of this Super Tuscan-style blend of 60% Sangiovese and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon. It combines Old World and New World elements well, its rocky minerality framing baked blackberry fruit, underpinned by chalky tannins and steady acidity.

properties.title: Montefiore 2013 Aria Reserve Red (Judean Hills)
properties.address: Yo'ezer St 7, Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel
properties.descrption: Aromas of black plum, raspberry and sage set the stage for flavors of black cherry, raspberry, nutmeg and clove. There's a nice sense of spice piggybacking on luscious fruit, while strong but not overpowering tannins fill the palate and gently subside into a soft savory finish.

properties.title: Quinta de Chocapalha 2012 Red (Lisboa)
properties.descrption: The main estate wine from Chocapalha, this is firm, with a beautiful balance between tannins and fruit. Blackberry and wood-derived spice notes are cut with acidity. It's elegant and ready to drink.

properties.title: Quinta do Vallado 2014 Touriga Nacional (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta do Vallado, Vilarinho dos Freires, 5050-364 Peso da Régua, Portugal
properties.descrption: At the western edge of the main Port vineyards, this estate is as well placed for fine wine as for Port. This richly structured Touriga Nacional has attractive acidity, perfumed black fruit and robust, tight tannins. With its wood aging, it's made to age. Drink from 2021.

properties.title: Midnight 2010 Estate Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2925 Anderson Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Strong cedar and cooked cherries alongside purple flowers and fresh tobacco characterize the nose of this wine from the expected-to-be-approved Willow Creek district. The tannins are very pronounced but not dominant, revealing sanguine flavors of iron and bloody game.

properties.title: Rocca di Fabbri 2011  Montefalco Rosso
properties.address: Località Fabbri, 06036 Montefalco PG, Italy
properties.descrption: This blend of Sangiovese, Sagrantino and Montepulciano has aromas of toasted oak, mocha and blackberry preserves. The dense palate offers dried black cherry, fig, espresso, toast and clove alongside chewy, drying tannins. You'll also detect the presence of alcohol on the midpalate.

properties.title: Roots 2012 Leroy Vineyard Pinot Noir (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.descrption: Tight and tart, this wine shows aromas of delicate roses and raspberries that follow through on the palate. Flavors are pure and true, somewhat simple, with a fruit-forward aspect that suggests young vines.

properties.title: Schäfer 2012 Estate Bottled Pinot Noir (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: 6154 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Hints of cedar and toast lend warmth to crisp red-cherry and plum notes in this big-bodied, yet delicately flavored wine. Bright cranberry acidity lends a fresh feel to the palate. It finishes moderately long with a hint of bitter tannin.

properties.title: Tenuta Alzatura 2010  Montefalco Sagrantino
properties.address: Vocabolo Alzatura, Montefalco, PG 06036, 06036 Montefalco PG, Italy
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas recall truffle, underbrush, game and ripe plum accented with espresso. The palate offers spicy plum, dried blackberry, dried sage and licorice alongside massively astringent tannins.

properties.title: Bodegas Aragonesas 2012 Crucillón Tempranillo-Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
properties.address: Carr. de Magallón a la Almunia, S/N, 50529 Fuendejalón, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy, warm berry aromas on the nose avoid being jammy and overripe. The palate on this everyday blend of Garnacha and Tempranillo is comfortable and balanced. Short plum and berry flavors shift to slightly lactic and creamy on the finish.

properties.title: Villa di Corlo 2013 Frizzante Secco  (Lambrusco Grasparossa di Castelvetro)
properties.descrption: Frothy and robust, this presents aromas of blue flower, ripe plum, fig and cassis that carry over to the palate, along with spicy blueberry. It's balanced with sharp acidity and hearty tannins.

properties.title: Viña Eguía 2009 Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Ripe, earthy aromas of berry fruits and raisins come with lactic oak and baking spice notes on the nose. Drying and tannic on the palate, this wine shows tart flavors of red berry and currant, with vanilla and oak tones leading to a creamy, soft finish.

properties.title: Le Cimate 2010  Montefalco Sagrantino
properties.address: Via Cecapecore, 41, 06036 Montefalco PG, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas suggest espresso, dried black currant, cedar and grilled herb. The warm palate offers oak, vanilla, licorice, stewed prune and evident alcohol. There's not quite enough fruit to support the iron-clad tannins that leave a mouth-puckering finish.

properties.title: Les Hauts de Croix de Labrie 2012  Saint-Émilion
properties.winery: Les Hauts de Croix de Labrie
properties.address: D243, 8 bis Peymouton Sud, 33330 Saint-Christophe-des-Bardes, France
properties.descrption: Young vines have gone into this fruity wine. It is full and rich in the mouth, with juicy black currant fruits and smoky tannins. The attractive perfume from Cabernet Franc moves easily into final acidity. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Les Parcelles de Stéphane Derenoncourt 2012  Bordeaux
properties.descrption: Rich and smooth, this solid, ripe wine offers a good sense of structure. It has weight, dense tannins and a creamy texture. Drink from 2015.

properties.title: Silvan Ridge 2012 Cabernet Franc (Rogue Valley)
properties.descrption: This 100% varietal is lightly aromatic with notes of herbs, cherry and barrel spices. The palate is medium-bodied with cinnamon-stick flavors, coffee tones and tart acidity.

properties.title: Silvan Ridge 2012 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 27012 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.descrption: This medium-weight Pinot Noir has a whiff of the chicken yard among its aromas, but the well-ripened cherry fruit at the core more than compensates. There's a hint of peach-skin phenolics, and the finish has enough stuffing to keep from fading too quickly. A good sipper for the near term.

properties.title: Vaza 2011 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Earth, leather, herb and berry aromas set up a firm palate and gripping structure. The midpalate is focused on red fruit and light oak tones, while the finish is crisp, fresh and zesty.

properties.title: Villa Mora 2010  Montefalco Rosso
properties.descrption: Made with Sangiovese, Merlot and Sagrantino, this opens with subdued, earthy aromas of leafy underbrush, tilled soil, berry and a hint of clove. The palate offers juicy wild cherry, raspberry, nutmeg and white pepper alongside mature and rather fleeting tannins. Drink through 2016.

properties.title: P2 2007 Aubaine Vineyard Pinot Noir (San Luis Obispo County)
properties.address: 2900 E Peltier Rd, Acampo, CA 95220, USA
properties.descrption: A bit heavy and full-bodied, without the elegant silkiness you want in a Pinot Noir. Tastes like a warm-climate Grenache, with low acidity and jammy flavors of cherries and currants. Drink now.

properties.title: Parsonage Village 2004 Estate Syrah (Carmel Valley)
properties.address: 74 E Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.descrption: Very dry and sharp in the finish, this Syrah has red currant and bitter cherry skin flavors, relieved by softer, richer oak influences. It's tough, but softens in the glass. Really needs a good steak.

properties.title: Poggio il Castellare 2003  Brunello di Montalcino
