properties.descrption: Forest floor, bramble, green spice and candied fruit characterize this hearty expression of Brunello di Montalcino. The wine tastes raw and edgy in the mouth due to the prickly nature of its tannins.

properties.title: Joseph Swan Vineyards 2004 Trenton Estate Vineyard Syrah (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Tons of jammy fruit in this softly tannic, easy-to-drink wine. Explodes with the essence of blackberries, cherries, raspberries, mulberries and chocolate, with plenty of pepper and other Asian spices.

properties.title: Librandi 2007 Classico  (Cirò)
properties.descrption: If you want to taste an authentic wine from Calabria, Librandi's Classico Cirò is for you. It's a light and tonic red, with a light ruby color and fragrant aromas of berry fruit and dried rose. It makes an easy match to seafood and pasta and carries a very attractive price tag too.

properties.title: Loring Wine Company 2007 Rancho La Viña Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1034 Aviation Dr, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Here's a youthful Pinot Noir that tastes like it's still in the barrel. It's a bit heavy and very fruity, offering scads of red and black currants, cola, mocha, cedar and spice flavors. Could develop silkiness and complexity in the bottle after 2009.

properties.title: Baricci 2003  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.descrption: This wine offers an unusual combination of hot, jammy fruit backed by crisp acidity. Its aromas are big and bulky yet the mouthfeel is surprisingly fresh. Pair this wine with roasted duck or other fatty meats.

properties.title: Wellington 2007 Estate Vineyard Marsanne (Sonoma Valley)
properties.descrption: A little too sweet for a dry table wine, with sugary flavors of tropical citrus fruits, coconut macaroon and vanilla sponge cake. Almost a dessert wine, but clean and vibrant on the finish, and quite delicious.

properties.title: Bluenose 2005 Syrah (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: This is a heavy, rich, dry Syrah. It shows forward flavors of blackberries, cherries, currants, mocha and spices, with a touch of raisins. Not likely to age, so drink up.

properties.title: Valle dell'Acate 2006 Il Frappato Frappato (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Bidini, 97011 Acate RG, Italy
properties.descrption: You could drink this Frappato slightly chilled with white meat or fish. It's a delicate and fragrant wine with crisp acidity and simple berry fruit flavors.

properties.title: Menduco 2014 Reserve Malbec (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Mitre 2818, M5500 Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Earthy, woodsy aromas of black plum are robust and gritty. Talk about a full-bodied but tannic Malbec; flavors of plum and wild berry are toasty and oaky but manage to emphasize fruit, while a spicy, drying finish shows a medicinal side. Drink this powerfully built Malbec through 2018.

properties.title: Paltrinieri 2014 Leclisse  (Lambrusco di Sorbara)
properties.address: Via Cristo, 49, 41030 Sorbara MO, Italy
properties.descrption: Fresh and fragrant, this offers aromas of pressed rose, violet and just picked grapes. Made entirely with the Sorbara grape, the bright, frothy palate doles out red cherry, crushed strawberry and a spicy ginger note alongside bracing acidity.

properties.title: Cowhorn 2011 Sentience Syrah (Applegate Valley)
properties.address: 1665 Eastside Rd, Jacksonville, OR 97530, USA
properties.descrption: Tart and tannic, this has a sleek, almost steely character, with cranberry and black cherry fruit, razor's edge tannins, and supporting acidity.

properties.title: De Bortoli 2014 Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Yarra Valley)
properties.address: Rijksweg 14, 2880 Bornem, Belgium
properties.descrption: This is a particularly earthy Pinot Noir. Beetroot and mushroom notes are dark and earthy, balanced by bright acids and supple tannins on the palate. The crisp, lean finish shows tremendous focus and length but less generosity. Drink 2018–2024.

properties.title: DiamAndes 2012 de Uco Malbec (Uco Valley)
properties.descrption: Ripe aromas of black plum, blueberry and charcoal lead to a palate that's muscular and full-bodied. Dark, peppery, slightly bitter flavors of toasted blackberry and prune end with burnt notes and black pepper along with grabby, rubbery tannins.

properties.title: Domaine de Colonat 2014 Perle de Granit  (Beaujolais-Villages)
properties.address: 4505 Voie Romaine, 69910 Villié-Morgon, France
properties.descrption: Granit is the sandy granite hillside soil of northern Beaujolais. The vineyard is a neighbor to the Fleurie appellation. This textured wine is rich with cherry and red-currant flavors that are rounded out and have just hint of tannins. The wine could soften even more so wait until early 2016.

properties.title: Fabien Collonge 2014 L'Aurore des Côtes  (Chiroubles)
properties.descrption: All juicy fruit, this is a bright, dry wine with delicious acidity that gives freshness. It also has a mineral edge, giving the red berry fruits a firm texture. The wine is ready to drink, although it will be better from 2016.

properties.title: Artadi 2012 Pasos de San Martín Garnacha (Navarra)
properties.address: Carretera de Logroño, s/n, 01300 Guardia, Álava, Spain
properties.descrption: Concentrated aromas of raisin, black currant, animal fur and charred wood announce a blocky, tannic palate. Grapy flavors of raisin, prune and minerals finish with peppery spice along with jammy black-fruit flavors. Drink this ripe Garnacha through 2019.

properties.title: Wilson 2014 Heartland Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1960 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Bold, meaty and softly simple, this robustly full-bodied wine is redolent of mocha and brown sugar. Its ripely sweet blackberry fruit is cut with savory black-olive notes.

properties.title: Bodegas Aragonesas 2013 Castillo de Fuendejalon Crianza Red (Campo de Borja)
properties.descrption: Earthy raisin and prune aromas are good in an overripe way. Following the nose, this Garnacha-Tempranillo blend feels dense, thick and chewy. Spicy stewy berry flavors taste chocolaty on a gummy finish.

properties.title: Volver 2015 Tarima Monastrell (Alicante)
properties.descrption: Toast and leather aromas support modest berry scents. This is full, loud and banging on the palate. Roasted blackened flavors of blackberry and plum carry a meaty note, while this remains dark and toasty on an aggressive finish.

properties.title: Château Coutinel 2016 On l'appelle Negrette (Fronton)
properties.descrption: Fronton's Négrette grape is found in few other places. Made 100% from the single variety, this wine displays the grape's juicy character as well as the spice and violet aromas and damson flavors. The wine is made to be drunk young.

properties.title: Dark Horse 2015 Zinfandel (California)
properties.descrption: A streak of vanilla winds through the almost-sweet fruit flavors of this medium-bodied and soft-textured wine. Ripe cherry aromas and strawberry jam flavors come with very little tannin and low acidity.

properties.title: Devil's Advocate 2014 One Hundred Percent Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 12291 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Fresh juice aromas and caramelized blackberry scents combine with dark chocolate and a little lavender in this blend of 44% Petite Sirah, 38% Syrah, 10% Mourvèdre and 8% Grenache. Soft, thick and sticky on the palate, it shows tangy plum skin and tart boysenberry flavors, with sharp and strong acidity.

properties.title: Del Rio 2013 Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 52 N River Rd, Gold Hill, OR 97525, USA
properties.descrption: Redolent of mushrooms and forest-floor aromas, this barely hints at fruit, and what is there could be any thin, generic red wine.

properties.title: Le Haut Païs 2014 Merlot (Périgord)
properties.address: 20 Rue des Carmes, 33000 Bordeaux, France
properties.descrption: This wine is soft and juicy without great focus. It has a light feel, with fresh jammy red fruits and a gentle breeze of tannins. Drink now.

properties.title: Bootstrap 2013 Red (California)
properties.address: 13502 E, US-290, Stonewall, TX 78671, USA
properties.descrption: Cedar aromas and raisin and prune flavors are bold in this full-bodied, fresh but rather rustic wine.

properties.title: Budeguer 2009 Patrimonio Seleccion de Barricas Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta Provincial 15 km 31,5, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: This is overripe and raisiny, no two ways about it. Hailing from a very hot year, this feels flat and flabby, while raisin and prune are the dominant flavors. Blatant overripeness and a ton of weight render this out of balance.

properties.title: Headbanger 2013 Rock n Red Red (California)
properties.address: 7302 E Helm Dr #1002, Scottsdale, AZ 85260, USA
properties.descrption: Very ripe and obviously fruity aromas and flavors are coated with sweet-seeming oak notes that resemble vanilla and maple syrup. The wine is medium bodied and just moderately tannic.

properties.title: Quinta do Arrobe 2012 Oculto Red (Tejo)
properties.address: 2000 Casével, Portugal
properties.descrption: A wine that is strangely hollow with structure and juicy fruit around a hole in the center. Spice and red berry flavors are contrasted with dry tannins that may not soften.

properties.title: Pampa 2013 Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Av. Antártida Argentina Km 16, Estancia Santa Isabel, Chapadmalal, B7600 Mar del Plata, Provincia de Buenos Aires, Argentina
properties.descrption: Spearmint and weedy red-fruit aromas lead to raw palate. This is more herbal than fruity, with a lean rubbery finish.

properties.title: Michel Torino 2014 Cuma Made With Organic Grapes Malbec (Cafayate)
properties.descrption: Rustic tomato and cherry aromas make for a scratchy opening. This is wiry and grating in feel, with sour plum and red-currant flavors. A fresh but scratchy and herbal tasting finish isn't exactly friendly.

properties.title: Bodegas Valdemar 2007 Conde Valdemar Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Extreme raisiny aromas are suggestive of P.X. Sherry. This is heavy and grabby on the palate while prune and raisin flavors are dominant. On the finish, this is overripe and ponderous, with fig and prune flavors.

properties.title: Casal da Coelheira 2011 Terraços do Tejo Red (Tejo)
properties.descrption: This is an earthy wine with barnyard flavors. It does have some blackberry fruitiness under its more rustic character. The aftertaste has acidity and a bitter edge.

properties.title: Del Rio 2012 Estate Grown Syrah (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 52 N River Rd, Gold Hill, OR 97525, USA
properties.descrption: Medicinal, pungent pine-needle scents continue into the main palate. This shows barely any trace of varietal character.

properties.title: Paro 2013 Kaufman Sunnyslope Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.address: Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: This oddly perfumed and quite tannic wine is hard to decipher in terms of fruit. It remains light bodied amid the grip.

properties.title: Sweet Cheeks 2012 Barrel Select Syrah (Southern Oregon)
properties.descrption: This is a thin, watery wine with flavors of stem rather than fruit.

properties.title: Casa Nuestra 2012 Tinto St. Helena Red (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: A field blend of several varieties, all organically farmed, this has a pruney aroma and flavors that lean rustic and raw, with a heaviness of weight.

properties.title: Paro 2013 Cloud 9 Vineyards Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Menthol and eucalyptus dominate over the indistinguishable fruit in this full-bodied, thick wine.

properties.title: Te Awa 2007 Syrah (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 2375 State Highway 50 Flaxmere, Roys Hill 4175, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Te Awa's 2007 Syrah is a ripe, chunky example, with chocolate and plum notes leading the way, followed at some distance by hints of baking spices. It's firm and slightly dusty on the finish, yet mouthwatering at the same time.

properties.title: Camille Giroud 2008 Aux Cras  (Beaune)
properties.descrption: With crushed strawberry and caramel flavors, this is relatively light wine, though elegant and pierced with acidity. Milk chocolate and soft tannins complete an attractive ensemble.

properties.title: Cascina Luisin 2008 Rabajà  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Str. Rabaja, 36, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: From one of Barbaresco's most celebrated vineyard crus, this ruby-colored wine exhibits loads of intensity and power in the form of cherry, cassis, leather, tar and cola. The wine's compact, tonic mouthfeel would make a great companion to rich, sophisticated cuisine.

properties.title: Dominus 2008 Napanook Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2570 Napa Nook Rd, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.descrption: With grapes from Yountville, this Bordeaux blend, which is mostly Cabernet Sauvignon, has a very fine structure. It's firm in tannins and acidity, with a bracing minerality. The flavors are already quite advanced, suggesting jammy cherries, blackberries and cassis. Drink now for sheer deliciousness, after decanting.

properties.title: Robert Mondavi 2008 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7801 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.descrption: A lovely Merlot, light and spicy. It has pretty flavors of cherries, mocha and cinnamon, with fine, ripe tannins, with a sweetness from glycerine. An elegant Merlot at a good price.

properties.title: Le Strette 2007 Le Strette  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via le Strette, 1F, 12060 Novello CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Barolo Le Strette (with fruit sourced from the Novello and Barolo areas of Piedmont) opens with dark, inky concentration and sweet aromas of cinnamon, clove and mature berry fruit. The wine comes on with strength and personality, but in an immediate, one-dimensional manner.

properties.title: Marziano Abbona 2008 Bricco Barone  (Nebbiolo d'Alba)
properties.descrption: Bricco Barone is a smokey, meaty expression of Nebbiolo with bold aromas of black fruit, prune, dried tobacco leaf and finely milled white pepper. This pretty wine ends with a masculine blast of earthy, dusty tones.

properties.title: Molino 2008 Teorema  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Frazione Annunziata - Borgata Gancia, 111 A, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Barbaresco Teorema opens with a distinctive bouquet of dried medicinal herb, cola, fennel or celery stick. There are subtle tones of red berry and currant and the mouthfeel shows a compact style and medium intensity. It's a bright, correct wine, but a measured one.

properties.title: Kenneth Volk 2008 Enz Vineyard Zinfandel (Lime Kiln Valley)
properties.address: 5230 Tepusquet Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Soft and mellow at three-plus years, this pleasant Zinfandel has sweet, jammy raspberry and cherry flavors, sprinkled with pepper, cinnamon and clove. It's a nice wine to drink now with steaks, roasts, barbecue.

properties.title: Ledson 2008 Caudalies Reserve Red (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 7335 CA-12, Kenwood, CA 95409, USA
properties.descrption: Made from equal parts Zinfandel and Petite Sirah, this blend seems to detract from the purity of both. The result is interesting and even dramatic in ripeness, but a little muddied, with hard tannins making it tough despite a rich center of blackberry and cherry jam.

properties.title: Walter Dacon 2008 C'est Syrah Magnifique Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Finished in French oak, the Magnifique bottling from Walter Dacon seems a bit plain, almost generic in this vintage. Red fruit, noticeably high alcohol (14.8%) that you can taste, and tongue-scraping astringency suggest that this may need significantly more bottle age to pull itself together.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2009 Forchini Vineyard North Flats Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Quite a good Zinfandel, although it does show some of the weaknesses that strike this vineyard in a cool year. You'll find a smooth, full-bodied wine, with ample tannins and fine berry-cherry fruit and spices. Yet it's curiously ambiguous in the mouth, and the concentration falls apart midpalate.

properties.title: 2nd Chance 2009 Swiss Clones 2A Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.descrption: Good raspberry, cola, vanilla, sweet oak and spice flavors in this silky Pinot Noir. It's a little off in texture, though, with overly aggressive acidity. But it's a pretty nice Pinot.

properties.title: Antonino Tringali-Casanuova 2009 Patrimonio  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: Podere Casa Rossa, Via del Castelluccio, 57027 San Vincenzo LI, Italy
properties.descrption: A 60-40 blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, Patrimonio opens with bright fruit tones of cherry and blueberry with background notes of spice and leather. Overall, it's easy and compact in style.

properties.title: Bodegas Bilbainas 2005 Viña Pomal Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Earthy berry aromas convey quality, and there's oak, floral aromas and tobacco notes for support. Feels dry and tight, with lightly herbal, lightly burnt flavors of plum, berry, tomato and toasted oak. Finishes dry and herbal.

properties.title: Cartograph 2009 Perli Vineyard Pinot Noir (Mendocino Ridge)
properties.address: 340 Center St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Although there's only 25% new oak on this wine, it's dominated in youth by caramel and buttered toast aromas and flavors. That makes it awkward, despite ripe, forward cherry and raspberry fruit. Might calm down after a few years.

properties.title: Casa di Terra 2010 Lenaia Rosso Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Comunale delle Ferruggini, 162/A, 57022 Bolgheri LI, Italy
properties.descrption: Lenaia Rosso (50% Merlot with Sangiovese and Colorino, vinified in cement) opens with foxy notes of crushed grape, root beer and bitter almond. It's short, crisp and fine on the finish.

properties.title: Castro Pena Alba 2008 Serrado Colheita Red (Dão)
properties.address: Quinta Serrado, Castelo De Penalva, Viseu, 3550 Penalva do Castelo, Portugal
properties.descrption: A wine that rides between the richness of its black fruits and the tight acidity that gives it considerable juiciness. The result is a wine that is fruity, with layers of coffee and vanilla, likely to benefit from two more years' aging.

properties.title: Château de la Cour 2009  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: La Cour, 44430 Le Landreau, France
properties.descrption: New wood flavors go over the structured fruit and give currant flavors. It is already coming into balance and is for medium-term aging. The vineyard is on the plain beneath the hill of Saint-Émilion.

properties.title: Château Sainte-Barbe 2010  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: Lieu-dit, Sainte-Barbe, 33810 Ambès, France
properties.descrption: . Recent vintages have left Bordeaux with an alcohol problem, as seen in this wine. The saving grace is the essential Cabernet Sauvignon structure and acidity that keeps the ripe Merlot in balance.

properties.title: Dashe Cellars 2009 Florence Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1951 Monarch Street Hangar 25, Alameda, CA 94501, USA
properties.descrption: A big, strong, spicy Zinfandel, packed with wild berry, currant, licorice, cola, clove and white pepper flavors that finish dry and tannic. Drink this potent wine with barbecued pork, chicken and beef, slathered in spicy sauce.

properties.title: Fattoria la Castellina 2008 Aureo Red (Rosso di Toscana)
properties.address: Viale della Rimembranza, 28, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot features a dark ruby color and balanced aromas of black fruit, leather, spice and rum cake. It's fresh and fruity in the mouth, with just the right measure of concentration to pair with lasagna.

properties.title: Haras 2007 Character Cabernet Sauvignon-Carmenère (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Rd, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Smells a little volatile, but with airing there's enough baked fruit, leafiness, olive and tobacco to set things straight. Choppy and tannic on the palate, with herbal flavors of casssis, coffee and toast. Leafy and tasting of tobacco and olives on the finish. Drink now; contains 23% Syrah and Cab Franc in addition to CS and Carmenère.

properties.title: Bodegas Navarro López 2005 Old Vines Gran Reserva Tempranillo (Valdepeñas)
properties.address: Autovía A-4, km. 193, 13300, 13300, Cdad. Real, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy, baked, raisiny aromas convey ripeness and sweetness. The palate is medium in body and intensity, with juicy acidity propping up lightly leafy and herbal berry and plum flavors. Has good length and feel, with tomato and herbs on the finish.

properties.title: Jasper Sisco 2014 Zenith Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: This Pinot is lightly peppery with fruit flavors of watermelon and strawberry. They're expanded with generous skin phenolic flavors from 50% whole cluster fermentation, then softened with aging in neutral oak. Though a light wine overall, it's complex and holds your attention.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2014 Collection  (Saint-Amour)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: From the northernmost of the Beaujolais cru villages, this is a ripe and full wine. With rich cherry flavors and just enough acidity, the wine is lightly structured with some dry tannins. It is ready to drink.

properties.title: Lima Smith 2013 Boa Vista Touriga Nacional (Douro)
properties.descrption: A ripe, well-integrated wine, this is both structured and full of fruit. It is rich with perfumed tannins and with black fruits. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Lima Smith 2014 Quinta das Tecedeiras Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: Rua do Mirão, Sao Tome de Covelas,, 4640-211 Baião, Portugal
properties.descrption: Still closed and firm, this is a dry, tannic and smoky wine. With the dark tannins, it will take a while to bring out the juicy fruits that are underneath. Drink this rich wine from 2020.

properties.title: 3 Horse Ranch Vineyards 2014 Merlot-Cabernet Franc (Washington)
properties.address: 5900 Pearl Rd, Eagle, ID 83616, USA
properties.descrption: Light in color, this wine offers high-toned aromas of herb, cherry, clove, wood spice and exotic spice. The palate is quite elegant in style, wanting a bit more heft to fully bring it together.

properties.title: Analemma 2014 Oak Ridge Vineyard Pinot Noir (Columbia Gorge (WA))
properties.address: 1120 State Rd, Mosier, OR 97040, USA
properties.descrption: Pinot Noir is a relative rarity in Washington, this one coming from the highlands above the town of Husum. It brings aromas of earth, game, dried mushroom and strawberry that lead to plump elegantly styled fruit and savory flavors, with a finish that lingers.

properties.title: Archium 2014 Faction Syrah (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 703 Jefferson St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Dried red fruit, a touch of tar, fresh violets and cola spice show on this bottling's nose, which is reserved in style. Dried strawberry and cranberry flavors unfold on the palate, along with hints of caramel and hibiscus, proving refreshing if not deep in style.

properties.title: Barnard Griffin 2014 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 878 Tulip Ln, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.descrption: The fruit is at the fore here, with aromas of blue fruit, wet stone and spice, along with a whiff of tire rubber. The palate has sweet fruit flavors with nubby tannins and a tart coffee-filled finish.

properties.title: Barrel Road 2014 Artisan Blend Red (California)
properties.address: 3272 Industry Rd, Rootstown, OH 44272, USA
properties.descrption: This light- to medium-bodied red wine doesn't take itself too seriously and will be versatile with food. The fruity, almost jammy and fresh aromas lead to dry, substantive flavors and a tempting, smooth texture.

properties.title: Beacon Hill 2014 La Collina Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.descrption: Soft and accessible, this pushes pretty cherry fruit forward with pleasant notes of toast and mocha. Fermented with native yeast, it has an extra dollop of texture and detail.

properties.title: Brecon Estate 2014 Estate Tannat (Adelaida District)
properties.address: 7450 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas are wound tightly on this bottling that eventually shows asphalt, lava rock, violet and a touch of blueberry on the nose. There's a strong dose of acidity on the front of the sip, leading into boysenberry, elderberry, pepper and herb flavors.

properties.title: Brian Carter Cellars 2013 One Olsen Vineyard Merlot (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 17311 135th Ave NE STE A450, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas of cocoa and dark raspberry are speckled with light barrel accents. The red-fruit flavors are ripe and generous, dipping in the middle before coming back together on the elegant finish.

properties.title: Château de Paillet-Quancard 2014  Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: Chât Paillet, 33550 Paillet, France
properties.descrption: Grown on the slopes above the Garonne river, this is a crisp wine with attractive black-currant fruitiness. It has soft tannins that are well integrated into the fruitiness and acidity of the wine. The aftertaste is crisp and the wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Château Haut Beyzac 2014  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: château Beyzac, 33180 Vertheuil, France
properties.descrption: Bringing together the fruit of the vintage with some firm structure, this is going to be a ripe and balanced wine. It will also have plenty of juicy acidity and black currant fruits. Let this wine develop and don't drink before 2020.

properties.title: Château Poitevin 2014  Médoc
properties.address: 16 Rue du 19 Mars 1962, 33590 Jau-Dignac-et-Loirac, France
properties.descrption: This is a perfumed, juicy wine. It has attractive red-berry fruits and touches of black currant. Still young, the wine is still shot through with tannins and a firm structure. This will soften over the next year to give a fruity, smooth wine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Etablissements Thunevin 2014 Mauvais Garçon  (Bordeaux)
properties.address: 6 Rue Guadet, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: This is the branded Bordeaux from Jean-Luc Thunevin, so-called Bad Boy (Mauvais Garçon) of Saint-Émilion, now respected owner of Grand Cru Classé Château Valandraud. It is a richly smooth wine with touches of wood and generous blackberries. Concentrated and lightly tannic, it is fruity and ready to drink.

properties.title: Black's Station 2014 Malbec (Yolo County)
properties.address: 6652 US-15, Carthage, NC 28327, USA
properties.descrption: Bright, vivid flavors like black cherry and cranberry make this wine taste fresh and alive. Medium body and a somewhat tart but polished texture balance it out.

properties.title: Casa de la Ermita 2013 Crianza Red (Jumilla)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, 30520, 30520 Jumilla, Murcia, Spain
properties.descrption: Floral berry and plum aromas are lightly woody. This feels full and edgy, with fairly hard tannins. Black-fruit flavors are certainly ripe, while this finishes bold and intense, with scratchy tannins. The blend is Monastrell, Tempranillo and Cab Sauvignon.

properties.title: Dezzani 2012 San Carlo  (Barolo)
properties.descrption: This opens with subdued aromas of dark berry, cake spice, espresso and a whiff of pressed violet. On the straightforward palate, hints of white pepper and star anise add depth to dried morello cherry while solid tannins lend support.

properties.title: Juslyn Vineyards 2003 Perry's Blend Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2900 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: A very good wine, rich and packed with flavor. A dry and softly tannic, it floods the mouth with cassis, red currant, blueberry, plum, cocoa and smoky oak flavors.

properties.title: Domaine Alfred 2005 Califa Pinot Noir (Edna Valley)
properties.descrption: Represents a big improvement over last year's Califa; this one returns to dryness thanks to the cool vintage. Edna Valley acidity brightens cherry, root beer, vanilla bean and oak flavors. Dry and complex now, the wine should peak in a year or so, then hold through 2010.

properties.title: J. Portugal Ramos 2005 Aragonês (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: Smooth, wood-polished wine, packed with a ripe, comfortable texture, very ripe red fruits, highlights of tannins. There are black figs, balanced with sweet acidity and fattened with some bacon flavors.

properties.title: Quinta de Chocapalha 2005 Red (Estremadura)
properties.descrption: A powerful expression of Portuguese varieties, with dense tannins, dark fruit flavors and ripeness. If the alcohol is too high—and it shows in the pepper edge to the wine—it still has a sense of shape and structure.

properties.title: Smith & Hook 2005 Grand Reserve Red (Central Coast)
properties.descrption: Smith & Hook has tried hard to perfect their Cab, transferring fruit sourcing from Monterey to Paso Robles. As a result, the wines are riper, as evidenced by this fruity young Cab. The cherry and blackberry flavors are balanced by firm tannins and crisp acids, making it a versatile wine at the table.

properties.title: Talisman 2004 Thorn Ridge Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: The vineyard is in a cool area of this sprawling appellation southwest of Sebastopol, but the heat of the vintage shows in the wine's relative softness and ripeness of fruit. The cherries, raspberries and dates are almost, but not quite, cooked, bringing to mind a Fig Newton cookie. Scores high on the deliciousness scale, but it's not a wine for the cellar. Drink now.

properties.title: Luca 2006 Laborde Double Select Syrah (Uco Valley)
properties.descrption: Controlled berry and plum aromas are pure and not mucked up by too much oak. Like all Luca wines, this Syrah is bulky, full-framed and meaty. It's extracted but well balanced, with mellow fruit and a dark, crusty finish. Very pleasant and chunky, but not overwhelming. Drink now or over the next year or two.

properties.title: R.L. Buller & Son 2004 Calliope Limited Release Durif (Rutherglen)
properties.descrption: Despite substantial alcohol (16.5%), this admirably concentrated wine doesn't show that much heat, nor does it show any roasted, cooked character. Instead, it delivers black olive, leather and cassis flavors just tinged with mint and a fresh, lively finish hinting at coffee. The tannins are soft but present, helping to balance a hint of residual sugar. Drink now–2012.

properties.title: Tarapaca 2005 Zavala Red (Maipo Valley)
properties.descrption: Mainly Cabernet Sauvignon, with 7% Syrah and 6% Merlot, this presents wonderfully pure, expressive notes of mint, cassis and vanilla. It just lacks that extra touch of textural richness to put it in the top category. A prebottling sample of the 2007 was more impressive.

properties.title: Trivento 2006 Golden Reserve Syrah (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: A big, woody, totally modern style of Syrah. There is a lot more coconut, mocha and big berry fruit than anything you might find from France. It's dark and layered on the palate, with coconut and resin supporting black fruit. Finishes smoky and oaky, but structured, tannic and serious enough to impress.

properties.title: Valori 2003 Vigna Sant'Angelo  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
properties.descrption: This wine has beautiful complexity and balance backed by a soft, generous personality. Oak aging has shaped tones of spice, chocolate and vanilla with a smooth, rich texture that lasts long on the palate. Hedonistic and opulent.

properties.title: Work 2004 Zinfandel (Howell Mountain)
properties.descrption: Made in an exotic style, this Zin is ultra-concentrated in fruit and rich in tannins, in the way of a Howell Mountain red wine. It's complex in spicy currants, Dr. Pepper, Tabasco, chocolate and anise. A little soft in acidity, but should mellow out for years.

properties.title: El Coto 2000 Coto de Imaz Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Calle Cmno. Viejo, 26, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Like you might expect from a maturing gran reserva, Imaz offers glimpses of raisin, sweet berry and even some aged cheese. In the mouth, it's all about red fruit, although an earthy undertone provides some background. Feels a little stark, zesty and lean, while the finish is solid and tastes of vanilla and leather. Drink now through 2012.

properties.title: Baglio di Pianetto 2004 Ramione Red (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Francia, 90030 Santa Cristina Gela PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Ramione is a 50-50 blend of Merlot and Nero d'Avola that delivers a unique and very attractive mineral quality. Under that drying layer of white stone and talc powder, you'll find bursting red cherry and rich blueberry. The various elements of this velvety wine work very well together.

properties.title: Capel Vale 2005 Regional Series Shiraz (Mount Barker)
properties.descrption: Mixed berry, cola and cedar notes dominate the nose, while the palate is packed with cherry cola and leather flavors. The dense texture could use some time to open up, and that suggestion of ageability is reinforced by the finish's dry, dusty tannins. Drink 2010–15. Imported by Tom Eddy Wines.

properties.title: Château Julien 2006 Black Nova Red (Monterey County)
properties.address: 100 N Hope Ave UNIT 15, Santa Barbara, CA 93110, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of Zinfandel and Syrah, this wine is softly rich and jammy, with very ripe, forward black and red currant, chocolate, licorice and black pepper flavors. Fundamentally dry, though it leaves behind the impression of glyceriney sweetness.

properties.title: Feudo Arancio 2006 Merlot (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Portella Misilbesi, 92017 Sambuca di Sicilia AG, Italy
properties.descrption: Bright cherry and spice color this luminous Merlot that delivers power and definition and is not too weighed down by oak. In fact, this Sicilian red is sprightly and fresh with sweet cherry flavors on the close.

properties.title: Umani Ronchi 2005 Jorio  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: Via Adriatica, 12, 60027 Osimo AN, Italy
properties.descrption: The wine's cherry and spice flavors reach a good balance and create a solid wall of taste and flavor. This is not a subtle or intricate wine, but it is a fruit-forward, juicy expression of Montepulciano with chewy tannins and good succulence.

properties.title: Roquesán 2013 Rosado (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Calle Arriba, s/n, 09454 Quemada, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: Dusty, candied aromas of raspberry and stone fruits aren't all that fresh or defined. This has a grabby, citric feel and briny red-fruit flavors that are echoed on a full, chunky finish.

properties.title: Cascada Peak 2012 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 58575 State Rte 20, Rockport, WA 98283, USA
properties.descrption: Cherry, dry spice and leather aromas are detectable on an otherwise lean and dilute nose. Like the bouquet, the palate on this basic Malbec is thin. Flavors of generic berry fruits finish earthy and scratchy.

properties.title: Finca La Luz 2013 Callejon del Crimen Estate Malbec (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Tunuyán, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: Candied red-fruit aromas are thin and limited. This is edgy, rubbery and tannic in feel, with rudimentary raspberry and red-plum flavors. A juicy finish is lean and tastes medicinal.

properties.title: Burnt Bridge 2012 Upland Vineyards Grenache (Snipes Mountain)
properties.address: 1500 Broadway St, Vancouver, WA 98663, USA
properties.descrption: Aromatically unusual, this suggests raspberry jam, purple flowers, orange peel and manure. Flavors are tangy and almost seem to have a light spritz.

properties.title: Château Fleur la Mothe 2012  Médoc
properties.descrption: The wine is stalky with a green element that suggests underripe fruit. Black currant competes with burnt flavors that will soften as the wine ages. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Bodegas San Valero 2013 Castillo Ducay Red (Cariñena)
properties.address: Ctra. N-330, km 450, 50400 Cariñena, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Wiry, narrow aromas of red fruits and bell pepper lead to a grabby, tight palate. Flavors of spicy plum and green herbs are slightly bitter, while the finish feels raw and tannic.

properties.title: Diseño 2012 Old Vine Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: Stalky aromas make for a sketchy opening. In the mouth, this is blocky and grabby in feel. Burnt, underripe flavors of berry fruits are herbal and finish with grassy notes.

properties.title: Lágrimas de Maria 2009 Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Dense, roasted, earthy aromas start with tomato and fall off to raisiny and overripe. A chunky, flabbby, raisiny palate follows suit, while raisin and fruit-cake flavors maintain this wine's soft, overripe character.

properties.title: Larchago 2009 Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: La Poveda Hiribidea, 36, 01306 Lapuebla de Labarca, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Oaky aromas of maple and molasses are overriding and ponderous. In the mouth, this is tannic and punishing. Flavors of coconut and chocolate are overly dominant, leaving nothing but candied stickiness and wood resin on the finish.

properties.title: Fujishin 2012 Tempranillo
properties.address: 15593 Sunny Slope Rd, Caldwell, ID 83607, USA
properties.descrption: This unusual wine displays notes of cigar box, strong green herbs and woodspice. It drinks on the lighter side of medium bodied with coffee and nori flavors and a smoke-filled finish.

properties.title: Northwest Cellars 2012 Serenade Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon (40%), Merlot (35%), Syrah (22%) and Carmenère, this offers aromas of green tea, sawdust, blueberry and barnyard. The flavors are tangy and elegant in style.

properties.title: Orpheus 2010 Red Over Heels Red (Napa County)
properties.address: 8910 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: Half Merlot, the rest a mix of Petite Sirah and Syrah, this has a bell pepper and jalapeño greenness that can't be avoided in aroma or taste. From there, the wine seems diluted yet finishes with a hit of heat.

properties.title: Fujishin 2012 Mourvèdre
properties.address: 15593 Sunny Slope Rd, Caldwell, ID 83607, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is aromatically untoward, with notes of green herbs, bell pepper, dried tobacco and black pepper. The flavors are silky in feel and show decent concentration along with tart acids.

properties.title: Bodegas Paniza 2013 Agostón Garnacha-Syrah (Cariñena)
properties.address: Carretera Valencia, Km 53, 50480 Paniza, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Syrupy red-berry and cherry aromas are medicinal, while the mouthfeel on this blend is hard and abrasive. Berry and herbal flavors are on the sour side, while the finish does nothing to bring this around.

properties.title: Bodegas Paniza 2013 Agostón Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon (Cariñena)
properties.address: Carretera Valencia, Km 53, 50480 Paniza, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Grassy aromas mix with whiffs of red licorice candy and cinnamon to create an odd nose. Hard on the palate, this blend tastes of rubbery plum and pepper, with a minty, green finish closing it out.

properties.title: Field Stone 2012 Convivio Red (Alexander Valley)
properties.descrption: The bringing-together of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot and 10% Sangiovese is rough, coming off as dry, smoky and a tad odd on the palate, the fruit hidden from sight.

properties.title: Finca La Luz 2013 Callejon del Crimen Barrel Selection Malbec (Uco Valley)
properties.descrption: Roasted, barnyard, leathery aromas of lemony oak and tomato are far from ideal. This has a scratchy, tartaric feel to it, while herbal raspberry flavors are backed by a mulchy aftertaste. It's stewed on the finish and weedy.

properties.title: Two Ponds 2012 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This wine offers a somewhat untoward combination of herbs, nori, tire rubber and blue fruit. Flavors are sharp-edged backed by chalky tannins.

properties.title: Clos Henri 2011 Petit Clos Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: 639 State Highway 63, Renwick 7271, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Owned by the same Henri Bourgeois family that produces a dizzying array of Loire wines, this tastes a bit like a Loire wine. It's lean and tart in style, with barely ripe fruit that is accented by herbal notes and a crisp finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Cottesbrook 2010 Pinot Noir (South Island)
properties.descrption: A hint of adhesive bandage on the nose casts a sweaty note over the otherwise pretty tones of violets and cherries. On the palate, the wine is medium bodied, and it's tart and tangy on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Jaffelin 2010 Les Chapitres de Jaffelin  (Bourgogne)
properties.descrption: High acidity makes this wine taste bright, fruity and light. There is only a hint of dry tannin to the red currant flavor.

properties.title: Saint Clair 2011 Pioneer Block 16 Awatere Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.descrption: Most of Saint Clair's Pioneer Block offerings are excellent, but the 2011 Block 16 from the Awatere comes across as a simple, fruit-driven Pinot Noir. A punched-up cherry note dominates, leaving little room for complexity or structure. Drink now.

properties.title: Mazzocco 2010 Smith Orchard Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1400 Lytton Springs Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: The high alcohol gives this wine glycerine-driven sweetness and Port-like heat. With its raisin and chocolate flavors, this is Mazzocco's signature style.

properties.title: Tower 15 2010 The Swell Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 19925 Hogback Mountain Rd, Leesburg, VA 20175, USA
properties.descrption: A blend based on Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot, this is heavy, soft and fruity, delivering a blackberry flavor and a dry finish.

properties.title: A. Parparoussis 2005 Taos Dry Red Wine Red (Achaia)
properties.address: Polykastis, Patra 264 42, Greece
properties.descrption: Leather, spice, red fruit and smoke notes characterize this red blend. Dry and fresh, it will pair nicely with dried meats or tomato-based dishes.

properties.title: Four Vines 2010 Truant Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: 7300 N River Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: A clean, everyday Zinfandel, this shows the varietal's full body, tannins and spiciness. The flavors are of raspberries, cherries, cola, olives and pepper.

properties.title: Herdade dos Templários 2010 Vale das Donas Red (Tejo)
properties.address: R. Tomar - Valdonas, Santa Maria dos Olivais, 2300-608 Tomar, Portugal
properties.descrption: Flavors of beetroot and juicy fruit are juxtaposed in this structured yet fruity wine. It has some bitterness and a hint of wood, and there is intense acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Fess Parker 2010 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: This tastes somewhat vegetal, with dill and asparagus hints that are set against the cherry pie flavor.

properties.title: Girasole 2009 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
properties.descrption: A fairly tannic Zinfandel, this is made from organic grapes. Enjoy with pizza or hamburgers.

properties.title: Tin Barn 2010 Ricci Vineyard Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 21692 8th St E Ste. 340, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: This is a simple Pinot Noir that has raspberry and cherry jam flavors. While it has a delicate mouthfeel, it tastes candied and sweet.

properties.title: Wairau River 2010 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: 11 Rapaura Road, Blenheim 7273, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Lean and wiry in style, this pale Pinot Noir stands out as being different from most Marlborough bottlings. Modest strawberry and cranberry flavors are accented by leather and dark chocolate notes.

properties.title: Kokomo 2010 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 4791 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This Zinfandel is a bit rustic, with a jagged mouthfeel. It offers sweet-tasting varietal flavors of wild berry, spice and tobacco, plus a touch of prune.

properties.title: Barra of Mendocino 2010 Pinot Noir (Mendocino)
properties.address: 7051 N State St, Redwood Valley, CA 95470, USA
properties.descrption: A wispy Mendocino Pinot Noir, this lacks depth and finesse. It has undertones of currant and cherry, and a wham-bam finish.

properties.title: Martin's Rake 2010 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.descrption: This relatively lightweight Pinot Noir features an array of meaty, earthy notes and a modest pie-cherry flavor before drying out and turning even more tart on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Parkers Estate 2011 Riverside Crossing Syrah (North Coast)
properties.address: 6200 Foxen Canyon Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: Red fruit dominant, this tight Syrah also offers whiffs of grenadine and perfume.

properties.title: Tower 15 2010 Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 19925 Hogback Mountain Rd, Leesburg, VA 20175, USA
properties.descrption: A heavy, dull wine, this is dry and tannic, and it offers blackberry, cassis and cedar flavors that seem thin.

properties.title: Fess Parker 2010 Pommard Clone Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: Green and mint-like in scent, with a note that's reminiscent of grape stem, this Pinot Noir tastes hot from the high alcohol.

properties.title: Il Cascinone 2014 Rive  (Barbera d'Asti Superiore)
properties.descrption: Ripe black-skinned berry and black plum aromas take center stage in this wine, along with a whiff of toast. The dense palate shows black cherry, licorice and mocha touches framed by firm tannins. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Il Falchetto 2016 Pian Scorrone  (Barbera d'Asti)
properties.address: Frazione Ciombi, 16, 12058 Santo Stefano Belbo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Intense violet, red-skinned berry and cooking spice aromas set the stage in this bright red. The lively palate delivers red cherry, blackberry and cinnamon touches alongside round tannins and lively acidity. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2015 Laurent Dufouleur Cuvée Grégoire  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: Laurent Dufouleur is the current director of Tramier and has created a series of wines under his name. This wood and red-fruit-flavored wine is likely to be attractively ripe and jammy as the wood softens and integrates. There is fine acidity at the end and the wine will be ready to drink from 2019.

properties.title: Left Bend 2014 Syrah-Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 1020 Mt Madonna Rd, Watsonville, CA 95076, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of 55% Syrah and 45% Cabernet Sauvignon offers tightly wound elderberry, beef char and deep black-plum aromas on the nose. The flavors are balanced between a blackberry ripeness and a tarry bitterness, lifted by touches of lavender, rose petals and tart black-plum skins.

properties.title: Maison Jessiaume 2015  Bourgogne
properties.descrption: This wine really benefits from the delicious ripe fruit of the vintage. So broad, rich red-berry flavors give the wine a generous character with just the right amount of the balanced acidity. The wine is full, fruity and ready to drink.

properties.title: Meiomi 2016 Pinot Noir (Sonoma County-Monterey County-Santa Barbara County)
properties.descrption: This bottling blends 60% Monterey County, 23% Santa Barbara County and 17% Sonoma County fruit to deliver bright and juicy berries on the nose, from strawberry to blackberry as well as graphite and tree bark. The flavors are very full, with more berries and star anise, although the texture is somewhat simple.

properties.title: Montes 2015 Alpha Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: I-350, Millahue, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: This opaque Carmenère opens with oaky, charred aromas of black fruits, coconut and burnt toast. The palate is full, meandering and ultimately heavy and extracted. Dark, toasty flavors of black fruits, resiny oak and vanilla finish with grabby tannins, spiky acidity and long-lasting blackened notes.

properties.title: Nada Fiorenzo 2013 Manzola  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Via Ausario, 12/C, 12050 Treiso CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with licorice, chopped herb, eucalyptus and dark spice aromas. The assertive palate offers dried black cherry, coffee bean and sagenotes framed by close-grained tannins.

properties.title: Nada Fiorenzo 2013 Montaribaldi  (Barbaresco)
properties.descrption: This has earthy aromas suggesting underbrush, new leather, menthol and truffle, along with a whiff of medicinal herb. The palate is tightly wound and still rather closed, offering hints of espresso, anise and raw berry framed by drying, close-grained tannins.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2014 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Grenache (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Berry, vanilla, coconut and barrel spice aromas are followed by barrel flavors in this wine. It brings appeal, but the oak (42% new French and American) seems to take over.

properties.title: Rabble 2014 Mossfire Ranch Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3090 Anderson Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Savory pepper and rustic gravel aromas meet with strawberry and dried cherry on the nose of this proprietary red blend that is widely available. Strawberry pie flavors dominate the sip, but there's also a lava rock minerality and a burst of acidity.

properties.title: Siduri 2015 Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 235 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Intensely dark blackberry fruit meets with game and minty chocolate on the nose of this appellation blend by Adam Lee. The flavors are woody with forest undergrowth, and surround a core of mulberry.

properties.title: Tenuta H.Lentsch 2004 Palestina Red (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Reichsstraße, 71, 39051 Branzoll, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of 60% Cabernet and 40% Merlot, this is a soft and lush red wine, with pretty aromas of cherry, blackberry, dried herb, spice and bitter chocolate. It has a smooth texture that's backed by firm, enduring structure.

properties.title: Domaine de Leyre-Loup 2010 Réserve Louis Leyre-Loup  (Fleurie)
properties.address: 69910 Villié-Morgon, France
properties.descrption: This is a perfumed wine with violet aromas and a fragrant character. It has soft plum and cherry flavors, its acidity shaped by ripe fruits. There is a touch of structure that provides a fine finish.

properties.title: Georges Duboeuf 2011 Côte de Py  (Morgon)
properties.address: 836 Rte de Fleurie, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.descrption: This is a solid, structured, mineral-driven wine from a famous vineyard. It is firm and dense, its big plum and berry flavors are supported by dry tannins and an herbal spice character. With its firm style, it needs to age for at least two years.

properties.title: Georges Duboeuf 2011 Domaine Chaponne  (Morgon)
properties.address: 836 Rte de Fleurie, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.descrption: Firm tannins and its dark plum and blackberry fruits all point to a structured wine that has aging potential. It is ripe, with black cherry and spice notes that are balanced with acidity. Keep for one year.

properties.title: Agustí Torelló Mata 2008 Brut Reserva Rosat Trepat (Cava)
properties.descrption: Dusty and smooth upfront, this has attractive orange, nectarine and cream aromas. It feels layered and balanced, with cantaloupe, orange and milk chocolate flavors vying for attention. Mild but composed on the finish, this is made entirely from Trepat.

properties.title: Amavi 2010 Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Though the wine saw less than 10% new oak, it carries a rich, smoky note of espresso from first whiff to last swallow. It's dusty and dense, with fragrances of baking spice and incense. The flavors bring accents of citrus rind, orange peel and white pepper, showing lovely balance and varietal strength throughout.

properties.title: Casale della Ioria 2009 Torre del Piano Superiore Riserva  (Cesanese del Piglio)
properties.address: km 4,200, Strada Provinciale 118, 03012 Anagni FR, Italy
properties.descrption: Cesanese del Piglio is at the center of Lazio's wine renaissance, which is currently only in its initial stirrings. This is perfumed, bright and loaded with dried herb, ginger, forest fruit and spice flavors. The close is velvety and soft.

properties.title: Judith Beck 2011 Blaufränkisch (Burgenland)
properties.descrption: The partner to Beck's Zweigelt, this is every bit as complex and structured. It has a solid, firm feel, with darkly tannic fruit, a broad texture and a hint of toast. This is for aging for at least a year. Screwcap.

properties.title: K Vintners 2009 Stoneridge Vineyard Merlot (Washington)
properties.address: 820 Mill Creek Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This is a very firm, tight and focused effort, with a clean cherry flavor. It is not at all like most Washington Merlots, which are often heavily influenced by new oak aging. Here is a concise, pure expression that may come across as a little monochromatic, perhaps because it seems to be somewhat shut down at the moment. Made using grapes from 10-year-old vines, it shows great promise.

properties.title: Pieve Vecchia 2010 Pieve dei Monaci  (Maremma Toscana)
properties.descrption: Plush and velvety, this has loads of red fruit, leather, tobacco and overall intensity. The finish is smooth and soft, with a touch of black pepper.

properties.title: Red Knot 2015 Shiraz (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: 3 Stump Hill Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: This is simple yet rich style, with dark berries, chocolate and toasty oak notes. For those who like their powerful, dense reds, this comes at an affordable price.

properties.title: Scheid Vineyards 2015 Pinot Noir (Monterey)
properties.address: 2015 Metz Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.descrption: Warm red-cherry aromas meet with light hints of sage and leather on the very shy nose of this bottling from one of the region's larger growers. The flavors are also light and rustic, with tart cranberry and hints of leather and game.

properties.title: Stemilt Creek 2014 Ascent One-half Mile Closer to the Moon Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Aromas of wood spice, dill, vanilla and cherry are at the fore. The palate mixes jammy fruit with barrel flavors. The two seeming to tussle a bit. The wood wins out on the finish.

properties.title: Tantara 2014 Mateo Vineyard Cabernet Franc
properties.descrption: There's a very cooked quality to this bottling, with aromas of kirsch, stewed cherry, grape juice, coffee and strong violets. Somewhat sweeter flavors of strawberry, plum and cocoa dust show on the sip, held up by decent acidity.

properties.title: Tedeschi 2014 Maternigo  (Valpolicella Superiore)
properties.address: Via Giuseppe Verdi, 4/a, 37029 Pedemonte di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of forest floor, grilled herb, steeped prune and a balsamic note carry over to the palate, along with a hint of salted game. It's on the lean side in terms of fruit, with vivacious acidity and soft tannins.

properties.title: Karah Estate 2015 Reserve Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 1010 W Railroad Ave, Cotati, CA 94931, USA
properties.descrption: Woody and herbal, this full-bodied robust wine is approachably thick and round, with distinct characteristics of forest floor, mushroom and black tea.

properties.title: Kendall-Jackson 2014 Vintner's Reserve Merlot (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 5007 Fulton Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.descrption: Soft and supple, this wine aims to please across a wide range of palates, offering mellowed tannins and oak around a layering of plum, cherry and cinnamon.

properties.title: Smoke Tree 2015 Pinot Noir (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: Earthy mushroom and (no joke) smoke, entertain a simple layering of robust strawberry, raspberry and vanilla in this ripe wine.

properties.title: Terrapura 2015 Pinot Noir (Chile)
properties.address: San Fernando, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: For value-priced Pinot, give this its props for being fair and consistent with past vintages. On the nose, this smells a bit furry and spicy, with meaty plum and tea notes. A medium-bodied palate feels a touch resiny, while this tastes of spice, wood and ripe red fruits.

properties.title: Adega Vila Real 2014 Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: The oak aging gives this wine an attractive, spicy character. A blend of four of the Douro's most familiar varieties, it is rich, full of black fruit with a rich core of tannin and balanced acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Amador Cellars 2013 Aglianico (Amador County)
properties.descrption: Full bodied and firmly tannic, this bold wine has lots of berry and cherry flavors, tangy acidity and plenty of tannin, too. It tastes dry, almost tart, and leaves an astringent effect on the finish, so it needs to pair with rich fatty foods that balance it out.

properties.title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2016 Alabastro by Quinta de Terrugem Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Estrada Nacional 10, 2925-901 Azeitão, Portugal
properties.descrption: This young and fruity wine has soft tannins and the typical warm rich character of Alentejo. Its spice and juicy red flavors are all ready to drink, full of fruit and with a fine cut of acidity.

properties.title: Barton & Guestier 2015 Passeport  (Bordeaux)
properties.descrption: This is a soft and easy wine from a ripe vintage. With black currant fruit, plenty of acidity and a light touch of tannin, it's made to be drunk young.

properties.title: Andrew Will 2007 Sorella Red Wine Red (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: In this new vintage of Sorella, Cabernet Sauvignon is again right out front at 72% of the blend. Here the fruit seems more subdued, the wine tight, the dense tannins showing graphite and mineral more than new barrel flavors. It definitely needs decanting.

properties.title: Andrew Will 2007 Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Red Wine Red (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: A completely different blend from the winery's 2006 Ciel, this reflects Chris Camarda's growing enchantment with Cabernet Franc, which is now 45% of the blend. Most of the rest is Merlot—a Right Bank style. The concept works. It captures the sleek minerality of the site, and puts the fruit into tight, laser-like focus. The wine seems almost crystalline—sharp-edged and reflective, with penetrating angles and offset flavors.

properties.title: Rulo 2007 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3525 Pranger Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Superb fruit highlights this tight, sculpted Syrah. It's extremely dense, with deep and intense raspberry and cassis fruit flavor, augmented with coffee grounds, smoke and iron filings. Complex, detailed, balanced and deep—what more can a wine give you? This is drinking very young and surely needs to be decanted. But already displaying amazing power.

properties.title: Le Chiuse 2004 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Loc Le Chiuse zona Val di Cava, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Le Chiuse has produced one of Montalcino's brightest stars with this Riserva 2004 (the base 2004 Brunello didn't impress us as nearly much). This is a delicious wine that you will enjoy on every level. The intensity and purity of the fruit and spice aromas are impressive and the mouthfeel is extra-plush and supple. Yet, those firm tannins give it the balance and structure it needs.

properties.title: Andrew Will 2007 Champoux Vineyard Red Wine Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.descrption: A unique version of Andrew Will's Champoux, this is more than half Cabernet Franc, with Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot filling in the rest. Thick and tannic, yet perfectly ripe and almost silky, it coats the palate with black cherry, graphite, slate and a bit of chalk. All that said, the fruit more than holds its own against the terroir's minerality. Drink this with your best steak, and give it plenty of breathing time.

properties.title: Fort Ross 2007 Fort Ross Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: What a beautiful Pinot Noir for drinking now with lamb chops or maybe a rich, exotic Ahi tuna tartare. Brilliantly crisp in acidity, with a clean, bracing mouthfeel, it offers dazzlingly rich flavors of raspberries, cherries, orange zest, Dr. Pepper cola and Asian spices, with smoky oak adding elaborate tiers of vanilla char. For the price, it's a very great buy.

properties.title: Buty 2007 Rediviva of the Stones Red Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Violets and compost dance through the aromas, leading into an intensely fruity palate loaded with sappy berry richness, nuanced with scents and streaks of cured meat, garrigue, earth and graphite. Blending 77% Syrah with 23% Cabernet Sauvignon, it strikes a perfect balance among fruit, earth, and rock. At its core it is still wrapped tight, immaculately clean, and still almost impenetrably dense.

properties.title: Quinta do Vallado 2007 Reserva Field Blend Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: From old, mixed planting vineyards in the Quinta do Vallado, this is an impressively complex blend of flavors, from rich spice, smooth tannins, the richest plum juice and a gorgeous, opulent texture. It is ripe, drinkable now, but likely to benefit from several years aging.

properties.title: Mercy 2008 Cedar Lane Vineyard Pinot Noir (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 40 W Carmel Valley Rd A, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.descrption: An absolutely delicious Pinot Noir. Hard to exaggerate the drinkability factor. Supremely ripe cherry and raspberry fruit is highlighted by brilliantly crisp acidity to make it all bright and lively. Oak plays second fiddle, contributing rich, tasteful notes of smoke, vanilla and buttered cinnamon toast. Just gorgeous for drinking now and for the next 5–6 years with your best fare.

properties.title: Andrew Will 2007 Two Blondes Vineyard Red Wine Red (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.descrption: This Two Blondes is the best ever—powerful and ripe, with a plush mix of raspberry and strawberry fruit, tart and tangy and mouthfilling. This wine has a huge midpalate, but doesn't stop there; as it slowly winds through a full-throttle finish, threads of chocolate, coconut, caramel and coffee appear. The flavors go on for several minutes.

properties.title: àMaurice 2007 Malbec (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178 Vineyard Ln, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Scents of cinnamon, peppery herbs and Asian spices. Lovely, detailed and deep, this blends sharply etched red and purple fruits with seams of vanilla and cut tobacco. Flavors follow, with medium acidity and leafy tannins. Nicely balanced, spiced, varietal and persistent.

properties.title: J. Bookwalter 2007 Protagonist Red (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 1695 Malibu PR NE, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.descrption: Lushly aromatic and toasty, the substantial oak flavors are set against deep, brambly berry and cassis fruits. There are subtle suggestions of mint and some alcoholic heat, and an interesting orange peel scent carries into the mouth. The tannins are big and ripe and not at all bitter or too heavy.

properties.title: Laetitia 2007 La Colline Pinot Noir (Arroyo Grande Valley)
properties.address: 453 Laetitia Vineyard Drive, Arroyo Grande, CA 93420, USA
properties.descrption: A vigorous, masculine Pinot Noir. Dark in color, tannic and acidic, it has the weight of Grenache, although with silkier tannins. The flavors are impressively ripe and deep, suggesting raspberries, cherries, currants and a baked pie crust quality from oak. A bit ponderous now. Give it a good, long decant, or hold for up to six years.

properties.title: Quilceda Creek 2007 Palengat Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.descrption: Quilceda's Palengat is now a proprietary blend, not a strict Cabernet as before. You can smell the violets amidst nicely layered aromatics, built upon layers of black fruits, cassis and dark, smoky elements. Smoke, earth, coffee, a hint of iron and rock continue into the midpalate, which loses a little density as it moves through the finish. That may be a reflection of the young-ish (7 to 10 year old) vines.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2007 Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Once again, here is a Seven Hills wine that opens with truly lovely aromatics. It's a clean varietal expression of Syrah, with medium weight, wild berries and finishing highlights of pepper, earth, sea salt, baking spices and cassis.

properties.title: Braida di Giacomo Bologna 2007 Bricco della Bigotta  (Barbera d'Asti)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale N. 27, 14030 Rocchetta Tanaro AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a super-modern and thoroughly lovable style of Barbera with intense and complex notes of milk chocolate, big black berry spice and espresso coffee. This wine stands tall among a new school of Barbera producers who have opted for a soft and extracted interpretation of this otherwise thorny and acidic grape.

properties.title: Freeman 2008 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Another in a string of fine Pinots from this producer. Shows real cool coastal influence in the brisk acidity, delicate structure and deep flavors of cherries and cola, which seem to have a long hangtime complexity. Very good, and should develop over the next 5–6 years.

properties.title: Maison Bleue 2008 Alder Ridge Vineyard La Montagnette Grenache (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 20 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Fragrant and spicy, this opens with green pepper notes and boatloads of prickly/brambly raspberry/strawberry fruit. From a cool vintage, the blend includes 15% Syrah. It's nicely handled, with great penetration and a dancer's precision.

properties.title: Mas del Périé 2007 La Pièce Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Le bourg, 46090 Trespoux-Rassiels, France
properties.descrption: How good to find a powerful wine like this with reasonable alcohol. For this is an impressively dense and concentrated wine from 50-year-old vines. The fruit is ripe, juicy and chunky to go with the polished wood. A wine for cellaring.

properties.title: Château Peyros 2005 Vieilles Vignes Tannat (Madiran)
properties.address: 9 Chem. du Château, 64350 Corbère-Abères, France
properties.descrption: A delicious wine whose richness is matched by great texture and big, juicy fruits. It has plenty of tannins, but they meld easily into the rich ripe fruits, leaving a wine with a structure that offers considerable potential.

properties.title: Château Saint-Sernin 2010 Prestige Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
properties.descrption: This is a rich and structured wine from Heifara Swatvagher. With wood aging giving the wine its toasty, spicy character, it is ripe and perfumed with black plum flavors and fresh with black currant acidity. The wine is only just beginning to be ready to drink and will certainly be better from 2018.

properties.title: Fallbrook 2011 33 Degrees North Gracie Hill Vineyard Merlot (South Coast)
properties.descrption: This is a strong wine from this region just south of Temecula and north of San Diego. The nose offers smoked cigar, blackberry preserves, raw cut wood and pine-needle aromas, while the palate packs juniper and floral tea elements into a black-plum backbone. Hints of soy and burned caramel add action to the medium-weight mouthfeel.

properties.title: Fattoria San Michele a Torri 2013 Tenuta La Gabbiola  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Via Santa Michele, 36, 50018 Scandicci FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Enticing scents of blue flower, plum, blackberry and dried herb come together on this. The fresh, chewy palate offers dried black cherry, anise and tobacco set against a backbone of assertive tannins and zesty acidity.

properties.title: La Fortuna 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: 16712 NE 219th St, Battle Ground, WA 98604, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of menthol, mature dark-skinned berry and a whiff of cellar floor lead the way. On the palate, notes of coffee, white pepper and grilled herb accent fleshy wild cherry alongside solid, assertive tannins.

properties.title: Luis Felipe Edwards 2012 Cien 100 Ancient Vines Carignan (Maule Valley)
properties.descrption: Gritty but ripe and earthy dark-fruit aromas are spicy and alert. This Carignan from centenary vines feels angular and slightly acidic and tannic. Toasty oak flavors complement plum fruit, while this is bright, fresh and racy on the finish.

properties.title: Margerum 2013 Colson Canyon Vineyard Syrah (Santa Barbara County)
properties.descrption: From a popular vineyard in the mountains north of the Santa Maria Valley, this bottling shows strong blackberry-pie notes as well as tighter scents of black-plum skins. Purple fruits and flowers of lavender and violet pop on the palate, where zesty acidity carries the sip into an ever-so-slightly caramel finish.

properties.title: Podere Castellinuzza 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.address: 50022 Castellinuzza, Metropolitan City of Florence, Italy
properties.descrption: Violet, woodland berry, baking spice and chopped mint aromas slowly emerge on this polished red. The bright palate doles out tart cherry, cinnamon and a hint of white pepper while lithe tannins and fresh acidity lend a refined framework.

properties.title: Ravenswood 2013 Teldeschi Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: This old-vine wine contains 12% Carignane and 8% Petite Sirah, and is one of the larger of the producer's single-vineyard offerings. Feral black fruit and fig form a core of concentrated richness before red-berry pie and vanilla come into play, finishing with a blur of toasty oak.

properties.title: Robert Hall 2014 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3443 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Opting to focus on the herbal side of California's historic grape, this wine shows dark cranberry on the nose but lets the chaparral, thyme and cola do the heavy lifting. The palate is dominated by shrub character, with wild mint, sage and oregano flavors seasoning the dried-berry fruit.

properties.title: Jacob's Creek 2013 Reserve Shiraz (Barossa)
properties.address: 2129 Barossa Valley Way, Rowland Flat SA 5352, Australia
properties.descrption: So putting “Reserve” on a $13 bottle of wine might seem like a stretch, but the fact is what's in the bottle is very good. It's full bodied, creamy and lushly textured, with an intriguing herbal tang to the black cherry fruit, hints of vanilla and a softly dusty finish. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Luiano 2013 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Via di Luiano, 32, 50026 San Casciano in Val di pesa FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Enticing scents of rose, moist soil, plum, raspberry and dark spice meld together in the glass. The lively palate shows fleshy black cherry, mocha, vanilla and a licorice note alongside zesty acidity. Fine-grained tannins give it a polished finish.

properties.title: Marchesi Antinori 2013 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Via Cassia per Siena, 133, 50026 Firenze FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Red currant, French oak, espresso and cedar aromas emerge on this blend of 90% Sangiovese and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon. The taut palate offers sour cherry, licorice, grilled sage and oak-driven spice alongside a backbone of fine-grained tannins that grip the finish.

properties.title: Querciabella 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Via di Barbiano, 17, 50022 Greve in Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Leather, menthol, dark-skinned berry and light toast aromas slowly come together on this fresh, polished wine. The lithe, straightforward palate offers wild cherry, anise, orange peel and a hint of coffee while fine-grained tannins and vibrant acidity provide the framework.

properties.title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2013 Red (Tejo)
properties.descrption: Dominated by Touriga Nacional at 60% with the addition of 40% Syrah, this is a ripe, fruity wine. It is full of fresh berry fruits that are sustained by the firm tannic background. It has a ripe feel while also have a light touch of acidity. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Finca Sandoval 2009 Red (Manchuela)
properties.address: CM-3222, km. 26, 800, 16237 Ledaña, Cuenca, Spain
properties.descrption: Strapping aromas of blackberry and licorice are fiery and grating. This Syrah-led blend from a hot vintage is mighty tannic, so much so that it collapses under tannic weight. Flavors of blackberry, prune and cherry are spicy, while this tastes rooty and warm on the finish. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Iris Vineyards 2014 Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.descrption: Despite its youth, this is a soft, round, totally accessible wine with pretty flavors of sassafras, pie cherries and cooked plums. It skirts close to an impression of jam, and almost begs for near-term consumption. Don't hold back.

properties.title: Ken Brown 2013 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 157 W Hwy 246, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.descrption: This appellation blend is rich and lush with baked black-cherry aromas, touches of black cardamom and clove spice, and earthy rhubarb and beet notes. The palate packs a lot of forest-floor flavors, from loam to pine needles, into dark cranberry and tight raspberry fruit, leveled by pepper and pencil lead.

properties.title: Wrath 2013 Alta Loma Vineyard Grenache (Monterey)
properties.address: 35801 Foothill Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.descrption: Fresh red cherry and plump red currants are spiced up by Dr Pepper, cola, rose petals, mace and dried fennel on the nose of this bottling by Sabrine Rodems. Tea and Asian five-spice notes arise once sipped, backed by raspberries and pink peppercorns, altogether fairly light and lithe in body.

properties.title: Barone Ricasoli 2013 Brolio Bettino  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: 53013 in, Via G. Marconi, 27, 53013 Gaiole In Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Dark-skinned berry, menthol, dark cooking spice and aromatic herb aromas unfold on this. The fresh, juicy palate offers dried black cherry, red currant, coffee and licorice alongside smooth, polished tannins. Enjoy through 2019.

properties.title: Barone Ricasoli 2013 Brolio Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: 53013 in, Via G. Marconi, 27, 53013 Gaiole In Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Scents of black currant, green bell pepper, cedar and a hint of violet slowly emerge in the glass. The firm palate offers dried black cherry, toast, coffee, mocha and a touch of vanilla alongside polished, fine-grained tannins.

properties.title: Baxter 2013 Run Dog Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 8660 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has a deep color, strong fruity aromas and substantial fruit flavors. Full bodied and moderately tannic, it has a good, grippy mouthfeel and honest black-cherry and plum notes. Tasty now it will improve through 2018 or so.

properties.title: Carpineto 2014  Rosso di Montepulciano
properties.descrption: This savory red opens with aromas that recall underbrush, dark berry, spice and a hint of new leather. The easy-drinking, juicy palate offers wild cherry, raspberry and a dash of baking spice alongside polished tannins and lively acidity.

properties.title: Castellare di Castellina 2013 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Caselle, SP130, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Fragrant purple flower, dark-skinned berry, eucalyptus and aromatic herb aromas lead the way. The bright, no-frills palate offers sour cherry, chopped mint and a hint of clove while lithe tannins add polish. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Castello della Paneretta 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Strada della Paneretta, 35, 50028 Barberino Tavarnelle FI, Italy
properties.descrption: This offers aromas that recall red berry, moist soil and a whiff of clove. The vibrant palate delivers juicy wild cherry, blackberry, chopped herb and anise alongside lively acidity and polished tannins.

properties.title: Alidis 2011 Gran Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.descrption: Alidis is not the most consistent winery in Ribera del Duero, but this gran reserva gets it mostly right. Earthy, slightly mulchy and rubbery berry aromas lead to a saturated bulky palate. Saucy earthy flavors of black fruits finish gritty and a bit leathery, with a jammy weight and a lasting note of black coffee.

properties.title: Betwixt 2014 Grenache (Chalone)
properties.descrption: Extremely light in the glass, this bottling demonstrates both the delicate and action-packed aspects of the grape, much like many world-class Pinot Noirs. Vivacious and fruity bramble and hibiscus aromas meet with anise and nutmeg on the nose. The palate refreshes with red plum and spice flavors.

properties.title: Buehler 2014 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 820 Greenfield Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This is a classy, elegant expression of the variety, despite its brawn and ripe density. Fruit-forward, with blackberry and cherry flavors, it shows traces of vanilla, spicy pepper and smoky oak. The texture is soft, with subtle tannins.

properties.title: Carlisle 2014 Carlisle Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6301 Starr Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: From an almost centenarian vineyard planted to mixed varieties, this has juicy core of cherry and blackberry fruit. An undercurrent of Asian spice and white pepper shows through, finishing on a minty chocolate note.

properties.title: Carlisle 2014 Pagani Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 6301 Starr Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: This wine contains 14% “mixed blacks,” including grapes like Alicante Bouschet, and is powerful and ripe. Its flavors seem at once tart and sweet, framed by dusty cherry and vanilla. There's a persistent, feral, compost-like thread throughout its dense structure and tannic finish.

properties.title: Château Armandière 2012 Diamant Rouge Malbec (Cahors)
