properties.descrption: To say the least, it comes out guns blazing and oozing mountain character. Animal and barnyard, coffee and earth, even burnt toast and smoky bacon are all over this wine. Fruit definitely plays second fiddle to the dark, earthy essence of this Cabernet, Merlot and Cab Franc trio.

properties.title: Conn Valley 1997 Eloge Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8711 Silverado Trail, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Fine berry fruit, dried flowers, and an olive note mark the intriguing nose of this very dry, even austerely elegant blend. Very mature, almost raisiny fruit and dark-chocolate flavors cover the palate. A full finish with tobacco notes wraps up this very masculine package. Hold until 2005.

properties.title: Cain 1997 Concept Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3800 Langtry Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: A mix of Cabernet, Cab Franc and Syrah, this out-of-the-ordinary blend is a little funky and meaty, but still offers lots of juicy black fruit and a whole lot of toasted oak. If any one thing announces itself here it's the wood, which keeps everything austere and maybe a touch overcharred.

properties.title: Chimney Rock 1997 Elevage Red (Stags Leap District)
properties.address: 5350 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: The bouquet offers intensely jammy prune and black-currant fruit, with tobacco and vanilla shadings making an appearance. Dark blueberry flavors, with some mint and a light orange-citrus note. Full grapey mouthfeel, a long finish, and dusty tannins. Almost drinkable now, but best after 2002 and until 2010.

properties.title: Stonehaven 1998 Shiraz (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: Padthaway SA 5271, Australia
properties.descrption: Quite lively and solid, offering loads of black currant and bramble on the nose, and ripe dark fruit with smoky accents on the palate. The mouthfeel is supple, with a nice peppery tang, and it finishes well, with tart berry and licorice notes.

properties.title: Easton 2013 Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
properties.address: 1247 Simon Blvd Suite N103, Easton, PA 18042, USA
properties.descrption: This is an excellent, dry, well-balanced and nicely tannic wine that would love to come to your next dinner featuring a roast bird or grilled chop. It's a bit reserved, not as showy as a lot of other wines, but has the gripping texture and firm acidity that is great at the table.

properties.title: Fiddletown Cellars 2013 Barbera (Amador County)
properties.address: PO Box 69, Fiddletown, CA 95629, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is concentrated, richly textured and full of great dark fruit character. It smells like plump blackberries and raspberries, tastes ripe, lush in the mouth, and lingering on the finish. What's more, it has very good balance, full body and well-integrated tannins.

properties.title: Firriato 2012 Cavanera Covo delle Coturnie  (Etna)
properties.address: Via Trapani, 4, 91027 Paceco TP, Italy
properties.descrption: Intensely floral aromas of violet, iris and rose emerge in the glass along with a whiff of dark-skinned berry. The savory palate offers juicy wild cherry, raspberry, cinnamon, mint and clove while mineral and licorice notes wrap around the finish. Close-grained tannins provide the firm framework.

properties.title: Girolamo Russo 2014 A Rina  (Etna)
properties.address: via 95012 ct, Via Regina Margherita, 80, 95012 Passopisciaro CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of toast, hazelnut, ripe berry and spice lead the nose while the structured palate doles out succulent black cherry, crushed raspberry, fennel and mineral. Fine-grained tannins leave a firm finish.

properties.title: Goldeneye 2013 Confluence Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 9200 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: Strawberry jam and red cherries meet vanilla and nutmeg in this fresh, fruity but also complex wine. It is medium-bodied and just slightly tannic in the texture, which is a good thing. It has a great sense of harmony that lasts through the finish.

properties.title: Albert Bichot 2014 Domaine du Pavillon Clos des Ursulines  (Pommard)
properties.address: 6 Bd Jacques Copeau, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: With some firm structure, this wine also has great fruitiness. It offers plenty of raspberry fruits, good acidity and a solid texture of tannins. The acidity keeps the wine perfumed and fresh. Drink the wine from 2019.

properties.title: Amador Cellars 2013 Cooper & Karmere Vineyards Barbera (Amador County)
properties.address: 11093 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Whiffs of cedar and baking spices lead to ripe blackberry and boysenberry flavors in this well-balanced and easy to appreciate wine. The ample fruit flavors are hard to resist, and the supple, modestly tannic texture is just right.

properties.title: Andis 2012 Cooper Ranch Barbera (Amador County)
properties.address: 11000 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Meaty, smoky aromas and good, high-amplitude fruit flavors give a robust personality to this full-bodied, dry and firmly tannic wine. It will make a good pairing with pasta, roasted birds or grilled meat.

properties.title: Bella Luna 2013 Bailey Ranch Riserva Zinfandel (Adelaida District)
properties.address: 1850 Templeton Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of gingerbread cookies with a black-cherry glaze meet black gravel and a touch of asphalt on the nose of this complex and flavorful bottling. The palate blends the brightness of red cherry and strawberry fruit with a rocky minerality, spiced up by black pepper and settling into a plum-skin groove toward the finish.

properties.title: BKB 2014 Makena Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 5561 Sonoma Mountain Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95404, USA
properties.descrption: The debut release for this producer is a bright garnet shade. Exhuberant and broad, the palate is bursting with cranberry, blue plum and Bing cherry flavors. Drink over the next year or two, while it is at its freshest.

properties.title: Black Stallion 2013 Limited Release Zinfandel (Rockpile)
properties.address: 4089 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This is a full-bodied, ripe, well-made and fruity wine, subdued and velvety on the palate in bright red fruit, leather, mint and cinnamon.

properties.title: Boeckel 2013 Les Terres Rouges Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: 2 Rue de la Montagne, 67140 Mittelbergheim, France
properties.descrption: With a little airing, this wakes up to reveal dark red cherries held in a taut and firm body that nonetheless has a generous core. There is some gentle grip and frank, firm acidity. It's a very honest wine without any baroque frills—but bags of forthright appeal.

properties.title: Boeger 2013 Barbera (El Dorado)
properties.address: 1709 Carson Rd, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: Smoky, earthy, black pepper aromas make this wine catchy at the first sniff, and then the flavors fill the mouth with similarly spicy, earthy suggestions. It is full-bodied, firm-textured and quite concentrated. Pour this with venison or smoked duck or another game dish if possible.

properties.title: Burgo Viejo 2013 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: C. Concordia, 8, 26540 Alfaro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Berry and cinnamon aromas are lightly woody and spicy. This is tannic but not mean or fierce. Flavors of oaky plum and berry fruits turn savory in front of a finish with a dry, snappy, slightly raw feel. Given that 2013 was a cold vintage, this Crianza deserves praise.

properties.title: Caruso & Minini 2014 Perricone (Terre Siciliane)
properties.address: 631 Brawley School Rd # 405, Mooresville, NC 28117, USA
properties.descrption: This opens with alluring aromas of raspberry jam, blue flower, ground pepper and grilled herb. The savory, succulent palate offers juicy black cherry, black raspberry, clove and mineral. Firm tannins provide seamless support while fresh acidity lifts the ripe, mouthwatering fruit.

properties.title: Cottanera 2015 Rosato Nerello Mascalese (Etna)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale, 89 - Contrada Iannazzo, 95030 Castiglione di Sicilia CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Vibrant and elegant, this offers aromas of wild flower and ripe red berry. The juicy palate doles out tart red cherry, fresh strawberry and mineral alongside tangy acidity. A mouthwatering saline note closes the bright finish.

properties.title: Graveyard 2014 Mortal Zin Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 6990 Estrella Rd, San Miguel, CA 93451, USA
properties.descrption: Inviting aromas of baked blueberries are leveled by crushed asphalt and dried herbs on the refined nose of this bottling. Stewed strawberry and red plum flavors are elegantly cut by more crushed stone, dried spearmint and a touch of sweet tobacco, all held together by grippy tannins.

properties.title: Hunnicutt 2013 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3524 Silverado Trail N, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: The grapes for this full-bodied wine hail from the Luvisi Vineyard in the heart of Calistoga old-vine country—a warm and welcome site for the variety. Baked blackberry and black olive combine around a taste of charred meat before brawny spins of brown sugar and nutmeg play on the palate with jolts of chocolate and vanilla.

properties.title: Kuentz-Bas 2014 Tradition Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Route des Vins, 68420 Husseren-les-Châteaux, France
properties.descrption: Gentle spice and redcurrant notes promise a subtle wine. The palate does not disappoint and sings with translucent, light-footed elegance. This is all about charm and ease, about chiffon rather than velvet. Crisp freshness brightens and lightens everything. It's a mere whiff of a wine but a delicious one.

properties.title: Finca Patagonia 2015 Expedicion Merlot (Maule Valley)
properties.address: RN22, Río Negro, Argentina
properties.descrption: Burnt and herbal plum and berry aromas are just good enough. This feels clampy due to hard tannins. Medicinal plum and cherry flavors come with a forced-oak element, while this is dry and tannic on a hollow finish.

properties.title: Mas Chappell 2012 Pinot Noir (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 1070 Clark Rd, Zillah, WA 98953, USA
properties.descrption: Volatile aromas are backed by abundant strawberry and cherry notes. The palate packs a mouthful of bold and puckering dried-cranberry flavors, backed by lightly astringent tannins.

properties.title: Casal da Coelheira 2014 Red (Tejo)
properties.address: N118 1331, 2205-681 Tramagal, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is one of those complex blends that are a specialty of Tejo. The result is bright and fruity with just enough tannins from the Touriga Nacional to give structure to the bold Alicante Bouschet. Drink now.

properties.title: Viña La Fortuna 2013 Twelvestones Malbec (Lontué Valley)
properties.address: Sagrada Familia, Maule, Chile
properties.descrption: Creamy malty aromas of vanilla and baked berry fruits lead to an astringent palate with hard tannins. This Malbec tastes earthy and like baked berry fruits and coffee grounds. A grabby finish with clamping residual tannins makes for a rugged ending.

properties.title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2015 Espirito Lagoalva Red (Tejo)
properties.address: Quinta Lagoalva De Cima, 2090-222 Alpiarça, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a simple soft red-fruited wine, designed for drinking with barbecues. With spicy fruit, attractive acidity and a soft, juicy texture, the wine is ready now.

properties.title: Redwood Empire 2014 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 22000 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Spearmint and pine resin stand out in this simple, light-bodied red that traffics subtly in spice and tannin, not quite finding its balance.

properties.title: White Rock Vineyards 2013 Claret (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1112 Loma Vista Dr, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This is made from a majority of Cabernet Franc, with sizable additions of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Petit Verdot. Mint and bay leaf curry favor on the nose, while a severity of oak hits the palate.

properties.title: Kenos 2013 Tempranillo (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: 20 Grand Corner Ave A, Gaithersburg, MD 20878, USA
properties.descrption: An incongruous mix of plastic, olive, oak and green berry aromas sets up an abrasive palate. This is strange at all checkpoints, with heavily oaked, leathery flavors of herbal berry fruits. A fiery finish that runs heavy on green notes is the close.

properties.title: Lacheteau 2015 Tip Top Pinot Noir (Vin de France)
properties.address: ZI L'étang Vignon,, 37210 Vouvray, France
properties.descrption: This is a simple, fruity wine. Its red cherry fruit is cut with a stalky, crisp texture and layered with acidity. It's made to drink young.

properties.title: Plaisance Ranch 2014 Ranch Red (Applegate Valley)
properties.address: 16955 Water Gap Rd, Williams, OR 97544, USA
properties.descrption: This is half Merlot, with Pinot Noir, Cab Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon divvying up the other half—a completely different Ranch Red than in 2013. It's sweaty and short, with some off flavors in the finish.

properties.title: Granite Springs 1999 Syrah (El Dorado)
properties.address: 772 Appaloosa Rd, Angels Camp, CA 95222, USA
properties.descrption: Country style, with its rough, earthy tannins and brambly berry flavors. Yet it's clean and likeable, with intensely jammy, berry and stone fruit flavors. It also has a nice, round, supple texture. A versatile wine with lots going for it.

properties.title: M. Cosentino 2000 Cigar Zin Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 7415 St Helena Hwy, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Here's a Port-like Zin to sip late at night as the snow falls and the chestnuts are roasting. Plum pudding, raisin, and dark-chocolate flavors, with slight residual sugar and enough acidity to make it bright and balanced.

properties.title: Sandalford 2000 Merlot (Western Australia)
properties.address: 3210 W Swan Rd, Caversham WA 6055, Australia
properties.descrption: Somewhat weedy on the nose; then shows a lot of overripe cherries on the palate, along with baking spices like clove and cinnamon. Soft and pleasantly chewy.

properties.title: Kunde 1999 Shaw Vineyard Century Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 9825 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: What does “briary” mean? Think about a wild black raspberry bush on a hot summer afternoon. The wood, the bark, the dust, the chlorophyll from the baking leaves and the berries, with that wild, primitive, spicy, fructose-sweet bitterness. This wine is bone dry and finishes with a tannic bite. Drink it now with sturdy chow.

properties.title: Stonehedge 2000 Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: 1929 1st St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Pretty nice for a statewide appellation, with true Zin characteristics of wild, brambly berries. The alcohol is high and the wine is very dry, a full-throttle assault on the senses, with its maximum load of jammy fruit. Nothing subtle, just a bases-loaded, ripe wine that leaves little to the imagination. Best Buy.

properties.title: Calina 2000 Reserve - Cabernet Sauvignon/Carmenere Red (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Calle Camino las Rastras Km 7, Talca, Maule, Chile
properties.descrption: A straight shot down blackberry lane. The palate is all about the fruit; it's got lots of texture, and maybe even some tannins to shed. Finishes with gravel, herb and a certain meatiness. The nose—wood and maybe a bit of mocha—is not its strength.

properties.title: Beaucanon 1998 La Crosse Cabernet Franc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1006 Monticello Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: A Loire-like red wine, pleasantly light and fruity, it has black cherry and cola flavors and a real streak of earthiness. Dry, supple tannins provide structure, but it's pretty soft. From Beaucanon.

properties.title: Primus 1999 Red (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: 727 Lincoln Blvd, Venice, CA 90291, USA
properties.descrption: The nose of this Augustin Huneeus-made wine shows soil, wood and a algae-greenness; the palate, blackberry and oak. Medium-bodied; finishes with dry tannins. 60% Carmenère, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Merlot.

properties.title: St. Supéry 1999 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8440 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This medium-bodied Merlot shows as much mineral as it does oak over its sturdy mixed-berry fruit. Spice, green-herb and resin notes add interest to the nose; chalky tannins linger on the finish. 30,000 cases produced.

properties.title: Stonehedge 1999 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: Comes down firmly on Zin's wild and wooly side. The brambly berry and pepper flavors are accompanied by savage tannins, not big and heavy, but jagged and rustic. High alcohol creates a hot aftertaste, and the wine is fermented to dryness. Finishes with a tart bite of acid.

properties.title: Talley 1999 Rosemary's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Arroyo Grande Valley)
properties.address: 3031 Lopez Dr, Arroyo Grande, CA 93420, USA
properties.descrption: Lush and opulent, with South Coast notes of tomato, cola and beet, crushed hard spices and earth and some pretty black-cherry fruit. It drinks very soft, almost disembodied, with scarcely a tannin to be found, and low acidity. It's elegant, but could use some more crispness and structure.

properties.title: Holly's Hill 1999 Syrah (El Dorado)
properties.address: 3680 Leisure Ln, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: Here's an edgy wine, a walk on the wild side. Explosive aromas of blueberries, crushed white pepper, earth and smoke lead to slightly sweet wild-berry flavors, packaged in very silky tannins, although the acids are fine. It's a big wine, making up in chutzpah what it lacks in finesse.

properties.title: Casa Julia 2000 Reserve Merlot (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: 202 N Houston St, Granbury, TX 76048, USA
properties.descrption: Rustic and medium-bodied, this Merlot has a nice spiciness that would be a big hit at a backyard barbecue. There's some char on the nose, and a spicy-marinade note on the palate. Finishes with dryish tannins and outdoorsy, tree-bark flavors.

properties.title: San Simeon 1999 Syrah (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 442 Slo San Simeon Rd, San Simeon, CA 93452, USA
properties.descrption: Dark and rich, with plummy, tomato flavors and quite a bit of tannin. It's very dry, with a real bite of acidity. Doesn't have the stuffing for aging, but it is a big, clean bruiser of a wine, and will drink nicely with rich foods.

properties.title: Collemassari 2014 Rigoleto  (Montecucco)
properties.address: Localita, 58044 Poggi del Sasso GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 70% Sangiovese, 15% Ciliegiolo and 15% Montepulciano, this simple wine opens with subdued aromas of leafy underbrush, nut and dark-skinned fruit. The lean diluted palate offers dried berry set against evolved tannins. Drink soon.

properties.title: Verum 2015 Pinot Noir (Alto Valle del Río Negro)
properties.address: Mitre, Río Negro, Argentina
properties.descrption: Smoky roasted aromas of tomato, saddle leather and earthy red-berry fruits lead to a medium-bodied palate. Dry herbal peppery flavors of cherry and plum finish with heat, juicy acidity and a mild toasty burn.

properties.title: Senda Verde 2015 Mencía (Bierzo)
properties.address: C/ Progreso 24, Oficina 3, 36202 Vigo, Pontevedra, Spain
properties.descrption: Candied berry aromas are a touch syrupy. In the mouth, this is tight, rugged and high in acidity. Dry raw flavors of currant and cranberry feature an herbal accent. Drying abrasive tannins rule a raw, snappy finish.

properties.title: Steiner Family Vineyards 2013 Free Bird 19 Zinfandel (El Dorado)
properties.descrption: Raisin and prune aromas and flavors mark this full-bodied wine as very, very ripe. It has a soft, relaxed texture and earthy notes on the finish.

properties.title: Manyana 2015 Tempranillo (Cariñena)
properties.address: 1540 S River St, Spooner, WI 54801, USA
properties.descrption: Medicinal berry aromas show a touch of nail polish. Tight and high in acidity, this deals limited plum flavors with earthy undertones. A short finish is grapy in flavor but doesn't last long despite acidic push.

properties.title: Poggio Nardone 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: 220 W Main St, Smithtown, NY 11787, USA
properties.descrption: This offers subdued whiffs of blue flower, red berry and a hint of moist soil. On the rustic, rather diluted palate, bracing acidity and raspy, fleeting tannins accompany suggestions of tart sour cherry and orange peel. It finishes on an astringent note.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2015 Collection  (Bourgogne Hautes Côtes de Beaune)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: This small appellation is in the hills behind the Côte Beaune. The wine has the cool character of many of these wines, with red-currant fruitiness. Layers of acidity give the wine a youthful, ready-to-drink fresh character.

properties.title: Mascota 2015 La Mascota Pinot Noir (Mendoza)
properties.address: Mendoza, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: Generic berry and cherry aromas along with a note of asphalt open this Pinot Noir that struggles to define itself as Pinot Noir. Crisp in feel, this tastes of plum and cherry, but with little to no spice or earthy Pinot character. For quaffing purposes, this is good.

properties.title: Midnight 2013 Moonlight Cabernet Franc (El Pomar District)
properties.address: 2925 Anderson Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This wine's nose is a tad hollow, offering poppy seed, roast beef and black-fruit aromas. The palate conveys blueberry, blackberry and chocolate flavors, with a rising acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Domaines Devillard 2014 Le Renard  (Coteaux Bourguignons)
properties.address: 13 Rue du Closeau, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: Gamay from the Beaujolais region is blended with 10% Pinot Noir in this light and fruity wine. It has gentle tannins and forward red-cherry fruits. The wine is soft and ready to drink.

properties.title: François Lurton 2015 Araucano Humo Blanco Edicion Limitada Pinot Noir (Lolol Valley)
properties.address: Km 29 Ruta - l.72, Lolol, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Heavy, generic cherry aromas are a touch volatile. This feels full and bouncy, with juicy acidity. Flavors of black fruits are ripe but lack complexity, while this is hot and raspy on the finish.

properties.title: Sauvion 2015 Loire Valley  (Chinon)
properties.address: Château du Cleray, 44330 Vallet, France
properties.descrption: This soft, spicy wine has red-cherry flavors and light tannins. It is smooth with black currants and acidity. The end brings in a more stalky character with hints of bell peppers.

properties.title: Renato Ratti 2013 Conca  (Barolo)
properties.address: Frazione Annunziata, 7, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Rose, iris, ripe red berry and aromatic herbs are some of the aromas you'll discover in this wine. It's both focused and juicy, delivering succulent Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, mint and licorice alongside a backbone of fined-grained tannins that leave a firm finish. Bright acidity provides balance. Drink 2023–2043.

properties.title: Stift Klosterneuburg 2015 St. Laurent (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Rathauspl. 24, 3400 Klosterneuburg, Austria
properties.descrption: Both tart and ripe red cherries characterize nose and palate. Ample, crunchy freshness gradually tips into juicy ripeness. The palate discloses lovely density, with overtones of licorice that create subtle, delicious resonance. The tannins are superfine and have a sexy little crunch. It's a totally balanced and beautiful red.

properties.title: Vignobles K 2014 Badine de la Patache  (Pomerol)
properties.address: 21220 Chambolle-Musigny, France
properties.descrption: The wine, with its firm tannins and solid structure, is still young. The hints of black-plum fruits are way behind the structure. That's all good, because this wine will come together well, to give a rich full wine with spice, juicy black fruits and acidity. Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Bel Colle 2013 Simposio  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Castagni, 56, 12060 Verduno CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Enticing scents of woodland berry, new leather, blue flower and baking spice meld together in the glass. The focused yet full-bodied palate delivers raspberry, Marasca cherry, clove and a hint of dried herb. Velvety tannins and fresh acidity provide framework and balance. Drink 2021–2033.

properties.title: Betwixt 2015 Helluva vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 540 Barneveld Ave suite k, San Francisco, CA 94124, USA
properties.descrption: Subtle, intricate aromas and equally sophisticated flavors of baking spices, tamarind and cherries make this a fascinating wine to taste. It's full bodied but lithe. Energizing acidity and firm tannins give it great structure and help carry the complex flavors through a lingering finish.

properties.title: Jalits 2014 Steinberg Red (Burgenland)
properties.address: Untere Dorfstraße 16, 7512 Badersdorf, Austria
properties.descrption: A touch of black cherry with the faintest lick of licorice appears on the nose. The palate is equally reticent but incredibly juicy. Black-cherry notes billow and swell on the fluid body. This wine is fresh, firm and toned, brightened by acidity that adds elegance. A cool and profound red, it draws you in with its inherent freshness.

properties.title: Domaine des Remizières 2011 Cuvée Christophe  (Crozes-Hermitage)
properties.address: 1459 avenue du vercors, 26600 MERCUROL, France
properties.descrption: One of the finest Crozes-Hermitage wines I can remember tasting, this wine combines mouthwatering notes of hickory-smoked pork and dark berries. There's plenty of richness on the midpalate and a long, velvety finish, making this truly a complete package. Drink now–2030.

properties.title: Produttori del Barbaresco 2011 Rio Sordo  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Via Torino, 54, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: New leather, wild berry, violet, white pepper and dark spice aromas come together in the glass. The elegantly structured savory palate offers a nice depth of flavors including ripe morello cherry, crushed raspberry, star anise and clove. Tightly wound refined tannins provide the firm polished framework. Drink 2018–2028.

properties.title: Reynvaan Family Vineyards 2014 Estate In the Rocks Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 6309 Cottonwood Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Co-fermented with 5% Viognier, mineral-laden aromas of smoked meat, Kalamata olive, earth, flower and funk are followed by shimmering fruit and savory flavors that possess a compelling mouthfeel and lead to an extended finish. The alcohol and oak are dialed back, allowing the fruit to shine.

properties.title: Shoup 2013 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1604 Frenchtown Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of 68% Cabernet Sauvignon, a whopping 23% Petit Verdot, 7% Merlot and 2% Cabernet Franc. The aromas leap up from the glass, with notes of garden herb, tar, black cherry and licorice. The flavors are rich and saturated, loaded with black-fruit notes that persist effortlessly on the finish. It shows a fine sense of structure and balance along with a compelling texture. Best after 2024.

properties.title: Somerston 2013 Deerhound Estate Grown Cabernet Franc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3450 Sage Canyon Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Softened by 20% Merlot, this wine tastes of chocolate-covered clove and spicy dried herb, the robust layers of flavor cradled in toasted oak. Fresh and brooding, it offers forest pine, black currant and tobacco in a refined package of integrated tannin.

properties.title: Talisman 2014 Huckleberry's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 13651 Arnold Dr, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: From a vineyard that's less than one acre in size, this special bottling is tiny but mighty, juicy in blue and red fruit. Robust in spice, it unleashes a velvety texture with ease, allowing room for focused tannin to be supportive rather than distracting. The finish retains a welcome freshness.

properties.title: Tenor 2014 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 16116 140th Pl NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is überaromatic, with notes of raspberry jam, stemmy herbs, blackberries, smoked meat, orange peel, iron and an earthy funk. The palate brings a lot of intensity of flavor, with smoke and orange-peel notes lingering on the warm finish.

properties.title: Long Meadow Ranch 2015 Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 738 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This new wine from an estate vineyard is the strong, quiet type that's not effusively fruity but instead emphasizes mineral elements and great structure. An attractive chalky, spicy aroma leads to beautifully restrained red cherry and pomegranate flavors that seem to grow and expand with each sip. The texture is firmly tannic but also polished, supported by perfect acidity that keeps everything sharp and focused.

properties.title: Marcarini 2013 Brunate  (Barolo)
properties.address: Piazza Martiri, 2, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of truffle, forest floor, woodland berry, mint and new leather escape the glass. Bright and elegantly structured, the polished palate delivers Marasca cherry, cranberry, cinnamon and star anise framed in youthfully firm, refined tannins. Fresh acidity lends balance. Drink 2023–2038.

properties.title: Marcarini 2013 La Serra  (Barolo)
properties.address: Piazza Martiri, 2, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Rose, iris, red-berry and cake-spice aromas set the tone on this graceful red. It's linear, bright and loaded with finesse, evoking red cherry, crushed strawberry, star anise and pink peppercorn alongside taut, polished tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2013–2033.

properties.title: Amici 2014 Reserve Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3130 Old Lawley Toll Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: Spicy acidity wraps around a lengthy and intense experience of full-bodied concentration and power in this well-made wine. Forest pine, red cherry and vanilla combine effortlessly to provide a robust flavor profile that's memorable and rich.

properties.title: Bodkin 2016 Hotspur Rosé of Syrah (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 313 N F St, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Nutty, meaty and complex, this crisp, high-toned wine offers food-friendly elegance and refreshment while teasing in savory hints of earthiness. Balanced and dry, it continues to impress as it glides along in the glass.

properties.title: Goldeneye 2014 Confluence Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 9200 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: Beautifully made, complex and complete, this full-bodied wine embraces seductive, spicy oak flavors, ripe fruit and a mouthfilling texture. Intricate vanilla, nutmeg and toasted baguette aromas lead to mulled plum, rhubarb and red-cherry flavors that coat the palate and linger on the finish.

properties.title: Heinrich Hartl 2013 Graf Weingartl Pinot Noir (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Trumauer Str. 24, 2522 Oberwaltersdorf, Austria
properties.descrption: An earthy, oakleaf note signals a true expression of Pinot Noir. There is something sleek, fluid and authentic about this. The wine accents cherry and forest berry as much as the autumnal notions of spice, fallen leaves and earth. It's elegant and honest, with a firm yet relenting structure and lasting flavors.

properties.title: Centovigne 2011 Castellengo Nebbiolo (Coste della Sesia)
properties.address: Frazione Castellengo, 29, 13836 Cossato BI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Nebbiolo from Alto Piemonte, this boasts alluring aromas of ripe black-skinned berries, dark cooking spices, cut roses, new leather and tilled earth. The taut, elegant palate is loaded with flavor and finesse, delivering mature black cherries, cranberries, licorice and tobacco framed in youthfully assertive but polished tannins. Fresh acidity provides balance. Drink 2019–2031.

properties.title: Château Léognan 2014  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: 98 Av. de Mont de Marsan, 33850 Léognan, France
properties.descrption: Under the attention of the Miecaze family, this ancient estate has burst out of a dormant period and into new life with vineyards, a winery, a restaurant and a B&B. This latest vintage is powerfully dense and with great swathes of tannins and perfumed fruit. The wine is stylish, while also being ripe and full in the mouth. It has fine potential and will be ready from 2020.

properties.title: Curto Marco 2013 Arborina  (Barolo)
properties.address: 12064 Annunziata, Province of Cuneo, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of fragrant purple flower, dark-skinned berry, new leather and a whiff of crushed botanical herb float out of the glass. The savory, full-bodied palate doles out layers of juicy Marasca cherry, raspberry compote, cinnamon and anise while polished, fine-grained tannins lend finesse and structure. Orange peel and an earthy hint of game lend depth. Drink 2019–2025.

properties.title: Feiler-Artinger 2015 Umriss Blaufränkisch (Burgenland)
properties.address: Hauptstraße 3, 7071 Rust, Austria
properties.descrption: Brooding, darkly aromatic fruit plays on the nose. The wild blueberry almost has a floral touch of peony. The palate still contains juicy fruit in a taut, firm structure, while tannins are fine but still crunchy. A bright streak of freshness brightens and guides everything, creating juicness and verve, and giving definition to that lovely, ripe fruit. This wine might take a little time to come out of its shell but is worth waiting for. Drink 2019–2025.

properties.title: FEL 2014 Savoy Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 1473 Yountville Cross Rd, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.descrption: Hints of sweet oak meld beautifully with full-fledged fruit aromas and flavors of dark plum and black cherry in this full-bodied wine. It unfolds from a mildly spicy nose to a rich, warm palate sensation and lingering finish. One of several single-vineyard expressions, the Savoy Vineyard is now the FEL estate vineyard.

properties.title: Figgins 2014 Estate Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2900 Melrose St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot and Merlot all coming from a single vineyard site. It's wound up tightly at present, with aromas of herb, dark fruit, spice and earth. The palate is big and bold, with rich fruit flavors and a firm lick of tannins. Best from 2024–2030.

properties.title: Abadia Retuerta 2012 Estate Grown Selección Especial Red (Sardon de Duero)
properties.address: N-122, km 332, 5, 47340 Sardón de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Few wines offer as much as this for under $30, but this extracted, bullish Tempranillo blend is not for everyone. Blackberry, cola and savory herbal aromas are strong and pure. This feels wide and cushioned, yet is still a driller. Blackberry, cassis and chocolate flavors finish rich and ripe. Drink through 2024.

properties.title: Hogue 2013 Genesis Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2800 Lee Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of huckleberry, herbs and spice are fresh and focused. The fruit flavors are concentrated, with a supple feel and soft tannins. It displays a good sense of balance.

properties.title: Judeka 2014 Nero d'Avola (Vittoria)
properties.address: C.da San Mauro Sotto SP 39/II, Km 3.8, 95041 Caltagirone CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Alluring scents of pressed violet, perfumed berry and a whiff of cake spice lead the nose. The bright, chewy palate doles out layers of ripe black cherry, blackberry, raspberry, chopped mint and a sprinkling of cocoa. Soft, round tannins support the juicy flavors. There's not much complexity but it is mouthwateringly delicious. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Soos Creek 2012 Terrible Beauty Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 24012 172nd Ave SE, Kent, WA 98042, USA
properties.descrption: Though labeled as a red wine, this could just as easily be labeled as Cabernet at 91%, and it drinks like one. Spice, herb, coffee and black-cherry aromas are followed by plump fruit flavors that show purity and depth, trailing ever so slightly toward the finish.

properties.title: Statti 2010 Batasarro Red (Calabria)
properties.address: Contrada Lenti, 88046 Lamezia Terme CZ, Italy
properties.descrption: This polished red offers enticing aromas of mature plum, fragrant blue flower, leather and tobacco. The chewy palate is full of juicy wild cherry, black raspberry, cinnamon and licorice alongside soft, silky tannins. There's not much complexity but it's delicious and accessible so enjoy soon.

properties.title: Stolpman 2013 Estate Grown Syrah (Ballard Canyon)
properties.address: 2434 Alamo Pintado Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: Boisterous fruit shows on the nose of this wine from the heart of the newish appellation, presented in a specially made Ballard Canyon bottle. Olallieberry jam gains nuance from pulverized purple flowers. The palate begins with straightforward purple fruits then evolves into potpourri, incense and dried berries.

properties.title: Swick 2014 Terre Brûlée Grenache (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 28005 NE Bell Rd, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: This inaugural release displays dialed-back aromas of pencil eraser and dried herbs that need a bit more lift. The palate puts a premium on purity of expression along with a tart lick of acid and cinnamon notes on the finish. If the aromas and flavors sync up further, this young wine moves up a notch.

properties.title: Wilridge 2013 Estate Wilridge Vineyard Zweigelt (Naches Heights)
properties.address: 250 Ehler Rd, Yakima, WA 98908, USA
properties.descrption: This variety is extremely rare in Washington. Fruit-forward aromas of cranberry, cocoa powder and herbs are followed by tart, appealing flavors that linger.

properties.title: Wilridge 2013 Upland Vineyard Barbera (Snipes Mountain)
properties.address: 250 Ehler Rd, Yakima, WA 98908, USA
properties.descrption: Bottlings of this variety and also this appellation are scarce in the state. This one has reserved aromas of red and blue fruit along with whiffs of spice. The plump, tangy flavors show a pleasing purity, trailing a bit toward the finish. Try it with pasta with a red sauce.

properties.title: Château Phélan-Ségur 2013  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: Rue des Écoles, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: This wine brings out the tannic side of Saint-Estèphe. However, the 2013 is less wood-laden than some previous vintages from this estate, allowing more room for the fresh fruits and ripe tannins. The wine therefore has good potential, drink from 2020.

properties.title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2013 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14111 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Notes of olive, herbs, flowers, orange peel, gravel, meat, coffee and light barrel spices leap up on a wine that shows a lot of aromatic complexity. The fruit and savory flavors are plush and full in feel followed by a lingering finish. There's a whole lot of wine delivered for this price.

properties.title: Château Trottevieille 2013 Dame de Trottevieille  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Trotte-Vieille, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: The second wine of Saint-Émilion premier cru classé Trottevieille is full of fruit while also having plenty of structure. It shows signs of becoming a delicious, fresh wine with attractive tannins and red-berry fruits. Developing well, it will be ready to drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Vieux Robin 2013  Médoc
properties.address: 3 Rte des Anguilleys, 33340 Bégadan, France
properties.descrption: This wine is firm, solid and dense with ripe black fruits. It is structured, with a dry core that needs to round out. However, the main thrust of the wine is towards rich fruitiness and enough tannins, wood flavors and acidity to allow it to age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: City Winery of New York 2012 Bacigalupi Vineyard Reserve Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 25 11th Ave, at Hudson River Park, New York, NY 10011, USA
properties.descrption: The soft delicacy to this wine is compelling, inviting and surprising, given the power of the vintage and the relative warmth of the vineyard site in the appellation's Middle Reach. Floral with rose, it's deceptively fruity, hiding its depth of black cherry and citrus to the end.

properties.title: Columbia Winery 2013 Limited Release Cabernet Franc (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 14030 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Herb and flower aromas mix with notes of coffee and dark fruit. The licorice and black-fruit flavors show intensity, with a lick of tannins in the background.

properties.title: Domaine de Saint-Guirons 2011  Pauillac
properties.address: 6750 NE Breyman Orchards Rd, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: This small estate is wedged between some of the classed growths of Pauillac. Firm and structured, the wine is solid with tannins and backed with concentrated blackberry fruits. The 60% Cabernet in the blend gives great acidity as well as the tannins. These two elements will allow the wine to age, so drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Tour Haut-Caussan 2012  Médoc
properties.address: 27 Bis Rue de Verdun, 33340 Blaignan-Prignac, France
properties.descrption: A blend of half-and-half Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, this is a solid wine. The tannins are still quite dominant although they are ripe and will integrate well into the red and black berry fruits. Acidity at the end keeps the wine fresh and fruity. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Codorníu 2011 Gran Codorniu Pinot Noir (Cava)
properties.address: Avda. Jaume Codorniu, s/n, 08770, Barcelona, Spain
properties.descrption: Citrus peel and stone-fruit aromas blend with dusty, yeasty notes and a touch of spiced cherry on the nose of this juicy, fresh Spanish sparkler. Cherry, raspberry and red-plum flavors hint at elegance before finishing dry, long and lightly peppery in flavor.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2012 Grand Estates Gold Limited Release Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Cabernet Franc (52%) along with Syrah (38%), Cabernet Sauvignon (8%) and 2% Merlot saw just a smidgeon (10%) of new oak. Notes of dried herbs, raspberries and dark chocolate partner with lithe fruit flavors backed by grainy tannins.

properties.title: Dusted Valley 2012 Stained Tooth Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 980 Merlot Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The fruit for this wine comes from the Red Heaven and StoneTree vineyards, with 10% Mourvèdre and 10% Petit Sirah. It seems a bit locked up at present, with notes of plum, blueberry and flowers. It's full bodied and rich, with the alcohol dominating the fruit flavors and causing some distraction.

properties.title: Fattoria dei Barbi 2010 Vigna del Fiore  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Loc. Podernovi, 170, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Oak, underbrush, tobacco and stewed plum aromas lead the nose. The palate offers roasted coffee bean, vanilla, espresso and licorice alongside astringent but not very persistent tannins.

properties.title: Genoa 2012 Danger Buoy Sangiovese (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE c1100, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This unusual Walla Walla Valley-designated Sangiovese offers notes of vanilla, coffee and cranberry. It brings a rich, textured mouthfeel full of sweet cherry and plum flavors backed by a light grip of tannins. It doesn't seem varietally correct but it's undeniably delicious.

properties.title: Golden Ridge 2010 Estate Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: US-12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: With 62% Cabernet Sauvignon and 38% Merlot, this wine offers reserved notes of vanilla, cherry, herbs and dill. The fruit flavors are elegantly styled, dry, focused and sweet with fine-grained tannins.

properties.title: Grattamacco 2013 Rosso  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: Loc. Lungagnano, 128, 57022 Castagneto Carducci LI, Italy
properties.descrption: This blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Cabernet Franc, 10% Sangiovese and 10% Merlot opens with aromas of blackberry, cedar and cooking spice. On the palate, notes of bell pepper, espresso, toast and black pepper accent a firm black cherry core. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Atwater 2012 Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5055 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.descrption: Intense aromas of vanilla, smoked nuts and black cherry preserves seduce on the nose of this ripe, richly textured Pinot Noir. It's bold in fruit and oak tones, but penetrating tannins add gravitas to the finish.

properties.title: Bernard Magrez 2012 Château Pérenne  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 33230 Saint-Christophe-de-Double, France
properties.descrption: Ripe and luscious, this reflects the fruitiness of the vintage very well. It has tannins that will develop, although the blackberry fruits and juicy acidity dominate at the moment. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Brian Carter Cellars 2010 Tuttorosso Red (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 17311 135th Ave NE STE A450, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of 67% Sangiovese, 23% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Syrah, this wine offers an intriguing assortment of raspberry jam, black licorice, vanilla and spice box. It's elegant, with a supple feel to the tangy fruit flavors backed by a firm squeeze of tannins.

properties.title: Brian Carter Cellars 2011 Corrida Red (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 17311 135th Ave NE STE A450, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Tempranillo (61%), Merlot (13%), Graciano (11%), Garnacha (8%) and Cabernet Sauvignon recalls burnt coffee, red fruit, tobacco, vanilla and exotic spices. It's supple in feel with lightly chalky tannins.

properties.title: Burnt Bridge 2012 Blend X Les Collines Vineyard Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1500 Broadway St, Vancouver, WA 98663, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 30% Merlot with the balance Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, this wine offers aromas of coffee, cherry and herbs. It's full bodied with sweet cranberry flavors backed by gritty tannins.

properties.title: Château Belle-Vue 2012  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 2 Chem. des Caperanis, 33360 Quinsac, France
properties.descrption: Belle-Vue changed its usual blend for 2012 to emphasize the ripe Cabernet Sauvignon. That gives a fresh black currant-flavored wine that is layered with ripe tannins and acidity. Fruity, it will develop quickly, so drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Charmail 2012  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: Château Charmail, 33180 Saint-Seurin-de-Cadourne, France
properties.descrption: Vines close to the Gironde are the source of this structured wine. It has rich berry fruits and a good balance between the fruit acidity and the wood. At the moment, it is dry and firm. Give it until 2018 and it will be a powerful wine.

properties.title: Koenig Vineyards 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon-Syrah
properties.address: 21452 Hoskins Rd, Caldwell, ID 83607, USA
properties.descrption: This blend offers notes of nori, olive, cherry and tire rubber. The full-bodied flavors are sweet and palate-coating, with abundant savory notes and lightly grainy tannins.

properties.title: La Torre 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: 6025 W Las Positas Blvd, Pleasanton, CA 94588, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas suggest bright berry, underbrush, eucalyptus and a whiff of wet fur. The palate starts off strong, with bright red berry and grilled herb but then it falls off, leaving a somewhat hollow midpalate. Despite the lean character, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity make this very drinkable.

properties.title: Two Vintners 2012 Some Days Are Diamonds Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 18570 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This 100% Syrah conveys espresso, raw meat, flowers, chocolate and peppery spices. It's reserved in style with tart acids.

properties.title: Villa Poggio Salvi 2010 Pomona  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale 103 di, località poggio salvi, 53024 Castiglion del Bosco SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of stewed plum, game and leather lead the nose. Tightly wound, the concentrated palate offers toast, espresso, fleshy black cherry marinated in spirits and licorice. Aggressive, raspy tannins generate an abrupt finish.

properties.title: Macari 2010 Dos Aguas Red (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 150 Bergen Ave, Mattituck, NY 11952, USA
properties.descrption: Rich, lusciously concentrated black plum and cherry flavors are accented with spice and smoke in this bold, Merlot-heavy blend. Framed with fine, chalky tannins, it's supple and silky in mouthfeel with a moderately long finish.

properties.title: Northwest Cellars 2010 Coyote Canyon Vineyard Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 11909 124th Ave NE, Kirkland, WA 98034, USA
properties.descrption: This 100% varietal wine offers lightly volatile notes of vanilla, coconut, pepper and dried cherries. The fruit flavors show good concentration along with a beguiling feel and a finish that lingers. Although the wood takes center stage, it plays its part well.

properties.title: Autoritas 2013 Gran Reserva Shiraz (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: 5100 US Hwy 98 N, Lakeland, FL 33809, USA
properties.descrption: Jammy boysenberry aromas are a touch oaky. Loud acidity gives zest and ring to cherry, plum and raspberry flavors. While this is a bit shear and hard on the palate, solid berry flavors along with cocoa and brown sugar make for a good ending.

properties.title: Beresan 2012 Merlot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4169 Peppers Bridge Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Blended with 15% Syrah, this is a distinctive wine with aromas of herbs, coffee and vanilla. The palate seems wound up, not quite ready to reveal its charms.

properties.title: Bersano 2013 Costalunga  (Barbera d'Asti)
properties.address: Piazza Dante, 21, 14049 Nizza Monferrato AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Bright and easy drinking, this opens with aromas of red berry, tobacco, menthol and spice. The vibrant palate offers wild cherry, crushed raspberry, clove and star anise alongside racy acidity and soft, supple tannins. Drink soon.

properties.title: Bishop's Peak 2013 Pinot Noir (San Luis Obispo County)
properties.address: Bishop Peak, San Luis Obispo, CA 93405, USA
properties.descrption: Light in aromas, this reasonably priced wine by the Talley family eventually shows subtle earth and game on the nose. The palate packs much more textural action, with bitter cranberry skins and orange rinds as well as black slate flavors, with a bright acidity that lingers long.

properties.title: Bunnell 2009 Clifton Hill Vineyard Syrah (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE C-800, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The oak shows itself first on this wine with aromas of vanilla and coconut in front of sappy fruit. The flavors are full bodied, equal parts fruit and barrel, with vanilla taking the lead on the finish. There are good things but the oak dominates.

properties.title: Château Magnan-Figeac 2012  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: 3 Cormeil, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: From one of three estates owned by the Moreaud family in one contiguous 61-acre property, this smooth and ripe wine is all about rich black fruits. Supported by just the right amount of tannin and acidity, it is already delicious and fruity. Drink now, but better to wait until the end of 2016.

properties.title: Silvano Bolmida 2011 Bussia  (Barolo)
properties.address: Località Bussia 27/A, 12065 Monforte D'alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Baked cherry, toasted oak and cooking spice aromas lead the nose. On the palate, licorice, oak-driven spice and roasted coffee beans back up a core of dried red cherry alongside tightly packed tannins.

properties.title: Stefania Mezzetti 2012 Principe Syrah (Cortona)
properties.address: loc. Vernazzano Basso, 06069 Vernazzano PG, Italy
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of tilled soil, bell pepper, ripe plum and a whiff of barnyard waft out of the glass. The palate is a bit rustic, displaying fig, ground black pepper, graphite and a gamey note alongside velvety tannins. Drink soon.

properties.title: Tenute dei Vallarino 2012 La Ladra  (Barbera d'Asti Superiore)
properties.descrption: Aromas of blackberry, toast, chopped mint and a whiff of dried rose lead the nose. The juicy palate doles out fleshy wild cherry, ripe blackberry, clove and anise alongside fresh acidity and round tannins. You'll also notice the warmth of alcohol on the close.

properties.title: Michele Chiarlo 2013 Le Orme  (Barbera d'Asti Superiore)
properties.address: Strada Nizza-Canelli, 99, 14042 Calamandrana AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Violet, dark-skinned berry and sweet baking spice aromas take center stage on this vibrant, easy-drinking red. The supple, savory palate doles out black cherry, raspberry, orange peel, cinnamon and star anise framed in zesty acidity.

properties.title: Monterebro 2013 Barrica Red (Jumilla)
properties.address: C. Bo. Iglesias, 55, 30520 Jumilla, Murcia, Spain
properties.descrption: Toasty oak and vanilla aromas are draped heavily over blueberry and blackberry notes. Staunch, rubbery tannins and bold acidity make for a high-toned flavor profile of herbs, black fruit and briny salt. A long, oaky, herbal finish is silky and lusty.

properties.title: Poderi Luigi Einaudi 2013  Dogliani
properties.address: Borgata Gombe, 31/32, 12063 Dogliani CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This medium-bodied, easygoing red offers aromas of blue flowers, dark berry, underbrush and a whiff of cake spice. The palate delivers blackberry, red currant, ground pepper and a note of star anise alongside firm, refined tannins. An almond note backs up the finish.

properties.title: Pomum 2012 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 18512 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This wine starts out quite reductive, while also showing aromas of black olive, herbs and chocolate. It's full bodied in feel with abundant dark fruit flavors that show persistence. There are good things here but the aromas and flavors seem disconnected.

properties.title: Boyle MacDonald 2013 Petite Sirah (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 448B Main St, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.descrption: Big, tannic and true to type, this wine has flavors like blackberry and black pepper, and a mouthfeel that is dry and somewhat astringent. It will be very good with a hamburger or pork tenderloin.

properties.title: Castel Boglione 2011  Barolo
properties.address: Viale Pietro, Viale Laudano, 2, 14040 Castel Boglione AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Subdued aromas suggesting underbrush, scorched earth, leather and dried herb lead the nose. On the medium-bodied rather straightforward palate, hints of baking spice add interest to a core of tart cherry. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: Casa Santos Lima 2015 Reserva do Monte Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: Quinta da Boavista, 2580-081, Portugal
properties.descrption: Bright and fruity, this is a ripe, red-fruit-flavored wine. The youthful tannins will soften quickly to give a rounded wine, rich but with crisp acidity at the end. Drink now.

properties.title: Caves Transmontanas 2011 Vertice Grande Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: R. de São Domingos 22, 5070 Alijó, Portugal
properties.descrption: Ripe red fruits and strong minerality give this wine both its crispness and structure. It has style and elegance, as well as plenty of fruit. Drink this attractive wine from 2017.

properties.title: Château de Bordes-Quancard 2014  Bordeaux
properties.address: 87 Av. Gustave Eiffel, 33440 Saint-Vincent-de-Paul, France
properties.descrption: This is a crisp juicy wine showing the bright red fruits of the vintage. It still has its tannins intact along with plenty of black-currant acidity and a dry aftertaste that will soften over the next few months. Drink from late 2017.

properties.title: Château du Roc 2012  Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: La grange, 11700 Montbrun-des-Corbières, France
properties.descrption: This is a full-bodied wine with generous black-fruit flavors. It has enough acidity to sustain the rich black-currant and blackberry fruits. With its soft tannins and fruity aftertaste, it is ready to drink.

properties.title: Château Haut Beyzac 2014 Classic  (Haut-Médoc)
properties.address: château Beyzac, 33180 Vertheuil, France
properties.descrption: A ripe and fruity wine that has black fruits and intense youthful acidity. It is structured as well, the tannins from the 25% Cabernet Sauvignon in the blend are showing firmly. Black currants and blackberries balance with the firm dry core. It will develop and will be ready from 2018.

properties.title: Château Montaiguillon 2014  Montagne-Saint-Émilion
properties.descrption: With 20% of Cabernet Franc in the blend, this is a finely perfumed wine. It has a firm texture along with juicy black fruit and some lively acidity. The 70-acre vineyard faces Saint-Émilion across a small valley. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Firesteed 2014 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8380 NE Worden Hill Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: Firesteed's value-oriented Pinot is a solid and reliable wine that varies little from vintage to vintage. Flavors of rhubarb and strawberry are set in place with a touch of vanilla wafer. Don't cellar this. It's ready to go.

properties.title: Denario 2010 Reserva Malbec (Río Negro Valley)
properties.descrption: With little luster in the glass, this mild mossy-smelling Patagonian Malbec is saturated and pinching on the palate, with clamping tannins. Chunky incongruous berry flavors end full but rough, with a note of burnt brown sugar on the finish.

properties.title: Doña Paula 2014 Estate Malbec (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: High-elevation aromas of blueberry, herbs and bramble are accented by cumin and spiced-plum notes. This displays ample size and grip, while flavors of roasted plum and savory spices are earthy. On the finish, this is oaky and minty tasting.

properties.title: Fenestra 2012 Silvaspoons Vineyard Malbec (Lodi)
properties.address: 83 Vallecitos Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Tobacco and cedar aromas add complexity to this medium-bodied wine that relies more on savory, herbal and spicy notes than fruit flavors.

properties.title: Fosso Corno 2014 Mayro  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: Loc. Villa Bizzarri, 64010 Torano Nuovo TE, Italy
properties.descrption: Underbrush and dark-skinned fruit aromas lift out of the glass along with a hint of nut. The soft fruity palate offers black cherry, spice and a hint coffee. Round tannins and bright acidity provide the easy-drinking framework.

properties.title: Quinta do Pôpa 2011 Pôpa Vinhas Velhas Red (Douro)
properties.address: N222, 5120-011, Portugal
properties.descrption: With strong new-wood character, this wine has vanilla and toast flavors. The concentrated red-berry fruits are suppressed, giving a wine that needs time to develop. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: The Archivist 2014 Pinot Noir (Monterey County)
properties.descrption: Black cherry, dark pomegranate and sagebrush show on the nose of this decently priced bottling for midweek sipping. Ripe cranberry dominates the palate along with allspice, nutmeg and oak components, set against an intriguing texture.

properties.title: White Rose 2014 The Neo-Classical Objective Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6250 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: A thin, sharp attack pushes subdued flavors of stem, cherry and chocolate into a quick, tight finish. In some ways, this wine recalls the Eyrie releases of decades ago, and may prove to age well, as many of those wines did. For now, it's a hard stemmy wine with a bit of burn.

properties.title: ZinPhomaniac 2014 Old Vines Reserve Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.descrption: There's 3% each of Grenache and Petite Sirah in this wine that is quite ripe and straightforward in its fruity waves of blackberry, cherry and oaky chocolate. Firm tannins don't overwhelm, opting instead to support and structure. Black pepper leaves a lasting impression on the finish.

properties.title: McManis 2015 Merlot (California)
properties.address: 18700 E River Rd, Ripon, CA 95366, USA
properties.descrption: Thoroughly oaky and spicy, this full-bodied wine smells toasty and smoky. Flavors suggest nutmeg, cinnamon and smoked meat, followed by tangy and fresh black cherry.

properties.title: Château Fongaban 2011  Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: Domaines Taïx, 33570 Puisseguin, France
properties.descrption: Very juicy and ripe, this is a fruity, blackberry flavored wine. The ripe feeling is cut through by acidity and solidified by tannins, making it a rich wine that will be ready to drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château Tour Haut-Caussan 2011  Médoc
properties.address: 27 Bis Rue de Verdun, 33340 Blaignan-Prignac, France
properties.descrption: This is a smooth, attractively ripe and aromatic wine. It has soft black fruits, and full tannins. Developing quickly, it already shows attractive fruitiness Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Cinnabar 2011 Mercury Rising Red (California)
properties.descrption: Based on Cabernet Sauvignon, this wine is a blend of all five classic Bordeaux varieties. It's dry and tannic and rather austere, with herb-infused black currant, tea and oak flavors. Drink it soon.

properties.title: Dão Sul 2011 Cabriz Colheita Seleccionada Red (Dão)
properties.address: Quinta Das Sarzedas, Currelos Aptd. 28, Carregal Do Sal, Viseu, 3430-211 Carregal do Sal, Portugal
properties.descrption: A familiar brand on Portuguese wine shelves, this is a ripe wine, soft and smooth. Light tannins are finely integrated with the red berry fruits and juicy acidity. It's an easy wine that has good structure. Drink now.

properties.title: Duck Pond 2012 Fries Family Cellars Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 23145 OR-99W, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: Primary fruit flavors of cranberry are at the core here, with medium concentration and acidity. Flavors of leaf and stem come into play and turn the finish slightly bitter. Give this until 2015.

properties.title: Flora Springs 2011 Trilogy Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 677 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: There's an oddly sweet-ashy aroma and taste to this Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend. It comes from the oak, which overpowers the underlying blackberry, cherry and currant fruit flavors.

properties.title: Gnarly Head 2011 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 12001 CA-99, Manteca, CA 95336, USA
properties.descrption: This jammy, crowd-pleasing Zin is well put-together, soft in blackberry spice and has just a trace of wintergreen on the nose. Widely distributed and value-priced, it's a steal worth stocking up on.

properties.title: Adega Cooperativa do Cartaxo 2011 Bridão Clássico Red (Tejo)
properties.address: Adega do Cartaxo - EN. 365-2, 2070-220 Cartaxo, Portugal
properties.descrption: Great bursts of red fruits come strongly through the tannins of this powerful and structured wine. It's fruity and ripe, although an herbal element suggests a more green aspect. Tannins need to finish softening, so wait until 2015.

properties.title: Herdade das Servas 2012 Monte das Servas Escolha Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Estrada Nacional n.º 4 Km 136.4, 7100-600 São Bento do Ameixial, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a warm, ripe and spicy wine. It is full of red fruits, black currant and soft tannins, with great acidity at the end. Drink now.

properties.title: Longevity 2010 Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 2271 S Vasco Rd b, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: This Livermore Valley producer travels to Lodi to make this Zin, a smattering of 4% Petite Sirah blended in. Intense in cherry-watermelon candy aromas, its flavors develop into tart cherry, blueberry and spice. With soft tannins this wine is straightforward, with the finish all about dusty cigars.

properties.title: Moniker 2012 Pinot Noir (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.descrption: A new luxury tier from Mendocino Wine Company, the folks who also produce the Parducci wines, Moniker Pinot is softly aromatic, leathery in dark berry fruit and dry, made in a big, rich style. Fruit is sourced from Anderson Valley, and also from inland Potter and Redwood valleys.

properties.title: Pech Merle 2011 Merlot (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 21001 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: This shows the fleshiness of Merlot. But it's also enormously tannic, with a mouth-numbing astringency, and the finish is severely dry. With black cherry and herb flavors, it wants an hour or two in the decanter, but it's not an ager.

properties.title: ZinPhomaniac 2012 Old Vines Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.descrption: Beneath the come-hither packaging and name, this Zin offers velvety tannins and smoky fruit and spice, finishing with a powerful hit of alcohol and leathery cedar.

properties.title: Château les Ormes Sorbet 2011  Médoc
properties.address: 20 Rue du Trois Juillet 1895, 33340 Couquèques, France
properties.descrption: On the distinctly fruity side, this is a ripe, full-bodied and generous wine. It may not have the tannin density for long aging, but it offers ripe black fruits and a fresh cut of acidity. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Vrai Caillou 2012  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: Aux, Cailloux, 33790 Soussac, France
properties.descrption: The wine is full of ripe berries, red and black fruit flavors. Soft tannins are a subtext to the main fruitiness. Although the tannins are still dry, they will soften to give a fresh wine that will age quickly. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Tenimenti Famiglia Cavallero 2009 Bussia  (Barolo)
properties.address: Regione Mezzena, 19, 14030 Scurzolengo AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of leather, underbrush, ripe red berry and eucalyptus lead the nose on this structured wine. The delicious palate delivers juicy black cherry, crushed raspberry, baking spice and savory herb alongside big, chewy tannins. It ends on a succulent note. Drink 2016–2024.

properties.title: D'Arenberg 2010 Shipster's Rapture Single Vineyard Shiraz (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: Osborn Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: D'Arenberg wines are typically quite structured, so this wine's full body and creamy texture come as a bit of a surprise. Earthy, loamy notes run alongside espresso, black olive and blueberry before finishing long and silky. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Markowitsch 2012 Reserve Pinot Noir (Carnuntum)
properties.address: Pfarrgasse 6, 2464 Göttlesbrunn, Austria
properties.descrption: Sumptuous red cherry, wrapped in velvety structure, presents a ripe and rounded Pinot Noir with earthy, autumnal edges. It offers lovely balance and constant glimpses of red fruit, oaky spice and soft yet crunchy midpalate mouthfeel. This will benefit from holding 2016–2017 in bottle.

properties.title: Silver 2010 Trentotto File Syrah (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 8264 US-290, Johnson City, TX 78636, USA
properties.descrption: Benjamin Silver quietly makes great stuff out of a small warehouse on Santa Barbara's Eastside, including this Syrah that's boosted by pinches of Mourvèdre, Grenache and Viognier. Beautiful aromas of roasted pork in a blackberry-licorice reduction sauce pick up a bit of grape candy before hitting the palate with black pepper, blueberries and solid tannins. It's fun but serious.

properties.title: Gebeshuber 2012 Grosse Reserve Red (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Jubiläumsstraße 43, 2352 Gumpoldskirchen, Austria
properties.descrption: White pepper mixed with clove and cinnamon frames the cherry fruit on this elegant, almost understated red. That delicious white pepper edge highlights and spices every impression of this nuanced, moreish red.

properties.title: Stolpman 2012 Angeli Syrah (Ballard Canyon)
properties.address: 2434 Alamo Pintado Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: There's a mysteriously attractive aromatic profile to this winery's top-end Syrah bottling, with violet perfume blending into blueberry syrup, anise and spearmint. The flavors are bold but not over the top, with lavender, dried berry leather and espresso combining into a seriously memorable wine.

properties.title: Travaglini 2009 Il Sogno  (Gattinara)
properties.address: Via delle Vigne, 36, 13045 Gattinara VC, Italy
properties.descrption: Made from dried Nebbiolo grapes, this structured wine weaves together plum, raisin, leather, earth, carob, balsamic and mineral notes. Combining power and finesse, it's well balanced but still young, with a firmly tannic backbone. Drink after 2017.

properties.title: Vasse Felix 2011 Heytesbury Red (Margaret River)
properties.address: 4357 Caves Rd, Wilyabrup WA 6280, Australia
properties.descrption: This is slightly plusher and more powerful than the similarly excellent 2010 Heytesbury, yet still retains an undeniable sense of finesse. Dried herbs and flowers mark the nose, while the flavors include black cherry, cassis and vanilla. On the finish, lingering fruit persists beyond the soft, mildly drying tannins. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Weninger 2012 Kirchholz Alte Reben Blaufränkisch (Mittelburgenland)
properties.address: Florianigasse 11, 7312 Horitschon, Austria
properties.descrption: Tightly closed, still young, this has wonderful promise for the future. It offers a fine tannin structure around which iron-oxide-tinged blueberry and cherry play, along with earthiness and savory spice. This needs time to loosen its tightly coiled flavors. Drink as of 2016.

properties.title: Northstar 2010 Merlot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1736 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is still in its shell, with notes of dark raspberries, cocoa and barrel spices. It's lusciously rich, dense and layered with firm tannins that need time in the cellar to soften. Just a baby now, it will be best from 2017 on.

properties.title: Travaglini 2007 Riserva  (Gattinara)
properties.descrption: From one of the hottest vintages in recent years, this wine delivers layers of succulent wild cherry, crushed raspberry and cinnamon. It's balanced with firm but refined tannins and surprising freshness for the vintage. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Anton Bauer 2012 Reserve Red (Wagram)
properties.address: Neufang 42, 3483, Austria
properties.descrption: Broodingly black cherry with aromatic sprays of pepper accompany notions of dark flower petals with a tarry edge. On the palate a meatiness adds a further layer of flavor. There is alcoholic strength and lots of concentration but this is a young wine which still has to come into its own. Enjoy its ripe elegance as of 2016.

properties.title: Betz Family 2012 La Côte Rousse Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: This aromatically appealing wine brings aromas of blue fruit, barbecue briquettes, herbs, mineral and assorted spices. The fruit flavors are lithe yet intense, with a squeeze of tannins that lead to a supremely long finish.

properties.title: Peter Mertes 2015 Platinum Sweet Red Dornfelder (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Bornwiese 4, 54470 Bernkastel-Kues, Germany
properties.descrption: Vanilla and spice aromas lend confectionery notes to this soft, slightly syrupy red wine. Sweet and fleshy on the palate, it's light in alcohol and acidity. The finish is marked by fine but rigid tannins.

properties.title: Rigal 2012 Château Beauvillain-Monpezat Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
properties.descrption: This is a smooth, soft wine that is full of black fruits and ripe tannins. The Merlot rounds out the rougher edges of the Malbec to give a rich juicy wine that will develop quickly. It is all fruit, generous and ready to drink from 2017.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2015 Monte da Baía Red (Península de Setúbal)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.descrption: Made by Leonor Freitas in the family winery, this is a rich blend of Castelão, Touriga Nacional and Syrah. With its firm tannins balanced by juicy red fruit, it's a wine to savor from early 2018.

properties.title: Château Coutinel 2015 Il est des nôôôtres! Gamay
properties.address: 82370 Labastide-Saint-Pierre, France
properties.descrption: This softly fruity wine has the lightest of tannins and plenty of simple red-berry fruits. There is an earthy edge to the young wine as well as plenty of acidity at the end. Drink now.

properties.title: Domaine Bousquet 2015 Reserve Made With Organic Grapes Pinot Noir (Tupungato)
properties.address: Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: Earthy leafy aromas suggest compost. This feels lean in the middle but also creamy. Spicy oaky flavors of clay and dried red fruits are light and inoffensive.

properties.title: Quinta do Arrobe 2014 Oculto Red (Tejo)
properties.address: 2000 Casével, Portugal
properties.descrption: This wine comes from the northern reaches of Tejo, giving it a structured, cool and bright, fruity character. Juicy acidity cuts through its tannins and black plum flavor. Needing a few more months of bottle age, it will be ready to drink in 2018.

properties.title: Quinta dos Murças 2015 Assobio Red (Douro)
properties.address: Covelinhas, 5050-012 Quinta dos Murças, Portugal
properties.descrption: The Douro venture of Alentejo-based Herdade do Esporão, this wine is structured with tannin while also having generous red berry fruit. Acidity, mineral texture and a bright aftertaste give it both weight and crispness. Drink now.

properties.title: Three Thieves 2014 Red (California)
properties.descrption: Very fruity, lightly sweet and full bodied, this easygoing blend of Zinfandel, Merlot and other varieties smells like maple syrup, tastes jammy and has enough sweetness to balance its tannic texture.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2015 Companhia das Lezírias Herdade de Catapereiro Single Vineyard Red (Tejo)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.descrption: This state-owned estate of forests and vineyards grows organic grapes. This wine, softly structured and ripe has light black fruits and plenty of acidity. An undercurrent of tannin keeps the wine in order and will allow it to age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Opta 2014 Red (Dão)
properties.address: 11 NW Lava Rd, Bend, OR 97703, USA
properties.descrption: This is an open and fruity wine, made to be drunk young. With its wood-derived spice notes, black currant fruitiness and acidity, it's balanced, elegant and ready to drink now.

properties.title: Orsi Family Vineyards 2013 Barbera (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 2306 Magnolia Dr, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This dull, rustic wine offers earth and anise flavors around a core of soft cherry fruit. Light bodied, its acidity is moderate and unobtrusive.

properties.title: Caparra & Siciliani 2012 Volvito Rosso  (Cirò Classico)
properties.address: PR-2, Guaynabo, 00966, Puerto Rico
properties.descrption: Funky aromas of barnyard, burnt tire rubber and game lead the nose and follow through to the bitter palate along with overripe plums and a note of almond skin. Dusty, almost gritty tannins give it an abrasive but fleeting close.

properties.title: Amayna 2012 Pinot Noir (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: G - Chile 818, San Antonio, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Heavy, raisiny aromas of cherry and chocolate are ominous. This feels thick, out of shape and awkward, with zero elegance. Weedy, raisiny, syrupy berry flavors finish fat, with a palpable note of cooked fruit.

properties.title: Tres Palacios 2013 Reserve Merlot (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Magnere 1543, Providencia, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Green, soupy aromas of tomato are blatant and harsh. This is decent in terms of mouthfeel, but it reverts to herbaceous, leafy flavors of bell pepper and grass that finish with nothing but pyrazines.

properties.title: Viña Requingua 2014 Los Riscos Malbec (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: Av. El Cerro 056, Providencia, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Aromas of mushroom, dirty water and mud puddle are far from inviting. Herbal, briny flavors of mushroom, salt and bitterness come with almost no fruit.

properties.title: Mascarello Giuseppe e Figlio 2010 Villero  (Barolo)
properties.address: Località Borgonuovo, 108, 12060 Monchiero CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Enticing aromas of iris, rose, perfumed red berry and cake spice emerge on this stunning wine. The elegantly structured, silky palate delivers juicy wild cherry, crushed raspberry, mint, white pepper and tobacco alongside firm but ultrafine tannins. It's already tempting but hold to let it unwind and develop more complexity. Drink 2018–2035.

properties.title: Ponzi 2013 Madrona Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 19500 SW Mountain Home Rd, Sherwood, OR 97140, USA
properties.descrption: Search carefully and you'll note delicate scents of tamarind, cola, ginger, coriander, cocoa and pepper. The palate opens with a generous, exotic potpourri of baking spices, amaro, honey, dark chocolate and caramel. There is the slightest hint of barnyard, but everything plays together beautifully. Drink now through 2025.

properties.title: Sottimano 2010 Riserva  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Località Cottà, 21, 12052, 12052 Neive CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This dazzling red is still in its infancy but promises to bloom into a stunning beauty.
