It opens with delicate aromas of red rose, perfumed berry, forest floor, exotic spice, aromatic herb and a light balsamic note. Energy abounds on the full-bodied, elegant palate, which delivers bright red cherry, strawberry, white pepper and licorice alongside a backbone of vibrant acidity and firm, refined tannins. Drink 2020–2040.

properties.title: Elvio Cogno 2010 Bricco Pernice  (Barolo)
properties.address: Località Ravera, 2, 12060 Novello CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Radiant and structured, this is initially closed but slowly opens to reveal engaging aromas of woodland berry, violet, star anise, dark cooking spice and a balsamic note. The vibrant, full-bodied palate boasts great energy while offering layers of wild cherry, raspberry, white pepper and licorice. Bright acidity and firm, polished tannins provide balance. Give it time to fully develop. Drink between 2020 and 2035.

properties.title: Bruno Giacosa 2011 Falletto  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via XX Settembre, 52, 12052 Borgonovo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: One of the most balanced and impressive Barolos from the hot 2011 vintage, this opens with alluring aromas of mature black cherry, tobacco and spice. The smooth, full-bodied palate abounds with ripe raspberry, juicy strawberry, chopped herb, clove and cinnamon alongside firm but polished tannins that give the wine a silky mouthfeel. Drink 2018–2031.

properties.title: Guido Porro 2011 Vigna S. Caterina  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Alba, 1, 12050 Serralunga D'alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This gorgeous wine offers classic Nebbiolo aromas of pressed rose, mature berry, crushed mint and baking spice. The structured, savory palate offers juicy wild cherry, raspberry, star anise, tobacco and clove alongside firm, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2018–2028.

properties.title: Ponzi 2013 Aurora Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 19500 SW Mountain Home Rd, Sherwood, OR 97140, USA
properties.descrption: This wine shows exceptional detail—scents of rose petals and milk chocolate, subtle suggestions of dried wood, incense and smoke, and a vein of maple syrup. The foundation is the beautifully ripened cherry fruit, set in 50% new French oak.

properties.title: Brovia 2011 Brea Vigna Ca' Mia  (Barolo)
properties.descrption: Enticing aromas of wild berry, pressed rose, cake spice and chewing tobacco come together on this gorgeous wine. The firmly structured palate delivers juicy black cherry, crushed raspberry, cinnamon, licorice and clove. It's well balanced, with ripe, velvety tannins that will make it approachable earlier than other vintages but still age-worthy. Drink 2019–2036.

properties.title: Castello di Verduno 2011 Massara  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Umberto I', 9, 12060 Verduno CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Violet, rose, perfumed berry and a whiff of sweet cake spice are some of the enticing scents you'll find on this impressive wine. On the delicious palate, notes of clove, cinnamon, mocha, licorice and raspberry weave seamlessly throughout the juicy black cherry core. It's elegantly structured, with fresh acidity and firm, ripe tannins. Drink 2020–2036.

properties.title: Cavallotto 2009 Vignolo Riserva  (Barolo)
properties.address: via Alba-Monforte 104, Bricco Boschis, 12060 Castiglione Falletto CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Perfumed with woodland berry, dried rose, cake spice and sweet pipe tobacco, this is one of the most impressive of the '09 Riservas. The delicious, full-bodied palate offers layers of juicy black cherry, clove, cinnamon, licorice and mineral. Firm, ripe tannins give it structure and a polished feel. Drink 2019–2029.

properties.title: Bruno Giacosa 2011 Albesani Vigna Santo Stefano  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Via XX Settembre, 52, 12052 Borgonovo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Rose petal, perfumed berry, new leather, pressed powder and underbrush are just some of the enticing scents you'll find on this stunning wine. The structured palate is loaded with finesse, offering crushed cherry, black raspberry and licorice accompanied by polished tannins. This is the firm's last vintage of Santo Stefano, and they nailed it. Drink 2017–2026.

properties.title: Tenute Silvio Nardi 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Localita' Casale Del Bosco, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas recall stewed dark fruit, coffee, clove and toasted oak. The palate delivers plum, woodland berry, mocha, vanilla and a confectionary note alongside bracing tannins. It's still tight and tannic so give it time to unwind. Drink 2017–2022.

properties.title: Chakana 2013 Ayni Malbec (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Calle Baldini 16197, M5509 Lujan de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Heavy oak and spice aromas are the primary greeting on this muscular, thick, well-made Malbec. Following the lead set by the bouquet, this tastes of spicy oak, chocolate and creamy blackberry. Clove, nutmeg and chocolate flavors drive the finish.

properties.title: Musico 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: 36140 Ave 9, Madera, CA 93636, USA
properties.descrption: Light toast, forest floor and espresso aromas partner with notes of leather and tilled earth. The palate is still closed but reveals dried cherry, raspberry, ground pepper and savory herb alongside a tannic backbone. It's young but balanced, with bright acidity and austere tannins.

properties.title: PianCornello 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: 125 Localita' Pod. Piancornello, Castelnuovo Dell'abate, Si 53024, 53024 Castelnuovo dell'Abate SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Oak-driven aromas convey toast, wood shop, vanilla and a whiff of underbrush. The rich palate delivers cherries marinated in spirits, toasted oak, espresso, pipe tobacco, vanilla and a confectionary note alongside bracing wood tannins. A licorice note marks the finish.

properties.title: Roblar 2013 Gold Collection Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 3010 Roblar Ave, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.descrption: This dark and savory nose blends dried cranberry, orange peels, woody mushrooms and rose-petal potpourri. Flavors are strongly sanguine at first, starting with iron before morphing into dark chocolate. The finish comes on quite bitter and tart, without much overt ripeness.

properties.title: Anaba 2012 Soberanes Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 62 Bonneau Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: The Sonoma winery heads south to source fruit from this vineyard jointly owned by the Pisoni and Franscioni families. The nose offers cherry pastry, black olive, sandalwood and graphite, and the palate presents flavors of pomegranate seeds and cranberry-orange juice across finely grained tannins.

properties.title: Bellangelo 2012 Red (Seneca Lake)
properties.address: 150 Poplar Point Rd, Dundee, NY 14837, USA
properties.descrption: Initially dusty mineral tones blow off to reveal an aromatic bouquet full of fresh lilacs and cassis. Tart blackberry and cherry flavors on the palate are bristling and spry, accented by touch of sage and delicate tannins on the finish.

properties.title: Borra 2012 Old Vine Barbera Barbera (Lodi)
properties.descrption: Fresh raspberry and cranberry flavors match the bright acidity and firm tannins in this lively, medium-bodied, dry red. With this vibrant texture it will pair with the richest osso buco, risotto or juicy steak.

properties.title: San Lorenzo 2010 Bramante  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: podere San Lorenzo, 280, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with aromas of plum, menthol, licorice and a whiff of cellar floor. The palate offers dark berry fruit, clove, dried sage and white pepper alongside assertive, drying tannins and the warmth of evident alcohol.

properties.title: Silver 2010 Nebbiolo (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 8264 US-290, Johnson City, TX 78636, USA
properties.descrption: Benjamin Silver offers a very traditional tar and roses nose on this solid wine, with extra aromas of leather, iron, pipe smoke, iodine and beef jerky. The palate shows white pepper, roasted fennel and tight pomegranate fruit, with some gaminess and tobacco leaf, as well as grippy tannins that will continue to soften with time.

properties.title: Tenuta Argentiera 2012 Poggio ai Ginepri  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: via Vecchia Aurelia 412A località i Pianali, 57022 Donoratico LI, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a savory blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah and Merlot offering aromas of blackberry, underbrush and baking spice. The smooth, soft palate delivers juicy black cherry, licorice and ground pepper alongside round tannins. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Tenuta di Vaira 2011 Bolgherese  (Bolgheri Superiore)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale Bolgherese, 275, 57022 Bolgheri LI, Italy
properties.descrption: An equal blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, this features aromas of leafy underbrush, spiced plum and a hint of soy sauce. The dense palate offers coffee, dried plum, black cherry, licorice and a confectionary note alongside supple tannins.

properties.title: Thurston Wolfe 2012 The Spaniard Premium Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 588 Cabernet Ct, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Grenache (63%), Tempranillo (25%) and Syrah offers barrel notes of fresh brewed coffee, woodspice and vanilla bean along with red and blue fruit. It's silky-soft with a creamy feel backed by grainy tannins.

properties.title: Verum 2013 Pinot Noir (Alto Valle del Río Negro)
properties.address: Mitre, Río Negro, Argentina
properties.descrption: Light, leafy, earthy aromas of plum and tomato accurately announce a lively, fresh palate with spicy, peppery flavors of earth, red plum and cranberry. Juicy acidity, dry but ripe red fruit and earthy complexity make for a strong finish.

properties.title: Château Lamothe-Bergeron 2012  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 49 Chem. des Graves, 33460 Cussac-Fort-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: Classic Bordeaux in structure, this firm wine has dry tannins that still dominate the black and red berry fruits. However, the fruit that's now in the background will come strongly forward to give a fresh character and plenty of final black currant.

properties.title: Château le Pape 2012  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: 25 Chem. le Thil, 33850 Léognan, France
properties.descrption: Firmly smoky, strong wood-aged texture gives a solid structure. However, the wine has some juicy acidity that allows a fresher side to show through. At the end, though, the firm tannins dominate. Give this wine time and drink from 2020.

properties.title: Château Les Trois Manoirs 2012  Médoc
properties.address: 2 Rte de Vendays, 33340 Gaillan-en-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: If the wood had been used more judiciously, this would already have been a rich wine. As it is, the burnt-toast wood character needs time to blow off and integrate. The fruit itself is full in the mouth and juicy. Cabernet Sauvignon dominates and adds the fruit structure. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Cheval Quancard 2012 1844  (Médoc)
properties.address: La Mouline, 4 Rue du Carbouney, 33560 Carbon-Blanc, France
properties.descrption: With a dominance of Cabernet Sauvignon in the blend, this structured and firm wine has a dry, dusty character lightened by black currant fruitiness. The aftertaste, with its good mix of fruit and acidity shows a wine that's likely to be ready to drink from 2016.

properties.title: Corvus 2011 Petit Verdot (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 760 C St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: From the winery's estate vineyard, this 100% varietal is lightly aromatic with cocoa, bittersweet chocolate, flowers and dark cherry. It's medium bodied with rich cherry flavors and firm, slightly dry tannins.

properties.title: Melrose 2009 Parker's Pinot Noir (Umpqua Valley)
properties.descrption: Dark fruits—notably black cherries and figs—come with a chocolaty edge. The citrusy acids keep the wine on point as it slowly fades.

properties.title: Merrill Cellars 2009 Reserve Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 220 E California St, Jacksonville, OR 97530, USA
properties.descrption: This is rich, round, toasty and chocolaty, and it is instantly accessible and mouth filling. The forward fruit and barrel flavors coat the tongue with notes of cherries and chocolate. Drink soon, while the flavors remain fresh and balanced.

properties.title: Principi di Spadafora 2009 Don Pietro Red (Sicilia)
properties.address: V2WJ+44 Fraccia, Camporeale, 90046 Monreale PA, Italy
properties.descrption: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Nero d'Avola and Merlot opens with bright intensity, especially in terms of the quality of its fruit aromas. The palate is smooth and silky, with a long, fruit-driven finish.

properties.title: Principi di Spadafora 2010 Syrah (Sicilia)
properties.address: V2WJ+44 Fraccia, Camporeale, 90046 Monreale PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Winemaker Francesco Spadafora shows his deft hand with Syrah in this easygoing wine. It has intensity and complexity, with layers of spice, red cherry, leather and black pepper.

properties.title: Raptor Ridge 2010 Trig Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 18700 SW Hillsboro Hwy, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: This is quite unusual, loaded with notes of green herb, leaf, fiddlehead fern, pepper and lemon verbena. It's herbal and not at all disagreeable, though fruit-lovers may want to look elsewhere. Just 50 cases of this wine were made.

properties.title: Redhawk 2010 Pataccoli Family Vineyard Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 2995 Michigan City Ln NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.descrption: Somewhat volatile aromas suggest stems and a bit of nail polish before the herbal fruit surfaces. This chewy, tannic wine does not live up to its single vineyard promise.

properties.title: Redhawk 2010 Vintner's Reserve Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 2995 Michigan City Ln NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.descrption: Light, but elegant and pretty, this wine spent 17 months in 40% new oak. Fruit flavors emphasize tart berry, with a dash of earthy sandalwood.

properties.title: Tarara 2010 Nevaeh Red (Virginia)
properties.address: 13648 Tarara Ln, Leesburg, VA 20176, USA
properties.descrption: The oak influence currently sits high on this blend of 50% Merlot, 35% Syrah and 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, offering notes of char, molten caramel, tea and smoky wood. It feels extracted, with easy acids and big, mouth-clasping tannins. Cedar and dried herb accents add interest to the finish.

properties.title: Tenimenti Zabù 2010 Il Passo Nerello Mascalese (Sicilia)
properties.descrption: A pure expression of Nerello Mascalese—the main indigenous grape of the Mt. Etna area—this is a ripe and juicy rendition, compared to the variety's normally austere personality. It has notes of blackberry, spice and dark tobacco.

properties.title: Tenuta Rapitalà 2010 Nuhar Red (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Rapitalà, 90043, 90043 Camporeale PA, Italy
properties.descrption: An innovative mix of Nero d'Avola and Pinot Nero, this shows balance and harmony on the palate. In terms of aroma, the Nero d'Avola overpowers the Pinot Nero, however. It's a bright, fruit-driven wine with freshness on the finish.

properties.title: Vignerons de Bel Air 2011 Domaine de la Calèche  (Fleurie)
properties.address: 1086 Rue Bruce, Dunham, QC J0E 1M0, Canada
properties.descrption: This is generous, full of red berry and plum fruits and lined with acidity. It has a firm structure that gives shape to its exuberant fruitiness. Ready to drink now, but it can be aged for another 2–3 years.

properties.title: Château de Gaudou 2010 Tradition Red (Cahors)
properties.address: Gaudou, 46700 Vire-sur-Lot, France
properties.descrption: This blend of Merlot, Malbec and Tannat is soft and rich. With its ripe plum fruit, rich texture and soft, dusty tannins, this feels full on the palate. The finish shows crisp acidity.

properties.title: Château de Reynaud 2010  Côtes de Bourg
properties.address: 1 lieu-dit, Reynaud, 33710 Bourg, France
properties.descrption: A finely structured wine, this has a rich, juicy black-currant flavor and a solid, tannic core. It has weight and a dark, firm presence, and a smooth herbal character that highlights the wood aging. This should age for five years or more.

properties.title: Château de Sours 2010  Bordeaux
properties.address: 5 Au Vigneau, 33750 Saint-Quentin-de-Baron, France
properties.descrption: Full and rich, this has flavors of spice, juicy black currant and mulberry, with a fine tannin backdrop and a dry core. The wood aging has smoothed the fruity finish.

properties.title: Chehalem 2010 Three Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 31190 NE Veritas Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: This smoky, dusty wine seems to be chugging quickly along the aging curve. At the moment, it's drinking nicely, decked out with pretty baking spice and mocha highlights. It's smooth and mouth filling, with lots of pretty cherry flavor.

properties.title: Domaine des Nugues 2011  Beaujolais-Villages
properties.address: Domaine des Nugues, Les Pasquiers, 40 rue de la Serve, 69220 Lancié, France
properties.descrption: A wine with some depth, this is layered with fine tannins. The acidity and red cherry flavor are held up by its firm structure. It's also fruity enough to be consumed now.

properties.title: Erath 2010 Leland Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 1439 NW Marshall St, Portland, OR 97209, USA
properties.descrption: Even in a less-than-ripe vintage such as this, the Leland stands out in the Erath lineup. Tight and herbal, this has an array of Pinot-specific fruits that are of medium concentration. Its balanced use of barrel aging brings a chocolate flavor to the finish.

properties.title: Feudi di San Marzano 2009 Sessantanni Old Vines  (Primitivo di Manduria)
properties.address: Via Mons. A. Bello, 9, 74020 San Marzano di San Giuseppe TA, Italy
properties.descrption: This Primitivo bears a dark, inky color, with bold aromas of blackberry jam and exotic spice. Oak-driven flavors of tobacco, cinnamon, toasted nut and carpenter's shop are almost too much. However, the wine does end on a sweet, fruity note.

properties.title: Calatrasi 2006 La Piazza Primitivo (Puglia)
properties.address: Contrada Piano Piraino, San Cipirello, PA 90040, 90040 San Cipirello PA, Italy
properties.descrption: La Piazza is made by Sicily's Calatrasi and offers an easy-drinking red wine that would wash down well with pizza or pasta. The wine is thin, but it has bright fruit flavors and a spicy close.

properties.title: Canoe Ridge 2005 Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 45 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: A little floral/grapey scent comes up from the glass, then the wine descends into darker, grippier, more tannic levels with boysenberries and smoke. There's lots of acid—maybe too much—and it gives a sense of something missing as the wine heads into the finish. Green, earthy, chewy tannins leave a slightly harsh impression.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2006 Grand Estates Shiraz (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.descrption: From the use of the term Shiraz (rather than Syrah) to the sweet, vanilla-and-tobacco-laden flavors, this seems to be aimed squarely at the consumer who loves a forward, round and rather soft Australian-style wine. It delivers ripe berry flavors, silky tannins and plenty of up-front pleasure for the price.

properties.title: De Loach 2006 Maboroshi Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1791 Olivet Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: The vineyard could qualify for a Sonoma Coast appellation, being in a very cool location. The vintage also was a chilly one. The resulting wine is not opulent. It has a peppery, minty dryness and acid-edged tannins, with only suggestions of cherry fruit. Clean and proper, but feels like an off-vintage Pinot.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2005 Monte Alentejano Reserva Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.descrption: There is an attractive mint character to this wine, that follows through to a juicy fruit character with a ripe blackberry jam flavor. The acidity keeps the whole wine soft, sweet and fresh.

properties.title: Capo Soprano 2006 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Capo Soprano Nero d'Avola delivers black olive and fresh capers backed by jammy fruit and hickory spice. The wine has a sweet, raw feel and would pair well with easy red meat recipes or fried pork chops.

properties.title: Feudo Principi di Butera 2006 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Feudo Principi di Butera, Contrada Deliella, 93011 Butera CL, Italy
properties.descrption: This well-priced Nero d'Avola takes an informal approach thanks to its pretty notes of black fruit and mature raspberry. By your second sniff, however, you'll pick up spicy tones of BBQ sauce, smoked meat and steak sauce. The wine's tannins are soft and supple.

properties.title: Vitae 2006 Negroamaro (Puglia)
properties.descrption: Here's an easy Negroamaro with fresh fruit tones of cherry, blueberry, bramble and almond. The wine is simple but genuine and would make a great companion to pasta and pizza: it embraces a clean, no-fuss approach overall.

properties.title: La Posta 2006 Angel Paulucci Vineyard Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: Cloudy and a little stewy at first, which gives it a richer, plumper outward personality. With loads of earth and leather, fruit takes an early back seat before rising up in the form of black plum and berry. Finishes plump, with adequate structure. Gets better the more you get to know it.

properties.title: Tenuta Rapitalà 2007 Campo Reale Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Rapitalà, 90043, 90043 Camporeale PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Fruit-forward and generous, this expression of Nero d'Avola from western Sicily delivers chocolate, spice, espresso, blackberry, raspberry, barbecue spice and hickory. The wine is fresh and intense with a well-paced, spice-driven finish.

properties.title: Terrazas de Los Andes 2006 Reserva Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Cochabamba y Thames, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Jammy aromas of raspberry and cherry show a slightly pickled, brambly edge, while the palate delivers tight, grabby cherry and berry flavors. There's a bit of cheesy tang to the finish, while sheering acidity and an overall light body make it food friendly.

properties.title: Quinta da Cortezia 2005 Vinha Conchas Red (Estremadura)
properties.address: R. do Casal 6, 2580 Aldeia Gavinha, Portugal
properties.descrption: With its fresh fruits, this wine emphasizes its cool origins. The spice is discreet, but the soft tannins go well with the light black currant fruits. It is a wine driven by its acidity and fruit. Give it an hour to open out before drinking, it deserves it.

properties.title: Susana Balbo 2007 Crios Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Cochabamba 7801, M5509, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Dark and quite oaky for a brand that earned its stripes via balanced wines that overdelivered. This vintage seems much more extracted and rough, with big, burly aromas and then tannins that grab the cheeks. Along the rough and tumble ride there's spice, pepper, blackberry and coffee. This wine pumps it out but is less polished than in the past.

properties.title: Symington Family Estates 2006 Altano Red (Douro)
properties.address: R. do Barão de Forrester 86, 4400-034 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: A light, fresh wine, showing berries, a touch of wood and very soft tannins. The finish shows a more meaty, rustic aftertaste, but also good acidity.

properties.title: Howling Wolves 2004 Shiraz (Margaret River)
properties.descrption: An earthy, savory style, with just enough crisp blackberry and sour plum fruit to give it a sense of modernity. It's fairly full-bodied, finishing with a squirt of lemon juice and some dusty tannins.

properties.title: Talbott 2011 Sleepy Hollow Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: This is not a successful Sleepy Hollow Vineyard bottling. The cold vintage took its toll, resulting in a wine whose cherry and tart cranberry flavors are cut through with a streak of green veggies. Drink up.

properties.title: Lost Angel 2009 Mischief Red (California)
properties.descrption: There's residual sugar in this wine, to judge by the sweet cherry cola flavors with a hit of alcohol.

properties.title: Mount Pleasant Winery 2009 Bethlehem Valley Norton (Missouri)
properties.descrption: This smells like warm chocolate ganache spread over layers of vanilla buttercream and black plums. It feels loose on the palate, offering soft acidity and only a slight tug of tannin toward the chocolaty finish.

properties.title: Bodega de Edgar 2010 Garnacha (Central Coast)
properties.address: 3550 Combine St, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This simple Grenache has cherry pie and sandalwood flavors, cut through with a vegetal unripeness suggesting boiled asparagus. It's soft in texture and high in alcohol.

properties.title: San Simeon 2009 Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 442 Slo San Simeon Rd, San Simeon, CA 93452, USA
properties.descrption: Old-fashioned Petite Sirah, dark, heavy and hot in alcohol. It tastes overripe, with extracted flavors of raisins and prunes, leading to a bitter finish.

properties.title: Les Bourgeois 2010 Collector's Series Chambourcin (Missouri)
properties.descrption: This Chambourcin has medium-intense aromas of chocolate-covered cherries, dill and caramel popcorn. The medium-bodied palate feels limp due to soft tannins and languid acids.

properties.title: Midnight 2009 Estate Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Fruit-forward and simple, with the sugared taste of black cherry jam. Very high alcohol shows up in the form of jalapeño pepper heat.

properties.title: Pinot Patch 2012 Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 1947 Frene Creek Rd, Hermann, MO 65041, USA
properties.descrption: A simple Pinot Noir, dry and light-bodied, with thinned-down cherry, cola and raspberry jam flavors.

properties.title: Rio Perdido 2011 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Cam. al Hotel Rio Perdido Lodge, Provincia de Guanacaste, Bagaces, Costa Rica
properties.descrption: There's a strong dose of sawdust and faux vanilla on the nose of this flabby Malbec. Woody, minty flavors crowd out the fruit content, while the finish is resiny in feel, and consistent with the palate.

properties.title: Stanburn 2011 Chambourcin (Virginia)
properties.address: 158 Conner Dr, Stuart, VA 24171, USA
properties.descrption: A shy aroma of Meyer lemon zest sits on top of a broad note of dark cherry. The medium-bodied palate tastes washed out, and it finishes with elevated acidity that veers tart.

properties.title: Bodegas Valdemar 2012 Conde de Valdemar Rosado (Rioja)
properties.address: Calle Camino Viejo Logroño, 24, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Simple red-berry aromas are about as good as this gets. In the mouth, it's wet but dilute. Flavors of pithy citrus and grass finish with grapefruit and bitter flavors. This is basic at best and empty at worst.

properties.title: Talbott 2011 Kali Hart Pinot Noir (Monterey)
properties.address: East Side of Lincoln St., between 5th &, 6th Ave, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA 93921, USA
properties.descrption: A simple Pinot Noir, with candied raspberry and cherry flavors. There's a green, unripe streak that detracts.

properties.title: Origin 2011 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 9700 S Dixie Hwy #840, Miami, FL 33156, USA
properties.descrption: Briny berry aromas turn dull and flat with airing. This is hollow and weak on the palate, with sour berry flavors and an acidic finish akin to tart fruit juice.

properties.title: San Antonio 2009 Heritage Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 737 Lamar St, Los Angeles, CA 90031, USA
properties.descrption: Soft, bitter and overripe, with raisin, mocha and Port flavors. It's a Rhône-style blend.

properties.title: Cruz Alta 2011 Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Cruz Alta, Cordoba, Argentina
properties.descrption: This smells far better than it feels or tastes. The nose offers black fruit and graham cracker notes, but the palate is sharp and punchy, with sour plum and rhubarb flavors that finish herbal and briny.

properties.title: State of Art 2011 Red (Monterey County)
properties.address: 1745 Wildcat Creek Rd, Manhattan, KS 66503, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Syrah and Grenache is hard and tough, with stringy, dry tannins and flavors of vegetables and cherry cough syrup. Lots of new French oak does little to make it more palatable.

properties.title: Lapis Luna 2012 Merlot (North Coast)
properties.address: 19341 Bear Valley Rd, Apple Valley, CA 92308, USA
properties.descrption: An inexpensive Merlot packed in sweet vanilla and smoky oak that has 5% 2008 Dolcetto, 3% 2010 Syrah and 3% 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon.

properties.title: Lapis Luna 2012 Romanza Moon Shoup Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 19341 Bear Valley Rd, Apple Valley, CA 92308, USA
properties.descrption: While juicy and ripe with red fruit, this Zin lays a little flat on the palate. A handful of Sangiovese is blended in.

properties.title: Oenophile Wines 2011 Oe-lixir Red Mélange Red (California)
properties.descrption: This blend is comprised of Merlot (70%) and dabbles of Mourvèdre, Petit Verdot and Shiraz, sourced mainly from the Clements Hills region of Lodi. The wine is marked by a strong streak of green bell pepper and herbal scents, and is a tad dull on the palate.

properties.title: MacRostie 2011 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 4605 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: The cold vintage seems to have affected this wine. It lacks its usual richness and instead, is acidic and lean, even vegetal.

properties.title: Castle Rock 2012 Reserve Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 75 Malaga Cove Plaza #7, Palos Verdes Estates, CA 90274, USA
properties.descrption: This Pinot is marked with candied raspberry and cherry flavors, along with oaky vanilla and toast notes. It finishes rather soft.

properties.title: Orfila 2011 Full Fathom Five Red
properties.descrption: A tannic blend of Montepulciano, Sangiovese, Merlot, Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon, this is closed in the nose and dense in texture.

properties.title: Kirnbauer 2011 Blaufränkisch (Mittelburgenland)
properties.address: Rotweinweg 1, 7301 Deutschkreutz, Austria
properties.descrption: Very primary, with tart blackberry fruit and a slim, refreshing body, suggesting that this young wine could also work well chilled when its lively, uncomplicated nature will show best.

properties.title: Zantho 2012 Zweigelt (Burgenland)
properties.address: Dammweg 1a, 7163 Andau, Austria
properties.descrption: Expansive cherry fruit make for a broad palate. A generous body falls in line with fresh acidity and ripeness to result in an easy-drinking party wine.

properties.title: Round Hill 2011 Merlot (California)
properties.address: 35246 Harry Byrd Hwy #190, Round Hill, VA 20141, USA
properties.descrption: This is a simple Merlot, but it's dry in style with tart sour-cherry flavors.

properties.title: Fenestra 2009 Conjugation Red (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 83 Vallecitos Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Fenestra's blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Malbec, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot is aromatically interesting with hints of Dr. Pepper and spice. The palate devolves with strong herbal aromas and light fruit flavors before finishing slightly high in alcohol.

properties.title: Garces Silva 2012 Boya Pinot Noir (Leyda Valley)
properties.address: G - Chile 818, San Antonio, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Odd aromas of pomegranate and grapefruit are off the grid. This is citric and austere in feel, with sour, herbal flavors mixed with oak. A minty, herbal, green finish raises questions.

properties.title: Ascension Cellars 2010 Dalliance G-S-M (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: A dull Rhône-style blend, this is soft and hot with alcohol. You'll find some green vegetable and mushroom notes that mar the ripe flavors of red cherry jam.

properties.title: Claudia Springs 2010 Rhodes Vineyards Grenache (Redwood Valley)
properties.address: California 95466, USA
properties.descrption: Marked by aromas of raspberry liqueur, this is a sweet, listless Grenache. Sourced from a good site in Mendocino.

properties.title: La Rochelle 2009 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: The winery held this back for four years before releasing it. While it's dry and silky on the palate, it has raisiny flavors, and a touch of volatile acidity.

properties.title: Segal's 2013 Fusion Red (Galilee)
properties.address: 5757 Greenville Ave, Dallas, TX 75206, USA
properties.descrption: A bouquet of blueberry, pomegranate and juniper berry braces the palate for flavors of blueberry, raspberry, anise, juniper berry and eucalyptus that sit in a plexus of comforting tannins. Fruity and cool flavors battle it out for dominance, with fruit remaining victorious on the bright and juicy finish.

properties.title: St Hallett 2013 Black Clay Shiraz (Barossa)
properties.descrption: An excellent value, this is a fairly full-bodied, slightly creamy-textured Shiraz that should provide ample pleasure through 2020. Smoky, plummy fruit finishes warm and plush.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Azul Portugal Reserva Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.descrption: All the warm southern heat of the Alentejo is in this wine. It is rich, generous and full of ripe, black fruits. Berries and juicy damsons are spiced with pepper, rich tannins and lifted by acidity. It is a wine for big meat dishes, for stews, a powerful, no-holds-barred style. It will be ready to drink from 2017.

properties.title: A.A. Badenhorst Family Wines 2012 Secateurs Red Blend Red (Swartland)
properties.address: Jakkalsfontein Road, Malmesbury, 7300, South Africa
properties.descrption: The Secateurs selections are always attractive wines, and this vintage red doesn't disappoint. Accents of minty cassis, licorice, black tea and leather frame the black berry and cherry core, while lingering suggestions of purple flowers, black tea and sweet spice unfold on the finish. The plush texture and structured yet approachable tannins make this a wine that can be enjoyed now–2018.

properties.title: Darcie Kent Vineyards 2012 Pinot Noir (Monterey)
properties.address: 7000 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: A delicate but earthy nose shows aromas of hibiscus, pencil lead, sagebrush and bay leaf. The palate packs a bright vibrancy, showing flavors of tart cranberry, crushed black pepper, clove, more sagebrush and juniper. This is action-packed but lightly framed.

properties.title: Sadie Family 2012 Pofadder Cinsault (Swartland)
properties.address: Babylons Toren Road, Paardeberg, Malmesbury, 7300, South Africa
properties.descrption: Another entry from Sadie's Old Vine Series, this Cinsault leads with wild, earthy aromas of game and savory herbs like sage, bay leaf and rooibos tea that are layered atop the red currant and tart cherry fruit tones. There's a touch of sharpness to the palate, with bright acidity and fine tannins that frame the sour cherry, rhubarb and citrus fruit. Enjoy through 2017.

properties.title: Joseph Swan Vineyards 2012 Matthew's Station Vineyard Tannat (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2916 Laguna Rd, Forestville, CA 95436, USA
properties.descrption: This is a thick, firmly structured version of a rare variety in California, smoky in black cherry and vanilla. Perfumed in sweet aromas of violet and raspberry pie, it offers a deceptively balanced fullness of body and power, with persistence to the finish.

properties.title: Luis Duarte 2014 Rapariga da Quinta Colheita Seleccionada Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: 71 Park St, Troy, MI 48083, USA
properties.descrption: This is a rounded, ripe wine that exudes black fruits, soft tannins and juicy acidity. It is fresh, tight with a mineral texture. The six months of wood aging has served to tame the firmest tannins. That means this approachable wine is ready to drink just for its freshness and fruitiness, although it will be even better from early 2017.

properties.title: Adelsheim 2013 Zenith Vineyard Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 16800 NE Calkins Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: Young and precise, this balances flavors of wild raspberries against a mineral foundation. Suggestions of wet stone and a dash of brown spices come through, with lots of supporting acidity. As it fades, there's a lick of chocolate from aging in 29% new French oak.

properties.title: Bernardus 2011 Marinus Red (Carmel Valley)
properties.address: 5 W Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.descrption: Black and white pepper, boysenberries and roasting pork notes show on the fresh and vibrant nose of this blend of the five red Bordeaux varietals. Light and lively on the palate, it offers lots of boysenberry energy, with more pepper, thyme, cardamom and tea elements. It's a refreshing change of pace from a cool vintage.

properties.title: Joseph Jewell 2013 Alderpoint Vineyard Pinot Noir (Humboldt County)
properties.address: 6542 Front St, Forestville, CA 95436, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas and flavors like prunes and strawberry jam make an unusual combination in this full-bodied and uncomplicated wine. It is certainly fruity and generous in personality.

properties.title: Materra Cunat Family Vineyards 2011 Midnight Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4326 Big Ranch Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This wine combines 32% Petit Verdot with 28% Merlot, 26% Malbec and 14% Cabernet Sauvignon. It's intense in milk chocolate and blackberry-raspberry jam, high in acidity and low in oak, showing a tendency toward bitterness on the finish.

properties.title: Carlson Creek 2012 Sangiovese (Cochise County)
properties.address: 4142 N Marshall Way, Scottsdale, AZ 85251, USA
properties.descrption: An herbal strawberry aroma meets dusty furniture and dried hay on the nose. Light bodied and showing little tannic structure, flavors of watery strawberry and currant race to the finish.

properties.title: Cenay 2011 Rodgers Vineyard Pinot Noir (Napa Valley)
properties.address: Javier Mina 262, Centro, 63000 Tepic, Nay., Mexico
properties.descrption: Rustic, dark and deeply tannic, this wine is sourced from the Oak Knoll District of the Napa Valley, known for relatively cooler-climate varieties, though not necessarily Pinot Noir. It dances in dark plum and leather, finishing short.

properties.title: Nevada Ridge 2011 Syrah (Nevada)
properties.address: 3800 Winery Rd, Pahrump, NV 89048, USA
properties.descrption: An incredibly savory nose of hoisin-glazed barbecue, with a hint of tarragon, carries the bouquet. More fruit comes on the palate of jammy, mixed black berries, yet the mild acidity struggles to keep the balance.

properties.title: Marilyn 2012 Meritage (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 16234 Marquis Rd, Orange, VA 22960, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of 52% Cabernet Sauvignon, 39% Merlot and 3% each of Cabernet Franc, Malbec and Petit Verdot, this wine tastes of charred wood and generic red juice, accented by a slight green character. Puckering tannins and a diluted finish complete the picture.

properties.title: Emiliana 2013 Natura Malbec (Rapel Valley)
properties.address: RUTA 68 Y RUTA F-870 Casablanca, Valparaíso, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Briary, herbal berry aromas take on a wet-dog scent. This feels shear and shrill, with high acidity and not much body. Sour black-plum flavors are highly herbal and borderline weedy, while a tart, scouring finish closes this out.

properties.title: Falernia 2013 Reserva Pinot Noir (Elqui Valley)
properties.address: Vicuña, Coquimbo, Chile
properties.descrption: Stalky, damp, funky aromas are not unusual for Elqui wines. This is mild in feel and registers as being in the Pinot Noir range. Rooty, bitter flavors are rustic and low on fruit. Heat on the finish is of no help.

properties.title: Arché 2012 Syrah (Texoma)
properties.address: 228 Wagner Rd, St Jo, TX 76265, USA
properties.descrption: Craisin and geranium aromas mark the nose of this Texas Syrah. The medium-bodied palate brings more floral tones, soapy in nature, with soft tannins giving little support.

properties.title: Quintay 2014 Q Grand Reserve Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Red-berry aromas are damp, mulchy and not fully fresh. On the palate, this wine feels sticky, while flavors of briny, herbal red-berry fruits turn salty on the finish.

properties.title: Stony Lonesome 2013 Estate Reserve Barbera (Finger Lakes)
properties.descrption: An unusual variety in New York, this Barbera contrasts a rich, deeply black berried nose against a palate that's chock full of sour cherries and dusty mineral tones. It's a bit out of balance, with a short, craggy finish.

properties.title: Falernia 2014 Reserva Pedro Ximénez (Elqui Valley)
properties.address: Vicuña, Coquimbo, Chile
properties.descrption: Aromas of orange and tangerine are oily on the nose. Melon, papaya and almond-skin flavors end with creamy lees notes that give way to bitterness on a dilute finish.

properties.title: Heron 2013 Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 2269 Chestnut St, San Francisco, CA 94123, USA
properties.descrption: This good, generic red wine smells like mixed fruits and tastes mildly fruity along with light veggie flavors. It feels lean in texture and dry in balance.

properties.title: Carpineto 2008 Riserva  (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
properties.address: SP 16 Chianti-Valdarno, 50022 Greve FI, Italy
properties.descrption: In this structured wine, aromas recall meat juices, black plum, bell pepper and cooking spices. The dense palate delivers fleshy black cherry and black currant accented by black pepper, clove and espresso. Still young, it has brooding tannins that need time to tame. Drink 2016–2023.

properties.title: Casca Wines 2010 Monte Cascas Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: Av. Gen. Carmona nº2, 2765-207 Estoril, Portugal
properties.descrption: Showing strong, dense structure, this is a full, tannic wine. It starts tough and dry on the palate. The fruit comes through slowly, revealing red berry flavors. It needs to age, so don't drink before 2015.

properties.title: Casey Flat Ranch 2010 Estate Red (Capay Valley)
properties.address: Guinda, CA 95637, USA
properties.descrption: This intense blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Cabernet Franc and Mourvèdre is dusty in cassis and leather with nice layers of blackberry, too. Tightly wound and grippy, the wine offers nuanced shades of herb and cedar and a long, satisfying finish.

properties.title: Castello di Cacchiano 2007 Millennio  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Cacchiano, 53013 Gaiole in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely from Sangiovese, this has primary aromas of underbrush, woodland berries and tobacco. The concentrated palate delivers ripe plum, prune and black cherry accented with black pepper and a note of vanilla alongside the warmth of alcohol. Brawny, round and delicious, this is already approachable. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Watermill 2009 Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (OR))
properties.address: 235 E Broadway Ave #1807, Milton-Freewater, OR 97862, USA
properties.descrption: A fine value, this is sourced from vineyards in the Rocks and Seven Hills regions of the Walla Walla valley. Bright fruit flavors of raspberry and cherry, amped with vivid acidity and showing pretty,  lively spice, carry on through a finish lightly touched with flavors of grapevine and espresso.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas Red (Douro)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.descrption: Made from old Douro vines, this wine is dark, almost black, with flavors as dense as its color. While rich, it is also fruity with blackberry flavor, sweet tannins and a cutting edge of acidity to give a lift at the end. Drink until 2020.

properties.title: Boas Quintas 2009 Quinta da Fonte do Ouro Touriga Nacional (Dão)
properties.descrption: A classic structured Dão wine that is very firm still and packed with tannins. Its mineral texture, wood aging and stony feel are balanced by dense berry fruits and juicy acidity. It still needs time, so either decant or wait until 2016.

properties.title: Finca Casa Lo Alto 2009 Reserva Red (Utiel-Requena)
properties.address: CV452, 2, 46311 Venta del Moro, Valencia, Spain
properties.descrption: Initial aromas are scratchy and piercing, but with airing this blend of Syrah, Garnacha and Cabernet Sauvignon offers intriguing notes of vanilla, tobacco and charcoal. In the mouth, this is undeniably thick and tannic. Flavors are saturated and suggest blackberry and cassis. The finish leans toward syrupy but maintains acidity for balance. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Yarra Yering 2009 Pinot Noir (Yarra Valley)
properties.descrption: This doesn't fit the current fashion in Australian Pinot Noir toward lightness and delicacy. Instead, it delivers rich and mellow flavors of black cherry, tinged with licorice, earth and moss. Drink it over the next several years.

properties.title: Waltzing Bear 2005 Cargasacchi Jalama Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 19360 Rinaldi St #426, Porter Ranch, CA 91326, USA
properties.descrption: Aged more than two years in 50% new French barrels, this wine smells and especially tastes too oaky, with caramel and toast notes that overwhelm the underlying wine. Below all that wood is a dry, crisp Pinot Noir with red currant flavors. Other wines sourced from this Santa Rita Hills vineyard have been outstanding.

properties.title: Zefina 2005 Zinfandel (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 1225 4th Ave, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
properties.descrption: Lightly spicy and displaying a brambly character, with fruit flavors of strawberry jelly, this high alcohol (over 15%) Zin includes some high-toned, volatile notes. It is trending toward an Amador County Zinfandel style, though it is not quite that hot or volatile. All in all, it's a good effort.

properties.title: McPrice Myers 2006 L'Ange Rouge Grenache (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 3525 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: A little heavy and soft, and while it's technically dry, the wine has a chocolate-covered raspberry taste, sprinkled with anise liqueur, and made to seem sweeter than it really is from high alcohol. Tasty, but needs greater structure and finesse.

properties.title: Morrison Lane 2005 Sangiovese (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 201 W Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Morrison Lane's Sangiovese includes a little Syrah and Carmenère in the blend, giving it a light sprinkling of peppery spice. Tart red fruits fill in the rest.

properties.title: Roncolato 2005  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.address: Via Carcera, 21, 37038 Soave VR, Italy
properties.descrption: This is a jammy, mature Amarone that imparts aromas of berry preserves, blackberry tart and sun-ripened strawberries. The wine is sweet and chewy in texture and offers bright berry flavors and sticky tannins.

properties.title: Calafia 2005 Meritage (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: Ripe fruit and new oak combine to produce a wine of power, if not of subtlety. A Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend of Bordeaux varieties, it blasts the palate with blackberry jam, cassis, chocolate and caramelized new oak flavors, and the acidity is soft and mild.

properties.title: Brander 2006 Bouchet Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2401 N Refugio Rd, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.descrption: Made from the two Cabs plus Syrah, this bottling shows its typicity in the rustic mouthfeel and exuberant berry, spice and cocoa flavors. It's a dry, lusty red that will happily wash down savory stews and roasts.

properties.title: Chaltén 2007 Reserva Pinot Noir (Mendoza)
properties.address: Lago del Desierto 265, El Chalten, Santa Cruz, Argentina
properties.descrption: A lean and clean specimen with basic but familiar raspberry and cherry aromas. The palate is a little thin and acidic, but with that comes freshness. Flavors of cherry and mixed herbs are good but sharp, while a light dusting of pepper covers the lean, snappy finish.

properties.title: Alexander Valley Vineyards 2006 Sin Zin Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 8644 CA-128, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Jammy and thick, this is a simple but lusty Zin, powerful in fruity cherry, blackberry and cola flavors that finish dry and spicy. Great with barbecued steak.

properties.title: Anglim 2006 Grenache (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3340 Ramada Dr Suite D, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: There's a baked fruit taste to this Grenache-Syrah blend, like cherry pie filling that got a little caramelized. In its favor, the wine is dry and soft, with finely ground, ripe tannins.

properties.title: Sartori 2004 Estate Collection  (Amarone della Valpolicella)
properties.address: Via Casette, 4, 37024 Arbizzano-Santa Maria VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Sartori's Estate Collection Amarone delivers soapy-floral notes that recall dried lavender and rosehip potpourri. The feminine bouquet is attractive to smell but is oddly reinforced in the mouth because of the wine's inherent sweetness. Pair with meats marinated with thyme, rosemary or other fragrant herbs.

properties.title: Tierra Prometida 2008 Clasico Bonarda (Mendoza)
properties.address: B7611 Mar del Plata, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: Plum, red berry and wild herb aromas combine to create a briary whole. As it airs, the nose turns lemony and hard, while the mouthfeel is tight and limited, with herbal, saucy, red berry flavors. Tomato and basil notes appear on the finish.

properties.title: Il Valentiano 2008 Campo di Marzo  (Rosso di Montalcino)
properties.address: Località Mocali, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: There's a ripe, jammy aroma on the bouquet of this wine that is soon followed by toasted espresso, rum cake, spice and tobacco. The finish is harsh and strong, thanks to a combination of alcohol and high acidity.

properties.title: XYZin 2009 Vine Age Series Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: 22281 Chianti Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: A simple, rustic Zinfandel, sweet and fruity in cherry jam, red licorice, bacon and spice flavors, wrapped into robust tannins. The grapes were sourced from Sonoma, Mendocino and Lodi.

properties.title: Colby Red 2010 Red (California)
properties.address: 11920 US-12, Lowden, WA 99360, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of five varieties, including Cabernet Sauvignon and Zinfandel, is soft and sweet. Call it bistro style. It's jammy in cherries, licorice and mocha. Proceeds from the wine's sales go to heart disease research.

properties.title: Cortijo 2010 Cortijo III  (Rioja)
properties.address: Ctra. Campillos, Km. 35, 29400 Ronda, Málaga, Spain
properties.descrption: Smells flat and sweet, with a plastic-like essence. Zesty in feel but angular, with tangy acids and candied red-fruit flavors along with a pinch of dry spice. Tastes oaky on the finish. Tempranillo with 20% Garnacha.

properties.title: Laberinto 2009 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 1110 Stone Hill Hwy, Hermann, MO 65041, USA
properties.descrption: Strange smelling, with aromas of exotic spices, blueberry and some other notes that don't come across that well. Feels solid and chunky, with herbal, sweet flavors that culminate in a dry, rubbery, herbal-tasting finish.

properties.title: Manos Negras 2010 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 220 W Main St, Smithtown, NY 11787, USA
properties.descrption: Smells different than most, with blueberry, carob and exotic sandalwood. Takes a dive on the palate, where it's sweet, syrupy and flat, almost like prune juice. Along those lines, it tastes pruny, with chocolate on the finish. Struggles to achieve balance.

properties.title: Pomar Junction 2010 Brooster Fighting Red Red (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Too soft in structure, and sweet, too, like berry fruit concentrate. Fans of sweet, simple red wines will like this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah and Zinfandel.

properties.title: Bianchi 2011 Signature Selection Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3380 Branch Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This wine from the Geneseo district offers aromas of sour plums and just enough cigar box to tempt the nose. The flavors are a bit flat at first, then the acidity and tension of sour cherries emerges in the midpalate, bolstered by some black licorice.

properties.title: Felix Lavaque 2010 Felix Malbec (Cafayate)
properties.address: San Rafael, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: Baked plum, molasses, balsamic vinegar and cheesy oak aromas feed into a palate that's braced by a bolt of acidity. A compact set of saucy red-berry and plum flavors features tobacco and peppery accents, while the finish is mildly green in flavor, with respectable weight and balance.

properties.title: Gaucho Andino 2011 Winemaker Selection Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 21301 Kathy Ln, Spicewood, TX 78669, USA
properties.descrption: Raw black-cherry aromas are direct and simple but good. This has a juicy feel that thickens over time, with oak character and extract becoming more apparent. A flavor profile driven by dark-berry fruits and smoldering oak finishes meaty but hot.

properties.title: Masseria Setteporte 2012 Rosso  (Etna)
properties.address: 434 W Ontario St, Chicago, IL 60654, USA
properties.descrption: This is dominated by oak and oak-driven aromas that include roasted coffee bean, espresso, coconut and vanilla that carry over to the palate, together with plum and chocolate. Astringent, drying tannins give it a rather abrupt finish.

properties.title: Hanson Vineyards 2011 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 34948 S Barlow Rd, Woodburn, OR 97071, USA
properties.descrption: Scented with some musky, dusty notes of light cinnamon and a hint of the barnyard, this brings thin berry fruit, baking spices and clove together. It shows some interesting complexity, but fades quickly into a dilute finish.

properties.title: Castillo de Maluenda 2011 Picos Pardos Fusión Garnacha (Calatayud)
properties.descrption: Jammy, creamy, oaky aromas of vanilla and raspberry come with a strong hint of rubber and wet dog. This is oaky and only moderately well balanced, with flavors of cough medicine, raw oak, plum and raspberry. A sticky, oaky residual feel drives the finish.

properties.title: Costantino 2013 DeAetna Red (Etna)
properties.address: 7415 St Helena Hwy, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of wild flower, pink grapefruit and savory herb lead the nose. The palate is a bit lean, but reveals citrus, raw cherry and a hint of sage.

properties.title: Folin Cellars 2011 Petite Sirah (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 9200 Ramsey Rd, Gold Hill, OR 97525, USA
properties.descrption: Petite Sirah remains a curiosity in Oregon, and at such a low level of ripeness, this turns generic. Tart cranberry fruit remains herbal and thin as it hits a quick finish. The wine is well made, but lacks varietal punch and authenticity.

properties.title: Gubinelli 2010 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 20 Grand Corner Ave A, Gaithersburg, MD 20878, USA
properties.descrption: Raisin, prune, mint leaf and extreme ripeness define the nose on this grabby, tannic Malbec that's both jammy in feel but also extracted and heavy. Like the nose and palate, the flavors are jammy and rich, with a strong raisiny element. On the finish, a note of licorice blends with a persistent raisiny quality.

properties.title: Maimai 2011 Syrah (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 1474 Alexander Valley Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Pleasantly spicy, yet soft in the mouth, this is a medium-bodied Syrah to drink over the near term. Hints of anise, cracked pepper and cedar accent cherry fruit.

properties.title: Sweet Cheeks 2011 Barrel Select Tempranillo (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 27007 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.descrption: Strongly minty with a streak of wintergreen, this barrel selection comes from the right AVA for Oregon Tempranillo, but does not fully capture the varietal flavors. It's an earthy, tart, generic red wine, with drying tannins and a short finish.

properties.title: Lo Nuevo 2012 Vilata Old Vines Monastrell-Syrah (Jumilla)
properties.address: 6240 South Main Street L114 & L115, Aurora, CO 80016, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of char, tinny metal, raspberry and matchstick are a disadvantage, but in the mouth this turns the corner via jammy ripeness and oaky flavors of herbal blueberry and cassis. Loamy, big and ripe on the finish, this melds meaty tannins and candied, sweet, oaky flavors. The blend is 85% Monastrell with Syrah.

properties.title: Pagos del Moncayo 2012 PdM Moncayo Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
properties.address: Carretera, Z-372, Km 1, 6, 50580 Vera de Moncayo, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: This discloses funk, rubber and sulfur , but otherwise is a good but chunky and beefy Garnacha. Aromas of rubber and scrambled egg veer toward boysenberry and cassis, while the palate is grabby and jammy. Flavors of baked black fruits, prune and licorice finish pasty and oaky, with a note of sweet plastic.

properties.title: Trust 2013 Single Vineyard Series Lewis Vineyard Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 760 C St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Pungent aromas of herbs, cherry cola, orange peel and dark fruit lead to well-balanced blue-fruit flavors. It shows a lot of purity and appeal as well as good length.

properties.title: Domaine de Bellene 2014 Les Peuillets Premier Cru  (Savigny-lès-Beaune)
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: From negociant Nicolas Potel's own vines, this wine is dense and smoky. It has spice and hints of licorice as well as rich red-cherry fruit. The tannins and the structure of the wine promise aging, so drink this concentrated wine from 2020.

properties.title: Foxen 2014 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 7600 Foxen Canyon Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Concentrated red cherries, dried purple flowers, fresh rose petals and a wet gravel minerality show on the nose of this bottling by Billy Wathen and Dick Dore. It's light in body and fairly delicate on the sip, with Earl Grey tea, stewed cranberry and rose-hip flavors.

properties.title: JM Cellars 2013 Margaret's Vineyard Estate Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14404 137th Pl NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Sauvignon (45%) takes the lead on this blend, followed by Merlot (30%), Cabernet Franc (20%) and Petit Verdot. The aromas are all high toned, with notes of vanilla, herb and dark fruit. The black-fruit flavors are tightly wound, needing time in the cellar to stretch their legs. Best after 2020.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2013 Collection  (Corton)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: With gentle tannins and juicy red fruits this is a ripe wine that is developing fast. It is beginning to get secondary flavors: mushrooms with undergrowth aromas. The fruit is still there, of course, giving red berry and acidity. Drink this wine soon, certainly from late 2017.

properties.title: Marisco Vineyards 2013 Craft Series The Journey Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: 169 Guernsey Road, Renwick 7271, New Zealand
properties.descrption: This high-end offering is a blend of New Zealand's own Abel clone with Dijon clone 777. Mocha, toast and charred wood notes fame pristine black cherry and plum fruit in this medium- to full-bodied wine. A dusty, lingering finish wraps things up nicely, suggesting up to 10 years of aging potential.

properties.title: Roche de Bellene 2014 Vieilles Vignes  (Savigny-lès-Beaune)
properties.descrption: Vines planted in 1947 are the source of this dark and concentrated wine. It has a strongly smoky character with dry tannins. They contrast with the potential of the red cherry and berry fruits that are ripe and juicy. The wine is developing well and should be ready to drink from 2019.

properties.title: Soos Creek 2013 Artist Series #13 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This wine is an equal split between Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc. Heady black cherry and dark-fruit aromas lead to pitch-black-fruit flavors, with the tannins combed to a fine sheen.

properties.title: Spann Vineyards 2012 Tempranillo (Lake County)
properties.address: 8910 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: This well-balanced wine tames the tannins and brings to the table a relaxed texture plus layers of fruit, spice and oak flavors. Still it has great underpinnings of ripe cherry and raspberry, plus a sense of completeness and reserve.

properties.title: Tanner 2013 Estate Grown Petite Sirah (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 435 Main St, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.descrption: Richness and density highlight this full-bodied and deftly oaked wine that smells like baking spices and black pepper sprinkled on ripe black cherry and dark chocolate. The texture is very inviting, almost thick, and beautifully marries the ripe fruit with velvety tannins.

properties.title: Uvaggio 2014 Radix Vinea Zinfandel (El Dorado)
properties.address: 820 Randolph St, Napa, CA 94581, USA
properties.descrption: Concentrated fruit flavors, full body and a smooth, broad mouthfeel make this wine soothing and satisfying to drink. Made from vines growing on their own roots, the wine delivers a ripe berry and cherry character that floods the palate and lingers nicely on the finish.

properties.title: Guastaferro 2008 Primum  (Taurasi)
properties.address: Via Antonio Gramsci, 2, 83030 Taurasi AV, Italy
properties.descrption: From one of Taurasi's rising stars, this gorgeous wine opens with enticing scents of underbrush, just-picked violet, dark berry and a whiff of cake spice. The balanced, full-bodied palate delivers layers of mature black cherry, raspberry, cinnamon, carob and cocoa while firm but refined tannins and fresh acidity provide an elegant, age-worthy structure. It's already tempting but hold for more complexity. Drink 2018–2033.

properties.title: Testarossa 2013 Sierra Madre Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.descrption: Mossy, dank, forest-floor aromas of juniper, chaparral shrub, pencil lead and spiced porcini mushrooms mix with a cooked rhubarb character on the nose of this wine from single-vineyard specialist Bill Brosseau. Cranberry and tart cherry flavors are decorated with rainbow peppercorns, herb-crusted roast beef, bay leaf, eucalyptus and camphor, with layers upon layers of complexity.

properties.title: Château Cheval Blanc 2013  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: 1 Cheval Blanc, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: Smoky aromas and layers of tannin and fruit give this wine great complexity. It is smooth, juicy and fresh while also having perfumed tannins and an elegant, lightly mineral structure from the Cabernet Franc. The wine's cherries and red berries are still encased in the structure, allowing it to develop slowly. Drink from 2024.

properties.title: Château Haut-Brion 2013  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: 135 Av. Jean Jaurès, 33608 Pessac, France
properties.descrption: This wine is structured with impressively ripe fruit. Black-plum juice and blackberries are balanced with a strong tannic content that gives the wine backbone and structure. It has weight, although with its already exuberant fruitiness, it is not likely to be really long-term wine. Drink from 2024. From 120 acres, only the best grapes go into this top wine and 2013 was a smaller crop than the average (10,000 to 12,000 cases). Believed to be the oldest of the five Bordeaux first growths, Haut-Brion has been in the Clarence Dillon family since 1935. The current president is Prince Robert de Luxembourg.

properties.title: Château Léoville Las Cases 2013  Saint-Julien
properties.address: Rue de l'École, 33250 Saint-Julien-Beychevelle, France
properties.descrption: This impressively powerful wine has dense tannins and concentration. With 74%  Cabernet Sauvignon, it is firm, packed with black-currant fruits with intense, perfumed acidity. Cabernet Franc adds spice to the wine. The wood aging is still showing and the wine will need several years before enjoying. Drink from 2025.

properties.title: Château Pontet-Canet 2013  Pauillac
properties.address: Château Pontet-Canet, 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: This wine is rich, with generous black plum and berry fruits. It has a structure that is full, ripe and that will sustain the fruitiness of the wine over many years. The sensation is of velvet, with some force behind it. This remarkable wine will develop well over the medium term and then age for many years. Drink from 2022.

properties.title: Muhr-Van der Niepoort 2013 Spitzerberg Blaufränkisch (Carnuntum)
properties.descrption: Very pure and lifted notes of red cherry are held tightly within a taut frame: the nose gives almost nothing away. The palate provides another glimpse of that hauntingly delicious, almost sublimated cherry note. There is something aromatic and pure, unforced and honest about this disarming wine. The structure is subtle but firm, the elegance borders on the Pinot-esque, thus the wine is slender but profound.

properties.title: Sleight of Hand 2013 Psychedelic Stoney Vine Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: The winery's first release off its estate vineyard in The Rocks offers expressive, captivating aromas of peat, dried flowers, fire pit, herbs, grilled asparagus, funk and green olive. The flavors are sweet, sumptuous and rich, showing depth and detail. It's a knockout.

properties.title: Château Margaux 2013  Margaux
properties.address: 33460 Margaux-Cantenac, France
properties.descrption: This wine is smooth, ripe with fine tannins and red plum and black-currant fruits that are soft and gentle. Acidity dominates at this stage, supported by the tannins. It brings out the fruit and freshness of the year while also keeping some structure from the high percentage of Cabernet Sauvignon in the blend. Drink from 2025.

properties.title: Château Montrose 2013  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: 3 Grand Vignolles, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: This is a firm wine although with superb fruit. It is structured and dense, dark with tarry tannins as well as juicy fruitiness. It is a powerful wine that certainly has the freshness of the year while also having dark, dense tannins. Drink from 2025.

properties.title: Candido 1997 Riserva Red (Salice Salentino)
properties.address: Via Armando Diaz 46, 72025 San Donaci BR, Italy
properties.descrption: Emanating from the heel of the Italian boot, close to the beautiful city of Lecce, this is one of Puglia’s classic wines. The grapes are Negroamaro and Malvasia Nera. Pleasant cherry-berry aromas and flavors predominate. The structure is ample, as is the mouthfeel. The tannins need some softening. The finish is long. Grilled lamb would make a fine accompaniment.

properties.title: Bolla 1999  Valpolicella
properties.address: 231 Bay St, Staten Island, NY 10301, USA
properties.descrption: Seems confected, with sweet Jolly Rancher aromas playing against taut acidity. A light, tart offering best paired with tomato-based sauces—fine with spaghetti at your local Italian joint.

properties.title: Terrale 1998 Primitivo (Puglia)
properties.address: 7878 Dry Creek Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Definitely not Zinfandel-like, despite its Primitivo origins; a rather nondescript wine, as a matter of fact. Light cherry overtones are noted on the nose and palate. The tannins are mouth-drying. This is certainly not a good example of how far Puglia has come with this grape. However, it would work fine with a slice or two of pizza.

properties.title: Audubon Cellars 1997 Picnic Hill Vineyard Late Harvest Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.address: Audubon, NJ 08106, USA
properties.descrption: Exaggerated, burnt aromas of sun-dried tomato, raisins and plum liqueur don’t roll out the red carpet. Sweet (5.35% RS) and fruity, but also tannic and on the rough, earthy side. Ultimately it finishes short.

properties.title: Remo Farina 1997 Ripasso  (Valpolicella Classico Superiore)
properties.address: Viale Alberto Bolla, 11, 37029 Pedemonte VR, Italy
properties.descrption: The ripasso technique consists of passing the already completed “normal” Valpolicella back over the lees of the Amarone in the spring after vinification of the latter is complete. This results in a minor refermentation, adding extra alcohol and flavor. If the latter occurred in this particular version, it is not very evident. There is a modest amount of dry fruit present, but the mouth-searing acids and mouth-drying tannins hurt this wine.

properties.title: Acacia 1997 Lee Vyd Pinot Noir (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 555 Gateway Dr, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: From the Napa side of Carneros, this beautiful wine begins with very forward aromas of cola, black raspberry, black cherry, tomato, mushroom, earth, vanilla, spice and smoky oak. Very fruity and lush in the mouth, with soft tannins. It’s rich and opulent, offering wave after wave of different sensations that are endlessly fascinating. The finish is fruity and long. Fabulous wine; enjoy it now, or age it.

properties.title: Acacia 1997 St. Clair Vyd Pinot Noir (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 555 Gateway Dr, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This lovely, powerful wine is very similar to the Lee Vineyard bottling, but slightly more backward. The fruit and spice aromas are a little earthier, like sniffing a handful of rich, moist humus. In the mouth, there’s just a tad more tannin, indicating, possibly, slightly longer ageability, while the finish is a bit harder. Nonetheless, this is terrific Pinot Noir, among the best anywhere

properties.title: Robert Mondavi 1998 Reserve Pinot Noir (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7801 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.descrption: If you must open this now, let it breath for a while because it’s dumb, as they say, on opening. Airing and swirling reveal more earthy things than fruit. There’s a hint of truffles, of bark, and you almost have to close your eyes to imagine the blackberries and cherries buried deep down inside, but they’re there. You can taste them in the midpalate, and the finish lasts for a long time. Cellar this beauty and drink the regular Mondavi Pinot now and for the next five years.

properties.title: Fidelitas 2011 Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 14467 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This single-vineyard selection is 100% varietal, with deep cassis, dark chocolate and espresso flavors. The alcohol comes out as a slight burn, but the tannins have been nicely rounded off and this will drink well immediately.

properties.title: Regio Cantina 2010 Donpà  (Aglianico del Vulture)
properties.descrption: This solid Aglianico opens with aromas of leather, underbrush, game and ripe plum. The structured palate delivers ripe blackberry accented by notes of licorice, sage and eucalyptus. There's a subtle warmth of alcohol and firm tannins. Best after 2016.

properties.title: Renegade 2012 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 600 Main St, Stroudsburg, PA 18360, USA
properties.descrption: There is nothing wimpy about this Bordeaux-style blend except the price. It way over-delivers, loading your palate with full-bodied, fruit-powered flavors of strawberry and raspberry jam, bolstered with bracing acidity. It's balanced and complete, with crisp, ripe tannins.

properties.title: Shiloh Winery 2011 Mosaic Red (Judean Hills)
properties.descrption: A blend of Merlot, Cabernet Franc, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot, this deep violet-red wine has a nose of black cherry, crème brulée and black pepper. Cool and fruity notes play well together on the palate, shored up by flavors of black cherry, orange zest, menthol, clove and a touch of seawater. Mevushal.

properties.title: Tamarack Cellars 2011 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 700 C St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Just a bit of Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon is added to the blend, most of which comes from the Ciel du Cheval, Tapteil and Weinbau vineyards. In this cooler vintage, an herbal character emerges, lending firm tannins and structure to the tight black cherry and cassis core.

properties.title: Taverna 2010  Aglianico del Vulture
properties.address: 5585 OH-307, Geneva, OH 44041, USA
properties.descrption: Blue flower, tilled soil, leather, blackberry, licorice and black pepper sensations all come together in this vibrant, straightforward Aglianico. The dense, juicy palate is framed by tightly woven, brooding tannins and a vein of mineral.

properties.title: Terre di Giurfo 2012 Kudyah Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Giurfo, s.n, 95040 Licodia Eubea CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a fresh, delicious Nero d'Avola, loaded with juicy blackberry and black cherry sensations that are accented by hints of black pepper and nutmeg. It's a delightfully easy-drinking, fruit-forward style meant to be enjoyed young.

properties.title: Tortoise Creek 2011 Le Charmel Syrah-Grenache (Costières de Nîmes)
properties.descrption: For the suggested price of $12, this delivers plenty of richness and flavor. Plum and briary blackberry aromas lead the way, followed by a medium- to full-bodied, slightly creamy palate that offers dark fruit tinged with a hint of brown sugar. Drink now–2017.

properties.title: Vivera 2010 Martinella  (Etna)
properties.descrption: Made with 80% Nerello Mascalese and 20% Nerello Cappuccio, this opens with aromas of black fruit, subtle oak, toast and vanilla. The palate offers juicy black cherry and raspberry flavors that are lightly accented by notes of clove and chocolate. The tannis are polished.

properties.title: Longoria 2012 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: Here, Pinot Noir master Richard Longoria offers a more affordable taste of his Fe Ciega estate vineyard (whose other expressions cost upwards of $45 each). Aromas range from cranberry and tart blackberry to black pepper and wet slate, and the flavors hone in on sour cherry and tar. This wine features gripping tannins, so wait until 2016 for an even more optimal experience.

properties.title: L'Ecole No. 41 2011 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: In this cooler vintage, Syrah reveals more of its herbal, leafy side. Along with wild blueberry fruit come streaks of herb, green tomato and wet stems.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2011 Epenots Premier Cru  (Pommard)
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: With its tannins, the wine is firm, tight and dark. The black fruit flavors are just beginning to come through. It has power and structure and certainly needs to age. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Maison Champy 2011 Aux Fourches  (Savigny-lès-Beaune)
properties.address: 5 Rue du Grenier À Sel, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: Broad and rounded, it is full of sweet fruits and soft tannins while still retaining a good sense of structure. Red fruits come through strongly to give richness. It's for short-term aging.

properties.title: Mastroberardino 2012 Aglianico (Campania)
properties.address: Via Manfredi, 75-81, 83042 Atripalda AV, Italy
properties.descrption: Blue flower, tilled soil and mature black berry aromas pour from the glass of this young Aglianico. The warm, forward palate doles out ripe black cherry, black pepper, espresso, licorice and toast alongside velvety tannins.

properties.title: Marchesi di Barolo 2014 Rurè  (Barbera d'Alba)
properties.address: Via Roma, 1, 12060 Barolo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Young and fruity, this informal wine opens with aromas of dark berry, violet and a whiff of clove. The simple palate doles out tart cherry, raspberry, orange peel and a hint of white pepper alongside bracing acidity.

properties.title: Maryhill 2013 Winemaker's Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: The aromas of basil, blueberry and char aren't entirely in harmony on this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Syrah and Cabernet Franc. The fruit flavors come together better, sweet and palate-coating with a pleasing intensity.

properties.title: Grand Bourgeau 2012  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 12847 W Hwy Bb, Rocheport, MO 65279, USA
properties.descrption: Still dominated by its tannins, this is a full, structured wine. Dense and with fragrant acidity and black currant flavors, it has a way to go before it is ready to drink. Wait until 2017. The estate is an Alliance Bourg co-operative member.

properties.title: Baigorri 2010 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: This gets off to a clumsy start based on a nutty, rubbery, low-fruit bouquet. In the mouth, this crianza is pinched and tannic, with sandpaper rawness. Herbal, woody flavors of red plum end in a drawing, earthy finish.

properties.title: Bocopa 2013 Alcanta Barrique Oak Aged Monastrell (Alicante)
properties.address: Carrer Talladors, 03610 Petrer, Alicante, Spain
properties.descrption: Raisin and baked plum aromas set the stage for a somewhat flat-feeling palate. Plum and berry aromas are chunky and finish soft, with low acidity and not a lot of pop.

properties.title: Boomtown 2013 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 200 Main St # B, Downieville, CA 95936, USA
properties.descrption: A plummy interpretation of Merlot, this also brings aromas and flavors of herbs and spice. Flavors are sweet and easy drinking with lightly grainy tannins.

properties.title: Brooklyn West 2012 Rockridge Red (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 200 2nd Street @, Jackson St, Oakland, CA 94607, USA
properties.descrption: Moderately sweet, this wine has attractive and ripe plum and strawberry aromas, then a soft, plush texture and light, fruity flavors. Made with Barbera, Grenache and Petite Sirah, it tastes sweet and easy to swallow but has plenty of body and alcohol to go with it.
