properties.title: Calcu 2012 Reserva Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Los Militares 4777, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Plum and berry aromas come with a floral accent. This feels raw and a touch abrasive, with woody, saucy flavors of berry fruits and plum. The oaky, heavily spiced finish brings a grippy tannic feel.

properties.title: Capoverso 2011 Cantaleone Sangiovese (Cortona)
properties.descrption: Aromas of toasted oak, cedar, dark-skinned berry and a whiff of barnyard lead the nose. The dense, one-dimensional palate palate doles out overripe plum, vanilla, game and a confectionary note. Buffed, fleeting tannins and soft acidity make this extremely accessible so drink now.

properties.title: Castello di Querceto 2010 La Corte Sangiovese (Colli della Toscana Centrale)
properties.address: Via Alessandro François, 2, 50022 Greve in Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: This 100% Sangiovese opens with aromas that recall coffee, scorched earth and toasted oak. The fleeting palate offers espresso, mocha and a green note of powdered sage alongside astringent tannins. The fruit has mostly dried out.

properties.title: Château la Nauze 2012 Identité  (Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 2 La Nauze, 33350 Saint Philippe d'Aiguilhe, France
properties.descrption: Dense and well structured, this is also a rich and juicy wine. It has crisp acidity, a fresh character that goes well with the firm tannins. Still young, this fruity wine needs to age, so drink from 2017. Marcel Verfaillie purchased the property in 2007. Enologist Jean-Marc Domme runs the estate; consultant is Thomas Duclos.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2014 Select Terroir Merlot (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.descrption: Tarry black-cherry aromas are a bit damp, oaky and scratchy, but overall this opens well. A solid, firm, edgy palate offers flavors of herbal blackberry and baked black plum, while the finish is meaty and a touch salty.

properties.title: Massi di Mandorlaia 2008 Colpetroso  (Maremma Toscana)
properties.address: S.P. 9 (Aione) - Km 10, 58054 Scansano GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Blueberry, blackberry, toast, spice and tobacco aromas lead the nose on this blend of 50% Cabernet, 40% Merlot and 10% Petit Verdot. The evolved palate offers prune, raisin, cocoa, espresso and cedar alongside fleeting tannins. Most of the fruit has dried up, giving it a lean quality.

properties.title: Amador Cellars 2013 Ottimista Vineyard Sangiovese (Amador County)
properties.descrption: An attractive spicy, floral perfume joins rich fruit and spice flavors in this full-bodied, almost thick but luxuriously textured wine. An abundance of enticing oak aromas and flavors mingle with ripe cherry and blackberry notes, while piles of fine-grained tannin give a velvety mouthfeel.

properties.title: Château d'Agassac 2014 Pomiès-Agassac  (Haut-Médoc)
properties.address: 15 Rue du Château d'Agassac, 33290 Ludon-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: The second wine of Agassac is smooth, full of the fruit of this fresh year. With bright red-berry fruits and soft tannins it is a wine that is developing quickly. It will be delicious and ready to drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Franc Cardinal 2014  Francs Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 33570 Tayac, France
properties.descrption: A ripe and spicy wine from owner Sophie Holzberg that has tannins as well as rich black fruits. It has a concentrated backdrop that is dry and firm. Full, perfumed and generous, it will age well. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Château Hyot 2014  Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.descrption: This is a ripe, fruity wine with its black-currant fruit and balanced sweet tannins. It has a fine elegant texture and juicy acidity. All these elements promise a wine that will be delicious to drink from 2019. The daughters of owners Bernadette Faure and Alain Aubert oversee vineyards, winemaking and marketing.

properties.title: Château Sainte-Marie 2014 Alios  (Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 51 Rte de Bordeaux, 33760 Targon, France
properties.descrption: Warm and ripe, this is a delicious, structured wine from a blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot from Stéphane Dupuch. It has fine tannins that give a spicy character aided by 14 months in French oak as well as bold black fruits that are developing well. The acidity at the end adds the freshness. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Eisold-Smith 2014 Fairsing Vineyard Pinot Noir
properties.descrption: A standout among the winery's vineyard designates, this puts ripe raspberry jam and cherry-pie fruit front and center. There's a dollop of balsamic and chocolate as well. Native yeast fermentation may have contributed to the unusual flavors of toasted peanuts that linger in the finish.

properties.title: El Coto 2008 Coto de Imaz Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Calle Cmno. Viejo, 26, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Crisp, direct, smoky aromas are intertwined with berry and oak-based vanilla scents. This feels fresh, easy and in the drinkability zone. Cherry, plum and berry flavors are bright for an eight-year-old wine, while the finish is more secure and solid than racy. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: En Garde 2013 Reserve Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a sultry, leathery and sinewy wine, dark in tannin and oak and a full-bodied ripeness of dense fruit that delves into savory Asian spice. Powerful, it combines a wealth of clones to good effect, aging for 17 months in new French oak, 83% of it new.

properties.title: Fenestra 2012 Graciano (Lodi)
properties.address: 83 Vallecitos Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Touches of wood smoke and cardamom give an exotic streak to this full-bodied and dark-colored wine. It has deep fruit flavors like blackberry and prune, good balance and light tannins to enhance the texture.

properties.title: Fenestra 2012 Infrared Estate Red (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 83 Vallecitos Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Warm aromas, mellow flavors and a plush texture make this full-bodied wine easy to appreciate. It smells like cherries, berries and baking spices, tastes generous and mouthfilling, and has a soothing layer of fine-grained tannins.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Pegos Claros Grand Escolha Castelão (Península de Setúbal)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.descrption: A big, bold and ripe wine, this is rich and packed with dark fruits. Firm tannins are well cushioned by the berry fruits and the acidity. It is a generous wine that comes from the region south of Lisbon. Aged in wood for 12 months, it is now ready to drink.

properties.title: Troon 2013 Malbec (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 1475 Kubli Rd, Grants Pass, OR 97527, USA
properties.descrption: So dark the wine stains the glass the instant it's poured, this plush, dense and pure varietal effort pulls together crushed raspberries, ripe cherries, tanned leather, cut tobacco, cedar and spice components. They are well-matched and captivating; the aromas are like sticking your nose into an especially spicy cigar box.

properties.title: Bodega Classica 2012 El Pacto Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: 9075 Holman Rd NW, Seattle, WA 98117, USA
properties.descrption: Berry and plum aromas start out aggressive before settling on earth tones and cinnamon spice notes. This feels juicy, ripe and well constructed. Flavors of raspberry, currant and plum are mildly peppery, while savory earth notes continue the wine's good vibes and solidity. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Penley Estate 2012 Special Select Shiraz (Coonawarra)
properties.address: McLean Rd, Coonawarra SA 5263, Australia
properties.descrption: You've got to like oak to appreciate this wine, which is presently dominated by scents of vanilla, mocha and toasted coconut. It's full bodied and velvety in texture, with hints of black cherry lurking in the background.

properties.title: Penley Estate 2013 Hyland Shiraz (Coonawarra)
properties.descrption: Mouthfilling and round, this wine's savory notes of roasted meat, mocha and cracked pepper frame plummy fruit. Vanilla creeps in on the long, supple finish. Drink now through 2025.

properties.title: Henry's Drive Vignerons 2013 Pillar Box Shiraz (Padthaway)
properties.address: 15 Spring Gully Rd, Piccadilly SA 5151, Australia
properties.descrption: A solid value, the 2013 Pillar Box offers oodles of blackberry and plum fruit, framed by vanilla and accented by mocha. It's creamy-velvety in texture, with a rich long finish. Drink now through 2025.

properties.title: Le Gode 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Loc. Le Gode, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Nicely balanced and firmly structured, this earthy red opens with classic Sangiovese aromas of tilled soil, pressed blue flower, red berry, herb and a whiff of game. The savory palate delivers juicy black cherry, crushed raspberry, clove, tobacco and licorice accompanied by chewy tannins.

properties.title: Walt 2013 Sierra Mar Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: This bottling from the Kathryn Hall family of wines is rich and juicy but not sweet at all. The nose begins with sage, clove, black cherry, concentrated violets and rose petals, with a turned-loam quality. The palate shows beets, fennel, sagebrush, dark red cherry and plum. A eucalyptus and menthol quality rises on the finish.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2013 Foss Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: A delicate expression of power and beauty, this conveys kirsch cherry, wet stone and high-toned minerality. Round and easy to love, it offers a subtle streak of tannin and tight, integrated oak, finishing in dark chocolate and orange.

properties.title: Jean-Luc Colombo 2011 La Louvée  (Cornas)
properties.address: 10 Rue des Violettes, 07130 Cornas, France
properties.descrption: Plummy and ripe, with a sheen of glossy, cedary oak, this is as plush as it gets in the northern Rhône. It's full-bodied, supple and open, with a long, velvety finish. Drink now–2030.

properties.title: Alto Moncayo 2013 Aquilon Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
properties.address: Ctra. Antigua de Borja, 50540 Borja, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Smoky, roasted aromas of hickory and blackberry are patented for this label: all Alto Moncayo top-end bottlings open like this. In the mouth, this is direct, full bodied and high in energy. The flavors match the nose, meaning this tastes like dark berry fruits mixed with smoky oak and char, while the finish turns chocolaty, with pepper, wild berry, spice notes and heat. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Au Pied du Mont Chauve 2013 Les Chaumées Premier Cru  (Chassagne-Montrachet)
properties.descrption: This young and structured wine has ample fresh red-currant fruitiness, but is ensconced in dry tannins that will soften over the next few years. The wine holds good potential, with its bright fruit and final acidity. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Caparzo 2011 La Casa  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale del Brunello, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This elegantly structured red opens with aromas of dark-skinned berry, sunbaked earth, new leather, thyme and a whiff of pipe tobacco. The balanced, polished palate offers wild cherry, strawberry, vanilla, coffee and star anise alongside integrated tannins. It's already accessible and will offer fine drinking over the next several years. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: Dutton-Goldfield 2013 Azaya Ranch Vineyard Pinot Noir (Marin County)
properties.address: 3100 Gravenstein Hwy N, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: This is a bold and expressive but not overly big wine. It smells wonderfully like clove and coriander, and tastes generously focused on classic black cherry and cedar notes. It's full bodied, but has great acidity and a lively layer of tannins to keep it balanced and refreshing.

properties.title: Dutton-Goldfield 2013 Dutton Ranch Freestone Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This tightly wound wine opens in the glass, with intense, bright acidity that wraps around herbal, minty undertones. Blackberry, raspberry and clove give it plenty of varietal classicism, but it's the strong earthy loam and forest floor that provide intrigue and elegance.

properties.title: Padelletti 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Via Guido e Dino Padelletti, 9, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Mature dark-skinned berry, forest floor, spice rack, chopped mint, eucalyptus and graphite are some of the aromas you'll find on this structured red. The chewy, full-bodied palate doles out black raspberry, juicy wild cherry, licorice and dried herb alongside tightly packed but ripe tannins. Best 2019–2026.

properties.title: Podere Brizio 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Localita' Podere Brizio, 67, 53024 Tavernelle SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Baking spice, leather, menthol, chopped mint and ripe berry aromas come together on this elegantly structured wine. The firm palate shows mature black cherry, raspberry jam, anise, cinnamon and dried sage while assertive, fine-grained tannins provide support. Drink 2020–2032.

properties.title: Riverbench 2013 Clone 115 Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 6020 Foxen Canyon Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Baking-spice notes of mace and nutmeg meet with sage, incense, oak and sandalwood components across dark red fruit on the nose of this clonal study. It's delicate in mouthfeel, but heavily spiced with oregano and thyme atop cranberry, beet and raspberry fruits that surround graphite.

properties.title: Kerloo 2013 Stone Tree Malbec (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 3911 1st Ave S, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.descrption: All varietal coming from two blocks of this vineyard, this wine dazzles with its strikingly pure aromas of plum, herbs and spice. The flavors don't disappoint, coating the palate with velvety, restrained, exquisitely balanced fruit flavors that perfectly capture the essence of this variety. For those looking for a primer on Malbec in Washington, look no further.

properties.title: Two Sisters 2013 Lindsay's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 240 John St E, Niagara-on-the-Lake, ON L0S 1J0, Canada
properties.descrption: Clove-spiced pomegranate juice hits the nose first on this top-end bottling from the Foley family. It also offers some soy and sesame scents. A minerally line of pencil lead and black rocks coalesce the palate around savory, tangy flavors of tart cherry, incense, Earl Grey tea and orange rind.

properties.title: Two Vintners 2013 Some Days Are Stones Stoney Vine Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 18570 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from The Rocks District, the herb, green stem, black olive, peat, wet stone and floral aromas are expansive. The potpourri and savory flavors are broad in feel and exquisitely balanced, capped off by a long finish. Stunning stuff.

properties.title: Wait Cellars 2013 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 25378 US-80, Grand Saline, TX 75140, USA
properties.descrption: One of the producer's native-fermentation wines, this was given 25% whole-cluster fermentation and one-third new oak. The wine blends grapes from the Devoto Garden and Skikos vineyards, combining them into light, clear color with a twist of pine resin. Juicy in acidity, it offers complexity and balance.

properties.title: Zepaltas 2013 Devoto Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 2920 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This light, clear wine is varietal in approach and silky texture, also offering a tension of high acidity, forest floor and nervy, cool-climate fruit. From a vineyard overlooking Freestone, it speaks to site and taste with classy effectiveness.

properties.title: Siro Pacenti 2011 Vecchie Vigne  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Podere Pelagrilli, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Underbrush, sun-baked earth, black spice, menthol and mature dark-skinned fruit aromas jump out of the glass. The bold, full-bodied palate doles out raspberry jam, ripe Marasca cherry, ground pepper and licorice alongside firm, fine-grained tannins that provide seamless support. It's brawny and bold but the refined tannins also lend a measure of finesse.

properties.title: Small and Tall 2012 Joyful Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: There's unending floral fragrance on the nose of this bottling. Hibiscus, lilacs, rosewater and cherry blossoms decorate cranberry fruit, kola-nut spice and wet slate. A potpourri power shows on the palate, with lavender and oregano laid across pomegranate, bolstered by an earthy tobacco-leaf spice.

properties.title: Jed Wines 2010 Limited Release Cabernet Franc (Uco Valley)
properties.address: 7000 Broadway #307, Denver, CO 80221, USA
properties.descrption: This loud, feral Cab Franc starts with medicinal, earthy aromas. Next up is a tannic, hard, grabby palate with roasted berry, salt, char and savory flavors. An amplified roasted character carries onto the finish, which is broad and bulky.

properties.title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi 2011 Santa Maria  (Morellino di Scansano)
properties.address: Via Aretina, 120, 50065 Sieci FI, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of 85% Sangiovese and 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, it has aromas of blueberry and blue flower. The palate offers sour cherry and prune accented with hints of white pepper and green bell pepper alongside bitter tannins. Overall this feels lean and lacks freshness. It's not an ager so drink soon.

properties.title: Fabre Montmayou 2012 Phebus MMC Red (Mendoza)
properties.address: Roque Sáenz Peña, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Light, minty, savory aromas of Middle Eastern spices accent basic berry aromas. In the mouth, this is a touch flat. Flavors of herbal, peppery plum and berry fruits finish dry but hollow. The blend is 70% Malbec with 15% each of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon.

properties.title: Finca del Marquesado 2008 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: 3808 Rolling Hills Lane, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The wine leads with aromas of raisin and black fruits. In the mouth, it feels spiky, with pointed tannins. Earthy, stewed plum and baked berry flavors lead to a big, edgy feeling finish with blocky tannins.

properties.title: Foris 2011 Fly Over Red (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 654 Kendall Rd, Cave Junction, OR 97523, USA
properties.descrption: Almost half Merlot with the rest Cabernet Sauvignon with just a dollop of Cabernet Franc (9%) added to the mix, it brings notes of cocoa, plum, green herbs and bell pepper. Lighter in color and feel, it's made in an elegant style with a pleasing sense of freshness.

properties.title: Frédéric Lornet 2011 Trousseau (Arbois)
properties.address: 39600 Montigny-lès-Arsures, France
properties.descrption: With its typical light color, this is a strawberry-flavored wine that has light acidity and a jammy feel. With an attractive crispness to the texture, it is a wine to drink now.

properties.title: Portalupi 2012 Il Migliore Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: An unripe streak of mushrooms and green veggies runs right through the middle of this dry Pinot. That mars enjoyment of it, despite some black cherry and cola flavors. Drink up.

properties.title: Casarena 2012 505 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: Woody smelling up front, this is a thick, ripe Malbec with sweet plum and berry aromas and flavors. Despite feeling fat, this has adequate acidity to match resiny oak and jammy berry fruit. Wood spice is the dominant flavor on the finish.

properties.title: Finca Flichman 2012 Reserva Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Munives 800, Barrancas, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Wiry red-berry aromas are lean and stalky smelling. This feels tight with little excess weight or body. Flavors of peppery red fruits come with a broadside shot of oak in front of a short finish.

properties.title: Spellbound 2012 Petite Sirah (California)
properties.address: 10 Lippincott Ln #12, Mt Holly, NJ 08060, USA
properties.descrption: A widely distributed wine that'll please in yeasty strawberry and blueberry flavor and a yeasty nose. Soft and straightforward, the tannins are tamed and the profile more juicy than earthy.

properties.title: Page Springs 2010 Colibri Vineyard Mourvèdre (Cochise County)
properties.address: 1500 N Page Springs Rd, Cornville, AZ 86325, USA
properties.descrption: A high-toned note of smoky, roasted red apple hits the nose first, followed by notes of wild berries and undergrowth. This has fine, tender tannins, plus salient acids. Notes of confected watermelon, rose and spice surface on the palate, with the watermelon note extending onto the medium to long finish.

properties.title: Rapaura Springs 2009 Vineyard Reserve Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
properties.address: 309 Rapaura Road, Rapaura 7273, New Zealand
properties.descrption: This medium-bodied Pinot Noir is a pleasant enough drink, offering modest strawberry and cherry aromas and flavors before a touch of mocha creeps in on the finish.

properties.title: Lockwood 2012 Merlot (Monterey County)
properties.descrption: A pretty good Merlot for the price, it's dry and full-bodied, with cola, black cherry, oak and baking spice flavors. Easy to drink with everything from burgers to a char-broiled steak.

properties.title: Monterebro 2010 Crianza Monastrell-Syrah (Jumilla)
properties.address: C. Bo. Iglesias, 55, 30520 Jumilla, Murcia, Spain
properties.descrption: This Monastrell-heavy blend hits with a ton of ripe berry aromas, Graham cracker and minerality on the bouquet. In the mouth, it's creamy and syrupy, with jutting tannins. Flavors of lactic oak, stewed black fruits and carob finish chocolaty and creamy, with mild tannins and heat.

properties.title: Naked Mountain 2008 Raptor Red Red (Virginia)
properties.address: 2747 Leeds Manor Rd, Markham, VA 22643, USA
properties.descrption: Maple syrup, coffee and dried peppered meat lend this wine a distinctive aromatic profile. It feels medium in weight, offering bright acidity and fine, chalky tannins for support. A flavor of toasted popcorn kernel surfaces on the finish.

properties.title: Taron 2008 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: Ctra. Miranda, s/n, 26211 Tirgo, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Dusty berry aromas blend with mint and herbal notes. This Tempranillo feels grabby and pinched; flavors of baked black fruits, vanilla and dill are earthy on the finish, which is chunky but generally balanced.

properties.title: Canyon Wind 2009 Merlot (Grand Valley)
properties.address: 3907 N River Rd, Palisade, CO 81526, USA
properties.descrption: Decadent aromas of warmed chocolate and hazelnut coffee lead onto the pliant palate. Chalky tannins keep the vanilla-tinged finish grounded.

properties.title: Saviah 2015 The Jack Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1979 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Merlot makes up just over three-quarters of this blend, with the balance Malbec, Cabernet Franc, Sangiovese and Petit Verdot. Bright aromas of cherry pie, blueberry, herb, plum and earth are followed by smooth polished blue-fruit flavors. It's a complete delight, focusing on elegance.

properties.title: Beran 2013 Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: 1275 Inglewood Ave, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Deep in color and dramatically smoky in flavor, this full-bodied wine is not at all shy. It tastes fruity, saturated, nicely tannic and very oaky. Charred meat, black pepper and espresso impressions wind through the generous black cherry and blackberry notes.

properties.title: Kohl 2015 Classic Zweigelt (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Milchhausstraße 9, 2223 Hohenruppersdorf, Austria
properties.descrption: Abundant cherry notes show on the nose and palate of this wine—red, black and very ripe. It's juicy, fresh and straight-forward, with lovely, peppery spice. A picnic wine par excellence.

properties.title: Las Positas 2013 Estate Barbera (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 1828 Wetmore Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: This full-bodied Barbera's especially dark, opaque color is difficult to miss, and its aromas are equally intense. It smells like a late harvest wine, and its blackberry jam and cherry compote flavors seem to coat the palate. Although dry, it's ripe to the extreme and structured with moderate tannins.

properties.title: Pepper Bridge 2014 Estate Vineyards Merlot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1704 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Dark raspberry, barrel spice and smoke aromas are followed by medium-bodied fruit flavors. The tannins bring a slight sense of astringency. Perhaps some time in the bottle will help them settle.

properties.title: Calera 2011 Ryan Vineyard Pinot Noir (Mt. Harlan)
properties.address: 11300 Cienega Rd, Hollister, CA 95023, USA
properties.descrption: Difficult to appreciate now, this Pinot is bone dry, brittle in tannins and acidic. It has quietly complex rosehip tea, sour cherry candy and cola flavors, with a tasteful appliqué of oak. Hold until 2019 and see what it's doing.

properties.title: Château Balac 2011  Haut-Médoc
properties.descrption: A strongly wood-aged wine, full of as much spice and toast as fruit. It will probably soften and round out to give a wine that, while firm, will have rich black currant fruitiness, dusty tannins and fresh acidity at the end. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Laforge 2011  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: 3S281 Williams Rd, Warrenville, IL 60555, USA
properties.descrption: It shows great depth of flavor, with delicious fresh berries, black fruits, balanced acidity and fragrance. The tannins are present, but given a great lift by the fruitiness. A wine to drink over the medium-term, from 2016.

properties.title: Dão Sul 2012 Palestra Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: This wine shows some of the natural tannic structure of the Douro while really bringing out plenty of fruit. It is rich, full of black fruits, ripe berries and elegant acidity. Firm and fruity at the end, it could age until 2016, but is good to drink now.

properties.title: Domaine de Bellene 2011 Les Hauts Jarrons Premier Cru  (Savigny-lès-Beaune)
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: For a wine from the 2011 vintage, this ripe wine has plenty of weight. It's in the fruity, fresh spectrum but this is sustained by a young, solid and tannic core. Full of red fruits and sweet final acidity, it's for medium-term aging.

properties.title: Franz Keller 2011 Schwarzer Adler Pinot Noir (Baden)
properties.address: Badbergstraße 44, 79235 Vogtsburg im Kaiserstuhl, Germany
properties.descrption: Char and roasted coffee notes lend a brooding, smoky backdrop to bright red berry and cherry flavors in this full-bodied Pinot Noir. Cranberry acidity bristles the palate, leading a long finish marked by firm but fine tannins. It needs another 3–5 years in the cellar to integrate, but should mature elegantly.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2009 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The blend includes 7% Cabernet Sauvignon and 4% Cabernet Franc. It's tight, herbal and earthy, with a scent of forest floor. As it opens, it adds layers of wild berry, bramble, graphite and leaf, all in good balance. This has lovely proportion and follow through, as in all of the Novelty Hill reds.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2009 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Malbec (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: A whiff of clover jumps from the glass, then this dark, juicy wine rips into a dense cassis flavor. Ripe and sappy, it has just the right touch of new oak layered onto the finish.

properties.title: Pala 2009 Siray Red (Isola dei Nuraghi)
properties.address: Via Giuseppe Verdi, 7, 09040 Serdiana CA, Italy
properties.descrption: This shows dark concentration, with dense aromas of sweet cherry, tobacco, prune and blackberry. On the palate, it delivers a ripe impression of sweetness and a soft, plush texture.

properties.title: San Huberto 2007 Nina Blend Red (Argentina)
properties.address: Guardia Vieja 1100, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Roasted and decidedly earthy on the nose, this has mature aromas of coffee, spice and herb note. A solid fabric of aged tannins and acidity bolster the wild berry and cherry flavors, which finish syrupy and raisiny. A blend of 50% Petit Verdot, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon and 20% Malbec.

properties.title: Leeuwin Estate 2008 Art Series Shiraz (Margaret River)
properties.address: Stevens Rd, Margaret River WA 6285, Australia
properties.descrption: Made in a restrained, perhaps age-worthy style, Leeuwin's 2008 Art Series Shiraz offers up cassis tinged with hints of mint and tobacco. The tannins are silky in texture, while the wine never strays past medium weight. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Bailiwick 2010 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Juicy and brisk in acidity, this mouthwatering Pinot Noir is dry and silky. It has cool-climate cherry, pomegranate and cola flavors, with a nice mushroomy earthiness. Decant this elegant wine for several hours before opening it.

properties.title: Bodegas Bilbainas 2006 Viña Pomal Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Dill, vanilla, tobacco, earth and light red-fruit aromas comprise the classic nose. The palate feels tight and in good shape, while a mild berry flavor comes topped with touches of cardamom, cinnamon and nutmeg, expressing Rioja in every way. Elegant and balanced; drink now.

properties.title: Château du Seuil 2008  Graves
properties.descrption: Now maturing well, this is a wine that reflects much of the freshness of 2008, with firm tannins and solid structure. A black currant flavor dominates this elegant offering, providing acidity as well as freshness. It could age for another few years, but is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Château Grand Jean 2009  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 8555 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: This rounded, wood-aged wine has just the right amount of structure and delicious acidity to accompany the full red- and black-berry notes. It's refreshing, while still concentrated and age worthy.

properties.title: Château Monbrison 2010  Margaux
properties.address: 1 All. de Monbrison, 33460 Arsac, France
properties.descrption: Powerful, with concentrated tannins, this bottle remains a tough proposition. Its acidity suggests some fruitiness, though the structure is lacking real flesh. This will obviously round out, but could well be a firm wine for many years.

properties.title: Château Roustaing 2010 Vieilles Vignes  (Bordeaux)
properties.address: 1 Rte de Fossés Longues, 33750 Beychac-et-Caillau, France
properties.descrption: An attractively balanced wine, this shows fruitiness that's supported by fine tannins. It's a ripe wine, ready to drink now, with black currant juice and red plum flavors giving pleasure.

properties.title: Château Saransot-Dupré 2009  Listrac-Médoc
properties.address: entrée 2, avenue de Soulac, 4 Rue Grande Rue, 33480 Listrac-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: A wine with structure, this achieves balance with its black currant flavor and acidity. It's lined firmly with tannins that bring a dry and texture to this solid, age-worthy bottle. Give it at least five years.

properties.title: Di Meo 2008 A Aglianico (Campania)
properties.address: Contrada Coccovoni, Salza Irpina, AV 83050, 83050 Parolise AV, Italy
properties.descrption: This wine inspires a pairing with foods that have a sweet cheese or butter element. It is well shaped and opulent, with loads of crushed black pepper, dried fruit and  dusty mineral nuances.

properties.title: Domaine de Valmengaux 2009  Bordeaux
properties.descrption: This wood-aged wine is soft and rounded. It has a ripe black-plum flavor and a generous texture, which brings out the richness of the vintage. There is a fine line of refreshing acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2011 Ros'Aura Aglianico (Irpinia)
properties.address: Località Cerza Grossa, 83050 Sorbo Serpico AV, Italy
properties.descrption: Ros'Aura is one of the most delightful rosatos to come from southern Italy. It's a concentrated bright pink color, with fresh aromas of wild berry and pink grapefruit.

properties.title: Finca Torremilanos 2009 Los Cantos  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: N-122, km. 274, 09400 Aranda de Duero, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: This is jammy and reduced throughout, especially on the nose, which offers a dense blueberry aroma. Saturated and solid on the palate, it features ripe flavors of black plum, blackberry and caramel. A potent, fruity, modern type of Tempranillo that's long on fruit and short on complexity.

properties.title: Lucania 2010 Grifalco  (Aglianico del Vulture)
properties.descrption: This delivers excellent value, with dark fruit aromas, tight tannins and a lingering spice note. The wine is aged partly in oak and partly in stainless steel. It would make an excellent partner to barbecued meats.

properties.title: Manuel Olivier 2011  Pommard
properties.address: 7 Rue des Grandes Vignes, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: Wood aging for 18 months has smoothed out the natural tannins of this Pommard while retaining the concentration of the 30-year-old vines. The wine is rich, soft, full of blackberry fruitiness and maturing well, ready to be drunk from 2015.

properties.title: Reustle 2012 Pishon Bloc Pinot Noir (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 960 Cal Henry Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.descrption: Aged in mostly new French oak, this wine's barrel influences stand out. Notes of coffee and cinnamon come alongside herbs and brown stems, with the oak bringing some grit to the tannins.

properties.title: Reustle 2012 Winemaker's Reserve Tempranillo (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 960 Cal Henry Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.descrption: After starting out reductive, it's moderately aromatic with notes of pencil eraser, vanilla and cocoa. The palate is medium bodied with the oak a bit overweighted for the fruit that is in the bottle, finishing with coffee flavors.

properties.title: Castillo de Maluenda 2011 Punto Suspensivo Garnacha (Calatayud)
properties.address: Av. Mudéjar, 61, 50340 Maluenda, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: A grapy, clamped nose lacks nuance. In the mouth, this is raw and choppy, with fresh red-fruit acidity. Red-berry and oak flavors finish woody, with ample spice and juicy acidity.

properties.title: Jezebel 2013 Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 5705-F NE 105th Ave, Portland, OR 97220, USA
properties.descrption: A smoky nose carries a strong suggestion of bacon fat, wrapped around tightly wound blackberry fruit. Flavors play out broadly and thin out quickly, but this young wine offers solid value and immediate pleasure.

properties.title: Festival and Feast 2013 Rosé of Pinot Noir (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: Jolly Rancher-red in color, there's high-toned grapefruit and watermelon in this Rosé. Layers of tropical juiciness on the back of the tongue and a nice finish make this a refreshing wine before, during or after dinner.

properties.title: Rutini 2011 Encuentro Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Km 10.5, RP89, Tupungato, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Minty, inky, oaky aromas rest on top of basic berry scents. This is juicy but also reduced in feel. The flavor profile is superficial, with hints of cassis and blackberry. The finish is loamy and heavy, with adequate lift and acidity.

properties.title: Telmo Rodríguez 2012 Al Muvedre Tinto Joven Red (Alicante)
properties.address: 01308 Lantziego, Álava, Spain
properties.descrption: Punchbowl aromas of red currant, raspberry, cherry and bath soap set up a bright yet sinewy palate. Flavors of baked berry, roasted plum and minerally earth notes finish with mild herb and spice flavors, ample residual fruit and juicy acidity.

properties.title: Toboni 2010 Oakwild Ranch Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7015 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Interesting components of rural earth, mushroom, plum, dark cherry and cola spice play off each other in this robust, full-bodied Pinot, from the growers of Toboni Vineyards.

properties.title: Andrew Will 2009 Sorella Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 12526 SW Bank Rd, Vashon, WA 98070, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced entirely from the Champoux Vineyard, this Bordeaux-style blend is two-thirds Cabernet Sauvignon. Yummy from the first sniff to the last sip, it's packed with juicy berries and cassis, gracefully wrapped in layers of black olive, toast, clean earth and dark chocolate. Tannins are ripe and smooth.

properties.title: Lynmar 2010 Quail Hill Vineyard Lynn's Blend Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3909 Frei Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: With fine acidity, grippy tannins and a tangy minerality, this Pinot offers complex flavors of sour-cherry candy, red currant, Dr. Pepper and spice that are laced with notes of dried herbs and white pepper. Turns dramatic on the midpalate, where the weight sinks in. Delicious now, this should develop over the next 6–8 years.

properties.title: La Jota Vineyard 2009 Cabernet Franc (Howell Mountain)
properties.address: 1102 Las Posadas Rd, Angwin, CA 94508, USA
properties.descrption: Hard to describe the balance and elegance of this Cabernet Franc, although it's pretty hard in tannins. Below that is a fabulous core of blackberry, black cherry and mineral flavors. Rich, complex and dramatic, this is arguably one of the best Cab ernet Francs on the market. Drink now–2017.

properties.title: Buty 2008 Phinny Hill Vineyard Columbia Rediviva Cabernet Sauvignon-Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 535 E Cessna Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Syrah—this is a focused wine, with complex nuances of licorice, tar, mineral and lead pencil, but it is buttressed by the compact, concentrated red and black fruits. The dusty tannins are reminiscent of a Napa wine, with excellent length and polish.

properties.title: Beckmen 2009 Purisima Mountain Vineyard Grenache (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2670 Ontiveros Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: Beckmen is one of Santa Barbara's premier Rhône-style producers, and one of the few wineries that understands how to get Grenache right. This one, which has been blended with a little Syrah is just wonderful. It's not only delicious in fruits and spices, but it's balanced, with superb acidity and a bracing coating of tannin.

properties.title: Verité 2008 La Joie Red (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: Right now this is not typically soft and lush like a cult Cab, but hard in tannins, with minerality like little particles of granite. Buried deep down is a pirate's treasure of ripe, intense blackberry fruit. New oak, to the tune of 94%, doesn't cloud the wine, suggesting this blend's its intensity and concentration. The wine is comprised of all five classic Bordeaux varieties, sourced throughout Sonoma County. Clearly this is one for the cellar; drink after 2018.

properties.title: Efeste 2009 Eléni Syrah (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 19730 144th Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The Eléni Syrah, sourced from old vines at Red Willow Vineyard, may lay claim to being the best of a very fine lineup. It is a densely fruity wine, with concentrated flavors of raspberry liqueur, set upon a foundation of liquid rock. Focused and precise, it is almost crystalline in its resonant elegance.

properties.title: àMaurice 2008 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178 Vineyard Ln, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This “Tobey” Artist Series release is 44% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Cabernet Franc and 26% Merlot. Sweet scents of toast and cherry fruit introduce a wine with exceptional detail and density. Its core of cherry fruit is highlighted with cinnamon and baking spices, and the finishing tannins are polished and precise. The elegance, persistence and sheer finesse of this wine is most impressive.

properties.title: Maison Bleue 2010 La Montagnette Upland Vineyard Grenache (Snipes Mountain)
properties.address: 20 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This lacy, fine-tuned Grenache displays superb aromatics that are still a bit raw. One gets the feeling that as good as the juicy, young grape and berry flavors are, this wine has more complexity lurking below the surface. Berry, mineral and bright spices elevate the finish, much like a youthful Montsant.

properties.title: Marques de Griñon 2005 Emeritus Red (Dominio de Valdepusa)
properties.address: Finca Casa de Vacas Carretera, CM-4015, Km 23, 45692 Malpica de Tajo, Toledo, Spain
properties.descrption: A huge wine that's tannic as nails but so aromatic and flavor packed. Toasted oak, mint, cola, maple, marzipan work the potent nose, while the saturated palate thumps along with massive black-fruit flavors and coffee, fudge and light herb accents. This is one of the most powerful wines from Spain or anywhere. Drink or hold.

properties.title: Fielding Hills 2009 RiverBend Vineyard Tribute Red (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 565 S Lakeshore Rd, Chelan, WA 98816, USA
properties.descrption: This interesting blend consists of 31% Cabernet Franc, 30% Syrah, 20% Merlot and 19% Cabernet Sauvignon. Roasty, toasty aromas explode from the glass, with gorgeous barrel notes of cedar and smoke. Bright raspberry and cherry fruit is set amid generous streaks of caramel, maple syrup and coffee liqueur. High-toned and expressive, it is the most accessible and complete of the 2009 releases from Fielding Hills.

properties.title: Lynmar 2010 Old Vines Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3909 Frei Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: This is a concentrated wine, with intense flavors of cherry and red currant. There's a tug of the earth by way of minerals and dried herbs. It's splendid acidity and firm tannins give it wonderful structure. It's an ager, so it should hold out at least through 2017.

properties.title: Clarendon Hills 2008 Astralis Syrah (Clarendon)
properties.descrption: A step up from the other Syrahs in the 2008 Clarendon Hills' lineup, the Astralis is firmly tannic and should be long-lived. The masses of rich black-cherry fruit are amply framed by cedary oak without ever being overwhelmed, with the fruit persisting on the long finish. Try around 2018.

properties.title: Roadhouse Winery 2012 Black Label Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 240 Center St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Oaky and dense, this wine is sourced from the Nunes Vineyard, a fine site in the heart of the appellation. Raspberry and blueberry jam sway between a juicy midpalate, integrated with the oak and yet toasty, before boasting a vanilla-cherry finish.

properties.title: San Juan Vineyards 2011 Cabernet Franc (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 3136 Roche Harbor Rd, Friday Harbor, WA 98250, USA
properties.descrption: Light in color, this wine offers aromas of dried herbs, fresh flowers and cherry. The style is light and elegant. It doesn't entirely stand up on its own but it should do well at the dinner table.

properties.title: San Juan Vineyards 2011 Merlot (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 3136 Roche Harbor Rd, Friday Harbor, WA 98250, USA
properties.descrption: All of the fruit for this wine hails from Destiny Ridge Vineyard. Though it saw no new oak, the barrel aromas of vanilla and woodspice seem to jut out. The cranberry and raspberry flavors bring appeal however backed by grainy tannins.

properties.title: Sleight of Hand 2013 The Spellbinder Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1959 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Fruit-forward and appealing, this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot displays aromas of black currants, black olive and fresh raspberries along with high-toned herbs. Flavors are sweet and plump with a squeeze of dry tannins.

properties.title: Terra Vina Wines 2012 Tempranillo (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This barrel-forward wine offers aromas of caramel, vanilla, green wood and cocoa along with cherry. The milk chocolate and cherry flavors are sweet and luscious. It could use a bit more structure to hold it all together but it brings plenty of appeal.

properties.title: Tohu 2013 Single Vineyard Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.descrption: This sums up what Marlborough can do well when it comes to Pinot Noir. Bright cherry fruit is a bit simple, but crisp and appealing, lined with toasty oak elements and finishing long and fruity.

properties.title: Viticcio 2011 Beatrice Gran Selezione  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località S. Cresci, 12/a, 50022 Greve in Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with aromas of leather, sage, mature black-skinned fruit and a balsamic note. The palate offers toasted notes, espresso, spiced plum and dried blackberry alongside chewy, drying tannins.

properties.title: VML 2012 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Earthy funk and black tea surround dampened mushrooms, giving this wine a feral quality before a lift of red rhubarb and strawberry pie provide juicy succulence. Cola and vanilla make appearances toward the finish, which builds in intensity of oak.

properties.title: Wagner 2012 Estate Bottled Merlot (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9322 St Rt 414 Winery, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.descrption: Fresh, primary flavors of black cherries and plums are layered delicately with swathes of toast, granite and soil in this keenly balanced Merlot. It's refreshingly moderate in alcohol and the finish is long and persistent, extended by a streak of bristling sour-cherry acidity.

properties.title: Weingut Schneider Tattendorf 2013 St. Laurent (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Badner Str. 3, 2523 Tattendorf, Austria
properties.descrption: There is something meaty about this St. Laurent: The fruit is fleshy and ripe. The palate, while soft and pliable, is also rich and dense. Amidst red cherry fruit, there also is a hint of iron oxide and red meat. Its pliable, fresh structure will make this a versatile companion for earthy dishes.

properties.title: Villa Maria 2012 Private Bin Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: 118 Montgomerie Road, Māngere, Manukau 2022, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Charming, pretty and accessible, this is what many inexpensive New Zealand Pinots aspire to be. Mushroomy, earthy notes add depth to straightforward aromas and flavors of cherry and vanilla, all framed by supple tannins and a mouthwatering finish. Drink now–2017.

properties.title: Graham Beck 2012 The Game Reserve Pinotage (Western Cape)
properties.address: 13303 W Maple St Suite 111, Wichita, KS 67235, USA
properties.descrption: Earthy notes of licorice, bark and bramble are prominent on the nose of this wine, framing the black berry, plum and boysenberry core. The mouthfeel is lush and ripe, with a subtle creaminess that's complemented by notes of baking spice and cocoa powder on the finish. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Domaine A. Machard de Gramont 2012 Clos Blanc Premier Cru  (Pommard)
properties.address: Clos de la Maréchale, 21700 Premeaux-Prissey, France
properties.descrption: Initially there is too much burnt wood flavor in this wine. It's only slowly that the red fruits begin to show, leaving a fresh, if lightweight character before attractive final acidity.

properties.title: Don Miguel Gascón 2012 Reserva Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 1119 Riverdale St, West Springfield, MA 01089, USA
properties.descrption: This creamy, oaky Malbec opens with aromas of rubber and raw oak, although with airing black plum, blackberry and chocolate scents rise up. Full, creamy and jammy in feel, this tastes of black plum, blackberry, chocolate and vanilla. A heady, oaky, sticky finish wraps it up.

properties.title: Fattoria di Lamole 2010 Le Stinche Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.descrption: This opens with unusual aromas of moist soil, hay, truffle, underbrush, baked bean, molasses and black-skinned fruit. The palate offers prune, espresso, dried black cherry, thyme and anisette alongside bracing tannins.

properties.title: Fattoria Mantellassi 2012 San Giuseppe  (Morellino di Scansano)
properties.address: Localita' Banditaccia, 58051 Magliano in Toscana GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of blue flower, dark berry, scorched earth and a whiff of oak spices come together in the glass. The palate offers dried cherry, game, ground pepper, toast and espresso alongside grippy, drying tannins.

properties.title: Fattoria San Felo 2012 Balla La Vecchia Red (Toscana)
properties.address: 58051 Magliano in Toscana GR, Italy
properties.descrption: A 50-50 blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, this opens with aromas of red currant, cooking spice and a lightly toasted note. The sleek, easy palate doles juicy black cherry, crushed raspberry, white pepper and mocha alongside supple tannins and fresh acidity. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Fattoria San Felo 2012  Morellino di Scansano
properties.address: 58051 Magliano in Toscana GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of ripe berry, allspice and blue flower lead the nose. On the palate, notes of white pepper and clove accent a core of juicy black cherry. Firm, fine-grained tannins provide the framework. Drink through 2016.

properties.title: Virage 2012 Barrel Select Red (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: A delightfully elegant wine, the majority of it Merlot, this exudes cassis, pomegranate and cedar. Soft, refined tannins make it a pleasure to enjoy, made from a minuscule single-barrel lot, the grapes sourced from the hillsides of Carneros. It finishes in a refinement of dark milk chocolate.

properties.title: Leonetti Cellar 2012 Reserve Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1278 Berney Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Just over 75% Cabernet Sauvignon with the balance Malbec (10%), Petit Verdot (8%) and Merlot, this wine offers brooding but well-delineated aromas and flavors of blackberry, dried flowers, black tea, herbs, earth, barrel spices and light meaty notes. It's packed tightly with firm tannins and also shows great length. Drink 2022–2028.

properties.title: Ardor 2012 Stoney Vine Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4243 SE Belmont St UNIT 400, Portland, OR 97215, USA
properties.descrption: Fermented 75% whole-cluster and then aged in neutral oak, this wine offers complex, expressive aromas of green olive, fresh herbs, grilled asparagus, earth and peat. The palate brings waves of intensity, with sensuous, layered savory flavors that lead to a hyperextended finish. It's an exclamation point of a wine that shows the promise of this young winery and vineyard.

properties.title: Cadence 2012 Bel Canto Cara Mia Vineyard Red (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 9320 15th Ave S, Seattle, WA 98108, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Franc (84%) takes the lead on this wine with the balance equal parts Merlot and Petit Verdot. It opens with aromas of flowers, dried herbs, earth and mineral. The mouthfeel is dazzling, showing depth and intensity, with enough structure to go the distance.

properties.title: Cantina Bartolo Mascarello 2011  Barolo
properties.address: Visite solo su Appuntamento, Visits by Appointment only, at:, Via Roma, 19, 12060 Barolo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Woodland berry, tilled soil, cake spices and a whiff of game are some of the aromas you'll find on this fragrant, impressive wine. The full-bodied, elegant palate delivers juicy red cherry, black raspberry, clove, chopped herbs and a hint of cured meat alongside a backbone of firm, refined tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2018–2026.

properties.title: Giacomo Fenocchio 2011 Bussia  (Barolo)
properties.address: frazione Bussia Soprana, 72, 12065 Monforte d'Alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of wild berry, underbrush and tobacco lead the nose on this classically crafted Barolo. The full-bodied palate delivers juicy Morello cherry, ripe black raspberry, baking spice and licorice alongside a network of ripe, assertive tannins and firm acidity. Drink 2018–2026.

properties.title: Von Strasser 2012 Reserve Red (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.address: 965 Silverado Trail N, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: Equal parts Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot figure into this wine, along with 20% Malbec, all from the producer's estate. A mix of coconut and cherry-berry cobbler entice aromatically, seasoned in dried herb and black peppercorn. Dry, dusty tannins make their presence felt, the wine all in all tart, generous and lively, finishing in a slow drag of tobacco.

properties.title: Leonetti Cellar 2012 Sangiovese (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: The first vintage to see Aglianico (8%) blended in, this wine brings aromas and flavors of leather, sour cherry, earth and flowers. Seeing only neutral puncheons and oval botti, it's fresh and focused, coating the palate with textured fruit flavors brightened by tart acids and backed by firm tannins. It's both appealing and serious.

properties.title: Michael David 2013 Ancient Vine Cinsault (Lodi)
properties.address: 4580 CA-12, Lodi, CA 95242, USA
properties.descrption: Polished, elegant and supple, this offers upfront aromas of plum, strawberry and red cherry. The flavors are pure and fruity, but nicely complex, bringing in light nuances of vanilla, clove and cinnamon to top the cherry and berry freshness. Made from one of the state's oldest Cinsault plantings, this is supremely smooth and sophisticated.

properties.title: Rasa 2012 Creative Impulse DuBrul Vineyard Red (Yakima Valley)
properties.descrption: Aromas of sage, espresso and green, savory herbs are at the fore on this lightly colored blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, with the fruit notes in the background. The coffee and cherry flavors are elegant yet rich, with an outrageously long, expressive finish. It's all about subtlety, refinement and detail with plenty of each but needing some time for them all to meld together.

properties.title: Rasa 2012 Principia Reserve Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4122 Powerline Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Not yet fully open, this blend of Les Collines and Seven Hills vineyard fruit has high-toned aromas of violets, sage, toffee and black plums. The feel is supple, showing depth and detail to the dark fruit flavors along with exceptional length. It's all about subtlety and elegance.

properties.title: Spring Valley Vineyard 2012 Uriah Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2 E Rose St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Merlot and Cabernet Franc make up the majority of this wine, along with pinches of Petit Verdot and Malbec. It commands attention with aromas of flowers, herbs, freshly tilled soil, cherry, coffee and bittersweet chocolate. The palate is outrageously textured with a hypnotic mouthfeel and a finish that sails into the distance. Far from a blockbuster style, it's all about elegance and detail.

properties.title: Tenet 2013 G-S-M (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: A blend of 40% Grenache, 35% Syrah and 25% Mourvèdre, all aged in neutral oak, this wine impresses with alluring aromas of ripe strawberry, clove, blueberry, coffee and spice. Flavors are rich and palate-coating while displaying balance and finesse, with a finish that lingers.

properties.title: Baer 2012 Callisto Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This wine is half Cabernet Sauvignon and 40% Syrah, finished off with Petit Verdot. The aromas and flavors of dried herbs, blackberry, tar and fresh flowers show multiple layers, with the palate displaying density and richness. It needs time to be at its best but will be worth the wait. Drink 2020–2027.

properties.title: Brezza 2011 Sarmassa  (Barolo)
properties.descrption: Fragrant and structured, this opens with aromas of wild berry, menthol, leather, tilled soil and aromatic herbs. The palate doles out wild cherry, fleshy black raspberry, cinnamon, white pepper and anise. Bracing tannins and racy acidity give it an ageworthy structure, but don't attempt this until after 2020.

properties.title: Bucher 2013 Three Sixty Bucher Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 5293 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: From the producer's estate vineyard, adjacent to a successful dairy farm it also runs, this tiny offering comes from four specific blocks across the property, and is a seductive, juicy, well-composed wine. Lush and oaky, it conveys a density of forest floor, complemented by raspberry and strawberry, before finishing robustly in spice and mushroom.

properties.title: Cadence 2012 Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Red (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 9320 15th Ave S, Seattle, WA 98108, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon each take up 38% of this blend, with the rest equal parts Merlot and Petit Verdot. It captivates with aromas of black licorice, purple flowers, earth and herbs. The style is reserved, more focused on acid and tannin structure, but it still shows layers of textured fruit flavors. It will be best 2020–2030.

properties.title: Cambiata 2013 Dornfelder (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 19 E Carmel Valley Rd, Carmel Valley, CA 93924, USA
properties.descrption: An incredibly dark wine by veteran winemaker Eric Laumann, this rarely tapped varietal offers lush and deep aromas of blackberry pie, black currant syrup, licorice soda and mint-chip ice cream. Velvety, tongue-tingling and extremely lengthy on the palate, it shows almost port-like flavors of milk chocolate, blueberry juice, peppery mint, cherry liqueur-filled chocolate and ripe raspberry-cranberry juice.

properties.title: Cascina Chicco 2011 Rocche di Castelletto  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Valentino, n. 14, 12043 Canale CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Firmly structured, this opens with aromas of white truffle, forest floor, baking spice and red berry aromas accented with a whiff of sage and rosemary. On the palate, notes of white pepper, grilled herbs and tobacco accent the black cherry core while a backbone of assertive but refined tannins provide the framework.

properties.title: Prosper 2014 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 5560 Oak Bend Trail, Prosper, TX 75078, USA
properties.descrption: This brushy, foresty wine offers big, ripe blackberry and cherry flavor around a smoky core of oak.

properties.title: Pull 2012 Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Light dried herbs, cigar box and cranberry aromas arise on the nose of this bottling from the Broken Earth team. It's zesty on the sip, with raspberry and cooked red-plum flavors that are spiced up by pepper and more dried herbs. It's a tad thin.

properties.title: Wolff 2014 Red Wolff Red (Central Coast)
properties.descrption: Red cherry, brick, dust and dried-earth aromas arise from this blend of 30% Merlot, 24% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Syrah, 15% Grenache and 11% Nebbiolo from San Luis Obispo and Santa Barbara counties. Forest-floor flavors of pine needle and turned earth show on the palate, along with light cranberry and cherry fruit.

properties.title: Basile 2011 Ad Agio Riserva  (Montecucco)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale, Cinigianese, 58044 Cinigiano GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 100% Sangiovese, this offers aromas of dark-skinned berry, exotic spice and French oak. The firm palate displays dried red cherry, tobacco and toasted oak but it doesn't have quite enough fruit richness to balance the evident wood sensations.

properties.title: Finca Patagonia 2015 Expedicion Syrah (Maule Valley)
properties.address: RN22, Río Negro, Argentina
properties.descrption: Bright but basic plum, spice and leather aromas are uncomplicated. This feels grabby and rugged, with chewy tannins. Leafy red-fruit flavors offer a jammy side note, while this finishes with dry, scouring tannins.

properties.title: Marimar Estate 2013 Mas Cavalls Doña Margarita Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 11400 Graton Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: This is an estate-grown wine from a vineyard planted to three clones. It has an air of forested truffle, pine and cinnamon within a stemmy and somewhat unresolved body of medium weight.

properties.title: Marrenon 2014 Orca Vieilles Vignes Grenache (Ventoux)
properties.address: Boulevard Saint-Roch, 84240 La Tour-d'Aigues, France
properties.descrption: This high-end bottling features fruit from 90+-year-old vines, aged for 12 months in oak. It's medium to full in body, with supple tannins and crisp acids. Notes of barrel char and cherries finish dry, with a rustic edge.

properties.title: Podere Ciona 2014 Montegrossoli Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Loc. Montegrossi, 17, 53013 Gaiole In Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 88% Sangiovese, 10% Merlot and 2% Alicante, this opens with whiffs of violet and tilled earth. The simple palate offers red cherry and clove alongside soft tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Rhiannon 2014 Red (California)
properties.address: 1680 Silverado Trail S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas like maple syrup and fresh-cut oak sawdust set the stage for a powerfully oaky, smoky, spicy flavor and finish for this full-bodied, firm-textured wine. It's very dramatic and extreme in style, so some drinkers will love it and others will find it over the top.

properties.title: St. Supéry 2013 Dollarhide Estate Vineyard Merlot (Rutherford)
properties.address: 8440 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Thick, rich and woody, this herbal, estate-grown red shows a wealth of baked-plum flavor laced in vanilla, with richness bursting on the finish.

properties.title: Stolen Identity 2014 Red (California)
properties.descrption: This deeply colored, full-bodied wine adds chocolaty richness to ripe plum and blackberry flavors, backed with light tannins that counter a bit of sweetness.

properties.title: Terre di Talamo 2013 Tempo  (Morellino di Scansano)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale S. Donato, 58051 Magliano in Toscana GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a simple red with subdued aromas of red berry and a whiff of forest floor. The lean slightly diluted palate shows dried black cherry and a hint anise alongside soft, rather fleeting tannins. Drink now.

properties.title: Valentini 2013 Atunis Merlot (Toscana)
properties.address: 31 W Lake St, Chisholm, MN 55719, USA
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Merlot, this has a shy nose that tries to hide suggestions of plum and bell pepper. The straightforward palate provides plum with hints of vanilla and clove alongside grainy tannins.

properties.title: Luiano 2015 Rossoassai Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Via di Luiano, 32, 50026 San Casciano in Val di pesa FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Sangiovese, this opens with delicate aromas of violet and baking spice. The simple easy-drinking palate offers wild cherry and chopped herb alongside round tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Oveja Negra 2012 Single Vineyard Carmenère (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Av. Diego Portales 2372, Arica, Arica y Parinacota, Chile
properties.descrption: Spiced plum, vanilla and sandalwood aromas add up to something nice. This feels good enough, with nothing demanding about the palate. Spicy berry and olive flavors are typical of the variety, while this feels dry and tastes a bit woody on the finish.

properties.title: 3 Horse Ranch Vineyards 2014 Single Vineyard Sangiovese
properties.address: 5900 Pearl Rd, Eagle, ID 83616, USA
properties.descrption: This wine offers aromas of wild berry, flowers, barrel notes and spice. The palate is lighter styled, backed by chalky tannins. The variety seems somewhat hard to find.

properties.title: Agrisole 2013 Colorino (Toscana)
properties.address: Via Serra, 64, 56028 San Miniato PI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Colorino, the restrained nose eventually reveals red berry and scorched earth. The simple palate delivers blackberry and white pepper alongside somewhat fleeting tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Caparzo 2014 Sangiovese Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale del Brunello, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 85% Sangiovese, 5% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot and 5% Alicante, this easygoing wine opens with aromas of blackberry and a hint of graphite. The simple fruity palate delivers red plum and a hint of cedar alongside smooth tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Bodegas Riojanas 2008 Viña Albina Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Don Ricardo Ruiz de Azcárraga, 1, 26350 Cenicero, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy mature plum and berry aromas are quite solid. This feels tight and a little abrasive, but smooth enough to rank high. Spicy dry peppery berry flavors finish with lasting cherry and plum notes on a long balanced finish. Drink through 2025.

properties.title: Château des Bachelards 2014 Le Bérac Gamay
properties.descrption: From biodynamically grown grapes, this is a concentrated wine with mint and spice flavors as well as tight red fruits. It comes from vines situated in the Moulin-à-Vent appellation, giving the typical mineral character from the granite soil as well as the structure. The wine will be ready to drink from 2017.

properties.title: Darioush 2013 Shiraz (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4240 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This burly, robust wine is smoky in oak, with a twist of cedar and sage. The tannins are sizable and soft, providing weight and structured body, while the fruit remains elusive behind dried herb and cracked black pepper.

properties.title: Edmeades 2013 Perli Vineyards Zinfandel (Mendocino Ridge)
properties.address: 18700 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Concentrated, bright and focused fruit flavors feel shaped by a moderate oak influence in this full-bodied and nicely structured wine. A good amount of tannin wraps the raspberry and blackberry flavors in a firm texture.

properties.title: Four Vines 2014 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 7300 N River Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This beautiful wine has aromas as ripe as dried figs, flavors as deep as blackberries falling off the vine, and a welcoming, broad texture that begs for another sip. While full bodied, it's easy to relax into.

properties.title: Brian Benson 2013 S&M James Berry Vineyard Syrah-Mourvèdre (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: From one of the region's more renowned vineyards, this blend of 75% Syrah and 25% Mourvèdre takes a extra time to open up, so decanting is recommended. But once it does, black plum and dried purple flowers arise on the nose, and then a strong tannic structure slowly reveals flavors of pepper and boysenberry on the palate.

properties.title: Angel Vine 2012 Alder Ridge Vineyard Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 8749 NW Marshall St, Portland, OR 97229, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from the Horse Heaven Hills region, this wine offers appealing aromas of cranberry, raspberry fruit leather, red currant and spice—all displaying a fine sense of purity. The tart fruit flavors are broad and generous but stay in balance.

properties.title: Atalayas de Golbán 2012 Torre de Golbán Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: N-330, 97, 02640 Almansa, Albacete, Spain
properties.descrption: Smooth heady aromas of black fruits touched up by oaky vanilla and tobacco are a draw. In the mouth, this is chunky and defined by thick abrasive tannins. Ripe blackberry, coffee and chocolate flavors finish with leftover oak that rests atop residual black-fruit flavors. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Basel Cellars 2012 Estate Merriment Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2901 Old Milton Hwy, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot make up three-quarters of this blend. Subtle aromas of baking spice, vanilla and cherry lead to tart well-proportioned pit-fruit flavors. It shows a fine sense of balance.

properties.title: Larchago 2008 Izarbe Reserva Selección  (Rioja)
properties.address: La Poveda Hiribidea, 36, 01306 Lapuebla de Labarca, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: High-grade oaky aromas of vanilla and baking spices mix with modest mature berry fruit and animal notes on the nose of this dense tannic mature Rioja. Oaky flavors of sawdust and wood resin share space on the palate with spicy dried cherry and plum. Drink through 2024.

properties.title: Cadence 2013 Bel Canto Cara Mia Vineyard Red (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 9320 15th Ave S, Seattle, WA 98108, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Franc makes up two-thirds of this wine with the rest Merlot. It dazzles with aromas of flowers, red fruit and mineral that are followed by generous amounts of dark fruit along with cranberry-like acidity.

properties.title: Domaine Chevillon-Chezeaux 2014 Les Porêts Premier Cru  (Nuits-St.-Georges)
properties.address: 41 Rue Henri de Bahezre, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: At the southern end of Nuits Saint-Georges, this vineyard produces a ripe and full style of wine. This wine has those characters along with the tannins and the acidity of the vintage to produced a juicy wine that will age well. The aftertaste keeps that crunchy, crisp character. Drink it from 2019.

properties.title: Domaine de Bellene 2014 Vieilles Vignes  (Nuits-St.-Georges)
properties.descrption: Produced from 65-year-old vines, this is a rich and perfumed wine from the estate of Nicolas Potel. It is structured, balancing the red fruits and acidity with a solid framework of tannins. Spice from the wood aging shows lightly, while the wine finishes with crisp red-currant acidity.

properties.title: Domaine d'Alzipratu 2014 Pumonte Red
properties.address: Domaine d'Alzipratu, 20214 Zilia, France
properties.descrption: This wood-aged wine is ripe with black fruits and dense with dark tannins. It has a warm feel to its structure, developing into a concentrated, black-plum-flavored wine backed by toast and firm tannins. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: El Enemigo 2013 Gran Enemigo Cabernet Franc-Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Videla Aranda 7008, M5519 Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Chunky, earthy aromas of balsam wood, finely aged balsamic vinegar and stewed blackberry yield to a tight drawing palate with hard tannins. This tastes meaty, roasted and more aggressive than El Enemigo's lower-elevation 2013s. A finish with salty toasty oaky notes, big tannins and blazing acidity closes the show. This is Cab Franc with 15% Malbec. Drink through 2023.

properties.title: Monte del Frà 2011 Lena di Mezzo Scarnocchio  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.descrption: Aromas suggesting resin, mature plum, forest floor, exotic spice, leather and black currant emerge on this solidly structured red. The firm palate offers espresso, raisin, cherry marinated in spirits, fig, licorice and chewing tobacco alongside firm, close-grained tannins that clutch the finish.

properties.title: Reininger 2012 Mr. Owl's Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 5858 Old Hwy 12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is a unique blend of Malbec (60%), Syrah (20%), Merlot (15%) and Petit Verdot. It opens with brooding but alluring aromas of dark plum, asphalt, and a kiss of baking spice. The flavors are full bodied and palate coating, showing weight but also a sense of suppleness that charms the senses.

properties.title: Tedeschi 2010 Capitel Monte Olmi Riserva  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.descrption: You'll discover aromas of leafy underbrush, grilled herb, raisin, new leather and a whiff of blue flower on this bold red. The syrupy concentrated palate doles out raspberry jam, stewed prune, anise and nutmeg framed in big chewy tannins. A confectionery note closes the finish.

properties.title: Tenuta Santa Maria alla Pieve 2010  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.address: Tenuta Santa Maria di Gaetano Bertani - Winery & Wine Shop, Via Novare 4 - Località Novare, Arbizzano di, 37024 Negrar VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Pressed rose, violet, forest floor, baked plum and cake spice aromas emerge on this full-bodied red. The concentrated palate also has finesse, offering dried cherry, licorice, cinnamon and pipe tobacco framed in fresh acidity and a backbone of firm but refined tannins. Drink 2017–2025.

properties.title: Vignerons de Buxy 2014 Clos Jus Premier Cru  (Givry)
properties.address: 4-6 Rte de Chalon, 71390 Buxy, France
properties.descrption: This is bright and fruity wine that has a smoky character as well as brilliant black fruits and acidity. Aromatic and concentrated, the wine is still developing, still with considerable acidity. That will broaden out as the wine matures to give a rich, always lively wine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Yering Station 2010 Reserve Pinot Noir (Yarra Valley)
properties.descrption: Like all of the Yering Station Reserves, this one shows a healthy whack of new oak, but there's plenty of ripe cherry fruit to support the vanilla and cedar nuances. It's medium bodied, plump yet suave, with a long finish that echoes vanilla and spice. Drink now–2019.

properties.title: Finca Albret 2008 Juan de Albret Crianza Red (Navarra)
properties.address: 31515 Cadreita, Navarre, Spain
properties.descrption: Gets rolling with a blitz of dark berry, cedar, bramble and graphite aromas. It feels punchy for being a dark-style red, with meaty black-fruit flavors. On the palate, it turns juicier and more rugged as the acidity steps up, ultimately finishing thick but catchy, with peppery spice. A blend of Tempranillo, Cabernet and Merlot.

properties.title: Marques de Griñon 2005 Summa Varietalis Estate Bottled Syrah+Cabernet Sauvignon+Petit Verdot Red (Dominio de Valdepusa)
properties.address: Finca Casa de Vacas Carretera, CM-4015, Km 23, 45692 Malpica de Tajo, Toledo, Spain
properties.descrption: Woodsy and smooth smelling, with integrated spice and black-fruit aromas. It feels like a padded vise grip, with demanding tannins and blackberry, toast and coffee flavors that narrow down due to tannic astringency. Incredibly flavorful and potent; drink or hold.

properties.title: Pepper Bridge 2009 Merlot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1704 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Spicy, peppery and still a bit sharp, this Merlot-dominated blend includes fruit from both estate vineyards—Seven Hills and Pepper Bridge. It shows the seamless polish that marks all of Jean-François Pellet's wines. The finish is focused and long, with delicious highlights of cinnamon and dark chocolate.

properties.title: Cumbre of Vine Hill 2008 Hicks Family Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 7353 St Helena Hwy, Spanish Flat, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Big, rich and fruity, with fantastically ripe cherry and Dr. Pepper flavors that are elevated by a note of sweet sandalwood, and brightened with crisp acidity. Impresses for sheer power, as well as the long, spicy finish. This is too young to drink now; it needs 5–6 years to mellow.

properties.title: Ridge 2010 Benito Dusi Ranch Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 650 Lytton Springs Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A first-class Zinfandel, showing the variety's briary, brambly personality. The flavors are of ripe wild summer berries, cola, pine extract, black pepper and cinnamon, wrapped into firm tannins and finishing sweet and long.

properties.title: Saviah 2008 Petite Verdot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Saviah makes one of the better varietal Petit Verdots in Washington. This is full bodied, with black fruits and excellent concentration. It's highlighted with suggestions of mint and vanilla, from 21 months in 100% new French oak barrels.

properties.title: Titus 2009 Cabernet Franc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2971 Silverado Trail N, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: One of the lusher, more delicious Cab Francs out there. It's enormous in baked cherry pie flavors, with the spicy, smoky crust, and a little heat from alcohol. Drink this generous wine while it's still fresh and young.

properties.title: Josef Weger 2007 Maso delle Rose Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
properties.descrption: A bright and elegant red wine with a crisp, silky mouthfeel. The bouquet is redolent of wild berry, white almond, chopped mint and spice. This should pair with honey roasted ham or wild turkey.

properties.title: MacMurray Ranch 2009 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: A proper, textbook Pinot Noir—it's dry, nicely crisp, with smoothly astringent tannins. It has pleasant, complex cherry, pomegranate, plum, tobacco, bacon and sandalwood flavors. Not an ager, so drink up with upscale fare.

properties.title: Marchese Carlo Guerrieri Gonzaga 2007 Terre di San Leonardo Red (Vigneti delle Dolomiti)
properties.address: Località San Leonardo, 1, 38063 Avio TN, Italy
properties.descrption: This is a delicate and refined Bordeaux-style blend, with aromas of white cherry, wild berry, rosemary crushed stone and licorice. The finish is crisp and bright.

properties.title: Pala 2007 S'arai Red (Isola dei Nuraghi)
properties.address: Via Giuseppe Verdi, 7, 09040 Serdiana CA, Italy
properties.descrption: This blend of Cannonau, Carignano and Bovale opens with bright, intense fruit, with notes of blackberry, crème de cassis and pomegranate juice. The mouthfeel is firm and structured.

properties.title: Val de Los Frailes 2004 Pago de las Costanas Tempranillo (Cigales)
properties.address: Ctra de Cubillas de Santa Marta s/n, 47290 Cubillas de Santa Marta, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Sweet and toasty, with overt oak, sarsparilla, raisin and coconut aromas. It feels supersaturated, with monster tannins. Flavors of black coffee, chocolate, spice, pepper and licorice are rich and deep, while the finish is chewy, meaty and long. Drink now.

properties.title: Gunter Triebaumer 2009 Reserve Blaufränkisch (Burgenland)
properties.address: Neuegasse 18, 7071 Rust, Austria
