properties.descrption: Properly rustic, this has firm and dry tannins, a powerful structure to go with the wood aging and black plum flavor. It has pepper, spice and toast notes, with layers of acidity. The finish is very dry and firm. Screwcap.

properties.title: Hogue 2009 Genesis Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2800 Lee Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: Well made and muscular, this compact effort brings black fruit, black olive, black licorice and espresso flavors together in a balanced and strikingly complex Syrah. The blend includes small amounts of Cabernet, Lemberger, Sangiovese and Merlot—unusual, but it works.

properties.title: One Hope 2009 Reserve Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.descrption: A little heavy for Pinot Noir. Almost like Grenache, with deliciously sweet, full-bodied flavors of cherry compote and raspberry tart, sprinkled with powdered sugar and cinnamon. Give it a good decant and drink now.

properties.title: Pessagno 2009 Central Avenue Vineyard Pinot Noir (Monterey)
properties.address: 1645 River Rd, Salinas, CA 93908, USA
properties.descrption: A nice Pinot Noir to drink now. It's bone dry and somewhat austere, showing only modest cherry, pomegranate and cola flavors that are marked by rich tannins and zesty acidity. But it's very elegant.

properties.title: Tenuta San Giorgio 2010 Ciampoleto  (Rosso di Montalcino)
properties.address: Localita' Pod. S. Giorgio, Castelnuovo Dell'abate, Si 53024, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a lovely Rosso and a rare value wine from one of Tuscany's most prestigious wine-growing areas. Ciampoleto offers bright berry nuances, light shadings of exotic spice and a fresh, zesty finish.

properties.title: Tormentoso 2009 Mourvèdre (Paarl)
properties.descrption: Fleshy black-plum, cherry and blackberry notes lead this medium-weight wine, with a light dusting of cocoa powder. Dark but vibrant in the mouth, with a good amount of pepper and licorice on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Fattoi 2010  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Localita' Capanna, 101, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This hearty Rosso opens with spicy aromas of candied fruit, clove, dark spice and cured meat. The wine has a warm, earthy note that is characteristic of Tuscany's Sangiovese. The mouthfeel is tart, bright and fresh on the finish.

properties.title: Altocedro 2011 Año Cero Malbec (La Consulta)
properties.address: Ejercito de Los Andes y, Arturo Tregea 1, La Consulta, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Concentrated aromas of blackberry come with leather and dried-cheese scents. The palate is full in depth and solid in feel, with flavors of creamy oak, medicinality and blackberry. Feels rich, grabby and tastes resiny on the finish, but there's enough solid black fruit to override the oak.

properties.title: Black Box 2009 Shiraz (California)
properties.descrption: Robust, peppery, dry and fruity, just what an inexpensive Shiraz should be. Easy to like for its array of blackberries, spices and cedar. A great value in a barbecue-style wine.

properties.title: Buccia Nera 2007 Amadio Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Loc. Campriano, 9, 52100 Arezzo AR, Italy
properties.descrption: This blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot opens with earthy aromas of leather, tobacco and button mushroom, followed by fresh cherry. Crisp acidity makes this a good wine to pair with cheesy risotto or pork.

properties.title: Camigliano 2010  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.descrption: A crisp, streamlined expression of Sangiovese Grosso that opens with lively aromas of wild berry, white pepper and pressed rose. Pair this wine with sweet meats, such as roasted ham or pork.

properties.title: Casato1 2009 Voliero  (Rosso di Montalcino)
properties.descrption: Simple, bright and packed with fresh berry intensity, this easygoing Rosso would pair well with meatloaf, lamp chops or pasta with meat sauce. The wine's naturally crisp acidity will cut through the fat content of these succulent foods.

properties.title: Casato1 2010 Voliero  (Rosso di Montalcino)
properties.address: Località Casato, 17, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Pair this food-friendly bright Rosso with meatloaf or pork roasted with chopped fennel and leeks. The wine opens with easy berry aromas backed by blue flower and spice, and there's a blast of cleansing acidity on the close.

properties.title: Château Tanunda 2008 Noble Baron Shiraz (Barossa)
properties.address: Château Tanunda, 9 Basedow Rd, Tanunda SA 5352, Australia
properties.descrption: Already showing a bit of bricking, this is a full-bodied Shiraz that's a bit coarse in texture, with aromas and flavors of plum and brown sugar. The finish matches tart, zingy fruit with sweet, molasses-tinged oak. The individual components show promise, but it's tough to say if they will all come together in time.

properties.title: Lamadrid 2010 Single Vineyard Malbec (Agrelo)
properties.descrption: Dense and inky on the bouquet, with blueberry as the core fruit aroma and some grass or alfalfa around the edges. Feels blocky and tannic, with sweet, roasted flavors of black fruits that come with a peppery aftertaste. Full on the finish, with coconut and oaky accents.

properties.title: Leese-Fitch 2009 Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 633 W Main St, Charlottesville, VA 22903, USA
properties.descrption: A little on the soft side, with candied raspberry, cherry and cola flavors, but at this price, it's a decent starter Pinot Noir for those who are curious about this red-hot variety but don't want to spend a bundle. Enjoy the silkiness and spice.

properties.title: Leopard's Leap 2009 Pinotage-Shiraz Red (Western Cape)
properties.address: R45 Main Rd, Franschhoek, 7690, South Africa
properties.descrption: A funky edge frames this wine, both on the nose and in the mouth, and adds character to the otherwise straightforward blackberry, boysenberry and fig-preserve core. Cured meat and sweet spice grace the palate and persist through the medium-length close. The blend is 52% Pinotage and 48% Shiraz.

properties.title: Tempus Alba 2007 Tempranillo (Mendoza)
properties.address: BPS, Moreno 572, M5504 Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Cheesy and way too earthy and murky to be rewarded with anything higher than an acceptable rating. The feel is scratchy and raw, while the flavors seem roasted, overly earthy and dry.

properties.title: Venteux 2007 Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 1795 Las Tablas Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.descrption: Too much unripeness in this wine, which shows aromas of asparagus and broccoli. Tastes somewhat better than it smells, with blackberry and black cherry notes.

properties.title: Finca Agostino 2007 Malbec-Syrah (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: Heat and horseradish define the sharp, peppery bouquet. The palate is tannic and grabby, with leafy red-fruit flavors and an added dose of herbs and pepper. Finishes medicinal and peppery. At this price it isn't shining.

properties.title: Tamburlaine 2008 Wine Lovers Malbec (Orange)
properties.address: 358 McDonalds Rd, Pokolbin NSW 2320, Australia
properties.descrption: Light to medium in body and rather tart, with leather and dried cherry notes that are submerged under an excessively medicinal character.

properties.title: Bodegas Navarro López 2009 Rojo Granrojo Tempranillo (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
properties.address: Autovía A-4, km. 193, 13300, 13300, Cdad. Real, Spain
properties.descrption: Burnt rubber and a certain stemmy, roasted character is draped over the nose and palate. It has a decent, normal feel to it but the flavors of strawberry and raspberry are herbal and burnt. Tastes and smells rubbery and not fully clean.

properties.title: Muscardini 2008 Monte Rosso Vineyard Sangiovese (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 9380 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: An awkward wine, high in acidity and sugary sweet in candied cherry and raspberry flavors that veer into Port. Tasty, but rustic. Ready now.

properties.title: Pomar Junction 2008 Pomar Junction Vineyard Zinfandel (Monterey)
properties.descrption: Simple and sweet, with raspberry, cherry and mint candy flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Curtis 2007 Grenache (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: A difficult wine to like. It's not quite ripe, giving a vegetal edge to the modest cherry flavors, and is cuttingly sharp in acids.

properties.title: Pomar Junction 2007 Brooster Fighting Red Red (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Simple and a little vegetal, with asparagus and raspberry flavors.

properties.title: Ursa 2006 Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5001 Dollhouse Rd, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: Soft, sweet and gluey. A hard wine to like despite rich raspberry and mocha flavors.

properties.title: Butterfield Station 2009 Merlot (California)
properties.address: 36229 US-12, Dayton, WA 99328, USA
properties.descrption: Raw and harsh in green tannins, with bubblegum and raspberry sour candy flavors.

properties.title: Oddero 2014 Gallina  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Frazione S. Maria, 28, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This wine's herb, clove, coconut, leather and camphor aromas slowly take shape. The palate is rather raw, offering unripe sour cherry, cranberry, vanilla, espresso and star anise flavors framed by tight, grainy tannins that leave a raspy finish.

properties.title: One 2015 Flock Red (California)
properties.address: 526 E Woodin Ave, Chelan, WA 98816, USA
properties.descrption: A rich mouthfeel and considerable sweetness come with oaky spicy aromas and jammy fruit flavors in this full-bodied and rather tannic wine that was blended from mostly Zinfandel and Cabernet Sauvignon.

properties.title: Pendulum 2015 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1604 Frenchtown Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Petit Verdot (28%), Malbec (27%), Syrah (20%), Cabernet Sauvignon (16%) and Merlot (9%) leads with wild blueberry, crushed flower, herb, vanilla and spice aromas. Soft, elegant blueberry flavors follow, persisting on the finish. Light on the midpalate, it still brings appeal.

properties.title: Pico Maccario 2015 Tre Roveri  (Barbera d'Asti)
properties.address: Via Cordara, 87, 14046 Mombaruzzo AT, Italy
properties.descrption: This wine's baking spice, vanilla and black-skinned berry aromas drift out of the glass. The straightforward palate offers mature black cherry, clove and tobacco flavors while rounded tannins lend easygoing support. Drink soon.

properties.title: Sassi San Cristoforo 2012 Riserva  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: via Pastura, 10, 12052 Neive CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Oak-driven spice, camphor and coconut aromas lead the nose of this wine. Tight, bracing and lacking fruit richness, it shows instead roasted coffee bean, toasted oak, dried cherry and vanilla notes. Astringent, grainy tannins leave a raspy finish.

properties.title: Shenandoah Vineyards 2015 Special Reserve Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.address: 3659 S Ox Rd, Edinburg, VA 22824, USA
properties.descrption: This is a great value for a wine from the celebrated Amador region. Aromas like strawberry jam and brown sugar lead to very ripe and fruity flavors in this full-bodied but lively wine. It's fun to sip and doesn't try for a serious profile or heavy texture.

properties.title: Socré 2013 Roncaglie  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Strada Riccardo Terzolo, 7, 12050 Tre Stelle CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with French oak, exotic spice, coconut and toast aromas. They follow through to the palate, which offers coffee bean and sage notes in place of fruit richness. Grainy tannins leave a raspy finish.

properties.title: Stottle 2013 6 Prong Vineyard Tempranillo (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 2641 Willamette Dr NE ste e, Lacey, WA 98516, USA
properties.descrption: Burnt coffee, vanilla bean, green wood and tobacco aromas are followed by medium-bodied fruit and barrel flavors in this wine. It's enjoyable despite the intense oak influence.

properties.title: Ampelos 2015 Ampelos Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 312 N 9th St, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Light in color and body, this restrained, classically styled red is tart in fruit character and acidity, with a thickness of concentration that surprises. A hint of reductive oak meanders through.

properties.title: Antale 2015  Barbera d'Asti
properties.address: Via Europa Unita, 13, 22072 Cermenate CO, Italy
properties.descrption: Violet, baking spice and dark berry aromas lead the nose of this zesty, straightforward wine. The palate offers dried cherry, black currant and clove flavors framed by rounded tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Cà Bianca 2014 Antè  (Barbera d'Asti Superiore)
properties.address: 835 2nd St, Santa Rosa, CA 95404, USA
properties.descrption: This has black-skinned berry, forest floor and toast scents. The easygoing palate delivers tart cherry, vanilla and clove flavors alongside smooth tannins. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Poderi Elia 2012 Serracapelli  (Barbaresco)
properties.descrption: Prune, leather, oak and balsamic aromas lead the nose of this wine. The palate shows oak, vanilla, coconut and fig flavors alongside close-grained tannins. The fruit is already starting to dry out so drink soon.

properties.title: Prinsi 2014 Gallina  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Via Gaia, 5, 12052 Neive CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Woodshop, camphor and oak-driven spice aromas lead the nose of this wine. The oak sensations carry over to the bracing palate, along with raw cherry, licorice and confectionary notes. Astringent tannins and firm acidity provide an assertive framework, leaving little room for fruit richness.

properties.title: Scagliola 2014 Sansi Frem  (Barbera d'Asti Superiore)
properties.descrption: This leads with vanilla, ripe black-skinned berry and baking spice aromas. The firm palate delivers tobacco, licorice and black cherry jam flavors alongside chewy tannins. It finishes on an astringent note. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Bodegas Palacio 2007 Glorioso Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Dry and spicy, with a note of bacon to go with red berry fruit and leathery aromas. The palate is voluminous and round, with smooth tannins, balanced acids and nice flavors of roasted berry and dry plum. Finishes dry, elegant and with tea-like flavors. A wine to enjoy; good value for Rioja.

properties.title: Finca Allende 2007  Rioja
properties.descrption: Big and dark, with deep aromas of turned earth and roasted black fruits. The palate has a soft, meaty feel along with sweet, semi-soupy flavors of rooty berry, tea, spice and herbs. Finishes with more oak than fruit, but also lush and sweet. Drink now through 2012.

properties.title: Perception 2008 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6514 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.descrption: This is a very delicious Pinot, made in a drink-me-now style. It's dry and crisp and silky, and enormously rich in raspberry, cherry and strawberry jam flavors. The texture is pure silk and satin. Drink now for sheer lusciousness.

properties.title: Hungerford Hill 2009 Fishcage Shiraz (New South Wales)
properties.address: 2450 Broke Rd, Pokolbin NSW 2320, Australia
properties.descrption: Hungerford Hill's vast array of wines includes this savory Shiraz, which features ample leather, tar, black olive and coffee flavors. It's fleshy and supple on the palate, with softly lingering tannins on the finish. Drink now–2017.

properties.title: Polkura 2008 Malbec (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Marchigüe, Marchihue, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Very sweet and lush on the nose, and teetering on overripe due to prune and raisin aromas. The palate, meanwhile, is more narrow than you might expect, with big tannins and extract. Tastes of black plum, blackberry and herbal notes. A ripe, loud wine that's a little clumsy but definitely big and fruity. 200 cases made.

properties.title: Roessler 2009 Gap's Crown Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 654 Broadway, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Roessler produces lots of single-vineyard wines, but this has not been one of their best ones. It's a good wine, not without interest, with plenty of compact cherry, raspberry and sandalwood flavors. But it's very acidic. Decant it for hours.

properties.title: Sequana 2009 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Doesn't show quite the rich complexity of Sequana's single-vineyard Pinots, but a fine wine nonetheless. Dry, tannic and crisp in acidity, it has berry, currant and spice flavors with a nice earthiness.

properties.title: Dynasty Cellars 2007 DC3 Meritage (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2169 E Bakerview Rd, Bellingham, WA 98226, USA
properties.descrption: A chocolaty, fragrant wine —74% Merlot, 15% Cab Franc, 6% Malbec, 5% Petit Verdot—with interesting spice highlights throughout the nose and mouth. The fruit is a mix of Bing cherry and strawberry, washed in a lush barrel-induced mix of chocolate, mocha, espresso and clove. Finishes a little hot, with alcohol listed at 14.6%.

properties.title: William Knuttel 2007 Clone 777 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 21684 8th St E #600, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: A textbook Pinot Noir for drinking now. Showing the variety's lighter side, it's savory in raspberry, cola and spice flavors, brightened with brisk acidity. Yet there's enough complexity to make it interesting.

properties.title: Abadía da Cova 2008 Barrica Mencía (Ribeira Sacra)
properties.address: Lugar, 63, 27548 Cuñas, Lugo, Spain
properties.descrption: Smoky, rubbery and suggestive of bacon and toast on the nose. The palate is more crisp and snappy, with juicy flavors of red currant, cherry and spice. Acidity throughout yields a lemony finish, but it's also chiseled and tight, which should please traditionalists who like their acidic bite.

properties.title: Avide 2005 Sigillo Red (Sicilia)
properties.descrption: A blend of Nero d'Avola and Cabernet Sauvignon, Sigillo shows soft fruit and blackberry aromas backed by a touch of the greenness—bell pepper or crushed clove—usually associated with Cabernet. There's heft and structure in the mouth.

properties.title: Milbrandt 2006 Traditions Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: From a mix of Milbrandt vineyard sites, this outstanding blend includes small amounts of Cabernet, Syrah, Malbec and Barbera. The blend was so well done that each component adds a vital piece to the whole—smooth berry and cherry fruits, spice, tobacco, licorice and smoke, folding into a lush and chocolaty finish.

properties.title: Odfjell 2004 Orzada Cabernet Franc (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Padre Hurtado, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile
properties.descrption: Dark as night, with aromas of brick dust, kirsch and black fruit. Don't expect anything like French Cab Franc from this Chilean monster. It's huge and fully directed toward blackberry and cassis. Which means the herbal, leafy, tobacco notes common to CF are simply not present here. But if you like yours big and burly, with crusty dark fruit, then this is your ticket.

properties.title: Errazuriz 2005 Don Maximiano Founder's Reserva Red (Aconcagua Valley)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: The best Don Max in quite some time. After too many herbal-green vintages, the 2005 is ripe, rich and well woven. The bouquet shows hickory, roasted plum, chocolate, vanilla and peanut. The palate, meanwhile, is all about pure cassis, blackberry, mocha and spice. Finishes with a dash of caramel and earthy fruit leftovers. Honest, rugged and ready, but ageable for at least another 3–4 years.

properties.title: Barlow 2005 Barrouge Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4411 Silverado Trail N, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: This is Barlow's Bordeaux blend. Based on Cabernet Sauvignon, it's a beautiful wine, dry and balanced and fully ready to drink now, although it will take some years of cellaring. With fine acidity and tannins, it displays elegant flavors of currants and cassis, with rich edges of mocha and cedar.

properties.title: Beresan 2006 Malbec (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4169 Peppers Bridge Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Malbec may well be the next red grape to emerge as a star in Washington State, once the young vines have a few more vintages behind them. This is 100% varietal. Light and elegant, it's nicely detailed with a peppery, floral character and a welcome persistence. Take the best qualities of Beresan's Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Syrah and mix them into a single, more delicate varietal, and you have this lovely Malbec, which glides along to a finish with chocolaty, satiny tannins.

properties.title: Castello di Gabbiano 2005 Alleanza Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Via Gabbiano, 22, 50020 Mercatale In Val di Pesa FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made in collaboration with Beringer's Ed Sbragia, this super Tuscan blend of Merlot (75%), Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon is loaded with smoky tones of oak, leather, spice and chocolate fudge. The fruit is in there (behind the wood) and is redolent of blackberry and dried currant.

properties.title: Lost Canyon 2007 Morelli Lane Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4225 N Marshall Way, Scottsdale, AZ 85251, USA
properties.descrption: A bit awkward now, tightly wound and brittle, with very ripe cherry and currant flavors as well as complex Asian spices. Bone dry and marked by acidity, it could be a sleeper. Needs at least through 2009 to wake up.

properties.title: Montebelli 2005 Acantòs Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Localita' Mulinetto, 6, 58023 Caldana GR, Italy
properties.descrption: This is an organically farmed blend of Sangiovese (80%) and Syrah (20%) with elegant mineral tones at the back of red berry, smoke and campfire. Elegance and harmony stand out here and the flavors are smoky and ashy.

properties.title: Podere Forte 2005 Petrucci Sangiovese (Orcia)
properties.address: 13 Localita' Pod. Petrucci, Castiglione D'orcia, Si 53023, 53023 Castiglione D'orcia SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Dark density sets the tone and so do thick aromas of vanilla bean, toasted oak and coffee. The wine is firm but smooth and offers a blast of cherry freshness on the close. With all the oak, it's hard to find Sangiovese's naturally delicate nuances. Big, bold red wine enthusiasts will love it.

properties.title: Roessler 2006 Ridges Ollie & Hazel's Block Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 654 Broadway, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Tough and gritty in youth, this Pinot is showing edgy tannins, tart acidity and unincorporated oak. It's almost like a barrel sample. But it's stuffed with currant, licorice and mocha flavors, and should develop well in the bottle. Try after 2009.

properties.title: Saudade 2007 Split Rock Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 229 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Shows its cool-climate origins with a certain austerity that accompanies the exotic wild cherry, currant, Mandarin orange and root beer flavors, accented with sweet smoky oak. A rush of acids and tannins takes over the palate, strongly suggesting modest ageability. Give this Pinot Noir a year or two in the cellar.

properties.title: Soos Creek 2006 Sundance Red Wine Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 24012 172nd Ave SE, Kent, WA 98042, USA
properties.descrption: The Sundance blend in 2006 is two-thirds Merlot, the other third splits Cab Franc and Cabernet Sauvignon. It's what the winemaker modestly describes as his “leftovers,” but like the best leftovers it tastes great. It's wide open and broadly appealing, with sweet and soft fruit flavors of ripe berries, cherries and milk chocolate. Along with the ripe, fresh fruit are soft tannins and some pleasing streaks of coffee and licorice.

properties.title: Tenimenti Angelini 2001 Val di Suga Vigna Spuntali  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Localita Val di Cava, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This Riserva Brunello offers excellent dimension and depth thanks to its vibrant aromas of ripe cherry, natural rubber, cola, molasses and exotic spice. The wine is chewy with thick pulp and sweet tannins.

properties.title: Domaine Matthias et Emile Roblin 2013 Origine Rouge  (Sancerre)
properties.address: Maimbray, 18300 Sury-en-Vaux, France
properties.descrption: This soft wine has red berry fruits and gentle tannins. It is dry, the fruitiness conveying a fresh character, a tang of acidity and black currant intensity. It is ready to drink, although it will be better from 2016.

properties.title: Erste Neue 2012 Mezzan Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via delle Cantine, 12, 39052 Caldaro BZ, Italy
properties.descrption: Delicate aromas of wild berry, violet and a whiff of baking spice come together in the glass. The elegantly structured palate offers crushed black cherry, alpine herb and a trace of vanilla alongside firm, fine-grained tannins.

properties.title: Franz Gojer-Glögglhof 2013 Glogglhof St. Magdalener Classico Schiava (Alto Adige)
properties.descrption: Red currant and alpine herb aromas lead the nose on this blend of Schiava and 5% Lagrein. The bright palate offers sour cherry, strawberry, tangerine zest and a touch of toasted almond alongside fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity.

properties.title: Genium Celler 2009 Red (Priorat)
properties.descrption: Aromas of brick dust, vitamins and baked fruits are gritty and require some navigating. This has a wiry, tight feel, yet in terms of flavors, it's ripe almost to the point of being raisiny. Heat, hard tannins and dried berry fruit flavors direct the finish. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Girardet 2012 Estate Grown Syrah (Umpqua Valley)
properties.descrption: Clear, well-defined varietal scents of pepper, licorice and boysenberry cut through, with a hint of fresh-cut tobacco. A substrate of granite underscores this ripe, supple, medium-long wine with good grip and a polished mouthfeel. Drink 2015 through 2020.

properties.title: Sancho Barón 2011  Rioja
properties.address: 22984 Baja California, Mexico
properties.descrption: Leather, meat and rubber aromas run with dark-berry and charred notes on this barrel-heavy Rioja that's full, round, chewy and bit saucy in feel. Baked, oaky flavors of vanilla, mocha and berry fruits finish with a wave of toasty oak and mocha as well as clove. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Campolargo 2013 Tinto Red (Dão)
properties.address: bairro 3780, Estr. São Lourenço do Bairro 43, 3780, Portugal
properties.descrption: This structured wine gives out a strong mineral texture as well as firm tannins that come from the dark black fruits. It's rich and full in the mouth as well as firm and densely textured. Although it is young, it will be ready to drink from 2016.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori Bolzano 2012 St. Magdalena Riserva Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Brennerstraße, 15, 39100 Bozen, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of woodland berry, alpine herb and crushed flower lead the nose. The palate offers red cherry, rosemary and green tea, while fine-grained tannins provide support.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2011 Riserva Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Circonvallazione, 17-19, 39057 Appiano sulla strada del vino BZ, Italy
properties.descrption: Bright and elegant, this features aromas of rose petal, woodland berry and a hint of cake spice. The palate delivers sour cherry, crushed raspberry, mineral and a touch of cinnamon alongside fresh acidity and smooth tannins.

properties.title: Casa de Vila Nova 2012 Visconde de Garcez Red (Douro)
properties.address: Rua de Vila Nova, 4560 Porto, Portugal
properties.descrption: Plenty of Douro tannins and minerality give this wine a strong character. It's dark and structured, full of blackberry fruits and acidity as well as a mouthful of young tannins. The wine needs to age; drink from 2017.

properties.title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2012 Clavis Aurea Reserva Red (Tejo)
properties.descrption: This is a ripe, smooth, gently tannic wine. It is dominated by rich red berry fruits, black plum skins that are balanced by a light layer of wood aging that adds some spice. It is sophisticated, structured and ready to age for a few years. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2012 Amplus Old Vine Carignan (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Izaga 1096, Isla de Maipo, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Rich, chocolaty, toasty aromas of lactic oak and vanilla match red-fruit scents of raspberry and strawberry. This is lively on the palate, with an acidic pulse. Flavors of raw oak, creamy vanilla, plum and boysenberry finish overtly woody, with a lasting flavor of oak grain. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Still Waters 2010 Estate Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2750 Old Grove Ln, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: A distinct aroma of freshly ground coffee hit the nose on this wine, followed by intriguing wafts of dark chocolate, aged Gouda, soy sauce and Oaxacan mole sauce. The palate is more familiar, with dark flavors of blackberry, black cherry and a touch of mint.

properties.title: Jaffurs 2012 Syrah (Santa Barbara County)
properties.descrption: Black cherries, turned loam and black slate swirl into a standard nose for this winery's workhorse bottling. It's quite tasty on the palate, with blackberries and boysenberries finding complexity amid licorice, slate and black dirt.

properties.title: Josep Grau Viticultor 2013 Vespres Red (Montsant)
properties.descrption: Black cherry, plum and currant aromas are young, bouncy and fresh as a whole. That pretty much describes the palate on this Garnacha-led blend: It's lively, rubbery, tannic and fresh. Blackberry, plum and black currant flavors finish tannic and grabby. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Villa Wolf 2012 Pinot Noir (Pfalz)
properties.descrption: Crisp red cherry and berry flavors are pristine and forward in this bright, vivacious wine. Yet it's also surprisingly nuanced with deft touches of bitter coffee bean, vanilla, bramble and herb that last through the finish.

properties.title: Weingut Niklas 2013 Lago di Caldaro Classico Schiava (Alto Adige)
properties.descrption: This lightly colored, luminous 100% Schiava offers aromas of wild berry, pomegranate and violet. On the bright palate, notes of mandarin orange and almond accent the red cherry core. It's easy drinking and balanced with crisp acidity and silky, soft tannins. Drink soon.

properties.title: Torii Mor 2012 Olson Estate Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 18323 NE Fairview Dr, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: Full but not flabby, this shows ripe flavors of strawberry and cherry, with suggestions of tropical fruits—papaya, even a hint of banana. It's soft and palate-coating, with a very pretty, open structure.

properties.title: WillaKenzie Estate 2013 Jory Hills Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 19143 NE Laughlin Rd, Yamhill, OR 97148, USA
properties.descrption: Elegant and aromatic, this 2013 offers light flavors of apple and raspberry, a dusting of cocoa and excellent balance. It does feel a bit thin as it fades out, but keeps its definition and focus.

properties.title: Joleté 2014 Cuvée Select Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: Good and spicy, this well-structured effort shows some lightly ripened flavors of rhubarb, raspberry and hard cherry candy. A streak of jalapeño pepper runs alongside, delivering impressive definition and length for the price.

properties.title: Viña Otano 2002 Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: 7370 Lockport Pl Suite B, Lorton, VA 22079, USA
properties.descrption: Stewy, earthy and muddled on the nose, this gran reserva from a notoriously cold and wet vintage comes across as forced, as if long hangtime was sought to offset poor weather conditions. Stewy flavors of plum and spicecake finish flat and heavy, with tannic thud.

properties.title: Viña Sastre 2013  Ribera del Duero
properties.address: C. San Pedro, s/n, 09311 La Horra, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: Initially, this gives off a note of iodine, which in due time transitions to minerality with red-fruit notes. Reflective of 2013, this feels raw and tannic, while plum and berry flavors are limited in scope. Drawing tannins and acid-driven red-fruit flavors carry the finish.

properties.title: Abacela 2013 Barrel Select Garnacha (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 12500 Lookingglass Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.descrption: Spicy plum and cherry fruit is highlighted with a sprinkle of nutmeg. Sappy, tongue-tickling acids elevate the fruit flavors, while the wine finishes with thick, velvety tannins.

properties.title: Acrobat 2014 Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.descrption: This well-built, aromatic wine smells of fresh raspberries. The mouthfeel is soft and smooth, the tannins subtle and the finish kisses you goodbye with a lick of milk chocolate.

properties.title: Armida 2013 Gold Mine Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: An unusual commingling of coconut and kirsch, this wine holds burly tannins at its core, which is full bodied and brawny, with a noticeable presence of oak around leathery blackberry pie. The vines are dry-farmed and date back to 1912.

properties.title: Blustone 2013 Pinot Noir (Leelanau Peninsula)
properties.address: 780 N Sylt Rd, Lake Leelanau, MI 49653, USA
properties.descrption: Pronounced notes of strawberry and red cherry are laced with notes of vanilla and brown sugar on the nose. The light-bodied palate follows suit, with toasted vanilla lingering to the finish.

properties.title: Bouchaine 2013 Bacchus Collection Swan Estate Vineyard Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 1075 Buchli Station Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has a light delicacy that provides an ethereal quality to its wispy layers of wild strawberry, dried herb and spearmint. Bright and crisp, it finishes smoothly with buoyant acidity.

properties.title: Casa Agricola Alexandre Relvas 2014 Passi Colheita Tardiva Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Herdade da Pimenta - S. Miguel de Machede 7005 - 752, 7005-752 Évora, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a late-harvest wine that has been produced from partially botrytised fruit. It is sweet and lightly honeyed, with lemon aromas and apricot flavors and carried by lively acidity. It is probably too young and needs time to integrate. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Dão Sul 2010 Cabriz Blanc de Noirs Bruto Touriga Nacional (Dão)
properties.address: Quinta Das Sarzedas, Currelos Aptd. 28, Carregal Do Sal, Viseu, 3430-211 Carregal do Sal, Portugal
properties.descrption: The surprisingly versatile Touriga Nacional has been used for this ripe and perfumed wine. It is balanced between apple and apricot fruits and tangy, tightly textured acidity. There is a touch of tannin as reminder that it's made from a red grape. Drink now.

properties.title: Dobbes Family Estate 2013 Eola-Amity Cuvée Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 240 SE 5th St, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: Juicy and bright, this pushes snappy raspberry and cherry fruit front and center, with a tasty touch of spice as well. It's a good introduction to the more elegant style of the 2013 vintage wines.

properties.title: Erath 2014 Oregon Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 1439 NW Marshall St, Portland, OR 97209, USA
properties.descrption: If you are looking for a well-made Oregon Pinot Noir under $20, this is a good choice. Medium bodied, it offers well-ripened red and blue fruits, a lick of toast, well-built tannins, and a finishing streak of dark roasted coffee.

properties.title: Sean Thackrey 2008 Andromeda Devil's Gulch Ranch Pinot Noir (Marin County)
properties.address: 660 Horseshoe Hill Rd, Bolinas, CA 94924, USA
properties.descrption: An eccentric wine. Rather heavy for a classic coastal Pinot Noir, yet not without charismatic charm. Shows rich, deep flavors of wild raspberries, toffee, vanilla bean and smoky wood. Gathers momentum and interest as it breathes in the glass. Could substitute for everything from Zinfandel to Grenache. Drink now.

properties.title: Siduri 2009 Keefer Ranch Pinot Noir (Green Valley)
properties.descrption: A good Pinot Noir, lusty, dry and fruity, although it's a bit raw in youth. Shows rich cherry marmalade, cola, spice and sandalwood flavors, brightened with crisp acidity. The vineyard is not among the valley's best, but Siduri interprets it as well as anyone.

properties.title: Stark-Condé 2007 Unfined and Unfiltered Syrah (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Oude Nektar Farm Jonkershoek Valley, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.descrption: A bit more rustic than its Three Pines Syrah. Notes of bramble, wild forest berries, game and white pepper flood the nose and mouth. The mouthfeel is creamy and lush, with rich cherry flavors developing on the palate and playing into the cocoa-dusted finish.

properties.title: Stonehedge 2007 Terroir Select Grenache (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 1929 1st St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: A delicious Grenache sourced from Mendocino's Eaglepoint Vineyards, a high-elevation, cool-climate site with a peppery opening note that extends itself through dense chewy tannins and the bright fruitiness and inviting aromatics we all love about Grenache. A very nice bottle of wine with great backbone and depth that should age another 5–10 years.

properties.title: Terredora 2004  Taurasi
properties.descrption: A vein of pure elegance runs straight through this austere Taurasi and holds it together until the firm, tannic end. Along the way, it imparts tones of crushed black stone, resin, dark fruit, prune, cola and dark spice. Pair this wine with meat or aged cheese.

properties.title: Thistle 2008 Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 10555 NE Red Hills Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: A firm, full, distinctive Pinot Noir, from an organic vineyard in the Dundee Hills. Light fruit flavors of berry play second fiddle to notes of earth and clay, and drying tannins. The wine surprises with its length; it extends into a finish that continues to hold your attention and its focus, for a minute or more.

properties.title: Terre del Principe 2007 Centomoggia Casavecchia (Terre del Volturno)
properties.address: Via Municipio, 4, 81010 Castel Campagnano CE, Italy
properties.descrption: This inky, thick and well- extracted wine (made from Casavecchia grapes) offers very pretty aromas of dark chocolate, prune, exotic spice and black jammy fruit. The tannins are soft and polished and the wine performs even better after a few minutes in the glass.

properties.title: Riverhaven 2007 Riverrock Vineyards Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (OR))
properties.descrption: Excellent varietal character, along with the lightly funky aromas associated with the vineyard's location in the Rocks (a sub-section of the Walla Walla Valley AVA), elevate this first release from Riverhaven Cellars. Along with blackberry fruit come cinnamon, mocha, coffee grounds and clean earth, well integrated into a rich and textural wine with good length and body.

properties.title: Terredora 2003 CampoRe Riserva  (Taurasi)
properties.address: Contrada Serra, 83030 Serra AV, Italy
properties.descrption: Well-aged and elegant, this proud Taurasi shows a very deep and sophisticated side. Aromas include cured meat, licorice, rum cake, dried herbs, cola and root beer. The freshness of the fruit is fading but the tannins are still firm, giving the wine a few more years of longevity.

properties.title: Domaine Serene 2008 Yamhill Cuvée Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6555 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: Drinkable now, but certainly cellar-worthy, the most widely available cuvée from Domaine Serene shows the strength of the 2008 vintage. Fully ripe, assertive and full-bodied, it brings scents of berry and herb into play, leading into a thick and tannic wine with coiled power. Decant it, or give it a few years in the cellar.

properties.title: Windstream 2009 Sarmento Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 1815 Augusta Hwy, Lexington, SC 29072, USA
properties.descrption: With zesty acidity and plenty of upfront fruit flavor, this Pinot is ready to drink now and over the next two years. It's rich and vibrant in cherry pie filling, red currant, red licorice, bacon, cola, pepper and sandalwood flavors.

properties.title: Caliboro Estate 2006 Erasmo Red (Maule Valley)
properties.descrption: A little lean and fiery from nose to tail, but amid all the heavyweights coming from Chile that might be a good thing. The palate is tight, acidic and fresh, with an Old World mouthfeel and flavors of dried berry, earth, tobacco and spice. Snappy and crisp on the finish, with a final wave of propelling acidity. Drink now through 2014.

properties.title: Brennan 2013 Reserve Tempranillo (Texas)
properties.address: 802 S Austin St, Comanche, TX 76442, USA
properties.descrption: Red cherry and currant mix with sweet sawdust and anise-spiced gum on the nose. Medium-bodied, with a plush feel, juicy red fruit flavors pervade on the palate. Light tannins make this an easy sipper—enjoy alone or with lighter proteins.

properties.title: Alex Gambal 2013 Cuvée des Deux Papis  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 14 Bd Jules Ferry, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: Fresh while also ripe and jammy, this is a strawberry-flavored wine with attractive acidity at the back. It is soft, lightly structured with lifted, perfumed fruitiness. Drink now.

properties.title: Angel's Cup 2013 Vineyard Selection Pinot Noir (California)
properties.descrption: A surprisingly tasty and well-balanced Pinot for this price category, this smells lightly spicy and ripely fruity. It feels smooth but not overly soft in texture and has lively, delicious fruit flavors.

properties.title: Charles B. Mitchell 2013 Reserve Goltz Vineyard Zinfandel (El Dorado)
properties.address: 8221 Stoney Creek Rd, Somerset, CA 95684, USA
properties.descrption: Full bodied and completely mature, this is saturated with ripe flavors. It has enough firm tannin for a gripping texture and brings a sense of completeness for something this bold. It tastes like sweet blackberries and boysenberries, yet is dry.

properties.title: Discreto 2012 Gran Reserva Red (Sagrada Familia)
properties.descrption: Spicy, dry aromas of tobacco, campfire, herbs and berry fruits lead to a raw, oaky palate of plum, cassis and woody, lemony flavors. A middle-of-the-road finish with heat tastes like what came before it. The blend is 85% Cabernet Sauvignon with Cab Franc and Petit Verdot.

properties.title: LangeTwins 2011 Midnight Reserve Red (Lodi)
properties.descrption: Jammy aromas, sweet-seeming baking spice flavors and a texture that's relatively soft for a red wine make this easy to drink and rich in flavor.

properties.title: Sostener 2013 Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 2800 W Boyles Hill Rd, Jackson, WY 83001, USA
properties.descrption: Simple but classy aromas of red currant and raspberries show on the nose of this bottling from an all-star team of the appellation. The palate is light and easy, with tart cranberry and a large boost of tannic grip, a surprise for how light it feels.

properties.title: Saint Gregory 2012 Reserve Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 13275 US-101 #3, Hopland, CA 95449, USA
properties.descrption: Full body, a broad texture and very ripe flavors give both heft and softness to this cedar- and brown-sugar-scented wine. The ample fruit flavors taste mature and fully ripe, like dried plums.

properties.title: Santa Alicia 2013 Gran Reserva Merlot (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Circunvalación Máximo Valdés 4135, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: This Merlot gets going with scratchy berry and plum aromas that come alongside roasted overtones. Choppy and tannic on the palate, this is short on flavors, with baked, loamy berry notes leading to a lightly herbal, briny tasting finish.

properties.title: Wood Family Vineyards 2012 Muy Bueno Zinfandel (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 2407 Research Dr, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Very fruity, ripe and extremely full bodied in terms of alcohol, this exuberant wine has abundant cherry and herbal flavors and a smooth, juicy texture. With very little tannin and all that fruitiness, it should be a crowd-pleaser.

properties.title: Commanderie de la Bargemone 2012 La Bargemone Red (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
properties.address: 3100 Rte d'Aix RN7, 13760 Saint-Cannat, France
properties.descrption: This is soft and generously fruity wine. It has spice, ripe red-berry fruits and just enough tannin to give structure. Touches of chocolate and bitter coffee are rounding out well to allow the fruit and ripe texture to speak. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: François Lurton 2013 Humo Blanco Gran Cuvée Pinot Noir (Lolol Valley)
properties.address: Km 29 Ruta - l.72, Lolol, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Humo Blanco means “white smoke,” and the name applies to the daily morning fog that spreads over the Lolol area where this comes from. Leathery, earthy aromas of cherry and plum are ripe, while the palate is tannic and rubbery. Earthy cherry and plum flavors finish lasting and potent.

properties.title: Poliziano 2013 Asinone  (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
properties.address: Via Fontago, 1, 53045 Montepulciano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Red berry, chopped herb, toast and a whiff of French oak are some of the aromas that take shape in the glass. The palate is taut but elegant, offering bright wild cherry, licorice and vanilla flavors, while tightly wound, fine-grained tannins leave a firm finish. Give this time to unwind and fully develop.

properties.title: Robert Hall 2014 Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Roasted beef and bacon fat scents meet with maple, char, Concord grape and blueberry on the nose of this hearty bottling from a winery recently acquired by O'Neill Vintners. Its tannins are deep and firm but welcoming, providing the framework for black currant, blueberry, charred beef and rosemary flavors.

properties.title: Sesti 2012  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Castello di Argiano, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Chopped herb, pine, forest floor and balsamic notes follow through to the palate, rich in vibrant red cherry, cranberry, star anise and white pepper notes. It's still tightly wound, with compact tannins and fresh acidity. Give it time to develop more depth and complexity. Drink 2022–2032.

properties.title: Three 2014 Old Vines Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
properties.address: Old Sugar Mill, 35265 Willow Ave, Clarksburg, CA 95612, USA
properties.descrption: Opulent and ripe, this full-bodied wine has great fruit concentration, a rich texture supported by firm tannins and a lingering, plummy finish. Oak plays a minimal role through all its blackberry and black plum flavors, but spicy clove and cedar accents emerge and persist through the finish.

properties.title: Villa San Juliette 2013 Romantique Reserve Red (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: This top-shelf red blend from television producers Nigel Lythgoe and Ken Warwick shows cooked blackberry, purple flower, soy and anise aromas on the nose. Oregano and marjoram lead the palate, which is moderately dense, with tangy blackberry and boysenberry flavors.

properties.title: Villa San Juliette 2014 Reserve Grenache (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 6385 Cross Canyons Rd, San Miguel, CA 93451, USA
properties.descrption: Rose petal, baked strawberry, sarsaparilla and baking spice aromas show strongly on the indulgent nose of this bottling. It's floral, full-bodied and multi-layered on the palate, with baked red cherry and cranberry flavors swathed in cinnamon, hibiscus and anise spice.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2014 Bernau Block Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.descrption: Planted in 1983, this is the original Willamette Valley Vineyards estate vineyard. The wine remains stiff and wrapped up tight, with a mix of wild strawberry, raspberry and cherry fruit. There's a light dusting of baking spices, the result of aging 14 months in one-quarter new French oak.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2014 Vista Verde Vineyard Pinot Noir (San Benito County)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: There is a rich black plum darkness to the nose of this bottling, which transitions to muddy loam and wet clay, lifted by aromatic sagebrush. The palate shows dried black cherry, star anise and more soil-driven minerality.

properties.title: Kessler-Haak 2013 Synergy Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: One of Dan Kessler's many Pinot bottlings, this shows tart but deep black plum skin aromas, with boysenberry, lavender, hibiscus and a touch of candied cherry. The palate shows both red cherry ripeness and fresh pomegranate tang, with a focus on floral elements of lavender and rose, presented like a bouquet on the tongue.

properties.title: Lucien Albrecht 2013 Weid Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: 28 Rue du Printemps, 68500 Orschwihr, France
properties.descrption: Glints of spicy, salty soy sauce hover on the nose above a fresh cherry note. The palate is juicy and fluid, mouth filling and round, without being heavy. Cherry notes abound and play, pervaded by freshness and held within a frame of fine, ever so slightly crunchy tannins. The finish is refreshing, bone-dry, clean and moreish.

properties.title: Lula 2014 Mariah Vineyard Zinfandel (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 2800 Guntly Rd, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: This substantial dry wine made from dry-farmed vines planted in 1980 has tempting jammy aromas and ripe and satisfying fruit flavors matched by a solid backing of fine-grained tannins and acidity. It has the appetizing bite and firm texture that will make it mouthwatering at dinner.

properties.title: Abacela 2014 Fiesta Tempranillo (Umpqua Valley)
properties.descrption: Fiesta is the lightest, most fruit forward of the four different Tempranillos from Abacela. In a great year such as this, it's also substantial and authoritative, with deeply driven flavors of red and blueberry fruit, a whiff of oak and slightly grainy tannins. This wine clearly over-delivers for the price.

properties.title: Alma Rosa 2014 La Encantada Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1623 Mission Dr, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.descrption: Richard and Thekla Sanford of Alma Rosa produce much lighter styles of Pinot Noir than many of their neighbors. In this bottling, that translates to bright pomegranate and cranberry fruit with hints of anise and rose on the nose. The palate offers raspberry fruit and sagebrush spice, with a strong, grippy texture.

properties.title: Baker & Brain 2014 Stolo Vineyard Pinot Noir (San Luis Obispo County)
properties.address: Baker, KS, USA
properties.descrption: This is a tight and restrained wine from an extreme coastal vineyard behind Cambria. On the nose, it shows touches of raspberry and pomegranate along with non-fruit notes of lavender, dried rose and cinnamon stick. The palate is mineral-driven, with gravel, loam and pencil lead accented by sagebrush, toast and cedar flavors.

properties.title: Château de Malleret 2014  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 470 Chem. Malleret, 33290 Le Pian-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: This grand estate situated in the southern Médoc has been revitalized in recent years and now makes some impressive wines. This rich wine is concentrated with a dark texture that will allow it to age well. There is a juicy aftertaste showing the ripe fruit. Drink from 2021.

properties.title: Château Pontoise Cabarrus 2014  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 29 Rue Georges Mandel, 33180 Saint-Seurin-de-Cadourne, France
properties.descrption: This is a powerfully tannic wine from a blend of equal proportions of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot with a serious touch of Petit Verdot. It is dark in color, dense in texture although with no hint of toughness. Instead, it is a rich wine that will age well. Drink from 2023.

properties.title: Château Reverdi 2014  Listrac-Médoc
properties.address: 11 Rte de Donissan, 33480 Listrac-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: Owned by the Thomas family, this wine has an unusual blend of 50% Merlot and 35% Petit Verdot (with the rest Cabernet Sauvignon). It shows how Petit Verdot can now ripen easily in warm years. The dark color and dense tannins are a counterpoint to the juicy blackberry fruit. They will allow this wine to age well. Drink from 2021.

properties.title: Domaine Barmès-Buecher 2015 Réserve Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: 30 Rue Sainte-Gertrude, 68920 Wettolsheim, France
properties.descrption: There is a hint of flinty reduction that still clings to the nose. Underneath that is shy crisp red-cherry fruit. The palate adds glimpses of lifted conifer aromas to that. There is lightness and a very fine structure, but also depth. This is very elegant and understated but all the more touching for that. The finish is totally refreshing and dry.

properties.title: Mercer 2014 Robert Willis Reserve Spice Cabinet Vineyard Malbec (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 3100 Lee Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: High-toned aromas of herb, pencil lead, vanilla and plum are followed by plush plump fruit and game flavors. It possesses a soft texture.

properties.title: Pedroncelli 2016 Dry Rosé of Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1220 Canyon Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Dark pink-orange in color, this pungent 100% varietal wine was given no time in oak, allowing its crisp orange peel, grapefruit and cherry flavors to shine. Moderate acidity underlies the simple finish.

properties.title: Sculpterra 2014 Maquette Red (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Blackberry, rose petal and espresso combine for a relatively light aromatic profile in this blend of 45% Cabernet Sauvignon, 35% Cabernet Franc and 20% Merlot. A cedar flavor dominates the palate, lending structure and depth to blackberry fruit and black pepper spice.

properties.title: VGS Chateau Potelle 2014 Syrah (Mount Veeder)
properties.address: 1200 Dowdell Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This broad-shouldered, burly and feral wine is ripe with smoky cherry and vanilla notes. Smoothly textured, it imparts dusty leather and black licorice accents amid a serious slathering of oak.

properties.title: Le Vigne 2014 Di Ranchita Vista Cabernet Franc (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5115 Buena Vista Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Less exuberant on the nose than its counterparts, this bottling offers dried cherry and licorice aromas. The palate shows tart but dark berry and plum skin flavors, with a graphite minerality that leads into a touch of caramel on the finish.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2015 Pinot Noir (Green Valley)
properties.address: 2191 Laguna Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: Strawberry, vanilla and smoke overlay deep blue fruit in this seamless, velvety wine. Light-bodied, it wields vibrant acidity and moderate, spicy highlights.

properties.title: William Church 2014 Gamache Vineyards Malbec (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19495 144th Ave NE # A110, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This 100% varietal wine comes from older plantings at this vineyard. Aromas of plum, barrel spice and herb are up front followed by sweet black-fruit flavors. It shows hang time on the finish.

properties.title: Wilson 2014 Sawyer Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1960 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: High-toned acidity complements the generous, brambly black fruit and brown sugar notes in this wine, its savory undertone recalling leather and coffee.

properties.title: Wither Hills 2015 Rosé of Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.descrption: Despite a pale hue and only 12.5% abv, this is a fairly weighty wine on the palate. It's dry and silky in texture, with hints of mossy forest-floor complexity to go along with pear and melon fruit.

properties.title: Launa 2014 Selección Familiar Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: Vitoria Errepidea, Km 57, 01300 Logroño, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Hard and charred on the nose at first, this sheds its tire-like aromas for cleaner berry-fruit notes with airing. A full grabby palate is a bit rough and awkward, while roasted berry, plum and oak flavors finish minty and resiny.

properties.title: Legaris 2009 Calmo Vino de Lágrima Nocturno  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Carretera Peñafiel- Encinas de Esgueva, km 2,5, 47316 Curiel de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Big grapy aromas of blackberry and cassis are rather heavy and flat. This has a tannic abrasive mouthfeel in which nothing is smooth. Borderline overripe flavors of baked plum and blackberry finish chocolaty and with baking-spice flavors.

properties.title: Radford Dale 2012 Freedom Pinot Noir (Elgin)
properties.descrption: This wine is densely packed in ripe red-fruit aromas and flavors, but still expressive in earthy notes of cocoa nib, anise and black tea. Medium tannins and plush berry flavors flesh out the mouthfeel, with a crushed satin texture. The evolving finish seamlessly transitions between ripe, fleshy fruit flavors to cherry skin and finally lightly charred oak and woody spice. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Beckmen 2012 Purisima Mountain Vineyard Syrah (Ballard Canyon)
properties.address: 2670 Ontiveros Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: This entry-level look at the family vineyard that overlooks Ballard Canyon and beyond brings scents of graphite, pepper, blackberry and dried, slightly dank herbs. It's tight and tart at first on the palate, with skins of black cherry and plum unwinding into pencil shavings, oregano, wood and emergent mushrooms. The tannins are best for drinking 2017–2025.

properties.title: Betz Family 2012 Cuvée Frangin Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 13244 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Redmond, WA 98052, USA
properties.descrption: A new wine for this winery, this comes from declassified barrels from its other programs. This blend of Merlot (36%), Syrah (26%), Cabernet Sauvignon (23%) and Petit Verdot delivers a whole lot of immediate appeal with its notes of smoke, char, black currant, huckleberry and plum. The flavors are full and lush with a creamy, supple feel and soft tannins.

properties.title: D'Arenberg 2010 The Other Side Single Vineyard Shiraz (McLaren Vale)
properties.descrption: Of all the various d'Arenberg Shiraz bottlings, this may be the silkiest in texture this vintage. It's still a full-bodied wine, filled with savory, earthy notes of black olive and espresso, but the finish stands apart for its length and suaveness. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Pendulum 2012 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: A kitchen-sink blend of varieties with Merlot (44%) and Cabernet Sauvignon (26%) taking the lead, this wine offers appealing aromas that suggest high-toned, sweet barrel spices, plum and herbs. It's loaded with cranberry, cherry and plum flavors with a rich mouthfeel that keeps the interest high.

properties.title: Standing Sun 2011 Syrah (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 92 2nd St, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.descrption: This wine from the Fess Parker-owned Rodney's Vineyard shows inky purple color, offering slightly reductive aromas of tar and charred meat but also violets and black pepper. It's full on the palate, hitting first with purple fruit and dried purple flowers before delivering plum-skin acidity and peppery spice. It's an attention-grabber.

properties.title: Steininger 2012 Novemberlese Zweigelt (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Walterstraße 2, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.descrption: This comes across as so light, friendly and easy to drink that one almost forgets to note the outstanding purity of fruit. Fresh cherries and blueberries present themselves honestly. Silky tannins and a spicy aftertaste suggest that it took top-quality fruit and lots of experience to make something so deceptively simple.

properties.title: Syncline 2012 Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: This wine comes from all free-run juice and was aged 16 months in three- to four-year-old French barrels. The result is a luxuriously pure wine that puts a premium on the feel of its plum and cranberry flavors, with a light squeeze of tannins that brings it home.

properties.title: Walla Walla Vintners 2012 Cabernet Franc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 225 Vineyard Ln, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: A signature wine for this winery, this directly appealing offering carries notes of herbs, flowers, cherry and chocolate. It's chock-full of elegantly styled cherry flavors, with chocolate that lingers on the finish.

properties.title: Wirra Wirra 2010 Woodhenge Shiraz (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: 255 Strout Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: Like so many of the 2010 Shirazes from South Australia, this is a terrific wine. It's full bodied and creamy in texture without going over the top, and the bold, oak-derived aromas of toast and vanilla ably frame flavors of black olive and plum. Already very drinkable, it should still be going strong in 2020.

properties.title: Trust 2012 Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Aromatically alluring, this features notes of raspberries, Red Vines and cherry candy. It brings a full-bore, plush, richly flavored feel with abundant raspberry flavors that linger on the finish—an unapologetically lush example of 2012 vintage fruit.

properties.title: Tuck Beckstoffer 2010 Semper Ellenbach Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: Adams St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Soft, supple and mouth-coating, this wine dances in cola, forest floor and subtle red and black berry, building power and concentration as it goes. Already given time in bottle, it's ready to enjoy now.

properties.title: Merryvale 2011 Profile Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1000 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: The winery's top-end Bordeaux red, this blends 42% Cabernet Sauvignon, 24% Cabernet Franc, 19% Petit Verdot and 15% Malbec. The fruit is sourced from the family's estate vineyard on the eastern slopes of the Napa Valley, then aged 20 months in French oak, 90% of it new. Black in color, it tastes of cedar and smoke, with soft layers of subtle plum and cassis before a grippy finish. Enjoy through 2021.

properties.title: Northstar 2010 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: True to the vintage, this is a more aromatically brooding wine than often found from this winery, with notes of dark raspberries, vanilla and assorted barrel spices. It's full bodied, layered and rich with cherry and raspberry flavors showing a lot of depth and intensity. Best after 2017.

properties.title: Alberto Longo 2012 Red (Cacc’e Mmitte di Lucera)
properties.descrption: Aromas suggest smoke, blue flower, mature berry and baking spice. A blend of 55% Nero di Troia, 30% Montepulciano d'Abruzzo and 15% Bombino Bianco, this has a savory, smoky palate that delivers juicy blackberry, spicy blueberry, clove and graphite alongside sleek tannins. It's delicious and already approachable.

properties.title: Babcock 2012 Je Ne Sais Quoi Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 5175 CA-246, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Part of Bryan Babcock's annual series of creatively named Pinots, this has smoky aromas of smoldering campfire, with brown spice and Bing cherry. The flavors tend toward brown as well, with burned orange, smashed cranberry and clove spice.

properties.title: Château Peyros 2010 Tannat-Cabernet (Madiran)
properties.address: 9 Chem. du Château, 64350 Corbère-Abères, France
properties.descrption: Putting two naturally tannic grapes together seems to soften them both. The blend gives this rich wine structure, as well as rich plum and damson, leather and smokiness. The wine finishes on a high note of acidity. Age and drink from 2016.

properties.title: Viña Santa Cruz 2007 Chamán Gran Reserva Malbec (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Exequiel Fernández 3397, Macul, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: This earthy, concentrated Malbec is dense on the nose, with herbal flavors of blackberry, spice and heat. A toasty finish carries a choppy feel and fresh acidity, while the finish tastes toasty but doesn't rise up or improve. Overall, this is perfectly good but not complex. Drink now.

properties.title: Anton Bauer 2010 Reserve Pinot Noir (Wagram-Donauland)
properties.address: Neufang 42, 3483, Austria
properties.descrption: Very pale in color, this is a fruity, fragrant wine. It has acidity, red fruits and a leathery texture. There is something of the undergrowth here, an earthy character that needs time to broaden out. Give the wine 4–5 years.

properties.title: Château Arnaucosse 2011  Bordeaux
properties.descrption: A rich, smooth wine, all ripe black fruit and soft tannins. It has weight and depth, but is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Château Maison Noble 2011  Bordeaux
properties.descrption: This new-wood-dominated wine is ripe, but full of caramel and mint flavors. The fruit is more discreet, just hinting at blackberry richness. The potential to achieve balance in six months is all here.

properties.title: Château Seguin 2011  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.descrption: Firm and tannic, but it promises a ripe, fruity future. It's dense and concentrated, with blackberry fruit giving it a full, ripe character. Age 4–6 years.

properties.title: Emiliana 2011 Novas Gran Reserva Made with Organically Grown Grapes Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: RUTA 68 Y RUTA F-870 Casablanca, Valparaíso, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Rubbery red-berry aromas blend with spicy field scents to create a true Pinot nose that's a bit strained. This is intense, chunky and slightly herbal, with red-fruit flavors, spice notes and some heat and oak on the finish.

properties.title: Happy Canyon Vineyard 2010 Piocho Red (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.address: 30 El Paseo, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.descrption: Easy to drink this blend of all five classic Bordeaux varieties, with Merlot predominating. It's all about cherries, blackberries, plum jam, currants and chocolate. Not particularly subtle or ageworthy, but very pretty.

properties.title: Rivetto 2010 Zio Nando  (Barbera d'Alba)
properties.descrption: This Barbera offers rich black fruits, white pepper and anisette over a subtle layer of chocolate. Its nervous acidity is typical of the grape. This will get even better in a couple of years.

properties.title: Jack Nicklaus Wines 2009 Private Reserve Red (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a Cabernet Sauvignon-based Bordeaux-style blend with a splash of Syrah. It's made in the modern cult style of softness, extracted fruit and plenty of toasty oak. With blackberry, cassis and dark chocolate flavors, it's obviously delicious, yet has a certain generic quality. Drink now.

properties.title: La Playa 2011 Axel Syrah (Limarí Valley)
properties.address: Avda 11 de Septiembre 1860, P 13, Providencia, Santiago, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: This Syrah begins with subtle, mellow aromas of herbs and black fruits. A plump, round, chunky palate carries flavors of lemony oak, loam, pepper and soft blackberry. This is solid but regular on the finish, where herbal flavors are slightly toasted and show some heat.

properties.title: Laetitia 2011 Clone 777 Pinot Noir (Arroyo Grande Valley)
properties.address: 453 Laetitia Vineyard Drive, Arroyo Grande, CA 93420, USA
properties.descrption: This appealingly jammy wine is rich in red cherries and raspberries. The fruitiness is the main attraction, fortunately balanced by crisp acidity, gentle tannins and the smoky structure that oak barrel aging brings. Drink this racy, silky Pinot now.

properties.title: Leese-Fitch 2011 Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: 633 W Main St, Charlottesville, VA 22903, USA
properties.descrption: There's an honesty to this Zin. It is an upfront, robust wine to drink now with pleasure. Peppery, it has solid flavors of wild berries, currants, crisped bacon and pepper.

properties.title: Luke Donald 2010 Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 24500 Ramal Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: This Cabernet Sauvignon-based Bordeaux-style blend is very rich and ripe in blackberries, cherries and currants. It has smooth tannins, and the finish is dry. It's a fashionable wine that feels plush in the mouth, but young. Give it 3–4 years, but it doesn't seem to have the stuffing for the long haul.

properties.title: Georges Vigouroux 2010 Cuvée Icône du Château de Haute-Serre Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Route de Toulouse CS20159 Cahors Cedex 9, 46003 Cahors, France
properties.descrption: Minerally and structured wine with a serious and complex range of flavors. The wine is richly textured, layering black currant fruits, a very dry character with dense tannins and intense acidity. It shows the potential for elegance and balance. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2011 Seven Hills Vineyard Merlot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 212 N 3rd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Entirely estate-grown, 100% Merlot from old vines, this unfined wine is labeled vegan. Plush, briary, brambly fruit from the 30 year old vineyard brings an extra dimension to the wine, which shows a lovely balance of cranberry, raspberry, pie cherry and baking spice flavors. There's a hint of pastry crust in the finish, which is seamless and long. An absolute delight.

properties.title: Sparkman 2010 Ruckus Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St #102, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Dark and dense, without turning fat or heavy, this excellent Ruckus captures the underlying minerality of Red Mountain grapes. There's boysenberry and black cherry fruit, black coffee and wet rock. This is built for aging.

properties.title: Maurodos 2009 San Román  (Toro)
properties.descrption: Take a hot year like 2009 and combine it with a hot region like Toro and what you get is this rich, ribald wine. Heavy aromas of raisin and blackberry suggest maximum ripeness. A beefy, saturated palate houses dark flavors of prune, chocolate and baked plum, while the finish is dark, toasty, chewy and a pure reflection of the Toro region. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Domaines Devillard 2011 Domaine des Perdrix Aux Perdrix Premier Cru  (Nuits-St.-Georges)
properties.address: 13 Rue du Closeau, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: A dense wine, rich and smooth for a Nuits-St-Georges, full of ripe red fruits, dark cherries and acidity that almost gives the wine a fresh character. Behind this fruitiness is a more solid, dark structure of tannins that will allow the wine to age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Foxen 2011 Block 43 Bien Nacido Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 7600 Foxen Canyon Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: A great success, especially given the difficulties of the vintage. With a modest alcohol reading of 13.8% by volume, it's exuberantly ripe in cherries and umami-filled red currants, with oak adding just the right notes of toast. Delicious now, but this is a Pinot that wants some age. Even better after 2017.

properties.title: Georges Vigouroux 2010 Cuvée Icône du Château de Mercuès Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Route de Toulouse CS20159 Cahors Cedex 9, 46003 Cahors, France
properties.descrption: With a blackness that coats the glass, this is a huge wine, even before tasting. The palate, with its hugely dry tannins and immense structure, confirms this. It is dark in character, brooding almost, demanding many years to age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Royal Oporto 2011 Quinta das Carvalhas Vintage  (Port)
properties.address: Tv. de Cândido dos Reis 9, 4430-999 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: Dark and dense, the fruit dominated at this stage by tannins. This wine is solid, structured, firm and dry. Black currant fruitiness will show, offering a richer character, but for now this is dense, spicy and tough, needing many years.

properties.title: Trapiche 2010 Finca Ambrosia Terroir Series Single Vineyard Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: C. Nueva Mayorga s/n, M5513 Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Like almost every wine in Trapiche's single-vineyard Malbec series, Ambrosia is concentrated and deep, with potent aromas of wood smoke, lemon peel, blackberry and tar. This feels layered and plush, while flavors of wild berry, dark spices, coffee and mocha finish with a blast of chocolate and nutmeg. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Januik 2010 Reserve Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Januik's reserve blend is 81% Cabernet Sauvignon, 16% Merlot and 3% Cabernet Franc. The fruit is cloaked with lush layers of barrel toast, and it may require several hours of decanting for it to open up. When it does, the flavors multiply on the palate with cassis, black cherry, dark chocolate, pencil lead and wood smoke, along with dusty, mouth-coating tannins.

properties.title: Masi 2006 Mazzano  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.descrption: This Amarone has a fragrance that recalls black cherry and licorice, along with a hint of well-integrated oak. The palate offers raspberry, ripe cherry and spicy notes of white pepper and clove. Smooth and well balanced, it closes on an almond note.

properties.title: Andrew Will 2010 Champoux Vineyard Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.descrption: This is a blend of Merlot (42%), Cabernet Franc (32%) and Cabernet Sauvignon coming from vines with an average age of 30 years. It has light but complex notes of cherries, plum, herbs, flowers and bittersweet chocolate. It's restrained and understated in style with seamless fruit flavors, mouthwatering acids and edgy tannins that need some time in the cellar to calm down.

properties.title: Viera de Sousa 2011  Port
properties.address: Casa da Capela 508413990, 5060-193, Portugal
properties.descrption: This wine, shows its spirit through the ripe fruit. It is textured and structured, with very firm tannins and powerful, spicy fruit. Hard-edged at this stage, the fruit is still developing. The aftertaste brings out the vintage's hallmark acidity.

properties.title: Waits-Mast 2010 Wentzel Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.descrption: This lovely Pinot Noir has an appealing baked crust quality with structured, firm tannins and ripe cherry goodness all around. From the steep, 900-foot-elevation Wentzel Vineyard, it exudes robust fruit flavor and layers of just-right spice.

properties.title: Barros 2011 Quinta Dona Matilde Vintage  (Port)
properties.address: R. Dona Leonor de Freitas 182, 4400-266 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: Sweet and ripe while powerfully structured, this is a wine with the concentration for a long life. Solid tannins and ripe berry flavors come together into an intense and dense wine. The finish brings out just a hint of freshness.

properties.title: Forgeron 2010 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: An A+ trio of vineyards—Olsen, Stonetree and Boushey—contribute equally to this pure Merlot. In a Forgeron portfolio that regularly shines with a variety of red wines, Merlot is usually the best of show, as it is here. Tight, tart and perfectly proportioned, this at first offers scents and accents of sweet tomato paste and a whiff of oregano, then opens further with lush cherry flavors and a dash of dried tobacco. Merlot and pasta? Why not?

properties.title: Goldeneye 2010 Gowan Creek Vineyard Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 9200 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: Silky and voluptuous, Gowan Creek is Goldeneye's larger production Anderson Valley Pinot Noir. Still a barrel selection of its best lots, the wine is made from fruit that's heavily scrutinized before fermentation. A powerful Pinot that retains the acidity and earthiness of the variety, with streaks of ripe fruit throughout.

properties.title: J Vineyards & Winery 2011 Barrel 16 Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 11447 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A gorgeous Pinot Noir, J's best in years. You're immediately wowed by the intensity of raspberry, cherry and cola flavors, then the overall balance and complexity. It's so clean, silky, rich and delicate. Awesome with lamb. Will glide through the next 15 years easily.

properties.title: Pintia 2009  Toro
properties.descrption: There's no denying this wine's force. It's 15% ABV but balanced, with roasted berry, leather, toasty oak, graphite and prune aromas. The palate feels full, flush and without gaps, while flavors of blackberry, cassis, chocolate and spice finish exceedingly smooth, with loamy notes and leftover spice. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Shoup 2008 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1604 Frenchtown Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This is 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot, 20% Petit Verdot and 5% Cabernet Franc. It's dark, dusky, and loaded with dense black fruits. A smoky, earthy character prevails, bringing moist earth, black licorice and intense dark chocolate flavors to the tannins.

properties.title: Spring Mountain Vineyard 2010 Elivette Red (Spring Mountain District)
properties.address: 2805 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: There's lots of lush Cabernet Sauvignon character in this smooth Bordeaux blend. It has the all-important quality of impeccable texture, as soft as velvet, yet firm in minerals. With about one-third Cabernet Franc, it shows flavors ranging from cherries and currants to sweet cassis liqueur, with a complex veneer of new French oak. Beautiful to drink now, and it should age effortlessly for the next 10 years.

properties.title: Wine with Spirit 2012 Carpe Noctem Voyeur Limited Edition Red (Alentejano)
