properties.title: Château Grand-Puy Ducasse 2014  Pauillac
properties.address: 4 Quai Antoine Ferchaud, 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: For the vintage, this is a particularly rich wine. It is structured and firm with opulent black-plum fruit that gives the wine a ripe character. Dense with supporting tannins, the wine is going to develop well over the medium term. Drink from 2022

properties.title: Château Labégorce Margaux 2014  Margaux
properties.address: 1 Route de, Rue de Labegorce, 33460 Margaux-Cantenac, France
properties.descrption: This is a firm wine, dominated by tannins and dark layers of wood. The black-currant fruit is there to burst out as the wine matures over the next few years. The estate is close to the river, on a dense gravel rise, near Château Margaux.

properties.title: Château Siran 2014  Margaux
properties.address: 13 Avenue du Comte JB de, Av. du Comté Lynch, 33460 Labarde, France
properties.descrption: Siran is in the south of the Margaux appellation just where the gravel outcrops rise above the river. It shows its fine position in this tannic wine. It has all the black-currant fruit buried for the moment under the structure. It is a serious wine that will repay aging. Drink from 2022.

properties.title: Domaine Serene 2013 Jerusalem Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6555 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: Though labeled simply Willamette Valley, the vineyard is set in the Eola Hills AVA. Complex aromas meld sassafras, Asian spices, baking spices and delicate notes of leaf and stem. The fruit is lightly brambly with an accent on raspberry flavors. The wine is well-proportioned throughout.

properties.title: Rusack 2014 Estate Reserve Syrah (Ballard Canyon)
properties.address: 1819 Ballard Canyon Rd, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.descrption: Ripe blueberry fruit meets vanilla, cola and thyme touches on the approachable nose of this wine from Steve Gerbac. There's a well-balanced array of flavors on the dynamic palate, from potpourri spice to blackberry and blueberry fruit.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2014 Pentad Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 212 N 3rd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot, Carménère, Malbec and Cabernet Franc offers aromas of purple fruit, green herb, clove, barrel spice and spice box. It's light and supple, filling out with palate-coating fruit flavors. The tannins bring a bit of grip that softens with additional time open. Put it on the dinner table to see it at its best.

properties.title: Starmont 2016 Rosé of Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: c/o Merryvale Vineyards, 1000 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced from the Stanly Ranch Vineyard, among other sites, this 100% varietal wine is light pink-orange in hue, and citrus-driven in flavor. Cherry and strawberry notes complement the lemon and grapefruit, delivering a refreshingly lengthy zip of acidity.

properties.title: Undurraga 2013 Vigno Old Vines Dry-Farmed Red (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Cam. a Melipilla 34, Talagante, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Piercing black cherry and cassis aromas are a touch rustic and massive, but hey, that's old-vines Carignan from Maule (this one also contains 12% Cinsault). So saturated that it's beastly on the palate, this tastes of hard-rolling blackberry and black plum. Plenty of gritty spice, tomato and integrated oak fill out the menu. Drink through 2025.

properties.title: Waxwing 2015 Halcon Vineyard Syrah (Yorkville Highlands)
properties.address: 111 Industrial Rd #8, Belmont, CA 94002, USA
properties.descrption: Great concentration and textural density make this full-bodied and firmly structured wine stand out. Blackberry, black pepper and clove aromas fill the glass while the palate brings out layers of blackberry and dark chocolate notes. With all that structure and flavor, this will be interesting to age a few years. Best after 2021.

properties.title: Joseph Swan Vineyards 2013 Saralee's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2916 Laguna Rd, Forestville, CA 95436, USA
properties.descrption: Light and cloudy in the glass, this wine shows a carbonic earthiness that's welcoming and complex. Forest floor, mushroom, pine and cola flavors permeate the palate in a delicately savory way, finishing bright and crisp.

properties.title: Klinker Brick 2014 Old Ghost Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 15887 Alpine Rd, Lodi, CA 95240, USA
properties.descrption: While quite ripe and fruity, this wine is also dry, nicely tannic and firmly textured, so it will pair beautifully with rich proteins. Aged 18 months in oak, mostly French, it has concentrated dark fruit aromas, and a layered array of flavors that recalls blueberry, dark chocolate and blackberry syrup. Bright acidity keeps everything in balance.

properties.title: Kooyong 2015 Estate Pinot Noir (Mornington Peninsula)
properties.address: 110 Hunts Rd, Tuerong VIC 3915, Australia
properties.descrption: The 2015 vintage in Mornington yielded dark concentrated wines. This one is atypically (for the estate) full bodied and bold as a result, with plum and black-cherry fruit and hints of mint, sage and bay leaf. Long and a bit drying on the finish, it needs a couple of years to come into balance. Drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Mark Ryan 2014 Crazy Mary Mourvèdre (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 14475 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: 100% varietal, this wine is a blend of fruit from Ciel du Cheval and Force Majeure vineyards. The dark fruit, mineral, meat, white pepper, green herb and savory aromas are initially brooding but intriguing. The palate packs a big wallop of dark-fruit flavors, bringing a lot of hedonistic appeal. It's not for the faint of heart but it delivers.

properties.title: Fulcrum 2015 Brosseau Vineyard Pinot Noir (Chalone)
properties.address: 25 E Napa St suite D, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Incredibly suave dark strawberry and cherry aromas meld with chocolate and dusty earth notes on the nose of this bottling from one of the appellation's largest vineyards. The palate is more tightly wound, offering dried thyme, bay leaf and peppercorn instead of opulent fruit.

properties.title: Guarachi Family 2015 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 3148 Soda Canyon Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This small-production wine from two spectacular sites in the Petaluma Gap is robustly earthy and spicy, showing compost and blue fruit flavor. Broadly structured, it expands on the palate, its finish dotted with black tea and clove.

properties.title: Hoi Polloi 2014 Syrah (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 24338 Main St, Santa Clarita, CA 91321, USA
properties.descrption: This new project from a co-founder of the popular Garagiste Festivals is promising. This bottling shows elegant violet, beef char, graphite and boysenberry notes on the nose. The palate is more pungent with its dark fruit, anise, pepper and roast beef flavors, finishing on a caramelized note.

properties.title: Hunnicutt 2014 CUTT Fearless Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3524 Silverado Trail N, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This is a blend of 35% Syrah, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon, 21% Zinfandel and 14% Merlot. It impresses with rich blueberry pie, spicy clove and black pepper flavors while offering a lively experience on the palate that finishes long, with leathery texture and complexity.

properties.title: Jaxon 2013 Syrah (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 10400 US-101, Hopland, CA 95449, USA
properties.descrption: This interesting, complex wine moves from tangy candied citrus to baking spices and long concentrated flavors of dried plum, apricot and more. Think Christmas fruitcake with a touch of leather and you're there.

properties.title: Rutherford Ranch 2013 Rhiannon Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1680 Silverado Trail S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This is a soft, simple, red fruit-driven blend of four Bordeaux varieties, the fruit complemented by a twist of cedar and mint.

properties.title: Tertulia 2016 Elevation Estate Vineyard Marsanne (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1564 Whiteley Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Aged in stainless steel, this wine comes from a new wine-growing region in the cataracts of the North fork of the Walla Walla River. The aromas are quite faint initially. The palate is on the lighter side of medium bodied, with tart flavors. It lacks a sense of clear direction.

properties.title: Borsao 2013 Berola Red (Campo de Borja)
properties.address: Camino del Tejar, s/n, 50540 Borja, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of stewed berry fruits and damp leaves lack freshness but are not spoiled. This Garnacha-based blend feels thick and resiny, almost to the point of syrupy. Creamy oaky stewed berry flavors finish with an herbal hint and sticky tannins.

properties.title: Brooklyn West 2012 Barbera (Amador County)
properties.address: 200 2nd Street @, Jackson St, Oakland, CA 94607, USA
properties.descrption: Cherry and raspberry aromas are accented by a spicy, earthy quality in this easy-drinking, well-balanced wine, and the flavors gush with fruit. It's smooth and polished on the palate, medium in body and light in tannin.

properties.title: Lemelson 2014 Chestnut Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 12020 NE Stag Hollow Rd, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: There's just not much here. The strawberry fruit is wispy thin, the acids tart, the tannins light, and the whole shebang shows only modest depth and grip.

properties.title: Bridlewood 2015 Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 3010 Roblar Ave, Santa Ynez, CA 93460, USA
properties.descrption: Black pepper and rosemary aromas join forces with black cherry and blackberry flavors in this well-balanced, moderately tannic wine. It has a refreshing quality, tasty fruit and medium body, all of which will make it versatle with food.

properties.title: Wilson 2014 Carl's Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1960 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Vanilla, cherry and raspberry flavors are complemented by smoky meat and tar in this softly built, mellow and pensively sweet wine that's ripe and generous in body.

properties.title: Burnside Road 2014 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 661 Burnside Rd E, Victoria, BC V8T 2X9, Canada
properties.descrption: This leathery, full-bodied red is rich with blueberry cobbler, coffee and smoked meat flavors. Soft and round in structure, it tastes robustly varietal.

properties.title: Cantine Grasso 2015 Caporosso Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Ginestra, 12065 Monforte d'Alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This Nero d'Avola has black-skinned berry, blue flower and black pepper aromas. The easygoing palate conveys mature black cherry and raspberry jam, with round tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Cedar River Cellars 2014 It's a Long Way Barrel Select Cabernet Franc (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 13018 Lake Kathleen Rd SE, Renton, WA 98059, USA
properties.descrption: Hailing from Two Blondes Vineyard, the aromas bring unusual, not entirely married notes of ham hock, bacon fat, herb and vanilla. The palate mixes smooth-feeling fruit and savory flavors. It's a unique wine, not for all tastes.

properties.title: Hahn 2010 Nicky Hahn Pinot Noir (Monterey)
properties.address: 37700 Foothill Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.descrption: Lots of raspberry and cherry fruit in this Pinot Noir. It's sweet and fruity and crisp in acidity, with a sweet coat of vanilla oak. Drink now.

properties.title: Chain Gang 2009 Red (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 8 Chains North Winery, 38593 Daymont Ln, Waterford, VA 20197, USA
properties.descrption: A sweet, soft wine, very ripe, almost porty. The blackberry and chocolate flavors have an edge of raisins, which makes it slightly bitter.

properties.title: Kouros 2008 Agiorgitiko (Nemea)
properties.address: Dafnes 700 11, Greece
properties.descrption: This wine starts with aromas of black pepper, anise and grape candy followed by a combination of wild cherry, cocoa and pepper on the palate. A soft character with a slight kick. Pair with poultry, cheese, pork.

properties.title: McFadden 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Mendocino)
properties.address: 13275 S, US-101, Hopland, CA 95449, USA
properties.descrption: A very minty old vine Zin from organically farmed grapes that tastes of not-quite-ripe strawberry jam and is otherwise smooth and peppery.

properties.title: Lava Cap 2007 Merlot (El Dorado)
properties.address: 2221 Fruitridge Rd, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: Simple and jammy, with sharp flavors of raspberries, cherries, gingersnap cookies and spices. Tasty and sweet, but lacking the structure to contain all that richness.

properties.title: San Simeon 2007 Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 442 Slo San Simeon Rd, San Simeon, CA 93452, USA
properties.descrption: Irregular tannins and acidity give this wine a harsh mouthfeel. On the plus side, it's fresh in berry fruit, even though it's more than four years of age. Drink up.

properties.title: Ksana 2008 Reserva Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: Reedy and green on the nose, then choppy and clipped on the palate. For a full-priced Malbec, this is lacking in ripeness, body and finesse; it's prickly and limited, with green bean, rhubarb and cranberry flavors. Not bad but underwhelming for $33.

properties.title: Gravity Hills 2009 The Sherpa Zinfandel (Central Coast)
properties.address: 10220 Lauer Rd, Baroda, MI 49101, USA
properties.descrption: This is a simple wine, sharp in acidity and dry, with spicy Zin flavors of berries. Okay with pizza, burgers, barbecue.

properties.title: Makulu 2008 Shiraz (Western Cape)
properties.address: 518 N Hamilton St, High Point, NC 27262, USA
properties.descrption: A real value wine that's perfect for large-group entertaining. Blueberry and cherry flavors lead here, with glimmers of raspberry leaf adding character. Juicy, light and simple, but good.

properties.title: Pianetta 2008 Sangiovese (Monterey)
properties.address: 829 13th St, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Dry and very acidic, with a cutting edge of tartness alongside the cherry and tobacco flavors. Rich meats and cheeses will help soften it.

properties.title: flipflop 2009 Merlot (California)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Candied and simple, with raspberry and cherry Lifesaver flavors. Okay for big parties.

properties.title: Calcu 2009 Malbec (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Los Militares 4777, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: A funky nose of wet dog and medicinal cherry is no place you want to begin. The palate is high in acidity and scratchy, with tart plum, berry and cheek-starching tannins. Tastes reasonably good but fails in the bouquet and mouthfeel departments.

properties.title: Cantora 2009 Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: 4888 Ontario St, Beamsville, ON L0R 1B3, Canada
properties.descrption: The nose is herbal and drawn but offers varietally correct cherry, berry and spice aromas. The wine runs ultracrisp and sheering in the mouth, with tart redfruit and herbal flavors of olive and mint. Seems more sharp and acidic than ideal.

properties.title: Barton & Guestier 2009 Bistro Pinot Noir (Vin de Pays de l'Ile de Beauté)
properties.address: 6161 S Yale Ave, Tulsa, OK 74136, USA
properties.descrption: Unoaked Pinot Noir from Corsica, showing ripe berry flavors, fresh acidity and only light tannins. It's what it says on the label: for casual drinking.

properties.title: Château de l'Orangerie 2007 Grand Classique  (Premieres Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: Palay, 33540 Saint-Félix-de-Foncaude, France
properties.descrption: Tobacco aromas and tight tannins set the scene for a wine that is light and fresh, with tangy berry fruits.

properties.title: Mazzocco 2008 West Dry Creek Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1400 Lytton Springs Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Shows overripe flavors in the raisins that gives a Port-like taste, and with alcohol well over 16%, it's hot. An inelegant, heavy Zin.

properties.title: Château la Croix de St-Georges 2008  Saint-Georges-Saint-Émilion
properties.address: 88-116 Rue de Catusseau, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: Tight, lean, severe, this wine only has a hint of fruit. It is firm, on the thin side, not a pleasure.

properties.title: Castillo Clavijo 2008 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: C. Don Dionisio Cabezón, 15, 26130 Clavijo, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Toasty, roasted aromas of baked berry and earth head straight to a narrowly built yet weighty palate with earth, plum and raspberry notes. On the finish, this holds onto its plum and raspberry flavors as well as its fresh feel.

properties.title: Cellars 33 2011 Bacigalupi Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 495 Barneveld Ave, San Francisco, CA 94124, USA
properties.descrption: This is a lighter-style wine, as Pinots from this vineyard, which is in a warm part of the valley, tend to be. But it's also a tasty Pinot, soft and supple, with cola, cherry jam, brown sugar, pie spice and sandalwood flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Del Carlo Winery 2010 Old Vine Home Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 4939 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This is an old-style, rustic Zin. It's tannic and high in alcohol, with wild berry jam, currant, spice and heady liqueur flavors. A little pricy, but a sound, robust wine with plenty of forthright character.

properties.title: Markham 2010 Estate Grown Cabernet Franc (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2812 St Helena Hwy North, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This Cab Franc has some nice features, starting with the cherry and herb flavors that finish dry and spicy. It's a bit rough-edged right out of the bottle, but the combination of decanting and drinking it with a rich, fatty steak will improve it tremendously at the table.

properties.title: Melini 2010 Terrarossa  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: 53036 Gaggiano, Province of Siena, Italy
properties.descrption: This straightforward selection offers plum and cherry sensations with hints of espresso and chocolate. The simple style will work well with pasta dishes and cheeses.

properties.title: Novy 2010 Garys' Vineyard Syrah (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 20299 Quivira Rd, Bucyrus, KS 66013, USA
properties.descrption: This is tremendous in blackberries, currants and plums, with grilled meat and black pepper notes, and the tannins are rich and profound. Right out of the screwtop, however, there's a tinny, metallic taste that detracts. Your best bet is to decant this fresh young wine and hope it blows off.

properties.title: Principe Corsini Fattoria Le Corti 2010  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Via San Piero di Sotto, 1, 50026 San Casciano in Val di pesa FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aged partly in concrete vats and partly in oak, this shows concentrated sensations of ripe plum, sour cherry and raspberry layered with espresso notes. Pair this with grilled vegetables or spicy cheeses.

properties.title: Saget la Perrière 2010 Domaine des Grandes Esperances Les Ailes Pourpres Cabernet Franc (Touraine Amboise)
properties.address: Rue de Charenton, 58150 Pouilly-sur-Loire, France
properties.descrption: A cool Cabernet, fresh rather than structured. It's obvious the wine has been worked hard to get out the red fruit flavors and tannins, and it doesn't quite work. It feels extracted with bitterness as well as a more attractive fruitiness.

properties.title: Barone Ricasoli 2011 Brolio  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Madonna a Brolio, 53013 Gaiole In Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This young wine offers aromas of underbrush and mushroom, along with evident oak and toasted notes. The palate is still rather closed but reveals oak, plum, espresso and coffee flavors. It's tightly knit, with astringent wood tannins that linger through the close.

properties.title: Casale di Daviddi 2011  Rosso di Montepulciano
properties.address: Via di Nottola, 9, 53045 Montepulciano Stazione SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This friendly rosso has aromas of ripe plum and black fruits, with a hint of tobacco leaf. The palate shows sweet black cherry and plum flavors laced with cinnamon spice. The warm midpalate is uplifted by just enough freshness, but this is best enjoyed young.

properties.title: Casalvento Radda 2012 Rosé Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Loc casalvento, 53017 Radda in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made from Sangiovese, this refreshing rosé has floral aromas of iris and white violet. The palate offers strawberry, crushed cherry and pink grapefruit flavors. Thanks to its crisp nature, this would work wonderfully with pizza.

properties.title: Castello di Meleto 2010  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Località Castello di Meleto, 53013 Gaiole In Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This straightforward selection has aromas of violet, plum and light toast. The palate offers ripe, black fruit and pepper flavors, partnered with brisk acidity and firm tannins.

properties.title: Cecchi 2011  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Loc. Casina dei Ponti 56, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This is a simple yet well made Chianti Classico with fresh and juicy black fruit, cinnamon spice and dense plum aromas and flavors. It's accessible and versatile for pairing with food; try it with barbecued chicken, spicy soy burgers or pork chops.

properties.title: Tenuta di Lilliano 2011  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Località Lilliano, 8, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This young Chianti Classico is still a bit closed, but it reveals cherry and raspberry sensations along with black- and white-pepper notes. It's still tightly knit but it should should open up well after one or two more years bottle aging.

properties.title: Joseph Phelps 2011 Quarter Moon Vineyard Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 200 Taplin Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Credit the cool vintage for this Pinot's mouthwatering acidity. The wine is rich but pristine with fruit, a testament to Phelps' superb viticultural practices and attention to detail at the sorting table. It's dry and crisp, yet rich and delicious, with flavors of strawberry and raspberry jam, rosehip tea and cedar. The tannins give the wine a velvety grip. As good as it is now, it would be a shame not to cellar it. Your window of drinkability begins in 2019 and extends for 15 years after.

properties.title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2011 Cuvée Arlette Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14545 148th Ave NE #211, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Winemaker Kit Singh has tweaked this Right Bank-style blend, but it remains solidly anchored in 49% Merlot and 29% Cabernet Franc, with a small amount of Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot. Tart, young raspberry and pomegranate fruit flavors are set against vividly crisp mineral notes. Tannins are supple and proportionate and the flavors beautifully defined. On the finish, a delightful detail of carpaccio appears.

properties.title: Dunham 2009 Lewis Vineyard Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 150 E Boeing Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The 2009 Lewis Merlot is in peak form—a dark, smoky, dare we say 'brooding' wine with generous swatches of cassis, espresso, cacao, licorice and sandalwood. It glides into a silky, seamless, sexy finish, lingering generously for a minute or more.

properties.title: Maison Bleue 2011 La Montagnette Upland Vineyard Grenache (Snipes Mountain)
properties.address: 20 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: An expressive, vibrantly pure wine with a complex medley of notes including dark raspberries, wet gravel, crushed flowers and cherry. Aged in five year old French oak barrels, it's vivid and focused with an initial elegance and delicacy that continues to flesh out and evolve over time. Give it some time in the cellar to see it at its best.

properties.title: Blue Rock 2010 Best Barrels Malbec (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 24509 Rich Ranch Rd, Cloverdale, CA 95425, USA
properties.descrption: This Malbec is lush with flavors of ripe blueberries, blackberry jam, mocha and cassis all wrapped up with toasty oak. There's fine acidity and rich tannins as well. It's one of the best examples of the variety in California, and endlessly enjoyable through a long, spicy finish. Kudos to winemaker/owner Kenny Kahn.

properties.title: Krutzler 2011 Perwolff Blaufränkisch (Burgenland)
properties.address: Deutsch-Schützen Weinberg 205-252, 7474 Deutsch-Schützner Bergen, Austria
properties.descrption: The combination of just-ripe cherry fruit and fresh blackberries with bracing acidity distinguishes this clean-cut red. A totally winning interplay of refreshingly tart fruit in a gentle structure, carefully framed by oak, this shows immense purity and is joy to drink. Drink after 2015.

properties.title: Sante Arcangeli 2012 Split Rail Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 79 North St, Pescadero, CA 94060, USA
properties.descrption: With a pale color and mouthwatering acidity, this delicately structured Pinot goes well beyond its immediate flavors of raspberry tea, pomegranates, persimmons, orange peel, exotic spices and oak to offer a Burgundian touch of earth and mushrooms. There's also a firm, stony minerality on the palate. This gorgeous Pinot was produced in tiny quantities of 300 cases and will drink well over the next six years.

properties.title: Owen Roe 2011 Red Willow Vineyard Chapel Block Syrah (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 309 Gangl Rd, Wapato, WA 98951, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced from what is arguably Red Willow's finest block of Syrah, this is superbly balanced and remarkably concentrated for this cool site from a cool vintage. Cassis fruit is streaked with licorice and mocha, showing plenty of new oak influence without sacrificing depth or fruit. Drink soon or tuck it away for a few more years; either way it's a gem.

properties.title: Brooks 2014 La Chenaie Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 21101 SE Cherry Blossom Ln, Amity, OR 97101, USA
properties.descrption: Just three barrels were made of this rather unusual wine. It's a seemingly disparate mix of raspberries, gun metal, dried seaweed and carpaccio, yet somehow it all comes together. The length is impressive. This is one of those wines that will thrill some tasters and puzzle others.

properties.title: Viñedos de Paganos 2013 La Nieta  (Rioja)
properties.address: Navaridas Errepidea, s/n, 01309 Páganos, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Typically dark in color, with plum, blackberry and a touch of raisin on the nose, this feels a bit jammy, with a shock of acidity and hard tannins. Prune, baked plum and baking-spice flavors finish toasty and charred, with dry rough tannins. Drink through 2025.

properties.title: Tenuta di Capraia 2011 Effe 55 Gran Selezione  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Unnamed Road,, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: The subtle nose of this all-Sangiovese wine suggests ripe black-skinned fruit, pressed violets and dark spices. The linear palate offers dried black cherry, licorice, clove and chopped herb flavors, pulled taut by firm, fine-grained tannins that lead to a coffee-inflected finish.

properties.title: J Vineyards & Winery 2014 J Nicole's Vineyard Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 11447 Old Redwood Hwy, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Floral and earthy in tone, this vineyard-designated wine has an undercurrent of spice to it that complements its baked plum, orange and cranberry fruit. Medium bodied, ripe and concentrated, it offers breadth and softness of texture.

properties.title: Otazu 2006 Altar Red (Navarra)
properties.address: Señorío de Otazu, 31174 Otazu, Navarra, Spain
properties.descrption: Cool rooty aromas of cola and tree bark grace the nose on this ripe but still not fully mature Cabernet Sauvignon (with 5% Merlot). In the mouth, this is choppy due to sandpaper tannins. Flavors of sarsaparilla, pepper, and blackberry are dense and chewy, while the finish is bumpy and scraping due to aforementioned hard tannins. Drink or hold through 2022.

properties.title: Príncipe de Viana 2013 Edición Limitada Red (Navarra)
properties.address: C. Mayor, 191, 31521 Murchante, Navarra, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of cherry, plum, forest floor and tobacco feed into a clampy palate with fresh acidity. Lightly spiced currant and red-plum flavors are limited in scope but nice, while this tastes herbal and feels tight and racy on the finish.

properties.title: Jim Barry 2014 The Lodge Hill Shiraz (Clare Valley)
properties.address: 33 Craig Hill Rd, Clare SA 5453, Australia
properties.descrption: This juicy, medium-bodied Shiraz is filled with mouthwatering cherry-berry fruit. Some silky tannins provide structure, but this is much more about the here and now than any sort of cellaring. The fruit persists through the finish, joined by hints of herbs and bacon. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Comenge 2011 Familia Comenge Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Camino del Castillo, s/n, 47316 Curiel de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy and a touch gritty smelling on first take, this gets riper, cleaner and better the longer it catches air. A full slightly tannic palate is mildly abrasive, while tea, herbal berry and chocolaty oak flavors are appealing. A spicy peppery chocolaty finish is not shedding its drying tannins. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: CVNE 2010 Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Costa del Vino, 21, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: For a tight, snappy rendition of Rioja, this answers the call. Herbal plum and tomato aromas are earthy and a touch horsey. Tomato, plum and herbal flavors amount to a saucy whole, while this is fresh, herbal and brothy tasting on a crisp finish.

properties.title: Bleasdale 2013 Bremerview Shiraz (Langhorne Creek)
properties.address: 1640 Langhorne Creek Rd, Langhorne Creek SA 5255, Australia
properties.descrption: Classic hints of mint mark the black-cherry and cassis aromas of this wine. On the palate, the fruit is reasonably restrained but pure, barely touched by dried spices and cedar, then glides to a silky finish. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Friedeman 2014 Dichotomy Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 180 Morris St, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: A fairly priced varietal wine, this shows currant, cranberry, raisin and a flurry of allspice on the nose. It takes on rose petal and lavender aromas as it opens, making it all the more pleasant and memorable.

properties.title: Allimant-Laugner 2015 Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: 10 Grand Rue, 67600 Orschwiller, France
properties.descrption: An aromatic hint of pine mixes with the red cherry notes on the nose, creating a very appetizing opening. The ultralight palate is translucent and slender, with the same leafy conifer aromas and lots and lots of red currant brightness and freshness. The light crunchy nature of this wine suggests that this is ideal for chilling. It's a weightless, very aromatic, and ultra-light-bodied red.

properties.title: Alma Rosa 2014 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1623 Mission Dr, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.descrption: Tart cherry, baking spice and dried chaparral show on the nose of this appellation blend from pioneering vintner Richard Sanford and Nick de Luca, making for a soft and easy entry. It's light and refreshing on the palate, with a bit of tannic depth, offering dried cranberry, juniper and garrigue-inflected flavors. Lively and vibrant with herbal depth.

properties.title: Ampelos 2014 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 312 N 9th St, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: This is a light, graceful red that's stemmy and fresh in a mix of well-integrated cranberry, rhubarb and cardamom flavors. An undercurrent of earthy truffle plays on the palate, weaving its way to a long finish.

properties.title: Argentiera 2013  Bolgheri
properties.address: via Vecchia Aurelia 412A località i Pianali, 57022 Donoratico LI, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of predominantly Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot with 10% Cabernet Franc, this opens with black-skinned berry, scorched earth and cooking spice aromas. The concentrated palate delivers black currant, mocha and licorice flavors with a hint of black pepper, all set against a backdrop of fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: Avignonesi 2012 Grandi Annate  (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
properties.address: Via Colonica, 1, 53045 Montepulciano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Ripe plum, coconut, vanilla and French oak aromas lead the nose. Youthfully assertive and austere, the palate offers toasted oak, licorice and espresso notes, set against a backdrop of bracing tannins that grip the finish. That structure should mellow and integrate with a few more years of bottle age.

properties.title: Brunelli Martoccia 2012  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Loc. La Martoccia, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Dark-skinned berry, underbrush and leather are some of the aromas you'll find in this juicy Brunello. The palate doles out fleshy black cherry, raspberry jam and clove flavors held together by fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity. Enjoy 2018–2023.

properties.title: Brutocao 2012 Bliss Vineyard Estate Bottled Zinfandel (Mendocino)
properties.address: 13500 US-101, Hopland, CA 95449, USA
properties.descrption: A classic Zinfandel with its unmistakable spice aroma and wild berry flavor, this is dry and tannic enough to provide balance. Medium bodied, it packs plenty of flavor and an appetizing mouthfeel.

properties.title: Camigliano 2012 Paesaggio Inatteso  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Via d'Ingresso 2, Loc. Camigliano, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Forest floor, leather, pressed violet and balsamic notes meld together in the glass. The palate is firm and linear, offering dried cherry, tart cranberry, crushed herb and licorice notes, set against youthfully assertive, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2019–2025.

properties.title: Piocho 2011 Reserve Red (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
properties.address: 30 El Paseo, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, USA
properties.descrption: This is a cohesive and well-integrated blend of 34% Cabernet Franc, 29% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Merlot, 9% Petit Verdot and 8% Malbec. It offers blackberry, black currant, cedar, toasty oak, violets, roast beef, black pepper and pencil lead on the nose. The well-hewn palate combines pepper and blackberry at the tip of the sip, followed by oaky vanilla and a touch of pine. it's very well focused.

properties.title: Small Vines 2014 Baranoff Vineyard Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1600 Barlow Ln, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: From a vineyard planted in rocky red soil, this wine shows a depth of concentrated and intense cranberry and black tea. It's currently youthful in feel, with structured tannins and full, rich chocolate and coffee flavors. It will benefit from time in the cellar, so enjoy 2020–2024.

properties.title: Tenuta di Sesta 2010 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Loc. Sesta, 53024 Castelnuovo dell'Abate Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Leafy underbrush, sunbaked earth, star anise and a whiff of new leather lead the way. The firm, elegantly structured palate offers mature wild cherry, crushed raspberry, licorice and clove alongside a backbone of firm, rounded tannins. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Johanneshof Reinisch 2014 Frauenfeld St. Laurent (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Im Weingarten 1, 2523 Tattendorf, Austria
properties.descrption: Something floral and soft hovers above the fruit. There also is the rich hazel presence of fine oak. The fruit is beautifully luminous: very aromatic red cherry is drenched in the soft vanilla of oak. The tannins are silky but dense. White pepper shimmers everywhere, supported by the inherent freshness of the palate. This still needs time. Drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Kokomo 2014 Cuvée Red (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 4791 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Perfumed and high-toned, this is an impressively crafted and priced blend of 35% Merlot, 24% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Malbec, 16% Grenache and 5% Petite Sirah. It shows a peek into each variety's personality, luxuriating in black pepper, leather, meat and black jam, with a juicy lushness to the palate.

properties.title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi 2013 Montesodi Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Via Aretina, 120, 50065 Sieci FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with Sangiovese, this vibrant red opens with aromas of fresh violet, woodland berry, underbrush, new leather and a balsamic note. The linear, elegant palate delivers crushed raspberry, wild cherry, star anise and a hint of white pepper. It boasts youthful tension, with taut polished tannins and bright acidity that give it an ageworthy structure. Give it a few more years to come together. Drink 2019–2028.

properties.title: Zoetic Wines 2014 Block 21 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1774 New York, U.S. 9, Germantown, NY 12526, USA
properties.descrption: Baking spice wraps around sizzling acidity in this well-made, full-bodied red from the heart of the appellation's Westside Road. Dark fruit is represented within a stemmy, brooding and slightly carbonic texture that's complex and rewarding.

properties.title: Mazzei 2012 Mix 36 Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Via Ottone III di Sassonia n. 5 Loc, 53011 Fonterutoli SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely from Sangiovese, this polished red opens with aromas of red berry, violet, sunbaked earth and a whiff of thyme. Structured and smooth, the palate delivers juicy red cherry, cinnamon and clove alongside fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2023.

properties.title: J. Lohr 2013 Cuvée Pau Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 6169 Airport Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This Cabernet Sauvignon-based ode to Pauillac improves immensely as it sits open for days, suggesting great ageability. Black currant, gravel, teriyaki and dark chocolate show on the nose, leading into a palate that is tightly wound with chalky tannins. Flavors of black fruit, charcoal, pencil shavings and coffee slowly emerge. Drink 2019–2033.

properties.title: Bacio Divino 2014 Red (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: A Cabernet Sauvignon-dominant blend from heritage vineyards farmed by Andy Beckstoffer, this wine tastes of chocolate-covered clove, sage and a waft of eucalyptus, thick in concentration and firm, integrated tannin. While it presents itself as a big, bold wine, it retains balance and grace in the glass.

properties.title: Biondi Santi 2012  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Unnamed Road, 53024, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Lovely scents of violet, iris and fragrant woodland berry lead the way along with a whiff of pressed powder. The fresh silky palate doles out ripe wild cherry, lip-smacking strawberry, white pepper and a hint of pipe tobacco. Firm tannins give it an almost Brunello-like structure. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Brophy Clark 2014 Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 6785 Creston Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Though an appellation blend, this bottling often comes from a single vineyard and is treated with great care, resulting in a complete package. That starts with baked red cherry, mulberry and tangy plum on the nose, dusted with nutmeg and hickory smoke. The intriguing flavor profile offers tangy black raspberry, suave hibiscus and other red-flower touches along with clove stick and cinnamon spice.

properties.title: Domaine Baron de l'Ecluse 2015 Les Garances  (Côte de Brouilly)
properties.address: Ecluse, 69460 Odenas, France
properties.descrption: From a parcel on this 12-acre estate, the wine is structured and rich. It has layers of firm tannins under the black fruits. Acidity and a crisp mineral texture mix with the solid structure and concentration. The aftertaste shows the generous future of this fine cru wine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine du Vissoux 2015 Les Garants  (Fleurie)
properties.address: Le Vissoux, 69620 Saint-Vérand, France
properties.descrption: The Chermette family has produced a rich generous cru wine. It is structured and dense with some firm tannins from maturing in wood. It also has a generous black plum and cherry fruits that are developing well. Drink this wine from late 2017.

properties.title: Fontodi 2013 Flaccianello della Pieve Sangiovese (Colli della Toscana Centrale)
properties.address: Località San Leolino, 89, 50022 Greve in Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely with organically farmed Sangiovese, this opens with aromas mature black-skinned fruit, French oak, exotic spice and a whiff of blue flower. The vibrant palate is both elegant and structured, delivering juicy black cherry, pomegranate, mocha, licorice and a potpourri of cooking spice. It's well balanced, with bright acidity and fine-grained tannins. It already dazzles, but hold for even more complexity. Drink 2018–2028.

properties.title: Rubino Estates Winery 2013 Riserva Collection Sangiovese (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 1188 Vineyard Ave, Pleasanton, CA 94566, USA
properties.descrption: Smoky, charred-oak aromas and flavors streak through this otherwise smooth, ripe and moderately fruity wine. It is full bodied and firmly tannic but not coarse.

properties.title: Sierra Norte 2014 Porta Regia Colección Privada 5 Meses Monastrell (Jumilla)
properties.address: Diseminado Diseminados, 208, 46390 Requena, Valencia, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of black cherry, cassis and desert brush hint at complexity. A flush, structured palate deals blackberry, cassis, spice, herb and chocolate flavors. Despite mild heat and rubbery tannins on the finish, this is largely a complete Monastrell.

properties.title: Spell 2014 Nichole's Blend Pinot Noir (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: This blends fruit from DeVoto in the Sebastopol Hills with grapes from Terra de Promissio, Umino and Alder Springs vineyards. It's soft and thick, with rich, ripe flavors of cranberry, pomegranate and cherry, a sizzling sense of cola spice underlying it all.

properties.title: Talisman 2013 Wildcat Mountain Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 13651 Arnold Dr, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: Presenting at first as somewhat reduced, this wine is tart and feral, with a muskiness reminiscent of mushroom and forest floor. Its intensely voluptuous body is concentrated in black cherry, cola and cardamom, with a richness and roundness on the palate and finish.

properties.title: Quinta do Arrobe 2012 Quinto Elemento Reserva Syrah (Tejo)
properties.address: 2000 Casével, Portugal
properties.descrption: Finely structured and with a good balance between acidity and ripe black fruits, this is a perfumed wine. It is densely textured, firm and keeping plenty of fruit. Drink this wine from 2017.

properties.title: Real Companhia Velha 2013 Porca de Murça Reserva Tinto Red (Douro)
properties.address: 4431-952, R. Azevedo Magalhães 314, 4431-952 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: Coming from the plateau above the river Douro, this wine has a cool edge with plenty of acidity. At the same time it is ripe with spice from 12 months of wood aging and full of black-currant fruitiness. Drink this wine now.

properties.title: Lexington 2013 Gist Ranch Estate Merlot (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 2000 Dog Hollow Rd, Lynnville, TN 38472, USA
properties.descrption: A shy nose of blueberry jelly, lilac and a touch of black tea show on this wine from a project connected to the Thomas Fogarty team. Light red plum, tart pomegranate and even raspberry show on the palate, where a dainty structure proves easy to sip, with additional chipped-slate minerality.

properties.title: Pezzi King 2013 Row 22 Reserve Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 412 Hudson St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: There's surprising brightness to this wine that otherwise traffics in dense chocolate and tightly woven tannin. Beyond full bodied and undeniably ripe, it somehow finds a balance that allows for a palatable experience.

properties.title: Rancho Sisquoc 2014 Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 6600 Foxen Canyon Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Pomegranate, hibiscus and dense red melon notes combine with clove and sandalwood on the nose of this wine that is a bit reserved though nicely layered. Red-plum fruit tones emerge from behind a veil of cracked graphite and dried oregano, with vibrant acidity making for a very easy-to-drink wine.

properties.title: Sobon Estate 2012 Rezerve Tannat (Lodi)
properties.address: 14430 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Overt and delicious oak aromas and flavors dominate this full-bodied, tannic wine. It smells like fresh-cut oak boards and tastes like cinnamon, cardamom and black cherries, finishing with lingering tannic grip.

properties.title: Vignobles Carreau Selection 2014 Château Clairac Grande Réserve  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: Château Les Petits Arnauds, 33390 Cars, France
properties.descrption: This wine is dense with tannins while not losing sight of the ripe berry fruits. The balance is coming together well, giving a structured wine that also has fine fresh black fruits. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Bucher 2014 Bucher Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 5293 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This wine presents as elegant and remarkably earthy, laced in a distinct tartness of cranberry and citrus. Lighter styled, it is integrated in tannin and oak, allowing for a smooth texture.

properties.title: Château Béard la Chapelle 2012  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: 4 Peyrelongue, 33330 Saint-Laurent-des-Combes, France
properties.descrption: With 90% Merlot, this is a full supple wine from the eastern end of Saint-Emilion. There are tannins that support the perfumed blackberry fruit and the balanced acidity. The wine is ready to drink now, although it will be better from 2017.

properties.title: Château la Croix St-Pierre 2014  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 88-116 Rue de Catusseau, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: The seventh generation of the Carreau family has produced this rich full-bodied and structured wine. It has dense tannins as well as plenty of ripe red fruits. The structure suggests the wine will continue to age, so drink this ripe wine from 2017.

properties.title: Château Lamothe-Vincent 2014 Le Grand Rossignol  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 3 Laurenceau, 33760 Montignac, France
properties.descrption: This is a smoky wine, full of rich strawberry flavors. Its tannins come from the wood aging that cuts through the fruit. With acidity as well, the wine is developing well and should be ready from 2017.

properties.title: Château Lescalle 2014  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: Château Lescale, 111 Chem. du Bord de l'Eau, 33460 Macau, France
properties.descrption: While there are plenty of firm tannins, there is also some fine red-berry fruit and layers of spice. The wine is structured as well, bringing the whole into balance. Drink this fine wine from 2018.

properties.title: Château Pey la Tour 2014 Réserve  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 33370 Sallebœuf, France
properties.descrption: This is a ripe generous wine that has solid tannins as well as red-plum flavors. It is concentrated and full of flavor. As the tannins soften, it is likely to be ready to drink from 2018.

properties.title: Verbena 2011 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: 53024 Montalcino, Province of Siena, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with aromas of black plum, French oak and roasted coffee bean. The dense palate offers dried black cherry, mocha and cedar alongside tightly packed tannins that leave a grippy, astringent finish. Drink soon to capture the remaining fruit richness.

properties.title: Il Grappolo 2012 Sassocheto  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.descrption: Subdued aromas of wild berry, scorched earth and roasted coffee bean slowly take shape on this. On the bracing palate, assertive, tightly knit tannins support dried red cherry, espresso, orange zest and a hint of grilled herb. Give the tannins another few years to unclench then drink to capture the remaining fruit.

properties.title: Il Poggione 2014 Leopoldo Franceschi  (Rosso di Montalcino)
properties.address: Montalcino, Province of Siena, 53024 Sant'Angelo In Colle SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of red berry, chopped herb, moist underbrush and new leather lead the way. The firm palate is less inviting than the nose, offering dried cherry, roasted coffee bean and grilled sage set against bracing grainy tannins that leave a somewhat raspy finish.

properties.title: Leonard Kreusch 2015 Sweet Red Dornfelder (Rheinhessen)
properties.address: Martinerfeld 61, 54294 Trier, Germany
properties.descrption: Pristinely ripe black cherry and blackberry flavors abound in this sweet, slightly syrupy red wine. It's plush and easy on the palate, held upright by sweet-tart cranberry acidity and the softest of tannins. It's an approachable, easy wine to enjoy now.

properties.title: Quinta do Arrobe 2013 Reserva Syrah (Tejo)
properties.address: 2000 Casével, Portugal
properties.descrption: A ripe wine with violet aromas and layers of ripe jammy berry flavors, this has robust tannins under the fruit, lending structure to its bold character. Acidity follows, adding a crisp texture to the aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Armandière 2014 Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: 760 Route du, Port de Langle, 46140 Parnac, France
properties.descrption: This third generation vineyard has produced a classic Cahors, with firm tannins that bring out the black fruits. It is richly structured while keeping fruitiness right to the fore. A wine for rich foods, it will be good to drink from 2018.

properties.title: Citille di Sopra 2011 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Pod. Citille di Sopra 46 Torrenieri, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of ripe black plum, cooking spice and scorched earth lead the nose. The robust, bulky palate offers prune, dried cherry, vanilla and a hint of white pepper set against bracing tannins while the heat of scorching alcohol throws it off balance. Drink soon to catch the remaining fruit.

properties.title: Clos d'Audhuy 2015 Les Polissons Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Clos d'Audhui, 46700 Lacapelle-Cabanac, France
properties.descrption: Produced from 30-year-old vines, this is a generous and open wine that is made to be drunk young. It has broad berry fruits, great tannins and acidity. The wine has no wood aging, keeping the bright fruitiness intact. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine de Grange Neuve 2014 La Fleur Lily Red (Bergerac)
properties.address: Lieu dit Grange Neuve, 24240 Pomport, France
properties.descrption: Ripe and fruity, this is a delicious wine. It has layers of red fruits and balanced acidity along with a gently smoky back taste. The structure is light, crisp and with the freshness that is typical of the vintage this close to Bordeaux. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Laurens 2015 Cuvée Pierres Rouges  (Marcillac)
properties.address: Graimenous, 11300 La Digne-d'Aval, France
properties.descrption: Also known as the Mansois, the Fer Servadou has produced a bright and fruity wine from vineyards in the foothills of France's central mountains. It is soft, juicy and with fine acidity that cuts through its red fruits. Drink now.

properties.title: Global Wines 2014 Encontro Q do E Merlot-Baga Red (Bairrada)
properties.address: 3430-144 Carregal do Sal, Portugal
properties.descrption: The Merlot certainly does its job here of smoothing out the Baga tannins. Together, they yield a soft, red fruit-flavored wine with minimal tannins and juicy acidity, adding a burst of flavor on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Joseph Swan Vineyards 2010 Trenton Estate Vineyard Syrah (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2916 Laguna Rd, Forestville, CA 95436, USA
properties.descrption: A light rendition of the variety given time in bottle to mellow, this is a stand-out wine redolent of black olive, fig and gamy, sanguine meat. Delicately peppered, it slowly unravels its layers of blueberry and cherry fruit, complementing its savory register of flavor.

properties.title: Marqués de Cáceres 2012 Gaudium Gran Vino  (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Fuenmayor, 11, 26350 Cenicero, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Saturated berry, cassis and black-plum aromas are densely packed onto the nose of this tightly built iron-fisted Rioja. Berry, plum and cassis flavors are lightly toasted and spicy, while this is juicy and bold on the finish. Best from 2020–2024.

properties.title: Muhr-Van der Niepoort 2014 Samt & Seide Blaufränkisch (Carnuntum)
properties.address: Spitzerberg, Kirchengasse 24, 2472 Prellenkirchen, Austria
properties.descrption: Lovely tart cranberry and just-ripe blueberry appear on the nose. The palate presents similarly appetizing crunchy red fruit that's pure and unpretentiously delicious, spiced with cinnamon and white pepper and brimming with freshness and verve. Don't let the light body deceive you; this has depth and will develop. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Nastl 2015 Klassik-Cuvée Red (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Gartenzeile 17, 3550 Langenlois, Austria
properties.descrption: Pure and vibrant dark and red cherry notes create an irresistible nose. The palate displays the same, invitingly juicy fruit. This is supple, slender, fresh and plump, with a joyful, balanced ripeness. Its tannins are smooth and ripe, ready to enjoy.

properties.title: Netzl 2015 Rubin Carnuntum Zweigelt (Carnuntum)
properties.address: Rosenbergstraße 17, 2464 Göttlesbrunn, Austria
properties.descrption: This wine's nose is still closed, but its palate presents velvety, cinnamon- and vanilla-tinged black cherry fruit. The tannic structure acts like a velvet grip around its pleasantly fruit-dense core. That richness is countered by freshness in a package that's sure to give lots of pleasure through 2022.

properties.title: Nicora 2014 Slide Hill Vineyard Syrah (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 2945 Limestone Way, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Winemaker Nick Elliott taps into the biodynamic vineyard planted by Syrah legend Bob Lindquist to deliver this rich bottling. It's full of roasted black fruit aromasl, with nori, soy and even organ meat touches on the nose. Peppery spice and charred beef flavors accent the lavish palate, while thick tannins frame ripe black-currant flavors on a bed of unwavering acidity.

properties.title: Pellet Estate 2014 Pellet Vineyard Henry's Reserve Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1241 Adams St #1002, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This small-production blend of 85% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Merlot from winemaker Tom Rinaldi is rounded and juicy, with moderate acidity. It shows generous clove, cinnamon and black cherry flavors, the structure supportive and graceful.

properties.title: Ponzi 2015 Tavola Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 19500 SW Mountain Home Rd, Sherwood, OR 97140, USA
properties.descrption: Stunningly good for an entry-level Pinot Noir, this new Tavola gets the sort of care generally reserved for reserves. Native yeast fermentation and almost a year in 20% new French oak is where it starts; then a barrel selection is made and it's bottled unfined and unfiltered. Deep flavors emphasize black fruits, with a dash of pepper highlighting the finish.

properties.title: Qupé 2014 Sawyer-Lindquist Vineyard Syrah (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 4665 Santa Maria Mesa Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: This bottling from Syrah legend Bob Lindquist, sourced from the biodynamic vineyard that he planted, delivers snappy boysenberry, white pepper, rosemary and lavender aromas. The palate judiciously balances savory, peppery spice and lush purple floral notes with tangy black plum fruit and rosehip accents, making for a wondrous sip.

properties.title: Renwood 2014 Grandpère Special Reserve Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.address: 12225 Steiner Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: This densely textured, deeply flavored wine showcases the beauty of old vines in Amador terroir. It has an opaque color, opulent clove, blackberry and cassis aromas, and ripe, jammy flavors that drench the palate yet are supported by tannins firm enough to keep it balanced and appetizing. Best after 2020.

properties.title: Renwood 2014 Jack Rabbit Flat Vineyard Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.descrption: Loads of ripe blackberry and boysenberry aromas lead to a plush, not quite soft mouthfeel laced with berry, cherry, clove and cinnamon flavors. It's a very generous, mouth-filling wine that will bring a lot of enjoyment.

properties.title: Uwe Schiefer 2014 Schiefer Blaufränkisch (Eisenberg)
properties.address: Welgersdorf 3, 7503 Großpetersdorf, Austria
properties.descrption: Delicious blueberry, plum and cinnamon notes are still shy on the nose. The palate also holds them tight with pervading, lively freshness and a very slight spritz. White pepper spice colors the edges, making for an exciting, concentrated but light-footed wine that has rusticity and elegance in equal measure. Lovely now but sure to develop. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Viña Cobos 2014 Bramare Malbec (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.address: Costa Flores s/n y, RN7, M5509 Perdriel, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Dense mossy aromas of blackberry are slightly murky. Forget about delicacy on the palate, this is full-bodied and clattering. Blackberry, cassis, black cherry and chocolate flavors finish spicy. This is at maximum ripeness. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Bergström 2014 Le Pré du Col Vineyard Pinot Noir (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.address: 8115 NE Worden Hill Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: In French, the vineyard name means “the meadow on the mountain,” a fitting name for the site. This is a spicy wine, with a touch of red-hot candy. The pretty cherry fruit is underscored with earth and mineral, and the astringent, tea-flavored tannins morph into a suggestion of cola at the tail end.

properties.title: Domaine Serene 2014 Yamhill Cuvée Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6555 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: Aromatic and lushly scented with rhubarb, strawberry, cola, root beer and cocoa powder, this is immediately accessible, and yet structured to age if you can keep your hands off of it. Streaks of beet root sneak in around raspberry and cherry fruit, with firm tannins and highlights of toast, coffee, caramel and dark chocolate. This is a very fine cuvée that seems to gain focus as it rolls through the finish.

properties.title: Donnafugata 2005 Mille e Una Notte  (Contessa Entellina)
properties.address: SS624, Km 60, 90030 Palermo PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Mille e Una Notte is a modern, thickly extracted Nero d'Avola-based red wine with elegant tones of blackberry, plum, spice, vanilla and clove. Its long finish ends with chewy tannins and excellent succulence. Donnafugata recently completed an ambitious Bordeaux-style underground cellar (among the biggest in southern Italy) for aging this showcase wine.

properties.title: Paternoster 2004 Riserva Don Anselmo  (Aglianico del Vulture)
properties.address: Contrada Valle del Titolo, 85022 Barile PZ, Italy
properties.descrption: Don Anselmo is among Basilicata's most important wines because it does a phenomenal job of highlighting the potential of this volcanic territory and the Aglianico grape. This interpretation focuses on soft, velvety tones of black cherry, graphite and spice that peel off in layers. The wine has a dark, concentrated color followed by great intensity, power and rock-hard tannins that need a few more years of bottle aging.

properties.title: Vistalba 2006 Corte A Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Roque Sáenz Peña 3531, Vistalba, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Top-notch Malbec blended with other varieties gives Corte A a chance at greatness. In its current juvenile state, the wine is fresh, expressive and exotic on the nose, with mineral, licorice and spice in addition to a lot of driving berry character. The core is a touch racy and acidic, so this is no mushy fruit bomb. Instead it is serious wine with a lot of oak, polish and pizzazz.

properties.title: Donnafugata 2004 Mille e Una Notte  (Contessa Entellina)
properties.address: SS624, Km 60, 90030 Palermo PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Always a top shelf ruby red from Sicily, this vintage of Mille e Una Notte shows more spice and mature fruit, backed by black olive and almond. The tannins here have a touch more astringency and grit but this thickly extracted wine ends with soft, yielding succulence and gorgeous cherry flavors.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2005 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The estate Syrah immediately shows a toastier nose and richer fruit than the excellent Columbia Valley bottling. Along with cassis, black cherry and blackberry fruit are powerful layers of toasted nuts, butterscotch and coffee. At the moment the wine seems still to be holding something back; decanting and substantial breathing time are highly recommended.

properties.title: Rivera 2005 Puer Apuliae Nero di Troia (Castel del Monte)
properties.address: SP231, km 60,500, 76123 Andria BT, Italy
properties.descrption: A pure expression of the Nero di Troia grape, Puer Apuliae is a beautifully executed wine with precise aromas of red berry fruit, root beer and cassis. It has an exciting and inviting personality and the mouthfeel  is smooth, supple and slightly sweet. Pair it with porchetta or honey roasted ham.

properties.title: Siduri 2006 Clos Pepe Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 235 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Offering considerable weight and depth of flavor, this Pinot, from one of the most respected vineyards in the appellation, offers mid-term aging prospects. Dry and spicy, it offers powerful flavors of grilled cherries, red currants, licorice, cola and smoky oak. Drink now through 2012.

properties.title: Buoncristiani 2005 Artistico Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2275 Soda Canyon Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Tannins weigh this Syrah down, making it toughly astringent, a wine that makes your mouth pucker. Through all that, you can taste the massive flavors of black currants, red licorice, violets, cloves and peppery grilled veal that are pure, dry and profound. Is it an ager? The pedigree suggests yes. The wine is a blend of the Caldwell, Stagecoach and Hyde-Oak Knoll vineyards. Stash it through mid-2009, if not longer.

properties.title: Herdade do Esporão 2005 Reserva Red (Alentejo)
properties.address: 9CJR+7GW, 7200, Portugal
properties.descrption: A rich, smooth wine that wears its ripeness and opulence with grace. The structure is all there, a dry center that supports the blackberry jelly and sweet fruits, as well as acidity, a vivid freshness that acts as a foil to all the rich, meaty flavors.

properties.title: Yangarra Estate Vineyard 2006 Single Vineyard Shiraz (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: 809 McLaren Flat Rd, Kangarilla SA 5157, Australia
properties.descrption: A unique blend of spice and blueberry sets this Shiraz apart from the pack, and it pulls away even further due to a lush, creamy texture and long, mouthcoating finish. There's great purity to the fruit, but enough peppery spice for complexity. Drink now–2016.

properties.title: Peter Lehmann 2004 Stonewell Shiraz (Barossa)
properties.address: Para Rd, Tanunda SA 5352, Australia
properties.descrption: The price keeps creeping up, but at least this is one Australian wine that consistently delivers vintage after vintage. The 2004 offers classic aromas of cassis, cinnamon and clove, with a touch of cracked pepper for good measure. It's full-bodied without going overboard, with a rich texture and a long, clean finish filled with complex spice notes. Good now, should be even better in 10 years.

properties.title: Poças 2005 Vale de Cavalhos Red (Douro)
properties.address: R. Visc. das Devesas 168, 4401-901 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: Classic Douro varieties give a finely structured wine, its blackberry fruit flavors subordinated to an elegant mineral character, with dark tannins and tight acidity. An impressive, rich, also restrained wine.

properties.title: Salvatore Molettieri 2003 Riserva Vigna Cinque Querce  (Taurasi)
properties.descrption: Here's a modern and beautiful wine with warming tones of vanilla, spice, chocolate and blackberry. The wine is thick and dense with dark extraction and very solid tannins. Drink after 2010. A Marc de Grazia selection, various American importers.

properties.title: Spring Mountain Vineyard 2005 Estate Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2805 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: From the estate vineyard on Spring Mountain comes this dense, powerful Syrah. It's a big wine, packed with black currants and chocolate and sturdy tannins that are a bit astringent right now. Yet the long finish, which turns up complex spices and olive tapenade and black pepper, suggests this wine has nowhere to go but up. Best after 2009.

properties.title: Nga Waka 2015 Three Paddles Pinot Noir (Martinborough)
properties.address: 6 Kitchener Street, Martinborough 5711, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Unmistakably a Kiwi Pinot Noir, with notes of Dr. Pepper, ripe bramble fruit, oaky spices and tree bark, it loses it's way a little on the palate, lacking the juicy fruit to stand up to all the oak.

properties.title: Argyle 2015 Grower Series Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 691 OR-99W, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: This big-production Pinot pierces through with smoke, char and stiff, earthy tannins. It's a chewy, rough wine, more herbal than fruity. It's got enough punch and power to hook up with grilled burgers or flank steak.

properties.title: Austerity 2015 Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 2805 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Concentrated candied cherry, sugar beet, rhubarb, cinnamon and clove aromas make for a sweet-smelling nose in this bottling. The palate proves much drier, showing complex vanilla, cranberry, eucalyptus and juniper flavors.

properties.title: Chaman 2016 Cabernet Franc (La Consulta)
properties.address: 450 S Chapman Rd, LaFollette, TN 37766, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of stewed black fruits and compost are leafy and a touch green. This has a wide-bodied mouthfeel and grabby tannins. Medicinal plum and berry flavors taste minty and herbal on the finish.

properties.title: Freja 2014 Estate Pinot Noir (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 16691 SW McFee Pl, Hillsboro, OR 97123, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has a light scent of animal funk and saddle leather around black-cherry fruit. Tannins are showing early signs of drying out, and it is probably best to enjoy by 2020.

properties.title: MacMurray Estate Vineyards 2015 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 9015 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Chocolate and mint notes combine effortlessly in this straightforward appellation wine, accented with rose, cherry and rhubarb. It features moderate acidity, thick tannins and weight.

properties.title: Martin Ranch 2014 Therese Vineyards Dos Niñas Vineyard Malbec (Santa Clara Valley)
properties.address: 6675 Redwood Retreat Rd, Gilroy, CA 95020, USA
properties.descrption: Prominent crushed gravel and stone notes meet leather and dust on the nose of this very earthy bottling, which shows a bit of blackberry as well. The palate is redolent with potpourri flavors and incredibly floral, with plum as the dominant fruit.

properties.title: Pech Merle 2014 Treborce Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 21001 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Blended with 8% Petite Sirah and aged less than a year in French and American oak, this wine is simple, with compostable earth scents and soft, round layers of brambly blackberry fruit.

properties.title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2013 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14545 148th Ave NE #211, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of fruit from Ambassador (Red Mountain) and Dineen (Rattlesnake Hills) vineyards, the aromas start off high toned, with notes of violets, talc and purple fruit. The flavors are big, dark and bold, packing a mouthful of fruit but not sacrificing on balance.

properties.title: Lynmar 2016 Rosé of Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Dark pink in color, this wine is marked by a nutty layering of light acidity and orange, Gravenstein apple and cherry flavors. It's delicate yet has enough stuffing and structure to pair with a wide array of dishes.

properties.title: Mark Ryan 2014 Wild Eyed Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: Ciel du Cheval Vineyard fruit makes up the majority of this wine, with the balance from Olsen Vineyard in the Yakima Valley. Aromas are bright and fruit forward, with notes of purple fruit and spice. The palate is rich, dense and dark, pulling up just a touch toward the finish.

properties.title: Matsu 2013 El Recio  (Toro)
properties.address: 129 W 27th St #9, New York, NY 10001, USA
properties.descrption: This firm, tannic wine's plum and black cherry aromas are matched by oaky maple and spice scents. Toasty, spicy black fruit and mocha flavors finish with a wave of toast, chocolate and spice. This is more bullish than elegant; drink through 2021.

properties.title: Miraflores 2013 Estate Malbec (El Dorado)
properties.address: 2120 Four Springs Trail, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: Bold, but complete and well-balanced, this full-bodied wine from a Sierra Foothills stalwart is packed with opulent black plum and cassis flavors and a firmly tannic texture. It starts with lightly smoky, peppery aromas and finishes with lingering fruit, spice and mocha notes. Best after 2020.

properties.title: Moorooduc 2014 The Moorooduc McIntyre Pinot Noir (Mornington Peninsula)
properties.address: 501 Derril Rd, Moorooduc VIC 3933, Australia
properties.descrption: A different vintage from the odd-numbered ones surrounding it, 2014 yielded wines of less ripeness and intensity. Despite that, this is a fine effort, offering overtones of green peppercorns, dried spices and fresh herbs over tart pie-cherry and cranberry fruit. It's taut and focused, silky without being soft. Drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Pursued by Bear 2013 Baby Bear Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 150 E Boeing Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: In this blend of fruit from Lewis and Phinny Hill vineyards, sweet spice, baking spice, vanilla and dark fruit lead to silky dark fruit and barrel flavors. The wood influence is primary but it still brings a lot of appeal.

properties.title: Sweetzer Cellars 2014 La Encantada Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 308 N 9th St unit c, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Light cranberry aromas meet turned loam, cinnamon and porcini mushroom-like umami touches in this bottling from a famed vineyard in the region. The mouthfeel is full and broad, but it's also lively with tart cranberry and raspberry fruit, earthy spice and a touch of raw beef rusticity

properties.title: Vall Llach 2014 Idus Red (Priorat)
properties.address: Carrer del Pont, 9, 43739 Porrera, Tarragona, Spain
properties.descrption: This wine's full dark berry and desert herb aromas are typical of Vall Llach. Its full-bodied, chunky palate delivers brandied black currant, black plum and baked berry flavors, with a finish that's strong with peppery, herbal notes. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Waxwing 2016 Blair Vineyard Rose of Pinot Noir (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 111 Industrial Rd #8, Belmont, CA 94002, USA
properties.descrption: Pale pink in the glass, this Pinot Noir-based rosé combines nectarine and watermelon aromas with a citrus spray and rose petal quality that provides both depth and tang on the nose. There is a good charge of acidity on the palate, as well as a grippy texture, while light stone fruit, mandarin orange and lime flavors prove quite mellow yet delicious.

properties.title: Bouchaine 2016 Vin Gris of Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 1075 Buchli Station Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: This blends 70% whole cluster-pressed juice with 30% saignée, vinified entirely in stainless steel. Fresh flower, cherry, strawberry and tangerine flavors wash brilliantly over the palate, lifted by acidity and just enough weight to feel lush.

properties.title: Coeur de Terre 2014 Renelle's Block Reserve Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 21000 SW Eagle Point Rd, McMinnville, OR 97128, USA
properties.descrption: Derived from the original planting in 1999, this nine-clone blend is a ripe, rich and complex wine, with the structure to age well over the medium term. Raspberry and cherry fruit comes with a touch of dried herb and the estate's signature minerality.

properties.title: Colinas do Douro 2015 Barquinha Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: Covas do Douro, 5085-222, Portugal
properties.descrption: Produced from old vines, this blend of Touriga Nacional, Touriga Franca and Tinta Roriz is rich and dense. It has firm tannins at this young stage although it is obviously going to become a generous rich wine as it develops. It has a fine future of complex structure and fruit. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Damsel 2014 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 18746 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: All coming from Stillwater Creek, this aromatic wine offers vibrant aromas of purple fruit along with herb, whiffs of smoked meat and violets. The palate is tart, bright and fresh, with lively acidity and good depth of flavor.

properties.title: Dominio Basconcillos 2011 Viña Magna Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: 09370 Gumiel de Izán, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: This heavily oaked Ribera del Duero features maple, barrel char, dried cheese, licorice and boysenberry jam aromas. The palate is so concentrated it's syrupy, its blackened oak, crème de cassis and chocolate flavors feeling heavy on the finish. Drink this saturated bruiser through 2022.

properties.title: Quinta do Noval 2013 Touriga Nacional (Douro)
properties.address: N322-3, 5085 Pinhão, Portugal
properties.descrption: The young wine is ripe, juicy, and richly structured. It is perfumed, with spice, red berry fruits, ripe tannins and inherent elegance. It will be an impressive wine as it matures. Give it until 2018.

properties.title: Shane Wines 2013 La Reine Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 637 Edenderry Dr, Vacaville, CA 95688, USA
properties.descrption: Vivid black cherry lights up the aroma and floods the flavors of this full-bodied, expressive wine. Attractive nuances of rhubarb and clove add complexity. The purity of fruit and absence of obvious oak give great focus and brightness that continue through the lingering finish. It will be best after 2018.

properties.title: Tantara 2014 Zotovich Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 2330 Westgate Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: There's unique sharpness to the chaparral spice on the nose of this bottling, where black sage meshes into rooty flavors of beet and rhubarb as well as violets and black tea. That Earl Grey tea component pops on the earthy palate, where baked black plum and black raspberry are laid across a base of dried purple flowers and pine-laden forest floor.

properties.title: Three Sticks 2014 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 143 W Spain St, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced from near the town of Sebastopol, in a site rich in Goldridge soils, this wine is juicy and complex, founded on a core of orange and cherry, with a tang of acidity that competes with the lushness. A brushy forest-floor note lies underneath the fruit, providing a lovely, savory counterpoint to the succulence.

properties.title: Left Bend 2013 Brosseau Vineyard Syrah (Chalone)
properties.address: 1020 Mt Madonna Rd, Watsonville, CA 95076, USA
properties.descrption: A bit lighter that other Syrahs of this small appellation, this bottling from a Santa Cruz-based producer shows light cherry juice, cinnamon, clove and gingerbread on the nose. Cola, black cherry, cranberry, leather and tobacco arise on the sip, but it's the intriguing crushed-gravel minerality that sets it apart.

properties.title: Maquis 2010 Viola Red (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Fundo Los Maquis s/n Valle de, Palmilla, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: This Carmenère-led blend opens with composed aromas of cherry, cassis and chocolate along with herbs and spice. The palate feels crisp and intense, with firm tannins and elegance. Roasted black-fruit flavors are peppery and chocolaty, while licorice and baking spice flavors grace a long finish. Contains 15% Cabernet Franc. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Migration 2013 Bien Nacido Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 1451 Stanly Ln, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Rich aromas of violets, lilacs and other purple flowers complement the turned loam, shiitake, ripe cranberry and dark hibiscus scents of this bottling by the Duckhorn family. Once sipped, flavors of hearty black plum, nutmeg, crushed gravel and Earl Grey tea prove extremely layered and earthy.

properties.title: Point & Line 2014 Reserve Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 435 SW 152nd St, Burien, WA 98166, USA
