properties.descrption: Just 50 cases exist of this cellar-worthy bottling from a team of restaurant professionals. The nose offers rounded plum pie, clove and inviting vanilla bean, while the palate is framed by chalky tannins that ensure long life, presenting flavors of baked black cherry, peppercorn, graphite, light mulberry and tart pomegranate. Drink 2018–2028.

properties.title: Quinta da Rede 2013 Grande Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: Av. Conselheiro José Maria Alpoim Nº166, 5040-324 Mesão Frio, Portugal
properties.descrption: Dominated by Touriga Nacional, this is a powerfully structured, rich wine. The wood aging shows through the mint flavors that brings complexity to the wine. Toast and spice also feature strongly while masking the ripe black plum fruits. Drink this impressive wine from 2018.

properties.title: Saviah 2013 The Stones Speak Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1979 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from the winery's estate vineyard in The Rocks District, this wine offers captivating notes of smoked meat, fire pit, flowers, black olive and peat that are followed by abundant fruit and savory flavors with a palate-coating lithe feel. Meaty flavors persist on the finish. It shows a spot-on sense of balance that thoroughly enchants.

properties.title: Alma Rosa 2013 Barrel Select Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1623 Mission Dr, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.descrption: Richard Sanford and winemaker Nick de Luca are making wines to stand the test of time, including this bottling that offers dried roses, rust and light cranberry on the nose. The palate combines turned earth, dried fennel and chipped sandalwood with delicate raspberry and strawberry fruit. That ethereal lightness will concentrate with time and last decades. Drink 2019–2033.

properties.title: Beckmen 2013 TLB Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2670 Ontiveros Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: The result of an accidental planting of these two varieties in the same block, this blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon and 30% Syrah provides prime evidence why these two grapes make for a dynamic duo. Aromas of roasted coffee, black-cherry paste, Dr Pepper, vanilla and elderberry prove both juicy and elegant. With a silky mouthfeel and polished acidity, the palate is layered with blueberry, blackcurrant, tobacco, leather and dark-chocolate flavors.

properties.title: Château Haut-Monplaisir 2012 Prestige Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Monplaisir, 46700 Lacapelle-Cabanac, France
properties.descrption: This is a powerful wine, full of dark fruits and dense dry tannins. Even at four years old, it is still young. It is impressive in its concentration with fine acidity  and black-plum flavors mingling with the tannins. Drink this serious wine from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Anderson 2013 Pinoli Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 9201 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: Tangy cherry flavors and a lip-smacking texture give a lot of life to this medium-bodied, tight and balanced wine. Great vibrancy comes from fruit flavors that are not overly ripe, and from moderate tannins and lively acidity that keep the mouthfeel fresh. A wonderful creaminess coats the tongue on the finish. Best after 2018.

properties.title: Shale Oak 2012 Ku Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3235 Oakdale Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of 64% Syrah, 24% Zinfandel and 12% Petite Sirah shows warm and inviting aromas of cherry, blueberry, brioche, vanilla and brown sugar on the nose. The palate is lush with black cherries, maple and smoke flavors, proving rich and ripe though extremely juicy and tasty. It's an attention grabber.

properties.title: Siduri 2014 Garys' Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: This wine by Adam Lee shows concentrated touches of nutmeg, crushed pepper and dried thyme laid across a base of hearty blackberries, with dried leaves on the nose. There is a strong herbal component to the sip, with eucalyptus oil and black-pepper dust spicing up the hearty beet juice and black-fruit core. A strong menthol lift arises on the finish.

properties.title: Testarossa 2014 Fogstone Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.descrption: This single-vineyard-focused winery controls four specific vineyards as monopole bottlings. This is one, showing black cherry, vanilla bean, nutmeg and a stony slate component on the nose. There is a soft density to the sip, with cranberries, graphite flakes and a sandalwood touch to the palate.

properties.title: Testarossa 2014 Garys' Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: Winemaker Bill Brousseau works to restrain the powerful ripeness that can come from one of the more famous vineyards in the appellation. This offers a nose with wound-up cranberry fruit, touches of hibiscus and rosebuds, and chipped-slate aromas. The palate shows juniper and pine-needle spice across a juicy black-cherry and black-plum core, with strong acidity and solid structure extending into a savory finish.

properties.title: Testarossa 2014 Sanford & Benedict Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.descrption: A brawny bottling from one of the state's most historic vineyards, this wine offers wild berries, turned earth, shiitake mushrooms and a light cinnamon glaze on the hearty nose. Rich cherry and plum fruit shows on the tip of the sip followed by rising waves of anise, eucalyptus and white sage. The mouthfeel is soft but with aggressive acidity.

properties.title: Iris Vineyards 2014 Steelhead Vineyard Syrah (Applegate Valley)
properties.address: 82110 Territorial Hwy, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.descrption: Though lightly ripened, this opens with classic varietal aromas of mint, spicy berry and pepper. It tends slightly to the green side of the fruit spectrum, with the acidity to age a bit further.

properties.title: Jack Barrett 2012 Pinot Noir (Central Coast)
properties.descrption: Rich black cherry, black-cardamom cream, smoked meat and touches of anise and tar show on the nose of this well-priced bottling from Kevin Riley of the Proulx Winery. There is lots of energy on the palate, with flavors of tart black raspbery, hibiscus, sagebrush and a touch of nutmeg.

properties.title: Château de Chambert 2014 La Tour Chambert Cuvée des Hauts Coteaux Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
properties.address: Château de Chambert Les Hauts Coteaux, 46700 Floressas, France
properties.descrption: This is the second wine of Château de Chambert, one that's made to be drunk young. It has bright red fruits and soft tannins that are well integrated into aromatic fruits that burst from the glass. Drink this wine now for its delicious fruitiness or wait until 2018 for the exuberant fruit to calm down.

properties.title: Château du Port 2014 Tertre-Perdigous Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
properties.address: 2290 S French Rd, Lake Leelanau, MI 49653, USA
properties.descrption: This pure Malbec is generous and ripe. It has concentration and dark berry fruits that come strongly through the tannic structure. As it develops, its texture will become increasingly more velvety, bringing out richness. Wait until 2018.

properties.title: Clos LaChance 2013 Reserve Grenache (Central Coast)
properties.address: 1 Hummingbird Ln, San Martin, CA 95046, USA
properties.descrption: Slightly funky aromas of dried, composting red and purple roses meet with crushed mint, vanilla and red berries on the nose of this complex bottling. Pomegranate, red plum and strawberry fruit show on the palate, bolstered by wet gravel, thyme and black-pepper spice.

properties.title: Cono Sur 2014 Organic Pinot Noir (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Chimbarongo, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Dry, spicy, earthy red-fruit aromas lead to a fresh palate with good body. Plum and spiced cherry flavors extend only so far, while this tasty little wine finishes dry, spicy and with a dusting of cocoa.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2013 Vega Red (Douro)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.descrption: Dense and textured, this is a tannin dominated wine. The black fruit is still developing through the firm structure. At the end, with juicy blackberry fruits, the wine shows its generous future. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Diego Finocchi 2013 L'Erta di Radda  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Case Sparse il Corno 25, 53017 Radda in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Plum, violet, vanilla and espresso aromas swirl around the glass along with a hint of herb. The linear palate offers toast, sour cherry, roasted coffee bean and a licorice note while fine-grained tannins give it a firm finish. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Berthoumieu 2012 Haute Tradition Tannat-Cabernet (Madiran)
properties.address: Dutour, 32400 Viella, France
properties.descrption: Ripe and juicy this is a wine that brings out perfumed black fruits and lively acidity. It is made to be drunk young, preserving all the berry fruitiness and leaving the tannins in the background. Drink from late 2016.

properties.title: Etude 2013 Grace Benoist Ranch Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 1250 Cuttings Wharf Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: A larger-production wine that doesn't hold back on quality, this offers a bittersweet bite of black tea, cranberry and dried herb atop aromas of dried rose petals, remaining varietal while also providing an oomph of body and texture.

properties.title: Fattoria di Corsignano 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Località Corsignano, 53019 Castelnuovo Berardenga SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of plum, tilled soil, truffle, dark baking spice and a whiff of violet lead the nose. The medium-bodied, easygoing palate offers juicy black cherry, white pepper and clove framed in lithe tannins and lively acidity. Enjoy through 2018.

properties.title: Fattoria di Montemaggio 2011  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Località Montemaggio, 53017 Radda in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of vineyard dust, red cherry and a hint of cake spice meld together on this. The round, easy drinking palate delivers raspberry jelly, clove, grilled herb and a hint of anise alongside lithe tannins. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Napa Cellars 2013 Classic Collection Winemaker Series Malbec (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7481 St. Helena Highway South, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.descrption: Dark blue-purple in color, this is a breezy, giving wine on the palate, fresh and light in blueberry preserves and soft layers of integrated oak and tannin. It finishes smooth and with a hint of chocolate.

properties.title: Querceto di Castellina 2013 L'Aura  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Loc, Via di Fronzano, 9, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Plum, moist earth, leather and a whiff of crushed violet aromas lead the nose on this straightforward red. The easy drinking palate shows dark berry, cinnamon, orange peel and a hint of game accompanied by dusty tannins zesty acidity.

properties.title: Rancho Maria 2012 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 481 1st St W, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Grippy in big, dry tannin and a weight of oak, this is a plummy and rich red wine. The palate veers into dusty layers of vanilla and chocolate, finishing leathery and peppery.

properties.title: San Simeon 2012 Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 442 Slo San Simeon Rd, San Simeon, CA 93452, USA
properties.descrption: Very reliable and rewarding for everyday drinking, this wine packs lush black cherries, well-integrated purple flowers, savory roasted beef and touches of salted caramel and oak into the nose. Cooked blueberries, caramel and French-toast flavors show on the palate.

properties.title: La Colombina 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Via dell'Olmo, 14, 53024 Castelnuovo dell'Abate, Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Toasted hazelnut, charred earth, underbrush, stewed prune and roasted coffee bean aromas all carry over to robust, one-dimensional palate along with mocha and a confectionary note. Solid tannins provide the robust framework.

properties.title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2014 Red (Buzet)
properties.address: 9 Rue Ada Byron, 64000 Pau, France
properties.descrption: A blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon that comes from the small region of Buzet in the north of Gascony. This wine has tannins that are already well integrated with the black currant fruits and acidity. It is going to develop further into a rich, smooth wine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Loring Wine Company 2014 Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 1034 Aviation Dr, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: One of Brian Loring's always solid appellation blends, this one packs sour cherry and cranberry on the nose, with plenty of crushed sage and dried garden herbs, picking up more black cherry as time goes on. Pencil lead, buttered red cherry, oregano and bay leaf play into the grippy palate.

properties.title: Mannucci Droandi 2013 Ceppeto  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Via Rossinello e Campolucci, 79, 52025 Montevarchi AR, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with organically farmed grapes, this opens with aromas of tilled earth, leather, truffle and mature berry. The chewy palate doles out juicy Marasca cherry, licorice, clove and aromatic herb framed in velvety tannins. Enjoy through 2018.

properties.title: Torii Mor 2013 Yamhill Carlton Select Pinot Noir
properties.address: 18323 NE Fairview Dr, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: The red berry and pomegranate fruit flavors are set against a background of dry earth, dried leaf and stem. It's balanced and detailed, definitely tilted more toward the herbal side of Oregon Pinot Noir rather than a fruitier style.

properties.title: Marcolino Sebo 2013 Visconde de Borba Red (Alentejo)
properties.address: Quinta da Pinheira, 7100-031 Arcos, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a fruity wine housing soft tannins and red berry fruit notes. It's rounded and smooth, with streaks of vanilla highlighting the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Robert Klingenfus 2012 Orfèvre en Arôme Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: 60 Rue de Saverne, 67120 Molsheim, France
properties.descrption: Still young and with strong wood aging flavors, this is otherwise a light wine where the fruit is reticent. Bitter cherry flavors show through along with acidity, and the wine obviously needs time to settle down. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2012 Colheita Seleccionada Red (Tejo)
properties.address: Estrada Municipal 1, 2080-201 Almeirim, Portugal
properties.descrption: Very ripe, juicy and spicy, this is a forward, fruity wine that should be consumed within the year. It has rich plum and jam flavors, light tannins and a soft aftertaste.

properties.title: Château Clos Bourbon 2012  Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 10 Côte de Bourbon, 33550 Paillet, France
properties.descrption: The wine is soft, just juicy and with little in the way of concentration. Barrel-aged for 12 months in one-third new oak, it is attractive and ready to drink now. Vines are planted on limestone and clay above limestone and iron schist subsoil.

properties.title: Château Côte Montpezat 2012 Cuvée Compostelle  (Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 1144 Route du Bois de Balette, 33350 Belvès-de-Castillon, France
properties.descrption: Firm, tannic and hard, this tight wine has a solid core of dry wood. It seems over-extracted with its bitter coffee flavors. Fruit is hard to come by, although there is weight that could develop.

properties.title: Château Dubraud 2012  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.descrption: This wine is soft and juicy with 12 months in barrel. It has rounded tannins and perfumed berry fruits. What it misses is the acidity, leaving an unbalanced wine.

properties.title: Château Les Grands Maréchaux 2012  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: Géniquet, 33920 Saint-Girons-d'Aiguevives, France
properties.descrption: The wine is perfumed, spicy with dense tannins. It has a hard-edged structure, tough with the ripe fruit still underneath. Vines are an average of 14 years old.

properties.title: Château Tertre de Belvès 2012  Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.descrption: This 100% Merlot from a small experimental vineyard is solid, firm and still young. It has a dense structure of tannins and wood aging, showing bitter coffee flavors and an austere character after 14 months in new French oak. It will likely remain a tough proposition.

properties.title: Damiani 2011 Sunrise Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4704 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.descrption: This delicate Pinot Noir might leave you wishing for a boost in power, concentration and depth. Nevertheless, this wine is quaffable and bright, with red cherry notes that lead to a refreshing, brisk finish.

properties.title: Domaine Pfister 2012 Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: 53 Rue Principale, 67310 Dahlenheim, France
properties.descrption: An attractively soft and fruity wine, flavored with red cherries and given a lift with acidity. It's a simple, lightly structured wine that can be drunk now.

properties.title: Muratie 2007 Ronnie Melck A Tribute Shiraz (Simonsberg-Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Knorhoek Rd, Koelenhof, Stellenbosch, 7605, South Africa
properties.descrption: A worthy tribute, this dark and concentrated Shiraz oozes rich fruit notes of mulled boysenberry, blackberry and cherry all dusted with cocoa powder, whole baking spice and tree bark. Big and gripping with assertive tannins and a firm structure, this is one that should age nicely; try after 2014.

properties.title: Sebastiani 2009 Merlot (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 389 4th St E, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Good price for such a lush, likeable Merlot. It's soft and rich in cherries, red currants and licorice. This is easly the best Sebastiani Merlot in many years.

properties.title: Bizoe 2009 Estalét Syrah (Western Cape)
properties.descrption: Only 30 cases of this gorgeous wine are imported, so snag what you can when you find it. It's a deep and complex Syrah, exuding attractive aromas and flavors of juicy red cherry and fresh raspberry spiced up with accents of vanilla crème, sweet wood, soft Earl Gray tea and whole baking spice on the close. Creamy and lush with a silky texture; drink now–2014.

properties.title: Decoy 2009 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 1000 Lodi Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: For the second year in a row, Decoy has released one of the best values in Zinfandel of the vintage. This year, Sonoma County is source to the grapes, and the wine shows classic wild berry, cola, anise, pepper and sandalwood flavors. Most remarkable is the tannic structure, which is smooth and distinguished. Easy to find, with 15,000 cases produced.

properties.title: Matrix 2009 R. Buoncristiani Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3291 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A succulent Pinot Noir, rich and ripe in cherries, tart cranberries, orange zest and Dr. Pepper cola, with sweet, smoky notes from oak barrel aging. The tight tannins and zesty acids together suggest midterm aging. Should hit its stride after 2013.

properties.title: Terlato 2008 Cardinal's Peak Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 900 Armour Dr, Lake Bluff, IL 60044, USA
properties.descrption: Fruit-forward, showing ripe, sweet blackberry, cherry, blueberry and cocoa flavors, elaborately uplifted by toasty oak. Made in the modern style, it's rich and delicious now.

properties.title: Clos la Coutale 2009 Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Clos la Coutale, 46700 Vire-sur-Lot, France
properties.descrption: In style, Coutale doesn't make many concessions to Malbec tannins. What you get is an impressively structured, firmly tannic wine, packed also with black fruits. The solid structure and the weight of fruit demand aging for at least 5 years.

properties.title: Rochioli 2009 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6192 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This is Rochioli's basic Pinot Noir. It's a beautiful wine, marked by great structure and accessible fruit. Near-perfect acids and tannins lend it elegance, while the cherry and cola flavors have a rich touch of smoky oak. Drink now.

properties.title: Nabygelegen 2009 Scaramanga Red (Wellington)
properties.address: Bovlei Division Road, R301, Wellington, 7654, South Africa
properties.descrption: An interesting blend of Cab Sauv, Merlot, Malbec and Tempranillo, this red boasts a beautiful array of aromas and flavors: cassis, eucalyptus, blackberry, fig, tobacco and cinnamon. With a velvety texture and medium tannins, there's a good grip to the long finish laced with accents of leather and black tea leaves.

properties.title: Novy 2009 Christensen Family Vineyard Syrah (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 20299 Quivira Rd, Bucyrus, KS 66013, USA
properties.descrption: This big, soft, delicious Syrah tastes like a candy bar. It's rich and sweet in blackberry jam, blueberry pie with the crust, cocoa and spice flavors, with an umami tanginess like bacon. Easy to savor it through the entire bottle, although the alcohol level is high.

properties.title: Proemio 2006 Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: y Adrover- Los, Severo del Castillo 5250, Corralitos, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: A fine value among moderately aged Malbecs. Smells like a well-grilled steak along with earthy berry and dry oak. Feels fresh and pure, with proper balance and a lively mix of toast, coconut, blackberry, spice and textured tannins. Compact and just right on the finish. 500 cases made; excellent for under $20.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2009 Elton Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.descrption: The best of the 2009 lineup from Willamette Valley Vineyards, this Eola-Amity Hills single-vineyard offering has the most complexity, in both nose and mouthfeel. Balanced fruits fill the palate, with spicy hints of earth, leaf and a wash of barrel-induced mocha.

properties.title: Esterlina 2009 Estate Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.descrption: Somewhat brittle and nervous in the mouth, with lots of tart acidity. The flavors are brilliant, suggesting ripe cranberries, cherries and cola, with a fascinating edge of mushrooms and leather. All indications are that the wine needs time in the bottle to mellow. Drink after 2013.

properties.title: Graham Beck 2007 Ad Honorem Red (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: 13303 W Maple St Suite 111, Wichita, KS 67235, USA
properties.descrption: There's great spice and depth to this tribute wine in honour of Graham Joseph Beck. Intense notes of cigar box spice, black pepper, cedar bark and cocoa powder all abound in the bouquet and follow through all the way to the long close. Black fruit flavors are present, but the spice takes center stage. Firm, gripping tannins flood the mouth and linger endlessly; try from 2014 on.

properties.title: Mas del Périé 2009 La Roque Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Le bourg, 46090 Trespoux-Rassiels, France
properties.descrption: With the richness of the vintage in mind, this wine makes a powerfully extravagant statement. There is nothing subdued about the concentrated tannins or the intensely rich black fruits. Even with 3–4 years aging, this will still be a bold wine.

properties.title: Sottano 2010 Reserva Red (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta Nacional 7 y, C. Costa Flores, Perdriel, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Opens with lovely blackberry and herb aromas that suggest richness and ripeness but not overt weight. It feels lush and deep, and tastes totally pleasant and easy, with black fruit, toast and pepper flavors. A thorough and balanced blend of Malbec, Cabernet and Syrah.

properties.title: Stark-Condé 2008 Unfined and Unfiltered Syrah (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Oude Nektar Farm Jonkershoek Valley, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.descrption: Although it took a little while to open up, the wine eventually expresses itself beautifully with deep notes of crushed purple florals, black cherry and blueberry along with a hint of game. Lush and full with a satiny texture, the mouth is heady and satisfying with a concentrated fruit core supported by cedar and mocha on the close.

properties.title: Carrick 2011 Unravelled Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
properties.address: 247 Cairnmuir Road, Bannockburn 9384, New Zealand
properties.descrption: This entry-level Pinot from Carrick is a strong effort in a cool vintage. Dried porcini aromas and flavors are earthy and savory, backed by cherry notes and some slightly tough tannins. Drink up before 2020.

properties.title: Maddalena 2010 Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: Los Angeles, CA 90033, USA
properties.descrption: This very fairly priced wine from the fourth-generation winemaking family behind San Antonio Winery delivers aromas of black cherry-crusted charred meats with significant mint character. It's dense on the palate and quite tannic, but quite nice with blackberry paste, licorice and tanned leather flavors.

properties.title: Nanfro 2011 Sammauro  (Cerasuolo di Vittoria)
properties.address: Contrada Nanfro, 95041 Caltagirone CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of dried berry, scorched soil and anisette lead the nose. The ripe palate offers spiced blackberry, juicy wild cherry, licorice, ground pepper and mineral alongside firm, fine-grained tannins and just enough freshness.

properties.title: Nicosia 2011 Fondo Filara  (Cerasuolo di Vittoria Classico)
properties.address: Via Luigi Capuana, 65, 95039 Trecastagni CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas include dark berry, blue flower, leather and a balsamic note. The palate delivers juicy black cherry, coffee, toast and mocha alongside chewy tannins.

properties.title: Occhipinti 2012 Il Frappato Frappato (Sicilia)
properties.address: SP68 Km 3, 3, 97019 Vittoria RG, Italy
properties.descrption: Tilled earth, game, red berry and orange peel aromas lead the nose on this concentrated wine. The ripe, savory palate delivers fleshy sour cherry, crushed raspberry, notes of baking spice, mineral and a suggestion of game. It's delicious, with an earthy charm that gives it a distinct character.

properties.title: Paraduxx 2011 C Blend Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 7257 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This holds 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 39% Zinfandel and 1% Petit Verdot. It satisfies in dusty dried cranberry and chocolate components, offering all-around balance with a shot of brawn, the latter most likely from the Cab's birthplace on Howell Mountain.

properties.title: Planeta 2011 Merlot (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Sciara Nuova, 95012 Castiglione di Sicilia CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of blackcurrant, dried plum, Mediterranean herb and espresso lead the nose. The smooth, round palate offers juicy black cherry, blackberry, ground pepper, mint and a light mineral vein alongside smooth, supple tannins.

properties.title: Valentin Bianchi 2010 Enzo Bianchi Red
properties.address: Ruta 143 y calle Valentín San Rafael Mendoza AR, Bianchi, M5600 BCJ, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: This Bordeaux-style blend is inky, reduced and heavily oaked up front, with aromas of sawdust, vanilla and jammy black fruits. Interestingly, it is somewhat sharp and shrill on the palate, with lively acidity. Flavors of raw oak, coconut, vanilla and blackberry finish savory and briny, with shearing acids and choppy tannins. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Vigna di Pettineo 2012  Cerasuolo di Vittoria Classico
properties.address: Contrada Pettineo, sn, 97019 Vittoria RG, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with organically farmed grapes, this offers enticing aromas of juicy black fruit, spiced blueberry, graphite and violet. The round, savory palate delivers layers of ripe dark cherry, white pepper and mineral alongside firm but polished tannins.

properties.title: Wellington 2009 Meeks Hilltop Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 11600 Dunbar Rd, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: This older wine displays an intriguing mix of baking spices, chocolate-covered cola cherry and menthol, combining nicely on the palate in juicy, fruit-forward waves. With a small amount of winery-identified Durif, it holds together through the peppery finish.

properties.title: Wild Coyote 2012 Red Tail Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3775 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: There's a characteristic funk on many unfiltered bottlings from this winery, and it works for this wine. Tangy, fermenting plum aromas give backbone to scents of purple fruit and black pepper. The intriguing flavors center on red cherry fruit, but carry oregano, parsley and Camembert cheese elements as well.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2012 AVA Series Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced entirely from the Winter's Hill vineyard, this is a lively mix of raspberry, lime, pineapple and cherry candy. Young and tart, it needs more time to flesh out and show more detail. Currently the baking spice accents from aging in one-third new oak, appealing as they are, stick out a bit. Give this until 2016 or so to bottle age.

properties.title: Trivento 2011 Eolo Malbec (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.address: RP60 & Jerónimo Ruiz, M5517, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Dark, extracted and woody almost to an extreme, this opens with resiny aromas of raw oak, coconut, vanilla and prune. A palate with pinching, hard tannins is fierce, with heavily oaked flavors of roasted blackberry feeding into a finish with dominant woodspice and resin flavors. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Clos de los Siete 2012 Red (Valle de Uco)
properties.address: Clodomiro Silva s/n, M5565 Vista Flores, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Blueberry and cardamom aromas rank as exotic and attractive. This has a rich, jammy, deep body that's easy on the palate. Flavors of blackberry, caramel and chocolate are rich and ripe, as is the finish, which has a meaty texture and a touch of youthful heat.

properties.title: Domaine Drouhin Oregon 2013 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6750 NE Breyman Orchards Rd, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: A new, lower-priced cuvée for DDO, this uses both estate and purchased grapes. Chocolaty, soft and fresh, it is a graceful wine with generous raspberry and cherry fruit. Moderate acidity leads into flavors that are elegant and bright, with a gentle, lingering finish. Let it breathe for at least an hour for best results.

properties.title: El Esteco 2011 Chañar Punco Red (Calchaquí Valley)
properties.address: RN40 km 4343, A4427 Cafayate, Salta, Argentina
properties.descrption: Reduced aromas of iodine, latex and blackberry lead to a tannic, grabby palate with baked blackberry, licorice and rooty flavors. A warm, stewy, earthy finish is where grabby tannins dominate. This is a bold, powerful wine that could benefit from some cellaring time.

properties.title: Marco Abella 2009 Loidana Red (Priorat)
properties.address: Carretera de Porrera a Cornudella del Montsant , Km 1, A-2, 43739 Porrera, Tarragona, Spain
properties.descrption: From the starting gun, this is a raisiny, candied wine with complexity issues. The palate is tannic and not the least bit varied; basically it just sits there. Flavors of raisin and red licorice finish sweet, medicinal and with a note of green peppercorn. This is flavorful but blocky and strange.

properties.title: Benziger 2011 Merlot (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 1883 London Ranch Rd, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: A mix of plum and vanilla, this is an easygoing Merlot that's good for most group occasions and palates, muted in aroma but developed in flavor.

properties.title: Château Laffitte Laujac 2011 L de Laffitte Laujac  (Médoc)
properties.address: 56 Rte de Laujac, 33340 Bégadan, France
properties.descrption: This wine is layered with wood that has softened the young fruitiness, adding spice and toast. The wine just keeps the right, juicy side of being too woody. It should be drunk now–2015.

properties.title: Château Le Prieuré de Bellegarde 2011 Sélection  (Côtes de Bourg)
properties.address: 44 Chem. de Fongaban, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: This light wine offers attractive black currant fruitiness. Burnt tannins from the wood aging give it a bitter edge, although the aftertaste does bring back the freshness of the vintage.

properties.title: Raffaldini 2011 Montepulciano (Swan Creek)
properties.address: 450 Groce Rd, Ronda, NC 28670, USA
properties.descrption: Dark cherry and mocha aromas come with a hint of desiccation. Supple and smooth on the palate, this finishes with a tangy mineral element and some warmth.

properties.title: Sobon Estate 2012 Rezerve Primitivo (Amador County)
properties.address: 14430 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: A sense of sweetness from oak smooths out this medium- to full-bodied wine and complements the moderate tannins and smooth texture. A pleasant plummy thread winds through the aromas and flavors, lingering on the finish.

properties.title: Silvan Ridge 2011 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 27012 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.descrption: Vinegary overtones suggest a volatile wine from the first sniff. Flavors are high-toned as well, with plum and cherry. Some sort of barrel treatment brings in dark chocolate and espresso, with slightly burnt, bitter tannins.

properties.title: Benvenuto de la Serna 2009 Trisagio Malbec-Petit Verdot-Tannat Red (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Av. España 850, M5500DFF Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: In this hot vintage, the wine seems narrow and reduced on the nose and palate. A collapsed structure shows density and jammy flavors of leafy berry, herbs and spice. The finish feels spent but offers tobacco and earth notes.

properties.title: Bodegas Bilbainas 2010 Viña Pomal Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: This is hard-hitting, rumble-ready Rioja with raw, minty aromas coming in front of a packed, drying palate. Powerful berry flavors finish with a peppery flavor, rubbery notes and sharpness. This may improve some over the next two years.

properties.title: Viña Requingua 2011 Toro de Piedra Grand Reserve Single Vineyard Syrah-Cabernet Sauvignon (Curicó Valley)
properties.descrption: Blackberry, cola and herbal aromas form a stout, slightly green nose. This feels stocky and clipped, with oaky weight. Flavors of roasted berry fruits are herbal and oaky, while mint, vanilla, licorice and wood resin flavors drive the finish on this Cabernet-Syrah blend.

properties.title: Waterbrook 2011 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 10518 US-12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Lifted by 8% Carménère and Viognier, it's straight down the fairway with notes of blueberry, orange peel, pepper and brambly fruit. Lighter in style, it tapers toward the finish.

properties.title: Zull 2012 Lust & Laune Red (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Schrattenthal 9, 2073 Schrattenthal, Austria
properties.descrption: This is light, easygoing and very fruity, with plenty of fresh red-cherry character and zingy, lively acidity. Waves of Amarena and Morello cherries unfold on the palate. This would be ideal for picnics and light lunches.

properties.title: 7 Peaks 2012 Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 101 W Main St, Boalsburg, PA 16827, USA
properties.descrption: This is a nice value for Pinot Noir. It has some real richness of fruit and smoothness of texture. Flavors of ripe raspberries and dates are offset by fine acidity.

properties.title: Beach Kite 2012 Pinot Noir (Central Valley)
properties.address: 1200 American Way, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: Fresh, minerally red-fruit aromas set up a light but good palate. Modest oak and red fruit flavors are earthy and a bit warm, while the finish is easy, clean and fresh. For $7, there's almost nothing to take issue with.

properties.title: Black Sheep 2010 Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
properties.descrption: Intensely spicy and rich on the nose with notes of cinnamon, dark plum and black cherry, this Zin has an aromatic intensity that fades somewhat on the palate. It's structured and textured with dusty tannins and finishes with a touch of prune.

properties.title: Cadaretta 2011 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 315 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This was co-fermented with 3% Viognier. It's a very light Syrah that punches below its weight and skirts around the edges of clear varietal character. Citrus skin flavors and thin red fruits push it close to generic red, serviceable but without the power of most Washington Syrahs in this price range.

properties.title: Trio Vintners 2011 Riot Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 6 W Rose St #101, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The 2011 Riot (a play on Trio) is half Sangiovese and one quarter each Mourvèdre and Grenache. It's been amped up in 2011, with the alcohol pushing near a heady 15%. Spicy and superripe fruit packs some heat, along with flavors of red and purple fruits. The finish turns a bit chalky and tart.

properties.title: Husch 2011 Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 4400 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: This is a tremendously light Pinot with a bouquet of yellow cherry and cranberry. It's slightly more savory than fruity, expressing the region's cool vintage. The texture of the wine is soft and pleasant with a subtle hint of fuzzy tannins.

properties.title: Illuminati Dino 2008 Riserva Lumen Red (Controguerra)
properties.address: Contrada S. Biagio, 18, 64010 Controguerra TE, Italy
properties.descrption: A heavy dose of oak takes center stage on this wine from Central Italy. The palate offers coffee, espresso, vanilla and chocolate but lacks enough fruit richness to support the oak.

properties.title: Justin 2010 Isosceles Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 11680 Chimney Rock Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: There's plenty of ripe blackberry and cherry flavor, as well as exotic spice and toasty oak notes on this expensive Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend. Overripe, raisinated notes lend a touch of bitterness and high alcohol makes it finish a tad hot.

properties.title: Kirnbauer 2011 Vitikult Riede Neuberg Blaufränkisch (Mittelburgenland)
properties.address: Rotweinweg 1, 7301 Deutschkreutz, Austria
properties.descrption: Here's a slender but aromatic red, with a pleasing cherry-flesh note and a cedar spice accent. It's fresh, sprightly and very fruity.

properties.title: Larner 2009 Reserve Syrah (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2900 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: Alcohol and superripe fruit give this wine a Port-like taste, although it's totally dry. Bold tannins give it a tough astringency, and blackberry and currant flavors finish with hints of raisin and bitterness.

properties.title: Le Caniette 2010 Rosso Bello  (Rosso Piceno)
properties.address: Contrada Canali, 23, 63038 Ripatransone AP, Italy
properties.descrption: Hints of mint, cedar and blue flower add depth to the black cherry aromas on this blend of 45% Montepulciano, 45% Sangiovese and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon. Juicy fruit flavors carry over to fresh and accessible palate. Not for cellaring; enjoy now.

properties.title: Muròla 2012  Rosso Piceno
properties.address: Contrada Villamagna, 9, 62010 Urbisaglia MC, Italy
properties.descrption: This 50-50 blend of Montepulciano and Sangiovese has blackberry, blue flower and spice aromas that carry on to the palate, along with black cherry and astringent tannins. Showing the heat of the vintage, it's also shy on freshness, so drink soon.

properties.title: Putah Creek 2009 Syrah (Solano County)
properties.address: 35265 Willow Ave, Clarksburg, CA 95612, USA
properties.descrption: While somewhat withdrawn aromatically, this Syrah has integrated flavors of cinnamon, plum and raspberry. It's structured with a tinge of sweetness and finishes on a leathery note.

properties.title: River Road 2012 Pinot Noir (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 5220 Ross Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: Soft and supple, this Pinot has pleasant flavors of Dr. Pepper cola, raspberries, red cherries and smoky oak. It makes for pleasant drinking now.

properties.title: San Juan Vineyards 2010 Cabernet Franc (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 3136 Roche Harbor Rd, Friday Harbor, WA 98250, USA
properties.descrption: Lighter in color, the wood is up front initially with notes of toast, spice and mocha, followed by jalapeno, green herbs and whole green pepper. It's elegantly styled with tart acidity and blocky tannins.

properties.title: Casa Smith 2014 Cervo Northridge Vineyard Barbera (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 35 S Spokane St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This is the inaugural release of this wine. It shows aromas of dried herbs, plums and currants that lead to a full-bodied and full-flavored palate. It's a mouthful of juicy fruit flavors that delights the senses, with the feel simply dazzling.

properties.title: Sarah's Vineyard 2012 Old Vine Zinfandel (Santa Clara Valley)
properties.address: 1204 W Steels Corners Rd, Cuyahoga Falls, OH 44223, USA
properties.descrption: A brawny, hearty and inviting nose of macerated bramble and lush cherry are enhanced by sarsaparilla, leather and turned loam on this bottling from a vineyard planted in 1922. Nutmeg and kola-nut spice enliven the brightly acidic cherry, plum and strawberry fruit. Lilacs and gravel minerality ensue as well, and it all finishes tartly on plum skins.

properties.title: Sequel 2011 Bin 898 Vintage Select Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1604 Frenchtown Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This reserve-style wine primarily comes from Boushey Vineyard in the Yakima Valley. Aromas of mineral, wood spice, bacon fat, herb and red fruit are followed by sultry, soft flavors that display a lot of elegance.

properties.title: Tantara 2014 Talley Rincon Pinot Noir (Arroyo Grande Valley)
properties.address: 2330 Westgate Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: This bottling from an iconic vineyard is subtle yet steady on the nose, with cinnamon and nutmeg spice giving character to a red-cherry base. The vibrant palate keeps the mouth watering, showing clove and more nutmeg atop sharper cranberry and warmer cherry fruit tones.

properties.title: Tenor 2012 2:2 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 16116 140th Pl NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Mostly Merlot (68%) and Cabernet Franc (26%) along with a smidgen of Cabernet, this wine brings aromas of toast, vanilla bean, red and black fruit and fresh herb. The palate is dense and full, with firm tannins providing the frame.

properties.title: Ardor 2014 Art Den Hoed Vineyard Syrah (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 4243 SE Belmont St UNIT 400, Portland, OR 97215, USA
properties.descrption: Initially quite light aromatically, this wine opens with notes of cherry candy and raspberry that reveal themselves over time. The cherry and cranberry flavors are medium bodied, showing good length. It's a pretty, very understated wine.

properties.title: Carpe Diem 2014 Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 1001 2nd St Suite#185, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Bright aromas and vibrant fruit flavors combine for a very energized, beautifully balanced wine that will shine at the dinner table. It has rhubarb and sour-cherry aromas, red-cherry and  cinnamon flavors, a lively texture and lingering finish.

properties.title: Casas del Toqui 2013 Terroir Selection Gran Reserva Syrah (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: Requínoa, Requinoa, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Bright cherry and berry aromas benefit from nicely integrated oak. This cool-vintage wine is slightly pulpy but not heavy on the palate. Plum and currant flavors end with notes of peppery spice, toasty char and lasting berry fruit. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Château Tour des Gendres 2014 La Gloire de Mon Père Red (Côtes de Bergerac)
properties.descrption: Named after Luc de Conti's father Albert, this is a structured and firm wine. It has juicy black-currant fruits that are concentrated by tannins and lifted by bright acidity. The wine is firm, impressive and aging well, although not yet ready, so drink from 2018.

properties.title: Robert Renzoni 2012 Montepulciano (Temecula Valley)
properties.descrption: Brown spices of clove and nutmeg decorate the nose of this solid bottling that offers a bit of dried blueberry in the deep background. The palate's presentation is very elegant and mellow, with black plum and blackberry fruit well integrated into graphite minerality and dried sagebrush, leaving a touch of tannins in the mouth.

properties.title: Seacampo 2008 C.A.V. Vinha Unica Red (Dão)
properties.address: 6290-632 Vila Nova de Tazem, Portugal
properties.descrption: Produced from a single parcel at 1800 feet, the wine is a blend of nearly every Dão red grape. It is firm, with dark chocolate and plum skin flavors. Acidity and a concentrated structure are now working together, meaning the wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Sparkman 2013 Wilderness Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St #102, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is mostly Syrah (58%), Grenache (18%) and Petite Sirah, with small amounts of Touriga Nacional, Tinta Cao and Tinta Madeira rounding it out. It brings aromas of dried herb, earth and blue and black fruit that are followed by palate-coating blue-fruit flavors, speckled with barrel spices, showing vibrant acidity.

properties.title: Stevens 2013 StevensFranc Cabernet Franc (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 18520 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of fruit from Sheridan (73%) and Dineen vineyards. It offers aromas of dried herb, violets, mushroom and cedar that are followed by elegant, very pretty fruit flavors. It's more about subtlety than brawn.

properties.title: Tantara 2014 La Encantada Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 2330 Westgate Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: Fruity aromas of fresh strawberry mash mix with touches of slate and a twist of dried mint on the nose of this bottling by winemaker Rick Hill. The palate relies on light black-raspberry flavors that are lifted by black-tea leaves and a touch of orange-rind tang.

properties.title: Herdade do Esporão 2012 S Syrah (Alentejano)
properties.address: 9CJR+7GW, 7200, Portugal
properties.descrption: The wine is part of a series of single varietal wines produced at the estate. Dense and dark, this Syrah has rich black fruits, coffee and vanilla flavors, as well as concentrated spice. The wood aging is apparent while bringing smoothness to this ripe, full wine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Koyle 2013 Royale Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Fundo Angostura Sin numero, Canadilla, San Fernando, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Woodsy spicy black-fruit aromas include notes of balsam wood. This is deep and layered but not too heavy; flavors of chocolaty oak, peppercorn and blackberry finish with a rich helping of oak-based mocha and coffee. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Montecariano 2011  Valpolicella Classico
properties.address: Via Valena, 3, 37029 San Pietro in Cariano VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Notes of ripe fruit, prune and moist earth give this easy-going red a warm, wintery feel. The palate is medium bodied and clean, with a tart touch of acidity on the finish.

properties.title: MooBuzz 2011 Pinot Noir (Monterey)
properties.address: 7801 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.descrption: This shows classic coastal crispness and delicacy, with a silkiness that makes it feel easy on the palate. It's also delicious in flavors of cherries, bacon, cola and spices. The blend happens to be fattened up by Sangiovese, Tempranillo and Syrah

properties.title: Morse 2007 Jones Vineyard Syrah (El Dorado County)
properties.address: 22355 Lawrence Rd, Fiddletown, CA 95629, USA
properties.descrption: This is a tight, monstrous Syrah, with a pocket of black fruit flavor and a dollop of earthiness. It veers into raisiny territory on the finish.

properties.title: Rosenblum 2010 Richard Sauret Reserve Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 10 Clay St, Oakland, CA 94607, USA
properties.descrption: The high alcohol shows through everything else, giving this Zin a chili pepper heat and a distracting Port-like sensation. It's rich and dry, with firm tannins framing the blackberry and currant flavors.

properties.title: San Cassiano 2008  Valpolicella Superiore
properties.address: Via S. Cassiano, 25, 37030 Mezzane di sotto VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Lasagna, meat-filled ravioli or mushroom risotto would make good pairing partners to this mild and crisp red. It offers notes of red berry, almond and cola.

properties.title: Scriani 2009  Valpolicella Classico Superiore
properties.address: Via Ponte Scrivan, 7, 37022 Fumane VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Light and pretty, this is aged in large oak cask for 12 months, which imparts notes of spice and toasted almond. Otherwise, the wine's core is all fruit: raspberry, cherry and currant flavors abound.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2009 Henry Ranch Merlot (Los Carneros)
properties.address: 1111 White Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This is a little too heavy and full bodied, but it's bone dry and rich in blackberry and currant flavors, with an earthiness that suggests mushrooms. Drink over the next year or two.

properties.title: Boxwood 2010 Topiary Red (Virginia)
properties.address: 2042 Burrland Ln, Middleburg, VA 20117, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of 61% Cabernet Franc and 39% Merlot, this has scents of black fruit and green bell pepper that are characteristic of many Bordeaux-style blends, with underpinnings of savory spice and char. The full-bodied palate has a soft, chocolaty core, boasting medium-grained tannins and easy acids that lend enough lift.

properties.title: Brander 2010 F/Red Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: Made from Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah, this has a rustic texture that frames raisin, currant and sandalwood flavors. It will pair well with beef ribs.

properties.title: Château Philippe-le-Hardi 2010 Clos du Roi Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.descrption: This is lightly structured, showing balanced red berry fruits and round tannins. For a 2010, it is softening fast; this should be drinkable in the next six months.

properties.title: Château Philippe-le-Hardi 2010 La Brigadière Vieilles Vignes  (Mercurey)
properties.address: 1 Rue du Château, 21590 Santenay, France
properties.descrption: Soft and crisp, this is light in texture and very fragrant. It boasts intense strawberry flavors, with already well-integrated tannins and a smooth, easy finish.

properties.title: Altos del Cuco 2010 Red (Jumilla)
properties.address: Carretera El Tigre-El Porvenir KM 7.5 Parcela 117 El Porvenir, 22755 Valle de Guadalupe, B.C., Mexico
properties.descrption: Interesting aromas of brick dust, mint, fall leaf and dried fruit seem traditional and familiar. The palate is tight, tannic and rubbery, with roasted, savory flavors of spiced berry and plum. Oak, prune and fig notes work the firm finish.

properties.title: Cantina Sociale della Valpantena 2010 Torre del Falasco  (Valpolicella Ripasso)
properties.address: Via Colonia Orfani di Guerra, 5, 37142 Quinto VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Simple, bright and tart, this easy red will pair with simple meat or pasta dishes. The bouquet offers red berry and cola aromas, with a spicy touch of dried ginger.

properties.title: Castillo de Jumilla 2010 Monastrell (Jumilla)
properties.address: Cam. Castillo, 30520 Jumilla, Murcia, Spain
properties.descrption: This begins with a light red-fruit aroma that falls into the cherry-berry vein. It feels bouncy, rubbery and pleasant, with roasted, rubbery berry and savory spice flavors. The finish is light on fruit but good in feel.

properties.title: Kuleto Estate 2009 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2470 Sage Canyon Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has flavors of wild blackberry, blueberry and mocha, with a rich vein of herb, tobacco and spice. However, it's hot in alcohol, and finishes with glyceriney sweetness—almost like a minor Port. Drink up.

properties.title: Chatom Vineyards 2008 Zinfandel (Calaveras County)
properties.address: 7449 Esmeralda Rd, San Andreas, CA 95249, USA
properties.descrption: A hit-you-upside-the-head, floral Zin, with mountain tannins, and big blackberry and savory leather flavors. Over time, the alcohol takes over.

properties.title: Forstreiter 2009 Zvy-Gelt Zweigelt (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Obere Hollenburger Hauptstraße 36, 3506 Krems an der Donau, Austria
properties.descrption: This is light, fruity and spicy, with a crisp edge of acidity as well as a soft texture. Ready to drink. Screwcap.

properties.title: Frenchman's Gulch 2008 Syrah (Washington)
properties.descrption: Sourced from the excellent Lewis Vineyard, this toasty, chewy Syrah displays black cherry fruit against a strong background of vanilla. At first it seems tart to the point of being almost sour, but as it breathes, the oak mutes some of the acid and balances it out.

properties.title: Gamache 2008 Estate Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1201 Basin Hill Rd, Mesa, WA 99343, USA
properties.descrption: Hard and tannic at first, this young wine grudgingly reveals a core of very tart cherry fruit, encased in flavors of stem and wood. A coffee-infused finish does not conceal the chewy, tough tannins.

properties.title: Markham 2009 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2812 St Helena Hwy North, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Shows the soft, supple side of Merlot, with smooth tannins framing earthy flavors of sour-cherry candy, herbs and cedar. Ready to drink now.

properties.title: Tapeña 2010 Tempranillo (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
properties.address: 3702 S Peoria Ave, Tulsa, OK 74105, USA
properties.descrption: This opens with smoky, rubbery aromas along with dark berry and cherry scents. It feels fresh and lively, with good body weight and forward, candied flavors of cherry and raspberry. The finish is nice, with cocoa notes and lasting sweetness.

properties.title: Gabarda 2009 Crianza Old Vine Red (Cariñena)
properties.address: Bodegas Gabarda, Ctra. Valencia, Km. 459, 50460 Longares, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Narrow and fiery on the nose, this has plum and raspberry aromas. On the palate, it feels snappy and crisp, with a mild lactic note alongside flavors of light herb, raspberry, plum and buttery oak.

properties.title: La Fornace 2011 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Podere Fornace, 154/a, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of prune, underbrush, leather and toasted oak lead the nose. The firm palate offers dried cherry, licorice and espresso while tightly packed tannins leave a rather drying finish. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Antonio Lopes Ribeiro 2012 Casa de Mouraz Red (Dão)
properties.address: Rua Comend. Alberto Cardoso Matos, Lt21a, 2º. A, Tondela, Viseu, 3460-575 Tondela, Portugal
properties.descrption: This old vine blend is made predominantly from Touriga Nacional, giving it concentration balanced by black currant fruit and crisp acidity. It's structured and tightly textured but drinkable now.

properties.title: August West 2015 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 540 Barneveld Ave suite k, San Francisco, CA 94124, USA
properties.descrption: The nose of this bottling is pleasant and straightforward, with light red cherry, rose petal and earth aromas. Bright acidity on the palate reveals raspberry fruit accented with oregano and thyme, proving complex enough for a weeknight dinner but not a showstopper.

properties.title: Vina Robles 2013 Red 4 Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3700 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Pepper, lavender, cranberry and iodine aromas lead the nose of this easy-drinking blend of 41% Petit Sirah, 40% Syrah, 10% Mourvèdre and 9% Grenache. The palate is tense and tart, its dried red fruit melding with graphite, nori and black pepper flavors.

properties.title: Voliero 2012  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Podere Uccelliera, 45, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This earthy red offers aromas suggesting stalky underbrush, Mediterranean scrub, toast, leather and a whiff of espresso that carry over to the robust palate along with dried cherry, grilled herb and a hint of licorice. Close-grained tannins provide the framework.

properties.title: Zorzal 2014 Terroir Único Pinot Noir (Tupungato)
properties.address: Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: Quiet aromas of dried red fruits and Band-Aid include a hint of spice. A lively palate is light to medium in body, while dried cherry and plum flavors are spicy on the finish, with punchy acidity. This emphasizes elegance over weight and power.

properties.title: Hacormim 2014 Adi 13 Shiraz (Israel)
properties.address: Derech HaYekev 2, Zihron Ya'akov, Israel
properties.descrption: Aromas of black cherry and dark chocolate prime the palate for flavors of black cherry, black plum, mocha, smoked meat and a hint of bell pepper. It is vibrant on entry, with a sense of brightness that stands out above firm but subtle tannins.

properties.title: Hobo 2014 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 412 Timothy Rd suite c, Santa Rosa, CA 95407, USA
properties.descrption: Earthy leather and black pepper notes play against tart cherry and raspberry flavors in this light-bodied red blended with 8% Petite Sirah. Bright acidity supports the fruit.

properties.title: Camaraderie 2014 Red Wine Cabernet Franc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 334 Benson Rd, Port Angeles, WA 98363, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas bring notes of coffee, bittersweet chocolate, wood spice, vanilla and black fruit. The fruit flavors bring a sense of elegance, with abundant vanilla flavors along with grainy tannins backing them up.

properties.title: De Loach 2014 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1791 Olivet Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: Rum-raisin cake comes to mind when smelling this robust, ripe wine that wears its intensity well. Fruit-forward with cherry and berry flavors, its texture is soft and luxuriously simple.

properties.title: Enoport 2015 Tonel 22 Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: This bold, firm wine strikes a fine balance between structure and ripe black plum fruit. It has dense tannins that indicate it needs time. A blend of Touriga Nacional, Tinta Roriz and Touriga Franca, it will be ready from 2018.

properties.title: Firestone 2013 Lineage The Chairman Series Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 5017 Zaca Station Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: This hearty blend of 35% Cabernet Sauvignon, 27% Cabernet Franc, 24% Merlot and 14% Petit Verdot offers blackberry, smoked beef, vanilla, cola and anise scents on the nose. The palate is tightly wound, its boysenberry fruit and dark soil minerality leading into a finish laced with licorice spice.

properties.title: Georges Vigouroux 2015 Atrium Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Route de Toulouse CS20159 Cahors Cedex 9, 46003 Cahors, France
properties.descrption: While there are plenty of tannins in this wine, there is also great fruit. Blackberry and plum flavors explode in the mouth. They are backed by the serious tannins and dark texture that will allow the wine to age. Drink this bold wine from 2019.

properties.title: Sheldrake Point 2015 Estate Bottled Gamay Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 7448 County Rd 153, Ovid, NY 14521, USA
properties.descrption: Delicate hints of fresh raspberry and red cherry extend throughout this light crisply composed red. A still-rare American Gamay, it's accented with touches of light toast and cedar. It's a slightly fragile wine that should be enjoyed now through 2021.

properties.title: Transmission 2015 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Bright, juicy red raspberry and bramble aromas meet red spice and earthy loam characteristics on the nose of this bottling. Medium in density on the palate, it's playful and flavorful, if not especially complex, with hints of wild thyme giving herbal nuance its core of red fruit.

properties.title: Trenza 2012 Tinto Red (San Luis Obispo County)
properties.address: 5828 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.descrption: Although the nose of this blend of Tempranillo, Syrah and Grenache starts out subtly, it opens into deeper aromas of blueberry, soy and char. The palate is dry and tightly wound, its mineral flavors of graphite, slate and lava rock leading to blue fruit and tobacco touches on the finish.

properties.title: Rutz 1999 Maison Grand Cru Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 24691 Dutcher Creek Rd, Cloverdale, CA 95425, USA
properties.descrption: This is a blend of Rutz's single-vineyard Pinots. Displays the fleshy, berry and tomato flavors of Dutton Ranch and Martinelli, and is very similar to both. Makes the case for blending. It doesn't hit the heights, but is a refined wine, and a versatile one. —S.H.

properties.title: Wirra Wirra 2000 Scrubby Rise Red (Fleurieu Peninsula)
properties.address: 255 Strout Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: This easy-to-drink blend of 50% Shiraz, 35% Cabernet Sauvignon and 15% Petit Verdot starts off jammy, with black cherry liqueur and clove notes before settling down and developing some interesting peach and mocha nuances. The persistent finish, lined with velvety tannins, makes it stand out from the crowd. Best Buy. —J.C.

properties.title: Ste. Chapelle 2000 Value Series Merlot (Idaho)
properties.address: 19348 Lowell Rd, Caldwell, ID 83607, USA
properties.descrption: Idaho and Merlot are not thoughts that generally spring together in the mind of the wine consumer, but Ste. Chapelle makes a good run at crafting an attractive, perfectly balanced wine here. The fruit is cherry and lightly herbal, and there are interesting flavors of earth and mocha, too. Best Buy. —P.G.

properties.title: Tatachilla 1999 Shiraz (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: Tatachilla Rd, Tatachilla SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: Shows nice complexity in its aromas of cherry, vanilla, soy sauce, leather and meat, then fills the mouth with supple cherry fruit that carries a hints of medicinal herbs. Finishes with tart cherries and a slight lactic note. —J.C.

properties.title: Preston 1999 Mourvèdre (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 9282 W Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: One of the more interesting of the lesser Rhone grapes, but vintners struggle to give it depth. This oneÕs got flattering red berry fruit flavors and soft acidity and tannins. Drinks dry and velvety, with a spicy finish.

properties.title: Valdegracia 1998 Tinto Crianza Tempranillo (Ribera del Guadiana)
properties.descrption: Even and light, but with copious tart cherry aromas and flavors, this tasty red comes from rugged Extremedura, in southwestern Spain, near Portugal. Saddle leather accents add interest, and the tangy finish closes with balanced tannins that'll cut through food well. Drink now–2005. —M.M.

properties.title: Warrabilla 2000 Shiraz (Rutherglen)
properties.address: 6152 Murray Valley Hwy, Rutherglen VIC 3685, Australia
properties.descrption: A tart, chalky finish suggests a couple years of cellaring would help this flavorful wine blossom because the other ingredients are already in place: Black pepper and eucalyptus   add complexity to the blackberry aromas and flavors. —J.C.

properties.title: Yangarra Park 2001 Shiraz (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: 809 McLaren Flat Rd, Kangarilla SA 5157, Australia
properties.descrption: This baby has aromas of just-picked ripe plums, boysenberries,and a peppery-chocolatey note that shows up on the palate. It's dry, clean and sharp, and it's a lot of fun. —S.H.

properties.title: Covey Run 2000 Lemberger (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 4123 US-17 BUS, Murrells Inlet, SC 29576, USA
properties.descrption: A popular favorite in the Northwest, Lemberger is a rustic, grapey, Zin-wannabe that offers pleasingly soft, fruity flavors well-suited to summer. This contains 24% Merlot, which adds weight to the fruit. Its soft tannins and light chocolate flavors make this a great go-to wine for the backyard barbecue. Best Buy. —P.G.

properties.title: Kiona 1998 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 44612 N Sunset Rd, Benton City, WA 99320, USA
properties.descrption: This is still the current release. A very hot vintage in Washington, it leads with a Portlike nose of raisins and prunes; follows with soft, ripe and roasted flavors. The tannins are deep and earthy. Drink now. —P.G.

properties.title: Rosemount 2001 Diamond Label Shiraz (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: 114 Chaffeys Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: Filled with bright, bouncy cherry-berry fruit and imbued with a slightly viscous mouthfeel, this fun, gulpable Shiraz won't break the bank. Its easygoing nature makes it worth having on hand for your next barbecue. —J.C.

properties.title: McIlroy 1999 Aquarius Ranch Merlot (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4605 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A wine that elicits mixed feelings. On the plus side, subtle fruit and oak, with a rich earthiness and sleek tannins. Does a good job of keeping Merlot fat and plump, while maintaining an herbal character. On the other hand, there's pronounced acidity and a sharpness that shows up on the finish. Doesn't seem likely to age well, but you never know. —S.H.

properties.title: Sapphire Hill 2000 Winberrie Old Vine Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 55 Front St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: An herbal, not to say earthy, wine with sage and oregano aromas and flavors. Dry and supple, it's softened by a hint of cherry cola in the finish, and will wake up with rich barbecue. —S.H.

properties.title: Hahn 1999 Meritage (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 37700 Foothill Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.descrption: The Santa Lucia Highlands are quickly becoming known for growing exceptional Pinot Noir, but this wine shows that the region also has potential for Bordeaux varieties. It's weedy, slightly green wine, but that's more than compensated for by the wonderfully lush and smooth texture and mouthfeel.

properties.title: Glass Mountain 1999 Syrah (California)
properties.address: 14831 Pierce Rd, Saratoga, CA 95070, USA
properties.descrption: From Markham, this medium-weight effort adds a touch of mint and a creamy, lactic note to blackberry and blueberry fruit. The finish is long, highlighting waves of supersoft tannins and juicy berries. —J.C.

properties.title: Sheridan Vineyard 2004 Reserve Syrah (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 2231 Roza Dr, Zillah, WA 98953, USA
properties.descrption: This is just 14.2% alcohol, so despite the richness and ripeness, this is not fat or flabby. The fruit has concentrated black cherry and cassis flavors, and the smoky, pain grillé flavors of barrel aging are nicely integrated. Aromatically this wine is just beginning to evolve, with complex plum, prune, cherry liqueur, coffee and smoke.

properties.title: Suacci Carciere Wines 2006 Suacci Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a new brand and a very good introductory Pinot Noir. In its light, silky mouthfeel and deep, complex flavors, it showcases its Russian River origins in a classic way. Offers up brilliantly ripe flavors of red currants, licorice, cola, gingerbread, mocha and spices, wrapped into a dry, balanced structure. Best now for its youthful charm.

properties.title: Keenan 2005 Reserve Mailbox Vineyard Merlot (Spring Mountain District)
properties.address: 3660 Spring Mountain Rd #9677, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This bottling has turned out to be one of California's more important Merlot releases. The '05, like its immediate predecessors, is a dry, richly tannic wine of great elegance and structural complexity. It pleases now for the wealth of black currants, anise, herbs, spices and smoky oak, and should develop bottle nuances through 2011.

properties.title: Fielding Hills 2006 RiverBend Vineyard Tribute Red Red (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 565 S Lakeshore Rd, Chelan, WA 98816, USA
properties.descrption: Tribute is 41% Syrah, 30% Merlot and 27% Cabernet Sauvignon, all estate-grown. The bouquet opens immediately into a fascinating complexity. What wafts up from the glass is a heady mix of incense, smoke, jam, toast, iron and herb—you can spend a pleasant 10 or 15 minutes just counting all the threads. Spicy, loaded with raspberry and strawberry fruit, gentle acids and silky tannins, this glides comfortably into a tangy finish.

properties.title: Brosseau 2006 Cuvee Kilene Brosseau Vineyard Syrah (Chalone)
properties.address: 32025 Stonewall Canyon Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.descrption: Brosseau scored with this bottling last year, and the '06 is as good, showing the same classy elegance. It's drily tannic, but enormously rich in currants, with complexities of smoky leather, tobacco, olive tapenade and tamari-sauteed wild mushrooms. Delicious now, and should develop bottle complexities through 2012.

properties.title: Byron 2006 Nielson Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 5250 Tepusquet Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: A lovely, complex Pinot that shows much of the flair of Byron's more expensive bottlings. The wine is dry and crisp and elegant, with long, deep flavors of currants, cola, sweet leather and dusty Asian spices. Good now, and will develop for at least six years.

properties.title: Soos Creek 2006 Artist Series #6 Red Wine Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 24012 172nd Ave SE, Kent, WA 98042, USA
properties.descrption: The vineyard sources for this Bordeaux-style blend—Champoux, Ciel du Cheval, Weinbau and Dineen—are impeccable, and represent four of the best AVAs in Washington. It's almost exactly half and half Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, and smells like beautifully ripe blackberries, boysenberries and cassis. It sets up in the mouth firm and textural, and adds layers of chocolate and baking spices as it winds through the finish. Not a soft wine, but more open and accessible than most vintages of Soos Creek.

properties.title: Soos Creek 2006 Champoux Vineyard Red Wine Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 24012 172nd Ave SE, Kent, WA 98042, USA
properties.descrption: This could be labeled Cabernet Sauvignon; the only other grape in the blend is a 14% Cab Franc component. Rich black cherry fruit provides the solid base, but after that the wine tightens down, so decanting would be essential if you plan to drink it soon. The scents weave together black fruits, spices and licorice; more than any of the other new releases from Soos Creek, this needs more time to settle.

properties.title: Fielding Hills 2006 RiverBend Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 565 S Lakeshore Rd, Chelan, WA 98816, USA
properties.descrption: This blend is 82% Cabernet Franc, 6% Syrah, 6% Merlot and 6% Cabernet Sauvignon. The emphasis on the Franc puts more herbal flavors in the center, with coffee grounds, black pepper and baking chocolate wrapped around the spicy and tart berry fruit. The match of acid and barrel flavored tannins is picture perfect.

properties.title: Harrington 2006 Brosseau Vineyard Pinot Noir (Chalone)
properties.address: 6211 Patton Rd, Arrington, TN 37014, USA
properties.descrption: Extraordinarily rich and ripe, just explodes with cherry jam, crushed black raspberries and sweet toasted oak and vanilla flavors. But it's not a simple fruit bomb. Crisp acidity and a deep, fine tannin structure give it complexity and limited ageability. Good now and through 2012.

properties.title: Barone Ricasoli 2004 Castello di Brolio  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Madonna a Brolio, 53013 Gaiole In Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Barone Ricasoli delivers a top-class Chianti Classico that is penetrating, proud and modern at the same time. The wine is creamy and dense in the mouth with satisfying flavors of blackberry, cured meat and exotic spice. Very nice.

properties.title: Byron 2006 Bien Nacido Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 5250 Tepusquet Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Very rich, very complicated, a young, dense, grapey wine that clearly needs time to come around. Dry and balanced in acids and tannins, it shows brilliantly ripe blackberry, black cherry and cola flavors, with an earthy note the Brits used to call beetroot. Give it until after 2009 to begin to mellow.

properties.title: Cantine Gini 2000 Messere Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Via Giacomo Matteotti, 42, 37032 Monteforte d'Alpone VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a definite “wow!” wine with soft texture, dense extraction and a generous bouquet of ripe cherry flavors. The blend is Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot and the wine sees 12 months of oak that shapes warm notes of chocolate and spice. It's well aged and well priced.

properties.title: Principi di Spadafora 2004 Sole dei Padri Syrah (Sicilia)
properties.descrption: Sole dei Padri is a soft, opulent and elegant wine that would taste great with a sophisticated dinner of red meat and wild mushrooms. Aromas include black cherries, spice, smoked ham and white pepper.

properties.title: Sojourn 2010 Wohler Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 141 E Napa St, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: This is Sojourn's most successful 2010 Pinot Noir, because it's the ripest and most satisfying. It shows rich, tantalizing raspberry, cherry and cola flavors that are brightened by brisk acidity. It earns extra points for its complexity.

properties.title: Bersano 2008 Mantico  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Piazza Dante, 21, 14049 Nizza Monferrato AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Tight aromas of berry, tar, smoke and roasted hazelnut open this wine. It's linear, silky and long on the finish, with a fine quality of tannin.

properties.title: Ca' del Baio 2009 Valgrande  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: via ferrere sottano 33, 12050 Treiso CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Sometimes Nebbiolo, depending on the ripeness of the fruit at harvest time, trades in its characteristic austerity for softer tones of ripe fruit and dried currant. This shows those plusher fruit tones backed by notes of exotic spice and crushed mineral. The mouthfeel is firm, tart and structured.

properties.title: Carmel 2009 Appellation Cabernet Sauvignon-Shiraz (Galilee)
properties.address: Derech HaYekev 2, Zihron Ya'akov, Israel
properties.descrption: This versatile, food-friendly blend is a great value that's perfect for entertaining. Scents of brambly berry and black plum skin immediately unfold on the nose, while dense notes of cassis and blackberry take center stage on the palate. Balanced and accessible, the crushed satin texture is framed with medium tannins and lush, rich fruit flavors that stay through the long cocoa-kissed finish.

properties.title: Cascina delle Rose 2009 Rio Sordo  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: visit by appoint. only, Strada Rio Sordo, 58, 12050 Tre Stelle CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with a savory earth tone and drying layers of crushed stone and wet granite. There are also pretty aromas of violets and pressed blue flowers. It finishes with fine tannins and a slightly gritty texture.

properties.title: Clos Pepe 2010 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 4777 E, CA-246, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Young, vibrant and juicy, this is a beautiful Pinot Noir to drink now with fine foods ranging from steak and lamb to tuna and salmon. It has a silky, dry mouthfeel made brisk with acidity, while the flavors veer toward red stone fruits and spices.

properties.title: Mercouri Estate 2007 Domaine Mercouri Vin de Pays des Letrinon Red (Letrinon)
properties.address: Korakochori 271 00, Greece
properties.descrption: Notes of savory meat, anise, crushed black pepper and balsamic on the nose are followed by elegant waves of ripe red fruit and smoke on the palate. A successful balance of rich fruit and a briny, spicy backbone, this is a red that's very good consumed on its own or paired with grilled meats.

properties.title: Two Vintners 2009 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 18570 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Toasty scents from having aged in 40% new French oak waft over the tart raspberry fruit. This is a very clean, focused, well-defined Syrah. It's not too big, but crisp and classy, with some aging potential over the next 6–8 years.

properties.title: Artadi 2011 Pagos Viejos  (Rioja)
properties.address: Carretera de Logroño, s/n, 01300 Guardia, Álava, Spain
properties.descrption: Violet petal, fine leather, roasted berry and spice aromas are classy and elevated. This is a deep, generous, modern Rioja with tons of ripeness but also ideal balance. Black-fruit flavors spread from cheek to cheek, while toast, bitter chocolate and espresso notes add complexity. This beauty finishes stout, with toast, mint, chocolate and herb flavors. Drink from 2015 through 2025.

properties.title: Cordero di Montezemolo 2010 Monfalletto  (Barolo)
properties.descrption: It offers compelling fragrances of rose, violet, leather, woodland berries and herbs, with balsamic accents. The savory palate delivers crushed Morello cherry, raspberry, mint, vanilla and espresso with a blast of orange zest on the finish. It's young but already elegant and balanced. Drink after 2018.

properties.title: Fratelli Alessandria 2010  Barolo
properties.descrption: This elegant wine opens with a spicy fragrance of white pepper, clove and nutmeg along with notes of violet and forest floor.
