The palate offers crushed red cherry and raspberry accented with allspice and cinnamon alongside silky tannins. This is already accessible but will also age well over the next decade. Drink 2015–2025.

properties.title: G D Vajra 2010 Albe  (Barolo)
properties.address: Piazza della Vite e del Vino, 1, 12060 Barolo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Intense floral scents of freshly cut roses and wild violets jump out of the glass. On the palate, dark cherry and crushed cherry twine with allspice, cinnamon, clove, leather and alpine herbs. All are partnered by assertive but supple tannins and fresh acidity. Best 2015–2030.

properties.title: Quinta do Crasto 2011 Vinha Maria Teresa Red (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta do Crasto, 5060-063, Portugal
properties.descrption: From an old block of vines, producing a field blend of many different varieties, Vinha Maria Teresa is a major wine. Its low yields, firm tannins and dense wood aging give it great staying power. Black plum surge through the chocolate flavors and are given point by acidity. Age this fine wine until 2018.

properties.title: Mauro Veglio 2010 Rocche dell'Annunziata  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Annunziata, 50, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of crushed roses, violet, tilled earth, forest floor, leather and balsamic notes all come together. The palate delivers juicy black cherry accented with thyme, white pepper, mocha and subtle oak. It's still young, with brisk acidity and compact tannins but already shows finesse and balance. Drink after 2020.

properties.title: Paul Hobbs 2012 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Powerful and lush, this is a velvety, classically styled Russian River Valley Pinot, weighty and lip smacking in black cherry and touch of earth buoyed by finely hued acidity. Perfectly enjoyable right now, it'll age, too, the spicy undertones coaxed to take center stage.

properties.title: Palladino 2010 Ornato  (Barolo)
properties.address: Piazza Maria Cappellano, 9, 12050 Serralunga D'alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This Barolo shows its pedigree from Serralunga, home to the most powerful and age-worthy wines in the denomination. It opens with aromas of underbrush, tobacco, leather and cherries marinated in spirits. These carry over to the palate along with notes of sage and licorice. The assertive tannic spine needs time to soften and promises serious aging potential. Drink 2020–2040.

properties.title: Sobrero 2010 Ciabot Tanasio  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Pugnane, 5, 12060 Castiglione Falletto CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This is still a bit closed, but scents of rose, berry, white spices and underbrush slowly emerge. The savory flavors include bright berry, black cherry and white pepper supported by lively acidity and firm tannins. Young and tightly wound, it needs time to unfold. Drink after 2022. Chigazola Merchants, Domenico Valentino.

properties.title: Stephen Ross 2011 Stone Corral Vineyard Pinot Noir (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 178 Suburban Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.descrption: Showcasing the southeastern Edna Valley's sandy loam soils, this begins with lush black cherry and sleek graphite aromas. On the palate, racy acidity precedes oregano, licorice and rocky minerality, all painted across a canvas of boysenberry fruit. The acidity and tannins assure that this will last in the cellar as well; drink after 2018.

properties.title: Attilio Ghisolfi 2010 Bricco Visette  (Barolo)
properties.address: Località Bussia , 27 - Cascina Visette, 12065 Monforte D'alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: It opens with hallmark Nebbiolo scents of freshly picked roses, crushed violets, leather, berry, alpine herbs and forest floor. The delicious palate delivers a core of succulent black cherry accented with notes of cake spices, mint, licorice and grilled herbs. It's young but already balanced with powerful but refined tannins and brisk acidity. Drink 2020–2045.

properties.title: Château Ausone 2011 La Chapelle d'Ausone  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Chateau Ausone, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: This complex wine has rich tannins and layers of new wood atop dark black berries. At the same time, it is rounding out well, offering spice, sweet acidity and a terse freshness that is infectious. It's a very fruity wine for the medium term. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Tanunda 2009 The Château 100 Year Old Vines Shiraz (Barossa)
properties.address: Château Tanunda, 9 Basedow Rd, Tanunda SA 5352, Australia
properties.descrption: Full bodied and supple, this wine shows an interesting array of sensory notes for Barossa Shiraz, with notes ranging from espresso, tar, mint and green peppercorn to dark chocolate and blueberry. Finishes long and softly dusty, suggesting the ability to age through 2020, although it's very drinkable now.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2012 Middleridge Ranch Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Rich and structured, this is a grand wine for a grand occasion. It starts with a deep ruby color that stays dark almost to the edge of the glass. Flavors of dark cherry and pomegranate are vivid, deep and delicious. The combo of lively acid and firm tannin holds it all together for a lingering finish.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2012 Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Smooth, harmonious and seductive, this full-bodied but elegantly structured Pinot has deep red color and lots of fresh, ripe fruit flavor. It offers a texture as smooth as silk and a finish that lingers for 30 seconds. Vibrant acidity and firm tannins help to keep it fresh and vital. Enjoy now through 2018.

properties.title: Castello del Poggio 2013  Barbera d'Asti
properties.address: Loc. Poggio, 9, 14100 Fraz. Portacomaro Stazione AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Fresh and fruity, this easy-drinking red delivers aromas and flavors of black cherry, blackberry, black pepper and a hint of anise. Thanks to bright acidity, it can be paired with almost any dish.

properties.title: Rivetti Massimo 2014  Barbera d'Alba
properties.address: Via Rivetti, 22, 12052 Rivetti CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Blackberry, ripe plum, kitchen spice and moist earth aromas lead the nose. The straightforward, easy-drinking, palate offers black cherry, white pepper and a hint of anise alongside lively acidity.

properties.title: Noceto 2012 Sangiovese (Amador County)
properties.address: 11011 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: This medium-bodied, understated wine has a rather light red color with brown undertones. It offers subtle earthy and smoky aromas, tart fruit flavors like cranberries, and an appropriately tannic texture. While its flavors are subtle, the balance is great and this wine stayed fresh for three days after opening.

properties.title: Keller Estate 2013 El Coro Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: Sandalwood and a shovelful of fresh earth mark the entry of this wine aromatically. A soft, tart expression of the variety, it offers bittersweet tannin and dark cherry at its core.

properties.title: Larchago 2008 Pagos de Tahola Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: La Poveda Hiribidea, 36, 01306 Lapuebla de Labarca, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Flat stewy prune-like aromas are low on life but not off-putting. This feels wide grabby and tannic, while jammy flavors of raspberry and plum finish chunky and expansive, but also tannic and wan. Drink now.

properties.title: Jigar 2012 RAJA Cuvée Red (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 3805 Bohemian Hwy Box 467, Occidental, CA 95465, USA
properties.descrption: One of the bolder, more tannic red blends, this full-bodied wine has cedar and cinnamon aromas, flavors like boysenberry jam and a nicely gripping texture. Well balanced by firm acidity, it stays lively. The wine is made with 46% Malbec, plus Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon.

properties.title: Winderlea 2013 Murto Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 8905 NE Worden Hill Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: Sharp acidity underscores light, quite tart cranberry fruit. This has herbal notes in abundance, and an earthy note to the tannins. But it all comes together with a clean, polished finish.

properties.title: Gustafson Family 2014 Heritage Tree Vineyard Estate Rosé of Syrah (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: Reddish-orange in color, this is a high-toned, citrus-laden wine that retains fresh flavors of grapefruit and mandarin orange. It stays crisp and dry on the palate, with just a tiny suggestion of its time in neutral oak. Pomegranate and a tang of sour cherry finish things off.

properties.title: Sweet Cheeks 2012 Barrel Select Tempranillo (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 27007 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.descrption: Aged two years in French and American oak, this is a dark and meaty wine, with black fruits and a hint of blood. There's a bit of a hole in the midpalate, but streaks of cola and licorice revive the finish.

properties.title: Bodega Norton 2013 Barrel Select Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: km 23, RP15, M5509 Perdriel, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Big, blocky black-fruit aromas are reduced and potent. This is quite chunky and extracted in feel, with jammy gritty blackberry and plum flavors that are mildly herbal and simmer with heat and heft on the finish.

properties.title: Bodega Renacer 2012 Enamore Red (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: A grassy, herbal element is up front on the nose of this Amarone-style blend done in conjunction with Allegrini of the the Veneto (Italy). In the mouth, it's round as a ball, with syrupy richness. Ripe sticky berry and plum flavors finish chewy with residual stickiness.

properties.title: Borsao 2014 Monte Oton Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
properties.address: Camino del Tejar, s/n, 50540 Borja, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Cherry and raspberry aromas are spunky and simple in front of a crisp edgy palate. Medicinal, lightly rubbery flavors of cherry and plum finish with a raw rub, juicy acidity, a lean body and mild heat.

properties.title: Château de Gaudou 2014 Tradition Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
properties.address: Gaudou, 46700 Vire-sur-Lot, France
properties.descrption: The simplest and fruitiest of the Cahors made at Gaudou, this is still a structured wine that has some firm, very young tannins that need to round out. Plenty of fruity, fresh black-currant flavor is cut by crisp acidity. The wine will need to age, so drink from 2016.

properties.title: Lamadrid 2010 Single Vineyard Bonarda (Agrelo)
properties.address: Roque Sáenz Peña 8450, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Opens with lemony aromas before blackberry settles in. Feels regular and rolls along a straight plane: Crisp flavors of raspberry and black plum lead to a snappy finish that's just long enough and contains chocolate and vanilla flavors.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2009 Red Red (California)
properties.address: 2191 Laguna Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: A fine red wine, full-bodied, tannic and spicy, with juicy berry and tobacco flavors. The jug-shaped bottle is one of the cutest in California.

properties.title: Methven Family Vineyards 2008 Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 11400 SE Westland Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: Solid and earthy, this is a bold, blocky style, highlighted with ripe cherry fruit. Notes of dried leaf and forest floor lead into drying tannins.

properties.title: Parducci 2009 Small Lot Blend Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.descrption: Good price for a deliciously drinkable Pinot Noir. It's silky and a little sweet in raspberries, brown sugar and bacon flavors. Easy to drink and at this price, it can be your house Pinot.

properties.title: Ricominciare 2009 Malbec-Cabernet Franc (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Rosario Bustos de Zapata y Carlos Pellegrini, M5567 La Consulta, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: A bit lemony and herbal on the nose, with scratchy, forward raspberry and red plum aromas. Feels a touch clacky due to blazing acidity, but there's good structure and definition to the palate. Tastes herbal, with peppery accents to cassis and berry flavors. Burns a bit on the finish, with choppy tannins.

properties.title: Château Eugénie 2008 Tradition Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
properties.address: Rivière Haute, 46140 Albas, France
properties.descrption: A structured and firmly tannic wine, with sufficient juicy blackberry fruit to make it already approachable.

properties.title: Esterlina 2009 Anniversary Everett Ridge Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: High alcohol gives this wine some heat, and also a glyceriney sweetness. It's very ripe in blackberry, blueberry and currant flavors that have a thick, liqueur viscosity. Tasty and heady, it defines the Dry Creek superripe style of Zinfandel.

properties.title: Verum 2010 Pinot Noir (Alto Valle del Río Negro)
properties.address: Mitre, Río Negro, Argentina
properties.descrption: Scratchy, dry raspberry aromas are standard and accurate for Pinot. The mouthfeel is tight and crisp, with gentle acids pushing standard strawberry, raspberry and oaky flavors of cocoa and spice. Mild tasting but long on the finish.

properties.title: Algodon 2008 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon-Syrah
properties.address: RN144, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Red berry, green herb and tobacco are the lead aromas on this Cabernet-Syrah blend. Feels grabby but structured, with a big, loud mix of ripe berry, plum, subtle spice and earth. Rounds out and unfolds on the finish.

properties.title: Burgess 2008 Estate Vineyards Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a fresh, fruity young wine, marked by ripe, jammy blackberry, cherry, cola and cedar flavors. It's spicy and tannic and easy to drink now.

properties.title: Valle Reale 2006  Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
properties.address: Contrada S. Calisto, 65026 Popoli PE, Italy
properties.descrption: Simple and bright, filled with crisp berry nuances, this easygoing effort offers tones of blackberry, cherry and spicy tobacco.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2009 Merlot (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This is a sound Merlot. It has some good fruit flavors, along the lines of cherries and blackberries, with earthier notes of olive tapenade and sweet, spicy tobacco. Despite firm tannins, it's fully ready to drink now.

properties.title: Morandé 2010 Reserva Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Rosario Nte 615, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Pointy aromas of citrus, red berry and juniper are nice but a little sharp. The palate is similar; it's closed, snappy and juicy but fresh, with cherry tomato, herb and raspberry flavors. Long but basic tasting come finishing time.

properties.title: Qualia 2009 Pavo Estate Syrah (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 100 Qualia Dr, Del Rio, TX 78840, USA
properties.descrption: Somewhat rustic and coarse, with sweet, jammy berry and new oak flavors and a soft, melted mouthfeel. It's an easy wine for everyday fare.

properties.title: RoxyAnn 2008 Tempranillo (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 3283 Hillcrest Rd, Medford, OR 97504, USA
properties.descrption: Some lightly reductive aromas of rubber yield to decanting, though the wine remains rather hard and compact. Bourbon barrel flavors highlight the middle and continue on through the finish. This young wine seems to have good stuffing, but needs more years in bottle.

properties.title: Talisman 2008 Gunsalus Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 13651 Arnold Dr, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: Like Talisman's other 2008s, this is an easy, gentle wine, marked by ripe, candied raspberry and cherry fruit, enhanced with the sweet caramel and vanilla of oak barrels. Drink now.

properties.title: Umani Ronchi 2010 Montipagano  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: Via Adriatica, 12, 60027 Osimo AN, Italy
properties.descrption: This offers soft, slightly sweet aromas of cherry and cinnamon, with touches of leather and tobacco. It shows an easy, smooth mouthfeel.

properties.title: Adelaida 2008 Viking Estate Vineyard Reserve Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5805 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: A bit hot and heavy. Alcohol gives it a glyceriney sweetness, while the flavors themselves are very ripe in blackberry and cherry pie filling, with a superripe finish of prunes.

properties.title: Caballo Bravo 2010 Reserva Privada Pinot Noir (Maule Valley)
properties.address: 43 Bridle Rd, Caballo, NM 87931, USA
properties.descrption: Light aromas of tea, briary raspberry and field notes are mild as a whole. Feels juicy, lean and transparent, with agile dry-fruit flavors, cocoa and modest buttery oak. Light in weight and tasting on the tail end.

properties.title: Amalia 2010 Le Coste di Monforte  (Barolo)
properties.address: 1248 S Main St, Wake Forest, NC 27587, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas suggest coffee, vanilla, oak, savory herb and menthol. The palate offers espresso, roasted hazelnut, dried sage and sour cherry alongside green, astringent tannins. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Brander 2011 Cabernet Franc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: The first to plant the grape in the Santa Ynez Valley, Fred Brander has a current Cab Franc release that hits the nose with black-as-night scents of wet potting soil and black pepper. The flavors are slow to emerge, but blueberry crumble, chocolate and crushed herbs appear with patience.

properties.title: Broken Earth 2010 Reserve Petit Verdot (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Candied blackberry, creosote and hot tar aromas fuel the nose of this Petit Verdot, a grape increasingly getting solo time in Central Coast bottles. It's thick on the palate, with smoked tobacco, peppery spice and cigar-like tannins.

properties.title: Château des Landes 2011 Cuvée Prestige  (Lussac Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Rue du Tertre de la Tente, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: From Château des Landes' old vines, this is a concentrated, solid wine. Dark tannins have dark chocolate and licorice flavors, with a structure that dominates the fruit and needs to soften. New wood aging was perhaps excessive, but give the wine time. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: René Muré 2012 Cuvée V Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: Clos Saint Landelin, 68250 Rouffach, France
properties.descrption: This soft and ripe wine is full of bright cherry flavors, with gentle tannins and just a hint of wood aging. A proper Pinot Noir acidity brings out the fruitiness of the wine. Drink now.

properties.title: Rock Wren 2010 Syrah (Solano County)
properties.address: 6652 US-15, Carthage, NC 28327, USA
properties.descrption: Intense tannins and full body make this Syrah difficult to savor at this point, but it may round out with aging. It smells like smoke and black pepper, and tastes like grilled beef and blackberries. It is firm and astringent in texture, tight and concentrated in flavor. Best after 2018.

properties.title: V. Sattui 2011 Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1111 White Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This wine also contains small percentages of Petite Sirah and Grenache to good effect, providing a soft and approachable entry of well-balanced black fruit and leather.

properties.title: Apex 2012 The Catalyst Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 357 Port Ave, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: A little over half Syrah with a balance of Merlot, barrel fermented in French and American oak—20% new—it shows notes of clove, dusty spice, and blackberry. The palate is medium bodied and flavorful with slightly astringent tannins with tart cherry and cranberry notes on the finish.

properties.title: Boomtown 2012 Syrah (Washington)
properties.address: 200 Main St # B, Downieville, CA 95936, USA
properties.descrption: This ready to drink wine seems tailor-made for many—loaded with blueberry fruit, it's a soft, smooth, easy-drinking style. The rich streaks of vanilla and milk chocolate keep it satisfying to the very end.

properties.title: François Bertheau 2011 Les Amoureuses  (Chambolle-Musigny)
properties.address: 5 Rue du Carré, 21220 Chambolle-Musigny, France
properties.descrption: This wine has great fruitiness, soft tannins and generous, ripe red fruits, while finishing dry. It's a wine with the structure for aging while also packed with big red fruits. Keep for 4–6 years.

properties.title: Blackbird Vineyards 2010 Illustration Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 604 Main St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: There's something enormously satisfying about this Merlot-based blend. It hits the Napa-Bordeaux sweet spot, with concentrated blackberry and cherry fruit, jacketed in sweet, smoky oak. But there's also a fascinating olive character. The tannins are rich and dense and velvety. Great to experience now, and should be one for the long haul, perhaps through 2022.

properties.title: Lynmar 2011 Freestone Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3909 Frei Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: Richness floods the midpalate with flavors of raspberries, cherries, red currants and cola, brightened with crisp, zesty acidity. This is Lynmar's best Freestone Pinot ever, showing the ability of the vineyard to ripen fruit even in a chilly vintage. Exciting and stimulating, it's a wine you want to age for at least six years.

properties.title: Domaine des Croix 2011 Bressandes Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.address: 2 Rue Colbert, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: A fine, mineral, structured wine with a very dry, solid core. Juicy red fruits offer a hint for its future ripeness. It has the freshness of the vintage that shows through at the end of this chunky wine. Age for 5–7 years.

properties.title: Primus 2010 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Calle Curto, M5567 La Consulta, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: A new wine from Chile's Veramonte, this starts with huge cola and blackberry aromas. which are backed by grippy tannins and mild astringency. It tastes bulky, bearing grippy tannins and mild astringency, with leather and blackberry notes. Coffee and spice flavors control the finish on this ripe Malbec.

properties.title: Agate Ridge 2009 Estate Syrah (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 1098 Nick Young Rd, Eagle Point, OR 97524, USA
properties.descrption: This is arguably the best of the current Agate Ridge reds. It's a nicely focused Syrah, mixing flavors of raspberry, chocolate and coffee syrup into a ripe bundle. The tannins are supportive and proportionate.

properties.title: Bodega Cuarto Dominio 2010 Chento Vineyard Selection Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: R2MC+C2, Agrelo, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: A very good, heavily oaked Malbec that exudes clove and hickory notes before settling on aromas of earthy fruit and cheesy leather. The palate feels flush and tannic, with accents of clove and cumin and a secondary berry flavor. It ends with touches of barrel spice and resin.

properties.title: Keever 2009 Inspirado Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 26 Vineyard View Dr, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Very ripe and fruity, this has a rich, glycerine-driven sweetness, like a tangy ruby Port. It's delicious in blackberry jam and caramel flavors, with intricate tannins and fine, citrusy acids.

properties.title: Labouré-Roi 2009 Le Taillefer  (Pommard)
properties.address: Rue Lavoisier, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: The wine has firm, dark tannins as befits a Pommard, with underlying sumptuous black fruit. As the tannins soften, this will become a rich and juicy wine, and it will likely always remain structured.

properties.title: Olson Ogden 2009 Margaret's Mandate Marsanne (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 32900 Diamond Hill Rd, Harrisburg, OR 97446, USA
properties.descrption: This full-bodied version—sourced from Napa Valley's famed Stagecoach Vineyard—tastes very much like a barrel-fermented Sauvignon Blanc, with honey and green apple flavors. Well-made, the finish shows the wine's time spent in 33% French oak.

properties.title: Cortes de Cima 2010 Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: Fruit and barnyard flavors combine to give a wine that, while on the rustic side, still has an attractive juicy quality. It is full bodied; its acidity combines with a ripe plum flavor.

properties.title: Easton 2009 Cooper Ranch Barbera (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
properties.address: 1247 Simon Blvd Suite N103, Easton, PA 18042, USA
properties.descrption: Pungent of baked plum and baking spice, this Shenandoah Barbera is soft and rustic, yet refined, with a jolt of mocha espresso on the finish. The expert acidity enveloping this wine should pair with Mediterrean-themed food.

properties.title: MacMurray Ranch 2009 Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: Russian River-based MacMurray Ranch turns to the Central Coast's Santa Lucia Highlands for Pinot Noir, with admirable results. This is a terrific wine for drinking now, dry and powerful in red fruits, cola and spices, yet elegantly tailored. Might develop for a few years, but best now for youthful exuberance, although you do want to give it three hours in a decanter.

properties.title: MacPhail 2009 Wildcat Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: Tastes thick, heavy and sweet in youth, showing the fantastic ripeness of the vintage, with a flavor of cherry and raspberry marmalade. Oak shows up in the rich addition of buttered cinnamon toast. If that sounds good, it is, and you can enjoy it now. But it will improve with 3–4 years in the bottle.

properties.title: Matrix 2009 Reserve Nunes Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 3291 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Deeply flavored in raspberries, cherries, red licorice and exotic dusty spices, this Pinot Noir has a tannin-acid tightness that makes it aloof and hard. Although it's dry, it's so rich in fruit, it tastes sweet. A very fine wine, but needs some time to come around. Give it four or five years to mellow.

properties.title: Vista Hills 2009 Marylhurst Estate Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6475 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: A standout Pinot, expressive from the first sniff to the last swallow. Elegant and precise, with deep notes of black cherry fruit, set into a balanced framework of tannin and acid. Barrel notes of coffee and cinnamon are expressive and beautifully integrated.

properties.title: Zuccardi 2008 Zeta Malbec-Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: Costa Canal Uco s/n - Paraje Altamira, San Carlos, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Powerful, pure and tightly wound, meaning it's a candidate for short-term cellaring, say 2–5 years. Smells ripe and fruity, with blackberry, cola and coconut resulting in a spot-on nose. Concentrated and juicy, with a strong constitution and potent plum, berry and cassis flavors. Toasty and lightly oaky on the finish; 73% Malbec and 27% Cabernet Sauvignon.

properties.title: Jean-Luc Baldès 2009 Château Labrande Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Lieu-dit "Les poujols", 46700 Vire-sur-Lot, France
properties.descrption: This is a serious, firmly structured wine, impressively rich as well as tannic. Black fruits push through the considerable structure, offering balance as the wine ages. It is young now, with hints of mint from wood aging. Powerfully textured, give this 4–5 years.

properties.title: Château d'Aydie 2009 Madiran Laplace Tannat (Madiran)
properties.address: 64330 Aydie, France
properties.descrption: With the richness of the vintage, the natural tannins of Tannat are tamed by the welter of intense black fruits, sweet berries and Arabica coffee. The structure is exhibited in the dusty tannins under all the fruit.

properties.title: Château Peyros 2006 Tannat-Cabernet Franc (Madiran)
properties.address: 9 Chem. du Château, 64350 Corbère-Abères, France
properties.descrption: Perfumed wine, from a blend of Tannat and Cabernet Franc. Here is a powerful expression of intense terroir. Very concentrated and dense, with the tannins just beginning to soften, the wine is packed with black ripe fruits, solid and chunky.

properties.title: Château Peyros 2007 Vieilles Vignes Tannat (Madiran)
properties.address: 9 Chem. du Château, 64350 Corbère-Abères, France
properties.descrption: A powerful wine, very concentrated, the tannins a part of the richer fruit and dark brooding character of the wine. There is good juiciness as well, black fruits and acidity cutting through the dominant young tannins.

properties.title: Davies 2009 Ferrington Vineyards Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.descrption: Richness marks this flamboyantly fruity, sweet young Pinot Noir. It erupts in jammy cherry and raspberry flavors, while new oak brings sweet, toasty complications of smoky butter and vanilla. Would be just an ordinary fruit bomb except for the wonderful acid-tannin structure. So delicious.

properties.title: Château Tour des Gendres 2008 La Gloire de Mon Père Red (Côtes de Bergerac)
properties.address: 24240 Ribagnac, France
properties.descrption: A warm, beautifully balanced wine, with a fine weight of black fruits, juicy acidity, all rounded with tannins and some wood. This ageworthy wine is concentrated while remaining poised and elegant.

properties.title: Domaine de l'Hermitage 2007 L'Oratoire Mourvèdre (Bandol)
properties.address: 1995 Chem. du Rouve, 83330 Le Beausset, France
properties.descrption: A big and powerful wine with a vibrant, rich texture. Dense black plum and ripe berry fruits push through the firm tannins. The wine is smooth and perfumed with a big spicy aftertaste. Drink now, or keep for 2–3 years.

properties.title: Domaine du Crampilh 2007 Vignes Vieilles Tannat (Madiran)
properties.address: route de carcassonne, 34310 Capestang, France
properties.descrption: A dark and rich wood aged wine, packing the intense punch of Tannat while smoothing and rounding it with spicy wood, dark chocolate and sweet plums. Age for 3–4 years and more.

properties.title: Donato D'Angelo 2013 Calice  (Aglianico del Vulture)
properties.address: 979 Lochore Rd, Penticton, BC V2A 8V1, Canada
properties.descrption: Aromas of woodland berry, damp earth and a whiff of cellar floor lead the nose. The firm lean palate offers raw cherry, powdered sage and a hint of white pepper set against bracing tannins and racy acidity. Give the tannins a few years to unwind then drink to capture the remaining fruit.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2015 Piedirosso (Campania)
properties.address: Località Cerza Grossa, 83050 Sorbo Serpico AV, Italy
properties.descrption: This offers heady aromas of ripe black-skinned fruit, blue flower and a whiff of tilled earth. On the soft succulent palate, brown pepper and a hint of saline accent fleshy plum and ripe black cherry. It's smooth and easy drinking, with supple tannins.

properties.title: Laird 2014 Phantom Ranch Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 5055 Solano Ave, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Simple and earthy, this ranch-designate shows a wealth of brick color and flavors of cherry cola, raspberry and bay, its full-bodied ripeness offset moderately by acidity.

properties.title: Maison Charles Père et Fils 2015  Bourgogne
properties.address: 8195 Crane Ridge Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Bright red cherry fruit and lively acidity give this wine an immediate burst of crispness. It has an attractive tannic character underpinning its ebullient fruitiness. Drink now.

properties.title: Mercer 2014 Reserve Cavalie Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.descrption: Merlot (63%) makes up the majority of this wine, with the balance Cabernet Sauvignon (25%) and Malbec. Brooding aromas of herb, pencil lead, vanilla and spice are followed by dry dark-fruit flavors. The midpalate seems lacking, and the tannins show a touch of astringency.

properties.title: Plaisance Ranch 2014 Cabernet Franc (Applegate Valley)
properties.address: 16955 Water Gap Rd, Williams, OR 97544, USA
properties.descrption: Stiff tannins are matched to sharp raspberry and boysenberry fruit, crafting a well-defined, young and potent wine. This may benefit from another year or two in bottle, but it's already a tasty, albeit tight wine with a mix of fresh fruit and astringent, herb and cracker flavors.

properties.title: Podere La Berta 2015 Sangiovese (Romagna)
properties.address: Via Berta, 13, 48013 Brisighella RA, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with subdued aromas of black-skinned berry and a whiff of baking spice. The straightforward palate delivers black plum, clove and leather alongside round tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2014 Forma de Arte Reserva Red (Tejo)
properties.address: Estrada Municipal 1, 2080-201 Almeirim, Portugal
properties.descrption: This half-and-half blend of Touriga Nacional and Cabernet Sauvignon is structured and with a firm layer of tannins. It also has plenty of ripe berry fruits that are balancing the more serious texture. Drink now.

properties.title: Sandler 2015 Peterson Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: An extremely light and lithe take on the region, this shows light red fruit and a gravel and riverstone quality on the nose. There is chalky structure to the sip, with tart and bright red plum skin flavors, but it's rather dull overall, albeit cleanly made.

properties.title: Simonnet-Febvre 2014  Irancy
properties.address: 30 Rte de Saint-Bris, 89530 Chitry, France
properties.descrption: This blend of Pinot Noir and the rare local César grape is as light as red wine can get in Burgundy. This northern region close to Chablis produces bright fruity expressions that attractively balance red cherry flavor with racy acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Sogrape 2015 Herdade do Peso Trinca Bolotas Red (Alentejo)
properties.descrption: The wine comes from the Alentejo vineyards owned by Portugal's largest company. Named after the local black pigs, the wine is fruity although with a core of tannins. Young, bright and packed with berry flavors, it is a wine to drink now or (better) from 2018.

properties.title: Tenuta Casali 2013 Quartosole Sangiovese (Romagna)
properties.address: Via della Liberazione, 32, 47025 Mercato Saraceno FC, Italy
properties.descrption: This straightforward red opens with aromas of leather, game and black-skinned fruit. The firm palate delivers prune, cedar and tobacco alongside assertive tannins that leave a rather grippy finish.

properties.title: San Simeon 2012 Estate Reserve Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 442 Slo San Simeon Rd, San Simeon, CA 93452, USA
properties.descrption: Elegant aromas of blackcurrant and black cassis combine with German-chocolate cake and concentrated violet oil scents on the nose of this bottling. It is soft and full on the palate, where mouth-coating tannins present flavors of earthy loam, black cherry and hint of burnt caramel on the finish.

properties.title: Le Chiuse 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Loc Le Chiuse zona Val di Cava, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of wild berry, blue flower, tilled soil and a whiff of dark spice lead the nose on this luminous wine. Savory and smooth, the easy-drinking palate presents black cherry, star anise and clove while bright acidity and polished tannins provide the sleek framework.

properties.title: Lexington 2013 Gist Ranch Estate Malbec (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 2000 Dog Hollow Rd, Lynnville, TN 38472, USA
properties.descrption: Blueberry, blackberry, black pepper and smoke swirl into a rather reserved and elegant nose on this bottling, one of the few Malbecs made in the mountainous region. There is great tannic tension to the acid-driven palate, with blackcurrant and dried-violet flavors adding to that blackcurrant and black-pepper base.

properties.title: Bodegas Valdemar 2008 Conde Valdemar Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Calle Camino Viejo Logroño, 24, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Gritty earthy nutty aromas announce a slightly stale wine that comes up a little short in terms of purity of fruit and freshness. A good mouthfeel is a positive, while flavors of tomato, spice and gritty, roasted berry and plum finish toasty, peppery and burnt. Drink now.

properties.title: Vermeil 2013 Compassion Red (California)
properties.address: 1018 1st St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Very sweet and supple, this red dessert wine has a light perfume of roses and prunes. Rich, ripe fruit flavors come with a full body and soothing, wrap-around texture. The finish is long and sweet, too.

properties.title: Vigilance 2014 Cimarron Red (Lake County)
properties.address: 13888 Point Lakeview Rd, Lower Lake, CA 95457, USA
properties.descrption: Complex, flavorful but not too big, this layered wine has aromas like cedar and tobacco, and flavors like black cherry and mint. It offers a medium-full body and velvety texture.

properties.title: Zuccardi 2014 Emma Bonarda (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Costa Canal Uco s/n - Paraje Altamira, San Carlos, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Initial rubbery, the oaky and smoky aromas give way to blueberry and plum scents. Hard tannins are cut by juicy acidity, while this tastes of blackberry, dark plum and bacon. Persistent hard-driving tannins are abrasive on the finish, which holds onto racy acidity and core berry fruit flavors.

properties.title: Señorío de Cuzcurrita 2011  Rioja
properties.address: C. San Sebastián, 1, 26214 Cuzcurrita de Río Tirón, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Reduced prune aromas are rubbery, herbal and not fully convincing. On the palate, this is gritty, tannic and tight, with tomatoey acidity. Oaky grapy flavors are compact, while graphite is noted on a finish that's weighted down by bulky tannins.

properties.title: Spring Valley Vineyard 2013 Frederick Estate Grown Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2 E Rose St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Sauvignon (80%) makes up the majority of this wine, with the rest equal parts Cabernet Franc and Merlot. Aromas of high-toned green herbs, spice, black cherry and blackberry lead to lively cranberry and cherry flavors. It shows a sense of freshness, though at times it seems a bit green.

properties.title: Buttonwood 2013 Classic Cuvée Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a perfect wine, both in accessible flavors and somewhat affordable price, for pizza night or meatballs. Cooked red plum, strawberry and a bit of cracked pepper kick off the nose in the Cabernet Franc-led blend, with Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Malbec. More plum hits the palate along with peppery spices, tobacco and marjoram. It's easy but not overly simple.

properties.title: Viña Cobos 2013 Malbec (Perdriel)
properties.descrption: Jammy and reduced on the nose, this smells gritty and gaseous. In the mouth, this is clampy and tannic. Medicinal flavors of blueberry are proprietary to this wine and frankly a touch green in the middle. That said, the heavy and herbal tasting finish seems fitting.

properties.title: Yves Leccia 2014 YL Rouge Red (Ile de Beauté)
properties.address: Lieu-dit, Morta Piana, 20232 Poggio-d'Oletta, France
properties.descrption: This blend of Grenache and Niellucciu comes from vines that are up to 40 years old. It is a big, bold ripe and juicy wine, bursting with black plum and berry flavors. The wine is fruity enough to drink now, although it should age for at least 10 years.

properties.title: Kim Crawford 2013 Small Parcels Rise and Shine Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
properties.address: 45 Station Road, Huapai 0810, New Zealand
properties.descrption: This is a fairly muscular rendering of Central Otago Pinot Noir. Plum, herb, espresso and charred oak notes mark the nose and palate, while the finish shows some gritty tannins. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Angel Vine 2013 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 8749 NW Marshall St, Portland, OR 97229, USA
properties.descrption: Lively aromas of brambly red fruit and spice are followed by plump raspberry flavors. It shows a lot of freshness and purity.

properties.title: Tedeschi 2012  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.address: Via Giuseppe Verdi, 4/a, 37029 Pedemonte di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of underbrush, scorched earth, toasted hazelnut, dark spice, menthol and new leather emerge in the glass. The firm palate delivers dried black cherry, raisin, coffee and chewing tobacco while fine-grained tannins provide the framework. It finishes on a slightly bitter note.

properties.title: Damiani 2012 Reserve Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 4704 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.descrption: Spice, toast and savory dried herbs accent rich black cherry in this penetrating Pinot Noir. Dense on the palate and voluptuous in body, it's forward in fruit yet maintains a cool restraint of minerality and fine, penetrating tannins. It's a polished, memorable wine.

properties.title: Dumas Station 2012 The Excursion Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 36229 US-12, Dayton, WA 99328, USA
properties.descrption: A new release from this winery, this aromatically intriguing wine conveys blueberry, dried herbs, flowers and cigar box. The palate shows good concentration and intensity to the sweet, succulent blue fruit flavors that linger on the finish with barrel notes. The wood gets a little out front but hopefully it will integrate more with time.

properties.title: Fiddletown Cellars 2012 Jack Rabbit Flat Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.address: PO Box 69, Fiddletown, CA 95629, USA
properties.descrption: This is a sophisticated and ultrasmooth wine. A spicy, almost sweet aroma of classy oak leads to rich strawberry and plum flavors that glide lightly on the supple texture, which has just enough tannin and acidity to keep the wine well balanced.

properties.title: Piccini 2010 Villa al Cortile  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Loc. Piazzole, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This earthy expression of Sangiovese offers aromas of fennel, dried hay, rose and a balsamic note. The palate delivers wild cherry, raspberry, clove, savory herb and licorice alongside gripping tannins and firm acidity. It still needs to develop. Drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2012 McClellan Estate Vineyard Petit Verdot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 212 N 3rd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from 2003 plantings that are truly just stretching their legs, this 100% varietal wine offers brooding notes of coffee, fig and barrel spices (40% new French). It's dense in texture with mouthwatering acids and expertly managed tannins, revealing espresso flavors on the finish.

properties.title: Two Vintners 2012 StoneTree Vineyard Zinfandel (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 18570 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: It's hard to ignore the high alcohol listing, but the wine is so well balanced and cohesive that few would even notice. It's aromatic with notes of dried and fresh cranberries and raspberries. The palate is full bodied and rich with concentrated, pure fruit flavors.

properties.title: Syncline 2012 McKinley Springs Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 111 Balch Rd, Lyle, WA 98635, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from 12-year-old plantings that are just starting to hit their stride, this wine shows brooding notes of blueberry, rhubarb, herbs and espresso. The flavors show intensity and restraint with slightly gritty tannins.

properties.title: Baer 2011 Star Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE #F100, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Merlot (81%), Cabernet Franc (11%) and Cabernet Sauvignon is directly appealing with accents of baker's chocolate, vanilla, blackberry, crushed flowers and raspberries. It's soft and supple in feel with focused fruit flavors and a finish that won't quit.

properties.title: Baer 2011 Ursa Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE #F100, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is equal parts Cabernet Franc and Merlot with the balance Malbec (8%) and Cabernet Sauvignon (6%). Aromas suggest pencil lead, vanilla, herbs, barrel spices and an assortment of red and black fruit. The coffee and cherry flavors are elegant in style, soft and supple in feel, with a grip of tannins and a tart finish. The wood often leads but there's plenty of stuffing there too.

properties.title: Bianchi 2011 Heritage Selection Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Licorice, blackberry extract and a slate-driven mineral element power the complex nose. There's great tension between hearty, ripe olallieberry fruit and bitter plum skins on the palate, resulting in one of the winery's best 2011s.

properties.title: Block Nine 2013 Caiden's Vineyards Pinot Noir (California)
properties.descrption: Classy and classic French oak and red cherry aromas combine with raspberry flavors, lively acidity and firm, textured tannins to make a complete, well-balanced wine. This is a bit more austere than many of its peers, but the taut balance and appetizing texture make it more compelling.

properties.title: Brave & Maiden 2011 Merlot (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: This new project by a former White House videographer recently enlisted Paul Hobbs as a consultant. The promise is already apparent in this wine, with aromas of cedar, cherry extract and pleasant green-pepper elements. Spicy black pepper leads the palate, which finds ripeness in black cherry and balance with leather and coffee.

properties.title: Finca Patagonia 2014 Reserve Merlot (Maule Valley)
properties.address: RN22, Río Negro, Argentina
properties.descrption: Gritty black-fruit aromas come with notes of bell pepper and green herbs as well as coffee grounds. A snappy, tough, drawing palate delivers peppery, blackened spice and herbal berry flavors prior to a crisp, tight finish with fresh acidity.

properties.title: Marchesi de' Frescobaldi 2015 Castiglioni  (Chianti)
properties.descrption: A blend of Sangiovese and Merlot, this delightful red has fruity aromas of wild berry and plum. The easy-drinking palate offers black cherry and a spicy note of clove alongside polished tannins. It's made to be drunk young, so enjoy soon.

properties.title: Midnight 2012 Synnove Petit Verdot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2925 Anderson Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Just-plucked blueberry, cedar and fermenting-grape aromas show on the dusty nose of this dark and heavy bottling. Boysenberry, turned earth and coffee beans show on the palate that is framed by chalky tannins, finishing on a touch of vanilla.

properties.title: Poggio al Chiuso 2013 Le Cappelle Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Str. S. Michele, 19, 50028 Barberino Tavarnelle FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 80% Sangiovese and 20% Merlot, this opens with subdued aromas suggesting red plum and baking spice. The aromas carry on to the straightforward palate, together with a hint of hazelnut. It's easy drinking, with fresh acidity and round tannins.

properties.title: Poggio Nicchiaia 2013 Mania Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Via San Martino 7, Loc. Montelopio, 56037 Peccioli PI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 70% Sangiovese, 15% Merlot and 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with delicate aromas of red berry and baking spice. The easy-drinking palate delivers mature plum, espresso and vanilla. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Odfjell 2012 Capítulo by Odfjell Carignan-Cabernet Sauvignon-Malbec Red (Central Valley)
properties.address: Padre Hurtado, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile
properties.descrption: Despite herbaceous aromas of eucalyptus and thyme, this choppy, grating blend of Carignan, Cabernet Sauvignon and Malbec offers forward bold plum and currant flavors along with can't-miss herbal notes. This is aggressive on the finish, with mild heat and raw tannins.

properties.title: Poggio Verrano 2010 3 Red (Toscana)
properties.descrption: Made with equal parts of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Alicante, this has earthy aromas of black-skinned fruit and game. The dense palate delivers prune, toast and tobacco alongside gripping, rather drying tannins.

properties.title: Viña Marty 2012 Pirca Carmenère (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Commercial Office - Eliodoro Yañez 1649, Santiago, Providencia, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Spicy berry, bath soap and graphite aromas are a bit hard to understand. Somewhat raw and pinched in feel, this tastes of spicy plum and tomato. On the finish, peppery notes of hard spice and plum are solid, as is the closing feel.

properties.title: Aresti 2015 Special Release Reserva Carmenère-Syrah (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Road,, Río Claro, Maule, Chile
properties.descrption: Demanding aromas of coffee grounds, tomato sauce, herbs and black fruits are normal for Carmenère and Syrah. With choppy, aggressive tannins and oaky flavors of herbal plum and berry fruits, this tastes somewhat green, minty and spicy on the finish.

properties.title: Bitner 2012 Erletxe Tempranillo
properties.address: 16645 Plum Rd, Caldwell, ID 83605, USA
properties.descrption: Brooding aromas of earth, tobacco, spice and red fruit lead to plentiful savory tobacco and mesquite flavors. It seems a bit dried out.

properties.title: Brancaia 2013 Tre Red (Toscana)
properties.descrption: A blend of 80% Sangiovese with the remaining made up of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, this opens with aromas of black-skinned fruit and espresso. The straightforward palate offers black plum and clove alongside smooth tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2013 Barrel Select Syrah (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: Izaga 1096, Isla de Maipo, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Oaky aromas of graphite, vanilla, berry fruits and plum lead to a firm clampy high-acid palate with oak-rich flavors of spiced plum and currant. Mildly green, minty flavors close out a drawing tight finish.

properties.title: Seaside 2014 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: 555 CA-1, Bodega Bay, CA 94923, USA
properties.descrption: This is light in hue, even for Pinot Noir, but it offers attractive, bright cherry fruit backed by crisp acids. The tannins are supple, leaving the acids to define the structure. Drink it before the end of 2017.

properties.title: Suberli 2014  Morellino di Scansano
properties.descrption: Fragrant purple flower, red berry, Mediterranean brush and a hint of resin come together on this enjoyable red. The lively palate offers juicy morello cherry, crushed raspberry and a savory sprinkling of dark spice alongside rounded tannins and firm acidity.

properties.title: Brancaia 2014 Tre Red (Toscana)
properties.descrption: With Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon added to 80% Sangiovese, this wine has a restrained nose that eventually reveals black-skinned fruit and charred earth. The straightforward palate offers berry, clove and a confectionery note alongside smooth tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Heron Hill 2014 Eclipse Red (New York)
properties.address: 9301 Co Rd 76, Hammondsport, NY 14840, USA
properties.descrption: Primary flavors of luscious cherry, berry and plum reverberate throughout this fleshy red blend. Sunny acidity and a silken rounded mouthfeel lend to a juicy and easy-drinking demeanor. Fine but persistent tannins lend structure to a vanilla-spiced finish. Drink now through 2019.

properties.title: Il Borro 2013 Pian di Nova Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Località Borro, 1, 52024 Loro Ciuffenna AR, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of 75% Syrah and 25% Sangiovese, this easygoing red has aromas of toast, espresso, chopped mint and a whiff of brown baking spice. The straightforward palate shows black currant, licorice and clove alongside fine-grained tannins.

properties.title: Il Borro 2013 Polissena Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Località Borro, 1, 52024 Loro Ciuffenna AR, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Sangiovese, this easy-drinking wine opens with subdued aromas of toast, espresso, aromatic herb and a whiff blue flower. The round straightforward palate offers dried wild cherry, walnut and star anise alongside supple tannins. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Castello d'Albola 2014 OSO Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale 72, 53017 Radda in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of Sangiovese, Merlot and Syrah, this has fruity aromas of dark-skinned berry along with a whiff of all spice. The fresh easygoing palate shows blackberry, black cherry and a hint of ground pepper accompanied by soft tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Luigi Oddero & Figli 2013  Barolo
properties.descrption: Aromas of rose, crushed herb, red berry and a balsamic note take shape in the glass. Elegant, fresh and poised, the palate offers black raspberry, red cherry baking spice and a hint of licorice framed in youthful but polished tannins. Drink 2020–2028.

properties.title: Michele Chiarlo 2013 Cannubi  (Barolo)
properties.address: Strada Nizza-Canelli, 99, 14042 Calamandrana AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Subtle aromas of dark berry, espresso, exotic spice and French oak slowly take shape on this. The firmly structured palate offers sour cherry, cranberry, coffee and licorice while close-grained tannins provide an assertive backbone. Drink 2023–2033.

properties.title: Villa Venti 2015 A Centesimino (Vino da Tavola)
properties.address: via Doccia 1442, 47020 Roncofreddo FC, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with rare native grape Centesimino (organically farmed) and fermented in amphora, this has intense, alluring aromas that recall dark-skinned berry, violet, rose and dark baking spice. The bright juicy palate delivers ripe morello cherry, red currant, clove and graphite alongside tangy acidity and lithe tannins.

properties.title: Poseidon 2015 Estate Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 1100 Milton Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: This is a classic, concentrated but elegant wine, from the wonderful black cherry and forest underbrush aromas to the ripe fruit flavors, full body and polished texture. Aging in 30% new Hungarian barrels gave a subtle spicy accent.

properties.title: Sanford 2014 Sanford & Benedict Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 5010 Santa Rosa Rd, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of juniper and forest floor give depth to the rusty cherry, tart cranberry, dried hibiscus and pepper-dust scents on the nose of this bottling from the historic vineyard. Soft in structure at first, it then delivers a firmer tannic edge in the midpalate, all the while delivering vivacious red fruit and pine-forest flavors. It will age very well.

properties.title: Tionio 2014  Ribera del Duero
properties.address: Carretera de Valoria, km. 7, 47315 Pesquera de Duero, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Intense, rubbery aromas of blackberry, cassis and raisin lead off. This Tinto Fino is full bodied, saturated and ripe in feel. Blackberry, cassis, toast and chocolate flavors finish with a covering of burnt oak and spice. Drink through 2026.

properties.title: W.T. Vintners 2014 Gorgeous Destiny Ridge Vineyard Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.descrption: All coming from Block 1, this wine was fermented 65% whole cluster and aged for 20 months in neutral barrels. Pretty aromas of spice, flower, herb, cherry and earth give way to a full fruit-forward palate that shows a dazzling sense of purity and richness while also maintaining its restraint. It's a bit of a stylistic departure for the winery in terms of its richness but it still delivers big time.

properties.title: Weninger 2015 Horitschoner Blaufränkisch (Mittelburgenland)
properties.address: Florianigasse 11, 7312 Horitschon, Austria
properties.descrption: The nose still gives away little. The palate also remains tightly curled in itself. This wine needs a little time but promises to blossom with another year of bottle age. It has a gamy streak on the firm, grippy midpalate as well as bright, enlivening freshness. The finish is lip-smacking and the tannins still edgy, but the juiciness of dark fruit is undeniable. Drink 2018–2020.

properties.title: Zaca Mesa 2013 Eight Barrel Syrah (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 6905 Foxen Canyon Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: Savory aromas of roasting meat and beef jerky are enhanced by pretty touches of lilacs, violet and chocolate syrup on the nose of this bottling. The slightest kiss of strawberry shows on the sip, followed by riper blackberry, purple flowers, rosemary and pepper. The firm tannic structure ensures ageability.

properties.title: García Figuero 2013 Milagros  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.descrption: Milagros means “miracles,” and the marvel is how good this wine is considering how rough in general 2013 was in the Ribera del Duero region. Oaky aromas of root beer and blackberry are smooth and heady. This wine is intense, with big tannins and firm acidity. Faith will be rewarded down the line with potent berry and chocolaty oak flavors. Bottle age should help this soften up; drink from 2020–2030.

properties.title: Reynvaan Family Vineyards 2014 Estate The Contender In the Rocks Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 6309 Cottonwood Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Blended with 6% Marsanne, the aromas are light (considering the appellation and producer), bringing notes of herb, smoked meat, white pepper, mineral and earth. The flavors are tart and bright, creating a real sense of freshness and vibrancy.

properties.title: Tessier Winery 2015 Saveria Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 3575 Slusser Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: This is a great example of a lower alcohol, somewhat underripe Pinot Noir that shows solid depth and lovable freshness. Lively aromas of black-raspberry sorbet and dark strawberry show on the nose, while the palate picks up a tart cranberry character. White pepper, thyme and juniper enliven the fruity flavors.

properties.title: Lawrelin 2004 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: A full 13 years old, the aromas are still vibrant, with notes of cranberry sauce, leather, vanilla and baking spice. The palate displays a beautiful sense of balance between the fruit and barrel flavors. It's in an absolute sweet spot right now but still has life in front of it.

properties.title: Lamborghini 2003 Campoleone Red (Umbria)
properties.descrption: The best word to describe this impressive Sangiovese-Merlot blend from Umbria is “healthy.” It has a vibrant, ruby red color and delivers absolutely immaculate aromas of succulent cherry, violet, balsamic notes, earth and root beer. It imparts soft, silky tannins, bright acidity and ends only after having carefully caressed each taste bud.

properties.title: Matthews 2003 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This has rich tannins, dense fruit and overall deep flavors. This is a dark wine, just this side of brooding, with ripe blueberry and cherry fruit, softly chalky tannins, whiffs of smoke and splashes of pepper. The dark fruit flavors are bold and seamless, melded with smoke and chocolate, dotted with ground espresso, and finished with a nice lift. This probably needs another five years to really show all of its complexity.

properties.title: Cesari 2001 Il Bosco  (Amarone della Valpolicella)
properties.address: Località Sorsei, 3, 37010 Cavaion veronese VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Cesari hits all the right marks with this single-vineyard wine and presents a gorgeous, proudly modern wine with soft plush notes of chocolate, vanilla coffee, smoked ham and natural rubber. It is chewy and firm in the mouth but ends on a fresh note, leaving the palate glossed and clean.

properties.title: Cecilia Beretta 2001 Terre di Cariano  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: 125 Sockanosset Cross Rd, Cranston, RI 02920, USA
properties.descrption: An exciting achievement, this select cru throbs with powerful intensity and complexity awarding a long list of adjectives to describe its aromatic qualities: black cherry and cherry liquor, leather, cola, milk chocolate and almond. Berry and bramble flavors make the mouthfeel lively and sophisticated and are a delicate segue into chewy-tart tannins and a spice driven finale.

properties.title: Vaona 2000 Pegrandi  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Via Paverno, 41, 37020 Marano di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Gorgeous color and concentration with brilliant ruby highlights make this a beautiful wine to contemplate in the glass. The aromas are broad and far-reaching with a high mineral component, small berry fruit, spice and a distinct soapy-lavender element. Chewy, firm and succulent, it's a mouth-watering bruiser that leaves a lasting imprint on the palate. Only 60 cases made.

properties.title: Domìni Veneti 2000  Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
properties.address: Via Ca' Salgari, 2a, 37024 Negrar VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Beautiful density and color characterize this wine as do its layered notes of exotic spice, cardamom, curry and roasted nut. Plush, full red fruit and cherry build in intensity, especially on the palate, creating a rich wine with a firm backbone, smooth texture and dusty notes on the finish.

properties.title: Jayson 2005 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 850 Bordeaux Way Suite 7, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This is the first Pinot from the Napa house of Pahlmeyer, the result of many years of effort in his vineyard in the Fort Ross area of the true Sonoma Coast. The result is rich in cherry pie, raspberry liqueur, cotton candy, licorice, vanilla and cinnamon flavors that captivate from sip one, but there's a certain young vine simple directness that limits the score. As the vines age, the wine is one to watch.

properties.title: Tenuta i Saltari 2001 Le Vigne di Turano  (Amarone della Valpolicella)
properties.descrption: The Sartori family is behind this wonderful vineyard select wine with deep concentration and intense aromatic of savory plum, cherry, natural rubber, almond nut and mineral shadings. The wine is well-rounded in the mouth with fresh acidity at the back and dusty mineral flavors on the finish.

properties.title: Baron Herzog 1998 Old Vine Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: 3201 Camino Del Sol, Oxnard, CA 93030, USA
properties.descrption: Smells a little hot and rubbery, with stewed-prune, tomato, spice and earth notes. Smooth and ripe, with plenty of nice fruit. A rough, rustic character comes through on the finish.

properties.title: High Pass 1998 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 24757 Lavell Rd, Junction City, OR 97448, USA
properties.descrption: Green-streaked barnyard aromas couple with black cherries and tobacco in this varietally true offering. Medium-weight on the palate, maybe even a bit low in acidity. Decent, but doesn’t truly sing.

properties.title: Duck Pond 1998 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: The interesting mix of aromas, ranging from fresh manure to cinnamon and cherries, gives way on the palate to the surprisingly unripe flavor of tart cranberries. The acidity is biting, making for a sinewy mouthful.

properties.title: Helvetia 1998 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 23269 NW Yungen Rd, Hillsboro, OR 97124, USA
properties.descrption: Unfortunately this wine just hangs on the cusp of quality. The nose is somewhat muddy and grassy. Plummy fruit with tangy acids carry the unrefined palate. Cola nut is noticeable on the dry finish. The effort seems to be there, but the result is not stellar.

properties.title: Benton-Lane 1998 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: Very light in color, so much so that it’s almost transparent. Potent aromas of mushroom, bramble and buttery oak. Some strawberry and cream flavors are driven by snappy acids. There’s length and kick to the fruit-forward finish.

properties.title: Girardet 1998 Barrel Select Pinot Noir (Umpqua Valley)
properties.descrption: Rather sharp and dominated by piquant cranberry and field aromas. Light in color, with lean red-fruit flavors. A little green and heavily oaked—the dill and pickle from the wood show boldly. Has some good characteristics, but they’re just too hard to get at. From the hotter reaches of southern Oregon.

properties.title: Fetzer 1997 Home Ranch Zinfandel (California)
properties.descrption: Ripe, briary aromas of wild berries, plums and earth veer into dark chocolate. Flavors are on the light side, and seem a little soft. An affordable everyday wine to serve at picnics. Don’t be misled by the “Home Ranch” description; this is not an estate wine.

properties.title: Hauer of the Dauen 1998 Estate Bottled Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 16425 SE Webfoot Rd, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: Some green manure notes and more general barnyard aromas provide aromatic interest but can’t make up for excessively tart cherry fruit and an oddly cloying finish

properties.title: Amity 1999 Eco Wine Cattrall Brothers Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 18150 SE Amity Vineyards Rd, Amity, OR 97101, USA
properties.descrption: If you are allergic to sulfites or insist on certified organic wines, this one fits the bill. Unfortunately it's heavy on the grape-juice characteristic, with sharp acids running the show. Dense and chewy, and there's an odd grapefruit note at the end.

properties.title: Leonetti Cellar 1998 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1278 Berney Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: If this isn't the best $50 Merlot in the world, I don't know what is. Dark, thick and jammy, with dense layers of fruit, spice and oak. Scents of sandalwood, coffee, mint, pepper and more, much more. In the mouth it offers a seamless, achingly rich mix of fruits, woods and spices. Big, rich, long and deep, it's nonetheless best enjoyed right now, not cellared.

properties.title: Glen Fiona 1997 Basket Press Reserve Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2750 John Hill Rd, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: 75% Syrah and 25% Cinsault from the oldest continually cultivated vinifera vineyard in the Walla Walla Valley. The spicy, intensely aromatic nose mixes black cherry, concentrated cassis, coffee, bacon, leather and roasted nuts. It unfolds in layer upon layer of rich fruit, tannin, leather and smoke. Dense, deep and Rhône-like, it finishes with a montage of meaty, peppery, bacon-smoke flavors.

properties.title: Hyatt 1998 Ice Wine Black Muscat (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 2020 Gilbert Rd, Zillah, WA 98953, USA
properties.descrption: What a pleasant surprise awaits you here: It's delectable, decadent and downright delicious. Fabulous mango, lime, and peach aromas parade upward in advance of vivid nectarine and pink grapefruit flavors. This charmer, which features perfect vitality and acidity, is almost too easy to drink and enjoy.

properties.title: Hedges 1997 Red Mountain Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: A two-thirds Cabernet Sauvignon, one-third Merlot blend, this is the winery’s prestige cuvée. Lushly perfumed with blueberry, black cherry and red fruits, it’s high-toned and assertive. A serious effort that is still tight as a drum, tannic and deeply streaked with black spices, smoke, tar and coffee.

properties.title: Leonetti Cellar 1998 Sangiovese (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Gary Figgins works his usual magic and adds layers of rich, buttery, nutty oak to the light, pleasant Sangiovese fruit. The oak doesn't overwhelm, it underscores, and the effect is exciting, sensuous and fat. The wine floats across the palate, with light fruit and buttery oak melding into a sinuous, delicious whole. Beautiful winemaking.

properties.title: Andrew Will 1999 Pepper Bridge Sangiovese (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Darker and more closed-up than the Ciel du Cheval bottling, this is a medium-bodied red wine with dusty cherry and cassis scents, and hints of tar, coffee, herb and leather. It's muscular and edgy, with tons of potential.

properties.title: Lorenzi Estate 2009 Series Zinfandel (Temecula)
properties.address: 36095 Monte De Oro Rd, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.descrption: This patiently aged wine delivers a dynamic and rich nose with aromas of plums, cassis, cola, Dr Pepper, chocolate syrup and well-spiced German chocolate cake. Those ripe elements are tamed on the tart and lively palate that shows sour plum skins alongside star anise, beef blood and dank herbs.

properties.title: Armanino Family Cellars 2012 The Ringneck Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: Juicy and big-bodied, this is a balanced expression of earthy black cherry and well-honed structure. Soft and lush on the palate, it'll appeal to fans who like a bit more meat on their Pinot bones, yet appreciate the fine texture of the tannins.

properties.title: Château Lamartine 2012 Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
properties.descrption: Big, dark tannins dominate this concentrated wine that is powerful, dry and firm. Under the structure lies a smoother layer of ripe plum and berry fruits. At 90% Malbec and 10% Merlot, it will certainly need more time to mature; drink from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Rotier 2013 Les Gravels Red (Gaillac)
properties.descrption: This wine has an intense structure while not losing sight of fruit. It's a solid wine with dominant tannins. It also has intense acidity and, in the background, red berry fruits. It needs time to come together into an impressive wine. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Lomas del Valle 2014 Coastal Cool Climate Estate Bottled Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
properties.descrption: Cherry and berry aromas are direct and vivid, with a slight touch of spice. There's energy to the palate, which is slightly jammy and creamy. Ripe plum and cherry flavors show mild oak notes, while the finish is bright, bold and deals some chocolaty oak.

properties.title: Loring Wine Company 2013 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1034 Aviation Dr, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Fresh black cherries and a bit of licorice are laced through the nose of this appellation blend by single-vineyard star Brian Loring. The palate is all about exotic spice, from ginger and black sage to anise seeds and cola, also showing some umami flavors reminiscent of shiitake mushrooms.

properties.title: Mikami Vineyards 2012 Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 845 W Sargent Rd, Lodi, CA 95242, USA
properties.descrption: This is a full-bodied but easy-drinking wine with ample ripe fruit flavors and attractive accents from oak aging, like vanilla, nutmeg and a touch of brown sugar. It coats the mouth with rich fruitiness and lingers on the finish in a compelling manner.

properties.title: Nera 2009  Sforzato di Valtellina
properties.descrption: This opens from aromas of dried black fruit, spiced plum, sage, pipe tobacco and mocha. The rich palate offers ripe blackberries, anisette, coffee and a chocolate note alongside smooth, velvety tannins. While it's concentrated, it manages its heft with surprising finesse. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Ornellaia 2012 Le Volte Red (Toscana)
properties.descrption: Aromas of fleshy black-skinned fruit, kitchen spice and underbrush emerge from this blend of Merlot, Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon. The fresh palate offers mature blackberries, black currants, clove, licorice and dried herb alongside firm, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2016–2020.

properties.title: Patland 2011 Stagecoach Vineyard Proprietary Red (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah and Malbec from high-elevation vines, this wine is medium in weight and texture, and bright in light, red fruit. The tannins are subtle upon entry, building softness and power in the glass, taking on weight amid gamy layers of black pepper and blueberry on the finish.

properties.title: Plaisance Ranch 2012 Mourvèdre (Applegate Valley)
properties.descrption: As with most of the winery's efforts, this is 100% varietal. Mineral, citrus and wild raspberry fruit flavors dive deeply into the palate; the raspberries in particular are intensely flavorful. The penetration, elegance and power are persuasive.

properties.title: Porca de Murça 2012 Reserva Tinto Red (Douro)
properties.address: 5090-137 Murça, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a rounded and ripe wine, with generous black fruits and a full, fruity texture. It shows balanced acidity, hints of wood and a fine integration of fruit and tannins. It can be enjoyed now, but will be better from 2016.

properties.title: Primus 2013 The Blend Red (Colchagua Valley)
properties.descrption: Lightly roasted, leathery berry aromas are oaky but not overly woody or resiny. A dense, concentrated palate is creamy but appropriate in feel, while flavors of black cherry, cassis, baking spices, vanilla and caramel end in a lasting swirl of licorice, nutmeg and cocoa powder flavors.

properties.title: Tranzind 2012 Red (Lodi)
properties.descrption: This big, hearty, full-bodied wine was made from 75% Zinfandel. It has spicy, oaky aromas, generous dark plum and cherry flavors and plenty of grip from tannins and acidity to wrap around all that flavor. It feels quite full bodied, dense but smooth in texture, and well-balanced for a wine with this much concentration.

properties.title: Pondera 2011 Entwined Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Merlot (57%) takes the lead on this lighter-colored wine that offers raspberries, cherries, herbs and woodspice. The fruit flavors are fresh and elegant, with lightly chalky tannins.

properties.title: Pondera 2011 SVS Number One Conner Lee Vineyard Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Malbec offers reserved aromas of green herbs, mineral and dusty chocolate. It's elegant and filled with juicy cherry flavors.

properties.title: Producta Vignobles 2011 Pavillon la Tourelle  (Haut-Médoc)
properties.address: 13 Av. de la Résistance, 33310 Lormont, France
properties.descrption: With its dusty tannins, this is a structured wine first, a more fruity wine second. It has density, juicy acidity and hints of blueberry and black currant fruits. It's typical of 2011 at this stage, still very firm and tannic. Give it until 2017.

properties.title: Ravenswood 2012 Teldeschi Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 18701 Gehricke Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: A field-inspired blend of 80% Zinfandel with 12% Carignane and 12% Petite Sirah, this wine holds red jammy fruit at its core. Medium to full-bodied in weight, it has fine tannins that give silkiness to offset the wine's sizable power.

properties.title: Tenuta Argentiera 2011 Villa Donoratico  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: via Vecchia Aurelia 412A località i Pianali, 57022 Donoratico LI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, Merlot and Petit Verdot, this presents a subdued nose of dried blueberries, leather, espresso, oak and a whiff of exotic spices. On the palate, lithe tannins balance out blackberry, graphite and licorice flavors. Drink through 2016. Alliance Beverage, Terravino.

properties.title: Tineta Avante 2011  Ribera del Duero
properties.descrption: Blackberry and dark plum aromas are solid but not overly rich or oaky. In the mouth, this Tempranillo is juicy, flush and friendly in feel. Blackberry and plum flavors are big and loud, but also clean. Notes of licorice and herbs work their way onto a hard-driving finish.

properties.title: Bernard Magrez 2012 Château Tour Blanche  (Médoc)
properties.address: 33230 Saint-Christophe-de-Double, France
properties.descrption: Fresh-fruited and well balanced, this has firm tannins that are already well integrated into the black currant flavors and acidity. Solid and structured, it will develop well. The aftertaste brings out the acidity.

properties.title: Bridlewood 2012 Zinfandel (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: Boosted with 4% Tempranillo, 3% Petite Sirah and 3% Tannat, this Zin comes from a 100-year-old Mendocino clone, and shows ripe strawberry syrup, campfire smoke and anise on the nose. The palate is dominated by smoke, with just touch of red fruits, tannins and tartness keeping it lively.

properties.title: Burnt Bridge 2012 Coyote Canyon Vineyard Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 1500 Broadway St, Vancouver, WA 98663, USA
properties.descrption: This appealing wine offers aromas of blueberry and huckleberry, and drinks like a vinous piece of blueberry pie. It's a bit one-note but it hits that note hard and well.

properties.title: Camigliano 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.descrption: Pretty aromas convey rose, wild red berry, savory herb and a hint of baking spice. The palate opens with wild cherry, black raspberry, clove and sage but drops off quickly on the midpalate. It's already accessible, with fine-grained tannins and bright acidity.

properties.title: Château de Portets 2012  Graves
properties.address: Accès par, Rue de Mongenan, 33640 Portets, France
properties.descrption: New wood and stalky fruit have combined well in this wine that is well on the way to being balanced and rich. The dry edge of tannins has smoothed well, giving a luscious wine that will develop quickly. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Sextant 2012 Night Watch Red (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: This blend of 53% Zinfandel, 26% Petite Sirah and 21% Syrah shows grape candy and roasted beef crust on the nose. The flavors are dark with creosote, licorice and dark chocolate, proving to be a heavy, thick wine that's balanced by plum-skin tannins.

properties.title: Silver Thread 2013 Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 1401 Caywood Rd, Lodi, NY 14860, USA
properties.descrption: While forward, plump red-cherry and strawberry notes are buoyant, a deep vein of granite and minerals adds gravitas and complexity to this elegant wine. Fresh cranberry acidity drives a swift finish.

properties.title: Tamarack Cellars 2012 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: A surprisingly green tinge vies with tobacco, raspberry and woodspice for attention. This wine is full in feel with good concentration of flavors but ultimately the greenness provides distraction.
