properties.descrption: The briary red-berry and plum aromas are earthy and rubbery. This is medium in body and a bit heavy, with just-adequate acidity and solid flavors of plum, berry and resiny oak. The finish is oaky and medicinal tasting.

properties.title: La Gironda di Galandrino 2011  Brachetto d'Acqui
properties.address: strada Bricco, 12, 14049 Nizza Monferrato AT, Italy
properties.descrption: A ruby-colored sparkling dessert wine from northern Italy, Brachetto d'Acqui enjoys a long history rooted in Italian tradition, and it can be paired with sweet foods and savory ones alike. This is soft and round with notes of raspberry and candied cherry on the close.

properties.title: Cave du Marmandais 2011 Château Campot Lafont  (Bordeaux)
properties.address: La Cure, 47250 Cocumont, France
properties.descrption: Light and fruity, this wine's berry flavor dominates the gentle tannins, while the bright acidity adds lift. Drink this in the next two years.

properties.title: Château de Janicon 2010  Graves
properties.address: 98 Av. de Mont de Marsan, 33850 Léognan, France
properties.descrption: The wine seems lean, austere and minerally in character. It has stalky black-currant fruits, firm tannins and forward acids. It should age over 2–3 years, but it will always be on the severe side.

properties.title: Château la Valade 2008  Premieres Côtes de Blaye
properties.address: 7, Le Barrail, 33330 Saint-Christophe-des-Bardes, France
properties.descrption: Fruity and juicy, this has soft tannins and an open, gentle texture. It has red currant fruit that gives acidity, with only a touch of dry tannins on the finish.

properties.title: Covington 2009 Petite Sirah (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 18580 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: From the Stonetree Vineyard, this supersaturated wine is so black that it looks impenetrable. The dark cassis fruit is drenched in astringent, tongue-drying flavors of smoke, asphalt and tar. Though true to its variety, it's a tough, chewy, somewhat chalky mouthful.

properties.title: Millaman 2010 Limited Reserve Carmenère (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Sagrada Familia, Maule, Chile
properties.descrption: Rather heavy and green on the bouquet, with olive, raisin and herbal aromas. Tannic in the mouth, this has a beam of acidity that keeps it moving forward. It's herbal, fruity and loaded with green and black olive flavors. The finish is quick and oaky.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2010 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2191 Laguna Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: There's something subtlely unripe about this Pinot Noir. It show up in the aroma, with a trace of stewed asparagus. Still, it's dry and elegant, and the flavors of sour cherry candy and sandalwood make it all right.

properties.title: Cremaschi Furlotti 2010 Reserva Carmenère (Loncomilla Valley)
properties.address: L-15, San Javier de Loncomilla, San Javier, Maule, Chile
properties.descrption: This is chunky and mossy on the nose, then thick and chewy in the mouth. It tastes of blueberry and herb, with a rubbery note on the finish. A meaty quality runs throughout.

properties.title: Hector Wine Company 2014 Cabernet Franc (Seneca Lake)
properties.address: 5610 NY-414, Hector, NY 14841, USA
properties.descrption: Hints of roasted beet and forest floor lend rusticity to ripe red cherry and plum in this full-bodied Cabernet Franc. Crisp acidity lifts and lightens the midpalate. Smooth supple tannins and a hint of truffle linger on the finish.

properties.title: Henri Bourgeois 2013 Les Baronnes  (Sancerre)
properties.address: 3535 Guerneville Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: This is a lighter style of Pinot Noir than some produced in Sancerre today. It brings out perfumes and red-cherry flavors lifted by acidity. The wine is fruity, with hints of wood aging and a juicy aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Millbrook 2013 Proprietor's Special Reserve Merlot (New York)
properties.address: 26 Wing Rd, Millbrook, NY 12545, USA
properties.descrption: Pronounced aromas of char, smoke and bramble lift with time and aeration, revealing prettier notes of fresh herb and red cherry. Plump cherry and berry flavors are supple and concentrated, but have a distinctly green, herbal tone on the midpalate. The finish is marked by a bite of fine-grained but delicately bitter tannins.

properties.title: Putah Creek 2011 Ruisseau Red (Solano County)
properties.address: 35265 Willow Ave, Clarksburg, CA 95612, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas like apple skin and flavors suggesting dark cherries and boysenberry put lots of fruit concentration into this full-bodied, dry and firmly textured wine.

properties.title: Le Macioche 2013  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: S.P. 55 di Sant’Antimo km 4,85, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of exotic spice, incense and aromatic herb lead the way. On the racy palate, hints of dark spice and cranberry add interest to the wild cherry core while vibrant acidity and supple tannins make it fresh and easy drinking.

properties.title: Luigi Bosca 2014 Single Vineyard A.O.C. Malbec (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.address: San Martín 2044, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Rustic, gritty berry aromas come with notes of plastic, oak grain and grass. This is raw, chewy and tannic in feel, with roasted, spicy berry flavors that run low on ripeness. A salt-and-pepper finish includes herbal berry flavors and sticky tannins.

properties.title: Luna Beberide 2015 Mencía (Bierzo)
properties.address: LE-713, 24540 Cacabelos, León, Spain
properties.descrption: This Mencía is grapy smelling, with rubbery, leathery accents. In the mouth, this feels grabby but juicy. Berry and bright plum flavors are also rubbery, while this is choppy on the finish, with peppery, spicy, toasty notes.

properties.title: Sannino 2013 Bella Vita Vineyard Syrah (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 15975 County Rd 48, Cutchogue, NY 11935, USA
properties.descrption: Ripples of fleshy, almost overripe, black cherry and berry are mouth-filling and plush in this voluptuous Syrah. It's amply oaked, wafting of toasted coconut, vanilla and spice. Soft, sunny acidity and feathery tannins cushion a moderately long finish.

properties.title: Santa Julia 2015 Reserva Malbec (Valle de Uco)
properties.address: km 7,5, RP33, M5531 Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Cherry and currant aromas come with soupy notes and a blast of animal fur. Although this is aggressive and choppy on the palate, it's loaded with grapy, slightly stewed berry and plum flavors. A similar tasting finish turns more rough and warm with airing.

properties.title: Silk Oak 2013 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 915 Oakville Cross Rd, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.descrption: Minty, menthol aromas and oaky sweetness create a flavorful profile for this medium-bodied wine.

properties.title: Ventosa 2013 Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 3440 NY-96A, Geneva, NY 14456, USA
properties.descrption: Ripeness abounds in this densely plummy Pinot Noir. Full bodied and plush in style, its fruit profile suggests notes of maturity—flavors of prune and dried cherry glazed in sweet balsamic. The finish is a bit earthier, lingering on notes of spice and forest floor.

properties.title: Villa Maria 2014 Private Bin Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: 118 Montgomerie Road, Māngere, Manukau 2022, New Zealand
properties.descrption: For less than $20, this delivers plenty of Pinot Noir character. Cherry, cranberry and beet root aromas and flavors pick up a hint of cola on the crisp finish of this silky-textured, medium-weight wine. Drink it over the rest of 2017.

properties.title: Fattoria La Vialla 2014 L'Abbandonato  (Montecucco)
properties.address: Via di Meliciano, 26, 52029 Castiglion Fibocchi AR, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with organic Sangiovese grapes, this offers subtle aromas of red berry and underbrush. The straightforward palate shows plum, toast and red cherry while accents of white pepper and clove add interest. It's structured but easy drinking, with seasoned tannins.

properties.title: Fossacolle 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Località Tavernelle, 7, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: You'll find aromas of red-skinned berry, aromatic herb and a whiff of exotic spice on this youthful red. Made to be enjoyed young, the palate offers sour cherry, unripe raspberry, sage and a hint of anise alongside racy acidity.

properties.title: Paul Jaboulet Aîné 2010 La Petite Chapelle  (Hermitage)
properties.address: 25 Pl. du Taurobole, 26600 Tain-l'Hermitage, France
properties.descrption: The 2010 La Petite Chapelle is firmly structured and tannic, but presents attractive aromas of earth, roasted meat and cedar, rounded out by savory flavors of black olive and espresso. Give it another couple of years in the cellar.

properties.title: Tabor 2011 Adama Shiraz (Galilee)
properties.address: Sderot Kakal, Kfar Tavor, 15241, Israel
properties.descrption: Aromas of blackberry, black pepper and a whiff of jalapeño get your palate ready for rich flavors of blackberry, tart cherry, black olive and mocha. Soft tannins, a smooth mouthfeel and a lasting finish with a touch of brightness make for a winning combination.

properties.title: Valle dell'Acate 2013 Il Frappato  (Vittoria Frappato)
properties.address: Contrada Bidini, 97011 Acate RG, Italy
properties.descrption: This fragrant, light-bodied and savory Sicilian red opens with intense aromas of blue flower, rose and red berries. The bright, silky palate delivers juicy strawberry, crushed red cherry and white pepper alongside fresh acidity. Chill this for 20 minutes and sip on the deck for a perfect summer red.

properties.title: L'Ecole No. 41 2011 Estate Seven Hills Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 41 Lowden School Rd, Lowden, WA 99360, USA
properties.descrption: Pure Syrah from 14-year-old vines, this offers classic peppery aromatics, blue fruits, good concentration, and a hint of the Walla Walla funk that marks the better Syrahs of the region. It's lifted with excellent acidity and continues into a focused finish with highlights of coffee grounds.

properties.title: Louis Jadot 2011 Clos du Roy  (Marsannay)
properties.address: 62 Rte de Savigny, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: Dense tannins dominate this firm and structured wine. Behind the dry surface lies fruitiness, bringing out red currant and berry flavors along  with acidity. The wine is potentially rich and deliciously perfumed. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Nanni Copè 2012 Sabbie di Sopra il Bosco Red (Terre del Volturno)
properties.address: 4640 N Pecos St Unit I, Denver, CO 80211, USA
properties.descrption: Made from native grape Pallagrello Nero along with 5% Aglianico and 5% Casavecchia, this robust wine opens with aromas of black fruit, earth, game, leather and black spice. The dense palate delivers rich blackberry, black cherry and black pepper, with robust tannins and a solid acidic backbone. Drink after 2016.

properties.title: Or Haganuz 2012 Amuka Series Marus Single Vineyard Shiraz (Galilee)
properties.address: ישוב, Or HaGanuz, 1390900, Israel
properties.descrption: Deep violet red to the eye, this wine offers fragrances of raspberry and vanilla. It has a silky mouthfeel as well as a pleasantly easy-drinking quality, with flavors of cherry, Dr Pepper, pomegranate seeds and eucalyptus that carry on into the bright and satisfying finish.

properties.title: Palivou 2008 Ammos Reserve Terra Leone Single Vineyard Selection Agiorgitiko (Nemea)
properties.address: EO Sidirodromikou Stathmou Nemeas, Nemea 205 00, Greece
properties.descrption: Refined aromas of toasted vanilla, spicebox, plum and tobacco are followed by vibrant waves of cherry, olive, dried herb and tobacco. The wine is elegant but has soul.

properties.title: Re Manfredi 2008 Vigneto Serpara  (Aglianico del Vulture)
properties.address: Contrada Piano Di Camera, 85029 Venosa PZ, Italy
properties.descrption: Made from 50-year old vines, this concentrated wine offers dense black currant and blackberry flavors that are layered with chocolate, black licorice, coffee, grilled red peppers, sage, oak and thyme sensations. The tannins are firm and drying; drink after 2018.

properties.title: Stottle 2011 Elerding Six Prong Vineyard Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 2641 Willamette Dr NE ste e, Lacey, WA 98516, USA
properties.descrption: An appealing wine with notes of coffee, blueberry and crushed green herbs. It's on the lighter side of medium-bodied, tart and lively with abundant herb flavors and fresh acidity.

properties.title: Stottle 2011 Homme Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2641 Willamette Dr NE ste e, Lacey, WA 98516, USA
properties.descrption: The companion to the Hombre blend, this is 80% Malbec and 20% Syrah. The pairing works nicely, with the Syrah bringing details of anise, pepper and coffee. The wine has decent grip and definition, along with a pretty, toasty top note.

properties.title: Tenuta di Fessina 2009 Musmeci Riserva  (Etna)
properties.address: SS120, 22, 95012 Rovittello CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Spice, berry, earth, leather, tobacco and blue flower aromas lead the nose of this elegant wine. The ripe, round palate delivers fleshy black cherry and raspberry, accented by white pepper and cinnamon and framed by polished tannins. Drink 2015–2019.

properties.title: Tommasone 2010 Pithecusa Red (Epomeo)
properties.address: Via Ronchetto, 4, 37029 Pedemonte di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of Aglianico and Piedirosso, this savory, hearty wine opens with earthy aromas of underbrush and dark spices. The dense palate delivers ripe black-cherry flavor that's layered with black pepper, clove and cinnamon. A mineral note closes the juicy finish, alongside firm but silky tannins.

properties.title: Truchard 2012 Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 3234 Old Sonoma Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Earthy in wild strawberry, tart cherry and exotic spicy aromas, it's well-made and tight in acidity. Elements of black tea intermingle nicely within complex layers that are delicate and bright.

properties.title: Venge 2012 Bacigalupi Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4708 Silverado Trail N, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: Pretty with aromatics of rose petals, this layered, complex wine offers restrained power and demure fruit. In taste, it's a mix of black cherries and that cola-like allspice that is prevalent in many Russian River Valley sites. The mouthfeel is round and soft, with just the right tension between tannin and acidity, with a protracted finish of toasty oak.

properties.title: La Querciolina 2013 Sassetti Livio  (Montecucco)
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: The shy nose eventually reveals suggestions of red berry, aromatic herb and a whiff of game. The bright simple palate offers red cherry, clove and an earthy note alongside mellow tannins.

properties.title: Valle Secreto 2014 Key Malbec (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: H-711 - C. Los Maquis, Pelequen, Malloa, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Gritty horsey berry aromas lead to a medium-bodied, basic palate. This tastes of blackberry and savory spices, while the finish is mild in flavor and short on length.

properties.title: Liberty Lake 2011 Aquila Red (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 23110 E Knox Ave, Liberty Lake, WA 99019, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of dried fruit and barrel spice lead to tart, slightly dilute seeming fruit flavors backed by lightly gritty tannins. It seems a bit evolved for its age.

properties.title: Great American Wine Company 2013 Red (California)
properties.address: 33 Harlow Ct, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Lots of grapy, raisiny flavors drench this wine with fruitiness, while a smooth, soft texture and touch of sweetness keep the texture mild. It's medium bodied, not at all tannic, and easy to sip.

properties.title: Iron Hub 2013 Esola Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.address: 12500 Steiner Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Rather light, easy-to-enjoy aromas suggesting fresh strawberry and raspberry, along with equally fruity flavors don't indicate how full-bodied and high-octane this wine is. Still, it has a smooth texture and lingering finish.

properties.title: Castello di Bossi 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Località Bossi, 28, 53019 Castelnuovo Berardenga SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Forest floor, porcini mushroom, violet and a whiff of chopped herbs lead the nose on this simple red. The straightforward palate is on the thin side, offering red cherry, a suggestion of clove and a hint of game alongside relaxed, loose-knit tannins.

properties.title: Castello di Poppiano 2014 Toscoforte Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Via Fezzana, 45, 50025 Poppiano FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Sangiovese, this has a restrained nose that eventually reveals aromas of black-skinned fruit and leather. The straightforward approachable palate offers roasted coffee bean and dried cherry alongside round tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Charles Krug 2014 Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 2800 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This is a simple, smoky wine, earthy and brimming in a mix of compost and mint. Medium bodied and moderate in acidity, it's ripe and round.

properties.title: Coli 2015  Morellino di Scansano
properties.address: 55054 Coli, Province of Lucca, Italy
properties.descrption: Fruity aromas of dark berry and scorched soil lead the nose on this informal red. The simple easygoing palate offers morello cherry and a hint of dried herb alongside soft, fleeting tannins.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2015 Reserva Syrah (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: 2923 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: Spicy grassy aromas of catmint are matched by unusual clove scents. A tough rubbery palate is where you'll find spicy blackberry and green-herb flavors. Pulling tannins are the driving force on this wine's choppy clipped finish.

properties.title: Junta 2014 Momentos Reserve Malbec (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: 5018 47a Ave, Delta, BC V4K 1T8, Canada
properties.descrption: Campfire, animal, horseradish and berry aromas make for a slightly difficult nose. This Malbec feels pinched, with tannic pull. Salty black-fruit flavors finish similar, with popping acidity that keeps this lively.

properties.title: Tolaini 2012 Al Passo Red (Toscana)
properties.address: SP 9 di Pievasciata, 28, 53019 Loc. Vallenuova, Castelnuovo Berardenga SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 85% Sangiovese and 15% Merlot, this has a shy nose, eventually revealing whiffs of black-skinned fruit and scorched earth. The subdued rather evolved palate suggests dried black cherry and a hint of baking spice alongside mellow tannins. Drink soon to capture the remaining freshness.

properties.title: Valentini 2013 Crebesco Red (Toscana)
properties.address: 31 W Lake St, Chisholm, MN 55719, USA
properties.descrption: Made with 40% Sangiovese, 40% Merlot and 20% Syrah, the nose has subdued aromas of red berry and cinnamon. The simple palate offers morello cherry and toast alongside evolved tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Vasco Sassetti 2010 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Localita' Benducce, 209A, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: The nose is quite shy but eventually reveals whiffs of scorched soil, leather and a balsamic note. The lean straightforward palate offers dried wild cherry and a hint of dark spice alongside grainy, rather fleeting tannins that leave an astringent finish.

properties.title: Fattoria di Ruppiano 2014 Selachus Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Via della Certosa, 53019 Castelnuovo Berardenga SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 80% Sangiovese and 20% Cabernet Sauvignon, the shy nose eventually reveals notes of plum and baking spice. The lean straightforward palate doles out fresh cherry and clove alongside drying tannins. Drink soon to capture the remaining fruit.

properties.title: Fornacelle 2015 Zizzolo  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: Località Fornacelle, 232/a, 57022 Castagneto Carducci LI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 60% Merlot and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon, this has a shy nose that eventually gives up whiffs of plum and scorched earth. The simple and zesty palate delivers black-skinned fruit and a hint of cedar. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Henry Fessy 2015  Brouilly
properties.address: 644 Rte de Bel air, 69220 Belleville-en-Beaujolais, France
properties.descrption: Produced from Henry Fessy's own cru vineyards, the wine is fruity and very accessible to drink young. Generous berry fruits and soft tannins make this an attractive wine. The aftertaste brings in light acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Hosanna 2006 Barrel sample  (Pomerol)
properties.address: 100 Tour De France, Braselton, GA 30517, USA
properties.descrption: 92—94 Barrel sample. Well balanced wine, with its rich dark fruits well in harmony with its freshness and its dry tannins. Very juicy aftertaste.

properties.title: Château la Gomerie 2006 Barrel sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: La Gomerie, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 92—94 Barrel sample. Owned by the Bécot family of Beauséjour-Bécot, this is a single vineyard parcel, producing a rich wine, powered by blackberry fruits.

properties.title: Bertani 2001  Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
properties.address: Via Novare, 2, 37024 Arbizzano-Santa Maria VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Try this beautiful wine in order to understand how Amarone evolves and becomes more sophisticated with age. The aromas here are thick and penetrating with tones of dried fruit, cherry preserves, cola and resin. The mouthfeel is deep and concentrated and the finish is impressively long. A true classic.

properties.title: MacPhail 2007 Sangiacomo Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 6761 McKinley St, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: Expensive, but a perfect Pinot Noir to drink now for sheer luxury and decadence. Tastes so good, offering a tapestry of raspberry, cherry, licorice, mocha and sweet, smoky sandalwood. With finely ground tannins and near-perfect coastal acidity, it's addictively likeable. Now–2012.

properties.title: Olson Ogden 2007 Stagecoach Vineyard Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 32900 Diamond Hill Rd, Harrisburg, OR 97446, USA
properties.descrption: This is a deeply ripe, authoritatively structured Syrah of great power and finesse. It's drinkable now for the velvety texture and massive flavors of grilled blackberries, blueberries, currants, dark unsweetened chocolate, leather, black pepper and lots of sweet, smoky new oak. But it's also fairly tannic. Very fine now, with a brief decant, and through 2013.

properties.title: Olson Ogden 2007 Unti Vineyard Syrah (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 32900 Diamond Hill Rd, Harrisburg, OR 97446, USA
properties.descrption: This is the biggest, most tannic and closed of the winery's three new 2007 Syrahs, and also the one most likely to improve in the cellar. It's intense and concentrated in pure blackberry and black cherry fruit, with the pepper, bacon, earth and smoky oak notes you want in a good 100% Syrah. But then, there are those big tannins. Give it a good 4–6 years.

properties.title: La Fenêtre 2007 Calmant Creek Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 2705 Aviation Way, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: Feels a bit thick and heavy now, with jammy raspberry, cherry, mocha and sandalwood flavors, but so good, so pure that a few years in the cellar have to benefit. A splendid acid-tannin balance provides the framework for aging. Better after 2011.

properties.title: Think Tank 2007 White Hawk Vineyard Syrah (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 1020 Foothill Blvd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: A gorgeous Syrah, sumptuous and seductive, with a texture of sheer silk and satin. Beyond that, the flavors are rich and complex, offering satisfying waves of blackberries, blueberries, raspberries, cassis, milk chocolate, anise, pepper and toast. Really fine, with a good backbone of tannins. Now–2011.

properties.title: Vina Robles 2007 Jardine Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3700 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: A tremendous Petite Sirah, among the finest from Paso Robles. It's a big wine, with massive flavors of blackberries, currants, leather, mocha and smoky oak, with an ultralong, spicy finish. Yet the wine is totally dry, with refined, silky tannins. Yes, the alcohol's high, but it's completely balanced. Best now and through the next decade.

properties.title: Château Faugères 2006 Barrel sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Château Faugères, 33330 Saint-Étienne-de-Lisse, France
properties.descrption: 92—94 Barrel sample. A dark, meaty wine, very new world in its richness and opulence. It is concentrated, packed with black fruit.—R.V.

properties.title: Hanaiali'i 2013 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 986 Salvador Ave, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This 100% Merlot offers a lot of heat around its otherwise approachable lift of soft, smooth tannins and reasonable oak. Sage, cedar and tobacco provide a weedy aspect to the wine, offset by plenty of ripe blackberry and cherry.

properties.title: Bodegas Berceo 2013 Viñadrian  (Rioja)
properties.address: C. Cuevas, 16B, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy notes of saline and cheesy leather accent plum aromas on this tight number with rubbery tannins. Plum, cherry and herbal flavors carry some bitterness onto a finish with medicinal plum notes.

properties.title: Lagana 2013 Breezy Slope Vineyard Pinot Noir (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 16 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Grown in the southern section of the valley in the foothills of the Blue Mountains, this rare varietal bottling from this appellation shows aromas of cranberry, raspberry and citrus, along with some hints of oxidation. It's tart and full in feel, not seeming entirely varietally correct.

properties.title: Lagana 2013 Minnick Hills Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 16 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This is an aromatically brooding wine with notes of herbs, pepper and brown spices. It drinks quite sweet with a lightly chalky feel.

properties.title: Loft 2013 Merlot (Monterey)
properties.address: 10207 US-290, Fredericksburg, TX 78624, USA
properties.descrption: This is box wine taken seriously, even featuring a picture of winemaker Denise Wordenon. Fresh-squeezed blueberry fruit mixes with black rocks, milk chocolate and cedar on the nose, followed by an easy-to-quaff juiciness on the lightly bodied palate. It's not very complex, but perfect for summer barbecues or car camping.

properties.title: Matsu 2013 El Picaro  (Toro)
properties.address: 129 W 27th St #9, New York, NY 10001, USA
properties.descrption: Rough, animal-like aromas wrestle with piercing, fairly hot plum and berry scents. Rubbery, blackened, peppery plum and raspberry flavors finish oaky, mildly bitter and tannic.

properties.title: :Nota Bene 2011 Ciel du Cheval Red (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 9320 15th Ave S unit c, Seattle, WA 98108, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc, this offers aromas of raisinated cherries, herbs, bittersweet chocolate and a whiff of barnyard. Medicinal flavors are backed by chalky tannins.

properties.title: Ignacio Marín 2012 Ballad Garnacha (Cariñena)
properties.address: C. San Valero, 1, 50400 Cariñena, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Prune and raisin aromas are dominant and suggest overripeness. Following that lead, this is chunky and heavy on the palate, with pounding tannins. Baked blackberry, prune and savory flavors finish long and dense.

properties.title: La Cignozza 2009 Riserva  (Chianti)
properties.address: Strada delle Cavine e Valli, 63, 53042 Chianciano Terme SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of tilled earth, leather, ripe black-skinned fruit and a gamey note set the stage for this funky wine. The overripe palate displays fleshy black plum, dried blue flowers and bitter barnyard sensations set against a backdrop of soft acidity. Drying, astringent tannins cut the finish short.

properties.title: La Querce 2013 Sorrettole  (Chianti)
properties.address: Via Imprunetana per Tavarnuzze, 41, 50023 Impruneta FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Fruity aromas of fresh, dark cherry and a whiff of leafy underbrush lead the nose of this blend of Sangiovese, Colorino and Merlot. The soft, simple palate delivers juicy black cherry and a gamey note alongside delicate, fleeting tannins.

properties.title: 60 North 2012 Merlot (California)
properties.address: 5940 Peck Rd, Croswell, MI 48422, USA
properties.descrption: Smooth and fruity, soft and rich, this medium-bodied wine will be easy to enjoy at a casual meal or big party. The aromas are like black cherries, the flavors like candied cherries and the texture relaxed.

properties.title: Brancaia 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.address: 42/B Localita' Poppi, 53017 Radda in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This simple wine opens with subdued aromas of blue flowers, red berry and a whiff of menthol. The informal palate offers raw, red cherry alongside hints of mint and anise. Brisk acidity and rather fleeting tannins lead to a short, drying finish.

properties.title: Château Andron 2010  Médoc
properties.address: 25 Rte du Moulin Gauchant, 33340 Civrac-en-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: This stalky, firmly tannic wine is still developing. Dominated by Merlot, it has black currant fruits in the background with acidity and crispness. Give this structured wine another few years and drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château Haut-Sorillon 2012  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 1 Petit Sorillon, 33230 Abzac, France
properties.descrption: While there are certainly tannins here, this wine is essentially about fruit. Stalky black currants and berries dominate this perfumed wine with its fresh acidity and crisp, clean aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Fattoria Petriolo 2012  Chianti
properties.address: loc. il Piano n.1, Torri, SP90, 50067 Rignano sull'Arno FI, Italy
properties.descrption: This ripe, easygoing red offers fruity yet fleeting aromas and flavors of fleshy black cherry and baked plum. It's made to be drunk young so enjoy now.

properties.title: Mil Piedras 2007 Merlot (Mendoza)
properties.address: 6425 Mira Cielo, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.descrption: Pretty well composed on the nose, with a core of blackberry. The palate runs narrow and grabby, but the generic sweet berry fruit is tasty, albeit ultrasimple. Snappy on the finish, with the gritty feel of cherry and grape skins. Good in a basic way.

properties.title: Alpataco 2007 Merlot (Neuquén)
properties.address: Pres. Manuel Quintana 450, C1129ABN CABA, Argentina
properties.descrption: Subtle on the nose, with restrained berry, cherry and citrus peel aromas. The palate is a little grabby but mostly fresh in its approach, with flavors of fresh berry fruit. Light and mildly candied on the finish. A no-brainer that's easy as they come.

properties.title: Muscardini 2007 Gracie Creek Vineyards Syrah (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 9380 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: Sharpness compromises this wine. Whether the acidity is natural or added, it's intrusive, cutting the palate and giving a sour candy taste to the blackberries, currants and cherries. Ready now.

properties.title: Santa Carolina 2008 Reserva de Familia Malbec (Rapel Valley)
properties.address: Til Til 2228, Macul, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Very dark and grapey, with raisin, licorice and bite to the bouquet. Saturated and heavy in the mouth, with lemony acidity framing loud, generic black fruit flavors. The finish features ample oak in the form of butter and coconut. A little overripe and oaky, but on the right path.

properties.title: De Loach 2008 Cool Coastal Vineyards Pinot Noir (Central Coast)
properties.address: 1791 Olivet Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: Quite sharp in acidity, giving a bite of tartness to the dry flavors of cola, cherries, sandalwood and pepper. A good, silky Pinot for drinking now.

properties.title: Château La Prade 2014  Francs Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 8555 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: Full of acidity and red-currant flavors, this is a wine that is light and fruity. It is crisp along with touches of wood. This is one of several Nicolas Thienpont properties, run by son Cyrille. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Lajarre 2014 Cuvée Eléonore  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 24 Av. des Châteaux, 33350 Mouliets-et-Villemartin, France
properties.descrption: The wine is firm and structured although with enough fruit weight to give the wine a good potential for aging. Still full of young energy, it is going to develop balance.

properties.title: Château les Arromans 2014  Bordeaux
properties.address: 2 Les Arromans, 33420 Moulon, France
properties.descrption: The wine is all fruit with just the lightest tannins. It has great acidity, a lively red -ruit character and intense freshness. Drink this wine now.

properties.title: Château Malbat 2014 Optimus  (Bordeaux)
properties.address: 5 Malbat, 33190 La Réole, France
properties.descrption: Spice and some firm tannins mark this wine. It has a red-fruit character as well as a more earthy backdrop. With its structure it will need to sit until 2017.

properties.title: Château Roc de Ségur 2015  Bordeaux
properties.address: 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: This is a fresh wine that has been aged in tanks, retaining its bright red fruits and lively acidity. It is still young although it will develop quickly to give a soft fruit-driven wine.

properties.title: Château Suau 2014  Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 600 Suau, 33550 Capian, France
properties.descrption: The organic wine has tight tannins and acidity. The structure is balanced by red-currant fruit flavors. The wine is vinified under the direction of Michel Rolland and one of several family wineries under Bacchus Investments. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Chehalem 2013 Ridgecrest Vineyards Reserve Pinot Noir (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.address: 31190 NE Veritas Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: Some might say this is old-school Oregon Pinot, with an emphasis on herbal acidic flavors and thin tart fruits. Despite aggressive aeration, the wine refuses to open up, and the impression of barely ripe fruit and chalky acids lingers.

properties.title: City Winery Chicago 2013 Lake Shore Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 1200 W Randolph St, Chicago, IL 60607, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has a generosity of tannin that can be distracting, as the rest of its boldness seeks to make room for flavors of tart cherry, leather and hint of almond extract. Medium bodied, it veers into ripe characteristics that can come off as heat, particularly on the finish.

properties.title: Consejo de la Alta 2013 Alta Río Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Fuenmayor, 0, 26350 Cenicero, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy, gritty, animal aromas are a bit raw as they blend with currant and red-plum scents. This wine lacks depth on the palate and flavors of tomato, red plum, herbs and oak finish choppy, drawing and tannic.

properties.title: EOS 2014 Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2300 Airport Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Bramble, wet slate, nori, red spice and a smoky, iodine-like element show on the nose of this bottling. The palate offers dried red fruit and a gamy quality, dashed with oregano, marjoram and a cigar-like spice.

properties.title: Sanguinhal 2013 Quinta de S. Francisco Red (Obidos)
properties.address: Quinta do Sanguinhal, 2540-216 Bombarral, Portugal
properties.descrption: A fruity wine with a stalky red-fruit character. It has firm layers of toast and spice that are dominant at this stage and need to calm down. When they do, it will be a wine that is full of bright fruit and final acidity.

properties.title: Vignobles Carreau Selection 2014 Château Crusquet Sabourin  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: Château Les Petits Arnauds, 33390 Cars, France
properties.descrption: This wine is ripe and potentially rich, but is firm at this stage. With its dark tannins and dense structure, it will age well. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Bodegas Ondalan 2013 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: Logroño Errepidea, 22, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Forced oak is the lead aroma on this clampy, tannic Rioja from a marginal vintage. Pasty oak covers up dried plum and currant flavors. A raw, rubbery, scouring finish tastes dry and woody.

properties.title: Casa Nuestra 2011 Estate Meritage (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: Soft and simply rendered, this blends 50% Cabernet Franc, 40% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, all organically farmed in St. Helena. Cherry, plum and vanilla stand out amidst a medium-bodied undercurrent of milk chocolate.

properties.title: Ioppa 2013 Nebbiolo (Colline Novaresi)
properties.address: Via Delle Pallotte, 28078 Romagnano Sesia NO, Italy
properties.descrption: Fresh and easy drinking, this light-bodied fragrant red has aromas wild red berry, blue flower and a whiff of baking spice. The brisk simple palate offers tart cherry, orange peel and clove. Bracing acidity dominates the finish.

properties.title: Ironstone 2014 Merlot (Lodi)
properties.address: Ironstone Vineyards, 1894 6 Mile Rd, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.descrption: This medium-bodied wine has a vivid smoky aroma that gives way to fresh strawberry and raspberry notes on the palate. It feels juicy, slightly tart and light.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2014 Portada Winemakers Selecton Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.descrption: Generous and ripe, this is a wine that is finely balanced and very ready to drink. Ripe tannins, soft texture and final acidity make for an easy-drinking wine.

properties.title: Château Bourron 2014 Belvedere de Château Bourron  (Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 16234 Marquis Rd, Orange, VA 22960, USA
properties.descrption: This is a dry wine, firm with tense tannins and structured. It needs time to bring out the ripe fruits that are there. Big and concentrated, this wine inaugurated a new gravity-fed winery. Wait until 2019 to drink.

properties.title: Château Feret Lambert 2014 Costes du Château Feret Lambert  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: Château Féret-Lambert, 1 Lambert, 33420 Grézillac, France
properties.descrption: The wine is full of juicy acidity along with some attractive spice and light wood flavors. It is still developing and the fruit is too young, so give it until 2018.

properties.title: Château Gigault 2014 Cuvée Viva  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 1 Gigault, 33390 Mazion, France
properties.descrption: This is a structured wine from 96% Merlot and 4% Cabernet Sauvignon that has plenty of fruit. With some firm tannins as well as concentrated blackberry fruit, it is going to be a fine wine. It was created under the direction of consultant Stéphane Derenoncourt's team. Start drinking from 2019.

properties.title: Château Haut Peyrefaure 2014  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: Société H. Duboscq & Fils, 7 Rue Mac Carthy, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: The wine is structured with concentrated tannins and dense fruit. It has spice, wood-aging flavors and a firm aftertaste. That means the wine needs time, so wait until 2019.

properties.title: Skouras 2007 Megas Oenos Red (Peloponnese)
properties.address: Argous - Sternas Rd (10th Km), Malandreni, Argos 212 00, Greece
properties.descrption: Anise, black cherry and allspice aromas give this Cabernet/Agiorgitiko blend a sultry start. On the palate, flavors of smoke, cedar, cherry and spice are integrated and smooth. A wine with panache and indigenous character.

properties.title: Terredora 2008 Aglianico (Campania)
properties.address: Contrada Serra, 83030 Serra AV, Italy
properties.descrption: Although those superfirm tannins do pop up on the end, this is a relatively smooth and fruit-forward expression of the austere Aglianico variety. Blackberry and maraschino cherry is surrounded by a drying aromatic embroidery of mineral and powdered spice.

properties.title: Thirteen Appellations 2007 Meritage (Napa Valley)
properties.address: Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Very dark in color, dense and thick in the mouth, and tight in astringent tannins. Clearly an immature wine not showing well. The blackberry and cherry flavors are impressive, but the wine seems disjointed. Cellaring is a gamble.

properties.title: Foris 2008 Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 654 Kendall Rd, Cave Junction, OR 97523, USA
properties.descrption: Light and balanced, this Pinot Noir is from Illinois Valley vineyards in southwest Oregon—quite different from the Willamette Valley sites that are most often associated with Oregon wines. It's a delicate wine, with 13% alcohol, and a mouthfeel much like a simple Bourgogne. A fine choice for everyday drinking with poultry dishes.

properties.title: Hartenberg 2008 Ecurie Red (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Bottelary Road Koelenhof, Stellenbosch, 7605, South Africa
properties.descrption: Here's a satiny, approachable red blend with notes of black currant, brandy-soaked cherry and a touch of vanilla bean on the nose and mouth. A savory peppery spice reveals itself on the end, with moderate tannins lingering through the close.

properties.title: Villa Matilde 2007 Tenuta Rocca dei Leoni Aglianico (Campania)
properties.address: Via Domitiana, 18, 81030 Cellole CE, Italy
properties.descrption: This is a tight, meaty Aglianico that offers a broad range of aromas that spans from black pepper to green olive to mature black cherry. The wine's solid structure makes it a good match to lamb or stewed game meat.

properties.title: Calera 2009 Pinot Noir (Central Coast)
properties.address: 11300 Cienega Rd, Hollister, CA 95023, USA
properties.descrption: Calera's basic Central Coast Pinot is a good, drily crisp wine, showing some real elegance. A little heavy, it shows cherry, red currant, herb, tobacco, teriaki beef and sandalwood flavors. Drink now. More than 12,000 cases were produced.

properties.title: Château Fourcas Hosten 2003  Listrac-Médoc
properties.address: 5 Rue Odilon Redon, 33480 Listrac-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: The hot, overweight 2003 vintage has not been kind to this licorice- and dark chocolate-flavored wine. It is dry, firm, while still garishly rich. If you have it, drink it now.

properties.title: Clos du Val 2007 Reserve Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 5330 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Somewhat lean and dry, a wine whose tobacco, pepper and herb flavors overshadow its cherries and red currants. Call it elegant, and drink now and over the next few years.

properties.title: MacMurray Ranch 2008 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 9015 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Vinified in California with grapes purchased from Willamette Valley sources, this is a pleasant, quaffable wine, with simple red fruit and grippy acids. The flavors seem to get stuck in the back of the throat, a bottleneck of acid and red berry. Don't look for the breadth or sweetness of California Pinot Noir here, but you will find texture and nuance.

properties.title: Lorenzi Estate 2013 Reserve Red (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 36095 Monte De Oro Rd, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.descrption: There are very ripe aromas of kirsch, cassis, licorice and root beer on the nose of this bottling, which begin to evolve into prunes, dried figs and raisins with time. The cola spice flavor is strong as are the prune and milk chocolate, all of which ride a strong tannic frame.

properties.title: Marchesi di Barolo 2016  Barbera d'Alba
properties.address: Via Roma, 1, 12060 Barolo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This leads with violet, black-skinned berry and baking spice aromas while red cherry, raspberry and white pepper flavors mark the savory palate. Smooth tannins and bracing acidity provide balance. Enjoy through 2020.

properties.title: Milbrandt 2014 Single Vineyard Series Clifton Hill Vineyard Syrah (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 707 US-2 unit d, Leavenworth, WA 98826, USA
properties.descrption: This shows vanilla, clove, barrel spice and dark fruit aromas. Its fruit flavors are full and laced with upfront barrel notes. It seems a little boozy.

properties.title: Molino 2014 Teoramo  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Frazione Annunziata - Borgata Gancia, 111 A, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This leads with aromatic herb, wild berry and oak-driven spice notes. The tight, taut palate offers licorice, clove, baking spice, crushed sage and dried black cherry flavors but lacks fruit richness. It's framed by firm, close-grained tannins and vibrant acidity.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2014 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Malbec (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14710 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Vanilla, cocoa, barrel spice and herb aromas are followed by creamy fruit and barrel flavors. The vanilla notes overwhelm the nose and palate, however, distracting from the fruit.

properties.title: Osprey's Dominion 2012 Flight Meritage (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 44075 Main Rd, Peconic, NY 11958, USA
properties.descrption: Ripe, lifted blackberry and plum notes are tinged with game and garrigue in this luscious, full-bodied Meritage. An unusual dose of Carmenère lends an earthy, savory character that balances an otherwise plush, fruity palate. The finish is framed with fine, soft tannins and a lingering spice note.

properties.title: Poderi dei Bricchi Astigiani 2014 Bricco del Perg  (Barbera d'Asti)
properties.address: Via Ritani, 7, 14057 Isola D'asti AT, Italy
properties.descrption: This wine's black-skinned berry, cooking spice and violet aromas drift out of the glass while the racy palate offers ripe black cherry and cranberry jam flavors with a touch of clove. Brisk acidity and supple tannins provide the framework. Enjoy through 2020.

properties.title: Castillo's Hillside Shire 2013 Petit Verdot (Santa Clara County)
properties.address: 2215 Liberata Dr, Morgan Hill, CA 95037, USA
properties.descrption: Blackberries, asphalt, char and black pepper show on the nose of this bottling from a winery in Morgan Hill. It's a little thin on the palate, especially for what can be a thick and dense grape, but the flavors are solid, with dark plum, coffee and pepper.

properties.title: Château de Pizay 2016 Château de Saint Lager  (Brouilly)
properties.address: 443 Rte du Château, 69220 Belleville-en-Beaujolais, France
properties.descrption: This wine has a firm structure as well as plenty of fruit. The wine's acidity, crisp red-currant fruit and bright character are balanced by the firm, smoky and dry tannins. Give this structure time to soften and fill out into a ripe wine. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Château de Pizay 2016  Morgon
properties.address: 443 Rte du Château, 69220 Belleville-en-Beaujolais, France
properties.descrption: For this appellation, this is a soft wine, full of bright cherry flavors and attractive acidity. A jammy character brings out rich fruitiness that will allow the wine to be ready from 2018.

properties.title: Domaine Jessiaume 2015  Auxey-Duresses
properties.address: 10 Rue de la Gare, 21590 Santenay, France
properties.descrption: Behind the main vineyards of the Côte de Beaune, this village makes some delicious wines, both red and white. This village wine, full of fruit, also has wood-aging flavors and firm spicy tannins. It is coming together well and will be ready to drink from 2020.

properties.title: Domaines Devillard 2015 Domaine des Perdrix  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 13 Rue du Closeau, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: The Domaine des Perdrix is based at Nuits Saint-Georges, so this wine comes from the Côte de Nuits. It is richly fruity with layers of warm red fruits and soft tannins. Rounded and ripe, the wine is an instant success. Drink now.

properties.title: Finca Constancia 2014 Selección Red (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
properties.address: Camino Bravo, S/N, 45543 Otero, Toledo, Spain
properties.descrption: Floral berry aromas are drowned out by heavy scents of licorice and clove. A jumpy, fresh palate is raw but high in energy. Herbal, minty currant flavors are dry, oaky and toasty on the finish. This blend is made from six grapes, Syrah and Cab Sauvignon among them.

properties.title: Hawkins Cellars 2014 Mourvèdre (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 10401 Cook-Underwood Rd, Underwood, WA 98651, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Horse Heaven Hills and Red Mountain fruit delivers brooding cherry and herb aromas and full-bodied black cherry flavors. The tannins contribute grit.

properties.title: Warramate 2012 Pinot Noir (Yarra Valley)
properties.address: 27 Maddens Ln, Gruyere VIC 3770, Australia
properties.descrption: One of Yarra's first wave of modern-day wineries, Warramate was founded in 1970, which means this comes from Pinot Noir vines that can legitimately be called old. The style is resolutely traditional, with crisp acids and a wiry backbone the standout features. Cedary oak further frames tart cherry fruit, which finishes long and crisp. Drink from 2018 through until 2025.

properties.title: Oso Libre 2011 Reserva Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 7383 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of 64% Cabernet Sauvignon and 36% Merlot is focused on cedar, crushed dried herbs and cracked, hot blacktop aromas, but also shows blueberry and boysenberry fruit on the nose. The savory palate coincides, with pencil lead, dried sagebrush and juniper, oregano and thyme and the ever-so-slight hint of dried New Mexico chile.

properties.title: Owen Roe 2014 Sharecropper's Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 309 Gangl Rd, Wapato, WA 98951, USA
properties.descrption: This deservedly popular value bottle gets the star Pinot treatment—nine months in French oak, 27% new. It's spicy and full-flavored, with resonant blue plum fruit, buttery toast and a tannic frame.

properties.title: Sequoia Grove 2012 Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8338 St Helena Hwy, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: A sizable percentage of Cabernet Franc (19%) makes it into this wine, as does 1% Viognier. Inky and plummy, it's a full-bodied, brawny mix of ripe plum, blackberry, leather and black pepper, well structured and built to age. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Terras de Alter 2013 Terra d'Alter Aragonês (Alentejano)
properties.address: Zona Industrial Da Lt. 22/28, 263, 7460 Fronteira, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a rich, full-bodied wine that is ready to drink now. It still has a dry core of tannins, although they are overwhelmed by the rich, juicy black fruits and generous texture. It's a concentrated wine, high in alcohol, although that is really balanced by the fresh aftertaste.

properties.title: Careglio 2012  Roero
properties.address: Loc. Aprato 15, 12040 Baldissero D'alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Fragrant and linear, this luminous wine is perfumed with woodland berry, black tea, wild violet and a hint of spice. On the sleek, polished palate, silky tannins and fresh acidity support bright red cherry, raspberry and white pepper. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Château Famaey 2011 Fût de Chêne Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Les, Inganel, 46700 Puy-l'Évêque, France
properties.descrption: The oak aging, implicit in the name of the wine, is present in its smooth character. This bottling is in the elegant style typical of Famaey wines and also has weight and firm, concentrated black fruit with acidity and a dry core. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Clos de Tafall 2013 Red (Priorat)
properties.address: 43736 El Molar, Tarragona, Spain
properties.descrption: This is ripe and a bit raisiny with prune and fig notes to the bold bouquet. This feels chunky on the palate, but not fat or out of shape. Baked black fruit and raisin flavors finish solid and ready, with a note of licorice and an overriding sense of richness. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Cordero di Montezemolo 2011 Bricco Gattera  (Barolo)
properties.address: Regione Annunziata, 67, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of French oak, coconut, vanilla and spiced plum lead the nose on this powerfully structured wine. The oak sensations carry over to the warm palate along with cherry marinated in spirits, licorice and menthol. Bracing, close-grained tannins provide the framework and need time to unwind. Best after 2020.

properties.title: Ceste 2011 Palliano Riserva  (Roero)
properties.address: Corso Alfieri di Sostegno, 1, 12040 Govone CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Berry, baking spice, dried iris, mint and a hint of vanilla come together on this structured wine. On the palate, notes of white pepper, sage, anise, orange zest and yellow peach accent the red cherry core while a balsamic note closes the finish. Firm, refined tannins provide the backbone.

properties.title: Panther Creek 2013 Schindler Vineyard Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 14455 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE Suite B, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Big, bold, dark and chewy, this builds upon substantial black-cherry fruit and supporting acids. Still knitting together, it shows highlights of cedar and tobacco, along with thick tannins. Give this a couple more years of bottle age, and drink after 2018.

properties.title: Pelter 2013 Matar Stratus Shiraz (Galilee)
properties.address: Ein Zivan
properties.descrption: This wine has a bouquet of black currant, cassis and juniper berry. There is a very pleasant balance of fruit and cool herbal flavors, with an emphasis on black cherry, peach, anise and eucalyptus. The sense of coolness that persists on the palate is slightly overshadowed by a flash of brightness on the finish.

properties.title: Longboard 2013 Savage Coast Syrah (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 5 Fitch St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: From two vineyard sites and given thimblefuls of Grenache, Petite Sirah, Carignane, Malbec and Zinfandel, this wine is an ode to the winemaker's lifelong obsession with surfing, with a nod to the wildness of the California coast. Black licorice, dark plum and saddle wrap around tightly wound, powerful tannins and a pronounced minerality. Drink now through 2023.

properties.title: Vite Colte 2004 Essenze Riserva  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Bergesia, 12060 Barolo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of leafy underbrush, mature berry, chopped herb and mocha lead the nose. The firm, full-bodied palate offers black cherry, licorice, menthol and clove alongside polished, fine-grained tannins. Drink 2017–2029.

properties.title: Viña Cobos 2012 Marchiori Vineyard Block C2 Malbec (Perdriel)
properties.address: Costa Flores s/n y, RN7, M5509 Perdriel, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Cool briary plum and blackberry aromas show lactic, creamy oak, which is nothing unusual for Cobos. Plump, dense and saturated in the mouth, this block-selection Malbec is extremely ripe, with medicinal black fruit and raisiny flavors touched up by mocha and peppery spice. An oaky, spicy finish is par for the course. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: Gustafson Family 2012 Logging Road Vineyard Estate Syrah (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 34 North St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Tobacco and tar stand out in this densely packed, robustly built estate, 100% varietal wine. Full bodied, it's a study in dark chocolate and smoked meats, wrapped in oak and black pepper. There's some serious power to this wine.

properties.title: Tenuta La Fuga 2006  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Unnamed Road, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Jammy, mature notes of dark cherry and blackberry preserves open the nose of this richly opulent Brunello. Background tones include polished mineral and sweet Christmas spice with lingering accents of black pepper and crushed clove.

properties.title: Valiano 2006 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Via Terra Rossa, 5, 53045 Valiano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a fleshy, well-proportioned Chianti Classico with bright, jammy notes of cherry and blackberry backed by softer aromas of vanilla and spice. Smooth roundness is capped by firm structure.

properties.title: Il Marroneto 2006  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Località Madonna delle Grazie, 307, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This classic Brunello is slightly more closed aromatically and subdued at first, but opens to deep layers of berry fruit and exotic spice as the wine stays in the glass. Elegant flavors of almond and cassis appear as pretty accents on the long fade.

properties.title: Il Poggiolo E. Cosimi 2006 Poggiolo  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Località Sasso al Vento, 262, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Buoyant cola and root beer aromas frame solid aromas of almond paste and wild berry. This Brunello shows a smooth, rich mouthfeel with tight, compact tannins on the close.

properties.title: La Calonica 2007  Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
properties.address: Via della Stella, 27, 53045 Montepulciano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This Vino Nobile offers a lighter, fresher interpretation of Sangiovese that would pair with white meat or turkey roast. Aromas include raspberry, white cherry and cinnamon. In the mouth, the wine is tight, linear and direct.

properties.title: Le Potazzine 2006 Gorelli  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Località Le Prata, 262, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This shapely, opulent Brunello delivers soft texture and rich intensity that is highlighted by crisp aromas of sweet cherry, spice and dark vanilla bean. That soft roundness continues to the palate where the wine exhibits a smooth, velvety texture.

properties.title: Altesino 2006  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Strada Provinciale del Brunello, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Altesino's Brunello is characterized by fine tannins, good acidity and aromas of white cherry, forest floor and bramble. The wine seems less intense than past vintages and there's a slightly browning edge to its color.

properties.title: Altesino 2007 Palazzo Altesi Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale del Brunello, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This very interesting expression of Sangiovese is light in color but bursting with small berry and floral fragrances. The wine does a lovely job of showing the elegant, feminine side of this Tuscan grape variety.

properties.title: Château Phélan-Ségur 2008  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: Rue des Écoles, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: This is a woody, toasty wine, which seems to be the style here for the last several years. It has weight, but does need time for the wood to subside and bring out the elegant fruits.

properties.title: Corley 2007 Proprietary Red Wine Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4242 Big Ranch Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Makes for nice drinking right now, because of the abundance of forward, jammy blackberry and cherry fruit. On the other hand, the tannins are considerable, and the acidity is evident, so it could age over the next six years.

properties.title: Dona Maria-Júlio Bastos 2008 Dona Maria Petit Verdot Petit Verdot (Alentejano)
properties.address: Quinta do Carmo, 7100-000 Estremoz, Portugal
properties.descrption: An almost black-colored wine, this Petit Verdot is unusual for the region. It succeeds well, a juicy wine full of dusty tannins, tight black fruits and a core of dark plum flavors.

properties.title: Drew 2009 Balo Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 9000 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: This big, powerfully fruity Pinot Noir screams coastal California all the way through. The raspberry, cherry and spice flavors, brightened with acidity, taste of long, warm days and cool nights. It's a good wine, but too young, and would have benefited had the winery held it back a year or so before release. Better into 2012.

properties.title: Agostina Pieri 2006  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Località Piancornello, 53024 Sant'Angelo Scalo, Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This fine and elegant Brunello is accented by plush softness and bright flavors of wild berry, raspberry and sweet almond paste. Thicker tones of espresso and chocolate appear on the close and are carried forth by the wine's velvety richness.

properties.title: Agricola Querciabella 2008 Querciabella  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Via di Barbiano, 17, 50022 Greve in Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: This youthful and fruit-forward Chianti Classico is balanced and fresh with bright berry and raspberry aromas that give it a cheerful, bright personality. The wine is fresh and zesty on the close and would pair with creamy vegetable risotto.

properties.title: Bolen 2007 Merlot (Oak Knoll District)
properties.address: 312 FM168, Smyer, TX 79367, USA
properties.descrption: Delicious in flavor, with fresh, ripe blackberry and cherry flavors, while the oak overlay adds richer layers of sweet caramel and buttered cinnamon toast. A crisp spine of citrusy acidity adds brightness. An appealing Merlot for drinking now.

properties.title: Borges 2008 Reserva Tinto Red (Dão)
properties.address: R. Infante Dom Henrique 421, 4436-909 Rio Tinto, Portugal
properties.descrption: A firmly structured wine, showing dark black fruits and a very mineral texture. The tannins are chalky, dusty, chewy. Along with all this tight structure, rich fruits are waiting underneath. Give it 4–5 years.

properties.title: Château Couhins-Lurton 2008  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: 48 Chem. de Martillac, 33140 Villenave-d'Ornon, France
properties.descrption: Soft, very round, already approachable, the wine is flavored with spice, black berry flavors and sweet tannins. Juicy, ripe Merlot for medium-term aging.

properties.title: La Poderina 2008 Poggio Abate Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Localita' Poderina, 53024 Castelnuovo dell'Abate SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Round and velvety, it has aromas of ripe berry, chocolate and exotic spices. The rich palate delivers juicy black cherry punctuated with ground black pepper, cinnamon, carob, pipe tobacco and mint. Forward and sweet, this is already extremely accessible so enjoy soon. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Le Macchiole 2010 Scrio Syrah (Toscana)
properties.address: S.P Bolgherese, 189/A, 57022 Bolgheri LI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Syrah, this concentrated wine delivers plum, black pepper, cocoa, coffee, fleshy black cherry and notes of bay leaf. It's plush, soft and savory but it also seems shy on vibrancy and essential energy. Drink sooner rather than later.

properties.title: Château Beaumont 2011  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 28 Rue Beaumont Nord, 33460 Cussac-Fort-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: An impressive wine, it already shows signs of its potential. It is elegant, with ripe fruits and layers of dark tannins. As it opens, blackberry fruits come through strongly, balancing the firm structure. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Clément-Pichon 2010  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 30 Av. du Château Pichon, 33290 Parempuyre, France
properties.descrption: The estate is under the same ownership as Château la Dominique in Saint-Émilion. This dense wine balances acidity with intense fruitiness. The tannins are now softening, giving a rich structure plus a concentrated leather and spice character. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château Fonréaud 2011  Listrac-Médoc
properties.address: Fonreaud, 33480 Listrac-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: Spicy new wood flavors dominate this otherwise strongly fruity wine. The tension between the two promises a rich, full and ripe wine for the future. There is enough weight, acidity, blackberry fruit and richness to balance out the wood aging. Give this dense wine until 2018.

properties.title: Altesino 2009 Montosoli  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale del Brunello, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This wine, from perhaps Montalcino's most famous single vineyard, opens with fruit aromas of black plum, black berries, cake spices and a whiff of new leather. The ripe, round palate delivers sweet black cherry layered with notes of chocolate and hints of vanilla alongside friendly tannins. While it lacks its usual complexity, it's juicy, delicious and extremely accessible. Drink 2015–2019.

properties.title: Angel Vine 2011 Avery Vineyard Zinfandel (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 8749 NW Marshall St, Portland, OR 97229, USA
properties.descrption: Among the four vineyards used by Angel Vine, the Avery stands apart for its detail, grip and length. Blue fruits take center stage—plums and berries—along with a tasty lick of coffee and chocolate. You may pick up a hint of the tack room and a streak of fennel in the finish.

properties.title: Angel Vine 2011 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 8749 NW Marshall St, Portland, OR 97229, USA
properties.descrption: Primitivo is a close relation to Zinfandel, and it slides easily into the Angel Vine lineup which includes four other Zins. This carries a touch more earthiness than the others, with darker fruits and a distinctive streak of espresso. Good grip and density mark this as the most muscular wine among the 2011's.

properties.title: Bouchaine 2012 Bacchus Collection Estate Vineyard Pinot Meunier (Carneros)
properties.address: 1075 Buchli Station Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Pinot Meunier is seldom bottled on its own. Vintners prefer to use it in sparkling wine blends. But Bouchaine is serious about it, and with this 100% varietal wine, has succeeded in producing a Pinot Noir-esque wine of great beauty. With some new French oak, it has a smoky edge to the raspberries and cherries, with savory hints of white pepper and cinnamon.

properties.title: Château Cos Labory 2011  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: Cos S, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: A very dry wine, it shows the traditional Saint- Estèphe hard tannins. That suggests it will develop slowly, gradually bringing out the potential of the red berry fruits and acidity as it develops into a fine, complex wine. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château d'Armailhac 2011  Pauillac
properties.address: 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: This is a ripe wine with spice, juicy red fruits and a feeling of opulence. Full, fruity and rich, it's a wine for medium-term aging. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Meyney 2011  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: Lieu-dit, Meyney, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: This is a perfumed, new wood-flavored wine. It has soft tannins and attractive acidity along with a drier core. Showing a rich potential, it will round out over the next four to five years. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Ormes de Pez 2011  Saint-Estèphe
properties.descrption: This is a rich, full-bodied and complex wine. It shows dense tannins and equally dense fruits that are powered by the ripe black currant fruit flavors. There is a fresher component at the end, attractive and bright. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Elsom Cellars 2009 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2960 4th Ave S #114, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.descrption: Interesting highlights of English Breakfast tea and toasted grains complement the strawberry fruit in this blend of 46% Cabernet Sauvignon, 46% Malbec and 8% Syrah. Layered and complex, it shows pleasing hints of lightly composted earth.

properties.title: Gamache 2010 Estate Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1201 Basin Hill Rd, Mesa, WA 99343, USA
properties.descrption: Consulting winemaker Charlie Hoppes has imprinted his benchmark style on Gamache fruit. This is a big, ripe, blocky but powerful wine—all Merlot as only Washington State can grow it. The ripe cassis fruit is enveloped in a mix of French and American oak, half new, yielding strong flavors of smoke, tobacco and mocha. A blockbuster style, ready to drink right now.

properties.title: Viña Mayor 2010 Secreto Vendimia Seleccionada  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: N-122, km 325,6, 47350 Quintanilla de Onésimo, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Raspberry and plum aromas are clean and welcoming. This is a firm, well-built wine, with crisp acidity and solid but not grating tannins. Flavors of toast, chocolate, blackberry and plum precede a chocolaty, warm, cushioned finish. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Trivento 2010 Eolo Malbec (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.address: RP60 & Jerónimo Ruiz, M5517, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Dark in color, then jammy on the nose, this oaky specimen has heavily extracted berry aromas. In the mouth, there's a level of freshness offset by heavy fruit content. Flavors of berry and plum are chocolaty up front and finish with spice, pepper and additional chocolate richness. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Pascual Toso 2005 Magdalena Toso Limited 40 Barrels Malbec-Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
properties.address: RP14 81, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: The wine is called 40 Barrels and every bit of those barrels is crawling on this Malbec-Cab blend. For starters, it smells more like hickory than fruit. Soon blackberry and prune aromas and flavors get into the game, but even then the back palate and finish are resiny. Some citric acidity in the center keeps it keen but raises questions about balance.

properties.title: Santa Julia 2007 Organica Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: km 7,5, RP33, M5531 Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Blueberry with snap is the way to describe the bouquet on this fresh and spunky young Malbec. The flavors are sweet and intense, just like grapes off the vine. It doesn't offer much complexity but at the same time it doesn't taste confected or flawed in any way.

properties.title: Tagaris 2006 Alice Vineyard Petit Verdot (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 844 Tulip Ln, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.descrption: This is warm and loose, with fruit that is very ripe and just on the verge of pruney. The ripe fruit flavors seem to soften the tannins, which are also quite ripe and smooth. It tastes a bit like prune juice, but not unpleasantly so, with an acid base that compensates for the volatility of the finish. A drink-now wine, but it has its charms.

properties.title: Domaine Alfred 2005 Estate Grenache (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 7525 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.descrption: Soft and mouth-filling, this Central Coast Grenache offers a flood of flavors. Cherries, black raspberries, milk chocolate and vanilla flood the palate, wrapped into rich, finely ground tannins. Drink now.

properties.title: Leasingham 2005 Classic Clare Shiraz (Clare Valley)
properties.address: Horrocks Hwy, Leasingham SA 5452, Australia
properties.descrption: Straightforward Australian Shiraz, combining mulberry fruit with vanilla oak. It lacks richness and expansiveness on the palate. A solid effort, but a bit of a disappointment given the history of the label and the suggested pricing.

properties.title: Winkler-Hermaden 2005 Reserve Pinot Noir (Südoststeiermark)
properties.address: Kapfenstein 106, 8353 Kapfenstein, Austria
properties.descrption: Lightly perfumed, this wood-aged wine has soft tannins and an unfocused character, which brings spice as well as green fruits. The aftertaste is taut and earthy.

properties.title: Castillo Clavijo 1998 Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: C. Don Dionisio Cabezón, 15, 26130 Clavijo, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Leafy and peppery on the nose, with light red-fruit aromas and some citrus peel. It runs more lean and spicy than anything, with hints of tomato leaf, fennel and sausage.

properties.title: Clos Pepe 2005 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 4777 E, CA-246, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Very dry and fairly soft, with licorice, cherry, cranberry, cola and oak flavors, it lacks the power and complexity you expect from this great property.

properties.title: Coeur d'Alene 2005 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Syrah (Washington)
properties.address: 3890 N Schreiber Way, Coeur d'Alene, ID 83815, USA
properties.descrption: These are still young vines, and showing rather simple, though attractive, fruit flavors of raspberry, strawberry and red currant. Vague hints of pepper and rock suggest good things to come, but for now this is a bit of an underachiever for the price.

properties.title: Undurraga 2001 Reserva Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Cam. a Melipilla 34, Talagante, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Spicy and peppery, with lots of body and richness. In a word, it's true Carmenère. The fruit here is ripe and lush, with plenty of herbal essence, and for every drop of plum or black cherry there's a balancing hint of green herb and bell pepper, which does not signal underripeness. The finish is tight and long, with some espresso flavor. If you're interested in trying a well-made Carmenère, give this a go.

properties.title: Montes 2001 Oak Aged - Reserve Malbec (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: I-350, Millahue, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Simple and clean up front, with inviting aromas. The mouth on this wine is broad and satisfying, and the flavors of plum, blackberry, black olive and buttery oak work in tandem. The finish is a bit aggressive, and here the oak is powerful as it leaves a bitter lasting sensation. But overall the wine impresses for its solidity and full fruit.

properties.title: Benziger 2000 Pinot Noir (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 1883 London Ranch Rd, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: A likeable, easy Pinot that straddles the line between simplicity and complexity. Darkly colored, with earthy, berry aromatics; in the mouth it has the soft, silky texture and crisp acids you want in a good Pinot. Flavors are of cherries and spices. Fruit-driven and a good accompaniment to a wide range of food.

properties.title: Calina 2001 Reserve Merlot (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Calle Camino las Rastras Km 7, Talca, Maule, Chile
properties.descrption: The nose is standard fare as it offers cherry, plum and a hint of herbaceousness. Good plum and berry fruit carries the mouth, while the finish is round and smooth. The wine is balanced and entirely satisfying even if it is basic in its intent. As per usual, Calina delivers a good wine for the price. -M.S.

properties.title: Testarossa 2001 Bien Nacido Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.descrption: Lots of flavor packed into this light-bodied, smoothly textured wine, although it's a bit one-dimensional. Flavors veer toward raspberry cola and lots of dusty, peppery spices, wrapped in silky tannins and boosted by crisp acids.

properties.title: La Palma 2002 Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: 4029 Hagen Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Very forward and young, with an overt, grapey style. This wine doesn't walk lightly, as it starts out more positive than it finishes. The plum, cassis and berry fruit is really ripe and active, but there's also some aggressive acidity that makes it more tangy and sharp than ideal.

properties.title: CampoReale 2008  Valpolicella Classico
properties.address: Contrada Mandranova, 90043 Camporeale PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's an easy, bright and lively Valpolicella that would make a great companion to bean soup with heaps of grated Parmigiano cheese on top. It's a crisp, fresh wine with an informal but inviting personality.

properties.title: Pricum 2007 Valdemuz Prieto Picudo (Tierra de León)
properties.address: 839 NE 3rd Ave, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33304, USA
properties.descrption: Medicinal, sweet and short on complexity for a wine of this price. The palate has a choppy, rough feel and then comes an onslaught of medicinal berry flavor that leads to a tight, biting finish that's big on acid and low on depth of flavor and intracacies you might expect for $80. More of a novelty wine; 160 cases made.

properties.title: Tarara 2007 Cabernet Franc (Virginia)
properties.address: 13648 Tarara Ln, Leesburg, VA 20176, USA
properties.descrption: Pretty black cherry, char and menthol aromas gently perfume Tarara's Cab Franc. On the palate, soft black fruit flavors are not deeply concentrated, but ripe with firm grape and wood tannins for balance. Bright acidity carries through on a tart, sour cherry finish.

properties.title: Murphy-Goode 2008 Liar's Dice Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 241 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A soft, simple but pretty wine, with slightly sweet, pie-filling cherry, raspberry, Dr. Pepper cola and baking spice flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Coquelicot 2007 Mon Amour Red (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 2884 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: This Bordeaux blend is a little rough around the edges. It has a sharp, jammy feeling, and seems too sweet in raspberry- and cherry-pie filling. Will appeal to fans of an easy drinking, accessible style of a Cabernet-based wine.

properties.title: Mazzi 2008 Sanperetto  (Valpolicella Classico Superiore)
properties.address: Via Crosetta, 8, 37024 Negrar di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Thin, informal and packed tight with crisp wild berry flavors, this bright Valpolicella will slice through fatty or cheesy dishes. In the mouth, it shows an easy, no-fuss approach with a citrus twist on the fade.

properties.title: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo 2009 Colheita Red (Douro)
properties.winery: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo
properties.address: Covas do Douro, 5085-222, Portugal
properties.descrption: An attractive, fruity, unoaked wine. It reveals red berry fruits, light acidity and a fine, firm tannic concentration. To drink now.
