properties.title: Ochoa 2008 Garnacha-Tempranillo Red (Navarra)
properties.address: C. de Miranda de Arga, 35, 31390 Olite, Navarra, Spain
properties.descrption: Hefty and rubbery on the bouquet, with black-fruit aromas and some dustiness. The palate is fresh feeling, with full acidity and a mildly stretched set of lively berry and roasted flavors. Comes up a bit short and hollow on the finish, but good all totaled.

properties.title: Perception 2007 Bacigalupi Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6514 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.descrption: Starts with a funky smell that doesn't go away despite lots of airing. Underneath that is a very dry, very tannic and deeply flavored Zinfandel, rich in berries, cola and spices. That barnyardy smell is troubling.

properties.title: Georges Vigouroux 2010 Pigmentum Merlot-Malbec (Buzet)
properties.address: Route de Toulouse CS20159 Cahors Cedex 9, 46003 Cahors, France
properties.descrption: Using fruit sourced from a small appellation to the west of Cahors and east of Bergerac, this blend of Merlot and Malbec shows a light, approachable character. It's full of red berry fruit, with sweet tannins and juicy acids on the finish.

properties.title: Wine Guerrilla 2010 Mounts Vineyard Cypress Block Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 6671 Front St, Forestville, CA 95436, USA
properties.descrption: High alcohol gives this Zin some jalapeño-like heat. It shows classically ripe Dry Creek flavors of briary, brambly blackberry, raisin and chocolate. It will age, gradually losing fresh fruit and turning more leathery.

properties.title: Oveja Negra 2010 Single Vineyard Carignan (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Av. Diego Portales 2372, Arica, Arica y Parinacota, Chile
properties.descrption: Graphite, blackberry, cassis and toast aromas define the bouquet on this hard-smacking, wide-bodied Carignan. The flavor profile is dominated by rugged flavors, and the mouthfeel is bouncy. Loud on the finish at first, and then things go quiet.

properties.title: Pessagno 2010 Idyll Times Syrah (San Benito County)
properties.address: 1645 River Rd, Salinas, CA 93908, USA
properties.descrption: This treads the line between slightly rustic and refined. The tannins are sandpapery, and it has lots of zingy acidity, making the wine feel a little rough. But the core of blackberry fruit is rich and dynamic. Probably not an ager, so give it a good decanting, and drink it over the next 2–3 years.

properties.title: Santa Alicia 2009 Gran Reserva de Los Andes Merlot (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Circunvalación Máximo Valdés 4135, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: This is dry, spicy and subdued on the bouquet, with a red berry aroma leading the charge. Focused and fresh on the palate, it has spicy, mildly oaky flavors of toasty berry fruit. Pinches of pepper and chocolate add weight and darkness to the finish.

properties.title: Sikelia 2010 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Monastero snc Scauri TP, 91017 Pantelleria TP, Italy
properties.descrption: Juicy and ripe, this opens with black fruit and prune notes, followed by soft tannins and a chewy, rich mouthfeel. Pair it with roasted meats with buttery baked potatoes.

properties.title: Spindrift Cellars 2011 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 810 Applegate St, Philomath, OR 97370, USA
properties.descrption: This offers light berry and melon flavors, with a tart, slightly peppery bite. Good texture and overall balance make this a pleasant quaffer.

properties.title: Abacela 2009 Malbec (Southern Oregon)
properties.address: 12500 Lookingglass Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.descrption: Tight and tannic, with an herbal edge, this stiff and rather unyielding wine remains a bit puzzling. Hints of cranberry, mulberry and blueberry are somewhat overtaken by herbal, earthy notes.

properties.title: Antica Enotria 2010 Negroamaro (Puglia)
properties.address: SP65, 71042 Cerignola FG, Italy
properties.descrption: Organically farmed Negroamaro delivers savory tones of ripe fruit, dried currant and leather. The mouthfeel is lean and streamlined with pretty, but very delicate, nuances of wet earth and spice.

properties.title: Cambria 2010 Mastronicola Nocera Red (Sicilia)
properties.address: 5475 Chardonnay Ln, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: This opens with savory spice, leather, cured meat and tobacco notes. There isn't much fresh fruit found, but there is a pretty aromas of cassis. Drink now.

properties.title: Château la Roque de By 2010  Médoc
properties.address: 5 Tour de By, 33340 Bégadan, France
properties.descrption: A 50-50 blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, this smoky wine has a flavor of black currant juice and a lean, firmly tannic texture. It needs several years to mature.

properties.title: Château Thénac 2009 Fleur du Périgord Red (Bergerac)
properties.address: Le Bourg, 24240 Thénac, France
properties.descrption: Ripe plum and blackberry fruits push this wine forward, with firm tannins and smokiness. Full and juicy in feel, this is a fruity wine that is immediately accessible and friendly. It's a wine that will age over the medium term.

properties.title: Cheval Quancard 2010 Réserve  (Bordeaux)
properties.address: La Mouline, 4 Rue du Carbouney, 33560 Carbon-Blanc, France
properties.descrption: Smoky and structured, this is a wine that has both firm tannins and balanced, juicy fruits. It's a fine wine to drink now, especially with rich meats, and it can age for a year or two.

properties.title: Cusumano 2011 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: 432 S Main St, Old Forge, PA 18518, USA
properties.descrption: There's a hint of ripe fruit here that recalls strawberry or raspberry. The palate is clean, round and soft, and the finish lacks the burnt almond note this grape sometimes offers.

properties.title: Cusumano 2011 Syrah (Sicilia)
properties.descrption: Plump and meaty, this opens with dark aromas of blackberry, spice, crushed pepper and bresaola. This would drink well at informal occasions with family and friends.

properties.title: Duca di Salaparuta 2009 Triskelè Red (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Nazionale s.s. 113, 27, 90014 Casteldaccia PA, Italy
properties.descrption: This blend of Nero d'Avola and Merlot shows a black-cherry note backed by toasted nut and leather accents. It feels tight and fresh, with an easy, crisp finish.

properties.title: Duca di Salaparuta 2009 Vajasindi Nawàri Pinot Nero (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Nazionale s.s. 113, 27, 90014 Casteldaccia PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Bright garnet in color, this delicate wine has aromas of cassis, sour cherry and violet, plus a drying touch of mineral. The mouthfeel is lean, fresh and sharp.

properties.title: Fenestra 2008 Ghielmetti Vineyard Petit Verdot (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 83 Vallecitos Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: This wine opens with spicy cinnamon and clove aromas before diving into soft, dark fruit, mellowed tannins and oak. It's brooding and zippy at the same time, and on the balanced finish, it's all mocha.

properties.title: a-non-ah-mus 2009 Alisos Vineyard Grenache (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 23837 US-385, Hill City, SD 57745, USA
properties.descrption: This has notes of raspberries, cherries and whipped cream. It's addictively drinkable, showing none of the problems Grenache so often encounters. Enjoy it now for its fresh, irrepressible appeal.

properties.title: Cantina Zaccagnini 2008 Chronicon  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: Contrada Pozzo, 4, 65020 Bolognano PE, Italy
properties.descrption: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo wines are making steady gains in popularity in foreign markets thanks to the softness and the creaminess of their fruit flavors. This one has soft and yielding tannins, with aromas that are intensely redolent of black cherry, coffee and tobacco.

properties.title: Ànima Negra 2009 ÀN/2 Red (Vi de la Terra Mallorca)
properties.address: Carrer son Negre, 23, 07200 Felanitx, Illes Balears, Spain
properties.descrption: This is a unique wine from Mallorca with light cherry and raspberry aromas. Clampy, dry and tannic on the palate, it's full of savory, roasted barbecue flavors along with tomato and red fruit notes. Very Mallorcan in that it's salty and savory from start to finish.

properties.title: Benincasa 2007  Montefalco Rosso
properties.address: Vocabolo Capro, 23, 06031 Bevagna PG, Italy
properties.descrption: There's a touch of dark spice and cured meat at the start that is followed by fruitier notes of blackberry and plum. This shows smooth tannins and nice richness, making it a good pairing partner to potato gnocchi with gorgonzola cheese sauce.

properties.title: Rex Hill 2009 Roserock Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 30835 OR-99W, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: The fruit carries a pleasing sweetness onto the herb-flavored midpalate. Then aggressive flavors of stem and grape skin emerge, though perhaps they're too dominant.

properties.title: Tenuta Castelbuono 2006  Montefalco Sagrantino
properties.address: Vocabolo Castellaccio, 9, 06031 Bevagna PG, Italy
properties.descrption: This Sagrantino by the relatively new brand Tenuta Castelbuono (owned by the same family that runs Ferrari sparkling wine) opens with savory notes of cured meat, blackberry and tobacco. It feels rich and spicy on the finish.

properties.title: Troon 2008 Reserve Syrah (Applegate Valley)
properties.address: 1475 Kubli Rd, Grants Pass, OR 97527, USA
properties.descrption: A whiff of leather introduces this tight, interesting, southern Oregon Syrah. Black fruits, iron filings, and smooth tannins mark a wine made from grapes that were carefully selected (just three rows of vines) and given special consideration by winemaker Herb Quady.

properties.title: I Giusti e Zanza 2009 Nemorino Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Via dei Puntoni, 9, 56043 Fauglia PI, Italy
properties.descrption: Dark in color and slightly bashful at first, this blend of Syrah, Sangiovese and Merlot shows strength in its solid structure, with bright aromas of red cherry, blackberry, leather and cured meat. It would pair perfectly with stewed game meat, like wild boar.

properties.title: José Maria da Fonseca 2010 José de Sousa Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: R. José Augusto Coelho 12a, 2925-538 Azeitão, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is an earthy wine that packs ripe fruit with structure and acidity. There is a juicy character from the red berry flavor that is given shape by the underlying tannins.

properties.title: Wattle Creek 2009 Malbec (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: Tastings at DeLoach Vineyards, 1791 Olivet Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: A dry, gritty red wine, lusty and tannic. The blackberry, cassis liqueur and smoky oak flavors suggest pairing with charred steak.

properties.title: Witness Tree 2010 Vintage Select Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 7111 Spring Valley Rd NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.descrption: Though it was given twice as many new French oak barrels as the Estate bottling, this Vintage Select could be its twin. Solid and balanced, it mixes berry, herb and earth components, making for a well-structured, no-frills wine.

properties.title: Château Patache d'Aux 2011  Médoc
properties.address: 1, rue du 19 Mars 1962, 33340 Bégadan, France
properties.descrption: Named after the stagecoaches that used to travel through the Médoc, this château has produced an attractive, fruity wine in 2011. It has some tannins and firm wood-aging flavors, while the fruit is light and fresh. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Cordella 2009  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Podere Meleto, 27,, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas include black berries, coffee, espresso and grilled Mediterranean herbs. The one-dimensional palate lacks the essential fruit richness needed to support the bracing, astringent tannins that give a drying, bitter character. It also displays evident alcohol sensations despite the modest alcohol.

properties.title: David Girard 2010 Estate Vineyard Mourvèdre (El Dorado)
properties.address: 741 Cold Springs Rd, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: Oaky and earthy, this estate Mourvèdre is on the savory side of things, ripe in stewed plums, tobacco and black pepper, linear and soft. Barrel-aged for a year in French oak, 20% of it new, the wine's oak imprint should continue to mellow with time.

properties.title: Elsom Cellars 2008 Isabella Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2960 4th Ave S #114, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.descrption: The prune and raisin scents and flavors suggest that some of these grapes were picked past optimal ripeness. For those who favor an almost Port-like style, this Bordeaux-style blend will hit the mark. The finish suggests figs lightly splashed with balsamic vinegar.

properties.title: Girasole 2011 Pinot Noir (Mendocino)
properties.address: 7051 N State St, Redwood Valley, CA 95470, USA
properties.descrption: Earthy and herbal, this inexpensive Pinot offers faint cherry tones and a structured, juicy midpalate. The wine's pronounced tannins take center stage on the finish.

properties.title: Sannino 2010 Prima Rossa Red (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.descrption: Brambly red berry and sour cherry notes are fleshy and ripe in this brawny, full-bodied Bordeaux-style blend. It's unabashedly primary in style with soft, plushy texture. Finishes with a bit of heat.

properties.title: Bonacchi 2009 Molino della Suga  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Via Collimozzi, 26, 51039 Quarrata PT, Italy
properties.descrption: In this one-dimensional wine, short-lived sensations of stewed black fruit quickly give way to acrid notes of unsweetened espresso, farmyard, sweat and green coffee beans alongside rough, grainy tannins. A bitterly tannic close leaves the tongue feeling parched.

properties.title: Parducci 2010 Small Lot Blend Petite Sirah (Mendocino County)
properties.address: 501 Parducci Rd, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.descrption: A good-value Petite Sirah that's straightforward in texture and personality. Its blueberry fruit lurks shyly in the background and there's a send-off of sturdy tannin on the finish.

properties.title: Patterson 2011 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This very light, thin Merlot shows modestly ripe fruit and fairly substantial tannins, perhaps from the addition of 16% Petit Verdot. Flavors are herbal and the finish fades quickly.

properties.title: Riverbend 2007 Estate Bottled Syrah (Humboldt County)
properties.address: 10439 33rd Ave, Chippewa Falls, WI 54729, USA
properties.descrption: This older vintage Syrah still has some fruit but otherwise shows drying tannins and leathery smoke.

properties.title: Château d'Escurac 2011  Médoc
properties.address: Rte d'Escurac, 33340 Civrac-en-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: This is a stalky, black currant and spice flavored wine. It has relatively soft tannins while showing a meaty, juicy character. The wine is for medium-term aging, so drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château Léo de Prades 2011  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: 2 Rue du Médoc, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: An attractive, if lightweight, wine that has good acidity and red berry fruits. It is a medium-term wine, fresh and developing quickly.

properties.title: Château Roullet 2010  Canon-Fronsac
properties.address: 8555 Sonoma Hwy, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: This is an enormous wine, maybe too much. With its layers of rich black fruits and dark tannins, it is a powerful, juicy, jammy and super-ripe wine. It all seems excessive and out of balance. It's fun for a moment, but not for drinking with food.

properties.title: Château Tour Prignac 2011  Médoc
properties.address: Château Tour Prignac, 33340 Blaignan-Prignac, France
properties.descrption: With layers of new wood and spice flavors, this wine is highly structured without much fruit to balance. It will develop into a dry, firm wine, showing light black fruit flavors surrounded by textured tannins.

properties.title: Naches Heights 2010 Naches Heights Vineyard Syrah (Naches Heights)
properties.address: 1857 Weikel Rd, Yakima, WA 98908, USA
properties.descrption: An aromatically interesting wine with notes of cherry, cedar and nori. The palate is flavorful with dry, rustic tannins.

properties.title: Oak Valley 2005 The Oak Valley Blend Red (Elgin)
properties.address: 127 Oak Ave, Grabouw, 7180, South Africa
properties.descrption: Spiced meat, tomato leaf and stemmy black fruit overwhelm this wine, which might unfortunately be a bit past its prime. 69% Merlot, 27% Cabernet Franc and 4% Cabernet Sauvignon.

properties.title: Emiliana 2009 Natura Merlot (Rapel Valley)
properties.address: RUTA 68 Y RUTA F-870 Casablanca, Valparaíso, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Fairly hard on the nose, with a hint of plastic and then raspberry and plum aromas rising as it settles. The palate shows decent zest and body along with narrow flavors of berry and pepper. Finishes with mild intensity and a note of saline.

properties.title: A.S. Kiken 2008 Red (Diamond Mountain District)
properties.address: 264 N Fork Crystal Springs Rd, Deer Park, CA 94576, USA
properties.descrption: Some awkward flavors and textures in this dry, tannic wine. Polished blackberries and cherries co-exist beside less ripe mint, and the tannins and acids are sharp and green. Seems like problems at the sorting table.

properties.title: Amalie Robert 2008 Vintage Debut Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 13531 Bursell Rd, Dallas, OR 97338, USA
properties.descrption: Light and delicate, this “Vintage Debut” Pinot Noir skates along a pretty thin edge. Light hints of strawberry and cherry blossom lead into a pale wine with plenty of acidity. But despite the acclaimed vintage, this is pretty thin stuff.

properties.title: Barton & Guestier 2008 Les Charmes de Magnol  (Médoc)
properties.descrption: Confusingly, the wine has no connection with Château Magnol, also owned by Barton & Guestier. It's a soft Médoc wine, light and gentle in character, the tannins soft, merging with the red berry fruits.

properties.title: Barton & Guestier 2008  Médoc
properties.address: 6161 S Yale Ave, Tulsa, OK 74136, USA
properties.descrption: Tight wine, its black currant flavors layered with dry tannins. It's finely structured, although the stalky element tends to dominate. Not for aging.

properties.title: Château Pimpine 2005  Bordeaux Côtes de Francs
properties.address: 11 Rue la Fontaine, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: #N/A

properties.title: Château Saint-Michel 2008  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 14111 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Close to Fronsac, this is a Merlot-dominated wine that has soft, ripe fruit. It shows sweetness and open berry flavors touched by chocolate and licorice. To be   opened over the next 2–3 years.

properties.title: Drei Donà Tenuta La Palazza 2009 Rosenere Red (Forlì)
properties.address: Via del Tesoro, 23, 47121 Massa di Vecchiazzano, FC, Italy
properties.descrption: This easy food wine (a blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon) offers aromas of wild berry and white almond. There's a nice balance between crispness and a touch of sweetness on the close.

properties.title: Baldassari Family Wines 2007 Nolan Vineyards Syrah (Bennett Valley)
properties.address: 9058 Windsor Rd, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: Soft, sweet in jammy raspberry and cherry fruit and caramelized oak, this Syrah is somewhat simple. It's good, but would benefit from greater structure.

properties.title: Barton & Guestier 2007 Thomas Barton Réserve  (Margaux)
properties.descrption: A wine that offers plenty of the charm of Margaux, with its soft tannins, layers of chocolate, smooth texture and juicy fruit. The wood at this stage is prominent, and needs to settle down.

properties.title: Borra 2008 47.5 Degree Limited Release Syrah Syrah (Clements Hills)
properties.address: 1301 Armstrong Rd, Lodi, CA 95242, USA
properties.descrption: Jammy and yet still savory, a fairly straightforward Syrah from the Clements Hills area of Lodi, small production (240 cases), 100% varietal and made using native fermentation, the wine has solid tannin structure and a heady texture, but could use more oomph on the finish.

properties.title: Botalcura 2006 Cayao Red (Central Valley)
properties.address: K-260, Botalcura, Pencahue, Maule, Chile
properties.descrption: Rather hard and baked on the nose, with a heavy helping of char and molasses. The palate is angular and tannic, while the flavors revolve around lemony oak and spice more than fruit. Spiky on the finish and sharp-edged as a whole. A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Carmenère, Malbec and Syrah.

properties.title: Carol Shelton 2008 Monga Zin, Lopez Vineyard Zinfandel (Cucamonga Valley)
properties.address: 3354-B, Coffey Ln, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.descrption: Not a ton of fruit on the nose but a respectable single-vineyard from Zin master Carol Shelton made from organically grown, dry-farmed 92-year-old vines, coaxed into a spicy, brambly wine from a very unusual appellation.

properties.title: Château Monroze 2008  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 4045 St Helena Hwy, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: A soft, open wine, kept together by its dry tannins. Good black fruits, fresh acidity and an attractive smoky character.

properties.title: Chilensis 2009 Reserva Malbec (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Av Vitacura 4380, Vitacura, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Purple in color, with grapey aromas that lack complexity. The palate is deep and dense but edgy, with sugary flavors of candied black plum and black cherry. Finishes sweet like burnt brown sugar, with some coffee and anisette. Syrupy but generous.

properties.title: Donelan 2008 Cuvée Moriah Grenache-Syrah (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 3352 Coffey Ln STE D, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.descrption: Not in the same league as Donelan's Syrahs. The Grenache seems to drag it down. It's paler in color, there's a vegetal smell, and it's simple in berry, cola and spice flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Bodegas Valdemar 2003 Inspiración Edición Limitada  (Rioja)
properties.address: Calle Camino Viejo Logroño, 24, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: The palate is big and cushioned, but the flavors are green, stewy and herbal. With carob and some veggies on the finish, there isn't convincing ripeness to this wine.

properties.title: Campo Viejo 2003 Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Cam. de Lapuebla de Labarca, 50, 26007 Logroño, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Strawberry, red plum and a strong hint of tomato leaf work the nose, followed by tangy raspberry flavors and a wash of acidity. Seems sort of scratchy and edgy, with a hard, dry peppery quality.

properties.title: Château Saint-Sulpice 2005  Bordeaux
properties.address: 418 Guillemin, 33450 Saint-Sulpice-et-Cameyrac, France
properties.descrption: There's earthy, fleshy aromas on this wine that has acidity, red fruits and soft tannins. The rough edge of rusticity is not far away, though, spoiling the fresh fruits.

properties.title: Rocca 2004 Syrah (Yountville)
properties.address: 129 Devlin Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: After a string of successful vintages, this wine has an oven-baked fruit taste, like blackberry and cherry pie-filling that burbled out from the crust and got caramelized.

properties.title: Bodegas Julián Chivite 2004 Gran Feudo Crianza Red (Navarra)
properties.address: NA-132, Km. 3,1, 31132 Villatuerta, Navarra, Spain
properties.descrption: Tightly wound and acidic, with forceful red-berry flavors that are spicy and zesty. Finishes a little on the raw side, with cranberry notes and a hard crescendo. Tempranillo with Garnacha and Cabernet.

properties.title: Bodegas Monte La Reina 2005 Torcanto Roble  (Toro)
properties.address: Carretera, N-122, Km 436, 7, 49881 Monte la Reina, Zamora, Spain
properties.descrption: Roble means “oak” in Spanish, and oaky it is. The nose is creamy and candied, while the palate is soft, sticky and mixes raspberry with butter-like flavors. When people say they don't want too much oak on their basic wines, this is what they mean.

properties.title: Hemar 2006 Joven  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: C. de la Iglesia, 48, 09315 Fuentecén, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: Condensed up front, with aromas of berry compote and molasses. So why is this so tangy and tart in the mouth? Maybe the grapes weren't as ripe as they seem from the nose, and in the end it fails the all-important balance/wholesomeness test.

properties.title: Bodegas Valdemar 2006 Esencia Valdemar  (Rioja)
properties.address: Calle Camino Viejo Logroño, 24, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Gumball aromas yield to scents of spice and wet animal fur, while the flavor profile settles on tart and thin, with a watery mouthfeel. This is a lean, funky wine that doesn't have a whole lot of Rioja character.

properties.title: Château du Bousquet 2005  Côtes de Bourg
properties.address: Lieu-dit, Bousquet, 33710 Bourg, France
properties.descrption: Rustic, barnyard aromas with flavors of hedgerow red berries and light acidity. The style is fruity; the sweet fruits are shot through with some licorice and beetroot flavors.

properties.title: Morandé 2008 Edición Limitada Carignan (Loncomilla Valley)
properties.address: Rosario Nte 615, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Edgy plum and berry aromas come with an herb accent, a spice note and a flower element. It comes across high in acidity, with shearing plum and cherry flavors that end with a feeling of citric acid. It's crisp and intense, but also tight as nails.

properties.title: Pheasant Valley Winery 2009 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (OR))
properties.descrption: Rustic and full bodied, this Oregon Primitivo is plenty ripe, yet it retains nuances of olive and herb, along with thick red fruit. A whisper of smoke weaves through the finish.

properties.title: Quevedo 2010 Oscar's Tinto Red (Douro)
properties.address: R. de Santa M.nha 77, 4400-291 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: Oscar Quevedo is one member of a new generation of winemakers bringing a breath of fresh air to the Douro. His everyday wines, like this one, are friendly, fruity and delicious when consumed young. This is a great wine for barbecue.

properties.title: Lava Cap 2009 Merlot (El Dorado)
properties.address: 2221 Fruitridge Rd, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: This is unmistakably a mountain-grown Merlot, hefty with dark fruit and layers of baking spice. Concentrated and ready to age another 5–7 years, it has a long and leathery finish.

properties.title: Alexander Valley Vineyards 2010 Cabernet Franc (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 8644 CA-128, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Soft, juicy and uncomplicated, this Cab Franc immediately offers likeable cherry and sweet oak flavors. The tannins beg for steak.

properties.title: Bella Piazza 2009 Montepulciano (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
properties.descrption: This roasted and rustically pleasing Montepulciano, which is hard to find in California, has dry tannins, a layer of boysenberry and a leathery mouthfeel. Pair it with roasted chicken or rich risotto.

properties.title: Cantine Benedetti 2008 Corte Antica  (Recioto della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Loc. La Polzella, 06036 Montefalco PG, Italy
properties.descrption: A touch of apple skin immediately appears on the bouquet of this wine, giving this hearty selection a bright, sharp quality. The apple tone is followed by notes of dark chocolate and espresso bean.

properties.title: Tormaresca 2008 Trentangeli Red (Castel del Monte)
properties.address: S. Provinciale 86 Per Torre San Gennaro, 72027 San Pietro Vernotico BR, Italy
properties.descrption: Made principally from organically-farmed Aglianico grapes, this delivers steady aromas of ripe fruit, prune, tobacco and cured meat. The mouthfeel is lean, bright and slightly bitter.

properties.title: Quinta do Quetzal 2008 Guadalupe Tinto Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Estrada das Sesmarias, 7960-909 Vila de Frades, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is an oak-aged wine full of ripe red-plum and highly toasted wood flavors. The two do not yet completely harmonize, with the burnt wood still dominating the fruit. Another year should do the trick.

properties.title: Quinta do Quetzal 2010 Guadalupe Tinto Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Estrada das Sesmarias, 7960-909 Vila de Frades, Portugal
properties.descrption: Firm and obviously wood aged, this has a red plum flavor and some bitterness from the highly toasted wood. It has richness and spice; aging may soften the wood character.

properties.title: L'Atzar 2012 Red (Priorat)
properties.descrption: Initially this smells green and candied, with overripe and underripe aromas. The palate is chunky and bulky, while flavors of black fruits and green herbs finish grassy, with notes of oregano and tarragon. Overall this is heavy, extracted, sweet and sticky.

properties.title: Mazzocco 2011 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 1400 Lytton Springs Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This intense, slightly sour Zinfandel combines herbal/menthol aromas with a taste of vanilla-toasted marshmallow, the fruit jammy and minty.

properties.title: Golan Heights Winery 2009 Yarden T2 Touriga Nacional-Tinta Cao Red (Galilee)
properties.address: התירוש 4, קצרין
properties.descrption: If blackberry preserves and black licorice were made into a wine, this would be it. While Yarden's T2 dry blend of Touriga Nacional and Tinta Cao is a very good wine, this sweet Port-style wine misses the mark. With a nose of blackberry preserves, cassis and rose petal—and flavors of blackberry, cassis, licorice and clove—it should be gorgeous in the mouth. However, the overall sweetness is cloying without necessary balance.

properties.title: Vin du Lac 2010 Barrel Select Cabernet Franc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 105 WA-150, Chelan, WA 98816, USA
properties.descrption: There is no varietal specificity to be found in this 100% Cabernet Franc. A wine labeled Barrel Select brings certain expectations, which this fails to meet. It's thin and herbal, with stemmy tannins and only a bare suggestion of black cherry fruit.

properties.title: Samson 2012 Merlot (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 1861 Van Dyk Rd, Everson, WA 98247, USA
properties.descrption: There's a hard edge to the mocha, herb and cherry aromas. The palate has blocky, dry tannins that distract.

properties.title: Godelia 2012 Viernes Mencía (Bierzo)
properties.address: Calle Antigua Ctra. N-VI, 5, 24547 Pieros, León, Spain
properties.descrption: Jumpy, young aromas of wet dog, plum, cherry and beet root set up a racy, high-acid palate. This tastes like medicinal raspberry and red plum, while the finish is light, scouring and fresh, with no oak character.

properties.title: Cruz de Piedra 2013 Garnacha (Calatayud)
properties.address: Carretera Coín-Marbella, km 1.5, 29100, Málaga, Spain
properties.descrption: Funky aromas of animal fur and lively berry are not that inviting. In the mouth, this has a narrow feel and high acidity. Herbal, tart flavors of plum and red currant are almost sour, while the finish is on the green and herbal side.

properties.title: Bodegas Ateca 2012 Honoro Vera Garnacha (Calatayud)
properties.address: Av. San Blas, 41, 50200 Ateca, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Tarry, stalky aromas fail to make much of a statement. This is high in acid and rugged in the mouth, with a mixture of herbal red-fruit flavors and distinct stalkiness. A grating finish is racy and hot.

properties.title: Bodegas Reyes 2011 Tamiz  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Av. Valladolid Soria, 54, 47300 Peñafiel, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Animal hide and roasted, stalky aromas bring overall quality into question. This feels raw, choppy and drawing, while flavors of stalky berry fruits are leathery and roasted. Hard tannins and green notes influence the finish.

properties.title: Vin du Lac 2011 Red Café Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 105 WA-150, Chelan, WA 98816, USA
properties.descrption: Dilute red fruits and a tomato paste flavor are the story here, with no varietal character. Some earthy, roasted barrel flavors come up but are not well-integrated.

properties.title: Savannah-Chanelle 2010 Estate Cabernet Franc (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 23600 Congress Springs Rd, Saratoga, CA 95070, USA
properties.descrption: Pipe tobacco, raspberry reduction and a sweet sagebrush character promise an interesting experience. Once sipped, the overwhelmingly sweet cherry, cough-syrup flavor pushes this wine beyond a dry, and the typical Cabernet Franc herbs that emerge in the midpalate don't overwhelm its cloying nature. Good for dessert, by itself.

properties.title: Cave B 2013 Dry Rosé Merlot (Ancient Lakes)
properties.address: 348 Silica Rd NW, Quincy, WA 98848, USA
properties.descrption: Notes of rhubarb and cherry don't stitch together. It drinks just off dry with a tart finish.

properties.title: Idrias 2007 Sevil Red (Somontano)
properties.address: Ctra. de Abiego 1229, Km 0.2, 22124 Lascellas, Huesca, Spain
properties.descrption: Stony minerality blends with raisin, leather and leafy berry aromas. This offers cheek-stanching citric acidity but not enough body to absorb it. Flavors of herbal red plum are choppy and turn gritty and fiery on the finish.

properties.title: Hawley 2015 Ponzo Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6387 W Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Thick and rich with tobacco and dark chocolate notes, this vineyard-designated wine shows a generous helping of brambly black fruit, its midpalate baring the teeth of sharp tannin and smoky oak. It finishes soft and contained.

properties.title: Grandes Vinos y Viñedos 2013 Anayón Cariñena (Cariñena)
properties.descrption: This rock-solid Carignan feels raw and snappy. Its ripe cassis, prune and vanilla aromas are heady but not overtly oaky. Lightly herbal plum and black cherry flavors finish dry and tannic, with a cool-vintage sense of freshness.

properties.title: Ramey 2015 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 25 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced from Bucher Vineyard on Westside Road and Platt Vineyard in the Sonoma Coast, this wine is light-bodied and fresh on the palate, offering baked raspberry, cardamom, clove and forest flavors.

properties.title: St. Francis 2014 Claret Red (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: This old-school blend of Merlot, Malbec and Cabernet Sauvignon shows ample body and flavor in its unfussy approach to succulent red fruit and subdued tannin. Moderate in build, it has dusty acidity and a soft finish that will please a wide range of palates.

properties.title: Sutro 2013 Warnecke Ranch Merlot (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 13301 Chalk Hill Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Black cherry flavor stars in this full-bodied, brawny and expressive red that's thick with jammy fruit and interwoven tannins and oak.

properties.title: Tower 15 2015 Dornfelder (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 19925 Hogback Mountain Rd, Leesburg, VA 20175, USA
properties.descrption: The Huber Vineyard is one of the few places where this grape grows in America, and the wine is always fascinating. Extremely dark in color, it offers unctuous black currant, graphite and licorice aromas. The palate combines mouth-coating tannins with a surprisingly light, acid-driven frame, showing woody elderberry flavors and the grape's telltale minty lift. Not extremely complex, but a fun and different sipper.

properties.title: Alma Rosa 2014 Mt. Eden Clone El Jabali Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1623 Mission Dr, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.descrption: Earthy iron, game and thyme aromas decorate the core of pomegranate fruit in this California heritage clonal selection from the Sanford family's home vineyard. Dark raspberry notes follow its firm line of acidity, framed by a grippy tannic texture despite its light body. Drink 2018–2024.

properties.title: Casa da Passarella 2014 Tinto Red (Dão)
properties.address: R. Santo Amaro 3, 6290-093 Gouveia, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a richly structured wine. With its juicy red fruits and generous structure, it is delicious now. Berry flavors and acidity go with the mineral edge of the texture to create a wine that is packed with acidity, tannins and fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Chehalem 2014 Ridgecrest Vineyards Reserve Pinot Noir (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.address: 31190 NE Veritas Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: Flavors roll from cranberry to sweet red cherry in a red-fruit riot. It was aged in 52% new and 24% one-year-old oak, but it's unobtrusive and not especially toasty. The barrel time has begun to smooth out any bumps and rough edges, though a touch of phenolic bite remains. Drink from 2018 to 2022.

properties.title: Cloak & Dagger 2013 The Assassin Cabernet Sauvignon-Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 488 Wellington St W, Toronto, ON M5V 1E9, Canada
properties.descrption: Plump black raspberry and blackberry notes mix with vanilla and baked licorice on the fruit-driven nose of this blend of 67% Cabernet Sauvignon and 33% Syrah. The tannic tension and strong acidity of the palate overwhelms the flavors at first, eventually revealing dark purple fruit and a vanilla-laced finish.

properties.title: Clos du Val 2015 Gran Val Vineyard Estate Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.descrption: Made in a full-bodied and fleshy style, this comes from an estate vineyard long owned by the producer. Cloudy, with a distinct fresh cherry aroma, it opens with leathery tannins and pronounced oak notes before its bright, citrus-like acidity settles in.

properties.title: Darcie Kent Vineyards 2012 Pinot Noir (Monterey)
properties.address: 7000 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: A delicate but earthy nose shows aromas of hibiscus, pencil lead, sagebrush and bay leaf. The palate packs a bright vibrancy, showing flavors of tart cranberry, crushed black pepper, clove, more sagebrush and juniper. This is action-packed but lightly framed.

properties.title: Bueyes 2012 Malbec (Uco Valley)
properties.address: 4200 Park Blvd, Oakland, CA 94602, USA
properties.descrption: Aromatics of raisin and earthy tobacco breathe complexities as this airs out. A balanced but ripe and mouthfilling palate holds deep flavors of blackberry and cassis. Loamy berry, fig and chocolate flavors provide pleasure on the finish. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Thorn Clarke 2013 Shotfire Cabernet Sauvignon-Shiraz (Barossa)
properties.address: Thorn-Clarke Wines, Gawler Park Rd, Angaston SA 5353, Australia
properties.descrption: Firmly tannic, this is the rare example of a lower-priced wine that deserves some time in the cellar. There's a sense of coolness and restraint to this wine at first. Hints of menthol lift scents of mixed berries, then develop on the palate into sturdy, chewy fruit flavors and mocha. Drink 2018–2030.

properties.title: Alvarez de Toledo 2013 Roble Mencía (Bierzo)
properties.address: Pol. Ind. del Bierzo, Pl. Industria Toral-, 8, 24560 Toral de los Vados, León, Spain
properties.descrption: Ripe plum and violet aromas carry a slight note of prune. A beefy palate shows hard tannins but nothing too tough that food can't tame. Blackened, roasted blackberry and blueberry flavors finish with charred, meaty intensity. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Arbor Brook 2013 Estate 777 Block Pinot Noir (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.address: 17770 NE Calkins Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: Produced from a single clone—Dijon 777—this offers pretty, fragrant raspberry scents and flavors. It's just rounded out enough for ready drinking. A fairly light wine, it fades gently with a saline minerality.

properties.title: Aubichon Cellars 2013 Reserve Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 1326 N, OR-99W, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: This has well-integrated herb and stem components around spicy red fruits. It punches through into a tight, well-built finish, with smooth, clean tannins. Another couple of years in bottle may help to fill it out.

properties.title: Castello di Amorosa 2013 Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.descrption: Generous, fully ripe fruit flavors and an easy, melting texture make this wine easy to sink into. While it's full bodied, every sip delivers lively acidity and supportive tannins to give an appetizing grip and help the flavors continue through the finish.

properties.title: Yatir 2010 Syrah (Judean Hills)
properties.address: Yatir Forest, Israel
properties.descrption: Dark ruby in the glass, this wine offers a fruit-laden bouquet of blueberry and raspberry. It is bright in the mouth, and firm tannins allow flavors of black cherry, blueberry, cassis, clove, anise, violet and chocolate to shine on the palate. The bright finish is marked by lingering notes of violet and clove.

properties.title: Hirsch 2012 East Ridge Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 57 Front St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Complex and fascinating aromas suggesting cranberry, cedar and mushroom get your attention right away. Next a tight, firmly tannic texture takes over and seems to hold on to the fruit flavors. The wine is light to medium in body, and seems likely to let its flavors out after 2019.

properties.title: Dobbes Family Estate 2012 Fortmiller Vineyard Syrah (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 240 SE 5th St, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: This fascinating wine comes from one of Oregon's highest vineyards, which grow at 2,000 feet. Superdense and impenetrably black, the fruit is steely and detailed, the flavors of black raspberries defined with crystal clarity.

properties.title: Dona Maria-Júlio Bastos 2011 Amantis Reserva Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: Named after the mistress of Portugual's King João V who lived at this estate, the wine is a super-ripe expression of the warmth of an Alentejo wine. It is a powerful, structured although the tannins are surrounded by ripe berry and damson fruit flavors. It is ready to drink.

properties.title: Fitapreta 2013 Baga ao Sol Baga (Alentejano)
properties.address: Paço do Morgado de Oliveira, Estrada M527 km10, 7000-016 Évora, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is an unexpected wine, unoaked Baga in the Alentejo rather than its home territory of Bairrada. The result is a wine that certainly hasn't lost its fierce tannins while gaining a rich, full black fruit character. The typical acidity is there, again mitigated by the warmer climate away from the ocean. It's a surprisingly impressive wine to drink now.

properties.title: Cennatoio 1995 O'Leandro Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: via San Leolino, 35, 50022 Panzano In Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Tart berries, a touch of maple syrup and some orange peel on the nose open into a dry black-cherry palate and lean mouthfeel. Sharply austere.

properties.title: Nando 1998  Chianti Classico
properties.address: 1300 Fleet St, Baltimore, MD 21202, USA
properties.descrption: The nose offers a full, interesting blend of Oriental spice, cherry, ginger and soy elements. The flavors turn to tart cherry, and brisk, slightly drying tannins show on the finish.

properties.title: Tiziano 1999  Chianti
properties.descrption: Opens with a complex nose of cherry, plum, cocoa and leather elements that promise much. On the palate, however, it turns much more tart—even sharp—with mild cherry fruit and a light body. Finishes with modest length and a sour cranberry-herb note.

properties.title: Piccini 1997 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Loc. Piazzole, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: The red cherry fruit bears some mushroom notes among the cedar and clove accents, and there's a sense of hollowing-out that should not be evidenced at this age. It's light, showing some nice berry and spice flavors and a sweet woodiness. But it's too developed now for a 1997 riserva.

properties.title: Carmel 1999 Valley Wines Petite Sirah (Shomron)
properties.address: Derech HaYekev 2, Zihron Ya'akov, Israel
properties.descrption: Opens with solid grape and red-currant fruit accented by tobacco, but on the palate the wine is light for a Petite Sirah, usually a hefty wine. As the fruit is from very young vines, it's not a terrible surprise, and it's a positive sign that Israeli winemakers are stretching their horizons. Finishes tart-sweet, with red berry fruit and a hint of licorice.

properties.title: Giacomo Mori 1998 Castelrotto  (Chianti)
properties.descrption: As much as we like the retro package, this time the contents are just too one-dimensional. The heavily toasted oak over the narrow fruit from the '98 vintage reads as just that—toast, with vanilla and coconut shadings. Dry powdery tannins mark the taut finish.

properties.title: Abarbanel 1999 Estate Bottled Syrah (Vin de Pays d'Oc)
properties.descrption: Bright cherry and cedary aromas open to a soft mouthfeel and tart blackberry flavors with black toast shadings. The dark flavors and light mouthfeel are a bit out of sync, as if the flavor range demands more weight on the palate. Tart black fruits show on the finish.

properties.title: Palmer 1997 Merlot (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.descrption: Strays too far into the kitchen-herb spectrum for this taster. Big and creamy, with a mocha finish that lingers, but the fresh-cut thyme, parsley and basil make for an eccentric mouthful.

properties.title: Vigna Piccola 1996  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Via Pier Francesco Mola 23B, 6877 Coldrerio, Switzerland
properties.descrption: Shows modest dark cherry fruit with cedar and leather accents. A lean, even mouthfeel and moderate acidity mark the palate. The tart dried-fruit flavors turn somewhat sour on the back end.

properties.title: Valiano 1995 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.descrption: Looking brown around the edges, this wine is showing decline at an age when a good riserva should be hitting full stride. The fruit is stylishly sweet, but attenuated, and past its best in this pretty, older wine. Fading elegance, but why at just past five years of age?

properties.title: Coli 1998  Chianti Classico
properties.address: 55054 Coli, Province of Lucca, Italy
properties.descrption: Light, with some sour cherry fruit on the nose and palate that's outweighed throughout by a dry, woodiness that enters early and persists.

properties.title: Castellare 1996 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.descrption: Shows unexpected age, with brown around the edges and mature prune and orange-peel aromas. The flavors are more alive, but are not vibrant. Rather dull on the finish, this isn't bad wine but tastes like something four or five years older.

properties.title: Channing Perrine 1999 Mudd Vineyard Fleur de Terre Merlot (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 1927 Scuttle Hole Rd, Bridgehampton, NY 11932, USA
properties.descrption: Bright red-berry aromas, decent weight and slightly tough tanins in the finish all point to this as a good partner to grilled burgers this summer.  100% Merlot.

properties.title: Castellani 1997 Riserva  (Chianti)
properties.address: Via del Popolo, 90, 56025 Santa Lucia PI, Italy
properties.descrption: The cherry aromas and flavors here already have an aged quality. Some nice spicy accents conspire to keep it alive, but it closes rather tart and woody. Doesn't show the depth expected in a riserva.

properties.title: Channing Daughters 1998 Sculpture Garden Merlot (Long Island)
properties.address: 1927 Scuttle Hole Rd, Bridgehampton, NY 11932, USA
properties.descrption: Offers mild berry fruit allied to some green bell pepper and herb aromas.  A bit light and tart fo a single vineyrd wine, but still good.

properties.title: Badia di Morrona 1998 I Sodi del Paretaio  (Chianti)
properties.address: Via del Chianti, 6, 56030 Terricciola PI, Italy
properties.descrption: There's some interesting game and slate accents on the nose here, but also a candied quality to the cherry fruit. The acidity is fairly high and the tannins tense and somewhat drying on the finish.

properties.title: Cantina del Nebbiolo 2013  Barolo
properties.address: Via Torino, 17, 12040 Vezza d'Alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Crushed mint, red berry and menthol aromas mix with an unusual scent suggesting paraffin. The aromas carry over to the straightforward linear palate together with sour cherry, thyme and clove alongside. Firm tannins and fresh acidity provide support.

properties.title: Cantina Terre del Barolo 2013  Barolo
properties.address: Via Alba Barolo, 8, 12060 Castiglione Falletto CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Rose petal, herb and camphor aromas are front and center. The full-bodied monolithic palate offers cranberry, morello cherry, star anise and the warmth of alcohol alongside solid tannins. It's big and rather straightforward for Barolo. Drink after 2023.

properties.title: Château de Lionne 2015 L'Envolée de Lionne  (Bordeaux)
properties.address: Lionne, 33720 Illats, France
properties.descrption: While there are plenty of wood flavors here, the wine also has fine ripe blackberries. That gives potential balance and density. This fine wine will be ready to drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château de Rouquette 2016  Bordeaux
properties.address: 1 La Rouquette, 33790 Pellegrue, France
properties.descrption: The wine has firm tannins and a dense texture that promises a good aging potential. Its ripe blackberry and black-plum fruits also show a solid wine with its richness and fine fruit. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Château du Roc 2014  Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: La grange, 11700 Montbrun-des-Corbières, France
properties.descrption: Produced in the hills above the small town of Castillon, the wine is fruity with a stalky texture and some firm tannins. It is balanced, though, with its acidity and black-currant flavors and should mature well over the next few years. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château la Verrière 2015  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 8 La Verrière, 33790 Landerrouat, France
properties.descrption: Rich and with good fruit, this is a structured wine that has the density to age well. The dark-chocolate flavors mingle with the black-plum fruits, finishing with just a light lift of acidity.

properties.title: Château le Grand Verdus 2015  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: Grand Verdus, 33670 Sadirac, France
properties.descrption: This is a bold fruity wine that just allows its tannins to build a supporting structure. The black fruits are right up front, full of acidity and with a delicious potential. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Château Saint Seurin 2015  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 5 Rue Pedroni, 33000 Bordeaux, France
properties.descrption: There is a caramel edge to this wine showing the wood-aging flavors. Luckily the fruit is all there as well, giving a balanced future to this structured wine. With plenty of tannins and juicy acidity combined, it will be a fine wine from 2019.

properties.title: Château Vircoulon 2015  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 11 au conte, 33330 Saint-Hippolyte, France
properties.descrption: Big tannins mask the fruit in this potentially ripe and fruity wine. It is structured and dark with a dry core of tannins. It means the wine needs time. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Reaper 2014 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 8546 Pete Wiles Rd, Middletown, MD 21769, USA
properties.descrption: Clean aromas of black cherry, dried thyme and white pepper show that this bottling isn't just all about creative packaging, with its Grim Reaper theme. The flavors are also cohesive and well integrated, with nutmeg, clove and stewed red cherry working together.

properties.title: San Biagio 2013 Capalot  (Barolo)
properties.descrption: Truffle, dried herb, espresso, new leather and balsamic aromas come together on this along with a whiff of wood shop. The firm tightly knit palate shows cranberry, sour cherry, clove and thyme framed in assertive close-grained tannins that leave a rather raspy finish. Drink after 2023.

properties.title: Sparkman 2014 Outlaw Merlot (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St #102, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of fruit from Obelisco, Olsen, Oasis and Kiona vineyards. Wood-forward aromas (60% new French oak) of char and coffee are out in front of herb and black cherry. The palate is on the lighter side of medium bodied, pulling up short on the finish. There's enjoyment to be had but the variety seems hard to find.

properties.title: Viberti 2013 Buon Padre  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via delle Viole, 30, 12060 Vergne CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of truffle, forest floor, used leather and a funky whiff of barnyard carry over to the firm palate along with ripe black cherry, clove and a hint of game. It's on the rustic side but full of personality.

properties.title: WesMar 2014 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 2064 Gravenstein Hwy N, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: Carbonic freshness lurks on the palate of this appellation wine, dotted in strawberry jam, lavender and rose characteristics. Lightly textured and built, it finishes soft and smooth.

properties.title: Kontos 2014 Les Collines Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: JONES BLDG, 10 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas are fresh, with notes of cranberry, red currant, baking spice and Red Vines. The palate is on the lighter side of medium bodied, trailing a bit on the finish. The vineyard, one of the state's top Syrah sites, doesn't seem to stand out as much as it typically does.

properties.title: Le Cecche 2013 Sorano  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Moglia Gerlotto, 10, 12055 Diano D'alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Crushed herb, violet, espresso, raspberry and menthol aromas carry over to the full-bodied but rounded palate along with cranberry and hints of anise and clove. Polished tannins provide support. Drink 2019–2025.

properties.title: Lorenzi Estate 2013 Brutus II Red (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 36095 Monte De Oro Rd, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.descrption: Dense aromas of cooked blueberries meet with clove, ginger and leather on the nose of this red blend. Leathery flavors also show on the palate along with black currant and more baking-spice touches.

properties.title: Keating 2009 Buchignani Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 23564 Arnold Dr, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: An awkward Zin, very high in alcohol (15.4%), yet a bit thin in berry-cherry fruit. It shows some unevenly ripened flavors.

properties.title: Ksana 2008 Bonarda (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: The bouquet is floral and lightly jammy, with berry aromas and a savory note or two. Turns a touch soupy and salty in the mouth, where the red fruit flavors thin out quickly. Finishes without much punch, but at least it's solid.

properties.title: Pali 2009 Huntington Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 2130 India St, San Diego, CA 92101, USA
properties.descrption: Lots of sweet raspberry, cherry and sugar-coated doughnut flavors in this simple little Pinot. It has the virtues of silkiness and good acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Coiron 2009 Malbec (Maipú)
properties.descrption: Brambly and leafy on the nose and palate, with tight acidity and reedy, peppery flavors that suggest foresty raspberry. The finish is equally peppery, herbal and leafy, but overall it's not green or unappealing. A natural wine in that it's unoaked.

properties.title: Carlos Basso 2009 Dos Fincas Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot (Mendoza)
properties.address: 11 NW Lava Rd, Bend, OR 97703, USA
properties.descrption: Syrupy smelling on first take, with bacon, rubber and herb aromas. The palate has a healthy, full feel and a mixed bag of not fully connected flavors including herbs, spice, dried fennel and sweet berry fruits. A somewhat odd tasting blend of 55% Cabernet Sauvignon and 45% Merlot.

properties.title: Project Paso 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3592 Broad St Suite 104, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.descrption: A pleasant, easy-drinking Zin. Has rich flavors of cherries, raspberries, figs and spices. Pretty good barbecue wine for the price.

properties.title: Presqu'ile 2014 Steiner Creek Vineyard Pinot Noir (San Luis Obispo County)
properties.descrption: From an extreme coastal vineyard three miles north of Cambria, this bottling kicks off with peppery spice on the nose along with strong black olive, bay leaf, dill and a black-raspberry element on the edges. Lively underripe fruit tones power the palate, as does Kalamata olive, North African spice, coriander and tomato leaf.

properties.title: Paritua 2014 Syrah (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 2112 Maraekakaho Road Bridge Pa Triangle, Hastings 4171, New Zealand
properties.descrption: This plush, silky wine is a thrill ride from start to finish. Asphalt and black olive notes on the nose give it a rather rustic edge to start, but purer peppery notes emerge with air. And once past the funk, this shows layers of blueberry and mulberry fruit, maybe even a trace of apricot to go along with savory notes of olive and espresso that glide gracefully through the long, silky finish. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Testarossa 2014 Soberanes Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.descrption: Stark minerality, from hot gravel to chipped slate, meets with garrigue elements of lavender and thyme on the nose of this strong bottling that gains a savory quality thanks to roasted-pork aromas. The requisite fruit arrives on the sip, where smashed cranberry meets with pepper spice and dried herbs. The structure is grippy and affords great length in the finish.

properties.title: Venturini Massimino 2005 Riserva  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Via Semonte, 20, 37029 San Pietro In Cariano VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Underbrush, dried plum, resin, leather and a whiff of baking spice aromas slowly emerge in the glass. The big chewy palate shows juicy blackberry, ripe black cherry, tobacco and clove set against a backbone of firm velvety tannins. Despite its heft, it also boasts surprising finesse. Hold for even more complexity. Drink 2017–2025.

properties.title: Windemere 2013 MacGregor Vineyard Pinot Noir (Edna Valley)
properties.descrption: There's a lot going on aromatically in this bottling, with a base of red plum and hibiscus lifted through hints of clove, cinnamon, dried rose petals and dried ginger. More plum and mulberry fruit power the palate, enhanced by fennel fronds, peppercorns, cedar, juniper and pine-forest flavors.

properties.title: Cayuse 2013 Armada Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 17 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The lilac, charcuterie, peat, smoke and black and green-olive aromas are tightly wound. The palate is focused, flavorful and energetic, showing depth and intensity while remaining quite light on its feet.

properties.title: Cayuse 2013 En Cerise Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: The aromas pop with notes of funk, smoked meat, red fruit, flowers, stems and orange peel. It's compact out of the gate with concentrated, tightly wound, salty flavors of olive brine, crushed rock and violets. It shows an exquisite sense of balance and a crazy long finish.

properties.title: Couloir 2014 Chileno Valley Vineyard Pinot Noir (Marin County)
properties.descrption: This wine grabs the attention with a distinctive earthy, wild yet sophisticated personality. The aroma is like forest floor, dried mushrooms and black tea. Flavors convey rhubarb and plum but also are savory and smoky as they fill the mouth and linger on the finish.

properties.title: Philippe Pacalet 2013  Echézeaux
properties.descrption: Structured and still very young, this is a dense and fruity wine. The tannins and the spice and licorice from wood aging show strongly, although they are just beginning to soften and integrate. Expect a rich wine, layered with fruit and ripe tannins as it develops. Drink from 2023.

properties.title: No Girls 2013 La Paciencia Vineyard Tempranillo (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Dark in color, this wine offers reserved aromas of smoke, tobacco, red fruit, crème de cassis, flowers, exotic spice and funk. The palate is plush and forward but still light on its feet, showing energy and focus. Fruit and savory flavors persist on the finish, demonstrating exquisite balance.

properties.title: Koehler 2013 Grenache (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.descrption: Look out for Colin Murphy, who was named winemaker at this estate after years working for regional legends Bruno d'Alfonso and Kris Curran. This bottling shows dark strawberry, incense, sandalwood, cola, figs, pepper and soy on the pretty yet complex nose. There is lots of intrigue to the palate too, where black plum comes together with chamomile, Earl Grey tea and lavender.

properties.title: Landmark 2014 Escolle Road Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: Sandalwood and smoke kick off the nose on this deliciously complex bottling that also shows aromas of black-plum skin, crushed slate and light fennel on the nose. Tangy cranberry and pomegranate make for a fresh entry to the sip, and then come herbal touches of white sage, bay leaf and peppercorn.

properties.title: Cambria 2013 Barbara's Clone 667 Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 5475 Chardonnay Ln, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Deep and hearty mulberry aromas meet with condensed rose petals, cinnamon, clove and hot gingerbread on the earthy, spicy nose of this clonal bottling by longtime winemaker Denise Shurtleff. The sip is thick and full of chaparral herbs at first, then opens toward rounded red cherry, cranberry and cinnamon before diving into fennel and peppercorn. It's amazing for one clone to be so complex.

properties.title: Capitain-Gagnerot 2011 Les Grandes Lolières  (Corton)
properties.address: 38 Rte de Dijon, 21550 Ladoix-Serrigny, France
properties.descrption: From right at the northern end of the sweep of Corton Grand Cru vineyards, this rich and complex wine is dense with smoky flavors as well as ripe blackberry fruit. It is solid, densely structured and powered minerality from the chalk in the soil. This is going to be a fine wine, so drink from 2019.

properties.title: Center of Effort 2014 Effort Pinot Noir (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 2195 Corbett Canyon Rd, Arroyo Grande, CA 93420, USA
properties.descrption: For the winery's lower-priced offering, this is a stunner. Baked black cherry, vanilla, raspberry, rose petals and a touch of licorice light up the nose. The lightly poised but intensely focused sip reveals a wild combo of fruit and spice, with sage, bay leaf, thyme and fennel laced through black cherry. It's like walking through the Central Coast scrubland.

properties.title: Dehlinger 2013 High Plains Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4101 Vine Hill Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: From grapes grown on a higher spot on the estate vineyard with Altamont soils, where the dirt is thin and the vines struggle, this wine delivers a depth of structure and incredible flavor. It finds a way to coax sage and wild forested earth from a robustness of cranberry and bright, citrusy acidity.

properties.title: Domaine de Bellene 2014 Les Suchots Premier Cru  (Vosne-Romanée)
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: This Premier Cru abuts some of the grandest Grand Crus of Burgundy. It shares the same rich, age-worthy characters with this dark structure and dense tannins. The wine is still very young: its texture mineral and concentrated. The black fruits and licorice flavors will develop slowly and surely, but don't drink before 2022.

properties.title: Domaines Devillard 2014 Château de Chamirey Les Cinq  (Mercurey)
properties.address: 13 Rue du Closeau, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: This is a blend of the best barrels from the five Mercurey Premier Crus owned by the Devillard family. First produced in the 2010 vintage, the wine is now made in most vintages. It is a rich wine, bringing out the pure red fruitiness of a Mercurey and its beautifully integrated structure. It is concentrated and very dense, packed with vanilla, mint and dark coffee flavors as well as the fruit. Age this wine, at least until 2020.

properties.title: Escarpment 2014 Pinot Noir (Martinborough)
properties.descrption: Winemaker Larry McKenna now has 30 years of experience with Martinborough Pinot Noir, and its on full display in this blend assembled from various plots around the village. Aromas of flowers, tea and cola lead into flavors of blackberries, vanilla and spice, framed by ample tannins. Drink 2020–2030.

properties.title: Etude 2014 North Canyon Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 1250 Cuttings Wharf Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Black raspberry and blackberry fruit approach a black-cherry richness on the nose of this bottling that also shows aromas of slate and roasted meats. The palate tightens up around dried elderberry and cranberry, tangy but deep fruit flavors that are enhanced by crushed juniper and dried pine needles with earthy tones of clay, loam and slate.

properties.title: Foxen 2014 Julia's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 7600 Foxen Canyon Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Fresh cranberry and black raspberry show on the nose of this bottling that also offers black-pepper sauce, savory soy and a touch of iodine. There's a tarry tension to the palate, but with tart dark cranberry and richer dark cherry flavors as well, mixing up the savory smoke with dense fruit.

properties.title: Cayuse 2013 En Chamberlain Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 17 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of ground violets, charcoal, smoke, iron, black fruit, tar and salami lead a salty, briny, expressive palate that shows depth concentration and elegance. A long finish caps it off.

properties.title: Chacewater 2000 15 Year Old Tawny Dessert Wine Red (Lake County)
properties.address: 5625 Gaddy Ln, Kelseyville, CA 95451, USA
properties.descrption: A delicious, beautifully aged tawny-style dessert wine, this rarity is sweet and fortified with alcohol, and also superbly well balanced. A diverse palette of flavors includes toffee, coffee, sweet prune, toasted almonds and chocolate. Supportive tannins and acidity keep the texture lively and the finish lingering.

properties.title: Bergström 2009 Bergström Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 8115 NE Worden Hill Rd, Dundee, OR 97115, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced entirely from the biodynamic estate vineyard, this extraordinary wine delivers compact, complex, detailed aromas and flavors in perfect proportion. The blueberry and cherry fruit is wreathed in dried herbs and flowers. Fourteen months in French oak, roughly half new, adds a thread of vanilla bean. Loads of dried extract, polished tannins and moist earth bring in more nuances.

properties.title: Alain Brumont 2006 Château Bouscassé Vieilles Vignes Tannat (Madiran)
properties.address: Château, Montus, 65700 Castelnau-Rivière-Basse, France
properties.descrption: Some vines at Bouscassé are 150 years old, which inevitably give this wine great depth and concentration. It is hugely structured, with very rich, intense black-plum flavors. The tannins are still developing.

properties.title: Masciarelli 2005 Villa Gemma  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: 144 Moore Rd, Weymouth, MA 02189, USA
properties.descrption: Villa Gemma is a flagship wine for Abruzzo that underlines a specific quality-minded winemaking philosophy that makes this Italian region so exciting and full of surprises. The wine is dark and superconcentrated, with amazing intensity and generous layers of mature berry fruit, spice, tobacco, used leather and polished river stone. It is smooth, firm, dense and will age many more years to come.

properties.title: Spring Mountain Vineyard 2007 Elivette Red (Spring Mountain District)
properties.address: 2805 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc shows all the charms of the 2007 vintage. It's an opulent, delicious wine, immediately likeable now for its broad array of blackberry, cherry, raspberry, mocha, cassis and new oak flavors. The tannins are soft, but strong enough to protect this wine for the next six years at the very least.

properties.title: De Loach 2009 Durell Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: Pinot Noir just doesn't get richer than this. It floods the mouth with ripe flavors of raspberries and cherries, with fascinatingly earthy things, like truffles and pine cones. Vibrant acidity and a hint of furry tannins give it a fine structure. This upscale Pinot Noir is drinkable now and should evolve over the next six years.

properties.title: Alain Brumont 2007 Château Montus Tannat-Cabernet Franc (Madiran)
properties.address: Château, Montus, 65700 Castelnau-Rivière-Basse, France
properties.descrption: This legendary Madiran is, its fruit tannins just softened by wood aging. It's smoky, brooding, very concentrated, and worth aging for 10 years.

properties.title: Bergström 2009 de Lancellotti Vineyard Pinot Noir (Chehalem Mountains)
properties.descrption: A concentrated core of pure, sweet raspberry and cherry fruit is showcased in a wine of remarkable penetration and length. The fruit, from a biodynamic estate vineyard, is perfumed and open, making this immediately accessible and supremely enjoyable. And yet cellaring will surely reward those with the patience and discipline to lay it down for up to a decade.

properties.title: Couloir 2010 Monument Tree Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.descrption: The vineyard has been source to Pinot Noirs from Copain and Drew, and this one, from Winemaker Jon Grant shows a somewhat Cabernet-esque interpretation. The wine is dark, tannic and medium-bodied, and quite extracted in the flashily ripe cherry and cola fruit that Monument Tree ripens so well in a cool, long hangtime year like 2010. Despite the richness, this is an elegant, ageworthy wine, whose low alcohol will delight many who critique California Pinot Noir for clumsiness. Give it at least six years in a good cellar.

properties.title: De Loach 2009 Nova Vineyard Zinfandel (Lake County)
properties.address: 1791 Olivet Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: De Loach reaches into Lake County, not usually thought of as Zinfandel country, with tremendous results. This is a great wine by any standard. It shows some heat from high alcohol and some shriveled raisin tastes, but that's part of a ripe Zin's charm. Mostly, you'll be impressed by waves of sweetly ripe berries, chocolate and bacon, smooth tannins and a long, spicy finish.

properties.title: Niepoort 1986 Colheita  (Port)
properties.address: Quinta de Nápoles, 5510-543, Portugal
properties.descrption: Gold in color, this is a wood-aged Port. Despite being 26 years old, it is still lively, almost fruity. The wood character does certainly show strongly, but so do the delicious caramel and toffee flavors, which are balanced by an intense acidity. Like all Colheitas, it is ready to drink.

properties.title: Herdade do Esporão 2008 TN Touriga Nacional (Alentejano)
properties.address: 9CJR+7GW, 7200, Portugal
properties.descrption: A superb example of the quality of Touriga Nacional. This wine combines the richness of the hot Alentejo sun with the sophisticated structure of the grape. Big, juicy and richly fruity as well as perfumed and elegant. Age it for at least 2–3 years.

properties.title: Obsidian Ridge 2009 Half Mile Red (Red Hills Lake County)
properties.address: 21684 8th St E, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: The winery doesn't reveal on the label what grape varieties are in this blend, but they're Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot. It's a fine, delicious wine, with blackberry, dark chocolate and bacon flavors, wrapped into exceedingly fine tannins. It's well-balanced, too, with moderate alcohol and a nice lick of acids. Impressive and classy from this Lake County winery.

properties.title: Niepoort 1984 Colheita  (Port)
properties.descrption: Now that the color of this superb wine has gone to old gold, it has definitely become a gloriously mature Port. The color translates into sweetness, which is allied to acidity, richness and an immense intensity due to its long wood aging.

properties.title: Herdade dos Grous 2009 Reserva Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Herdade dos Grous, 7800-601 Albernoa, Portugal
properties.descrption: A big rich wine from a warm year. Its powerful, dense structure is dominated by wood aging and fine blackberry and plum fruits. There is concentration along with swathes of delicious fruit. Age it for 4–5 years.

properties.title: Ken Wright 2010 Freedom Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: A marvelous vintage for Freedom Hill, this high-acid Pinot is loaded with black cherry fruit. Rich, ripe, full, tart and penetrating, it might seem one-dimensional at first, but it has such excellent focus and depth that the fruit simply rocks. The finish weaves in threads of smoke and mocha, but this is a wine to cellar for a couple more years at least.

properties.title: Domaine Serene 2008 Evenstad Reserve Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6555 NE Hilltop Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: Dark, full, generous and ripe to the far edge of elegance, this powerful Pinot is saturated with black fruits, annotated with fennel, pepper, smoke and espresso, the rich and varied flavors rolling right through a lush midpalate and on into a gently fading finish. Retasted over 24–48 hours, it continued to evolve and develop additional nuances. A wine to cellar for a decade or more.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2004 Piano di Montevergine Riserva  (Taurasi)
properties.address: Località Cerza Grossa, 83050 Sorbo Serpico AV, Italy
properties.descrption: This vineyard-designate Taurasi Riserva is probably one of the biggest, boldest wines produced in Italy. It opens with an inky black color and intense aromas of black fruit, toast, spice, espresso bean and bitter black chocolate. The jackhammer tannins are steady and firm, and there's a long tail of prune and black fruit on the finish.

properties.title: Ken Wright 2010 Savoya Vineyard Pinot Noir
properties.address: 120 N Pine St, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: Along with the Freedom Hill bottling, the Savoya is the wine of the vintage for Ken Wright. A beautifully-crafted mix of brambly berry, thistle and herb, this textural and detailed effort keeps developing added complexity as it rolls across the palate. Blackberry, black cherry, and hints of truffle infuse the complex, deliciously satisfying finish.

properties.title: Sodaro 2008 Estate Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 24 Blue Oak Ln, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: The majority Cab Sauvignon in the blend brings classic blackberry and cassis flavors, as well as firm tannins. The flavors are complex and interesting, and change as they breathe in the glass. Should develop additional bottle complexity over the years, although it's ready to drink now.

properties.title: Alienor 2009 Cote de Castelero Syrah (Lake County)
properties.address: 10 Rusty Tractor Ln, Little Rock, AR 72210, USA
properties.descrption: The wine is stunning, full of bright red fruit and a soft tinge of French bread, tightly structured with dark wood and a leathery component. A beautiful example of what can happen when the right winemaker and site collide: The finish is long and the wine is one to remember.

properties.title: Alvaro Castro 2008 Quinta da Pellada Red (Dão)
properties.address: Quinta Da Pellada -Adega, Pinhanços, Guarda, 6270, Portugal
properties.descrption: Rich and concentrated, this is a wine that has the Dão structure. It has an austere minerality from the hard granite soi, which is layered with enticing ripe black-fruit flavors. Touches of wood aging are blended well with the richness of this dense wine.

properties.title: Still Waters 2011 Estate Grown Primitivo (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2750 Old Grove Ln, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: From Paso Robles's warmer eastside, this wine begins with an elegant nose of raspberry, deep red rose and lavender. It's immediately delicious once sipped, with lush plum and sour cherry fruit, followed by a long-lingering finish of violets, rose and dried lavender.

properties.title: Tua Rita 2011 Giusto di Notri Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Località Notri, 81, 57028 Suvereto LI, Italy
properties.descrption: Round and opulent, this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc opens with aromas of black currants, blue flower, mocha and baking spices. The warm, dense palate delivers mouthfuls of succulent black cherry layered with chocolate, black pepper and clove alongside big, velvety tannins. Drink now through 2021.

properties.title: Left Bend 2011 Syrah-Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.descrption: There's a potpourri of wildly distinct and amazing aromas on this 60% Syrah-40% Cabernet Sauvignon, from cooked ripe cranberries and distinct black pepper to red clay, anise, violet and savory goulash with dried strawberries. Raspberry, pepper and cola overtake the palate, with a refreshing tartness on the finish.

properties.title: Buty 2012 Conner Lee Vineyard Merlot-Cabernet Franc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 535 E Cessna Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: A fine vintage yields a classic wine that seems sculpted out of rock. Firm lines and clear definition showcases racy raspberry fruit, limned with chiseled stone and a vein of gun metal. Excellent focus and length.

properties.title: Cascina delle Rose 2013 Nebbiolo (Langhe)
properties.address: visit by appoint. only, Strada Rio Sordo, 58, 12050 Tre Stelle CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Aged in steel, this vibrant wine shows Nebbiolo's more elegant and youthful side.
