It weaves together rose, violet, perfumed berries, bright cherry, crushed raspberry and sweet baking spices alongside supple tannins and fresh acidity. Enjoy it soon to capture the crunchy berry flavors.

properties.title: Chamisal Vineyards 2012 Califa Pinot Noir (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 7525 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.descrption: This darkly inclined Pinot Noir is the top-end bottling from one of Edna Valley's premiere producers. Black raspberry, crushed clove and iced tea form the nose. Those midnight elements carry to the palate, with rich blackberry, thick coffee and black tea flavors.

properties.title: Charles B. Mitchell 2012 Syrah (El Dorado)
properties.address: 8221 Stoney Creek Rd, Somerset, CA 95684, USA
properties.descrption: This wine brings out the variety's richness and depth of fruit flavors, while keeping the texture smooth and pleasing. It's very firm with tannins and acidity, yet not overly full-bodied. The ripe blackberry and cassis flavors have the intensity to match the structure and make for great balance overall.

properties.title: Viña Bisquertt 2012 Ecos de Rulo Malbec (Marchigue)
properties.address: Av. Del Condor 590, Huechuraba, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: This full-bodied Malbec out-performs its price. Ripe blackberry and pencil aromas set up a dense, tight, structured palate with focused, drilling flavors of blackberry and licorice. If you like layered, full-fruit reds with balance and harmony, this is it.

properties.title: Volker Eisele Family Estate 2010 Terzetto Red (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: This elegant Terzetto is equal parts Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Merlot from the Chiles Valley District on the far eastern side of Napa Valley. The grapes are grown organically by the Eisele family, who have farmed these parts for 40 years. Dusty red fruit entice from the beginning, unveiling a soft, round and drinkable wine with the structure to age until 2024–2029.

properties.title: Lucien Lardy 2013 Côte de Py  (Morgon)
properties.address: 2 Montée du Vivier, 69820 Fleurie, France
properties.descrption: This strongly mineral and textured wine is all about terroir. It has dark tannins, dense black fruits as well as freshness. Black currants and cherries give the fruity side, but at this stage it's the structure that is important. Wait and drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château des Jacques 2012  Morgon
properties.address: 147 Rte de la Gare, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.descrption: Château des Jacques, owned by Burgundy producer Louis Jadot, makes serious wines, such as this Morgon. It's powerful and rich, full of solid black cherry flavors and a strongly mineral structure from granite soil. It's a complex wine that needs to age, so drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Famaey 2009 Cuvée X Malbec (Cahors)
properties.descrption: The top cuvée from Château Famaey is a rich, new-wood-aged wine. With spice, mint and toast flavors, it's opulent, ripe and full of black fruits. Even at five years, it's still young, with tannins that are dense and concentrated. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Clos Troteligotte 2012 K-or Malbec (Cahors)
properties.descrption: This intense and rich wine has also managed to keep a great sense of balance. The black fruits emerge from the firm tannins, bringing with them juicy acidity and a dusty texture. The wine is still young, but it's developing well to emerge ripe and delicious by 2016.

properties.title: Cultura 2011 Meek Family Estate Vineyard Merlot (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 3601 Highland Dr, Zillah, WA 98953, USA
properties.descrption: Here's a quite dense Merlot, with plenty of grip and power. Black cherry and cassis fruit is firm and compact, with a generous frame of barrel char and dark chocolate. A lush and seductive selection that's delicious now.

properties.title: Fuligni 2012 Ginestreto  (Rosso di Montalcino)
properties.address: 53024 Montalcino, Province of Siena, Italy
properties.descrption: Enticing aromas of violet and rose, pressed powder and perfumed berries waft from the glass of this elegant wine. The juicy palate weaves together red cherry, strawberry, clove and cinnamon alongside fresh acidity and silky-smooth tannins. Balanced and enjoyable, this will make fine drinking now–2017.

properties.title: Villa Maria 2010 Reserve Gimblett Gravels Merlot (Hawke's Bay)
properties.descrption: Full-bodied and richly textured, this ultradark, concentrated Merlot makes a statement. Toast and vanilla shadings mark the bold cassis fruit, which glides easily into a long, velvety finish tinged with mocha. Drink now–2020—and possibly beyond, as this should prove to be a long-lived example.

properties.title: Uccelliera 2012  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Podere Uccelliera, 45, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This juicy, savory Rosso opens with a pretty fragrance of crushed violets, perfumed berries and sweet cake spices. The ripe, delicious palate doles out concentrated wild cherry, black raspberry and cinnamon-spice alongside supple tannins and fresh acidity. Bright orange fruit sensations signal the close.

properties.title: Garnet 2012 Pinot Noir (Monterey County)
properties.descrption: Bacon fat and cream soda meet with a flash of patchouli on the nose of this stunning deal from winemaker/author/blogger Alison Crowe. Cherry cola flavors and luscious red fruits get lifted with smoke and plum-skin bitterness, all set against decent tannins and fresh acidity.

properties.title: Lapostolle 2011 Collection Unfiltered Mourvèdre (Apalta)
properties.address: I-90 KM36, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Complete and satisfying, this Mourvèdre delivers punchy, alluring aromas of leather, rubber and dark berry fruits. This is deep and pure in the mouth, with excellent balance. Flavors of raspberry, spiced plum, currant and herbs finish long and elegant. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Le Chiuse 2012  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Loc Le Chiuse zona Val di Cava, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Fragrant, fresh and floral, this textbook Rosso di Montalcino offers lovely aromas of wild berries, violets, pressed powder and cake spices. The delicious palate doles out juicy red cherry and crushed raspberry accented with notes of cinnamon, all wrapped up in an elegant, silky-smooth texture. Enjoy over the next few years.

properties.title: Le Potazzine 2012  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Località Le Prata, 262, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Structured but elegant, this weaves together sensations of tilled earth, forest floor, black cherry, raspberry, orange peel and nutmeg alongside supple tannins. It's vibrant and drinkable. Even though it will age moderately well, enjoy over the next few years to capture the fresh berry fruit.

properties.title: Damalisco 2014 Roble  (Toro)
properties.address: 1351 Chain Bridge Rd, McLean, VA 22101, USA
properties.descrption: Spicy oak aromas accent foxy red berry scents in this pinchy, wayward wine. Its chocolatey black fruit and peppery spice flavors finish jammy, with a lot of unresolved oak.

properties.title: Viña Tabalí 2013 Reserva Especial Cabernet Franc (Limarí Valley)
properties.address: Quebrada del Durazno, Ovalle, Coquimbo, Chile
properties.descrption: Reduced gritty foresty aromas revolve around herbal berry and plum fruit. This feels heavy, concentrated, tannic and slightly collapsed. Dark blackened herbal berry and chocolate flavors finish hard due to abrasive tannins and enamel-peeling acidity.

properties.title: Gamache 2013 Vineyard Select Reserve Cabernet Franc (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1201 Basin Hill Rd, Mesa, WA 99343, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of fruit from Gamache (65%) and Ciel du Cheval vineyards. Aromas of game, Band Aid and dried cherry are followed by lush, sweet fruit and savory flavors. There are some interesting things going on but the gaminess proves too distracting.

properties.title: Havens 2014 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1004 Clinton St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Bay leaf, mint and cedar notes open this soft, nondescript wine, which is somewhat flat in tone and style. Mocha and cola notes provide flavor.

properties.title: Kooyong 2015 Massale Pinot Noir (Mornington Peninsula)
properties.address: 110 Hunts Rd, Tuerong VIC 3915, Australia
properties.descrption: From young vines, this is a somewhat austere, ungenerous rendering of Pinot Noir. The tannins are a bit drying, offsetting the attractive flavors of cola, plum and fresh minty herbs.

properties.title: Mira 2013 Hyde Vineyard Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6170 Washington St, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is blessed with velvety texture and bombastic ripeness, which leaves its plum and cherry fruit feeling baked and prune-like. The brawny fruit profile is accented with leather, tobacco and black pepper, finishing with a touch of heat.

properties.title: Mt. Konocti Winery 2013 Reserve Sangiovese (Lake County)
properties.address: California 95453, USA
properties.descrption: Very smooth and mouthfilling, this medium-bodied wine has a harmonious feeling about it. Ripe, juicy fruit and cola flavors meet soft tannins, and a broad, expansive texture carries them into the finish.

properties.title: Príncipe de Viana 2015 Roble Garnacha (Navarra)
properties.address: C. Mayor, 191, 31521 Murchante, Navarra, Spain
properties.descrption: This standard Garnacha feels jammy but a bit shapeless. Its raspberry and cassis aromas are ripe and candied, with a floral note while its raspberry and plum flavors finish with modest spice.

properties.title: Quinta do Noval 2015 Maria Mansa Red (Douro)
properties.address: N322-3, 5085 Pinhão, Portugal
properties.descrption: In terms of price, this wine can be considered the entry-level wine for the increasing range of Douro wines form this famed Port estate. This wine is all about fruit—bright red fruits—and just a touch of spice and toast from the wood aging. Drink the wine from early 2018.

properties.title: Ribafreixo 2013 Pato Frio Red Edition Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: 7960 Vidigueira, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a juicy soft blend of Aragonez and Alicante Bouschet. Ripe red fruits dominate with balanced tannins and generous fruit. The acidity and the final burst of fruit show this easy wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Ritual 2015 Merlot (Casablanca Valley)
properties.descrption: Leafy, slightly damp aromas include notes of spiced plum and herbs. On the palate, this is fairly stocky and chewy. A mixture of berry, spice and peppery flavors finishes with perceptible spicy oak.

properties.title: Finca la Rinconada 2009 Barcolobo 12 Meses en Barrica Red (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla y León)
properties.descrption: Stalky, medicinal, rubbery aromas announce an acidic Tempranillo-led blend that's downright astringent on the palate. Flavors of stalky fruit, buttery oak and sheer raspberry and plum end crisp and tight, with a salty flavor.

properties.title: Costa Archi 2009 Il Beneficio Red (Emilia-Romagna)
properties.address: 1331 Nicholson Ave, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: The IGT appellation is Ravenna (in the Emilia-Romagna region). Il Beneficio opens with bitter fruit notes followed by sweet tones and dark spice. The wine is slightly disjointed and very intense overall (in terms of alcohol too).

properties.title: Tarantas 2011 Monastrell (Jumilla)
properties.address: 560 NE F St #330, Grants Pass, OR 97526, USA
properties.descrption: Leathery, herbal aromas suggest compost. A full, hard, tannic palate is home to rubbery flavors of herbal blackberry and pepper, while a medicinal dark-berry character controls the finish. This is a decent wine with mild weediness.

properties.title: Tenuta Pederzana 2012 Gibe  (Lambrusco Grasparossa di Castelvetro)
properties.address: Via Cavalliera in Solignano, 8, 41014 Castelvetro di Modena MO, Italy
properties.descrption: There's a vein of sourness, astringency and thinness in the mouth followed by bright berry fruit and plump cherry. This is a light and straightforward bubbly Lambrusco that offers a good introductory view of this traditional Italian bubbly red wine.

properties.title: Heavyweight 2011 Merlot (California)
properties.address: 220 S Cluff Ave, Lodi, CA 95240, USA
properties.descrption: All this Merlot asks is to be paired with something simple, like a hamburger. It's straightforward and easy drinking, with juicy blackberries and cherries showing their ripeness.

properties.title: Autumn Hill 2009 Merlot-Petite Verdot (Monticello)
properties.address: 301 River Dr, Stanardsville, VA 22973, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of blood, nori and worn leather compose the nose, with a touch of charred bread that adds a subtle bitterness. Light to medium bodied, the palate feels pliant at the start, but the acids spike and tower over the tannins as the wine spreads across the palate. A flavor of tart raspberry marks the finish.

properties.title: Jigar 2011 Raja Cuvée Syrah-Petite Sirah (Mendocino County)
properties.descrption: A soft mix of 67% Syrah and 33% Petite Sirah, this is slightly ill-defined, marked most by mouth-puckering tannins.

properties.title: Loken Cellars 2010 Reserve Lot 13 Tecklenberg Ranch Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: 2004 W Manogue Rd, Janesville, WI 53545, USA
properties.descrption: Tastes unevenly ripened, with vegetal notes alongside the berries. Also feels overly soft and hot in alcohol.

properties.title: Opolo 2010 Tempranillo (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 7110 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: An everday wine, this is silky and crisp, with ripe raspberry and cherry flavors.

properties.title: River Road 2011 Hopkins Vineyard Pinot Meunier (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 5220 Ross Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: This is a tough wine, marked by hard acids and tannins, and an absence of the fruit to stand up to it. It's bone dry and severe, with thin cherry-skin and cola flavors.

properties.title: Domaine Carneros 2009 The Famous Gate Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 1240 Duhig Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: This is the winery's best new Pinot Noir. Essentially a barrel selection, using different clones from multiple sites in the estate vineyard, it's spicy and dry, with complex flavors of raspberry and cherry tart, Dr. Pepper, spice, sandalwood and anise, as well as a hint of mushroomy funk. Enjoy now–2015.

properties.title: Tenute Rubino 2010 TorreTesta Susumaniello (Salento)
properties.address: Via Enrico Fermi, 50, 72100 Brindisi BR, Italy
properties.descrption: TorreTesta demonstrates the beauty and power of Puglia's little-known Susumaniello grape. Enhanced by careful oak aging, the wine offers dark fruit aromas, followed by tobacco, chocolate and rum cake notes. On the palate, it is soft, plush and rich, with a mocha-tinged finish.

properties.title: Muga 2006 Selección Especial  (Rioja)
properties.address: Avenida Vizcaya, Barrio de la Estación, 2, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Rich yet subdued on the bouquet, with elegant tobacco, lemon peel and earthy scents, this feels lush and full of heft, but it's not plodding or heavy. Flavors of spiced black fruit, molasses and tobacco are nice, and the finish features a long, dry, comfortable fade. Drink this winner now–2016.

properties.title: Alto Moncayo 2009 Aquilon Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
properties.address: Ctra. Antigua de Borja, 50540 Borja, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: This is a powerful, rich, toasty Garnacha, with grit, earth and spice galore on the bouquet. It feels tough, masculine and tannic, with a mix of beefy black-fruit flavors elevated by molasses and spice. Firm and showing some burn on the finish, along with notes of black licorice and peppery spice. Only 200 cases made. Drink now–2016.

properties.title: Bailiwick 2010 Foray Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 21684 8th St E #470, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: This feels lush and important right out of the bottle, tantalizing with tart cherry, cola and persimmon flavors that are wrapped in acids and tannins. Give it up to six years, and enjoy. All of the fruit comes from the Foray Vineyard in the Green Valley.

properties.title: Château de Candale 2009  Saint-Émilion
properties.descrption: Warm, voluptuous, rich and generous, this wine has the right weight, along with firm, dark tannins and a bitter coffee flavor. The finish is warm and delicious.

properties.title: Château de Pez 2010  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: Château Pez, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: This firmly tannic wine boasts solid structure and density. It has powerful concentration, due to very low yields. The fruit is ripe, driven by notes of black plum and berry. This is a wine with a long-term future.

properties.title: Château du Tertre 2010  Margaux
properties.address: 14 All. du Tertre, 33460 Arsac, France
properties.descrption: Ripe, dense and smooth from wood aging, this is a modern view of Margaux. At the same time, it shows a beautiful black-currant flavor from the Cabernet Sauvignon, and the Petit Verdot adds great color.

properties.title: Château Fombrauge 2008 Magrez Fombrauge  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Château Petit Fombrauge Lieu-dit Fombrauge, 33330 Saint-Christophe-des-Bardes, France
properties.descrption: Rich and juicy, this features a ripe plum flavor and acidity, resulting in a wine that is fragrant, fresh and structured. It has power, and its dark concentration is at the heart of this solid effort.

properties.title: Château Grand-Puy Ducasse 2010  Pauillac
properties.address: 4 Quai Antoine Ferchaud, 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: Tough at the moment, this is a wine with impressive concentration. It's solid and chunky, with massive structure. The fragrant finish is a sign of the pleasure to come.

properties.title: Château la Croix Saint-Georges 2009  Pomerol
properties.address: 88-116 Rue de Catusseau, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: This has enough rich fruit to meld with the abundance of toasty wood. It is opulent and ripe, a powerful wine, typical of the vintage with its sweet red-berry flavor and refreshing acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Dow's 2010 Quinta do Bomfim Vintage  (Port)
properties.address: Largo do Videira, 5085-060 Pinhão, Portugal
properties.descrption: A firm and structured wine, this shows complex tannins as well as contrasting acidity. It feels complete, the tannins supporting red cherry and spice flavors. It is probably not for long-term aging but will start to taste delicious in 6–7 years.

properties.title: Pikes 2007 Eastside Shiraz (Clare Valley)
properties.address: 233 Polish Hill Rd, Sevenhill SA 5453, Australia
properties.descrption: Lush and creamy on the palate, this complex wine boasts flavors of slightly mossy, decaying cedar, molasses, damp earth and leather, all wrapped around a bright core of red berry. Supple and lasting on the finish. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Re Manfredi 2007 Serpara  (Aglianico del Vulture)
properties.address: Contrada Piano Di Camera, 85029 Venosa PZ, Italy
properties.descrption: A beautiful expression of Aglianico made from grapes that were sourced from the estate's Serpara Vineyard, this is darkly concentrated and powerful. It shows great aging potential, with dark fruit tones, natural structure and freshness.

properties.title: Melipal 2007 Nazarenas Vineyard Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta 7 kilómetro 1056, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Deep, dark and charred on the nose, this features campfire and black cherry aromas. It feels fresh, alert and snappy for being so dark and ripe, with blackberry and padded oak flavors. It's layered and a touch creamy on the finish. A modern, powerful Malbec to drink now–2016.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2009 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This Columbia Valley Syrah boasts strong varietal aromatics. It seems to have a spine of iron and a streak of garrigue-like dried herb, with lovely flavors of pomegranate and wild berry.

properties.title: Quinta do Vesuvio 2010 Vintage  (Port)
properties.descrption: This is intensely perfumed, with soft tannins that are followed by a dry, concentrated character. From the iconic Vesúvio Vineyard, where wines for vintage production are still foot trodden, this has a ripe feel, with tannins that are suitable for medium-term aging.

properties.title: Tenuta Le Querce 2005 Vigna della Corona  (Aglianico del Vulture)
properties.address: 85022 Barile PZ, Italy
properties.descrption: Packaged in a massively heavy glass bottle, Vigna della Corona is an important expression of Aglianico that deftly sets a touch of oak-derived against black fruit and prune notes. Savory flavors of wild mushroom, tobacco and smoke give the wine a masculine, brawny personality.

properties.title: Terredora 2006 CampoRe Riserva  (Taurasi)
properties.descrption: With all the qualities needed for long cellar time—structure, freshness and fruit integrity—this already shows its considerable pedigree. It delivers tobacco, leather, black fruit and a touch of dried herb on the finish.

properties.title: Vesevo 2007  Taurasi
properties.descrption: Here's a unique Taurasi that shows the elegance and brawn of the Aglianico grape without some of its massive bulk and intensity. In fact, this is a tempered expression, with a bright fruit tone and a point of apparent sweetness on the finish.

properties.title: Château Bouissel 2009 Le Syrah de Bouissel Syrah (Vin de Pays du Comté Tolosan)
properties.address: 200 Chem. du Vert, 82370 Campsas, France
properties.descrption: Almost black in color, this is a Syrah to rival the most concentrated wines from the Rhône. It has weight, richness and power, its dark damson fruit flavors and tannins almost lost in all this intense fruit. Age for 3–4 years or drink now.

properties.title: Château Haut-Monplaisir 2008 Prestige Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Monplaisir, 46700 Lacapelle-Cabanac, France
properties.descrption: A darkly tannic wine, with licorice and espresso coffee flavors as well as intense blackberry fruits. It is firm, the wood aging showing through strongly at this stage. Keep for 3–4 years so that the alcohol burn can blow off.

properties.title: Deaver 2008 Old Vine 1867 Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.address: 12455 Steiner Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Why yes this is mountain Zin with a lot of Dr. Pepper, sarsaparilla happening aromatically and then a mouthful of thick, savory, herbal, raspberry jam with soft tannins and a just-right note of earthiness too.

properties.title: Steenberg 2009 Private Cellar Series Red Blend Red (Western Cape)
properties.address: Steenberg Estate, Cape Town, 7945, South Africa
properties.descrption: Forward notes of menthol add depth to the black berry and plum backbone of this wine. Supporting but not overly grippy tannins lend a nice structure to the mouth, and the finish is long with a nice herbal streak.

properties.title: Algodon 2008 Estate Malbec
properties.address: RN144, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Ripe and open on the nose, with lush blueberry aromas mixed with vanilla and tobacco. Feels medium to full but not heavy, with raspberry, red apple skin, coconutty oak and spice for flavors. Almondy and sweet on the finish, with handsome dry spice.

properties.title: Bodega Poesia 2006 Clos des Andes Reserva Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Espejo 1591, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Smells earthy and baked, with bulk to the bouquet and a gaseous quality that blows off with time. Feels chunky, grabby and tannic, with fully ripe flavors of jammy blackberry. Pours on the heft and broad tannins, but comes up a little short in the nuance and character categories. Drink now.

properties.title: Château de Cénac 2009 Cuvée Prestige Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Lieu dit Circofoul - Plaine du Port - R.D.9 Albas rive droite, Plaine du Port, 46140 Albas, France
properties.descrption: This is structured, its tannins coming through dense and dry. The blackberry fruits give a juicy character that's overlaid by wood. The wine has a firm character, while letting the fruit show well.

properties.title: Jean-Luc Baldès 2009 Clos Triguedina La Chapelle du Clos Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Lieu-dit "Les poujols", 46700 Vire-sur-Lot, France
properties.descrption: Yes, it is very dark colored, but this rich wine shows elegance as well as its dense tannins. Flavors of blackberries come through the coffee note and dry core to give a wine that will develop relatively quickly over the next 2–3 years.

properties.title: Lamadrid 2007 Single Vineyard Gran Reserva Malbec (Agrelo)
properties.address: Roque Sáenz Peña 8450, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: There's a ton of oak on this Malbec, but there's also enough body and richness to handle it. The wine smells minty and dark, with shoe polish and chocolate aromas. Tight and acidic on the tongue, with an oak-led set of flavors that includes coconut, vanilla and butter along with blackberry. Prickly and electric due to high acidity, but quite good as a whole.

properties.title: Patz & Hall 2009 Pisoni Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: The price reflects the fame of the vineyard, not the quality of the wine. It's too big and extracted in cherry and raspberry jam flavors, and 70% new French oak just makes it taste sweeter and heavier. Earns extra credit for ripe power, and can be described as quintessentially Pisoni.

properties.title: Rust en Vrede 2007 Estate Red (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Annandale Rd, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.descrption: This red, made from 61% Cab Sauv, 30% Shiraz and 9% Merlot, offers attractive floral aromas of lavender, baby powder and light menthol (like a Thin Mint) to the soft but ripe dark fruit notes. The mouth offers more spice and weight than the aromas would suggest, with a firm but approachable structure and cigar box spice on the medium-length finish.

properties.title: Santa Julia 2010 Magna Red (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: A really good and upright blend of Cabernet, Malbec and Syrah that exhibits composure along with nice berry and pastry aromas. Bright and zesty in the mouth, with boysenberry, blueberry and pulse to the palate. Long, driving and steady on the finish.

properties.title: Graffito 2009 Malbec (Luján de Cuyo)
properties.descrption: This big boy brings the weight. It's loaded with blackberry, rubber and sweet baking spices on the nose. Feels like it went through max extraction with its mouthfilling tannins and density. Tastes a bit exotic, with pure blackberry and blueberry fruit. Finishes lush and soft.

properties.title: Archery Summit 2009 Renegade Ridge Estate Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 18599 NE Archery Summit Rd, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: Tight and perhaps in a bit of a dumb stage, this opens slowly, and shows raspberry and black cherry fruit, with a streak of cola and orange marmalade. Sleek and fruity, perhaps best for near-term drinking.

properties.title: Rusack 2013 Reserve Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1819 Ballard Canyon Rd, Solvang, CA 93463, USA
properties.descrption: Blistered cranberries, seared plums, slate, sandalwood and a whiff of pine forest pop on the nose of this bottling by Santa Barbara-raised winemaker Steve Gerbac. The palate bursts with energy, showing flavors of black sage, cherry, tart cranberry, pan-toasted herbs and cedar verve. The elements will focus and be even better 2017–2023.

properties.title: Bravium 2013 Wiley Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 1550 Guntly Rd, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has classic style, showing a rather light, traditional color and woodsy, earthy, herbal aromas, with tantalizing and complex fruity and savory flavors. A firm texture and flavor complexity highlight elegance rather than ripeness. It was aged in barrels whose staves were seasoned four years before assembling.

properties.title: Sculpterra 2012 Maquette Estate Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5015 Linne Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Hot gravel, fresh mint, dried basil and dark red fruits entertain the nose on this bottling of 44% Cabernet Sauvignon, 43% Cabernet Franc and 13% Merlot from the Frankel Family Estate. Playful red fruits make for easy drinking, with complexity coming from licorice and a buttered finish.

properties.title: Epiphany 2012 Stagecoach Vineyard Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2974 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: This age-worthy wine was given plenty of time to develop in used French oak, and will stand up to further time in the cellar. Right now it offers structured depths of high-toned cherry and leather, with a floral flourish that keeps it bright and fresh despite its substantial concentration. Drink now through 2020.

properties.title: Vellum 2011 Red Merlot-Cabernet (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6512 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.descrption: This majority Merlot, with 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, is elegant in sandalwood and cedar, offering a taste of cassis and dried herb atop integrated yet sizable tannins. French oak, half of it new, encased the wine for a little more than two years, adding to its power and structure. Drink now through 2021.

properties.title: Kendall-Jackson 2013 Jackson Estate Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 5007 Fulton Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
properties.descrption: Delicious fruit aromas and abundant spices waft up from the glass. The flavors follow suit, with ripe plum, strawberry and cinnamon all well supported by firm acidity and a medium-to-full body. This is a well-rounded wine that's easy to enjoy.

properties.title: Longoria 2013 Lovely Rita Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: Cola, cranberry, raspberry and pencil shavings greet the nose on this wine by regional veteran Rick Longoria. It's lush and plush on the palate, with licorice, black truffle, black sage and barely ripe blackberry flavors.

properties.title: Lucien Lardy 2014 Les Thorins  (Moulin-à-Vent)
properties.address: 2 Montée du Vivier, 69820 Fleurie, France
properties.descrption: This offers plenty of tannins and a dry, firm structure along with the weight of ripe plums, blackberries and a rich character. The wine is certainly going to age, with its solid texture and bold fruit aftertaste. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Companhia das Quintas 2012 Quinta da Fronteira Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: R. da Fonte Nova, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is not a shy wine—it is concentrated and powerful, with ripe tannins and dense black fruits. Coming from vineyards in the Douro Superior, this shows the region's the heat and harsh growing conditions, giving a compact, firm wine with a mineral texture to balance the juicy fruits. It will need several years, so drink from 2017.

properties.title: De Toren 2011 Fusion V Red (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Polkadraai Rd, Stellenbosch, 7604, South Africa
properties.descrption: This vintage of Fusion V is already approachable and enjoyable, with ripe aromas and flavors of brambly berry and cherry that are accented by attractive notes of cocoa powder, cigar tobacco, sweet spice and leather. The fine tannins are grippy and structured, complementing the black pepper, toast and licorice elements that linger on the finish. A blend of 51% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Malbec, 15% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc and 4% Petit Verdot, drink now–2019.

properties.title: Richard Rottiers 2014 La Sambinerie  (Beaujolais-Villages)
properties.address: 69 La Sambinerie, 71570 Romanèche-Thorins, France
properties.descrption: From one of the rising stars in Beaujolais, this ripe wine has both a tense minerality and rich black fruits from vines that average 60 years. It is balanced between the very fresh acidity and a dry edge that will allow it to age. Drink from 2016. The vineyards are certified organic.

properties.title: Budini 2009 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: Candied blueberry and syrupy aromas jump from the glass. The palate, however, is tangy and underdeveloped, with herbal, sharp flavors of boysenberry and black raspberry. Not a lot to the finish other than heat and licorice.

properties.title: Castello d'Alba 2009 Tuga Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: Lightweight, attractive, very juicy wine. It is a great pizza wine, with its edge of tannins and lively acidity. Drink this year.

properties.title: La Vuelta 2010 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 21301 Kathy Ln, Spicewood, TX 78669, USA
properties.descrption: Sweet and light smelling, with sugar cookie and blueberry aromas. The palate is medium in weight, with snappy acids and dry, lightly herbal flavors of raspberry and red plum. Mostly fresh on the finish, but with little volume or follow through.

properties.title: Alberti 154 2009 Tempranillo (Mendoza)
properties.address: Alberti 154, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Heavily earthy and rubbery smelling, then big and bulky but out of whack on the palate. Tastes buttery and gummy, with generic berry fruit flavors that finish oaky.

properties.title: Altocedro 2009 La Consulta Select Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ejercito de Los Andes y, Arturo Tregea 1, La Consulta, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Quite herbal and foxy on the nose, with char and olive aromas. The palate is thick, jammy and clumsy, with bittersweet notes of stewed berry and blackberry syrup. A huge, muscular wine that's really ripe and untamed.

properties.title: Cline 2009 Ancient Vines Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: 24737 Arnold Dr, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Simple and hot, with unevenly ripened flavors of raspberries and mint. Some portion of Cline's very old vines in Oakley add richness.

properties.title: Alma del Sur 2009 Colección Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Calle Hidalgo S/N Junto a escalinatas de la Misión de, Centro, 23880 Loreto, B.C.S., Mexico
properties.descrption: Jammy and a bit scratchy on the nose, and also sort of dull and earthy. In the mouth, it's tangy and citrusy, bordering on sour tasting, with pie cherry, plum and light savory notes. Finishes red and juicy, but with a tomato accent.

properties.title: Quinta de Baixo 2008 Colheita Red (Bairrada)
properties.address: Sedielos, 5040-530, Portugal
properties.descrption: Rustic, farmyard aromas follow through to a wine that has let the Baga tannins dominate. It is tough, chewy, offering few concessions to fruit.

properties.title: Valle Las Nencias 2008 Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: San Martín y antigua, RN40, La Consulta, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Tobacco and mint aromas cloud the wine's bouquet, while the palate starts out rough and scratchy, with a heavy dose of grape-skin tannin. Upon airing it offers more berry fruit but also salty, leathery finishing flavors. And the tannins never really cease.

properties.title: Bodega Carmine Granata 2008 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: ATB, Alberti 570, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Grapey blackberry aromas come across foxy. The palate is wet and high in acidity, leaving a semisour flavor profile with only a few hints of sweetness around the edges. Drying, herbal and salty.

properties.title: Cable Car 2007 Merlot (California)
properties.descrption: A soft, simple, fruity Merlot. Tastes like a cherry, blackberry, roasted almond, cocoa and cinnamon granola bar, melted into wine.

properties.title: Monte dos Cabaços 2008 Colheita Seleccionada Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: The Estremoz region in Alentejo is at the heart of one of the major vineyard areas. This rich and now mature wine shows the ripe fruit and structure that can be produced there. It is packed with tarry black fruits and dusty tannins. Drink now.

properties.title: Quinta da Rede 2010 Rede Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: Av. Conselheiro José Maria Alpoim Nº166, 5040-324 Mesão Frio, Portugal
properties.descrption: This has great fruits and plenty of structure to go with it. Juicy plum flavors complement the dense tannins, mineral structure and concentrated texture. It's a stylish wine that will develop some more. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Santa Carolina 2011 VSC Red (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: Til Til 2228, Macul, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Heavy, raisiny, ripe aromas of prune and earthy blackberry set up a chewy, oaky, mildly tannic palate that's fully stuffed with woody, baked, almost malty flavors of blackberry, chocolate and toast. This is a rich, ripe number, with a loamy, toasty finish that shows black licorice and jammy cassis flavors. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Viña Casablanca 2012 Neblus Syrah (Casablanca Valley)
properties.descrption: Graphite, wood grain, spice and black-fruit aromas are full and a touch funky. Tight, crisp and direct on the palate, this Syrah sports a good mouthfeel and toasty, herbal flavors of blackberry and mixed hard spices. Baked berry fruit flavors and chewy tannins are wrapped in an oaky finish. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Wine & Soul 2012 Manoella Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: This comes from 30-year-old vines in the Quinta da Manoella, the family vineyard of Jorge Borges, one of the winemaking husband-and-wife team at Wine & Soul. This bottling shows the fruit-driven side of this vineyard, which also has 100-year-old vines. It's dense and solid, with powerful tannins that are beautifully integrated into the big plum fruits. The aftertaste is smooth, rich and concentrated.

properties.title: Franz Haas 2011 Lagrein (Alto Adige)
properties.descrption: This solid red features aromas of ripe dark berry, violet and a whiff of spice. The savory palate delivers layers of crushed blackberry, juicy raspberry, white pepper, clove and cocoa alongside lively acidity and firm, yet velvety tannins.

properties.title: J. Scott Cellars 2013 Bradshaw Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 520 Commercial St unit g, Eugene, OR 97402, USA
properties.descrption: This opens immediately into a lush, varied, flavorful wine that's broadly fruity and generously endowed with toasty oak highlights. It's drinking beautifully already, but is also nicely structured for aging through 2022.

properties.title: Jaffurs 2012 Ampelos Syrah (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: This wine from a biodynamic vineyard is powerfully spicy on the nose, with aromas of ginger snaps, cloves, nutmeg and Indian spices seasoning the bloody meats and blackberry core. Oregano and other chopped, dried herbs flavor the palate, with black pepper, blackberry syrup and licorice combining for a savory sipping experience.

properties.title: Lancaster 2011 Nicole's Proprietary Red (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 15001 Chalk Hill Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Sauvignon dominates here, from estate-grown vineyards that also provide the 13% Merlot, 2% Petit Verdot and 2% Malbec. Soft and silky, the wine offers black cherry, black pepper and tight-grained tannin, atop a backdrop of spicy clove and mocha. Cellar through 2021.

properties.title: Lemos & Van Zeller 2012 VZ Van Zellers Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: This is a firmly structured wine that's powerful and rich. A dark, brooding quality powers the complex balance between fruit and tannins. It has the potential to be a beautiful, ripe, impressive wine with a strong sense of minerality. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Matetic 2012 EQ Syrah (San Antonio)
properties.descrption: Jammy, earthy, chocolaty blackberry aromas come with a minerally note of vitamins and grit. This is bold and lively on the palate, with black plum, brandied cherry, herb and charred-oak flavors. Burnt toast and blackened berry flavors finish woody, chocolaty and lemony.

properties.title: Monte De Oro 2009 Vista Del Monte Vineyard Reserve Syrah (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 35820 Rancho California Rd, Temecula, CA 92591, USA
properties.descrption: The scents of chaparral consume the nose of this rather high-alcohol wine, with crushed anise, dew-soaked sage, chemise and wild mint aromas spicing up a leathery boysenberry base. Rich flavors of black cherry extract, black cloves and vanilla decorate a grippy, mouth-tingling palate.

properties.title: Peirano 2013 The Heritage Collection Syrah (Lodi)
properties.address: 21831 CA-99, Acampo, CA 95220, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas and flavors range from charred wood to black cherry to white pepper to wild herbs. The complexity and diversity of tastes is fascinating, a reminder of how wild this grape variety can be. It's full bodied, smooth textured and firmly tannic.

properties.title: Perescuma 2011 Orquestra Special Selection Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Portugal, EM502, 5130, Portugal
properties.descrption: Strongly tannic, this is a firmly structured, wood-aged wine. The wood shows as dark toast that dominates the rich fruit that still needs time to show strongly. It's a complex wine, full of spice, acidity, and with a dry, dense core. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Pinhal da Torre 2007 Quinta do Alqueve Touriga Nacional (Tejo)
properties.descrption: Now at peak maturity, this wine is generously rich as well as sophisticated and stylish. Firm tannins interweave with the juicy black fruit character. A dry background gives a leathery texture while still having room for fruit. Drink now.

properties.title: Ramey 2012 Platt Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 25 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: From an ocean-view vineyard with consistently exceptional fruit, this wine represents its provenance with class and elegance, delivering crisp cranberry and cherry around an ethereal earthiness and deft seasoning of herb. Aged in barrels previously used for Chardonnay from the same vineyard, it offers restrained oak that still provides structure.

properties.title: Naggiar 2014 Estate Cabernet Franc (Sierra Foothills)
properties.descrption: Bold and substantial, this full-bodied and firmly tannic wine has a good core of ripe black berry and black cherry trimmed with lighter cinnamon and vanilla notes from oak. It's very attractive in a firm, palate-gripping way.

properties.title: Poggio Stenti 2013 Tribulo  (Montecucco)
properties.address: Podere Stenti, 26/A, 58033 Montenero GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of black cherry, tilled soil and a hint of dark spice lift out of the glass. The palate offers juicy wild cherry, cinnamon and white pepper while smooth tannins lend a polished texture.

properties.title: Suberli 2012 Riserva  (Morellino di Scansano)
properties.address: 1340 Smith Ave, Baltimore, MD 21209, USA
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of underbrush, sunbaked soil, pressed violet and dried rosemary meld together with whiffs of espresso. The firm palate offers dried Marasca cherry, cranberry, star anise and a gamy note alongside close-grained tannins.

properties.title: Anthony Nappa 2015 Bordo Cabernet Franc (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.descrption: Anthony Nappa's Bordo highlights Cabernet Franc at both its most savage and feral, but also vulnerable state. Black-cherry and plum flavors are plump and fleshy on the palate but layered in dark shadowy swathes of char, smoke, bramble and herb. Bold and expansive on the palate, it finishes softly, wrapped in fine feathery tannins. It's ready to drink now but should hold well through at least 2024.

properties.title: Bianchi 2011 Geste G-S-M (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Distinctive aromas of cinnamon stick, cola, red cherry, ripe cranberry, rose petal, lavender and smoked beef show on the nose of this blend of 39% Syrah, 35% Grenache and 26% Mourvèdre. It's light and easy drinking on the sip, with cranberry, red cherry, thyme, pepper, bay leaf and more rose-petal flavors.

properties.title: Borgo Scopeto 2014 Borgonero Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Località Cagliano, 53019 Vagliagli SI, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of 40% Sangiovese, 20% Syrah, 20% Merlot and 20% Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with aromas of ripe black-skinned fruit and cooking spice. The firm savory palate doles out sour cherry, cinnamon and tobacco alongside smooth tannins. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Ca' Marcanda 2014 Magari  (Bolgheri)
properties.descrption: Aromas of dark-skinned fruit, toast, mint and a whiff of espresso lead the nose on this Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc blend. The straightforward palate is on the lean side, offering raw red currant, coffee and star anise alongside firm acidity. Close-grained tannins leave a drying finish.

properties.title: Caiarossa 2011 Red (Toscana)
properties.descrption: Made with 24% Cabernet Franc, 22% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14% Petit Verdot, 14% Sangiovese, 6% Alicante and 5% Syrah, this opens with subdued aromas suggesting ripe black-skinned fruit, toast and coffee. The palate offers black cherry jam, espresso and oak-driven spice alongside polished tannins. It's a bit shy on freshness, so drink soon.

properties.title: Caparzo 2012 Cà del Pazzo Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale del Brunello, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon in equal parts, this opens with aromas of violet, cedar, and underbrush. The medium-bodied palate delivers red currant, black pepper and anise alongside smooth tannins. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Carpineto 2009 Sillano Red (Toscana)
properties.address: SP 16 Chianti-Valdarno, 50022 Greve FI, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of 60% Sangiovese and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon, this has aromas of leafy underbrush, bell pepper, dried herb and black currant. The palate is rather austere, offering dried cherry, leather, licorice and powdered sage alongside tightly wound, grainy tannins that grip the finish. Let the tannins unwind for another year or two, then drink up to catch the remaining fruit.

properties.title: Cono Sur 2015 Organically Grown Grapes Cabernet Sauvignon-Carmenere-Syrah Red (Chile)
properties.descrption: Saucy black-fruit aromas are beefy, dense and spicy. In the mouth, this blend of Cabernet, Carmenère and Syrah is chunky, with hard tannins. Herbal, spicy black-fruit flavors include tea and coffee notes, while the finish tastes herbal and peppery, with a leafy aftertaste attributable to the Carmenère.

properties.title: Podere San Cristoforo 2015 Petit Verdot (Toscana)
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Petit Verdot, this has aromas of cedar, graphite and Mediterranean scrub. The polished palate doles out black currant, black pepper and a tobacco note alongside smooth tannins.

properties.title: Renieri 2013  Chianti Classico
properties.descrption: Aromas suggesting toasted oak, sunbaked earth and a whiff of pressed violet lead the nose. The smooth, easygoing palate offers black raspberry, grilled herb and a hint of star anise alongside polished tannins and fresh acidity. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Rocca delle Macìe 2013 Famiglia Zingarelli Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Le Macie 45, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This linear red has attractive aromas of fragrant blue flower, red berry and chopped herb. The taut medium-bodied palate offers dried black cherry, red currant, white pepper and a note of dried sage alongside fine-grained tannins and bright acidity.

properties.title: St. Supéry 2013 Estate Cabernet Franc (Rutherford)
properties.descrption: Cedar dust, dried herb, currant and graphite combine effortlessly in this restrained wine, subtle in buried tannin. It shows voluptuous body with moderate acidity and a ripeness on the finish.

properties.title: Telaya 2014 Syrah
properties.descrption: This wine provides plenty of aromatic intrigue, with notes of wet stone, black pepper and umami. The savory and citrus flavors are quite restrained, showing a lot of elegance.

properties.title: Terre di Talamo 2012 Tempo Riserva  (Morellino di Scansano)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale S. Donato, 58051 Magliano in Toscana GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 85% Sangiovese, 5% Alicante, 5% Cabernet and 5% Syrah, this opens with aromas of violet and Mediterranean brush. The juicy palate doles out black cherry, licorice and black pepper alongside supple tannins. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Trenel Fils 2015  Morgon
properties.address: 33 Chem. de Buery, 71850 Charnay-lès-Mâcon, France
properties.descrption: A rich and fruity wine that is ripe with black-plum fruits. It is soft and smooth, with a juicy berry character. The tannins act as a cushion to all this opulent fruit. It is an attractive cru wine, ready to drink from mid-2017.

properties.title: Jean Loron 2015 Domaine des Billards  (Saint-Amour)
properties.descrption: Billards is the name of a small area of Saint-Amour. The cru wine from this vineyard is richly structured and packed with juicy black fruits. There is a mineral texture from the granite subsoil that gives the wine its structure. Drink from late 2017.

properties.title: Malibu 2014 Syrah (California)
properties.address: 33169 Decker School Rd, Malibu, CA 90265, USA
properties.descrption: There is a lot of promise in this bottling from a single vineyard 1,200 feet above the Malibu coast. Baked blackberry, red plum and sultry strawberry notes appear alongside savory roasted beef and herbs. There's enough pepper on the palate to indicate Syrah, but the fruit is lighter than usual, with bramble and raspberry lifted by touches of fennel and dill.

properties.title: Schloss Gobelsburg 2011 Haidegrund St. Laurent (Niederösterreich)
properties.address: Schloss Str. 16, 3550, Austria
properties.descrption: Fresh redcurrant flavors peek through subtle French oak tones, all balanced nicely by bright acidity. Lighter-bodied and toned, this will be perfect for starters or light lunches.

properties.title: Simonsig 2011 Pinotage (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: Kromme Rhee Rd, Stellenbosch, Cape Town, 7605, South Africa
properties.descrption: This opens with light and bright aromas of ripe red plum and berries, with glimmers of savory herbs and menthol. Accessible and open on the palate, the solid red-fruit core is brimming with juicy flavor, while a soft astringency unfolds on the close.

properties.title: Clos La Chance 2011 Reserve Meritage (Central Coast)
properties.address: 1 Hummingbird Ln, San Martin, CA 95046, USA
properties.descrption: Pleasurable and accesible, yet remarkably complex, this Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend is deliciously drinkable now with everything from burgers and tacos to an elaborate beef stew. It's strong in acidity and dry on the finish.

properties.title: Clos La Chance 2011 Reserve Red (Central Coast)
properties.descrption: Ripe red-cherry jam, red currant, oak and spice flavors mark this blend. It's brightened with brisk acidity, and the mouthfeel is silky and fine. Drink up.

properties.title: Leyda 2012 Single Vineyard Cahuil Vineyard Pinot Noir (Leyda Valley)
properties.descrption: Baked, leathery aromas of animal hide and sun-drenched berries set up a ripe, slightly out of shape palate with flavors of raspberry, plum and apple skins. A sweet tasting, tutti-frutti finish is short and basic. This reads like a wine from a hot year, which 2012 was.

properties.title: Artesa 2009 Elements Red (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: Although a blend of multiple grape varieties, Tempranillo's cherries and Cabernet Sauvignon's black currants and tannins dominate this wine. It's a widely appealing wine that will show dexterity at the dinner table.

properties.title: Casa Silva 2012 Cuvée Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, Angostura, San Fernando, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Wild berry and spice aromas are herbal. This is not that lively in feel, with herbal blue-fruit flavors of blackberry and juniper. This is more green on the finish, which is modestly structured.

properties.title: Atwater 2010 Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5055 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.descrption: Intensely aromatic of ripe black cherries and berries, this is a surprisingly bold, big Pinot Noir. The palate is lush of blackberry preserves and coarse, chunky tannins that dominate the finish.

properties.title: Dreaming Tree 2011 Crush Red (North Coast)
properties.address: 3535 US-1 Suite 100B, Princeton, NJ 08540, USA
properties.descrption: This red blend has ripe tannins and a dusty core of leather that frame rich red fruit on the palate. A partnership between singer Dave Matthews and winemaker Steve Reeder of Simi Winery in Healdsburg, it's fairly priced and accessible, with moderate alcohol and a soft, medium-weight body. It contains mostly Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot.

properties.title: Fort Ross 2012 Rosé Pinot Noir (Fort Ross-Seaview)
properties.descrption: Crisp acidity combined with ripe fruit is pleasant here, but this blush is a tad heavy and lacking in delicacy. The color is dark, and the wine is rich with raspberry jam and spices.

properties.title: Martin Ray 2012 Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.descrption: This isn't particularly complex or ageable, but it is a good example of a ripe Pinot for drinking now, at a fair price. It's slightly honeyed with toasty oak and raspberry jam flavors, and brightened with crisp acidity.

properties.title: Borsao 2011 Monte Oton Garnacha (Campo de Borja)
properties.address: Camino del Tejar, s/n, 50540 Borja, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: This value Garnacha is a fruity number with a no-nonsense berry character and clarity throughout. Cherry and plum aromas are vibrant, while flavors of black plum, boysenberry and medicinality are more than fine. Pepper, spice and overall warmth carry the finish.

properties.title: Cantine Leonardo 2008 Da Vinci  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.descrption: The high acidity on this wine gives it a sharp and steely personality, especially on first impression. Those sharp edges will soften with time but the wine already shows slightly aged aromas of candied berries, tar, tobacco and leather. Pair it with creamy pasta dishes.

properties.title: Château Bourgneuf 2010  Pomerol
properties.address: 1 Chem. de Bourgneuf, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: Tense and firmly tannic, this wine is still very young. Berry and black currant fruit are still dominated by a dry character. The wine will take time toward its slow maturity.

properties.title: Château de Laville 2010  Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.descrption: A full, rich wine, showing red fruits at their best. It has structure and layers of bright acidity. It's not a wine for long aging, likely to be at its best in three years time.

properties.title: Château La Grange Clinet 2010  Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 4 Rte de Saint-Gènes, 33880 Saint-Caprais-de-Bordeaux, France
properties.descrption: Rich and spicy, this is a smooth, wood-aged wine. It has ripe tannins and some concentrated fruits. With its acidity and dry aftertaste, it will certainly age.

properties.title: Ferrero 2008  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Despite the cool growing season in 2008, this Brunello shows ripe aromas of cherry and plump black fruit. Softer tones of spice and graham cracker fill in the rear, and ultimately the wine's crisp acidity comes as a surprise.

properties.title: Grati 1995 Grato Grati Vecchia Annata Sangiovese (Rosso di Toscana)
properties.descrption: From 1995, the vecchia annata (old vintage) referred to in the wine's name, this Sangiovese-based wine shows dried fruit aromas of prune and dried currant backed by licorice, tar and cola. The wine shows nicely aged aromas with some sour cherry and fine, polished tannins on the close.

properties.title: Hawley 2011 Ponzo Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Classic Sonoma Zin—dry, tannic and spicy. Shows the briary, brambly side of the variety, with wild blueberry, blackberry and cola flavors finished with exotic spices and a hint of dark chocolate. The addition of Petite Sirah may be responsible for the sizable tannins. This is a wine that will last for many years, gradually softening, but it's best enjoyed soon for its fruity exuberance.

properties.title: Heredad Ugarte 2008 Martin Cendoya  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: The opening is nice and chunky, with jammy blackberry aromas. The palate on this Tempranillo-led Rioja is full-bodied, with grip and flavors of herbal berry, tea, smoked meat and lemony oak. There's a hint of green to the medium-length finish, which is firm in feel and oaky in flavor.

properties.title: Marchesato degli Aleramici 2008  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.descrption: Here is a straight shooting and easy expression of Brunello with cherry, leather, tobacco and more dark fruit at the back. The wine is very fine and smooth, but ultimately less complex than other vintages.

properties.title: Peachy Canyon 2011 Mustang Springs Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Made in the Peachy Canyon style of great power and ripeness, this is one of the more assertive Zinfandels out there. Blended with some Petite Sirah, which gives it even greater heft, it's basically a nuclear blast of wild, briary summer berries and spices.

properties.title: Southern Right 2010 Pinotage (Hemel en Aarde)
properties.address: Hemel-en-Aarde Valley, R320, Hermanus, 7200, South Africa
properties.descrption: The fruit center of this wine is very ripe and fleshy, but the sprinkling of sweet yet peppery spice and soft gaminess provides depth and interest. The mouthfeel is lush and full, with a chocolate flavor that carries through to the medium-length close.

properties.title: Steven Kent 2009 Ghielmetti Vineyard Petit Verdot (Livermore Valley)
properties.descrption: This small-lot Petit Verdot needs another 5–7 years to shine. There's an intensity of licorice, black fruit and chocolate that's detectable, but the oak and tannin structure loom ominously over the fruit right now. Heaviness on the palate is balanced as well by the wine's acidity, a feat for such a big-boned grape variety.

properties.title: Viñedos y Bodegas Pablo 2010 Menguante Garnacha (Cariñena)
properties.address: Av. Zaragoza, 16, 50108 Almonacid de la Sierra, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Although the bouquet is a bit scratchy, bright, lightly candied aromas of raspberry and strawberry jam are friendly and welcoming. The wine is firm on the palate and well built, with fresh, slightly jammy tasting plum and berry flavors. And it's lasting and fresh on the finish.

properties.title: Kidder Family Wines 2010 Duet Red (Lodi)
properties.descrption: A blend of 57% Graciano and 43% Tempranillo, this rich, soft wine is layered with a tiny streak of hazelnut flavor intermingled among the spicy cherry and dense texture. A great wintertime wine, enjoy with meaty stews or game.

properties.title: Korbin Kameron 2009 Cuvée Kristin Red (Sonoma Valley)
properties.descrption: Marked by exceptionally rich, fruity flavors that finish candy sweet, this Merlot-based blend has cherry jam, blackberry, mocha and spice flavors and soft tannins. Drink it over the next 2–3 years.

properties.title: Las Rocas de San Alejandro 2009 Spanish Red Blend Red (Calatayud)
properties.descrption: Friendly aromas of kirsch and black cherry form the opening. The palate feels plump and flush, with good density and overall balance. In the mouth, nothing is complicated; the wine tastes of pure berry and plum fruits with some chocolaty oak on the finish.

properties.title: Château de Fonbel 2010  Saint-Émilion
properties.descrption: A rich, oak-laden wine that shows fine ripe fruits. There are juicy blackberry and dried fruit flavors allied to a light structure that results in a rich, open and generous wine.

properties.title: Canoe Ridge 2014 The Explorer Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.descrption: This blend of 49% Syrah, 27% Cabernet Franc and 24% Cabernet Sauvignon leads with boysenberry, blackberry and sweet spice aromas, followed by full-bodied, lush fruit flavors. The tannins are a bit tacky, but it's otherwise appealing, showing pleasant balance.

properties.title: Casa Smith 2015 Cinghiale Wahluke Slope & Rosebud Vineyards Sangiovese (Wahluke Slope)
properties.descrption: This wine's macerated cranberry, raspberry jam and dried orange peel aromas are bright. Its raspberry and cranberry flavors are sweet and focused, delivering a lot of appeal, though seeming a bit ripe.

properties.title: Castell d'Encus 2014 Quest Red (Costers del Segre)
properties.descrption: Hailing from high in the Pyrenees, this wine dances to the beat of its own drummer. Floral red-fruit aromas suggest hot stones and wild brush, accompanying leather and tomato scents on this blend of Bordeaux grapes. A tight, tannic palate is home to herbal plum and tea flavors. The wine is earthy tasting but a bit muddled on the finish.

properties.title: Château Los Boldos 2015 Grande Réserve Carmenère (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.descrption: Earthy, gamy aromas of blackberry and other berry fruits are meaty and sauvage. This Carmenère rings with acidity, lending a sense of raciness to the palate. Flavors of currant and plum are tart but also buttery, while an oak-infused finish is long lasting.

properties.title: Cigliuti 2013 Vie Erte  (Barbaresco)
properties.descrption: This wine's exotic spice, leather, toast and vanilla aromas unfold in the glass. The taut, linear palate offers dried black cherry and pomegranate flavors, with a sprinkling of cinnamon, assertive, fine-grained tannins and bright acidity.

properties.title: Coffee Pot Cellars 2014 Meritage (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.descrption: This traditional Bordeaux-style blend offers loads of bright blackberry and cherry flavors accented by notes of dark toast, coconut and spice. Moderately concentrated on the palate, it's juicy yet firmly structured. The finish is marked by bold, dense tannins.

properties.title: Conde de Siruela 2012 Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: 06650 Siruela, Badajoz, Spain
properties.descrption: Unusual but not unpleasant aromas of cinnamon and coffee cake lead to a saturated palate with rugged tannins. Flavors of fig paste, chocolate and baking spices confirm the wine's ripeness, while blackened flavors and rock-hard tannins drive the finish.

properties.title: Domaine Faiveley 2015 Clos de l'Ecu Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.descrption: Perfumed spice aromas give this wine its toasty character. The wood aging dominates the fruit. The fruit is ripe and will develop. Give this wine until 2024.

properties.title: Dusted Valley 2014 Petite Sirah (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 980 Merlot Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This wine's matchstick, dark fruit, vanilla, herb and spice aromas are brooding. It's full and rich on the palate, with dark fruit flavors that linger on the finish.

properties.title: Fielding Hills 2014 Estate Riverbend Vineyard Merlot (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 565 S Lakeshore Rd, Chelan, WA 98816, USA
properties.descrption: Vanilla, herb, cherry, coconut and barrel spice aromas are followed by supple cherry and spice flavors in this wine. The barrel influence is a bit up-front, but it still provides plenty of pleasure.

properties.title: Enate 2011 Syrah (Somontano)
properties.address: Avda.de Las Artes, 1, 22314 Salas Bajas, Huesca, Spain
properties.descrption: A tight beam of oak and char runs through prune, blackberry and cassis aromas. This Somontano Syrah feels tight like a fist, with rough tannins and bright acidity. Peppery oak and black-fruit flavors are lightly herbal and spicy on a snappy finish that doesn't lay down. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Saviah 2014 Tempranillo (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: With fruit from Funk, Dugger Creek and Watermill Estate vineyards, this delivers funky peat, olive and fresh tobacco aromas. The flavors are light, soft and palate-coating, gliding into the finish. A subtle rendition of the variety.

properties.title: Siduri 2015 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: Elegant aromas of black plum, asphalt, black tea and sandalwood show on the nose of this appellation blend from Adam Lee. The palate offers hints of forest floor with mushroom and mulberry flavors, as well as a persistent woody spice.

properties.title: Stottle 2013 Big Eddie Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2641 Willamette Dr NE ste e, Lacey, WA 98516, USA
properties.descrption: This combines 60% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon and 20% Malbec. Its baking spice, black fruit and herb aromas are followed by silky-smooth dark fruit flavors that linger on the finish.

properties.title: Vite Colte 2015 La Luna e i Falò Barbera
properties.descrption: This has black-skinned berry, mocha and tilled soil aromas. The concentrated palate doles out blackberry, clove and anise flavors alongside fresh acidity and fine-grained tannins. Enjoy through 2021.

properties.title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2015 Vieilles Vignes  (Savigny-lès-Beaune)
properties.descrption: Old vines on the Aegerter Domaine in Savigny-lès-Beaune give a rounded ripe wine. It has a crisper red-cherry side to its otherwise smooth texture. The tannins support all this juicy fruit and offer a chance for the wine to age. Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Kingston Family 2015 CJ's Barrel Syrah (Casablanca Valley)
properties.descrption: The distinct smell of fresh asphalt along with leather, burnt coffee, charred oak and black cherry make up the nose. In the mouth, this wine is wiry and acidic. Spiced black-plum flavors are peppery, riding a beam of acidity on a finish that could use more weight and tannins for balance. Drink through 2024.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2015 Collection Tramier  (Corton)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: This still-young wine is jammy while firmly structured with dry tannins. There is a foursquare character that misses subtlety with its broad-brush approach. The wine does need to age and will be ready to drink from 2023.

properties.title: Viña Casas Patronales 2010 Reserva Carmenère (Maule Valley)
properties.descrption: Toasty, tarry aromas include dark berry and baked plum notes. This offers ample tartaric acidity to cut the wine's weight, while flavors of berry, tea, mint and herbs lead to a good tasting but hollow feeling finish.

properties.title: Château Grand Marchand 2011  Bordeaux
properties.address: 12239 Center Rd, Traverse City, MI 49686, USA
properties.descrption: This firm wine has black-currant and red-plum fruit, nicely integrated with the dry core. Ready to drink, although capable of aging a year or two.

properties.title: Acorn 2010 Alegria Vineyards Sangiovese (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Shows Sangiovese's bright cherry and cola flavors and mouthwatering acidity, in a light, silky texture. It's a good, dry, savory wine, but a little one-dimensional. Drink up.

properties.title: La Storia by Trentadue 2010 Cuvée Evelyna Red (Alexander Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a Merlot-based Bordeaux-style blend, containing the five classic varieties. It's a little hot in alcohol and overripe, with raisin, prune and blackberry flavors. Will age for a long time, without gaining complexity.

properties.title: Francis Ford Coppola 2011 Votre Santé Pinot Noir (California)
properties.descrption: A nice starter Pinot for the price. Will introduce newcomers to the variety's light, silky texture and savory berry and spice flavors, touched with smoky oak.

properties.title: Château le Raz 2002  Montravel
properties.address: Vignoble Barde Chateau le Raz, 24610 Saint-Méard-de-Gurçon, France
properties.descrption: Generally regarded as one of the lighter vintages of the 21st century, the wine still has charm and attractive mature flavors like mushroom, as well as a leathery texture. The end still hints at freshness and attractive fruit.

properties.title: Coghlan 2010 Diopside Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: Doesn't taste quite ripe, as is the case with some 2010 Pinots due to the chilly season. There's a minty, green sharpness to the raspberries and cherries. Nicely silky but not an ager, so drink up.

properties.title: Lomas del Valle 2012 Coast Cool Climate Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
properties.descrption: Piercing sour raspberry aromas introduce an edgy, scratchy feeling wine with a combo of minty, herbal pie cherry and red plum flavors. This dries out and finishes modestly, but always with true Pinot Noir character.

properties.title: François Lurton 2010 Hacienda Araucano Clos de Lolol Red (Lolol Valley)
properties.address: Km 29 Ruta - l.72, Lolol, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: A scratchy, fiery opening of juniper, cheesy leather and berry fruit aromas settles with airing. This is tannic as a bag of rocks, with toasty, herbal, dark-fruit flavors. Throughout this feels abrasive, hard and blocky, with a finish of spice and chocolate flavors roughened by hard residual tannins.

properties.title: Château Maréchaux 2014  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.descrption: This is a wine with light spice and perfumed red fruits. It is juicy, fresh, lightly tannic and likely to develop quickly. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Queyssard 2014  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.descrption: The wine has plenty of ripe fruit, raspberry flavors and light spice. With a crisp streak of acidity, it is beginning to show a good balance. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Sainte-Luce Bellevue 2014 Tradition  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: Rte de Bellevue, 49190 Val-du-Layon, France
properties.descrption: This wine from Bruno Martin's 3.3-acre vineyard is going to be a fresh and fruity. Already it has a fine juicy character and plenty of red fruits. Crisp acidity at the end confirms this bright character.

properties.title: Dante Robere 2014 Tracy Hills Barbera (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 1200 Wetmore Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: Peppery and beefy in aroma, this wine is heavy on the savory components and rather lean on fruit flavors.

properties.title: Altavins 2015 Almodí Petit Red (Terra Alta)
properties.descrption: Jumpy cherry and berry aromas are basic. A fruity, fresh palate delivers straightforward berry flavors prior to a quick finish.

properties.title: Château du Grand Pierre 2014  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.descrption: The spicy wood is prominent here. It balances the red-berry fruits and bright acidity. That makes for a perfumed, juicy wine that will finish fresh and crisp.

properties.title: Maison Hebrard 2014 Premium  (Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.descrption: This is a dry wine although the fruit does show potential. It is concentrated and firm, tannins foremost. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Maitea 2014  Ribera del Duero
properties.descrption: In this heavy wine, stewy, baked aromas of raisin and prune are smothered in oak. On the palate, there's a reverb of oak and baked black-fruit flavors, while the finish feels and tastes resiny.

properties.title: Martin Lane Winery 2010 Sanguinetti Vineyard Sangiovese (Lodi)
properties.descrption: This wine is unusual for its smoky, earthy, petrol character that's easy to catch in the aroma and that lasts through the finish.

properties.title: Arínzano 2015 Hacienda de ArínzanoRosé Tempranillo (Pago de Arínzano)
properties.descrption: Mild citrus and stone-fruit aromas include a note of crushed vitamin. This bright-pink rosé is wide but citric on the palate, with mild nectarine and white-grape flavors. On the finish, this is round in feel without much flavor.

properties.title: Bodegas Paniza 2015 Agostón Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon (Cariñena)
properties.address: Carretera Valencia, Km 53, 50480 Paniza, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of berry fruit, wet cement and chewing gum struggle to make their case. This feels sticky and confected, while flavors of candied berry, mint and spicy oak finish with herbal notes and sweetness.

properties.title: Celler Cooperatiu de Gandesa 2013 Somdinou Red (Terra Alta)
properties.descrption: This blend of Carignan, Garnacha and other red grapes opens with stewy, herbal, slightly weedy plum aromas. A sticky, sinewy mouthfeel is more clumsy than agile, while flavors convey stewed berry fruits and prune. Low acidity throughout, especially on the finish, is a bit compromising.

properties.title: Château de Beauregard-Ducourt 2014  Bordeaux
properties.descrption: This is a structured, firm wine that has tense tannins and acidity. It is smoky with a dry core. The fruit is just not there.

properties.title: Château Haut Mouleyre 2014  Bordeaux
properties.address: La Mouleyre, 33330, 33330 Saint-Étienne-de-Lisse, France
properties.descrption: The wine is spicy and laden with wood. It has an extracted character that produces chocolate and bitter coffee flavors. The fruit is hard to find at this stage.

properties.title: Château Laffitte Laujac 2012  Médoc
properties.descrption: This is an obviously wood-aged wine with plenty of toast flavors. This wood aging has flattened the fruit giving a wine that is soft with few tannins. It is ready to drink.

properties.title: Château Briot 2014  Bordeaux
properties.descrption: Initially a little rustic, the wine does open out. It is smoky, fruity with the acidity of the vintage.

properties.title: Château la Mothe du Barry 2014 Cuvée Design  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 2 Les Arromans, 33420 Moulon, France
properties.descrption: Strawberry fruit flavors dominate this soft wine. It is unfocussed and misses out on clarity and shape.

properties.title: Château le Sèpe 2014  Bordeaux
properties.descrption: The wine is dry, firm and with too many tannins for its own good. It does have hints of fruit along with spice and acidity. Shame about the over extraction that gives it a bitter aftertaste.

properties.title: Château les Berthets 2014  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: Les Berthets, 39220 Les Rousses, France
properties.descrption: This is a lean wine, all tannins and missing fruit. It is dry and showing considerable hard extraction. It will soften, but not much.

properties.title: Emilio Moro 2015 Finca Resalso  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.descrption: Raw, gamy aromas of herbal black fruits and wet dog fur set up a bumpy palate that's tough and jagged. Unabsorbed oak sits atop rudimentary berry fruit flavors, while the finish is choppy, oaky and herbal.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2012 Walter Clore Private Reserve Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.descrption: Merlot (80%) is in the lead on this blend, with the rest rounded out by Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Malbec. Cocoa, dark raspberry, vanilla and toast aromas lead to supple fruit and barrel flavors backed by grainy tannins that need some time in the cellar to smooth out.

properties.title: Full Pull & Friends 2012 Klipsun Vineyard Merlot (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: There's a whole lot of appeal in this wine, with aromas of dark raspberries and barrel spices leading to rich, full-bodied fruit flavors with a velvety texture. It's a shamelessly appealing example of the variety.

properties.title: Gary Farrell 2013 Gap's Crown Vineyard Clone 667 Three Barrel Selection Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: This is another of the producer's intellectual exercises in experimental winemaking, made in tiny case-production numbers. It offers so much to think about, from its lemony-crisp and tangy palate to its chalky tannins. Full bodied, it merits attention, veering from herbal to chocolaty in one sip.

properties.title: Jeff Gordon 2011 Joie de Vivre Red (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: A blend of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon from Napa Valley, 10% Cabernet from Sonoma County's Monte Rosso Vineyard and 10% Petit Verdot from Napa, this wine reflects the cool vintage. It offers herb, cedar and peppercorn on the nose along with plenty of acidity and structure. The fruit tends red in cassis and cranberry, finishing juicy.

properties.title: Landmark 2013 Grand Detour Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: From a mix of vineyards within the vast Sonoma Coast, this wine offers dark color, tannic proportions, sizable oak and a touch of black pepper and anise, bringing out rich, bold, full-bodied flavor. Concentrated and dense in wild strawberry compote, it finishes in dried herb.

properties.title: Mas de Cadenet 2013 Red (Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire)
properties.descrption: Cigar-box aromas and a rich character give this wine a sense of perfumed concentration. It is young, with a stalky character still evident. The structure is firm, and the blackberry fruits still coming together. Give this wine until 2017 before drinking.

properties.title: Mezzacorona 2007 NOS Riserva  (Teroldego Rotaliano)
properties.descrption: Dark and dense, this opens with earthy aromas of underbrush, scorched earth, smoke and ripe black-skinned fruit. The firm palate offers ripe plum, blackberry, black cherry, black pepper and anise alongside velvety tannins.

properties.title: Pech Merle 2012 Cabernet Franc (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 21001 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Black pepper and baking spices surround a full-bodied and structured core of raspberry and black cherry in this small-production wine. It finishes in balance and with a touch of elegance.

properties.title: Bellangelo 2013 Cabernet Franc (Seneca Lake)
properties.descrption: A testament of Bellangelo's increasing winemaking prowess, this Cabernet Franc highlights fresh floral exuberance amidst a crush of concentrated sour cherry and cranberry flavors. While delicate in style and fringed by a whisper of tannins, its brambly, herbaceous complexities resonate through a long, meandering finish.

properties.title: Hendry 2012 Hendry Vineyard Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3104 Redwood Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Nearly equal parts Malbec and Cabernet Sauvignon, this blend also features good handfuls of Petit Verdot, Merlot and Cabernet Franc that offer soft, velvety flavors of blackberry and blueberry. Lightly oaked, the tannins are grippy while the wine generates an herbal undertone on the nose.

properties.title: Lagar de Bezana 2013 Edición Limitada Syrah (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.descrption: Dense, smoky aromas of well-toasted oak are lactic on impact, with blackberry and cassis scents in support.
