This is woody, resiny and tannic on the palate, which makes it rough now but bodes well for down the line. Charred, toasty oak and herbal blackberry flavors finish minty, with a speck of creosote. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: San Cassiano 2011  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.descrption: Aromas of crushed blue flower, perfumed berry, exotic spice and a whiff of charcuterie emerge on this bold red. The concentrated palate offers dried black cherry, blackberry extract, licorice and ground pepper accompanied by firm, fine-grained tannins.

properties.title: Shannon Ridge 2012 High Elevation Collection Zinfandel (Lake County)
properties.descrption: Aromas like spiced apple and brown sugar lead to luscious fruit and spice flavors and a plush texture in this medium-bodied wine. It has the richness and near-sweetness that can pair well with slowly cooked meats and mildly spicy dishes, but sips well on its own as well.

properties.title: Sobon Estate 2013 Zinfandel (Fiddletown)
properties.address: 14430 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Lots of fruit power flows through this full-bodied wine, making it focused and delicious. A firm coating of tannin kicks in to add weight to the texture and help the flavors linger on the finish. Plum, smoke and black pepper are among the complex flavors. It's made from vines planted in 1910 at a nearly 2,000-foot elevation.

properties.title: William Grassie 2012 Impératrice Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 7802 Center Blvd SE Suite A, Snoqualmie, WA 98065, USA
properties.descrption: Though labeled as a red blend, at 94% this could be a varietally labeled Merlot and it drinks like it. Aromas of cocoa, raspberry and spice box are followed by plump, soft chocolate and raspberry flavors accented by tart acids that hold the balance through the finish.

properties.title: Marilyn 2010 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 16234 Marquis Rd, Orange, VA 22960, USA
properties.descrption: This shows the softness and red cherry flavors of a nice Merlot, with rich Napa tannins and a hint of green mint. It's a clean, dry wine for drinking now.

properties.title: Marques de Griñon 2007 El Rincón Syrah-Grenache (Vinos de Madrid)
properties.descrption: With a dark purple hue and rubbery, horsy aromas of black fruit, leather, dried beef and coffee, this full-bodied blend of 95% Syrah and 5% Garnacha delivers plump, chewy flavors of dark plum and ripe blackberry. There's also a lot of animal, earth and leather to the rustic finish.

properties.title: Umani Ronchi 2010 San Lorenzo  (Rosso Conero)
properties.address: Via Adriatica, 12, 60027 Osimo AN, Italy
properties.descrption: San Lorenzo opens with bright cherry fruit and blueberry with subtle background notes of almond paste and dried tobacco. Overall, this clean and fresh red wine would pair with roast chicken or turkey.

properties.title: Undurraga 2011 Aliwen Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon-Carmenère (Rapel Valley)
properties.descrption: This opens hard and crusty, but with airing it softens as chocolate, plastic, creamy oak and spice aromas emerge. The palate is compact and fairly full bodied, with herbal, roasted, leathery tasting berry flavors that end with savory, oaky notes. Overall, this is a good blend of Cabernet and Carmenère.

properties.title: Uvaggio 2010 Barbera (Lodi)
properties.descrption: A great-value Barbera sourced from Lodi and entirely barrel-aged, Uvaggio's Italian red is very savory and rich with a mix of leather, cherry, chocolate and perfume. With a small amount of Primitivo in the blend, it'll accompany meats and pastas in red sauce as well as drink nicely on its own, the acidity standing up to a wide range of earthy dishes.

properties.title: Grands Terroirs de France 2010  Haut-Médoc
properties.descrption: Firmly tannic yet with the potential of good black currant fruit, this is a fine reflection of the vintage, rich and fruity, layered with considerably fresh acidity. Drink now, or give it a year.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2010 Estate Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: This wine is medium-bodied, with slightly briny flavors of cherry, earth and herb. It's balanced and holds interest, with a clear emphasis on the herbal aspect of Oregon Pinot Noir.

properties.title: Obsidian 2011 Tempranillo (Oregon)
properties.descrption: Purple and plum in color, this delivers plummy fruit and graphite, or charcoal dust, in the tannins. It's bone dry and straightforward, clean and balanced.

properties.title: Animale 2010 Petite Sirah (Yakima Valley)
properties.descrption: Not surprisingly, this young wine has dense, potent tannins, along with plenty of stem and herb accents. It's balanced texturally, and has rather acidic, young fruit flavors of cranberry and raspberry. At the moment it is the most chewy and tannic of all the 2010 reds from Animale.

properties.title: Broadway Vineyards 2009 Estate Grown Syrah (Carneros)
properties.address: 21330 Broadway, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Give this Syrah a few hours of decanting and drink it now. It's dry, full bodied and dense in blackberry, blueberry, bacon, pepper and oak flavors. Shows real elegance and class, but not an ager.

properties.title: Cantine Lupo 2010 Syranto Syrah (Lazio)
properties.address: Via Mediana-Cisterna, 27, 04011 Campoverde (Aprilia) LT, Italy
properties.descrption: The winemaking efforts of Lazio (the region that houses the Italian capital, Rome) are slowly being noticed thanks to an admittedly small group of quality-minded producers. This Syrah shows ripe fruit and soft roundness with elements of prune, coffee and cherry liqueur.

properties.title: Château Ramage la Batisse 2010 L'Enclose de Ramage  (Haut-Médoc)
properties.descrption: The second wine of Château Ramage la Batisse, L'Enclos is ripe and fruity. It has a sense of structure although this is played down by the rich black currant fruits. Acidity cuts through the general richness of this medium-aging wine.

properties.title: Còlpetrone 2010  Montefalco Rosso
properties.descrption: The blend here is Sangiovese (70%), Sagrantino and Merlot and the wine opens with an inky dark appearance followed by bulky tones of black cherry, cola and spice.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2010 Serie Riberas Gran Reserva Ribera del Tinguiririca Marchigue Malbec (Chile)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Herb and olive aromas give this Malbec a slightly green nose. There's a lot of body and acid once it hits the palate along with flavors of herbal berry, mint and pepper. This is sturdy, fully oaked and minty on the finish.

properties.title: Domini de la Cartoixa 2007 Galena Red (Priorat)
properties.address: Camino de la Solana, s/n 43736 El Molar Tarragona, España, 43736 El Molar, Tarragona, Spain
properties.descrption: Leather and herbal berry fruit aromas come with a horsey, stalky side. The palate is solid but hard, with herbal, stemmy flavors of licorice, baked berry and chocolate. The finish is chocolaty and slightly bitter, with a leftover green note.

properties.title: Cambridge 2013 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 700 Kenseth Way, Cambridge, WI 53523, USA
properties.descrption: Dense tannins find their way to roundness amid a smattering of red and blue berries and an intense shock of dried herb. The finish is a mix of leather pouch and brine.

properties.title: Campolargo 2012 Vinha do Putto Red (Bairrada)
properties.address: bairro 3780, Estr. São Lourenço do Bairro 43, 3780, Portugal
properties.descrption: The wine is all fruit, fresh red berries and refreshing acidity. The tannins are soft, rounded and generous, just supporting the fruitiness. The wine is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Carl Ehrhard 2014 Rüdesheim Pinot Sekt Pinot Noir (Rheingau)
properties.address: Geisenheimer Str. 3, 65385 Rüdesheim am Rhein, Germany
properties.descrption: A whisper of caramelized sugar glazes crisp berries and plums in this finely moussed sparkling Pinot Noir. It's elegantly structured, balancing striking cranberry acidity against a palate that's fruity, fresh and mineral.

properties.title: Casa Agricola Alexandre Relvas 2014 Art Terra Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: Produced from organically grown grapes, this is a young, fruity wine that has been produced to be drunk young. Light tannins and pure black currant flavors give the wine plenty of freshness and acidity. The wine is rich and ready to drink.

properties.title: Casa Agricola Alexandre Relvas 2014 Herdade da Pimenta Pimenta Preta Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: A young and fruity wine that is already balanced. So the tannins give a structure to the forward blackberry fruits and acidity. It's a juicy, full-bodied wine, the Alicante Bouschet in the blend giving the richness and also the structure. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Castoro Cellars 2013 Whale Rock Vineyard Reserve Tempranillo (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 1315 N Bethel Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.descrption: This wine's silky-smooth nose blends aromas of cherry pastries and cinnamon donut with black gravel and gingerbread. The palate is grippy with tannins that add mouthfeel but not a ton of structure, offering flavors of dense strawberry and tar.

properties.title: Division 2014 Methven Familly Vineyards Cru Gamay Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.descrption: Aged in neutral oak, this appealing wine has a strong underpinning of wet rock. The spicy, tart cranberry/raspberry fruit is rich enough to deserve more bottle age in order to reach its peak. Drink 2016–2020.

properties.title: Pagos del Rey 2014 Arnegui  (Rioja)
properties.address: Ctra. Nacional 232, P.K. 422,7, 26360 Fuenmayor, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Fresh, dry red-fruit aromas lead the charge on this tasty but simple Rioja that feels crisp, healthy and balanced. Flavors of plum, raspberry and herbs finish mild.

properties.title: 2 Lads 2013 Pinot Noir (Old Mission Peninsula)
properties.address: 16985 Smokey Hollow Rd, Traverse City, MI 49686, USA
properties.descrption: An earthy geranium note lingers above a core of dark cherry and raspberry on the nose. The medium-bodied palate boasts light tannins and a flavor profile of cherries, wilting red flowers and anise.

properties.title: Ancient Cellars 2012 One Toe Duck Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: The scents mingle rose petals, sandalwood and a touch of bitter greens. That dusting of incense continues on the palate, with Indian spices and tart red fruit. Tannins are firm and proportionate, with a bit of stem flavoring the finish.

properties.title: Bellingham 2013 The Bernard Series Bush Vine Pinotage (Coastal Region)
properties.address: 4301 Industrial Way, Benicia, CA 94510, USA
properties.descrption: Graphite, char, vanilla bean and cedar plank lay atop the black berry and plum preserve fruit core on the nose. The palate is creamy and mouthfilling at first, offering rich notes of vanilla-infused stewed berries and raspberry sauce that are then overwhelmed by aggressive, green tannins that hold the palate hostage through the long, woody finish.

properties.title: Bouchaine 2012 Pinot Noir (Carneros-Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: Truffled earth and cranberry-strawberry envelop sizable oak and bittersweet tannin in this warm-vintage wine. On the more light-bodied side, it features savory tinges of black tea.

properties.title: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo 2009 Late Bottled Vintage  (Port)
properties.winery: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo
properties.descrption: This wine is fruity, supported by firm tannins that integrate well with the acidity. While there is a delicious black currant and berry fruit character, this wine needs to develop richness as it matures. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Ramos-Pinto 2009 Late Bottled Vintage  (Port)
properties.descrption: Bacon aromas lead to a wine that is spicy, dry and meaty in character. There is a stalky element at first, yet turns to fresh, ripe fruit balanced by lively acidity. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Siduri 2013 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Crisp earth and seamless tannin give this wine a sultry softness around a subtle overlay of oak. Black cherry and leather meet in the middle, buoyed by a zest of acidity, medium weight and a lengthy finish.

properties.title: Rozes 2012 Terras do Grifo Red (Douro)
properties.address: R. Cândido dos Reis 526, 4430-999 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: Named after the vultures which fly in the Douro, this solid, structured wine is full of tannins as well as ripe fruit. It comes from a good red wine vintage, allowing the structure to develop richly with a good concentration. The wine still needs time, so drink from 2017.

properties.title: Bodega Patritti 2012 Primogénito Pinot Noir (Patagonia)
properties.address: -38.597623, -68.258987, Neuquén, Argentina
properties.descrption: Leafy tomato, dried cherry and baked plum aromas cover most ends of the Pinot spectrum. This feels round, ripe and a touch tannic, while oaky flavors of vanilla and chocolate dominate, ending with more than a dash of wood spice.

properties.title: Bodegas Murtia 2013 Cármine Monastrell (Jumilla)
properties.address: Carril Molino Alfatego, 220, 30100 Murcia, Spain
properties.descrption: Blackberry and cassis aromas are bold and come with a coating of oak that brings vanilla and sweet plastic into the frame. A crisp, tightly wound palate shows plum and red-currant flavors in front of a snappy finish with oak spice and chocolate hints.

properties.title: Domaine de Roche Guillon 2014  Beaujolais-Villages
properties.descrption: Dry in style, this dark-hued wine comes from vines between 30 and 90 years old. With firm tannins and a dry core, it is only just showing its fruity side. Coming from a five-generation family's vineyard near Fleurie, it has the richness and potential of wines from this cru. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Chehalem 2013 Three Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 31190 NE Veritas Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of the three estate vineyards is the first Pinot to be released from each vintage. Here it spent time in 22% oak, roughly half new. Cranberry, pomengranate, dried herbs and some gently earthy tannins combine in a tart, gulpable style.

properties.title: Innocent Bystander 2013 Pinot Noir (Yarra Valley)
properties.descrption: This reflects the Yarra region's Pinot Noir character well, combining earthy, cola- and beet-scented notes with well-ripened tannins and medium body. There's a fair bit of textural richness for such a modestly priced Pinot. Drink now.

properties.title: Lorenzi Estate 2011 Lot 451 Syrah (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 36095 Monte De Oro Rd, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.descrption: Stewed olallieberries and black cherries gain nuance from concentrated red rose petals, cola and gravel on this wine from Riverside County. Like many of this winery's bottlings, the palate shows lots of barrel influence, with strong vanilla elements laced amidst blueberry and lighter red fruits.

properties.title: Dutton Estate 2013 Manzana Vineyard Dutton Ranch Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a full-bodied wine, soft and smooth with integrated tannins, yet robust in black cherry and graham cracker. The savory fruit is seasoned in baking spices and a touch of herbes de Provence, finishing with aplomb.

properties.title: Domaine de la Sauveuse 2006 Cuvée Philippine Red (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 170 Lyle Snowden Rd, Lyle, WA 98635, USA
properties.descrption: Like the estate's Cuvée Carolle, this has a note of volatility and sur-maturité, but it's also bigger, richer and more extracted, with lots of ripe tannins but also thick purple fruit that comes through on the finish. Try in 2010. 40% Syrah, 40% Cab Sauvignon, 10% Mourvèdre, 10% Grenache.

properties.title: Gary Farrell 2005 Ramal Vineyard Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 10701 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: The Ramal Vineyard has been source to a fine series of Buena Vista Pinot Noirs. Farrell has captured another interpretation of its terroir, not quite as lush or ripe, but firm in acid-inspired cherries and licorice, with a subtle veneer of smoky oak. It's a dry, crisp young wine, well-structured, a good partner for upscale fare such as lamb chops.

properties.title: Seven Hills 2005 Ciel du Cheval Red Red (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: A beautifully structured Bordeaux blend from one of Washington's great vineyards. This spent about 18 months in French oak, and another 9–10 months in bottle. It is sleek and somewhat austere at first, but sculpted and evocative, with subtle, mixed fruits and impressions of steel and gunpowder. As the fruit comes up it shows some pretty blackberry and black cherry character, nicely balanced and set to evolve over the next decade or more.

properties.title: Soléna 2005 Willakia Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.descrption: The vineyard name is a combination of the two prevalent soil types, Nekia and WillaKenzie. The Dijon clone Pinot is dark and pleasantly earthy, with core flavors of cassis and cherry liqueur. The earthy, slightly rustic tannins coat the throat, leaving an astringent, green tea residue, but the silky fruit compensates. This needs some further bottle age to really shine.

properties.title: Viña Pérez Cruz 2003 Cot Reserva Limited Edition Malbec (Maipo Valley)
properties.descrption: It's not often that we come across Chilean Malbec (Cot) with several years of bottle age, but this offers that and a little more. The nose is pure, with herbal hints and plenty of sauvage character. Roundness and depth give it length on the palate, which is endowed with solid berry flavors and proper savory accents. A wine with personality that's drinking perfectly right now.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2006 Estate Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.descrption: The Estate Vineyard bottling shows a definite meaty, almost Rhone-like aroma, but this is no Syrah. It's a very elegant, light, sultry bottle of Pinot Noir. The tart black cherry and currant fruit is shadowed by smoke and cinnamon, but the balance throughout is light and delicate.

properties.title: Chatter Creek 2005 Clifton Hill Vineyard Syrah (Wahluke Slope)
properties.descrption: Clifton Hill Syrah looks and smells the way you'd hope it would, black in the center, purple/garnet at the edges, peppery and loaded with sweet grapey fruit. Viognier skins—not juice—added to the fermenter elevate the aromas with floral and citrus accents. It's juicy and fairly light in flavor, but clean and very fresh, with no new oak.

properties.title: Cortes de Cima 2005 Incógnito Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: A wine that has become something of a cult in Portugal, perhaps because of its mystery name (referring to a time when Syrah was not permitted in Portugal). This 2005 keeps the open, ripe blackberry jam fruit, with dark chocolate and herbal flavors. It has a generous, earthy character.

properties.title: Dona Maria 2004 Amantis Red (Alentejano)
properties.descrption: This rare blend of Cabernet, Syrah, Petit Verdot and Touriga Nacional works surprisingly well, emphasizing tannic structure rather than fruit. The acidity of the Cab is what keeps it from being heavy, while the dense color and herbal flavors show its southern warmth and richness. Dried plums and fresh acidity to finish.

properties.title: Andrew Rich 2005 Counoise (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Counoise—a southern Rhône blending grape—only rarely appears as a varietal wine, but this distinctive bottling makes a strong case for it. It's not just another generic red wine; it has a particular mouthfeel—elegant, almost Pinot-like—coupled with firm, slightly metallic tannins, sharp acids and accents of pepper on stone. Somehow the wine feels, more than tastes, European.

properties.title: Brandborg 2006 Ferris Wheel Vineyard Estate Pinot Noir (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 345 1st St, Elkton, OR 97436, USA
properties.descrption: As with the other Pinots from Brandborg, this estate bottling puts the spices front and center, and matches the intensity of the fruit and barrels appropriately. This is seductive and elegant with a feminine grace. The spicy plum and red currant flavors carry some tasty barrel notes of clove and cinnamon, and the wine has a bit more intensity than its stablemates.

properties.title: Casa de Santar 2004 Red (Dão)
properties.descrption: Somewhat tough initially, with the tannins coming before the fruit, and a distinctly lean character. But this is deceptive, because there is certainly enough fruit there to give richness after two years' aging, when the blackberry and licorice flavors will come up through all that dryness.

properties.title: O'Reilly's 2006 Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.descrption: This is hands-down the best value Pinot Noir made in Oregon, year in and year out. It's firm and full-bodied, perfectly ripe, with lovely spices that range from pepper to cinnamon and allspice. The fruit lingers in the midpalate, round and tangy, with flavors of cherry and plum. It's a thoroughly rich and satisfying wine that is big enough to work with dark poultry, salmon and even veal.

properties.title: Pali 2006 Momtazi Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 2130 India St, San Diego, CA 92101, USA
properties.descrption: This is interesting—a California take on Oregon Pinot Noir. It's sleek and spicy, with a racy spine and a very tart, dry mouthfeel. The fruit is peppery and hard; like hard candy with an herbal streak. The wine hides its almost 15% alcohol quite well, but it will reward ample breathing time.

properties.title: Quinta da Romaneira 2004 Red (Douro)
properties.address: Cotas, 5070-252 Alijó, Portugal
properties.descrption: The first fruits of the renaissance of this grand Douro quinta (which now also houses a luxury hotel). It is huge, revealing up-front, modern, polished black fruits that would not be out of place in Australia. Maybe the typicity is lacking, but the wine certainly has grandeur, power and rich, extracted fruits. The pepper finish reveals the alcohol.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2013 Amplus Old Vine Carignan (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Izaga 1096, Isla de Maipo, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: This dark, muscular Carignan smells cool and earthy, with a heavy dose of unintegrated oak creating woodgrain and vanilla aromas. This feels full but shows structural gaps, while blackberry, clove and resiny, grainy flavors finish with tannic hardness and lasting woody flavors.

properties.title: Sierra Starr 2012 Inertia Red (Sierra Foothills)
properties.descrption: Dark fruit aromas and flavors join with a generous texture and full body to make a complete and satisfying wine. This has just enough tannin to make it appetizing and well balanced.

properties.title: Tolosa 2013 Clonal Select Pinot Noir (Edna Valley)
properties.descrption: This blended study of 2A, 115, 667 and Pommard clones shows black pepper, red cherry, pressed purple flowers, eucalyptus and a touch of hot asphalt on the nose. The lean and light palate conveys lots of dried herbs and raspberry-cranberry juice, enlivening the tongue with sourness.

properties.title: Vignerons de Bel Air 2014 Grande QV  (Coteaux Bourguignons)
properties.address: 1086 Rue Bruce, Dunham, QC J0E 1M0, Canada
properties.descrption: Made from selected parcels of Gamay, this structured wine offers both fruit and fresh acidity. It has a dry core, giving a solid wine with some aging potential. Aromatic and fresh red fruits complete a wine that will be better from 2016.

properties.title: Stemmler 2013 Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.descrption: From multiple vineyard sites in the appellation, this wine is a tremendous value, offering vibrancy and complexity in an approachable way. The entry is marked by candied raspberry and strawberry, with hits of cinnamon and earth. Soft and easygoing, it ends in a rustic knot of tight tannin that resolves in the glass.

properties.title: Ventosa 2009 Merlot (Seneca Lake)
properties.descrption: Dark, luxurious streaks of blackberry and cherry lend heft and silkiness to this full-bodied Merlot. Subtly spiced, it's accented by sprightly acidity and fine, feathery tannins in the midpalate.

properties.title: Weather 2012 Reserve Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7670 Carpet Rd, New Tripoli, PA 18066, USA
properties.descrption: Earthy mushroom and forest floor rise from the opening bouquet of this reserve-level wine that expresses itself in dense, full-bodied layers of dark, bittersweet cherry. Concentrated and robust, it finishes savory and mouthwateringly fleshy.

properties.title: Sobon Estate 2012 Rocky Top Zinfandel (Amador County)
properties.address: 14430 Shenandoah Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Let's call it a highly stylized but nonetheless attractive wine. A sweet, spicy oak character floods the taste impressions, the body is full, and the texture firm but smooth. Enticing notes of orange zest, cinnamon and vanilla—almost sweet—dominate the smells and flavors.

properties.title: Millbrook 2013 Proprietor's Special Reserve Pinot Noir (New York)
properties.descrption: Touches of balsamic vinegar, violet and wet granite lend complexity to this crisp, elegant Pinot Noir. Black cherry and plum flavors are penetrating and pristine, finishing with a fringe of dusty tannins.

properties.title: Alto Los Romeros 2013 Gran Reserva Triumpheros Merlot (Colchagua Valley)
properties.descrption: Toasty, roasted aromas of earthy plum and berry fruits set up a full-bodied but friendly palate of soft tannins. Dark, oaky, minty flavors of black fruits finish with peppery spice, good length and some heat.

properties.title: Beaulieu Vineyard 2012 Maestro Collection Merlot (Carneros-Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1960 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.descrption: From the cooler climes of Carneros, long a good match for the variety, this wine offers sanguine notes of cranberry on the nose, before developing a soft, flavorful core of dusty cinnamon and baked plum.

properties.title: Château de Cordes 2012 Syrah-Carignan (Minervois)
properties.address: 1998 WI-87, St Croix Falls, WI 54024, USA
properties.descrption: Warm, spicy scents of brambly blackberry, spiced plum and fruit cake grace the bouquet of this 80% Syrah and 20% Carignan blend. Hints of graphite add intrigue, while soft tannins and fruit-skin flavors lend an attractive earthiness to the palate. An approachable and ready-to-drink selection.

properties.title: Gary Farrell 2014 Fort Ross Vineyard Pinot Noir (Fort Ross-Seaview)
properties.address: 10701 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A shy nose demands further time in the glass to open this medium-bodied and truly compelling offering from this far-flung coastal site. A depth of black cherry, cranberry and black tea awaits, marked by tart acidity and silky-smooth waves of flavor and body.

properties.title: Alta Vista 2013 Single Vineyard Serenade Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Alzaga 3972, M5505 Chacras de Coria, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: This pitch-black Malbec opens with aromas of raisin, blackberry, cassis and vanilla. The palate exhibits a tight muscular grip, while flavors of mocha, chocolate, prune and cassis finish with complex hints of leather and salt. Drink this massive offering from 2018–2026.

properties.title: Tapiz 2012 Las Notas de Jean Claude Merlot (Mendoza)
properties.descrption: One of Argentina's few high-end Merlots, this opens with maple, toasty oak and deep berry aromas. With 9% Petit Verdot and Cabernets Sauvignon and Franc mixed in, this feels juicy, ripped and eminently healthy. Flavors of coffee, blackberry and cherry are deep and pure, while this avoids being overweight by tipping the scales at 13.9% abv. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Melville 2014 Estate Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 5185 CA-246, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Light raspberry-sorbet notes meet with fresh fennel fronds, pepper and cinnamon on the nose of this bottling from Chad Melville and family. It's tight and tart on the palate, with dried cranberry, pine needle and eucalyptus flavors that juxtapose with the more fruit-driven nose.

properties.title: Scar of the Sea 2014 Bien Nacido Vineyard Block Q Old Vine Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.descrption: There's a very appealing sense of hickory smoke to this wine, which comes from a block planted in 1973 on this historic vineyard. Red cherry, mulberry, sweet sage and cola also play into the nose. Rich sandalwood flavors show on the palate, as does cedar, thyme, smoke and tart berry elements.

properties.title: Naggiar 2014 Estate Petite Sirah (Sierra Foothills)
properties.descrption: Naggiar makes at least 15 wines from its estate vineyard, and really hit a home run with this classic that should have a long life ahead of it. The color is dark and intense right to the rim, while aromas blend a subtle spiciness with bold and complex fruit notes. Flavors convey concentrated dark chocolate, black cherry and espresso. It's enjoyable now with big proteins, but will be best after 2020.

properties.title: Franz Keller 2014 Franz Anton Schwarzer Adler Pinot Noir (Baden)
properties.address: Badbergstraße 44, 79235 Vogtsburg im Kaiserstuhl, Germany
properties.descrption: Robust in body yet squarely structured, the Franz Anton shows more ripeness and concentration than the producer's standard-label bottling. Fleshy black cherry and berry flavors are ripe, but are offset by crisp acidity and a shroud of smoke and toast that accents without overwhelming. It's bold and penetrating, with a long finish marked by fine, persistent tannins. Delicious already, but bold enough to improve through at least 2030.

properties.title: Jean-Michel Dupré 2015 1935 Vieilles Vignes  (Morgon)
properties.address: 1185 Route de Chénelette, 69430 Les Ardillats, France
properties.descrption: Planted in 1935, this single vineyard wine is rich and structured. At this stage, it is dominated by firm tannins as much as by the perfumed juicy black fruits. As the wine softens with age, this generous fruitiness will comet through to give a deliciously ripe wine. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: K Vintners 2013 Morrison Lane Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 820 Mill Creek Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Kirsch, wet stone, lavender and dried herb aromas are followed by ripe jazzy generous dark-fruit flavors. Fine-grained tannins provide support, with a supple mouthfeel piquing the interest.

properties.title: K Vintners 2013 The Deal Sundance Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Kirsch, brown stem, herb and olive aromas give way to a powerful mouthful of black fruit speckled with savory accents. The finish lingers.

properties.title: Betz Family 2014 La Côte Patriarche Syrah (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 13244 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Redmond, WA 98052, USA
properties.descrption: Hailing from the state's oldest Syrah vineyard, this wine displays aromas of pure blue fruit, assorted herbs and whiffs of smoked meat. The palate is dense and seamless, with fine-grained tannins providing support. Its best days are far in front of it. Best from 2022–2030.

properties.title: Betz Family 2014 La Côte Rousse Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 13244 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE, Redmond, WA 98052, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of fruit from Ranch at the End of the Road and Ciel du Cheval vineyards. Brooding aromas of dark raspberries, black plum, spice and mineral are followed by ripe generous full-bodied fruit flavors that display a lot of hedonism while retaining a spot-on sense of balance. It's sensational.

properties.title: Château Branaire-Ducru 2014  Saint-Julien
properties.descrption: Spicy, rich and full of ripe fruit, this wine has great potential. It is structured and dense while bringing out a stylish elegance. Blackberry fruit dominates the tannins to create a wine that has both concentration and fine fruit. Drink from 2022.

properties.title: Walt 2014 Gap's Crown Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 380 1st St W, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: This is a bold, brawny red from a famous site, velvety in texture and all power and concentration. Forest floor and a touch of smoke complement juicy dark cherry, caramelized oak and licorice, while bright acidity supports the layers of flavor and strong tannins.

properties.title: Bethel Heights 2014 West Block Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 6060 Bethel Heights Rd NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.descrption: The top drop from Bethel Heights in this vintage, this is a dark, dense evocation of Pinot Noir at its most authoritative and engaging. It's a muscular mix of mulberry, blueberry and blue plum, with a dash of sassafras for good measure. The length and sense of throttled power suggest that this is a fine cellar candidate. Drink now through 2028.

properties.title: Charles Smith 2013 Broncho Stoneridge Vineyard Malbec (Washington)
properties.descrption: The aromas are pretty and pure, with perfumed notes of plum and blackberry speckled with spice and herb. The flavors are seamless and full, showing a real sense of freshness and vibrancy capped off by a tart finish that hangs together impressively.

properties.title: Château Clerc Milon 2014  Pauillac
properties.descrption: This property continues its upward trend. It is a solid wine, packed with great ripe fruit. Old vines give extra concentration and depth of flavor. The wine has great potential, with both its tannins and rich fruit playing strongly. Drink from 2023.

properties.title: Nicholson Ranch 2012 Estate Pinot Noir (Sonoma Valley)
properties.descrption: Minty strawberry hulls come to mind first in this wine, accented as it goes by a taste of grenadine and earth. Medium bodied and smooth in texture, it offers a big finish of black cherry and more of those strawberries.

properties.title: Palmina 2011 Barbera (Santa Barbara County)
properties.descrption: Steve Clifton makes this wine pop with a wet river-stone minerality on the fresh olallieberry fruit-laden nose. The palate offers spiced plums, a bit of blood and turned-earth flavors.

properties.title: Paniole 2012  Maremma Toscana
properties.descrption: Aromas of blue flowers, dried aromatic herbs and dark-skinned berry lead the nose. The juicy palate offers fleshy black cherry, raspberry, white pepper and roasted coffee bean alongside assertive, dusty tannins. A green note of powdered sage leaves an astringent finish.

properties.title: Ravenswood 2013 Vintners Blend Petite Sirah (California)
properties.address: 18701 Gehricke Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Overflowing with blackberry and black pepper flavors, this affordable, rich and layered wine is very dark in color, saturated with firm tannins and full in body. Serve with some hefty protein to make a good match.

properties.title: St. Francis 2012 Claret (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 100 Pythian Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95409, USA
properties.descrption: A blend driven by Merlot, it also contains 33% Malbec and 21% Cabernet Sauvignon. Dense and dark, it offers flavors of black licorice around a persistence of tannins, ending thick in toasted oak and caramel.

properties.title: Stags' Leap Winery 2012 The Investor Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6150 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: A unique blend of equal parts Petite Sirah and Merlot, with a smaller percentage of Cabernet Sauvignon, this is a sizably robust and dry, full-bodied wine. Puckering tannins should settle down in time, allowing the blackberry and black currant that's in there to shine through.

properties.title: Stefania Mezzetti 2012 Selvans Merlot (Cortona)
properties.address: loc. Vernazzano Basso, 06069 Vernazzano PG, Italy
properties.descrption: This concentrated red opens with aromas of mature black fruit, toasted oak and a whiff of Mediterranean herbs. The firm palate offers dried black cherry, red currant, powdered sage and espresso alongside bracing, tightly packed tannins that leave an astringent finish.

properties.title: Suberli 2013  Morellino di Scansano
properties.address: 1340 Smith Ave, Baltimore, MD 21209, USA
properties.descrption: Here's a straightforward red that opens with aromas of red berry and blue flowers. The easy-drinking palate offers wild cherry, clove and dried Mediterranean herbs alongside bright acidity and dusty tannins. Drink through 2016.

properties.title: Tertulia 2010 Redd Brand BDX Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: It's the Carmenère (14%) that pops first on this Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc-dominant blend. Aromas of braised jalapeno pepper are followed by coffee, vanilla and dark fruit. The coffee and cherry flavors are light, with some grit to the tannins and a warm finish.

properties.title: Three Rivers 2014 Estate Cabernet Franc Cabernet Franc (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 5641 US-12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: A pretty pale-pink color, this wine has aromas of cherry bubble gum, strawberry and herb. The palate has a full, creamy feel with flavors that linger. It's a broader style than often seen on rosés—more of a red wine feel—but it's hard to deny its appeal.

properties.title: Vinchio-Vaglio Serra 2012 I Tre Vescovi  (Barbera d'Asti Superiore)
properties.descrption: This offers aromas of mature plum, berry, toasted oak and coffee. The straightforward palate offers roasted coffee beans, espresso, dried black cherry and licorice alongside fine-grained tannins. The fruit is starting to dry up, so drink soon.

properties.title: Adriano Marco & Vittorio 2014  Barbera d'Alba
properties.address: Via XII Ottobre, 2, 16121 Genova GE, Italy
properties.descrption: Young and vibrant, this easy drinking red opens with aromas of red berry, violet, damp earth and dark cooking spice. The bright, refreshing palate offers tart cherry, red raspberry, orange zest, clove and a hint of star anise alongside racy acidity.

properties.title: Backhouse 2012 Merlot (California)
properties.descrption: Lively, lip-smacking fruit flavors and a tangy, tannic texture will make this a great pairing with grilled chicken, steak or portobello mushrooms. Medium bodied and well balanced, it's fun to drink.

properties.title: Beaulieu Vineyard 2013 Maestro Collection Ranch No. 5 Pinot Noir (Carneros-Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1960 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.descrption: A small-production wine for the producer, this heavy-hitting release is robust and meaty, built with plenty of structure and a full body. Pomegranate and strawberry fill out the fruit components, while a touch of rose petal dances in the background, the wine taking time ultimately to unwind.

properties.title: Bocopa 2014 Alcanta Monastrell (Alicante)
properties.address: Carrer Talladors, 03610 Petrer, Alicante, Spain
properties.descrption: Plum and raspberry aromas are clean, fruity and simple. The palate follows suit with lively acidity and punchy tannins in support of plum, cherry and moderate spice flavors. A light, zesty finish preserves this Monastrell's easy drinkability.

properties.title: Bocopa 2014 Señor Sierra de Alicante Tempranillo (Alicante)
properties.descrption: Plum and berry aromas are clean and fruity, with no funk or oak to wade through. A juicy palate deals slightly medicinal plum and red-berry flavors in front of a solid yet slightly hot and spicy finish.

properties.title: Clavesana 2011 Il Clou  (Dogliani Superiore)
properties.address: Borgo, Via Madonna della Neve, 19, 12060 Madonna della Neve CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Underbrush, pressed flowers and red berry aromas lead the nose. The easy-drinking palate offers ripe raspberry, black cherry, almond and a note of anise alongside polished tannins. This is already extremely accessible so enjoy now.

properties.title: Ruca Malen 2015 Yauquen Bonarda (Mendoza)
properties.address: Ruta Nacional 7 Km. 1059, Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Earthy plum and red-berry aromas are suggestive of tomato. This kicks around the palate with lively acidity and hard tannins. Roasted, savory plum and oak flavors taste spicy and peppery, with fruit pushed to the fringes.

properties.title: Salvano 2015  Dolcetto d'Alba
properties.descrption: This opens with delicate baking spice and black-skinned fruit scents that carry over to the simple palate together with a nutty note. It's easy-drinking, with soft tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: San Silvestro 2016 Primaio  (Dolcetto d'Alba)
properties.descrption: This simple red leads with baking spice, underbrush and red-skinned berry aromas. The palate delivers orange peel, black cherry and clove flavors, with round tannins. Drink soon.

properties.title: Twill 2014 Syrah (Oregon)
properties.address: 21775 SW Ribera Ln, West Linn, OR 97068, USA
properties.descrption: Tannic and drying, this offers simple black cherry fruit that thins out and finishes quickly. It's just a cut above generic.

properties.title: Messias 2014 Selection Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: The tannins and the fruit are well balanced in this open, fruity wine. A blend from several vineyards, it has a dusty texture, ripe red fruits and acidity. The wine is ready to drink.

properties.title: Quinta da Alorna 2014 Touriga Nacional (Tejo)
properties.descrption: This is a soft, open wine showing a few tannins and some of the perfumed character of the grape. The palate is rounded and shows attractive red fruits.

properties.title: Quinta da Lapa 2014 Reserva Syrah (Tejo)
properties.descrption: With perfumed black-currant and damson fruitiness, this is a juicy wine. That freshness contrasts with a firm texture, chocolate and smoky flavors and a tannic aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Sokol Blosser 2016 Estate Cuvée Rosé of Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.descrption: Sharp pine needle and tart berry scents dominate the nose. Low alcohol and pungent flavors emphasize the acidity, leaving a puckery mouthfeel with little impression of fruit. Best with mild cheeses and salted nuts.

properties.title: Tin Barn 2014 Pickberry Vineyard Reserve Merlot (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 21692 8th St E Ste. 340, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Thick and richly concentrated, this reserve-tier wine shows a wealth of tart tannins and leather on the palate, baked in black pepper and a strong element of cigar box flavor. Big boned and full flavored, it packs a powerful punch.

properties.title: Trentadue 2016 Estate Rosato di Sangiovese (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 19170 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Dark reddish-pink in color, this wine exudes the essence of a strawberry patch both in flavor and aroma, adding to the fruitiness with complementary flavors of peach. Expansive and duly ripe, it incorporates richer layers of vanilla that add a touch of sweetness to the finish.

properties.title: La Posta 2015 Pizzella Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 2322 N Broadway Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73103, USA
properties.descrption: Crisp cherry and plum aromas are gritty. This Malbec shows wiry acidity but the palate is still a touch soupy. Salty plum and oak spice flavors include notes of clove and pepper. As a whole, this is oaky and fairly heavy.

properties.title: Marrenon 2016 Les Grains Rosé de Merlot (Mediterranée)
properties.descrption: This medium-pink rosé shows some heft but is mostly about refreshment. Passion fruit and peach notes give way to citrus zest on its crisp, vibrant finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Al-Cantàra 2015 Muddichi di Suli Nerello Mascalese (Terre Siciliane)
properties.descrption: This Nerello Mascalese has Mediterranean herb, dark spice and orange peel aromas. Its simple, rather unusual palate evokes strawberry, white pepper and lemon alongside bright acidity and loose-knit tannins. Drink soon.

properties.title: Black Saint Peter 2015 Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 12400 Ida Clayton Rd, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: Smoke and black pepper accents give a nice kick to this otherwise fruity berry-like wine. It is medium bodied, has a soft easy texture and a touch of brown sugar on the finish.

properties.title: Isabelle et Pierre Clément 2015 Tradition  (Menetou-Salon)
properties.address: 1 Domaine de Châtenoy, 18510 Menetou-Salon, France
properties.descrption: While there is a youthful stalky element to this wine, it also has plenty of ripe black-cherry fruit. That suggests a warm ripe future as the tannins soften. Drink this potentially rich, spicy wine from 2019.

properties.title: James River 2010 Touriga (Virginia)
properties.descrption: Bramble and red fruits combine with spicy incense and oily coffee beans on the nose. Feeling viscous in the mouth, there are prominent flavors of coffee, clove, nutmeg and dried red plum. The tannins are bold, structured and well integrated, giving a crushed velvet feel. The finish is long with evolving flavors.

properties.title: Ken Brown 2014 Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
properties.address: 157 W Hwy 246, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.descrption: Somewhat and pleasingly feral on the nose, this county-wide blend shows wild cherry, composting rose petals, roast game and campfire on the nose. Black-plum skins come to the fore on the sip, which is quite tangy and a bit sour, lifted by dried thyme, rich mulberry and earthy chaparral scrub.

properties.title: Magnum Vinhos 2014 Vinha do Reino Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta do Ribeiro Santo, 3430 Oliveira do Conde, Portugal
properties.descrption: Celebrating the creation of the Douro demarcated region in 1756 by the King of Portugal, this wine comes from vineyards at the heart of the historic region. It is structured and dark, dense with both tannins and black fruits. At three years old, it is still young, so wait until 2018.

properties.title: Parusso 2013  Barolo
properties.descrption: This opens with red berry aromas and unusual whiffs of crushed dill and celery. Those green notes carry over to the taut, lean palate, with raw cherry, cranberry and clove. Bracing, tightly wound tannins and firm acidity provide the backbone.

properties.title: Quinta da Lapa 2014 Nana Reserva Red (Tejo)
properties.descrption: This ripe, spicy wine offers strong wood flavors as well as bold red fruits, accompanied by acidity and rich tannins. Drink now.

properties.title: Quinta da Romaneira 2013 Sino da Romaneira Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: This is the second wine from this showpiece quinta. The wine is a classic Douro blend dominated by Touriga Franca, giving a rich, soft and juicy character that is ready to drink. It has great fruit, spice and integrated tannins.

properties.title: Quinta da Romaneira 2014 Touriga Franca-Syrah Red (Duriense)
properties.descrption: This is one in a series of wines that blends Syrah with a major Douro grape, The wine has a severe, austere character, as much structure as fruit. Wood aging has helped to soften the wine and give density. It needs more time, so drink from 2019.

properties.title: Rubus 2014 Icon Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: 1340 Smith Ave, Baltimore, MD 21209, USA
properties.descrption: Blueberry, plum and cardamom aromas include a whiff of wood smoke. A balanced palate has energy along with brambly berry and chocolate flavors. A chewy, solid finish is good but less lively than the palate.

properties.title: Sokol Blosser 2015 Evolution Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 5000 NE Sokol Blosser Ln, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: This affordably priced Pinot Noir is part of the winery's popular Evolution series. It's smooth and forward, with pretty red fruit supported by juicy orange flavor. It has the tannin and stuffing to work well with roast poultry or as a stand-alone fireside sipping wine.

properties.title: St. Francis 2014 Anthem Meritage (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec and Petit Verdot form a rich thick character for this red wine, that's lush and concentrated on the palate. Full-bodied ripeness features black-cherry pie in a graham cracker crust.

properties.title: Tasca d'Almerita 2015 Regaleali Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.descrption: This wine's fruity aromas of red cherry and strawberry carry over to its bright, juicy palate together with black pepper notes. It's savory and easygoing, with round tannins that make it ready to enjoy soon.

properties.title: Tonnino 2015 Nero d'Avola (Terre Siciliane)
properties.descrption: This Nero d'Avola offers blackberry, violet and cooking spice scents. The easygoing palate doles out black cherry, blueberry jam and white pepper flavors alongside smooth tannins. Enjoy through 2019.

properties.title: Twill 2014 Stormy Morning Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: This medium-bodied wine with lightly-ripened red berry fruit flavors is a great showing for the winery's regular bottling. Light touches of herb, cola and earth carry through the finish.

properties.title: Valle dell'Acate 2016 Tenuta Ibidini Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Bidini, 97011 Acate RG, Italy
properties.descrption: Mature black-skinned berry, licorice and white pepper aromas lead the nose of this fresh, juicy Nero d'Avola. The palate recalls fleshy blackberry and black cherry jam, rounded with smooth, ripe tannins. Enjoy soon.

properties.title: Francesc Sanchez Bas 2004 Montgarnatx Red (Priorat)
properties.descrption: A little rusty in color and somewhat transparent, with raisin as the key aroma. There's not a lot going on in the mouth, but the wine is mellow and deep, with sweet flavors of molasses, berry syrup and baked black fruits. Rich and candied, but rather sweet and a touch dull for Priorat. Drink now.

properties.title: Gemtree 2008 The Phantom Petit Verdot (McLaren Vale)
properties.descrption: Petit Verdot is a character actor who's never really grabbed the spotlight for itself, but makes an interesting appearance now and again. This McLaren Vale example is oaky but backed by ample plum and cassis fruit and framed by tannins that seem soft for the variety. Cedar and spice come through on the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Wente 2008 Shorthorn Canyon Syrah (Livermore Valley)
properties.descrption: Savory on the nose with enough sweet blueberry to make it varietally enticing, this light purplish Syrah is well-balanced, pleasing and well-made, ready to drink now with a range of foods, its alcohol in proportion and acidity right on target. Wente blends in small percentages of Counoise, Petite Sirah, Mourvèdre and Tempranillo into this great-value Syrah. Delicious.

properties.title: Novelty Hill 2007 Stillwater Creek Vineyard Sangiovese (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This has a little bit of Cabernet Sauvignon (5%) and Merlot (2%), winemaker Mike Januik say it's there “to beef up the structure.” The Sangiovese brings the acid, and tart fruits with a hint of leaf and tomato. Still young vines, but showing great promise.

properties.title: SalvaTerra 2007  Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
properties.address: Via Cengia, 85, 37029 Cengia VR, Italy
properties.descrption: With a dark ruby-garnet color and loads of aromatic personality, this is the style of ripe and plump Ripasso you could pair with succulent cuts of grilled steak. The wine is soft and smooth in the mouth and it imparts bright aromas of black cherry, exotic spice, cola, barbecue smoke and toasted almond.

properties.title: De Bortoli 2008 Gulf Station Shiraz-Viognier (Yarra Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a bit chunkier and less suave than De Bortoli's more expensive estate bottled Shiraz-Viognier, but it's still a very nice wine. Peppery spice marks the nose, while the flavors feature a nice blend of plum with savory notes of coffee and black olives. Drink now–2015.

properties.title: Ferraton Pere et Fils 2007 La Matinière  (Crozes-Hermitage)
properties.address: 7 Quai Arthur Rostaing, 26600 Tain-l'Hermitage, France
properties.descrption: An easily accessible, easy-drinking style of Crozes-Hermitage, Ferraton's 2007 La Matinière displays a lovely balance between clean red fruit (cherries, raspberries), baking spices, cracked pepper and a faintly herbal tinge. Drink it now and over the next few years.

properties.title: Guerrieri Rizzardi 2007 Pojega  (Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso)
properties.descrption: Pojega is an expressive and polished Ripasso that shows a united aromatic front composed of spice, mature blackberry, leather and sweet tobacco. It delivers power and intensity but not in a heavy or exaggerated way.

properties.title: Agricola Falset-Marca 2007 Ètim Varema Tardana Negre Grenache (Montsant)
properties.descrption: Not a lot of glaring aromas of a sweet wine here; in fact, it's showing fresh tomato, cherry and more dryness on the nose than candy or syrup. The palate is tight and a little clipped, with sweet cassis and reduced black plum flavors. Short on the finish, but good and grabby overall.

properties.title: Beringer 2007 Alluvium Red (Knights Valley)
properties.descrption: This blend of all five Bordeaux varieties hails from a smaller, high elevation appellation bridging Sonoma County and Napa Valley. It's jammy and spicy in red fruit, berry and cocoa flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Qupé 2008 Sawyer Lindquist Vineyard Sonnie's Syrah (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 4665 Santa Maria Mesa Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Upscale and pedigreed, but not showing well now. Too tannic, with an astringent lockdown that accentuates the acidity. Underneath are fine black cherry, cola, pepper and oak flavors. The suggestion is ageability, but the future of this wine is unpredictable no matter what anyone says.

properties.title: Santa Sofia 2006 Monte Gradella  (Valpolicella Classico Superiore)
properties.descrption: Monte Gradella is an elegant and austere Valpolicella that represents the best of this traditional category of wine. The wine speaks highly of its territory, with aromas of maraschino cherry, cedar smoke and sweet aromas of vanilla bean and espresso. It shows firm, but polished tannins with sweet jammy fruit flavors on the close.

properties.title: Thorn Clarke 2008 Shotfire Shiraz (Barossa)
properties.address: Thorn-Clarke Wines, Gawler Park Rd, Angaston SA 5353, Australia
properties.descrption: This medium- to full-bodied Shiraz features a welcoming mix of mulberries and vanilla, overtaken by cedary flavors on the finish, where the fruit turns crisp. A slab of charred steak would match the woody notes nicely. Drink now–2013.

properties.title: Fabiano 2008  Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
properties.address: Via di S. Fabiano, 33, 52100 Arezzo AR, Italy
properties.descrption: Fabiano's newest Ripasso opens with bright cherry aromas followed by spice, clove, black pepper and pressed rose petal. The wine boasts a soft, steady feel in the mouth and relatively smooth texture overall.

properties.title: Gamba 2007 Le Quare  (Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso)
properties.descrption: Instead of brawn and muscle, this ruby Ripasso offers elegance and finesse. The nose is redolent of polished black stone, Indian spice and loads of dried cassis and wild berry. There's a playful hint of sweet almond and cinnamon at the end.

properties.title: Zecchini 2008 Vigneto Calandra di Romagnano  (Valpolicella Ripasso Valpantena)
properties.descrption: This lively Ripasso opens with distinctive notes of spice, clove and dried tobacco. There is ripe fruit here, mostly plum and prune, and the wine ends with a spicy blast of flavor.

properties.title: Villa Girardi 2004 Opere di San Pietro  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Via Villa Girardi, 37029 San Pietro in Cariano VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Sweet tobacco and overripe cherry open the nose of this thick, jammy Amarone. The wine exhibits a syrupy, bold mouthfeel with lingering tones of smoke, beef jerky and spice on the finish.

properties.title: Miro 2007 80 Year Old Vines Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a ripe, lusty Zinfandel, with many special qualities to recommend it. It's dry and rich in smooth tannins, and offers a flood of wild forest berry, sweet new leather, red currant, mocha and exotic Asian spice flavors. Delicious, and will hold for up to six years.

properties.title: Pali 2007 Keefer Ranch Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Give this ageable Pinot time in the cellar. It's tight now in tannins, with fresh acidity perking up primary fruit flavors of cherries, raspberries and jam. Very fine in structure, very complex in depth, it should come into its own after 2010.

properties.title: Begali 2003 Monte Cà Bianca  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Via Cengia, 10, 37029 Cengia VR, Italy
properties.descrption: This is an extraordinarily rich Amarone that exudes blackness and dense aromas of cola, raisins, dried prunes, leather, tobacco, spice and cherry wood. It's a big wine for big meals of succulent grilled meats or heavy winter stews. Vanilla and soft oak flavors come though and the mouthfeel is round and velvety.

properties.title: Brunelli 2003 Campo del Tìtari Riserva  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.descrption: Campo del Tìtari Riserva is an incredibly intense and meaty wine with ripe berry notes, barbecue smoke and exotic spice. You'll also get some chalky, mineral notes at the back and the wine is velvety in the mouth with drying tannins.

properties.title: Corte Rugolin 2003 Vigna Monte Danieli  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.descrption: This Amarone is made in a traditional style with aromas of forest berry, red apple, spice and barbecue smoke. It exhibits pretty luminosity and buoyancy with vibrant fruit flavors and a fresh cherry finale. Very nice.

properties.title: Le Vigne di Eli 2007 Calderara Sottana  (Etna)
properties.address: Contrada, Strada Comunale Calderara, 95036 Randazzo CT, Italy
properties.descrption: From the beautiful Calderara Sottana cru, this elegant wine packs a powerful aromatic punch of Spanish cedar, black fruit and volcanic smoke. There's harmony here: a tight, gritty texture and long-lasting intensity on the close.

properties.title: Mastroberardino 2005 Radici  (Taurasi)
properties.address: Via Manfredi, 75-81, 83042 Atripalda AV, Italy
properties.descrption: This is one of our favorite red wines from Southern Italy. The reason is personality: you just don't find this intensity and these lead pencil mineral notes and crushed black pepper anywhere else. The wine is elegant and focused with young tannins that promise a long aging future ahead.

properties.title: Pali 2007 Durell Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.descrption: An attractive, upscale Pinot for drinking over the next six years. It's dry and silky, with a nice tension of acidity and fruit. Shows flavors of red cherry pie filling, cola, mocha, anise, cinnamon, pepper and smoky oak. Beautiful and complex.

properties.title: Pali 2007 Thorn Ridge Ranch Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 2130 India St, San Diego, CA 92101, USA
properties.descrption: Ripe and crisp and rich, in the manner of this fine vintage, offering an explosion of cherries, currants, anise and vanilla-scented cedar. With its silky texture, it's a beauty, but needs time. Give it 3–4 years in the cellar.

properties.title: Corliss Estates 2004 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Blackberry, blueberry pie and plum fruit flavors are nicely welded to smooth barrel flavors that bring in coffee, licorice, toasted walnuts and mocha. This is definitely a fruit and barrel wine, thoroughly delicious but without the funk or minerality of Walla Walla Syrahs.

properties.title: De Loach 2007 OFS Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1791 Olivet Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95401, USA
properties.descrption: A beautiful Pinot that shows its coastal influence in the balance of ripe, long hangtime fruit and crisp acidity. Floods the mouth with cherry, cola, mocha, cinnamon toast, black pepper and vanilla flavors that are delicious. With its edge of tannins, it will hold for a few years of aging.

properties.title: Guenoc 2006 Serpentine Meadow Port Petite Sirah (Guenoc Valley)
properties.address: 21000 Butts Canyon Rd, Middletown, CA 95461, USA
properties.descrption: Very, very sweet, with exotic flavors of honey, black cherry liqueur, raspberry tart, white chocolate, butterscotch, vanilla cream and cinnamon spice, balanced with crisp acidity. In other words, delicious.

properties.title: Cà La Bionda 2004 Vigneti di Ravazzól  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.descrption: The Ravazzól vineyards produce fruit with intense aromas of blackberry, chocolate and spice. In the case of this wine, those tones are further enhanced with red apple and mesquite wood. The mouthfeel is smooth and very polished.

properties.title: Lamiable 2005 Les Meslaines Grand Cru Brut Pinot Noir (Champagne)
properties.address: 8 Rue de Condé, 51150 Tours-sur-Marne, France
properties.descrption: Les Meslaines is the name of the parcel of Pinot Noir that produces this Blanc de Noirs. It has richness, a ripe character with fresh apricot flavors, a Champagne that has the weight of a wine. It could do with bottle age, but for freshness drink now.

properties.title: Gérard Bertrand 2014 Syrah-Mourvèdre (Saint-Chinian)
properties.descrption: Solid, rich and ripe red raspberries and brambly berries are upfront on the nose of this attractive wine, with seductive tones of sweet oak and cured meat in the back. Medium in weight, with spicy, structured tannins and ample acidity, the oak is well-integrated into the plush fruit core.

properties.title: Anaba 2016 Rosé of Grenache (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 62 Bonneau Rd, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Made entirely from Grenache, this wine is whole-cluster fermented and aged in stainless steel. It's a dry, light expression that's pretty on the nose and palate, with inviting strawberry notes alongside hints of lemon and orange. It offers refreshing acidity alongside a meaty body and wet-stone minerality.

properties.title: Ardor 2015 Stoney Vine Vineyard Grenache (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4243 SE Belmont St UNIT 400, Portland, OR 97215, USA
properties.descrption: Very light in color, this wine brings appealing aromas of white pepper, smoked meat, orange peel, herb, earth and sauvage. The palate is ethereally light and delicate, showing pleasing nuances, with plenty of floral flavors on the finish.

properties.title: Cambria 2014 Clone 4 Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 5475 Chardonnay Ln, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: This latest bottling from the Jackson Family Wines' “Seeds of Empowerment” fundraising series shows woody, somewhat gamy aromas of animal hide alongside black cherry and sandalwood spice. The gamy quality extends to the sip, where dried meat meets red currant, cherries and a hint of fennel.

properties.title: Carlos Moro 2014 Finca Valdehierro 16 Meses Barrica Tempranillo (Cigales)
properties.address: Camino Garugele, S/N, 26338 San Vicente de la Sonsierra, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Heavily oaked and charred aromas of saucy berry fruits and espresso lead to a choppy, astringent palate. Reedy plum and berry flavors are a touch herbal and saucy. It feels tannic and drawing on an oaky finish that sports a clove note. Drink from 2018–2026.

properties.title: Château la Chapelle aux Moines 2014  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: Lugon et L'Ile du Carney, 2 rue Florence Arthaud, lieu-dit La Chapelle, 33240 Lugon-et-l'Île-du-Carnay, France
properties.descrption: The rich fruit and structure of this impressive wine are already well integrated. With power and concentration as well as layers of dark fruits, it is showing fine aging potential. The wine, dominated by 80% Merlot, comes from vines in the east of Saint-Emilion. Drink from 2020.

properties.title: Château la Dominique 2014 Relais de la Dominique  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 1 La Dominique, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: The second wine of La Dominique on the Saint-Emilion plateau shows the fruity side of this estate. It is packed with red fruits and with soft tannins. The acidity and the smooth texture promise early drinking for a generous wine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château le Gardera 2015  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 123 Atlantic Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201, USA
properties.descrption: This wine from the Gonfrier family property is full of berry fruits. It's also a ripe wine that is already drinkable. It has generous tannins and balanced acidity that gives the wine its crisp edge as a contrast to the blackberry flavors. Drink now, or even better, wait until 2018.

properties.title: Diora 2014 Three Crowns Red (San Bernabe)
properties.address: 53001 Oasis Rd, King City, CA 93930, USA
properties.descrption: This is a hearty and hedonistic blend of Syrah, Grenache, Viognier and Petit Verdot from one of Monterey's warmer regions. Pure blackberries and black cherries show on the brooding nose, with touches of mint and licorice. The palate is soft on entry, then come boisterous flavors of black currant and blueberry. Nettle, fennel and coffee elements add depth.

properties.title: Rattalino 2013 Trentaquattro  (Barolo)
properties.descrption: You'll find aromas suggesting mature dark-skinned berry, violet, tobacco and an earthy whiff of game on this. The aromas carry over to the full-bodied palate, together with hints of dark spice and dried cherry. Chewy tannins provide support.

properties.title: Roger Roessler 2015 Lennox Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Moderate in structure, full bodied and ripe, this wine is tightly wound in firm, strong tannin. Light flavors of cherry and orange integrate spiky accents of clove, tea and dried herb.

properties.title: Sante Arcangeli 2015 Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.descrption: A blend of three vineyards, located between Corralitos and the Summit area, this bottling conveys rusty, earthy cranberries, cherries and Earl Grey tea on the nose. The earthy character also shows on the sip, where animal hide, sour cranberry, red plum, rose petal and pine-forest flavors converge.

properties.title: Sattler 2015 St. Laurent (Burgenland)
properties.address: Obere Hauptstraße 10, 7162 Tadten, Austria
properties.descrption: Ripe red and luscious black cherry are the fruity protagonists here, dominating nose and palate with their dense, aromatic ripeness. The fruit shimmers both red and black, backed by densely woven but fine tannins and countered by freshness and verve. Juiciness and fruit prevail.

properties.title: Casa Dumetz 2014 Flower & VIne Grenache (Santa Barbara County)
properties.descrption: From the vineyard once known as Alisos comes this wine, with aromas of soft clove, red cherry and a touch of sage. A strong ginger spice reigns over the palate, which is bitingly acidic, and shows dark strawberry fruit and dark thyme herbs. This wine is still quite wound up, but that acidity will prove mouthwatering for years to come.

properties.title: Casa del Valle 2011 Orquestal Tempranillo (La Mancha)
properties.address: CM-4004, Km 47, 700, 45313 Yepes, Toledo, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of mulled black fruits, vanilla, tobacco, orange peel and earth are a touch jumbled, but compartmentalized—this smells nice. Wiry and fresh in feel, but with a slightly hollow midsection, this tastes peppery, oaky and like cherry and black plum. A toasty finish with snappy acidity solidifies this medium-weight La Mancha Tempranillo. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Chateau Margene 2013 Signature Series Cabernet Franc (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Winemaker Mike Mooney adds complexity with 16% Cabernet Sauvignon and 8% Merlot on this bottling, which shows blueberries, crushed black rocks and dark chocolate on the nose, but doesn't offer a lot of Cab Francness. The palate does offer some, however, with grippy tannins and dried oregano touches laid across rich black cherry, blueberry, fudge and espresso notes.

properties.title: Domaine Faiveley 2014 Clos du Roy Premier Cru  (Mercurey)
properties.descrption: With some firm structure behind the red fruits, this wine will have a good future. A dry core sustained by the acidity is waiting to burst out and give a ripe, fruity while always fresh wine. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Piping Shrike 2014 Shiraz (Barossa)
properties.address: 193 Field Stone Dr, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.descrption: At less than 14% abv, this reflects a growing sensibility within Barossa. It's a medium- to full-bodied wine with supple tannins and a refreshing, moreish finish. Cinnamon and mocha notes hang from plummy fruit. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Remelluri 2011 Lindes de San Vincente  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: This is a ripe, earthy, modern-leaning Rioja with aromas of blackberry, raisin and rubber. Soft and fleshy on the palate, what this easygoing number lacks in structure is made up for in charm. Ultraripe flavors of plum and berry come with a chocolaty accent, while the finish is smooth and tastes earthy and spicy. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Rioja Vega 2012 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Widely available Rioja Crianzas don't come much better than this. An opening of raspberry and strawberry aromas backed by direct cherry, raspberry and red-plum flavors render this all about fruit and freshness.

properties.title: Beaucanon 2011 Cuvée Louis Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1006 Monticello Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: A healthy addition of 12% Petit Verdot plays well in this wine. This is exuberant in black plum, chocolate and black pepper, with full-bodied and present oak, yet it also has a soft, approachability to the palate.

properties.title: Benessere 2013 Collins Holystone Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (St. Helena)
properties.descrption: From vines more than 90-years-old, this is a refreshingly restrained and elegant wine, earthy in grilled mushroom and cherry-berry juiciness, braced in firm acidity. Cocoa and nutmeg provide compelling seasonings that linger on the finish.

properties.title: Bodegas Muriel 2011 Fincas de la Villa Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Ctra. Laguardia s/n, 01340 Elciego, Álava, Spain
properties.descrption: Baked, rooty aromas of sandalwood, exotic spices and berry fruits are attractive. Though slightly grabby on the palate, this shows the right structure and build. Flavors of up-front oak, herbal plum and raspberry finish dry, with firm, pinching tannins. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: Kessler-Haak 2013 Syrah (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1700 Gypsy Canyon Rd Dr, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: Quite vibrant and floral on the nose, this shows deep blackberry and both dried and fresh purple-flower elements as well as a baked berry pastry. The flavors are well integrated on the palate, where cooked blackberries in a vanilla pie crust combine with juicy strawberry, peppercorns and rosemary spice.

properties.title: Ottimino Vineyards 2013 Zinfinity Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.descrption: From a selection of its best vineyards across the county, this producer showcases a majority of the variety with 16% Petite Sirah, all aged in French oak, 25% of it new. Black olive, spicy leather and cinnamon make for a bold, dry and boisterous wine that's entirely enjoyable, integrated in terms of both tannin and oak.

properties.title: Palencia 2013 El Viñador Petit Verdot (Wahluke Slope)
properties.descrption: Brooding aromas of moist soil and dark cherry are followed by big bold cherry flavors that coat the palate. The variety's often burly tannins are kept well in check.

properties.title: Palencia 2014 Grenache (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 421 E Columbia Dr, Kennewick, WA 99336, USA
properties.descrption: Light aromas of raspberry, coriander, vanilla and barrel spice are followed by ripe rich red-fruit flavors that glide on the finish. A pillowy mouthfeel only heightens the interest.

properties.title: Rutherford Ranch 2014 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1680 Silverado Trail S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Dusty Mexican chocolate meets black plum, cherry and pomegranate in this light-bodied, rounded wine that's juicy and delicious. It's well balanced and approachable now, so drink up.

properties.title: Saviah 2014 Une Vallée Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon (56%), Merlot (33%) and Cabernet Franc. Aromas of milk chocolate, cherry, herb and moist earth give way to soft supple palate-coating fruit and barrel flavors. It shows a lot of elegance and refinement.

properties.title: Tildio 2013 Estate Grown Cabernet Franc (Lake Chelan)
properties.address: 70 E Wapato Lake Rd, Manson, WA 98831, USA
properties.descrption: Brooding aromas of herbs, dark cherries and flowers are followed by supple, polished dark-fruit flavors. It's a promising wine from this young growing region.

properties.title: Le Macchiole 2012 Scrio Syrah (Toscana)
properties.descrption: Made entirely with Syrah, this has aromas of mature black-skinned fruit, French oak, leather and cedar. The full-bodied palate offers cured meat, dried blackberry, ground pepper and anise alongside firm, fine-grained tannins.

properties.title: Migration 2014 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: This wine has lovely, inviting aromas of baking spice and earth. Full-bodied flavors of blueberry and raspberry are supported by spicy oak. Its boldness and density is met by fresh cranberry, while a tease of vanilla complements the other characteristics.

properties.title: Podere Paganico 2010 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.descrption: Mature black-skinned fruit, new leather, Mediterranean herb and dark spice are some of the aromas you'll find on this big, bold red. The brawny monolithic palate doles out ripe plum, black cherry marinated in spirits and cake spice alongside chewy tannins and the warmth of evident alcohol. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Rocca di Castagnoli 2012 Poggio a' Frati Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.descrption: New leather, blue flower, wild berry and a whiff of oak-driven spice lead the nose. The savory chewy palate offers mature black cherry, raspberry, star anise, clove and menthol while lithe tannins provide polished support. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Saintsbury 2014 Sundawg Ridge Vineyard Pinot Noir (Green Valley)
properties.descrption: Cranberry and strawberry make for a pretty, fruity wine that's velvety in texture and full bodied in depth and length. Black tea and a backbeat of orange and lemon add to the tartness of this layered, complex red.

properties.title: Tenuta dei Pianali 2011 Coronato  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: Via Campoli, 104, 50026 San Casciano in Val di pesa FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Underbrush, Mediterranean herb, sunbaked soil and a whiff of sea breeze are some of the aromas you'll find on this blend of 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc and 10% Petit Verdot. The round chewy palate offers dried black cherry, star anise, grilled bell pepper and espresso alongside velvety tannins. Enjoy over the next several years.

properties.title: Naggiar 2014 Dahlia Noir Red (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 18261 Rosemary Ln, Grass Valley, CA 95949, USA
properties.descrption: A very dark color, tons of ripe fruit aromas and abundant black-fruit flavors give a lot of wallop to this full-bodied but not overly sweet or fat Rhône-style blend. Ripe blackberry, stewed plum and a touch of smoke hang on a big structure of firm tannins and good acidity. It will be best after 2019, but it's difficult not to drink up at this price.

properties.title: Nittnaus Anita und Hans 2014 Blaufränkisch (Leithaberg)
properties.descrption: The nose is still closed and just gives us a whiff of white pepper. The palate is beautifully slender and has a lighter touch of just-ripe blueberry and red cherry. There is a gentle silky grip and a lot of refreshing tart and delicious fruit. While 2014 was not an easy vintage for reds, this acquits itself with sassiness and grace.

properties.title: Parducci 2014 Reserve Grenache (Mendocino)
properties.descrption: Extremely flavorful and wonderfully exotic, this full-bodied wine has intense fruit flavors like raspberry and rhubarb, with a host of interesting accents recalling cedar, white pepper and clove. The mouthfeel is warm and rich, tannins are soft and easy, and the finish lingers nicely.

properties.title: Peachy Canyon 2014 Vortex Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Concentrated strawberry, black cherry, cinnamon-laced latte, licorice and mocha converge in an intriguing and beautiful nose from this legendary Zin winery. The structure is immediately apparent on the palate, framing smoked strawberry, oregano and dill flavors. It's full of plush, ripe fruit, but seemingly bone dry.

properties.title: Puma Road 2012 Apex Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: Hearty rhubarb, cranberry and cherry notes meet with copious spices, from allspice to cinnamon to vanilla, on the nose of this bottling that also shows dust and cigar box. It's boisterous with fresh flavors on the palate, where black raspberry and juicy strawberry flavors are cut by sharp spice and a pine-needle finish.

properties.title: R2 2013 Guidici Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 654 Broadway, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: This is a clear, light wine, aged lightly in oak, only 30% of it new. Wild brush and burnt orange dominate in taste and aroma, with additional characteristics of rhubarb, red cherry and lovely rose.

properties.title: Trenel Fils 2015  Fleurie
properties.descrption: This is a complex cru wine that has ripe fruits, firm tannins and a good ageworthy structure. It has a dense texture, rich black-cherry fruits and a finish that brings out crisp acidity. Produced by this Beaujolais-based negociant, the wine will be ready to drink from the end of 2017.

properties.title: White Hart Wine 2015 Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.descrption: From a vineyard that's 40 years old, this smartly priced bottling shows vanilla, clove, hickory smoke and black cherry on the hearty nose. The palate is soft upon entry, showing more of that clove against a baked black-plum background.

properties.title: Jaxon Keys 2013 Estate Allie Key's Vineyard Petite Sirah (Mendocino)
properties.address: 10400 US-101, Hopland, CA 95449, USA
