properties.descrption: Rich and fruity, this wine is finely balanced, with juicy black-plum fruit and acidity. The Merlot gives it a smoky character and a ripe, fleshy texture. Age this for 3–4 years.

properties.title: Château Lousteauneuf 2010  Médoc
properties.address: 2 Rte de Lousteauneuf, 33340 Valeyrac, France
properties.descrption: Mint and herb aromas are followed by a structured and tannic palate. It has balancing acidity, with a juicy black-currant flavor and a dark, dry edge. Like nearly all of the 2010s, it needs to age.

properties.title: Raptor Ridge 2011 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 18700 SW Hillsboro Hwy, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: From a tough vintage, this has friendly flavors of chocolate-chip cookie dough and walnuts. The chocolaty character, which is far more noticeable than the fruit, helps to mitigate the tough, chewy tannins. Drink soon.

properties.title: Redhawk 2010 Estate Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 2995 Michigan City Ln NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.descrption: Tight at first, this opens to reveal flavors of strawberry and red plum. A bit earthy and astringent, it has drying tannins that should smooth out with a bit more bottle age.

properties.title: Tarara 2010 SuperNoVA Red (Virginia)
properties.address: 13648 Tarara Ln, Leesburg, VA 20176, USA
properties.descrption: The restrained aromas of black mission fig, cumin, caraway seed and cocoa are alluring but elusive. Full bodied and muscular, the palate feels a bit clamped at the moment, finishing with some warmth. A blend of 67% Tannat and 33% Petit Verdot.

properties.title: Tenimenti Zabù 2010 Chiantari Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.descrption: Clean and easy, this has a bright fruit aroma, plus a subtle tone of burnt almond at the back. Pair this with ravioli and smoked ricotta cheese.

properties.title: Hawkins Cellars 2014 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 10401 Cook-Underwood Rd, Underwood, WA 98651, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has some off aromas, seeming to show some oxygen exposure, which distracts from its notes of orange peel and spice. The palate is considerably better but struggles to make up the difference.

properties.title: Huerta de Albalá 2012 Barbazul Red (Vino de la Tierra de Cádiz)
properties.address: CA-6105, Km4, 11630, Cádiz, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of black-olive juice, animal hide and seashell fail to offer much fruit, even with swirling. A tough palate shows no clear point of entry, while herbal black-fruit flavors draw in rather than expand on the finish. This is a Syrah-led blend with Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Graciano, aka Tintilla de Rota. It hails from Cádiz.

properties.title: La Pieve 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Via Pozzolo, 50050 Montaione FI, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with funky aromas that suggest farmyard, stewed fruit and worn leather. The dense palate is already evolved, showing raisin, fig, game and walnut that lead to a short, bitter finish.

properties.title: Chateau Les Amoureuses 2014 Les Charmes Grenache (Côtes du Rhône)
properties.address: Qur de Vinsas, 07700 Bourg-Saint-Andéol, France
properties.descrption: This Grenache-based cuvée is medium-bodied and crisp in feel. Black cherries and chocolate mingle easily on the palate, but the wine finishes dry and astringent. Serve with rare beef or lamb for best enjoyment.

properties.title: El Grifo 2014 Listán Negro (Lanzarote)
properties.address: Carretera, LZ-30, Km 11, 35559 San Bartolomé, Las Palmas, Spain
properties.descrption: Minerally cherry and raspberry aromas are as crisp as the black volcanic soil this varietal Listán Negro comes from. Bright in color, juicy and aggressive on the palate, with candied cherry flavors that are short on complexity, this Canary Islands wine tastes of berry residuals and brown sugar on the finish.

properties.title: Vicente Gandia 2012 Hoya de Cadenas Reserva Tempranillo (Utiel-Requena)
properties.address: Ctra. Cheste a Godelleta, s/n, 46370 Chiva, Valencia, Spain
properties.descrption: This basic Tempranillo smells dry and spicy but also dilute and mellow, with a note of cherry and red plum on the bouquet. Fresh, fleshy and fruity in terms of feel, this tastes of simple cherry and plum, while the finish is a touch tannic.

properties.title: Vicente Gandia 2012 Raiza Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Ctra. Cheste a Godelleta, s/n, 46370 Chiva, Valencia, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of prune, raisin, tomato leaf and rose petals lead to a somewhat heavy palate with a stewy character and big tannins. Baked, raisiny red-fruit flavors come with a note of caramel or molasses, while desiccated berry flavors dominate the finish.

properties.title: Vicente Gandia 2013 Xibrana Crianza Red (Priorat)
properties.address: Ctra. Cheste a Godelleta, s/n, 46370 Chiva, Valencia, Spain
properties.descrption: Stalky aromas of shrubs and bushes blend with scents of dried cherry and currant. A hard-smacking, tannic palate delivers basic berry and plum flavors that finish with a riper note of prune along with parching dryness.

properties.title: Heron Hill 2013 Reserve Ingle Vineyard Merlot (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9301 Co Rd 76, Hammondsport, NY 14840, USA
properties.descrption: Heady notes of cedar and pine lend a woodsy undertone to plump blueberry and black cherry flavors in this slightly soft, yielding Merlot. Delicate acidity and whisper-light tannins add to its plush feel. Drink now through 2018.

properties.title: Heron Hill 2013 The Chosen Spot Ingle Vineyard Red (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 9301 Co Rd 76, Hammondsport, NY 14840, USA
properties.descrption: Ripe blackberry and cherry flavors have a slightly ruddy tone in this plush, full-bodied blend of Cabernet Franc, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. Bold and juicy, its forward, approachable style is contrasted by slightly rustic tones of hay and grass.

properties.title: Bellaria 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Via Mar Jonio, 49, 47814 Bellaria-Igea Marina RN, Italy
properties.descrption: Leafy underbrush, wet earth, cellar floor and dried rose petal are some of the aromas you'll find on this. The evolved palate is rather muddled, offering dried black cherry, game, vanilla and a green note of powdered sage accompanied by astringent tannins that leave a mouth drying finish.

properties.title: Cairdean Estate 2011 Sangiovese (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3111 St Helena Hwy N, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has a sun-dried quality to the grapes, which are moderately exuberant in cherry and leathery earth. It's lean, dry and robustly tannic.

properties.title: Manuel Olivier 2009 Vieilles Vignes  (Hautes Côtes de Nuits)
properties.address: 7 Rue des Grandes Vignes, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: With the extra concentration from the low-yielding old vines, this is a dense wine, with its acidity contrasting the rich red fruit. It is round and smooth, with well-integrated tannins and a soft, fruity finish.

properties.title: Tommasi 2010 Vigneto Rafaèl  (Valpolicella Classico Superiore)
properties.address: Via Ronchetto, 4, 37029 Pedemonte di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: This bright wine offers delicate fruit notes of wild berry and white cherry, backed by hints of black pepper and cola. Easy on the palate, it shows a fresh point of acidity on the finish.

properties.title: Vagabond 2009 Arrighi Vineyard Petite Sirah (Clear Lake)
properties.address: 2715 SE 8th Ave #175, Portland, OR 97202, USA
properties.descrption: A tannic and ripe Petite Sirah, this has flavors of plum, dark chocolate and a serious shot of espresso. This is a big bomb of a wine that needs braised meat to match it.

properties.title: Atalaya do Mar 2010 Mencía (Monterrei)
properties.address: N-330, 97, 02640 Almansa, Albacete, Spain
properties.descrption: Fresh berry and cherry aromas come with a pinch of lemon and also a rose note. It has a tangy, fresh feel and snappy, semitart flavors of red plum and raspberry. Limited and short on the finish, but zesty all the way through.

properties.title: Giuseppe Lonardi 2009  Valpolicella Classico Superiore Ripasso
properties.address: Via Poste, 2/A, 37020 Marano di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Ripe, plush and chewy, this easy-going wine has the heft and endurance to pair with cheesy lasagna or pizza. It's soft and lush on the palate, with tame tannins.

properties.title: Zeni 2010 Marogne  (Valpolicella Superiore Ripasso)
properties.address: Via Costabella, 9, 37011 Bardolino VR, Italy
properties.descrption: The bouquet opens with touches of candied fruit, lemon zest and cola, followed by red fruit and spice notes. It has a thick, velvety mouthfeel.

properties.title: Zymè 2011 Rêverie  (Valpolicella)
properties.address: Via Cà del Pipa, 1, 37029 Località Mattonara VR, Italy
properties.descrption: With low alcohol and an easy disposition, this is the kind of red wine you can enjoy with pizza. The bouquet is redolent of red berry, cola and dried apple skin.

properties.title: Pedroncelli 2009 Petite Sirah (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 1220 Canyon Rd, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: Considering this is Petite Sirah, this is surprisingly soft and gentle—almost like a Pinot Noir. The texture is silky, with flavors of cherries, currants, Canadian bacon and black pepper. Drink now.

properties.title: Rosenblum 2010 Planchon Vineyard Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
properties.address: 10 Clay St, Oakland, CA 94607, USA
properties.descrption: There are lots of ripe, heady flavors of blackberry, dark chocolate, anise and exotic spice in this high alcohol wine. While it's a bit heavy by itself, it needs food to perk it up and coax out the richness. Grilled beef in almost any form is ideal.

properties.title: Stephen & Walker 2010 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 1300 3rd Ave N, Nashville, TN 37208, USA
properties.descrption: This is leaner and drier than you'd normally expect from the Sonoma Coast, with lots of tangy acidity. Although the alcohol is high, the wine is shy on fruit, but it remains elegant. Drink now.

properties.title: Adelaida 2009 Anna's Vineyard Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5805 Adelaida Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Tasting kind of sweet for a Syrah, this has flavors of blackberry jam, coffee and spice.

properties.title: Bodegas Abanico 2009 Eternum Viti  (Toro)
properties.address: 7370 Lockport Pl Suite B, Lorton, VA 22079, USA
properties.descrption: This starts with funky, saucy aromas that clean up and become less strange with airing. Rugged, tannic and bumpy on the palate, it has baked, rubbery black-fruit flavors. It finishes short and drying, with hard tannins and heat.

properties.title: Concannon 2010 Conservancy, Crimson & Clover Red (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 4590 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: This is Concannon's second vintage of Crimson & Clover—a Petite Sirah-based blend. It offers good value and sweet, smooth flavors, with a hint of licorice and dark chocolate running through.

properties.title: Corolilla 2009 Crianza Viñas Viejas Bobal (Utiel-Requena)
properties.address: 3787 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Woodsy, perfumed and light on the nose, this has rosebud and lemon peel aromas. The palate shows a touch of resiny oak, with flavors of raspberry and chocolate, ending with a hint of vanilla.

properties.title: Domaine Coquard Loison-Fleurot 2010  Vosne-Romanée
properties.address: 5 Rue Haute, 21640 Flagey-Echézeaux, France
properties.descrption: Firm and structured, this has strong tannins set over smoky fruit. It has concentration, although the wood flavor has an old-wood feel, seeming just a touch dirty.

properties.title: Messina Hof 2010 Private Reserve Double Barrel Cerro Santo Vineyard Primitivo (Texas)
properties.address: 4545 Old Reliance Rd, Bryan, TX 77808, USA
properties.descrption: Deep and dark smelling, this has aromas of Mission fig, black fruit compote and spiced pastry. It's a heavyweight effort with a dense texture, but the acidity saves it from feeling ponderous. An overripe flavor of sun-dried fruit dominates the flavor profile, concluding with a touch of Bourbon barrel on the medium-long finish.

properties.title: Urbina 2001 Reserva Especial  (Rioja)
properties.address: Rancho san marcos, 22766 Villa de Juárez, B.C., Mexico
properties.descrption: This rusty-colored Rioja shows funky aromas of leather mixed with hints of rose petal. A good mouthfeel with smooth tannins is suggestive of aged Burgundy or Merenzao (Trousseau), while rooty, earthy flavors of leaves and tea are interesting. Drink now.

properties.title: Viña Santa Marina 2010 Equus Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon-Syrah Red (Extremadura)
properties.address: C/ Ctra. N-630. P.K. 634. Aptdo .714, 06800 Mérida, Badajoz, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy, rubbery berry aromas are potent. So is the palate, which is demanding and bouncy but also a bit rough. Pinched, herbal plum and tomato flavors are rustic in style and reflect Extremedura's sunny, dry terroir. This wine is interesting and moderately complex.

properties.title: Convento de Las Claras 2012  Ribera del Duero
properties.address: Carretera Pesquera, Km 1,5, 47300 Peñafiel, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Bright cherry aromas are youthful and draw you in. In the mouth, this young RDD is clampy and fresh. Plum, wild berry and salty notes define the flavor profile, while the finish is full in feel and reflective of a well-made Tinto Fino.

properties.title: Château Mouton Rothschild 2012 Le Petit Mouton  (Pauillac)
properties.address: Château Mouton Rothschild, 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: This wine is soft and fruity with ripe berry fruits and gentle tannins. For a major second wine, it's surprisingly easy and soft, developing fast with its berry fruits, chocolate and wood flavors at the end. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Pierre de Montignac 2012  Médoc
properties.address: 1 Montignac, 33340 Civrac-en-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: For the vintage, this is a ripe, bold wine. Layers of delicious black fruits are supported by firm tannins and the right amount of wood aging. Balanced and dense, it will age well. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Teyssier 2011  Montagne-Saint-Émilion
properties.address: Château Teyssier Vignonet, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: Big and dry, this wine shows the tannic, firm character of the vintage. It has a dark, dense core of wood tannins while the juicy black currant fruit is still developing. The wine needs to age, so drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Teyssier 2012  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: Château Teyssier Vignonet, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: This shows both the fruit of the vintage and a more structured tannic side. Black currant flavors are up front, offering a generous feeling. They are balanced by the backdrop of tannins and tight acidity. Together they make a wine that is concentrated and likely to be ready to drink soon. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Citille di Sopra 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Pod. Citille di Sopra 46 Torrenieri, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of forest floor, Mediterranean herb, dark berry, turned soil and game mingle in the glass. The tight palate delivers clove, ground white pepper, grilled herb and dried black cherry alongside bracing tannins.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2012 Grand Estates Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.descrption: Aromatically pleasing, this suggests fresh blueberry pie, with a whiff of smoked meat. It's straightforward with huckleberry and mocha flavors, trailing slightly toward the finish.

properties.title: Domaine de la Solitude 2012  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: Rte de Bédarrides, 84230 Châteauneuf-du-Pape, France
properties.descrption: While this wine is lean initially, it also shows weight and the potential of ripe fruits. Concentrated tannins still allow room for a little juicy fruit. The overall effect is of structure triumphing over fruitiness. Made by the team at Domaine de Chevalier, the wine will take time to develop. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Domiciano de Barrancas 2012 Cosecha Nocturna Syrah (Mendoza)
properties.address: Maipú, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: This meaty, ripe Syrah is smoky and deep on the nose, with lusty berry aromas. The palate is tannic but supported by bold, fleshy blackberry flavors backed by maple, vanilla and burnt toast. Caramel richness makes its way onto the finish, which is rocky and tannic but tastes good. This value Syrah was built for grilled meat.

properties.title: Gård 2012 Vaucluse Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19151 144th Ave NE d, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Syrah (72%), Grenache (21%) and Viognier brings vibrant aromas of green olive, smoked meat and orange peel, which don't entirely meld. It's tangy and flavorful with abundant mesquite notes on the finish.

properties.title: Goose Watch 2012 Lemberger (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5480 NY-89, Romulus, NY 14541, USA
properties.descrption: Bright pomegranate and red cherry flavors penetrate this bracingly fresh Lemberger. The palate is primary and fruity, but nuanced by wisps of smoke, nuts and a lingering ruffle of tannins. It's an elegantly structured yet refreshing, quaffable wine.

properties.title: Riglos 2012 Quinto Malbec (Tupungato)
properties.address: Km 32, RP15, M5509, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Jammy, reduced aromas of cassis, blueberry and animal hide lead to a juicy, fresh palate that's not too thick or concentrated. Blackberry and blueberry flavors are lightly peppered, while the finish is quick and light for Malbec. This is a new wine that aims at freshness and simple fruit more than power and weight.

properties.title: Koenig Vineyards 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon-Syrah
properties.address: 21452 Hoskins Rd, Caldwell, ID 83607, USA
properties.descrption: This blend offers notes of nori, olive, cherry and tire rubber. The full-bodied flavors are sweet and palate-coating, with abundant savory notes and lightly grainy tannins.

properties.title: La Torre 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: 6025 W Las Positas Blvd, Pleasanton, CA 94588, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas suggest bright berry, underbrush, eucalyptus and a whiff of wet fur. The palate starts off strong, with bright red berry and grilled herb but then it falls off, leaving a somewhat hollow midpalate. Despite the lean character, fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity make this very drinkable.

properties.title: Macari 2010 Dos Aguas Red (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 150 Bergen Ave, Mattituck, NY 11952, USA
properties.descrption: Rich, lusciously concentrated black plum and cherry flavors are accented with spice and smoke in this bold, Merlot-heavy blend. Framed with fine, chalky tannins, it's supple and silky in mouthfeel with a moderately long finish.

properties.title: Northwest Cellars 2010 Coyote Canyon Vineyard Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 11909 124th Ave NE, Kirkland, WA 98034, USA
properties.descrption: This 100% varietal wine offers lightly volatile notes of vanilla, coconut, pepper and dried cherries. The fruit flavors show good concentration along with a beguiling feel and a finish that lingers. Although the wood takes center stage, it plays its part well.

properties.title: Naggiar 2008 Don Giovanni Red (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 18261 Rosemary Ln, Grass Valley, CA 95949, USA
properties.descrption: Made from Zinfandel and Cabernet Sauvignon, Don Giovanni is a full-bore wine. Its more Zin than Cab in flavor and personality, with bursts of berry and vanilla throughout.

properties.title: Niner 2009 Bootjack Ranch Malbec (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2400 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: There are lots of rich, ripe blackberry, licorice and spicy flavors in this dry Malbec. It feels soft and silky in the mouth, but there's some heat from the alcohol as well as a touch of overripeness. Drink now.

properties.title: Nuiton-Beaunoy 2010  Hautes Côtes de Nuits
properties.address: 97 Rte de Pommard, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: Light, fragrant, and structured, this shows a smoky flavor and refreshing red-berry fruit. It's lively and fruity, and the tannins are in the background.

properties.title: Ott & Murphy 2009 Tempranillo (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 340 Greentree Rd, Sewell, NJ 08080, USA
properties.descrption: Pleasant and simple, this offers light strawberry and cherry flavors, with a pretty streak of mocha. The finish shows some earth and stem notes.

properties.title: Speri 2010 La Roverina  (Valpolicella)
properties.address: Via Fontana, 14, 37029 San Pietro in Cariano VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Fresh, and easy, this is the perfect easy-drinking wine to enjoy with weeknight dinners. It offers blueberry, cherry and white almond aromas.

properties.title: Trenza 2009 Tinto Red (Edna Valley)
properties.address: 5828 Orcutt Rd, San Luis Obispo, CA 93401, USA
properties.descrption: This is very strong in fruit, tasting like the essence of raspberry and cherry, with penetrating acidity. It has a candied jamminess, although the finish is bone dry. Made from Syrah, Tempranillo and Grenache, it's a fun wine for drinking now with easy fare.

properties.title: Messina Hof 2009 Private Reserve Double Barrel Cedar Crest Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Texas)
properties.address: 4545 Old Reliance Rd, Bryan, TX 77808, USA
properties.descrption: A veneer of new wood overlays the aromas of smoke, spiced blueberry, blackberry and olive. Well-proportioned acids and tannins give shape to this medium- to full-bodied effort, which concludes with a seemingly long, clingy finish.

properties.title: Airfield Estates 2010 Runway Merlot (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 14450 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE #109, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Firm, hard, tart and chewy, this has tight black fruits, high acids and earthy tannins, which are lightened with a note of pretty baking spice.

properties.title: Boxwood 2010 Red (Virginia)
properties.address: 2042 Burrland Ln, Middleburg, VA 20117, USA
properties.descrption: Comprised of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Petit Verdot, this bears aromas of clover honey, char, dark chocolate and a late-to-develop savory meat tone. On the palate, there's enough flesh to buffer its high amount of fine-grained, muscular tannins. A rose petal note unfurls across the midpalate, leading to a finish marked with enduring grip.

properties.title: Campos de Viento 2010 Old Vine Tempranillo (La Mancha)
properties.address: 301 Country Club Rd, Hood River, OR 97031, USA
properties.descrption: The cherry and berry aromas are friendly and ripe. It feels flush, edgy and a little tannic, with a fresh berry flavor that's bundled with a touch of herb. The tasty berry flavor holds form on the medium-length finish.

properties.title: Costa de Oro 2010 Reserva Oro Rojo Estate Gold Coast Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 1331 Nicholson Ave, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: This tastes a little unripe, with a green mint and vegetal streak that cuts across the flavors of raspberry and sweet toasty oak. Rich meats and cheeses will help tame the acids. It doesn't seem to be an ager, so drink up.

properties.title: Gino Fasoli 2010 La Corte del Pozzo  (Valpolicella)
properties.address: San Zeno di, Via C.Battisti, 47, 37030 Colognola Ai Colli VR, Italy
properties.descrption: This bottling offers more density and heft than usually found in this category of Italian reds. The bouquet offers bright berry, cherry, leather and spice notes.

properties.title: Gino Fasoli 2010 La Corte del Pozzo  (Valpolicella Ripasso)
properties.address: San Zeno di, Via C.Battisti, 47, 37030 Colognola Ai Colli VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Toasty and bright, this garnet-colored wine offers fresh cherry and roasted nut aromas that balance each other nicely. The wine's medium body is backed by a touch of heat and a note of tangy exotic spice.

properties.title: Zenato 2009  Valpolicella Superiore
properties.address: Strada San Benedetto, 8, 37019 Peschiera del Garda VR, Italy
properties.descrption: This shows easy characteristics of red cherry, bitter almond, cola and spice, with a bright and cleansing finish. It would pair nicely with pasta or pizza.

properties.title: Rubinelli Vajol 2009  Valpolicella Classico Superiore
properties.address: Via Paladon, 31, 37029 San Pietro in Cariano VR, Italy
properties.descrption: The bouquet opens with red cherry, wild blueberry and dried flower aromas. The palate is medium in build, with a bright finish.

properties.title: 14 Hands 2013 The Reserve Cabernet Franc-Merlot (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 660 Frontier Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Franc makes up almost two-thirds of this wine, with the rest Merlot. Aromas of vanilla, cocoa, baking spice, flowers and cherry are followed by plentiful dark-fruit flavors and a tart finish, with the tannins providing a squeeze.

properties.title: Market Vineyards 2012 Derivative Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1950 Keene Rd Bldg S, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is predominantly Merlot (44%) along with a whopping 33% Petit Verdot, with the rest Cabernet Sauvignon and Malbec. Aromas of cocoa, vanilla, spice, green herbs and dark fruit are followed by generous dark-fruit flavors and plentiful tannins. It shows good cellaring potential.

properties.title: Morgan 2014 Twelve Clones Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: 204 Crossroads Blvd, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA 93923, USA
properties.descrption: Light raspberry, cranberry, pomegranate and strawberry fruit tones greet the nose on this bottling. The aromas then offer a brick-like minerality bolstered by chiseled slate and wet river stones. Flavors are also rocky and rusty, with lots of crushed gravel and turned earth giving complexity to the cran-pomegranate fruit.

properties.title: Musella 2011  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.address: Via Ferrazzette, 2, 37036 S. Martino Buon Albergo VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of exotic spice, baked plum, leather and menthol lead the nose along with a whiff of crushed purple flower. The smooth hearty palate delivers mature blackberry, prune, cinnamon and pipe tobacco while velvety tannins provide seamless support.

properties.title: Oakville East 2013 Core Stone Red (Oakville)
properties.address: 7730 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This shows classic valley-floor aspects of dusty tannin, brushy sage and cedar, staying true to the Bordeaux varieties it holds. Pencil lead and mocha accent the medium-bodied background, while soft, pillowy tannins are approachable.

properties.title: Revelry 2013 Aerial Series Block 19 Weinbau Vineyard Syrah (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 3978 Peppers Bridge Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This wine bears a strong resemblance to its sibling from one block over in with its berry and flower aromas. The palate however brings more lushness and texture that persists through the finish.

properties.title: Foxen 2014 Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 7600 Foxen Canyon Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: There's a forest-floor touch to the nose of this appellation blend that also shows smoked and raw beef, hearty berries and a slight compost touch. The mouthfeel is soft, with flavors of iron and aged beef giving nuance to the tart raspberry, pomegranate, chipped slate and dried-mint finish.

properties.title: Saintsbury 2014 Stanly Ranch Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 1500 Los Carneros Ave #9742, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: Velvety on the palate, this is a rich, unctuous wine, showy in full-bodied waves of baked cherry, tar and minty earth. With a substantial weight, it will appeal to fans of a bigger style while retaining plenty of varietal character.

properties.title: Tamarack Cellars 2013 Petit Verdot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 700 C St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Potting soil, pencil lead, vanilla, flower and cherry aromas lead to dense, pitch-black-fruit flavors. There's a lot of tannic heft but it's well integrated.

properties.title: Tranche 2012 Estate Grown Blue Mountain Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 705 Berney Dr, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Herb, wood spice, dried cherry, coffee and clove aromas lead to palate-coating full-bodied cherry and bittersweet-chocolate flavors. It captures the attention, with the feel providing as much enjoyment as the flavors, though at times it seems a bit advanced for its age.

properties.title: Turkovich 2014 The Boss Red (Yolo County)
properties.address: 304 Railroad Ave, Winters, CA 95694, USA
properties.descrption: Rich and almost meaty, this Rhône-style wine has wonderful complexity in aroma and flavor. It smells lightly earthy and very berry-like, tastes a bit smoky and beefy along with generous blackberry flavors that linger on the finish.

properties.title: Valduero 2012 Crianza  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Carretera de Aranda, s/n, 09443 Gumiel del Mercado, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: Oak-heavy aromas of vanilla, wood smoke and buttered toast vie with berry and plum scents. A fresh yet oaky palate feels full and resiny, with flavors of buttery oak, cherry and plum that follow the nose. Persistent oak on a full-force finish indicates that this has years left in it. Drink through 2023.

properties.title: Wind Rose 2013 Primitivo (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 143 W Washington St, Sequim, WA 98382, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of red fruit, herb and spice are followed by tart, full-bodied fruit flavors. A persistent finish caps it off.

properties.title: Zuccardi 2013 Zeta Red (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Costa Canal Uco s/n - Paraje Altamira, San Carlos, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: A crisp, focused nose consisting of lemon peel, cedar, dried cheese, blackberry and cassis aromas is encouraging. This Malbec (with 15% Cabernet Sauvignon) is mouth-filling and tight, with firm tannins. Pointed salty flavors of black plum and berry fruits finish with integrated spice and cocoa notes. Drink now through 2024—the longer this sits, the less aggressive and choppy it'll be.

properties.title: Gianni Brunelli 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Loc Podernovone, 157, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of dark berry, fragrant blue flower, chopped herb and a whiff of baking spice float out of the glass. The lively enjoyable palate doles out juicy wild cherry, cranberry, thyme and a hint of anise alongside smooth, supple tannins and firm acidity.

properties.title: JM Cellars 2013 Margaret's Vineyard Malbec (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 14404 137th Pl NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This 100% varietal wine opens with alluring aromas of plum, clove, stems and spice. The purple-fruit flavors are palate coating, speckled with cocoa and barrel accents throughout.

properties.title: Domaine Vacheron 2014  Sancerre
properties.address: 1 Rue du Puits Poulton, 18300 Sancerre, France
properties.descrption: Highly reputed for its red wines, Vacheron continues to display its skills with this latest vintage. The wine is rich and full with a combination of bright red fruits and a firm, integrated structure. It is a fresh wine now and one that should age. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Donna Olga 2010 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: 1340 Smith Ave, Baltimore, MD 21209, USA
properties.descrption: Underbrush, grilled porcini, chopped herb, tilled soil aromas and a hint of stewed fruit unfold in the glass. The developed palate doles out layers of mature black cherry, raspberry compote, chopped mint, tobacco and anise set along against a backbone of fine-grained tannins. It will be even better in a few years but it's not built for long-term cellaring.

properties.title: Fattoria dei Barbi 2010 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Loc. Podernovi, 170, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of sunbaked earth, underbrush, grilled herb and mature black-skinned fruit lead the nose along with a whiff of worn leather. The chewy palate offers ripe wild cherry, cinnamon and anise framed in velvety tannins. Drink 2018–2025.

properties.title: Fattoria La Lecciaia 2010 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Localita' Vallafrico, Montalcino, Si 53024, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Dark-skinned berry, menthol toast and tilled soil aromas come together in the glass. Full-bodied, ripe, velvety tannins underscore flavors of mature black cherry, licorice, tobacco and clove. Drink 2018–2028.

properties.title: Gary Farrell 2013 Grist Vineyard Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 10701 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Intensely dense and feral, this wine opens with a thicket of tart cherry and strawberry, followed by leathery black pepper and lavender. Medium in body and acidity, it works for the table, finding balance as it goes, before a rich taste of toffee finishes things off.

properties.title: Va Piano 2013 Les Collines Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1793 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from one of the state's premier Syrah vineyards, the aromas of violets, dried herbs, brown stems and smoked meat pop. The fruit and savory flavors show an exquisite sense of balance that persists through the extended finish.

properties.title: Viña Olabarri 2011 Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Ctra. Haro - Anguciana s/n, LR-202, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Complete and inviting aromas of plum and raisin make a positive statement without shouting. This feels stout, dense and layered, while a flavor combination of blackberry, black currant, herbs de Provence and dark chocolate finishes earthy, lightly baked and moderately complex. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: Jean-Luc Colombo 2011 Les Ruchets  (Cornas)
properties.address: 10 Rue des Violettes, 07130 Cornas, France
properties.descrption: Like the La Louvée, this wine is plummy and superripe, wrapped in toasty, cedary oak. It's savory as well, with meaty notes carried along by waves of richness. The finish is lined with mouthcoating tannins, suggesting a few years of cellaring are warranted. Drink 2018–2030.

properties.title: Isole e Olena 2011 Cepparello Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Località Isole, 1, 50021 Barberino Tavarnelle FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Full-bodied and refined, this offers aromas of mature plum, vanilla, exotic spice and French oak. The firm palate delivers dried cherry, black raspberry, chopped herb, licorice, ground pepper and mineral alongside tightly knit, fine-grained tannins. It's an impressive effort for this scorching vintage. Let the tannins unwind for another few years then enjoy sooner rather than later.

properties.title: Resalte 2010 Crianza  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: N-122 Km. 312, 47300 Peñafiel, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Calm aromas of plum, berry fruits and dried spices are composed. This feels solid and ripe, but also energetic. Flavors of chocolaty oak, mocha, baked plum and ripe berry fruits finish with lasting notes of clove and wood spice. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Tenuta di Lilliano 2011 Gran Selezione  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Lilliano, 8, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Ripe and velvety, this opens with classic varietal scents of crushed violet, black-skinned berry, baking spice and a whiff of leather. The juicy, delicious palate doles out fleshy wild cherry, black raspberry, cinnamon and licorice while firm, refined tannins proved support. It's an impressive effort for this hot vintage.

properties.title: Marchesato degli Aleramici 2010 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Podere il Galampio, 376, 53024 Camigliano, Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of tobacco, dried rose, mature berry and leather meld together on the glass. The firm palate is still a bit closed, but offers dried red cherry, licorice, grilled herb and a hint of black tea alongside firm tannins that give the finish some grip.

properties.title: Red Car 2013 Manchester Ridge Vineyard Pinot Noir (Mendocino Ridge)
properties.address: 8400 Graton Rd, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: Great fruit flavors and a lively, fresh texture come together for a very well-balanced and vivid-tasting wine. Just enough tannin and grape acidity provide an agile, appetizing structure to let the fresh red and black cherry notes stand out. Fermented with native yeast and aged in neutral barrels., it will be best after 2018.

properties.title: K Vintners 2012 Bronco Malbec (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 820 Mill Creek Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas of dark plum, thistle and earth captivate the senses, with the variety unmistakable. The flavors coat the palate from end-to-end, lingering on the finish.

properties.title: Krupp Brothers 2013 Black Bart Stagecoach Vineyard Syrah (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1094 Hardman Ave, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: A concentrated, full-bodied and dense explosion of chocolate, plum jam and smoky oak, this wine is powerful and well integrated, smooth on the palate with its oak well tucked in. From a mighty mountainous vineyard, it captures the soul of the variety from a standpoint of ripeness and grip.

properties.title: Law 2012 Audacious Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3885 Peachy Canyon Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Ripe and rich, this blend of 45% Syrah, 30% Cabernet Sauvignon and 25% Grenache punches strong with cherry blossom, olallieberry, vanilla, melted chocolate and violet aromas. Dill and anise pop up at the tip of the sip, then veer into cigar smoke, elderberry fruit and graphite. It's quite grippy with tannins.

properties.title: Tenute Silvio Nardi 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Localita' Casale Del Bosco, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Underbrush, red berry, scorched earth and dark spice aromas emerge in the glass. The structured, chewy palate offers mature black cherry, clove, ground pepper and star anise set in a firm framework of fine-grained tannins. Drink 2018–2028.

properties.title: Terralsole 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
properties.address: Villa Collina d'Oro, 160/a, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This offers typical Sangiovese aromas of wild berry, crushed blue flower, aromatic herb, new leather and a trace of pipe tobacco. The ripe, chewy palate doles out juicy black cherry, raspberry compote, licorice and espresso while brawny, velvety tannins envelope the palate.

properties.title: Walt 2013 Rita's Crown Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 380 1st St W, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Made in a toasty, richer style, this bottling shows cherry cola, blackberry brioche, oak-smoked plums and roast beef on the action-packed nose. The palate is dense, with black cherry, blackberry and black plum fruit layered across roasted-pork flavors.

properties.title: HAGT 2009 Syrah (California)
properties.address: 15343 Plum Rd, Caldwell, ID 83607, USA
properties.descrption: A pretty simple little Syrah, fruity and sweet in cherries, with a sugary finish. Will pair nicely with a cheeseburger.

properties.title: Andrew Peace 2009 Masterpeace Shiraz (South Eastern Australia)
properties.address: 4077 Murray Valley Hwy, Piangil VIC 3597, Australia
properties.descrption: This light- to medium-bodied Shiraz is crisp and tart, yet also shows some dried-fruit character on the finish.

properties.title: Talbott 2009 Sleepy Hollow Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
properties.address: East Side of Lincoln St., between 5th &, 6th Ave, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA 93921, USA
properties.descrption: A streak of unripe green mint mars this wine. It's almost vegetal, stealing the thunder from the cherry and oak flavors. The tannins and acidity are beautiful, but that asparagus note is disturbing.

properties.title: Glen Ellen 2010 Proprietor's Reserve Pinot Noir (California)
properties.address: 13750 Arnold Dr Suite #9, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: Thin, with acidic cherry flavors and a touch of oak. Saved by dryness and a nice Pinot silkiness.

properties.title: Wellington 2007 Meeks Hilltop Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 11600 Dunbar Rd, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: Thin and simple, with ripe wild berry, cherry, currant, tobacco and pepper spice flavors that finish dry and watery.

properties.title: Château Moulin de Canhaut 2007  Médoc
properties.address: 22 Av. du Fort Médoc, 33460 Cussac-Fort-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: Dry and light, an unfocused wine. It has tannins, only light fruit, very dry and ultimately tough.

properties.title: Château de Virecourt 2009  Bordeaux
properties.address: 21 Rue de Moulins, 57160 Scy-Chazelles, France
properties.descrption: Dry, dark-hued tannins cut through the wine, giving it a bitter feel. It is tough, firm, missing the balancing fruit.

properties.title: DFJ Vinhos 2009 Portada Tinto Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: 2070-681 Vila Chã de Ourique, Portugal
properties.descrption: Described as medium sweet, this is soft and sugary, its tannins at an awkward angle to the soft surroundings. This style works better with the rosé and white versions of Portada.

properties.title: Glen Ellen 2009 Petite Sirah (California)
properties.address: 13750 Arnold Dr Suite #9, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: Sweet, soft and jammy, with raspberry, bacon and bubblegum flavors.

properties.title: Pomar Junction 2009 Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.descrption: Sharp and aggressive in acidity and unripe tannins, with a green mint edge to the cherries and raspberries, which actually are quite sweet. It's an unbalanced, rustic wine with excessively high alcohol.

properties.title: Rock Wall 2009 The Palindrome Tannat (California)
properties.address: 2301 Monarch St, Alameda, CA 94501, USA
properties.descrption: Thin in structure, with simple, sweet jam and herb flavors, this Tannat has strong tannins and acids.

properties.title: Glen Ellen 2009 Proprietor's Reserve Merlot (California)
properties.address: 1883 London Ranch Rd, Glen Ellen, CA 95442, USA
properties.descrption: Dry and vegetal, with an asparagus taste alongside the cherries and blackberries. At this price, not bad if you're not fussy.

properties.title: Vina Robles 2009 Red4 Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3700 Mill Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Maybe they took all the leftover wine and mixed it together?. A Rhône-style blend based on Petite Sirah, it's dry, tannic and jammy.

properties.title: Argana 2010 Syrah (Mendoza)
properties.address: San Rafael, Mendoza Province, Argentina
properties.descrption: Scratchy, reedy raspberry aromas set up an edgy, tight and drying wash of tart plum fruit and then a peppery, woodspiced finish. Tart and astringent overall.

properties.title: Bon Cap 2010 The Ruins Syrah-Cabernet (Robertson)
properties.address: Route 60 Eilandia, Robertson, 6705, South Africa
properties.descrption: A low intensity wine with simple fruit flavors of berry and plum and a slight effervescence in the mouth.

properties.title: Espiritu de Argentina 2009 Bonarda (Mendoza)
properties.address: 21301 Kathy Ln, Spicewood, TX 78669, USA
properties.descrption: Stemmy and funky smelling, with a burnt, stalky element to the core aromas. The palate grates and tastes of stemmy, burnt berry fruit. Stemmy and herbal on the finish as well.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2008 Reserve Tempranillo (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.descrption: Tart, leafy, with light strawberry fruit. This has little depth, just a pleasant strawberry nose and a simple, fruity palate.

properties.title: Domaine Jessiaume 2008  Bourgogne
properties.address: 10 Rue de la Gare, 21590 Santenay, France
properties.descrption: An easy, fruity wine, its attractive red cherry flavors bubbling away in soft tannins and light acidity. Very drinkable, and not for aging.

properties.title: Familia Schroeder 2008 Saurus Select Pinot Noir (Patagonia)
properties.address: 3 E, EDIFICIO SANTO DOMINGO, Sta. Fe 269, Q8300 Neuquén, Argentina
properties.descrption: Opens with warm, baked black fruit aromas and then a wave of woodiness takes control. The palate is round, full and sticky, with beefy but generic black fruit flavors and too much oak. Finishes with vanilla and resin; not a bad wine but needs more balance and fruit.

properties.title: Calcareous 2008 Grenache-Mourvèdre (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3430 Peachy Canyon Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Ridiculously high in alcohol, clocking in at nearly 16%, and it shows in a porty taste that frames the blackberry jam and chocolate flavors. Drink now.

properties.title: Venteux 2008 Mourvèdre (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 1795 Las Tablas Rd, Templeton, CA 93465, USA
properties.descrption: An atypical Mourvèdre , more like a warm-climate Pinot Noir with its light-bodied silkiness. Crisp acidity frames red cherry and cola flavors, leading to a dry, spicy finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Torres 2007 Coronas  (Rioja)
properties.address: Carrer de Miquel Torres i Carbó, 6, 08720 Vilafranca del Penedès, Barcelona, Spain
properties.descrption: Rubbery but fresh smelling, with sharp acidity that creates big-time juiciness but also an angular feel. Tastes of zippy, tangy red fruits that are crisp and sizzle away. Gets a bit more deep and earthy on the finish.

properties.title: Mont Tauch 2009 Le Dog de Jean Marc Merlot (Vin de Pays d'Oc)
properties.address: 2 Rue Cave Coopérative, 11350 Tuchan, France
properties.descrption: There's a green edge to this wine that struggles with the richer dark berries and fudge cake flavors. Soft and round in the mouth with a short finish.

properties.title: Bodega Vistandes 2009 Alto Las Tacas Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: C. Pescara 9997, Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Rusty in color, with a mildly mulchy, leafy nose that's also slightly floral and smells of orange peel. Zesty in the mouth, with a lean profile and tart flavors of red cherry, plum and herbs.

properties.title: Bodegas Navarro López 2009 Rojo Granrojo Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
properties.address: Autovía A-4, km. 193, 13300, 13300, Cdad. Real, Spain
properties.descrption: Sweet and mildly candied on the bouquet, and then it clamps down firmly in the mouth with hard Cabernet tannins and lightly herbal, candied flavors of medicinal black cherry. Decent but not special; finishes sticky and candied.

properties.title: Martellotto 2014 La Gioja Merlot (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 100 Los Padres Way UNIT 7, Buellton, CA 93427, USA
properties.descrption: Intriguing notes of sandalwood and cedar meet with dark red fruit and a touch of black pepper on the nose of this wine. The palate is layered with interesting touches of sage, marjoram, gravel and tar, hints of black cherry and loamy earth, and a chalky mouthfeel.

properties.title: Ormanni 2011 Borro del Diavolo Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Ormanni, 53036 Poggibonsi SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of oak, coconut, vanilla, espresso and charred earth come together on this structured wine. The aromas carry over to the full-bodied palate along with prune, raisin and a confectionary note. Bracing tannins clench the finish. Give the tannins a few more years to unfurl then drink to catch what remains of the fruit.

properties.title: Producteurs Plaimont 2014 Moonseng Red (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: 59 Av. des Mousquetaires, 32100 Condom, France
properties.descrption: The producer has the largest nursery of old grape varieties in southwest France and from it has plucked the Manseng Noir to blend with Merlot. The result is a rich wine with ripe Merlot red fruits that are given a more tannic character with the Manseng. There is a fresh juicy aftertaste that allows it to be drunk now.

properties.title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2014 Terra de Touros Red (Tejo)
properties.address: Estrada Municipal 1, 2080-201 Almeirim, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a clever blend with the natural ripeness of Pinot Noir in Portugal smoothing out the firmer tannins of Touriga Nacional. The result is a rich, soft wine, just lifted by acidity and anchored by a background of cherry fruits and black currant. Drink now.

properties.title: Quinta do Passadouro 2013 Passadouro Touriga Nacional (Douro)
properties.address: Lugar do Passadouro, 5085-101 Vale de Mendiz, Portugal
properties.descrption: The wine has plenty of fruit, the right layers of tannin. And yet it seems one-dimensional—something that can happen with Touriga Nacional. The depth and complexity found in previous vintages of this wine are missing. So you get bold black fruits and a stylish structure in a wine that is almost ready to drink.

properties.title: Ramón Bilbao 2011 Mirto  (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Santo Domingo de la Calzada, 34, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Fiery and borderline herbaceous aromas are green-leaning, which is surprising considering that 2011 was a warm, dry, highly regarded vintage in Rioja. On the palate, this feels strained, with outsized acidity. Herbal, roasted wild-berry flavors come with a lot of oak and clove, while the finish is fairly tart and herbal.

properties.title: Kason 2013 Old Vine Reserve Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 7200 NW Bony Rd, Yamhill, OR 97148, USA
properties.descrption: Deep, dark and tannic, this pits black cherry and cassis fruit against thickly applied oak. They wrestle to a stand-off, just about equally matched. Pair this with grilled, well-seasoned salmon.

properties.title: La Braccesca 2014 Sabazio  (Rosso di Montepulciano)
properties.address: Via Stella di Valiano, 10, 53045 Montepulciano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of violet, wild red berry and dark cooking spice lift out of the glass. The aromas carry over to the soft, straightforward palate accompanied by mellow but rather fleeting tannins.

properties.title: Le Vigne 2013 Di Ranchita Vista Cabernet Franc (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5115 Buena Vista Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Boysenberry, cracked rainbow peppercorns and dried rose petals show on the nose of this bottling, which plays to the lighter side of the grape. It's tart and brisk once sipped, with cranberry and pomegranate fruit given more complexity by a touch of wild fennel.

properties.title: Santa Luz 2013 Gran Corte Red (Colchagua Valley)
properties.address: 8170 Caminito Santaluz E, San Diego, CA 92127, USA
properties.descrption: A heavy oak character controls the nose, and with it comes aromas of sawdust, vanilla, cocoa and raspberry. This feels a bit sticky and creamy, while palpable oak returns on the palate and creates vanilla, pepper and chocolate flavors. Heat, high acidity and peppery spice work the finish on this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Carmenère and Syrah.

properties.title: Silver Mountain 2014 Rosé of Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 402 Ingalls St unit #29, Santa Cruz, CA 95060, USA
properties.descrption: A perfect shade of medium pink, this is a standard, down-the-middle rose. Lemon, watermelon and fresh-cut cherry-tomato notes play on the nose, while the palate packs raspberry and Key-lime flavors.

properties.title: Tres Palacios 2013 Family Vintage Carmenère (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Magnere 1543, Providencia, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Aromas of tomato sauce and fresh green herbs set up true-to-Carmenère flavors of salty, herbal plum and berry. On the finish, typical varietal flavors of olive, herbs and spice are saucy.

properties.title: Vignamaggio 2014 Terre di Prenzano  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Via di Lamole, 46, 50022 Greve in Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Scents of fresh red berry, violet and cake spice meld together in the glass. The vibrant, straightforward palate offers tart red cherry, orange rind and a hint of star anise alongside racy acidity and sleek tannins.

properties.title: Vignerons de Bel Air 2014 Cuvées Classic  (Morgon)
properties.address: 1086 Rue Bruce, Dunham, QC J0E 1M0, Canada
properties.descrption: This is a structured wine whose fruit is still coming through the tannins. It has a dry core, layers of acidity and juicy bitter cherry acidity. Drink from the end of 2016.

properties.title: Willowbrook 2013 Kaufman Sunnyslope Vineyard Clone 777 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Mountain)
properties.address: Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Reduced on the nose, and showing strong barrel influence, this is a tangy, grippy, weighty wine. It's ripe and tightly wound, a sign of the vintage and most likely, vineyard site. Needing time to open in the glass, it unwinds slowly.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2014 Reserva Casillero del Diablo Malbec (Central Valley)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Although this opens with aromatic notes of inner tube and iodine, airing reveals dry herb scents and medicinal cherry and berry aromas. With proper weight and balance, this basic Malbec tastes of cherry cough drop and plum, with a dash of green herbs.

properties.title: Copper Belt 2012 Keating Reserve Red
properties.address: 1937 Main St, Baker City, OR 97814, USA
properties.descrption: The winery went all out on this blend of 50% Syrah, 25% each Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, giving it three years in 20% new French oak. It's a solid, chunky blend, bright and spicy, with high-toned cranberry and cherry fruit. It's good, but simple.

properties.title: Companhia das Quintas 2011 Quinta de Pancas Grande Escolha Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: R. da Fonte Nova, 3780 Sangalhos, Portugal
properties.descrption: Big, black and juicy, it manages to be both dense and structured and freshly fruity at the same time. With this combination promising great things, the wine is ripe and fragrant. The dark color from the Petit Verdot in the blend follows through to the firm texture while allowing room for refreshing juiciness. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Errazuriz 2011 Don Maximiano Founder's Reserva Red (Aconcagua Valley)
properties.address: E-639 18, Panquehue, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Smooth, deep aromas of berry, spice, earth and minerals are rolled into a pure, harmonious whole. This Cabernet Sauvignon-led blend is racy, clean and layered on the tongue, while oaky flavors of vanilla and cream are backed by ribald blackberry and cassis. The elegant finish is potent and deep. Drink through 2020.

properties.title: Donkey & Goat 2011 The Recluse Broken Leg Vineyard Syrah (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 1296 Bowmanton Rd, Roseneath, ON K0K 2X0, Canada
properties.descrption: There are subtle wild cherry and blackberry high notes in this stellar Syrah, much of it whole-cluster pressed from a cool site in a cool year. That combination of site and year dance into a peppery, leathery, savory, slightly smoky Syrah, medium in body, that's more about complexity and finesse than power.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2011 Companhia das Lezirias Tyto Alba Red (Tejo)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.descrption: Almost black in color, this is a powerful and concentrated wine. Named after the barn owl that is found in the woods around the vines, it is packed with dense and dry tannins. Acidity comes from the black currant fruit while perfumes come from the Touriga Nacional in the blend. Drink this complex wine from 2017.

properties.title: Clos de la Tech 2009 Domaine du Docteur Rodgers Pinot Noir (San Francisco Bay)
properties.address: 535 Eastview Way, Woodside, CA 94062, USA
properties.descrption: While impressive now for its weight and flavor profile, this should evolve well, thanks to its heavy tannins and ample concentration. Right now, there is wet earth and prominent mint on the nose. The palate also picks up spearmint, with sagebrush, licorice and tobacco as well. The tannins emerge at the end of the sip, and will continue to smooth out beyond 2020.

properties.title: Ken Wright 2012 Nysa Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 120 N Pine St, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: This Dundee Hills site captures the sweet, rich black cherry fruit flavors typical of the AVA, here highlighted with accents of fresh tarragon. It's young, bright and focused, with a lingering finish that adds a pleasing pat of butter and a hint of vanilla.

properties.title: Quinta de la Rosa 2011 La Rosa Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta de la Rosa, 5085-215 Covas do Douro, Portugal
properties.descrption: Powerful and tannic, this is a dense and complex wine. Made from selected barrels, it is structured as well as rich in fruit. Blackberry flavors come through the dry tannins and give acidity as well as ripeness. It's a wine that will need time; don't drink before 2017.

properties.title: Quinta Dona Matilde 2008 Dona Matilde Reserva Tinto Red (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta Dona Matilde, Bagaúste, 5050-435 Canelas PRG, Portugal
properties.descrption: Complex, ripe and fruity, this is an impressive wine with an impressive future. Its structure is still dominant, although the ripe damson and blueberry fruits are rich and concentrated. With strong wood aging flavors, it's powerful and still needs to age. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Sogrape 2011 Quinta dos Carvalhais Touriga Nacional (Dão)
properties.address: 5130-126 Ervedosa do Douro, Portugal
properties.descrption: Touriga Nacional is as much, maybe more, at home in the Dão as in the Douro. That's shown by this ripe and powerful wine that is still so young. The dark structure of tannins and wood flavors has a great mineral texture along with the potential for delicious blackberry fruits. It needs several years aging, wait until 2018.

properties.title: St. Rose 2011 Nunes Vineyard Ten Block Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2170 Co Rd 4110, Pittsburg, TX 75686, USA
properties.descrption: Light in color it's composed of violet and rose petal aromas, zippy in acidity, with layered dark cherry fruit and an earthy, herbal backbone. With texture on the palate, it has a buoyancy and electricity of minerality and finishes with the slightest suggestion of anise. Only 72 cases were made.

properties.title: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova 2011 Malhadinha Tinto Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova, 7800-601 Albernoa, Portugal
properties.descrption: This richly fruity wine has poise and elegance as well as a powerful structure. A light herbal character brings out the juicy fruits as well as a mint flavor. The wine is ripe although with its serious tannic element, it does need to age. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Charbay 2006 Still House Port (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 4001 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Made from Cabernet Sauvignon, Zinfandel and Syrah wine that's been aged seven years in French oak and fortified with four-year-old Charbay Syrah brandy, this vintage selection is aromatically stunning in chocolate, tobacco and dried ginger candy notes. Balanced and rich, it finishes semidry, with a viscous taste of almonds and dried cranberries, both of which would make a good pairing, atop a selection of gooey cheeses.

properties.title: Ken Wright 2012 Guadalupe Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 120 N Pine St, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: Quite tart, with lemony acids, the Guadalupe is built upon a mineral base of wet stone and chalk. There's a streak of earthy umami, dried leaf and green olive, yet the orchestration of these elements is superb, resulting in a distinctive wine focused on details of earth and soil.

properties.title: La Rochelle 2010 Deer Meadows Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 233 Adobe Canyon Rd, Kenwood, CA 95452, USA
properties.descrption: A high-elevation vineyard (1,700-feet) above Boonville, Deer Meadows imparts a subtle floral violet quality to this wine, which is lovingly faint in color and silky texture. Over time, the perfume builds into a singularly resolved mélange of dark blueberry and tart cherry, the acidity perfectly able to hit the high notes. This wine should be enjoyable through 2021–2024 minimum, making an incredible partner to mushroom risotto or spring lamb.

properties.title: Newsome-Harlow 2011 Herbert Vineyard Zinfandel (El Dorado County)
properties.address: 403 Main St, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.descrption: Winemaker Scott Klann combines with friend and fellow winemaker Marco Cappelli, the owner of Herbert Vineyard, to craft this celebration of elegant blackberry, jammy fruit, black pepper and licorice. Fine-tuned and elegant, it's also brawny, with substantial mouthfeel and texture.

properties.title: Sogrape 2010 Quinta dos Carvalhais Colheita Red (Dão)
properties.descrption: A wood-aged wine from the heart of the Dão, it has tannins, a tense mineral structure and layer after layer of black currant fruit and acidity. Dark and brooding at this stage, it needs to age for several years. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Tero Estates 2010 Windrow Vineyards Windrow Red (Walla Walla Valley (OR))
properties.address: 52015 Seven Hills Rd, Milton-Freewater, OR 97862, USA
properties.descrption: This is a field blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 14% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc, and 6% Malbec, all co-fermented and estate-grown. It's nicely evolved, ripe and fruity—a flavor cavalcade of pastry fruits and spices, fig, twig, cacao and coffee. Yes you may cellar this wine, but why wait? It's drinking beautifully.

properties.title: Viña el Principal 2010 Andetelmo Red (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Pirque, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile
properties.descrption: Bold berry, herb and olive aromas seem typically Chilean. This Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend, with 17% Petit Verdot, is round but firm, with superb structure and potency. Flavors of baking spices, herbs and rooty black fruits finish long, smooth and oaky. This is a sexy, polished, dark-tinted wine to drink through 2022.

properties.title: Couloir 2012 Monument Tree Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.descrption: Another lovely Monument Tree Pinot from Couloir, this vintage is stemmy and earthy, yet soft, silky and voluptuous in all the right ways. It's pleasantly refined and ethereal, with whispers of cherry and raspberry fruitiness alongside equal parts gravitas and substance.

properties.title: Ironstone 2010 Reserve Rous Old Vine Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: Ironstone Vineyards, 1894 6 Mile Rd, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.descrption: A distinct late-harvest character pervades this full-bodied Zin, which has very ripe aromas of raisins and prunes, and bold, dried-fruit flavors, too. The texture is smooth and the wine is soft and not very tannic.

properties.title: Kirkland Signature 2012 Château de Marsan  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 3705 Hampton Rd, Oceanside, NY 11572, USA
properties.descrption: Firm and hard-edged this wine is currently tough. The fruit—black currant and berry—will bring out the potential richness. It's structured for the moment, but wait until 2017.

properties.title: Château Bois de Rolland 2012 Cuvée Prestige  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 33720 Barsac, France
properties.descrption: Ripe berry fruits shine through this wine. Supported by the tannins, they give a solid and rich character that is beginning to develop. With a dark aftertaste, this wine has potential and will be best from 2017.

properties.title: Château Brande-Bergère 2012 Cuvée O'Byrne  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 1, Lieu-dit Brande-Bergère, 33230 Les Églisottes-et-Chalaures, France
properties.descrption: Juicy black fruits give a great start, supported by the tannins that kick in. Ripe, full of flavor and generous, this is a broad, full-bodied wine. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château de Bel 2012 La Capitane  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 1, 33500 Arveyres, France
properties.descrption: Ripe and juicy, this is perfumed, full of red berry flavor and attractively soft tannins. The wine feels broad and rich, ready to drink from 2015.

properties.title: Château du Tasta 2009 Grande Réserve  (Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 2 lieu-dit, 33126 Saint-Aignan, France
properties.descrption: Dense and richly smooth, this displays all the fruit and generous texture of a 2009. It's now maturing well with its blackberry fruitiness, sweet tannins and light acidity. Drink now and until 2020.

properties.title: Tabarrini 2011  Montefalco Rosso
properties.address: Loc. Case Sparse n.58/C - Fraz, 06036 Turrita PG, Italy
properties.descrption: This brawny red conveys aromas of wood shop, oak, spearmint and coffee. The one-dimensional palate displays oak extract, dried red berry, and roasted coffee bean alongside drying wood tannins. It doesn't have enough fruit richness to balance the oak and the heat of alcohol is evident on the midpalate.

properties.title: Château Lajarre 2010 Cuvée Eléonore  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 24 Av. des Châteaux, 33350 Mouliets-et-Villemartin, France
properties.descrption: Across the river Dordogne from Castillon, the vineyard of Lajarre is on the first slope. This soft and ripe wine has black currant fruitiness, fresh acidity and a judicious use of wood aging. It still shows the structure of 2010, so will be better from 2015.

properties.title: Château Penin 2012 Natur  (Bordeaux)
properties.address: 39 Couponne, 33420 Génissac, France
properties.descrption: The wine is rich, full of berry fruits that are also touched by damsons. It has spice, some toast and a smooth texture. Plenty of jammy fruit indicate good potential. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Clos Cantenac 2011 Petit Cantenac  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: La Boucharde, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: The second wine of Clos Cantenac is already accessible. With spice, black currant fruits and ripe tannins, it's both juicy and firmly structured. The wine is balanced, with great acidity at the end contrasting with the tannins. Drink now.

properties.title: David Clinton 2011 Unti Vineyard Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: From a new, small producer devoted to 100% Zinfandel, this soft, grippy wine offers a hint of menthol on the nose and muted aromatics. The finish is ripe though tempered by good acidity.

properties.title: Quasar 2014 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.address: 1000 Main St, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This Crianza has leathery aromas, a tannic mouthfeel and roasted, spicy red berry flavors. It's dry, oaky and not particularly ripe.

properties.title: Mariposa 2014 Tempranillo (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5022 CA-140, Mariposa, CA 95338, USA
properties.descrption: Leather, smoked meat, crushed rock, stewed black cherry and dried oregano notes show on the rustic nose of this bottling from the team at Cru Wine Company. It's light bodied, making for easy quaffing, with red plum, beef jerky and baking spice flavors.

properties.title: Mollydooker 2014 Enchanted Path Shiraz-Cabernet (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: Coppermine Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: Combine masses of American oak with high ripeness and the result is this warm woody wine oozing with vanilla, molasses and cedar. It's full and plush, but lacks complexity and cellaring potential. Drink it now.

properties.title: AuburnJames 2012 Speedster Red (North Coast)
properties.address: 1001 Silverado Trail S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This brawny, dry wine has oak, tannin and body in big portions, its dark color leading to cut wood aromas, tart black cherry and blackberry flavors and a firm, somewhat drying texture. It needs rich food as a pairing or more time in the bottle to mellow.

properties.title: Indomita 2015 Zardoz Cabernet Sauvignon-Carmenère (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Ruta 68, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Although this smells raw, woody and even a bit citric, sometimes a red wine that's not over the top is in order, and this Cabernet Sauvignon-Carmenère blend fits that bill. A tight lean racy palate offers flavors of red citric fruits, oak and herbs. Barrel spice is dominant on a tight energetic finish.

properties.title: Cono Sur 2015 Reserva Especial Pinot Noir (San Antonio)
properties.address: Chimbarongo, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Earthy spicy aromas of tea and leather frame herbal berry and cherry notes. This has a fresh jumpy palate and snappy flavors of spiced pie cherry, plum and oak-based vanilla. A bit of saltiness rises up on a juicy, racy finish.

properties.title: Chehalem 2010 Ridgecrest Vineyards Pinot Noir (Ribbon Ridge)
properties.address: 106 S Center St, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: The best of the three vineyard designates in 2010, this firm and full-flavored wine is still a bit tight, and rewards extra breathing time. It tastes like a bowl full of berries and plums with pretty mocha highlights.

properties.title: Domaine du Moulin 2010 Le Faucon Red (Côtes du Tarn)
properties.address: 7 Lieu dit Le Moulin, 49310 Lys-Haut-Layon, France
properties.descrption: A blend of Braucol and Tannat, this a dark-colored blockbuster, with firm tannins that are mitigated by the smooth, rich blackberry flavor. It has power, immense concentration and great density. Age for 3–4 years.

properties.title: Feudi della Medusa 2008 Norace Red (Isola dei Nuraghi)
properties.address: Via S. Michele, 36, 09010 Pula CA, Italy
properties.descrption: Norace is a blend of Cannonau, Syrah and Carignano that offers dried fruit and spice, backed by tobacco, black olive and a whiff of blue flower. The mouthfeel is dominated by savory flavors of peppercorn and cured meat.

properties.title: Feudo Maccari 2010 Saia Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale 19 Noto-Pachino km 13,5, 96017 Noto, SR, Italy
properties.descrption: Characteristics of toasted almond and pistachio shine through as soon as you put your nose to the glass. Those notes are followed by bright cherry and blackberry, plus fresh sensations of acidity.

properties.title: James Family Cellars 2009 Stony Point Vineyard Estate Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 6861 Grove St, Cotati, CA 94931, USA
properties.descrption: James Family continues to produce solid Pinot Noirs from this vineyard that are typical of the Sonoma Coast. The wine is dry, properly tart in acidity, and has flavors of pomegranates and cranberries, with astringent cherry-skin-like tannins.

properties.title: Laurent Gauthier 2011 Côte du Py Vieilles Vignes  (Morgon)
properties.address: 948 Haut Morgon, 69910 Villié-Morgon, France
properties.descrption: Intensely juicy, this is packed with acidity and tight red-cherry fruit layered with firm tannins. It feels a little austere at the moment, and it is likely to take time to open.

properties.title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2011 Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: 9 Rue Ada Byron, 64000 Pau, France
properties.descrption: Bold fruit characterizes this firm, fruity Cahors. It has the dark tannins of Malbec, which are supported by the rich black-fruit flavor and touches of licorice, black cherry and black currant. Age this for another 2–3 years.

properties.title: Signé Vigneron 2011 Domane de la Passion  (Moulin-à-Vent)
properties.address: La Martiniere, Chem. des Vignerons, 69210 Bully, France
properties.descrption: An attractively balanced Moulin-à-Vent, this has firm tannins that contrast well with the damson flavor and tight acidity. The finish is fresh, with a hint of minerality.

properties.title: Stoller 2009 Cathy's Reserve Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 16161 NE McDougall Rd, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: Aged in 100% new French oak, this seems to be a bit overwhelmed by the wood. Flavors recall black cherry cola, plus a layer of brown sugar and milk chocolate. It somehow misses some of the depth and texture that past vintages have shown.

properties.title: Abacela 2009 Syrah (Southern Oregon)
properties.address: 12500 Lookingglass Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.descrption: Forward, sappy and fruity, this has excellent structure and plenty of ripe berry flavor. It has supporting acids that lend a touch of citrus, plus a streak of vanilla that runs through the finish.

properties.title: Benanti 2009 Rosso di Verzella  (Etna)
properties.address: Via Giuseppe Garibaldi, 361, 95029 Viagrande CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Elegant and full of volcanic character, this blend of Nerello Mascalese and Nerello Cappuccio opens with notes of brimstone, crushed mineral and delicate forest berry. There is a spicy, slightly thorny side to the wine that becomes more apparent on the palate.

properties.title: Westrey 2010 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 1065 NE Alpine Ave, McMinnville, OR 97128, USA
properties.descrption: Pretty scents of rose petal and white chocolate introduce this smooth, mouth-coating wine. There's a hint of peppery herb and a finishing touch of light toast, with clean, well-structured red fruits displaying excellent varietal character.

properties.title: Château Ponzac 2009 Patiemment Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Lieu dit Le Causse, 46140 Carnac-Rouffiac, France
properties.descrption: Ripe, smooth and balanced, this wine shows firm tannins and a solid, chunky build. With its rich black-plum fruit and opulent texture, it will be ready to drink in 2–3 years.

properties.title: Concha y Toro 2009 Terrunyo Entre Cordilleras Peumo Vineyard Carmenère (Peumo)
properties.address: Av. Virginia Subercaseaux 210, Pirque, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: This has a dense bouquet, with aromas of beet, clove, mint, tomato and berry fruit. The mouthfeel is rich and saturated, with a rawness that didn't exist in prior years. Flavors of mixed herb, earth and savory berry end with a long finish.

properties.title: Abacela 2009 Dolcetto (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 12500 Lookingglass Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.descrption: Big, bold and outright luscious, this estate-grown Dolcetto mixes bright flavors of berries and plums with a dusting of cocoa powder and cinnamon spice. A flavor of baking spice wafts through, despite the fact that the wine was kept in neutral cooperage. The finish is long and just a little on the chalky side.

properties.title: Trione 2008 River Road Ranch Syrah (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 19550 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: This rich Syrah beguiles with its soft, velvety texture and delicious flavors of blackberry, chocolate, bacon and black pepper. High in alcohol, but a fine follow-up to the very good 2007. Drink now.

properties.title: Vignerons de Bel Air 2011 Domaine des Ailes  (Moulin-à-Vent)
properties.address: 1086 Rue Bruce, Dunham, QC J0E 1M0, Canada
properties.descrption: This is a rich, powerful and wood-aged wine that shows fine balance between its ripe red fruits and solid, chunky tannins. The wood rounds out the rich texture and gives character to the full, juicy finish.

properties.title: Viña Casablanca 2010 Nimbus Single Vineyard Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Baked red-fruit aromas come with tea, orange peel, rubber and creamy milk-chocolate accents. The palate feels complete, with a friendly creaminess that supports the strawberry, plum and vanilla flavors. This is a balanced wine that's fresh and ready to drink.

properties.title: Château de la Terrière 2009 Cuvée Jules de Souzy Vieilles Vignes  (Brouilly)
properties.address: 1031 Route du Château, 69220 Cercié, France
properties.descrption: Bottled unfiltered, this is a richly ripe wine, layered with a more smoky, even mineral, texture from the volcanic soil of the vineyard. It is dense, the tannins giving hints of wood as well as a black plum skin character.

properties.title: Truett Hurst 2009 Burning Man Petite Sirah (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 5610 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Classic Petite Sirahin its own brawny, briary way. It's full-bodied and drily tannic, with strong flavors of wild berries, tobacco, Canadian bacon, crushed pepper and toast. The depth of these flavors is considerable, as is the long, spicy finish. Should glide effortlessly through the next eight years.

properties.title: Uvaggio 2008 Barbera (Lodi)
properties.address: 820 Randolph St, Napa, CA 94581, USA
properties.descrption: If only more California Barbera could be like this. Opening with a pretty, yet rich fruit nose of dark cherry and plum, the structured wine has been tamed into a soft, chocolate-brushed finish with just the perfect amount of acidity. The vines have been in the ground since the 1880s. Winemaker Jim Moore adds just a thimble's worth (3%) of Nebbiolo too, before letting it all age in oak.

properties.title: Jettlynn 2008 Single Vineyard Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 8585 Cross Canyons Rd, San Miguel, CA 93451, USA
properties.descrption: What a value. Pretty much as delicious as Paso reds get, although it's high in alcohol. Dazzles with cherry, blackberry, currant, dark chocolate, sweet sandalwood and cinnamon spice flavors.

properties.title: Bodegas Roda 2009 Sela  (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Vizcaya, 5, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Ripe from the beginning, with big berry aromas matched by sweet molasses and brown sugar aromas. Round, full and jammy in the mouth, with sweet berry flavors and notes of mild spices and vanilla. Long and just a bit oaky on the finish. Nice and approachable; drink now through 2013.

properties.title: Darien 2003 Seleccion  (Rioja)
properties.address: 1937 Post Rd, Darien, CT 06820, USA
properties.descrption: Leafy, rooty aromas fold in earthy berry scents and chocolate. Mature on the palate, with baked plum, sweet spice and tobacco flavors. Ripe, long and friendly on the finish, with more than adequate structure and tightness. Contains one-third Mazuelo in addition to Tempranillo, which is a lot by Rioja standards. Drink now.
