properties.title: Gaël Martin 2009 Les Fouillouses  (Juliénas)
properties.address: Les Truges, 71570 Saint-Vérand, France
properties.descrption: A structured wine, with some tight black cherry flavors as well as firm tannins. The wine has a mineral edge, the acidity giving a juicy character to the fruit, while the texture is dry, tannic. Age for a year.

properties.title: Il Marroneto 2009 Madonna delle Grazie  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Località Madonna delle Grazie, 307, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This gorgeous Brunello proves that top producers can make outstanding wines even in challenging vintages like 2009. It opens with an elegant bouquet of violet, red berry, spice and a whiff of new leather. The delicious palate delivers fleshy black cherry layered with mint, licorice, balsamic herbs and cinnamon-spice. It's impeccably balanced with firm tannins and fresh acidity that give it an age-worthy structure. Drink 2016–2024.

properties.title: Château Ducru Beaucaillou 2011  Saint-Julien
properties.address: Chateau Ducru-Beaucaillou, 33250 Saint-Julien-Beychevelle, France
properties.descrption: Despite the huge weight of fruit and accompanying structure, this is a stylish wine. It's impressively dense, concentrated and solid. At the same time, the juicy black fruits give a generous, full-in-the-mouth character. Drink this very fine wine from 2022.

properties.title: Lachini 2011 La Cruz Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 14455 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE Suite A, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This Pinot seems to float weightlessly on the palate, yet the flavors sink in instantly and dazzle. Suggestions of raspberries and red cherries come spiced in white pepper and cinnamon, with richer levels of Dr. Pepper cola, mocha and red licorice, all highlighted with the most perfect acidity. It's easy to fall in love with this wine and drink it now, but it can develop interesting complexities through 2020. The winery is Oregon-based and has a good history with Willamette Valley Pinot Noir.

properties.title: Lineage 2010 Red (Livermore Valley)
properties.address: 5443 Tesla Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: This is Steven Kent's fourth vintage of Lineage, his blockbuster Bordeaux red from carefully tended Livermore fruit. Predominantly Cabernet Sauvignon (65%), it includes 16% Cab Franc, 15% Merlot, 3% Petit Verdot and 2% Malbec. Layered in coffee and herbal cassis, and finely structured, it is an elegant, herbal-kissed, slightly coy wine, enjoyable now with a big meal or ready to sleep in bottle until 2024–2029.

properties.title: Syncline 2011 Cuvée Elena Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 111 Balch Rd, Lyle, WA 98635, USA
properties.descrption: With each new vintage of Cuvée Elena, the blend of grapes and vineyards grows more complex, the vines older, the flavors more compact and captivating. A sophisticated and penetrating mix of strawberry and raspberry preserves, highlights of herb and spice, a dash of clean earth, and a lingering and detailed finish make this a wine to savor immediately while tucking away a few bottles to watch it evolve.

properties.title: Château Calon 2011  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: Firm and very structured, it has depth plus some spice from wood aging, along with a dry core that still dominates the fragrant red berry fruits. Don't drink before 2018.

properties.title: Château Cos d'Estournel 2011  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: Cos S, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: Powerful, very rich and very concentrated, this epitomizes the opulent style of Cos d'Estournel. A sense of extraction is overwhelmed by the huge, ripe fruit. It shows velvet texture at first, but then the tannins come on strongly, leaving a wine that will age over many years. Drink from 2022.

properties.title: Château Figeac 2011  Saint-Émilion
properties.address: 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: This is powerful and concentrated, with the high proportion of Cabernet Sauvignon in the blend standing out firmly. It is dark, rich, packed with ripe black fruits and sweet tannins. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Le Crock 2011  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: 1 Rue Paul Amilhat, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: Rich and smooth, this is a ripe wine packed with blackberry fruits and sweet tannins that give a soft, while firm, structure. From the owner of Léoville Poyferré in Saint-Julien, it is sophisticated and elegant. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Guado al Tasso 2010  Bolgheri Superiore
properties.address: Via Bolgherese - Località San Walfredo 184/A km 3,9, 57020 Bolgheri LI, Italy
properties.descrption: Antinori's blend of 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot and 15% Cabernet Franc creates a vibrant, structured wine that shows tension and energy. It opens with aromas of black cherry, black currant, dark spices and leather that carry through to the palate alongside firm but refined tannins and vibrant freshness. It already has nice depth but give it time to develop complexity. Drink 2015–2030.

properties.title: Michele Satta 2010 Piastraia  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: loc vigna al cavaliere, 61, 57022 Castagneto Carducci LI, Italy
properties.descrption: The wine blends Merlot, Syrah, Cabernet and Sangiovese in equal parts. Aromas of cedar, ripe black berries and plum almost jump from the glass. The juicy fruit carries over to the creamy palate together with black cherry, mint and mocha alongside soft, round tannins that give a velvety texture.

properties.title: Château Montrose 2011  Saint-Estèphe
properties.address: 3 Grand Vignolles, 33180 Saint-Estèphe, France
properties.descrption: As so often with Montrose, this is a powerful, concentrated and very structured wine. Dense tannins are paired with rich black fruits, although at this stage the wine also has a sense of austerity. Power, severity and complexity all make for a wine for long aging. Wait until 2019.

properties.title: Grattamacco 2010  Bolgheri Superiore
properties.address: Loc. Lungagnano, 128, 57022 Castagneto Carducci LI, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of 65% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Merlot and 15% Sangiovese, this opens with a beautiful fragrance of violet, iris, exotic incense, cedar and black currants. The plush palate delivers a core of juicy black cherry and red currant accented with black pepper, clove and graphite alongside smooth, velvety tannins. Drink 2015–2025.

properties.title: Prospect 772 2011 Bro Black Tie Charlie Cuvée Syrah-Petite Sirah (California)
properties.address: 772 Appaloosa Rd, Angels Camp, CA 95222, USA
properties.descrption: A perfect balance between Syrah and Petite Sirah from Calaveras County-based Prospect 772 this new offering hits it out of the park in terms of its dark, near-black color and subdued leather saddle and blueberry aromas. With rounded tannins, this is an intense wine with a distinct sense of personality, concentrated, savory, earthy and ready to age until 2019–2029 or decant awhile before settling into your glass.

properties.title: Terra Valentine 2010 Marriage Red (Spring Mountain District)
properties.address: 4007 Spring Mountain Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: The 2010 vintage was a generally good one for the winery. Most of the Cabs were released last year, but they've held this Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot blend back for extra time in the bottle. Yet it's still very tannic, stinging the gums with astringency. Underneath that is a beautiful wine, brimming with fresh blackberries and cassis, and an attractive green-olive note that's sweet and salty and umami-rich. Already throwing some sediment, this is a serious cellar candidate. Don't even think of popping the cork before 2018.

properties.title: Loring Wine Company 2012 Clos Pepe Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 1034 Aviation Dr, Lompoc, CA 93436, USA
properties.descrption: There's a subtle difference between this Pinot and Loring's eight other vineyard-designated 2012 Pinots. But by a hair, this is the best and most compelling, delicious in blackberries, blueberries and cherries. It's hard not to drink the entire bottle now, with its tantalizing acidity and soft but intricate tannins. And yet this gorgeous wine will develop bottle complexity until 2020 or 2021. The vineyard is in the sweet spot of the Santa Rita Hills.

properties.title: Biondi Santi 2007 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, 53024, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Thanks to having some of the highest vineyards in Montalcino, Biondi Santi was able to make a stunning Riserva in the hot and forward 2007 vintage. It opens with aromas of forest floor and dried rose petals. The palate showcases concentrated wild cherry and cinnamon-spice flavors alongside bracing tannins. The wine already boasts impressive depth and structure as well as remarkable freshness for the vintage, but give it time to fully develop. Drink 2017–2037.

properties.title: Chanamé 2011 Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 15401 Sonoma Hwy, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: A tiny-production Pinot by a new producer, it makes a stunning debut. Owners James Hahn and Mila Chanamé are childhood friends with longtime Anderson Valley vineyard manager Norman Kobler and the shared roots have clearly put them in sync. The wine is perfumey in lilac and violet with a lightly textured and seductive mouthfeel that's exotic in just-ripe cherry and raspberry.

properties.title: Château Clerc Milon 2011  Pauillac
properties.address: Lieu-dit, 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: Continuing its impressive development, Clerc Milon 2011 is a serious wine. It is elegant, stylish, its fruits well integrated with red berry and plum skin flavors. Powerful while round and fruity with a fine sense of weight, this wine will develop relatively quickly but will then stay at its peak for many years. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Archery Summit 2004 Estate Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 18599 NE Archery Summit Rd, Dayton, OR 97114, USA
properties.descrption: This is from the vineyard that surrounds the winery, and the bottling receives both Estate and Dundee Hills designations—best of the best. It's a pungent, pleasant wine upon entry, with rather pale strawberry fruit. It quickly moves through the midpalate and turns lean, with tomato leaf and green tea astringency. There is a slight impression of alcoholic heat. Though accessible and interesting, it somehow falls short of what it could/should be, given its provenance and price.

properties.title: Silvan Ridge 2005 Reserve Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 27012 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.descrption: Forward and fruity, this has California-style fruit and sweet, strawberry candy. The difference is that it fills out the middle with some leafy, herbal flavors, nothing too rough, but enough to add some flavor interest. The finish is fat and buttery, showing the influence of oak aging.

properties.title: WillaKenzie Estate 2004 Kiana Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 19143 NE Laughlin Rd, Yamhill, OR 97148, USA
properties.descrption: The Kiana bottling, named for the owners' granddaughter, is made with Dijon clones planted in 1996 and 1997. Initially quite tight and unyielding, it first opens into flavors of leaf, herb and green tea. Tucked neatly into the midpalate is a core of good red strawberry/cherry fruit. The tannins are earthy but not rough; everything here is balanced and well-managed; the alcohol a moderate 14.3%.

properties.title: Groote Post 2004 The Old Man's Blend Red (Coastal Region)
properties.address: 4800, South Africa
properties.descrption: Aromas of mint and white pepper are followed by a blend of red berry, savory spice and smoke. The successful play between juicy fruit and oak makes for a layered and affordable everyday drinking choice.

properties.title: Abacela 2005 Merlot (Southern Oregon)
properties.address: 12500 Lookingglass Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.descrption: Oregon Merlots have darker fruits and streaks of tar and smoke. Tannins are more aggressive, and must be carefully managed. This wine does a pretty good job of softening up the back end while keeping the richness up front. There is plenty of acid, and the nose carries interesting scents of sandalwood and milk chocolate. It's just a bit chalky on the finish.

properties.title: Rocca di Montemassi 2005 Le Focaie  (Maremma)
properties.address: Rocca di Montemassi, Strada Provinciale Pian del Bichi, 58027 Montemassi GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Why reach for a lean, tart Chianti when you could have this varietally correct but friendlier Sangiovese? Aged half in stainless steel and half in large Slavonian oak casks, this wine's black cherry and plum fruit flavors are carried by soft tannins, but still show hints of tobacco leaf on the finish.

properties.title: Tenuta Oliveto 2005 Il Leccio Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Via di Monte Olivo, 6, 50051 Castelfiorentino FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a delightfully voluptuous and chewy Sangiovese from Montalcino in southern Tuscany that offers lavish layers of succulent cherry, plum, spice and natural rubber. Thick, ripe fruit aromas are elaborated by 15 months of oak aging that adds background dimension and renderings of vanilla, cinnamon and toasted almond. It's a soft, velvety wine with plush consistency and drying tannins that would pair beautifully with tender venison medallions, wild mushroom risotto or meat ragout.

properties.title: Gypsy Dancer 2005 Broadley Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 9107, 143 E Main St, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: A tart, cranberry- and raspberry-flavored wine, this young, high-acid style of Pinot has a charming, Burgundian feeling to it. The snappy red fruits are underscored with citrus, and the balance is disarmingly light, but not simple or dull.

properties.title: Gypsy Dancer 2005 Gary & Christine's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 9107, 143 E Main St, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: Aromatic with soda pop scents of Dr. Pepper, cola and root beer, this is nonetheless a reasonably substantial wine, not a simple fruit bomb. It's lively and full of interesting flavors that suggest herb, root and spice; the wood remains a background flavor.

properties.title: Château Bianca 2005 Cellar Select Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 17485 OR-22, Dallas, OR 97338, USA
properties.descrption: This brings a lot of flavor to the table for its relatively modest price. Round and spicy, it leads with juicy strawberry, cherry and apple pie fruit flavors. Hints of cinnamon wind through the finish, and overall the impression is of a pretty, lively and slightly sweet wine without pretense.

properties.title: Coelho 2005 Paciência Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 111 5th St, Amity, OR 97101, USA
properties.descrption: Assertive and spicy, this interesting bottling, from Amity vineyard estate grapes, shows that even at just 13% alcohol Oregon Pinot can cut it. Made in a distinctive style that is clearly neither California nor Burgundy, this herbal, intense, wine puts the focus on the aromas, a beguiling mix of pine and herb. But the fruit is there right behind, tart and sassy, with cola and root beer notes sliding into a well-modulated but tannic finish.

properties.title: Lemelson 2005 Thea's Selection Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 12020 NE Stag Hollow Rd, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: Thea's Selection book-ends the single-vineyard wines and is the winery's lower-priced, multi-vineyard blend. As with the Jerome, the flavors are more complex and woven than in the single-vineyard bottlings; with cherry and berry fruit, fresh herb and streaks of bitter chocolate. It's a complete, supple wine, with no holes, moderately ripe fruit, and just a hint of heat in the finish.

properties.title: Undurraga 2008 Altazor Red (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Cam. a Melipilla 34, Talagante, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Fiery on first blush, this then displays aromas of plum, leather, tobacco and cheesy oak. It feels fresh and not the least bit fat or flabby, with cassis, raspberry, olive, cocoa and mint flavors. The finish is composed, dry and lightly herbal. A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Carmenère, Syrah and Carignan.

properties.title: Cascina Morassino 2009 Ovello  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Strada Bernino, 10, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Ovello is one of the most elegant vineyard crus in Barbaresco. This savory expression opens with a drying aromas of crushed mineral, graham cracker and toasted almond. The palate is ripe and succulent with a cherry flavor.

properties.title: Château Bellegrave du Poujeau 2009  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 433 Chem. Duthil, 33290 Le Pian-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: This is a well structured, rich wine. It has solid, ripe red-berry and black-currant fruits that dominate the firmer tannins, giving a juicy, generous feel. Well worth aging for 3–5 years.

properties.title: Clos du Val 2009 Cabernet Franc (Stags Leap District)
properties.address: 5330 Silverado Trail, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This is very tannic yet very elegant. With a dry, astringent mouthfeel, it has a powerful heart of red and black cherries. Aging this wine is a bit of a gamble, but trying cellaring it until 2015. Otherwise, drink it with foods that are compatible with astringent, dry red wines.

properties.title: Eberle 2008 Wine-Bush Vineyard 60% Steinbeck Vineyard 40% Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 3810 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: A spice note marks this lusty, briary Zinfandel. It tingles with touches of clove, anise, cinnamon, white pepper and nutmeg. It's also warm, but that heat merges with the spices to give it a stimulating mouthfeel. With bright cherry fruit and a jacket of cedar, it's a fine Zin—one of Eberle's best in years.

properties.title: Firestone 2009 Cabernet Franc (Santa Ynez Valley)
properties.address: 5017 Zaca Station Rd, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: A beautiful Cabernet Franc, dry, soft and supple, with a silky texture that glides across the palate with such smoothness. It conveys pleasantly complex flavors of red cherry essence, with hints of nutmeg, anise and sweet sandalwood. Not an ager, but a fine wine to drink now—especially with steak.

properties.title: Anthony Nappa 2011 Anomaly Pinot Noir (New York)
properties.address: 2885 Peconic Ln, Peconic, NY 11958, USA
properties.descrption: Winemaker Anthony Nappa describes Anomaly as a Pinot Noir vinified like a white wine. Bone dry, with understated black-cherry flavor, it's bracing with acidity and an intensely chalky, minerally palate. It's refreshingly quaffable, yet lingers long, sip after sip.

properties.title: Beni di Batasiolo 2009  Barbaresco
properties.address: 10241 Sawmill Pkwy, Powell, OH 43065, USA
properties.descrption: A bright Barbaresco—this opens with a fresh, floral quality that recalls blue flower and pressed rose. Beyond those aromas are layers of almond skin, ginger, cola and hazelnut. It's an elegant and fine expression that needs five more years of cellar aging.

properties.title: Borgogno F.lli Serio e Battista 2008 Cannubi  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Crosia, 12, 12060 Barolo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with aromas of sweet cherry liqueur, toasted espresso bean, bright forest fruit, cola and dried herb. It's fresh and light on the finish thanks to the fine and elegant tannins.

properties.title: Bruliam 2010 Deer Meadows Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 1200 American Way, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: There's a simple directness to this wine. But, the flavors are delicious, consisting of ripe cherries and pomegranates, with a seemingly fruity sweetness that belies the dry finish. There's also plenty of tart acidity and tannins. All of the parts, including the oak, haven't come together, so give it a 3–4 years in the cellar.

properties.title: Castello di Neive 2009 Santo Stefano  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Corso Romano Scagliola, 205, 12052 Neive CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Barbaresco Santo Stefano is a linear and silky expression of Nebbiolo, with pretty aromas of dried raspberry and smoke. It shows elegance and a bright, lively finish.

properties.title: Channing Daughters 2010 Mudd West Vineyard Blaufränkisch (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 1927 Scuttle Hole Rd, Bridgehampton, NY 11932, USA
properties.descrption: Initial whiffs of smoke and green leaves blow off to reveal intense flower and white-pepper notes. Densely concentrated with blackberry and boysenberry flavors, this Long Island Blaufränkisch (with 25% Dornfelder) is taut and crisp with acidity and crushed-stone minerality. A fresh herb note and a hint of bay leaf lend a savory tone to the finish. Delicious.

properties.title: Château Béhèré Courtin 2006  Pauillac
properties.address: Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: This small Pauillac property, close to Château Pontet-Canet, has produced an impressive 2006, structured with firm tannins under the black currant fruit.

properties.title: Château du Glana 2009 Terre du Lion  (Saint-Julien)
properties.address: 5 Le Glana, 33250 Saint-Julien-Beychevelle, France
properties.descrption: Densely tannic and rich, this is full of ripe chocolate and blackberry fruit. It is dark, brooding and dense—a great success for the second wine of Château du Glana.

properties.title: Château Lanbersac 2009  Puisseguin Saint-Émilion
properties.address: 10, 33570 Puisseguin, France
properties.descrption: This is a firm yet ripe wine that boasts ripe black-plum flavors layered with dense and dusty tannins. The wine is concentrated, with wood aging filling out the structure. It is big and bold, finishing with great ripe fruit.

properties.title: Benegas 2009 Don Tiburcio Red (Mendoza)
properties.address: Aráoz 1600, M5507 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: A ripe specimen with baked, earthy aromas that settle with airing. Hits with power and layering along with medicinal, oaky flavors that foist chocolate onto the wine's core black-fruit content. Generous despite some ruggedness and heat to the finish. Malbec with Cab Franc, Cab Sauvignon, Petit Verdot and Merlot.

properties.title: Bressia 2007 Conjuro Red (Mendoza)
properties.address: 7725,, Cochabamba, Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Dry and balsamic on the bouquet, with earthy, mellow berry aromas that do not push. In the mouth, it comes across charred and roasted, with baked, chocolaty, leafy accents on top of core red fruit flavors. Turns more leafy and charred as it unfolds, with a forward finish. Malbec with Cab Sauvignon and Merlot.

properties.title: Château Saint-Sernin 2008 Prestige Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: LES LANDES, 46140 Parnac, France
properties.descrption: A big and bold wine, showing black plum fruits, an impressive structure and a solid, foursquare feel. It is obviously a wine for aging. Give it 2–3 years.

properties.title: Robertson Winery 2007 Wolfkloof Shiraz (Robertson)
properties.address: 1501 S Tamiami Trail #501, Venice, FL 34285, USA
properties.descrption: Balancing foliage notes of sous bois, eucalyptus and purple florals mingle perfectly with the ripe blackberry and cherry flavors. Full and creamy with medium acidity and fine tannins. A touch of black pepper and roasted espresso graces the long finish.

properties.title: Siduri 2010 Sierra Mar Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 235 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Tart and tutti-fruity-sweet in raspberries, cherries and cola, and spiced with cinnamon, clove, nutmeg and white pepper that give it a savory edge. Gets credit for sheer ripeness, yet missing a certain depth and complexity. Drink now–2014.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2009 Hannah Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.descrption: This vineyard is relatively far north, hence lighter fruit with flavors of sweet tomato and fresh herb. Well balanced and tannic, it brings a pretty, resonantly toasty ring to the finish.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2009 South Block Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.descrption: Tart cranberry/raspberry flavors, found in many of these young Willamette Valley Vineyards Pinots, rule the palate here as well. Relatively high acidity and a restrained barrel regimen keep the oak flavors in check, but the tannins carry more than enough weight and grip for overall balance.

properties.title: Zuccardi 2010 Emma Bonarda (Mendoza)
properties.address: Costa Canal Uco s/n - Paraje Altamira, San Carlos, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: This small-lot Bonarda is one of Argentina's bright examples of the variety. It's ripe but brushy smelling, with chocolate and vanilla aromas blending with blackberry and herbs. Feels super fresh and juicy, with boysenberry, blackberry and chocolaty flavors. Very good overall.

properties.title: Patz & Hall 2009 Hyde Vineyard Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 917 Business 141 N, Pound, WI 54161, USA
properties.descrption: A big Pinot Noir, rich and extracted, and lacking delicacy at this time. It's as full-bodied as a Rhône blend, with jammy cherry, blueberry and spice flavors, enriched by lots of sweet new oak. Delicious, yes, if you care to drink it now. Try cellaring for four or five years to see if it mellows.

properties.title: Vignobles 46N118 2007 Noir 46 Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: 2501 Magladry Rd, Navan, ON K4B 0H3, Canada
properties.descrption: Tannic yet balanced wine with a great swathe of perfumed fruit as well as dense black flavors. There is a herbal character as well as dark plum and sweet fruit flavors. Age for 2–3 years, the wine will always be firm.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2009 Estate Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8800 Enchanted Way SE, Turner, OR 97392, USA
properties.descrption: Young, tart and wrapped up tight as a drum, this offers sharp flavors of cranberry and a bit of Campari. It has the heft and polish to open up further with some additional bottle age, but it isn't budging at the moment.

properties.title: Esterlina 2009 Reserva Pinot Noir (Cole Ranch)
properties.descrption: Esterlina's Pinot is very perfumey, light in body and soul at first, as it gathers steam with a tasty backbone of lush red fruit, spice and plenty of staying power over a meal.

properties.title: Goats do Roam Wine Co. 2008 Goat-Roti Syrah-Viognier (Coastal Region)
properties.address: 4038 Broadway, New York, NY 10032, USA
properties.descrption: A good value, this is an easy-pleasing Syrah with vibrant notes of red plum, cherry and blueberry. Fine, dusty tannins reminiscent of cocoa powder and dried crushed berries stay after swallow alongside a hint of sweet smoke flavor.

properties.title: Graham Beck 2007 The William Red (Coastal Region)
properties.address: Scenic Cape Route R60, Robertson, 7600, South Africa
properties.descrption: This approachable Cabernet-based blend, which also has 18% Pinotage, 11% Cab Franc and 2% Shiraz, is a spicy and balanced red with notes of menthol, purple florals, black cherry and berry. With a mouthfeel like crushed velvet, a black pepper finish and an attractive price tag, it's a shame only 100 cases were produced.

properties.title: Domaine Chiroulet 2015 Java by Chiroulet Red (Côtes de Gascogne)
properties.address: A Chiroulet, 32100 Larroque-sur-l'Osse, France
properties.descrption: The wine is full of stalky black currant fruits and fresh acidity. A blend of Bordeaux-style grapes with Syrah, it is made to be drunk young and slightly chilled for the summer. Drink now.

properties.title: Stomennano 2010  Chianti Classico
properties.address: Localita Stomennano, 53035 Monteriggioni SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas that suggest cellar floor, scorched earth, worn leather and weedy underbrush lead the nose. The evolved, diluted palate offers raisin, prune, coffee and a green note of powdered sage alongside dusty, fleeting tannins that lead to an abrupt, astringent finish.

properties.title: Herdade da Capela 2013 Monte de Capela Red (Alentejo)
properties.address: Rua João Tiago Coelho, S/N Pias Srp, 7830-212 Pias, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is so rustic that it has lost its fruit. What you do find are tannins, some acidity and a soft texture.

properties.title: Thorn Clarke 2013 Terra Barossa Shiraz-Cabernet-Petit Verdot Red (Barossa)
properties.address: Thorn-Clarke Wines, Gawler Park Rd, Angaston SA 5353, Australia
properties.descrption: Despite being priced as an entry-level blend, this doesn't show much in the way of forward fruit. Instead, it's grippy and tough, with a veneer of dry, woody tannins over flavors of vanilla, cedar and cinnamon.

properties.title: Benessere 2013 Black Glass Estate Vineyard Zinfandel (St. Helena)
properties.address: 1010 Big Tree Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Dark red in color, though fraying, like an older wine, this lacks in aroma. Otherwise it's a straightforward expression of blackberry, tar and leather.

properties.title: Casale dello Sparviero 2012 Ada Andrighetti Gran Selezione  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Casale, 93, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of Sangiovese and 10% Pugnitello, this has rustic aromas of game, overripe black-skinned fruit and barnyard. The funky aromas carry over to the palate but the fruit has dried up. Grainy, almost gritty tannins leave a raspy finish.

properties.title: Mancura 2012 Reserva Guardián Carignan (Maule Valley)
properties.address: 2410 Land O' Lakes Blvd, Land O' Lakes, FL 34639, USA
properties.descrption: A hard, grinding scent of road tar is out front on a mostly fruitless nose. This feels choppy and in search of balance. Gritty, herbaceous plum flavors finish with only modest fruit notes.

properties.title: Crespi Ranch 2013 Mission Series Pinot Noir (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 1 Kirkland Ranch Rd, American Canyon, CA 94503, USA
properties.descrption: Almost nonexistent in aromas, this has some light red berries that emerge with persistence. The palate is thin and watery, though clean and unflawed, with touches of root beer, cranberry and black cardamom. There's not a lot of action.

properties.title: Vidigal 2013 Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: QUINTA DA BATARRA, Estr. da Ribeira 230, 2410-502 Cortes, Portugal
properties.descrption: A rustic wine with barnyard aromas and some firm tannins. Beneath this surface there are red fruits and acidity. This is a wine to be drunk young.

properties.title: Enate 2014 Rosado (Somontano)
properties.address: Avda.de Las Artes, 1, 22314 Salas Bajas, Huesca, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas are mulchy and lacking in freshness. This is mostly flat and lifeless, with candied as well as bitter cherry and red-apple-skin flavors. Residual sugar combined with bitterness push the finish on this marginal rosé of Cabernet Sauvignon.

properties.title: Francis Ford Coppola 2012 Pitagora Red (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 300 Via Archimedes, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: A mad scientist's blend of 32% Syrah, with smaller amounts of Petit Verdot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, Petite Sirah and “other,” this wine is rustic, with a thin palate and not much in the way of fruit.

properties.title: Pope Valley Winery 2012 Tre Uve Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6613 Pope Valley Rd, Pope Valley, CA 94567, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is made from 75% Sangiovese with 18.5% Cabernet Sauvignon and 6.5% Merlot. A little pruney, it falls flat and veers hot on the palate, full bodied and quite ripe. Dashes of cinnamon stick brighten the experience.

properties.title: Château La Tour Figeac 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 3 La Tour Figeac, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. A complex and very successful wine, this shows rich tannins, dark fruits, a powerful texture of ripe blackberry fruits and spiced acidity. It will shine with some serious aging.

properties.title: Château Ausone 2012 La Chapelle d'Ausone Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Chateau Ausone, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. The second wine of Château Ausone shows its 60% Cabernet Franc to great effect. It's perfumed and mineral, but with a dark intensity and acidity. A fine wine with a good future.

properties.title: Château Beau-Séjour Bécot 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: La Carte, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. This is a finely balanced wine that's ripe and structured at the same time. It has richness and spice, with a powerful context of wood, juicy blackberry fruits and delicious acidity. With such concentration, this is a wine with excellent ageing potential.

properties.title: Château Beausejour-Duffau-Lagarrosse 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. This is a powerful wine with solid fruits and structure. The palate is full of beautifully ripe fruit—packed with rich and juicy blackberries. It shows how the potential of this property is being realized.

properties.title: Château Certan de May de Certan 2012 Barrel Sample  (Pomerol)
properties.winery: Château Certan de May de Certan
properties.address: Château Certan, 26 Rte de Saint-Jacques-de -Compostelle, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. This is a very firm and concentrated wine with dark and smoky character. The palate is elegant and fine, but densely structured with dark tannins that give extra complexity.

properties.title: Château Pavie Macquin 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 1 Peygenestau, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. Full bodied and ripe, this wine is marked by smoky character, spiciness and full-throttle tannins. Blackberry fruits on the palate complement this serious structure. Obviously a long-term wine.

properties.title: Le Dôme 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 339 E Main St, Belmond, IA 50421, USA
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. Lavish with chocolate, coffee aromas, this is a finely perfumed wine. The palate is packed with ripe fruits and generous tannins that yield a deliciously rich mouth feel. Spicy, wood laden and opulent.

properties.title: Clos Fourtet 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 1 Le Châtelet-Sud, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. Powerful and concentrated, this is a firmly textured wine with a dark, solid, dense character. The palate balances fine acidity and fruit with a dark, brooding structure.

properties.title: Château le Gay 2012 Barrel Sample  (Pomerol)
properties.address: 11 Chem. de Chantecaille, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: 93–95. Barrel sample. An exemplary wine, this is powerful, rich and full of ripe red fruits. The palate is dark, but brightened by acidity, red fruits and a beautiful line of freshness.

properties.title: Château Fombrauge 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Château Petit Fombrauge Lieu-dit Fombrauge, 33330 Saint-Christophe-des-Bardes, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. Very dense and rich with fine, tarry tannins that float amidst the ripe blackberry flavors. The wine is structured but full in body with a rich, opulent feel.

properties.title: Château Pavie Decesse 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Pavie-Nord, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. The diminutive neighbor of Château Pavie, Pavie Decesse's wine has its own, more mineral, tight character. It is complex but fruity, with blackberries supported by wood, acidity and dense texture.

properties.title: Château Beauregard 2012 Barrel Sample  (Pomerol)
properties.address: 73 Rue de Catusseau, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. Solid, firm and tannic, this is a powerful success. It has equal weight of fruit and tannins and a palate that's intensely structured and complex. For long-term aging.

properties.title: Château Villemaurine 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 23 Villemaurine-Sud, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. Black currant flavors resound on this juicy, deliciously fresh wine. It's a structured wine with a core of dry tannins and a palate that's firm and concentrated to the finish.

properties.title: Château Figeac 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. This wine has weight and tannins that offer good structure, but it's the ripe, rich fruit that dominates. It's powerful and complex, and likely to age well.

properties.title: Château Grand Corbin-Despagne 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. This concentrated wine is packed with new wood as well as dark chocolate flavors. The palate is dense with bitter, extracted coffee flavors, but balanced by lively, lingering acidity.

properties.title: Les Astéries 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 1240 Duhig Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. Tight, firm and mineral in style, this wine is dark with expressive tannins cast over black fruits. As always, the wine is a complex expression of its fine terroir.

properties.title: Château Canon 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: lieu dit Saint Martin, Route Du Milieu, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. This dense, extracted wine has dark coffee and bitter chocolate flavors that are followed by wood and tannins. The fruit is still obscured, and may need many years for its dark character to emerge.

properties.title: Château Faugères 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Château Faugères, 33330 Saint-Étienne-de-Lisse, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. This is a fruity wine, dominated by delicious black currant flavors. It has a firm background of fine, complex tannins and a fragrant, lingering aftertaste.

properties.title: Château Larcis Ducasse 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 1 grottes d'Arsis, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. Newly promoted to Premier Grand Cru Classé in 2012, this is a fine, concentrated wine, showing great style. It has weight and a delicious juiciness that is sustained by firm, dry tannins. Already a beautiful wine.

properties.title: Château Monbousquet 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 42 Av. de Saint-Emilion, 33330 Saint-Sulpice-de-Faleyrens, France
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. The only Grand Cru Classé on the sandy plain of Saint-Emilion, Monbousquet is producing great wines thanks to huge investments by owner Gerard Perse. This Merlot-dominated blend is ripe, spicy, rich and open.

properties.title: Château Providence 2012 Barrel Sample  (Pomerol)
properties.address: 2290 S French Rd, Lake Leelanau, MI 49653, USA
properties.descrption: 92–94. Barrel sample. This is a ripe and smoky wine with lively acidity. It also has dense black fruits and a firmly tannic character that demands aging. Solid in texture, it's touched by notes of licorice with a bitter edge.

properties.title: Château Valandraud 2012 Virginie de Valandraud Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 33330 Saint-Étienne-de-Lisse, France
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. The second wine of Château Valandraud is richly powered by spice from new wood and delicate acidity. It's smooth—showing opulent tannins—and attractive freshness.

properties.title: Château Dassault 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 1 Couprie, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. This solid wine is dark with tannins and a dense, extracted texture. The palate is weighty with an intensely dry core and a serious, mineral character. For long-term aging.

properties.title: Château Fonroque 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: Fonroque, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. Owner Alain Moueix is a standard bearer for biodynamics in Bordeaux. This is a rich and opulent wine, boasting ripe black currants and fragrant fruits. A very pure and forward wine.

properties.title: Château la Pointe 2012 Barrel Sample  (Pomerol)
properties.address: 18 Chem. de Gardelle, 33500 Libourne, France
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. Firm tannins guard the ripe blackberry flavors on this rich wine. Spice and sweet tannins add to the intensity.

properties.title: Château Nenin 2012 Barrel Sample  (Pomerol)
properties.address: Château Nenin, 66 Rte de Montagne, 33500 Libourne, France
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. This is a solid wine showing chunky richness that chimes with the black fruit of the vintage. It's full and ripe, but still shines with fresh fruit character.

properties.title: Château Petit-Village 2012 Barrel Sample  (Pomerol)
properties.address: Château Petit-Village, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. A ripe and fruity wine, this exhibits an well-structured balance of acidity and sweet tannins. It has weight, richness, and a fine fruitiness.

properties.title: Château Quinault L'Enclos 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. Surrounded by the city of Libourne, Quinault l'Enclos has produced a Merlot-dominated wine that's ripe and soft on the palate. There's a good sense of structure, balancing fresh black-currant flavors with delicious acidity.

properties.title: Le Carré 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 13920 NY-54, Hammondsport, NY 14840, USA
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. A fine, dense, opulent wine with a great sense of structure. It's dark and solid with tannins that are dense, dusty and brooding. It's likely to age well.

properties.title: Le Petit Cheval 2012 Barrel Sample  (Saint-Émilion)
properties.address: 1 Cheval Blanc, 33330 Saint-Émilion, France
properties.descrption: 91–93. Barrel sample. The second wine of Cheval Blanc is surprisingly soft and ripe—full of blackberry fruits—with delicious acidity and a lingering black-currant aftertaste.

properties.title: Zagan's Fire 2012 Pinot Noir (Lodi)
properties.descrption: There is not much in the way of fruit in this wine, which veers into questionable flavors of burnt mushrooms.

properties.title: Peltier 2012 Hybrid Pinot Noir (Lodi)
properties.address: 22150 N Kennefick Rd, Acampo, CA 95220, USA
properties.descrption: This basic, inexpensive Pinot has Syrah and Viognier blended, but overall the wine is fairly generic, with a streak of smokiness in the background.

properties.title: Russian Ridge 2011 Merlot (Santa Clara Valley)
properties.address: 919 Washington St, San Carlos, CA 94070, USA
properties.descrption: Hard tannins, cutting acidity and a lack of richness conspire to make this bone dry Merlot austere. It has thinned-down flavors of cherries and red currants.

properties.title: Herdade do Rocim 2011 Bojador Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Estrada Nacional 387, 7940-909 Cuba, Portugal
properties.descrption: An earthy, ripe and fruity wine, it has a solid base of tannins and a rough-edged structure. The black fruits are submerged in the more rustic nature of the wine's aftertaste.

properties.title: Masterpiece 2012 Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 14558 Ellsworth Rd, Berlin Center, OH 44401, USA
properties.descrption: With sugary blackberry and prune flavors, this tannic Zinfandel is pretty simple. It will pair well with burgers, tacos and barbecue.

properties.title: Peltier 2010 Peltier Station Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 22150 N Kennefick Rd, Acampo, CA 95220, USA
properties.descrption: This Zin tastes of smoke, oak and grilled meats, but has an odd acidity to it. It would be good paired with something off the barbecue.

properties.title: Castle Rock 2011 Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 75 Malaga Cove Plaza #7, Palos Verdes Estates, CA 90274, USA
properties.descrption: This wine opens with a stemmy aromas and remains basic in the glass, with a sweet ending.

properties.title: Big House 2012 Red (California)
properties.address: 6800 Greenville Rd, Livermore, CA 94550, USA
properties.descrption: An uninteresting wine despite good dryness and acidity. The blackberry and cherry flavors are thin, and have vegetal notes. The blend is Grenache Noir, Syrah and Zinfandel.

properties.title: Château Latour 2011  Pauillac
properties.address: 27 Rte des Châteaux, 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: Big tannins and impressive fruits are the hallmarks of this impressive wine. It is also subtle, not showing all its flavors at once, hiding beneath tannins and structure. For this fruity vintage, it shows a strong sense of direct, solid structure, only allowing the strong black plum and berry flavors to come through slowly. It is for the long haul, so don't drink before 2022, even better later.

properties.title: Masseto 2010 Merlot (Toscana)
properties.address: Masseto, Metropolitan City of Florence, Italy
properties.descrption: The phenomenal 2010 vintage shows why this wine is considered Italy's top purebred Merlot. Revealing structure, finesse and mesmerizing depth, it delivers blackberries, currants, cedar, exotic spices and mocha alongside firm, polished tannins and fresh acidity. It's well balanced with fantastic length and while it's delicious now, hold for more complexity. Drink 2015–2030.

properties.title: Tenuta San Guido 2010 Sassicaia  (Bolgheri Sassicaia)
properties.address: Località Capanne, 27, 57022 Bolgheri LI, Italy
properties.descrption: This supremely elegant and age-worthy Sassicaia opens with an intense bouquet of black cherry, Mediterranean herbs, blue flower, cedar and leather aromas. Powerful but graceful, the palate delivers a vibrant core of black cherry accented with white pepper, mineral and balsamic notes alongside youthful but polished tannins and vibrant acidity. It's not as exuberant as some of its counterparts, but it may outlive all the other Bolgheri 2010s. Drink 2018–2040.

properties.title: Ornellaia 2010  Bolgheri Superiore
properties.address: Località Ornellaia, 191, 57022 Bolgheri LI, Italy
properties.descrption: The 2010 Ornellaia celebrates the wine's 25th anniversary, and it could not have been a more spectacular vintage. It opens with aromas of crushed blue flowers, black berries, pipe tobacco and thyme that give way to an elegant, structured and polished palate. It delivers intense blackberry flavors layered with white pepper, Mediterranean herbs, mineral and mocha brightened by fresh acidity alongside smooth, velvety tannins. This will age and develop for decades. Drink 2016–2040.

properties.title: Le Macchiole 2010 Paleo Rosso Cabernet Franc (Toscana)
properties.address: S.P Bolgherese, 189/A, 57022 Bolgheri LI, Italy
properties.descrption: This extraordinary wine put Cabernet Franc on the map in Bolgheri. The 2010 reveals an exquisite bouquet of black currants, crushed blue flower, leather and baking spices. The smooth palate delivers mouthwatering blackberries, black cherry, white pepper, thyme and licorice alongside an age-worthy structure boasting firm but elegant tannins and fresh acidity. It's already gorgeous with intriguing depth but it will age and develop beautifully. Drink 2015–2040.

properties.title: Château Léoville Barton 2011  Saint-Julien
properties.address: France, Saint-Julien-Beychevelle, Chateau Langoa Barton
properties.descrption: Great swathes of fruit cross the tannic core in this impressive wine. Hints of wood aging peek out from beneath the sumptuous richness and spice. It is ripe, dense and obviously set for long aging. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Sineann 2012 Yates Conwill Vineyard Pinot Noir
properties.address: 8400 Champoeg Rd NE, St Paul, OR 97137, USA
properties.descrption: Yates Conwill is next to the Resonance vineyard, which was just sold to Burgundy's Louis Jadot. This vineyard is really reaching its prime, showing lovely ripe flavors of raspberry, red plum and sweet cherry. Generous acidity keeps the wine in proportion and leads through a generous midpalate with highlights of black tea and dried herb. Drink now and over the next 10 years.

properties.title: Château Lynch-Bages 2011  Pauillac
properties.address: 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: This is a luxurious wine that's opulently rich. Ripe black fruits dominate, lending fullness to the firm structure in the backdrop. It's a wine with great potential, density and weight. Touches of chocolate and licorice combine with flavors of dark plum, toast and spice. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Milziade Antano 2009  Sagrantino di Montefalco
properties.address: Via Colle Allodola, 06031 Bevagna PG, Italy
properties.descrption: From one of the longest established producers in Montefalco, this gorgeous wine shows the real potential of Sagrantino. It has an alluring fragrance of rose, violet, berry, spice and leather while the palate delivers lush black cherry, blackberry, licorice and white pepper. It has powerful but ripe tannins alongside vibrant acidity, and will develop beautifully. Drink 2015–2029.

properties.title: Shea 2010 Block 33 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 12321 NE Hwy 240, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: Here's a rich, full-bodied wine that rolls from the first floral sniff into a wellspring of deep, briary, berry-cherry fruit. Peppery spices and dried Mediterranean herbs meld on an endlessly fascinating finish that promises decades of development ahead.

properties.title: Tenuta Castelbuono 2007  Sagrantino di Montefalco
properties.address: Vocabolo Castellaccio, 9, 06031 Bevagna PG, Italy
properties.descrption: This stunning offering is aged in large casks that soften the wine but don't add wood tannins to Sagrantino's naturally tannic backbone. It opens with an intensely balsamic fragrance of Mediterranean herbs, mint and berry accompanied by delicious blackberry, white pepper and cinnamon flavors. The wine boasts fantastic depth and will develop even more complexity over time. Drink 2017–2027.

properties.title: Penfolds 2008 St. Henri Shiraz (South Australia)
properties.address: 839 NE 3rd Ave, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33304, USA
properties.descrption: Like virtually all of Penfolds' top-end reds, this is full bodied and densely concentrated. As it's aged solely in large vats, there's no oak influence and the wine needs a bit of bottle age to come around. For now, it's a bit monolithic, showing hints of mint, black olive and ripe raspberries before ending long and fine. Drink 2017–2030, and perhaps beyond.

properties.title: Viña Cobos 2011 Bramare Marchiori Vineyard Malbec (Perdriel)
properties.address: Costa Flores s/n y, RN7, M5509 Perdriel, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Among Cobos's high-end 2011 Malbecs, this one comes across as the most complete, layered and complex of the group. Aromas of fine oak and pencil lead augment blackberry and baked plum scents. The mouthfeel is smooth, round and rich, while flavors of tea, savory spices and black fruits dance long into the night. A ripe but not too heavy finish is earthy, calm and complete. Drink through 2019.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2011 Bacigalupi Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This is a medium-bodied Zinfandel, with elegant weight and mouthfeel. The flavors are classic—wild raspberries and cherries, cola, cocoa and exotic spices. This is surely one of the best Zinfandels of the vintage.

properties.title: Casa al Vento 2013 Aria  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Loc. Casa Al Vento, 53013 Gaiole in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This pure expression of Sangiovese offers classic varietal aromas of red berry, plum, violet and a whiff of dark cooking spice. The vibrant palate offers juicy black cherry, ripe raspberry, white pepper, anise and a hint of tobacco. Bright acidity and polished tannins provide the framework. Enjoy 2016–2020.

properties.title: Corvus 2011 Syrah-Petite Sirah (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 760 C St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Made with 57% Syrah and 43% Petit Sirah, this aromatic brooder offers aromas of cherry, dried herbs, baking spices and freshly tilled soil. The flavors are full bodied, rich, layered and tightly coiled, needing extended time in the cellar or a day-long decant to show their best. Drink after 2021.

properties.title: Doyenne 2012 Grand Ciel Grand Ciel Vineyard Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St Suite 101, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This intriguing wine brings aromas of cumin, mineral, dry chocolate, barrel spice and dark fruit. It delivers a mouthful of seamless fruit flavors that coat the palate from end to end.

properties.title: Escarpment 2013 Te Rehua Single Vineyard Pinot Noir (Martinborough)
properties.address: Escarpment Cellar Door Peppers Parehua, New York Street West, Martinborough 5711, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Veteran winemaker Larry McKenna says Te Rehua consistently shows the most ripeness of his various single-vineyard wines. In this vintage, that comes across as a slightly jammy midpalate filled with plums and blackberries. Upfront, there's a floral element, and on the finish, some dusty tannins. Try it once 2016 rolls around, and drink it through 2025.

properties.title: Reininger 2012 Malbec (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 5858 Old Hwy 12, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: There's a mixture of fruit and barrel on this wine with dark fruit aromas melding with cocoa, clove and spice. Sweet and concentrated flavors coat the palate, with a light squeeze of tannins backing it up.

properties.title: Reynvaan Family Vineyards 2012 The Unnamed Estate Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 6309 Cottonwood Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The color is light and the black and green olive, smoked meat and savory aromas are reserved. However, there's an elegant yet rich, captivating feel to the savory flavors that make this wine hard to resist.

properties.title: Romeo 2012  Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
properties.address: 1224 Lincoln Ave, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: Tilled soil, iris, violet, black plum and tobacco aromas come together on this classically crafted blend of Sangiovese, Colorino and Mammolo. The structured, balanced palate delivers black cherry, licorice, ground pepper, leather and grilled herb alongside youthfully austere tannins. It's still tightly knit so give it time to fully develop and bloom. Drink 2017–2027.

properties.title: Sparkman 2013 Wonderland Grenache (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 14300 NE 145th St #102, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of tobacco, dried herbs and strawberry are followed by focused, creamy-feeling raspberry and cranberry flavors. It shows a real sense of purity but the mouthfeel is where it truly shines.

properties.title: Stevens 2012 Stevens Timley Malbec (Yakima Valley)
properties.address: 18520 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: It's unusual to see a Washington wine from this vintage at this listed alcohol level but there's no question about the ripeness. It's all Dineen Vineyard fruit coming from the oldest block at the vineyard, with aromas of leafy herbs and sweet plums. There's a pleasingly supple feel to the polished dark fruit flavors that linger effortlessly.

properties.title: Storm 2013 John Sebastiano Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 2948 San Marcos Ave APT 101, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: South African winemaker Ernst Storm is one to watch. This bottling offers a smoky, black raspberry nose, with hints of brown mustard and beef char. There's tremendous energy on the palate, though it's rather light in body, with flavors of anise, black rocks approaching asphalt, and dark but not overly ripe plums. Solid tannins ensure more interesting drinking 2017–2025.

properties.title: Vatan 2012  Toro
properties.address: 7110 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Dense, dark, smoky, oaky aromas come with welcome nuances of licorice and graphite along with bold blackberry scents. This feels flush, layered and strong. Flavors of baking spices, blackberry, chocolate and char finish peppery, toasty, tannic and with plenty of black-fruit power. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Woodward Canyon 2012 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 11920 US-12, Lowden, WA 99360, USA
properties.descrption: This wine is all Merlot coming from equal parts Weinbau and Woodward Canyon Estate vineyards. It charms with aromas of café au lait, cherry, spice and earth. The chocolate and cherry flavors are rich and full bodied with a firm handshake of tannins. It's drinking young now, with the oak up front. Give it plenty of time to open up.

properties.title: Baxter 2012 Black Label Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
properties.address: 8660 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: A traditional and relatively light garnet color is the first sign that this is not a blatantly commercial wine. Savory, almost meaty, and cranberry-like aromas confirm the impression. Take a good sip and more crisp fruits like raspberries and red cherries emerge along with hints of cinnamon and clove for complexity. While medium bodied, it's vibrant in texture and elegantly balanced. It should improve through 2022.

properties.title: Brecon Estate 2013 Mourvèdre (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 7450 Vineyard Dr, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Welsh winemaker Damian Grindley delivers aromas of concentrated vanilla, bacon, black cherry compote, fig jam and barrel smoke in this wine from his west Paso estate. Loamy, earthy flavors evolve on the palate into elderberry fruit and leather, with a distinct minty sensation emerging on the finish, leaving the lips alive.

properties.title: Bunchgrass 2012 Merlot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 151 Bunchgrass Ln, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: All varietal coming from Seven Hills Vineyard, this displays aromas of café au lait, black raspberries and dried herbs. The fruit and barrel flavors are palate coating, displaying exceptional polish and texture.

properties.title: Force Majeure 2012 Estate Syrah (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 52274 Pleasant View Rd, Milton-Freewater, OR 97862, USA
properties.descrption: From this winery's young estate vineyard, this displays aromas of crushed rock, plum, raspberries and herbs along with coffee accents. It's rich and concentrated with layers of red and black fruit flavors. A firm squeeze of grainy tannins could use additional time to unwind. It will be best from 2020 to 2025.

properties.title: Il Molino di Grace 2011 Il Margone Gran Selezione  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Localita' Il Volano-Lucarelli, 50022 Panzano In Chianti FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of underbrush, ripe dark-skinned fruit, clove, espresso and a balsamic note lead the nose of this structured Sangiovese. The generous palate delivers juicy black cherry, blackberry, licorice and tobacco alongside velvety tannins. Drink 2016–2021.

properties.title: La Fenêtre 2011 Presqu'ile Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 2705 Aviation Way, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: Josh Klapper delivers an earthy take on the grape, with aromas of loam, tree roots, dusty chert, a touch of green olive and barely ripe wild berries. Once sipped, there are flavors of dried rose petals, raw meat, iodine, graphite and a Kalamata olive-dried cherry tapenade.

properties.title: Lecco 2011 Crianza  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: 36083 Summitville St, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.descrption: Direct and woody on the nose, with aromas of graphite and vanilla, this opens in fine form. A tight, pure palate deftly blends weight, fine acidity and chewy tannins, while the flavor profile is earthy and blackened by charred oak, with blackberry fruit and savory, peppery spice notes. This is meaty, savory and beefy on the finish. Drink through 2021.

properties.title: J. Christopher 2014 Sandra Adele Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 17150 NE Hillside Dr, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: Principally blended from Abbey Ridge vineyard fruit, this offers red plum and cherry fruit, with a distinct streak of pineapple. Native yeast was employed, along with aging in one-quarter new oak, adding hints of Asian spices. The length and balance are impressive.

properties.title: Alcance 2013 Bravura Red (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: 43 Round Lake Rd Suite #3, Ballston Lake, NY 12019, USA
properties.descrption: On the nose, this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Carmenère and Petit Verdot smells of spicy berry fruits and black plum along with chocolate and cedar. The palate is a touch drawing and tannic, but in no way harsh or impeding. Spicy black-fruit flavors include notes of olive and herbs, while the finish delivers more of the same. Drink through 2022.

properties.title: Ravenswood 2014 Dickerson Single Vineyard Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a lovely vineyard-designate, brawny and bold and completely floral. Brambly blackberry is met by plum and raisin as a leathery texture provides grit and brawn. Spicy black pepper and cinnamon season the finish.

properties.title: Rex Hill 2014 Shea Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 30835 OR-99W, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: This spent 11 months in 41% new oak, and there's a tasty lick of caramel running through the midpalate. The fruit catches some purple plum and plenty of Bing cherry, with a dark chocolate frame around svelte tannins.

properties.title: Shea 2014 Pommard Clone Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 12321 NE Hwy 240, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: A varied mix of fruits—citrus, apple, raspberry and cherry—accompany this wine's tannic note of breakfast tea. It's a bit on the astringent side, with a dollop of nougat and almond paste adding nice highlights through the finish.

properties.title: Structure 2014 Bauhaus Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3861 1st Ave S, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas are quite locked up at present, with notes of cranberry, cherry, herb and wood spice. On the palate, the dark-fruit flavors show the warmth of the vintage, with a spine of firm tannins providing support.

properties.title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2014 Sisters Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 935 NE 10th Ave, McMinnville, OR 97128, USA
properties.descrption: The winery's vineyards are now being showcased in a series of designates. Sisters includes the three Pinot “sisters”—Blanc, Gris and Noir—in a site just below Archery Summit in the heart of the Dundee Hills. It's clean, compact, complex and nicely layered. You'll note a spicy mix of cranberry, raspberry and red licorice, along with more subtle hints of curaçao and chocolate. The structure (and winery history) suggest that this will age quite well. Drink 2018 to 2030 and beyond.

properties.title: Tumwater 2014 Reserve Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
properties.address: 375 SW Barrel House Way, West Linn, OR 97068, USA
properties.descrption: This was sourced from Bethel Heights, which is a very good source indeed. It's packed with pure tangy red-berry fruit. The mouthfeel is lively, the length and concentration well above par. It's sappy and bright, with a light touch of new oak showing. Drink 2018–2028.

properties.title: Two Vintners 2013 Oliver Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 18570 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Petite Sirah makes up 60% of this wine, with the rest equal parts Syrah and Grenache. It brings aromas of herb, cherry, black licorice and spice. The palate is dense and structured, with layers of dark fruit flavors.

properties.title: Two Vintners 2014 Some Days Are Diamonds May's Discovery Vineyard Syrah (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 18570 142nd Ave NE, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This wine has perfumed aromas of sagebrush, potpourri, herb, purple fruit and a light earthy note, showing a lot of nuance and detail. The palate has full palate-coating dark-plum flavors, with the emphasis on purity. Vibrant floral notes persist on the finish. This is the winery's best example from this vineyard to date.

properties.title: Valdubón 2011 Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Antigua Carretera Nacional 1, Km 151, 09460 Milagros, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: Fully ripe aromas of blackberry, raisin, vanilla and wood grain set up a fleshy, bold palate that's tannic, but not tough or impermeable. Savory oak and ripe berry fruit flavors finish chewy and dense, with moderate complexity. Drink through 2025.

properties.title: Larchago 2007 Temperado Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: 191 S Highland St, Memphis, TN 38111, USA
properties.descrption: Mature woody aromas of foresty berry, cigar box and vanilla set up a palate that's mature but still fresh. Spicy oaky flavors of cherry and plum come with a hint of chocolate, while this ends with integrated notes of coffee and mocha. Drink through 2025.

properties.title: Davis Family 2014 Horseshoe Bend Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 52 Front St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Shaped by the capturing of a cool-climate site and philosophy, this wine is stemmy and balanced, offering a treasure's trove of fresh earth, black tea and clove, all within a lushly layered mouthfeel. The ripeness of the fruit and acidity are entirely complementary.

properties.title: Dominio Basconcillos 2011 Estate Grown 12 Meses en Barrica Made with Organic Grapes  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: 09370 Gumiel de Izán, Burgos, Spain
properties.descrption: This is a concentrated bruiser from a ripe warm vintage. Aromas of cheesy oak, vanilla, maple and blackberry require as much air as possible. Saturated, heavy and jammy on the palate, this pounds the palate with rugged tannins. Flavors of blackberry, prune and chocolate finish thick, chewy and grabby. This is not about elegance—it's all about power and concentration. Drink through 2025.

properties.title: Patel 2013 Malbec (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1245 Main St, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: This is a celebratory taste of blueberry pie that's silky smooth and additionally complex in vanilla, leather and dark chocolate. Luxuriously soft, it finds a way to mellow its tannins without sacrificing power or concentration.

properties.title: Château Lacombe Noaillac 2009  Médoc
properties.address: 8 Chem. de Tousquiron, 33590 Jau-Dignac-et-Loirac, France
properties.descrption: Initially dry and tannic, the wine shows dark fruits with blueberry flavors, smoke and spice. It is rich and dense, already with the fruit right up front. Drink now or better age.

properties.title: Château le Pape 2008 L'Excellence  (Pessac-Léognan)
properties.address: 25 Chem. le Thil, 33850 Léognan, France
properties.descrption: Rounded and sweet wine, its tannins buried in the rich blackberry fruits. It is dominated by its fruity character, although there is a chunky texture that gives a firm mouthfeel. Ready to drink in a year.

properties.title: Château Siran 2009  Margaux
properties.address: 13 Avenue du Comte JB de, Av. du Comté Lynch, 33460 Labarde, France
properties.descrption: On the lean side, with a layered concentrated wood structure. The wine has weight along with dryness, although the fruit is harder to discern.

properties.title: Dievole 2007 Novecento Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: Località Dievole 6, Wine Resort, 53019 Castelnuovo Berardenga SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Dievole was a beacon of quality and innovation in Chianti Classico but disappeared from the scene in the past few years. It's back now with its celebrated Novecento Riserva. The wine shows an elegant, more traditional style compared to past vintages, with a lighter mouthfeel, more acidity and bright aromas of white cherry and cassis.

properties.title: Quinta do Vallado 2009 Vallado Tinto Red (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta do Vallado, Vilarinho dos Freires, 5050-364 Peso da Régua, Portugal
properties.descrption: A rich, ripe, warm wine, smoothed with soft tannins. The open, generous fruit character is given an extra edge with textured wood and acidity. A black, tarry aftertaste adds further complexity.

properties.title: Real Companhia Velha 2008 Porca de Murça Reserva Red (Douro)
properties.address: 4431-952, R. Azevedo Magalhães 314, 4431-952 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
properties.descrption: Red fruits dominate a wine that is rich, full-bodied with a firm, tight structure. Round the firm texture there is a richer, ripe fruit character, dense and juicy. The wine can be aged, but it is ready to drink.

properties.title: Rocca delle Macìe 2009 Sasyr Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Località Le Macie 45, 53011 Castellina in Chianti SI, Italy
properties.descrption: As the name Sasyr suggests, this wine represents a successful blend of Sangiovese (60%) and Syrah that is sensual, spicy, savory and perfect for hearty meat dishes. This vintage shows great quality with ripe fruit tones, leather, tobacco, black olive and a plush, velvety mouthfeel.

properties.title: Sierra Cantabria 2006 Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Fuente de La Salud, s/n, 26338 San Vicente de la Sonsierra, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Woodsy and rich smelling, with sous-bois, ample spice, ripe berry aromas and weight. It shows texture and grip on the palate, followed by baked, smoky flavors of roasted black fruits and toast. Finishes foresty and warm. Appealing in every way. Drink now through 2013.

properties.title: Simaine Cellars 2009 Elvie's Block, Larry Venturi Vineyards Carignane (Mendocino)
properties.address: 3001 S State St # 42, Ukiah, CA 95482, USA
properties.descrption: A truly lovely Carignane, organically grown, dry-farmed and from a single vineyard, a 100% varietal example of how well Carignane can grow in Mendocino when well-tended and allowed to be itself. Rich, luxurious and smooth, the wine is also dark and brooding, incredibly fruity, like a liquid cherry-raspberry tart topped with vanilla ice cream.

properties.title: Terra d'Alter 2009 Special Selection Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Zona Industrial Da Lt. 22/28, 263, 7460 Fronteira, Portugal
properties.descrption: An elegant wine, its red fruits laced with firm yet subtle tannins. It is finished with acidity, a balanced layer of wood. The wine, with its serious structure, needs 2–3 years aging.

properties.title: Le Buche 2007 Le Buche Olivi Cantine Red (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Vicinale delle Buche, 25, 53047 Sarteano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Sangiovese (70%), Merlot, Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc are blended here to produce a rich, velvety wine with defined aromas of blackberry, chocolate, espresso and pipe tobacco. The wine finishes with a soft, chewy texture.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2009 Vista Verde Vineyard Pinot Noir (San Benito County)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A very good, impressively concentrated Pinot Noir, with flashy, ripe cherry, blackberry and currant flavors. It's a little too robust right now, with an almost rustic mouthfeel, but could develop bottle complexity over the years.

properties.title: Campo alla Sughera 2009 Adèo  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale Bolgherese, 57022 Castagneto Carducci LI, Italy
properties.descrption: A 50-50 blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, Adèo delivers bright fruit tones of fresh raspberry and blueberry with loads of spice at the back. Here it is: a perfect pasta wine.

properties.title: Casa di Terra 2008 Maronea  (Bolgheri)
properties.address: Strada Comunale delle Ferruggini, 162/A, 57022 Bolgheri LI, Italy
properties.descrption: A jammy note of strawberry or blackberry preserves comes to the front of this darkly concentrated Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah and Petit Verdot blend. The richness of this wine, and its overall intensity, would match hearty game meat dishes.

properties.title: Ceralti 2006 Sonoro Merlot (Toscana)
properties.address: Strada Comunale dei Ceralti, 77, 57022 Donoratico LI, Italy
properties.descrption: Sonoro (100% Merlot) opens with cherry and creamy milk chocolate with ripe berry flavors of plum and cassis. A touch of green pepper or chopped herb adds brightness to the finish.

properties.title: Château Bertinerie 2010  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 1 Le Bourg N, 33620 Cubnezais, France
properties.descrption: Big, structured tannins lie over the ripe fruit. The wine has a dense character, the young tannins dominant. Given a year, the fine fruit will come through to give a sweeter blackberry character.

properties.title: Château Rocher-Bonregard 2008  Pomerol
properties.address: 73 Rue de Catusseau, 33500 Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: While the wine does have considerable tannins, it also has the ripe Merlot fruit to support it. Good acidity, black currant fruits, smoky wood, all the elements are there. It will always be firm, but should mature well.

properties.title: Emiliana 2007 Novas Limited Selection Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot (Central Valley)
properties.address: RUTA 68 Y RUTA F-870 Casablanca, Valparaíso, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Rich and baked smelling, with hints of marzipan, tobacco, earth and black fruits. Feels chewy and deep, with fresh acidity and bright cassis, black cherry and blackberry flavors touched up by chocolate and spice. Penetrating and choppy on the finish; 70% Cabernet with 30% Merlot. Drink now through 2013.

properties.title: Bella 2008 Lily Hill Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 9711 W Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A good example of a ripe, robust Dry Creek Valley Zinfandel. It's huge in extracted blackberries, blueberries, chocolate and currants, with all kinds of tangy baking spices. Almost too much of a good thing, but Zin lovers will exult.

properties.title: Bibi Graetz 2009 Grilli del Testamatta Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Piazza Mino da Fiesole, 37, 50014 Fiesole FI, Italy
properties.descrption: Grilli del Testamatta is an elegant expression of Sangiovese that delivers blue flowers, bright fruit tones and touches of leather and spice. The wine is linear and long, fueled by fresh acidity.

properties.title: Canonica a Cerreto 2007 Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.address: 53019 Castelnuovo Berardenga, Province of Siena, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a very traditional expression of Chianti Classico that shows fine berry notes, cassis, currant, violets and white almond skin. It's a feminine and silky wine, with an extremely smooth and finely textured finish.

properties.title: San Antonio Abad 2015 Delicioso Tempranillo (La Mancha)
properties.address: C. Afueras, 17, 45860 Villacañas, Toledo, Spain
properties.descrption: Overall, this wine is fruity and solid. Raw, slightly austere red-fruit aromas are basic but fresh and clean. Flavors of plum, currant and cinnamon are suitable, but this wine finishes quickly.

properties.title: Pezzi King 2013 Elevation 1040 Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 412 Hudson St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Densely layered in overwrought notions of brown sugar and vanilla, this wine has a flatness and a discernible sweetness to the overripe black-fruit core.

properties.title: Red Rock 2014 Reserve Merlot (California)
properties.address: 3955 W Sunset Rd # 101, Las Vegas, NV 89118, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of this medium-bodied wine are smoky and herbal. The flavors combine black pepper, spicy oak notes and and almost-sweet fruits like plum and watermelon.

properties.title: Casa Ermelinda Freitas 2013 Reserva Petit Verdot (Península de Setúbal)
properties.address: Rua Manuel João Freitas, Fernando Pó, 2965-595, Portugal
properties.descrption: On the basis that anything goes in Setúbal, here is another grape from Bordeaux in a new setting. The wine certainly has the dark color of the grape and dark black-plum fruits. It is full and rich, but the finish has a lingering astringency.

properties.title: Amalie Robert 2012 Satisfaction Syrah (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 13531 Bursell Rd, Dallas, OR 97338, USA
properties.descrption: The overall impression is of under-ripe fruit, with flavors of rhubarb, cranberry and very sour cherry. It's tannic as well, and set on a thin frame. Drink up.

properties.title: Bersano 2010 Riserva  (Barolo)
properties.address: Piazza Dante, 21, 14049 Nizza Monferrato AT, Italy
properties.descrption: The nose is extremely shy but eventually reveals a hint of dark-skinned fruit and toast. The hefty one-dimensional palate offers raw red berry and oak-driven spice but not much fruit richness.

properties.title: Bodegas Paniza 2015 Agostón Rosé Garnacha-Cabernet (Cariñena)
properties.address: Carretera Valencia, Km 53, 50480 Paniza, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Reddish in color, this wine smells of wet stones, cherries and fresh-cut grass. A somewhat flat palate is home to candied but generalized red-fruit flavors. It's decidedly sweet on the finish.

properties.title: Bodegas Paniza 2015 Garnacha-Tempranillo (Cariñena)
properties.address: Carretera Valencia, Km 53, 50480 Paniza, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Strawberry and raspberry aromas are mild. This simple blend of Garnacha and Tempranillo feels grabby and rubbery, while salty baked-plum flavors finish with notes of herbs and mint.

properties.title: Care 2015 Solidarity Rosé Tempranillo (Cariñena)
properties.address: Ctra. Aguaron, 1, 50400 Cariñena, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: This salmon-colored wine made from Tempranillo is neutral in aromas, with a touch of creaminess on an otherwise standard palate. Mild peach flavors are slightly bitter. The wine loses freshness and focus the longer it sits.

properties.title: Château Pey La Tour 2014  Bordeaux
properties.address: 33370 Sallebœuf, France
