properties.descrption: This is an open fruity wine with attractive red berries and concentrated tannins. It is developing well into a ripe perfumed wine that will be ready to drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Roland-La-Garde 2014 Tradition  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 8 La Garde, 33390 Saint-Seurin-de-Cursac, France
properties.descrption: This is a fresh and juicy organic wine with attractive acidity and just the right balance of tannins. Drink this wine soon, certainly from 2018.

properties.title: Château Séguin 2014  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 3 Chem. du Bon Coin, 33360 Lignan-de-Bordeaux, France
properties.descrption: While the wine is dry at this young stage, it has fine potential. Generous fruits and firm tannins give it richness and a juicy character. Drink the wine from 2018.

properties.title: Sanguinhal 2015 Cerejeiras Tinto Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: Quinta do Sanguinhal, 2540-216 Bombarral, Portugal
properties.descrption: Aged in steel, this is a bright, fruit-driven wine that has red fruits and soft tannins. It has a crisp touch of acidity at the end. Ready to drink now.

properties.title: Besadien 2014 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 72308 E 260 Private Rd NE #7779, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.descrption: Produced by John Grochau (Grochau Cellars), this is stubbornly shut down, with hints of rubber tire in the aromas. Once you work past the reductive scents and flavors, it's a short wine with generic fruit and a quick finish.

properties.title: Cancello del Barone 2011 Riserva  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: 2320 Weston Rd, Weston, FL 33326, USA
properties.descrption: This opens with whiffs of resin, stewed prune and exotic spice. The raspy palate is extremely evolved, showing mint, a note of raisin and the warmth of alcohol despite the modest declaration of 13.5% alcohol on the label. The fruit is drying up quickly so drink soon.

properties.title: Carl Ehrhard 2015 Rüdesheim Blanc de Noirs Trocken Pinot Noir (Rheingau)
properties.address: Geisenheimer Str. 3, 65385 Rüdesheim am Rhein, Germany
properties.descrption: Whiffs of hazelnut and raspberry introduce this dry Blanc de Noir, a white wine made from Pinot Noir grapes. Red berry flavors on the palate run a touch ruddy, but vibrant acidity brightens the finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Casca Wines 2015 Bote Red (Douro)
properties.address: Av. Gen. Carmona nº2, 2765-207 Estoril, Portugal
properties.descrption: There is some of the mineral character that is typical of the Douro in this black-fruit-laden wine. It has acidity and tannins and a stalky, juicy character that keeps it crisp. The wine is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Château La Bourrée 2014  Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.descrption: High spice and toast flavors dominate this wine. The wood use is masking the fruit, probably too enthusiastically. It should soften, although not enough.

properties.title: Château Motte Maucourt 2015  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.address: 2 Au Canton, 33760 Saint-Genis-du-Bois, France
properties.descrption: The wine has red fruits and tannins along with acidity. The 25-year old vines have produced a rich wine that is all about fruit and acidity. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Closerie du Bailli 2014 Tradition  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 65 Rue des Dames de France, 51390 Gueux, France
properties.descrption: This is a crisp, fresh wine with red-currant fruits and light tannins from the Alliance Bourg co-op. It is juicy and fruity, likely to develop quickly to give a light, bright wine.

properties.title: Gibbs 2013 Money Road Vineyard Merlot (Oakville)
properties.address: 617 Crystal Springs Rd, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Blended with 15% Petit Verdot, this wine is big and brooding in tannin and charred oak, with a sizable presence on the palate. It dabbles in ripe, full-bodied black cherry, plum and tar.

properties.title: Château Bouscaut 2009  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: 1477 Av. de Toulouse, 33140 Cadaujac, France
properties.descrption: Impressive dusty tannins offer a structured counterpoint to the deliciously ripe fruits and sweet berry flavors that stand out in this wine. It has great concentration as well, a powerhouse of firm structure and gorgeous fruit.

properties.title: Williams Selyem 2009 Forchini Vineyard South Knoll Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 7227 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This is a terrific Zinfandel, offering berry, cherry, mocha, spice and cedar flavors that come wrapped in briary tannins. It's technically dry, but with a satisfying honeyed note.

properties.title: Ca' Viola 2006 Sotto Castello  (Barolo)
properties.address: Borgata S. Luigi, 11, 12063 Dogliani CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This boasts a bright ruby color, and it shows fine nuances of wild fruit, dried ginger, licorice and dried tobacco. The palate finishes with smooth, silky tannins.

properties.title: Keller 2009 La Cruz Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 5875 Lakeville Hwy, Petaluma, CA 94954, USA
properties.descrption: Very rich and elegantly structured, this shows the talented viticulture and superior winemaking. Bone dry, it has powerful flavors of cherry pie filling, cola and pomegranate, with a mouthwatering spiciness. The acidity is notable. Try pairing this with a salted and peppered steak.

properties.title: Fontanabianca 2009 Bordini  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: via Bordini, 15, 12052 Neive CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Elegant, toned and aromatically intense, this shows fine aromas of wild berry, crushed mineral, dried tobacco, cola and a touch of mint. The palate has a fresh, light and feminine touch that's backed by firm tannin.

properties.title: Fratelli Alessandria 2008 Monvigliero  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Beato Valfrè, 59, 12060 Verduno CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This terrific producer does a great job of capturing the magic of Nebbiolo. It is elegant and fine but powerful and bold at the same time. Sweet fruit and exotic spice give this wine a playful, modern flair. Drink after 2018.

properties.title: Giacosa Fratelli 2008 Bussia  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via XX Settembre, 64, 12052 Neive CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Enormous aromatic intensity of ripe cherry, leather, spice, licorice and moist earth opens the bouquet. It's silky smooth and shows a very fine texture.

properties.title: Grimaldi Bruna 2008 Bricco Ambrogio  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Parea, 7, 12060 Grinzane Cavour CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Bruna Grimaldi and her family present a delicious wine with bright spice and crisp fruit backed by a very distinct note of sweet marzipan. Balsam endnotes of rosemary, ginger and cola give the wine lift and buoyancy on the finish.

properties.title: Tulpen 2008 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3131 S 3rd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: As with the 2008 Tulpen Cabernet, the Lewis (Yakima Valley) and Wallula (Horse Heaven Hills) Vineyards provided the fruit. A muscle Merlot, this is smooth and round, bearing flavors of mixed berry and ripe cherry, with added notes of iron and clean earth.

properties.title: Beni di Batasiolo 2005 Riserva  (Barolo)
properties.address: 10241 Sawmill Pkwy, Powell, OH 43065, USA
properties.descrption: The 2005 vintage was a hot one, and this offers aromas of ripe fruit and savory spice, and the intensity is not overdone by any means. In fact, it shows elegance and restraint, with a thick, succulent quality to the firm tannins.

properties.title: Beni di Batasiolo 2007 Vigneto Corda della Briccolina  (Barolo)
properties.address: 10241 Sawmill Pkwy, Powell, OH 43065, USA
properties.descrption: Soft, rich and enduring, this should pair with braised beef or cornish hen with black truffle. It offers soft aromas of ripe fruit, leather, spice and licorice powder. Drink after 2018.

properties.title: Castello di Verduno 2009 Rabajà  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Via Umberto I', 9, 12060 Verduno CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Hailing from the celebrated Rabajà Cru, this offers plump fullness and beautiful aromatic intensity, with notes of black cherry, leather and a touch of chocolate powder. The tannins are solid and fine.

properties.title: Château Potelle 2009 VGS Zinfandel (Mount Veeder)
properties.address: 1200 Dowdell Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Château Potelle started making Zinfandel from Mount Veeder a long time ago. They've had their ups and downs, but the winery is back in force. The '09 Zin is intense with a spicy character. The black currant, prune and dark chocolate flavors should pair well with fancy beef and game dishes.

properties.title: Mauro Veglio 2007 Rocche dell'Annunziata  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Annunziata, 50, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Savory spice and candied fruit notes emerge on the bouquet of this sophisticated wine. It shows tight, silky tannins and delivers a brightly intense finish with notes of dried ginger, cedar and licorice.

properties.title: Thomas Fogarty 2010 Windy Hill Vineyard Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 19501 Skyline Blvd, Woodside, CA 94062, USA
properties.descrption: This is dry, silky and enormously complex, with flavors of raspberry, cherry, cola, new oak and spice that satisfy through the long finish. The mountain vineyard concentrated the fruit, yielding savory power. It's a beautiful Pinot Noir to drink now with steaks or lamb chops.

properties.title: Ugo Lequio 2007 Gallina Riserva  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Via del Molino, 10, 12052 Neive CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with sweet aromas of red berry, vanilla, toasted hazelnut and white pepper. It has a feminine touch, with endnotes of blue flower and red currant. Drink after 2018.

properties.title: Viberti 2006 La Volta Riserva  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via delle Viole, 30, 12060 Vergne CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This shows beautiful touches of cured meat, dried berry, ginger, rosemary oil and cigar box. It is soft and succulent on the finish, but the solid tannins hold it together very nicely.

properties.title: Gianni Gagliardo 2008 Serre  (Barolo)
properties.address: Borgata Serra dei Turchi, 88, 12064 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Dark and austere, this has aromas of spice, toasted hazelnut and wild berry. The mouthfeel is tight and astringent and the finish is elegantly streamlined. Definitely give this wine 5–10 more years in the cellar.

properties.title: Rasa 2010 Vox Populi Mourvèdre (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 4122 Powerline Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Showing great concentration and varietal character, this tart, brambly, pure Mourvèdre beautifully showcases both the grape and the winemaker's skills. Sour plum and spice lend themselves to a lingering, detailed finish.

properties.title: Silver Mountain 2011 Syrah (Central Coast)
properties.address: 402 Ingalls St unit #29, Santa Cruz, CA 95060, USA
properties.descrption: Clean purple fruit aromas mix with grapeseed, Concord grape and caramelized black fruit scents on this bottling. Black plum, peppercorn, tart elderberry, tar, beef char and soy show on the palate, which is lifted by a lavender nuance.

properties.title: Peter Cellars 2014 Estate Rosé of Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 21708 Broadway, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Dark pink-red in color, this wine has a ripe, sugary nose and a high-octane entry. It grows up to be tangy in citrus peel and fresh grapefruit and cherry, finishing dry.

properties.title: Rare 2012 Black Blend Extremely Rare Red (California)
properties.descrption: This is an elegant, silky-textured wine that doesn't taste as black or bold as the label would suggest. It has medium body, bright fruit flavors and hints of white pepper and white chocolate that accent a core of red cherry and raspberry.

properties.title: Tertulia 2012 Whistling Hills Estate Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1564 Whiteley Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Viognier (10%) announces itself first with aromas of flowers and orange peel that are followed by smoke, leather and spice on a wine that has yet to fully reveal itself. The cranberry and cherry flavors are full in feel, tapering toward the finish.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori Cortaccia 2013 Frauenrigl Lagrein (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Weinstraße, 23, 39040 Kurtatsch, Autonome Provinz Bozen - Südtirol, Italy
properties.descrption: Muted aromas suggesting vanilla, cassis and dark spice emerge in the glass while the palate shows roasted coffee bean and dried black cherry. Dusty tannins give it mouth-puckering astringency. Drink through 2016.

properties.title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2013 Lagrein (Alto Adige)
properties.address: Via Circonvallazione, 17-19, 39057 Appiano sulla strada del vino BZ, Italy
properties.descrption: The nose is rather closed, but eventually reveals subdued aromas of cassis, violet and a whiff of eucalyptus. The palate offers blackberry, tangerine zest, rhubarb and a hint of ground pepper alongside grippy tannins.

properties.title: Stroppiana 2011 Bussia  (Barolo)
properties.address: Frazione Rivalta San Giacomo 6, 12060 La Morra CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with subdued aromas of dark berry, scorched earth, grilled porcini and a whiff of leather. The palate offers sour cherry, sage and a hint of cured meat alongside raspy tannins that give it a grainy finish.

properties.title: Herzog 2014 Camouflage Red (California)
properties.address: 3201 Camino Del Sol, Oxnard, CA 93030, USA
properties.descrption: Slightly herbal aromas and generous, almost chocolaty fruit flavors make for a mouth-filling wine. It is full bodied, moderately tannic, and nicely dry despite the bold fruit character.

properties.title: Hunt Cellars 2010 Maestro Destiny Vineyards Red (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2875 Oakdale Rd, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: Dense aromas of smoked black plum, rustic leather and smoked meats show on this super Tuscan blend of Sangiovese, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Petite Sirah. Dried blueberries, fudge, beef char and very tarry elements show on the palate.

properties.title: Winzerkeller Andau 2014 Blaufränkisch (Burgenland)
properties.address: Dammweg 1, 7163 Andau, Austria
properties.descrption: Fleshy, generous black cherry fruit swishes across nose and palate. A core of freshness and spice brings a little order into all this fleshiness. This may benefit from being chilled as a full-fruited if medium-bodied summer red.

properties.title: Winzerkeller Andau 2014 Zweigelt (Burgenland)
properties.address: Dammweg 1, 7163 Andau, Austria
properties.descrption: Notes of fleshy black cherry dominate. The palate is fresh but lacks a little focus: there is plenty of black cherry fruit playing on the soft, easy palate, untroubled by oak. A very ready, easy picnic wine. Drink soon.

properties.title: Ballentine 2013 Block 9 Reserve Estate Grown Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 2820 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This wine opens in a combination of herbal mint and brown sugar, ultimately smacking the palate with a big, bold presence that's hyper-ripe. The size is significant and in need of equally bold, brawny and spicy food.

properties.title: Stony Lonesome 2013 Estate Reserve Zweigelt (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 8111 E 450 N, Columbus, IN 47203, USA
properties.descrption: Ruddy prune and balsamic vinegar notes on the nose contrast crisp, punchy black cherry and berry flavors in this Finger Lakes Zweigelt. It's velvety smooth on the palate, marked by persistent fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Longboard 2013 Point Break Red (North Coast)
properties.address: 5 Fitch St, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This 2013 keeps up the full body and ripe fruit of previous releases, with lush texture and saturated chocolate and blackberry flavors. It's a dry red, however, with no detectable sweetness but plenty of tannin and satisfaction.

properties.title: Mancura 2012 Gran Reserva Red (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: 2410 Land O' Lakes Blvd, Land O' Lakes, FL 34639, USA
properties.descrption: Herbal, briary raspberry and plum aromas come with a green hint of eucalyptus as well as leather. This Syrah-led blend is grabby and showing tannic grip. Flavors of briny red fruits, herbal notes and olive end with roasted overtones and rubbery tannins.

properties.title: Meadowcroft 2013 Giles Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: /Hwy. 121, suite Meadowcroft wines, 23574 Arnold Drive, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: A 100% varietal wine, and the producer's first vintage thereof, this is a juicy and leathery Cab Franc, soft and straightforward in plum and raspberry, with a layering of baking spice on the finish. Restrained, it's a nice one for the table.

properties.title: Mesa Del Sol 2011 Prima Rosso Red (Arroyo Seco)
properties.address: 45803 Arroyo Seco Rd, Greenfield, CA 93927, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Zinfandel, Syrah and Sangiovese shows dense, dark notes of chocolate, boysenberry, leather, lavender and a sprig of mint on the nose. The tannins are chalky in texture, with a balance of blueberries and menthol tones.

properties.title: Montresor 2012  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.address: Via Ca' di Cozzi, 16, 37124 Verona VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of scorched earth, game, dried rose petal and a whiff of barnyard lead the nose. The aromas follow through to the solid palate together with overripe black cherry, bitter walnut and a confectionary note alongside grainy tannins. It's a bit rustic but still has an earthy appeal.

properties.title: Oak Farm 2012 Wegat Vineyard Zinfandel (Lodi)
properties.address: 23627 N Devries Rd, Lodi, CA 95242, USA
properties.descrption: Ripe fruit aromas and flavors ooze from this full-bodied but silky-textured wine. It tastes like a late-harvest style, with cherry and blood orange flavors, and seems well-suited for kicking back by the fire after a meal, eating chunks of cheese.

properties.title: Peju 2012 Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8466 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.descrption: This is a big, oaky, brawny and tannic version of the variety, generous in brown sugar and blackberry and plum jam. A piquant seasoning of peppercorn dots the midpalate and finish.

properties.title: Viña Maipo 2013 Gran Devoción Red (Maule Valley)
properties.address: Tajamar 13, Santiago, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Traditional Maipo Valley aromas of eucalyptus and wild herbs form the opening, while spicy, oaky shadings fill out the bouquet on this Cabernet-led blend that contains 15% Syrah. A full, oaky palate is lively, while heavily herbal, briny flavors of olive and tobacco confirm the wine's Chilean character.

properties.title: Mercer 2012 Reserve Cavalie Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 3100 Lee Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: Merlot makes up half of this blend, with the balance Cabernet Sauvignon, Malbec and Petit Verdot. Vanilla, pencil shaving and woodspice predominate on the nose and palate.

properties.title: Milbrandt 2012 The Estates Merlot (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 707 US-2 unit d, Leavenworth, WA 98826, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of cocoa and coffee are mixed with black licorice and dark berries, with this wine showing some reduction out of the gate that detracts. The flavors are rich and full bodied, carrying some warmth on the finish. The aromas and flavors seem disconnected.

properties.title: William Grassie 2012 Cadeau Imprévu Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This wine is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Syrah. The aromas of spice, cherry and plum are quite reserved while the palate brings plump fruit and barrel flavors backed by grainy tannins.

properties.title: Ca'Romè 2005 Vigna Rapet  (Barolo)
properties.address: Str. Rabaja, 86/88, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This vintage of Rapet shows vibrant fruit flavors that stretch into the realm of over ripeness. The aromas include stewy plum, raspberry and strawberry and are brought in line thanks to contrasting notes of mineral and white mushroom. It offers bursting berry flavors and very polished but firm tannins.

properties.title: Cascina Luisin 2004 Rabajà  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Str. Rabaja, 36, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Rabajà is among the most celebrated single vineyards in Barbaresco. The cru is known for its elegant yet muscular wines that perform well either aged or when drunk young. This expression exhibits notes of raspberry and cherry with shadings of vanilla and spice. It also shows some creamy or lactic notes of white chocolate that will dissolve within a few years.

properties.title: JR Wine 2006 Boschetti Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4922 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.descrption: Big, ripe and juicy, with some overripenes veering into raisins, but it gives a rich plummy edge to the wild berries, tobacco and spice. Drink this impressive Zinfandel with roasts and beef stews.

properties.title: Volver 2005 Red (La Mancha)
properties.address: Ctra de PInoso a Fortuna s/n 03650, 03659, Alicante, Spain
properties.descrption: Purple as they come, with extracted aromas of boysenberry, blackberry, maple and bacon. It's a wide, flush wine with bulk, 14.5% alcohol and savage flavors of blackberry and smoky BBQ. Definitely for fans of big, modern Spanish wines; Old World enthusiasts will probably call it “too modern” and overdone.

properties.title: Youngberg Hill Vineyards 2006 Barrel Select Pinot Noir (McMinnville)
properties.address: 10660 SW Youngberg Hill Rd, McMinnville, OR 97128, USA
properties.descrption: A reserve selection from the winery's Jordan Block, this brings similar flavors with slightly more intensity. Black fruits, black pepper and some spice from barrel aging combine in a medium-bodied effort with moderate aging potential.

properties.title: Pierre Sparr 2003 Presitge Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Hoen, 68980 Beblenheim, France
properties.descrption: Developed aromas of forest floor and mushrooms come as no surprise, given the deep brick color on this Alsace Pinot. The highly nuanced palate is complex and shot through with mineral notes. Cherry cola flavors dominate the long finish. An excellent foil for squab or other game birds.

properties.title: Poderi Luigi Einaudi 2004 Costa Grimaldi  (Barolo)
properties.address: Borgata Gombe, 31/32, 12063 Dogliani CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Costa Grimaldi tastes fruity and tart and offers mature notes of raspberry and strawberry over subtle shadings of spice, licorice and root beer. It's definitely a riper expression of Barolo and therefore not as layered or complex as other wines from this vintage. That said, it's a fine wine with super-firm tannins and bright cherry flavors.

properties.title: Roagna 2004 Vigna Rionde  (Barolo)
properties.address: Località Paglieri, 9, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Vigna Rionda is among the finest crus in the Serralunga d'Alba area with 40- to 60-year-old vines and this producer takes a traditional approach to Barolo. It opens with a slightly brownish hue and seems older than the vintage thanks to aromas of old spice, used leather and dried herbs. The mouthfeel is raw, but firm.

properties.title: Siduri 2006 Hawk's View Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 235 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Kudos to Siduri for offering a serious Oregon Pinot Noir at alcohol levels (13%) reminiscent of Burgundy. It's a welcome tilt for the state that once was tagged as the new world's Burgundian hope, but which has sometimes seemed more like a California wannabe. Light and tart, this isn't a complex wine but brings the delicate nuances of the grape, with cranberry, citrus and strawberry.

properties.title: Siduri 2006 Shaw Mountain Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 235 Healdsburg Ave, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: This bottling brings strawberry preserves right up front; it's a light and spicy wine with immediate appeal. There's plenty of acid—rarely an issue in Oregon—but not much depth. It's got fruit and malted chocolate, and the finish lasts a bit longer than you might expect from the light fruit.

properties.title: Dão Sul 2005 Monte da Cal Reserva Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Quinta Das Sarzedas, Currelos Aptd. 28, Carregal Do Sal, Viseu, 3430-211 Carregal do Sal, Portugal
properties.descrption: Herbal, almost medicinal aromas set a complex scene for this densely structured wine. The flavors throughout, while rich, are also severe, a wrinkle on the otherwise ripe façade. That certainly suggests aging, and the dry tannins support this. In the meantime, it is a winter wine, its concentration needing rich meat dishes.

properties.title: Barale Fratelli 2004 Bussia  (Barolo)
properties.address: Via Roma, 6, 12060 Barolo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Bussia is among the best-regarded crus of Barolo and Sergio Barale's interpretation is definitely on the ripe side. You'll get aromas of mature strawberry and blackberry preserves backed by spice, licorice and anise. The overall effect is thick and chunky and the wine ends with firm astringency.

properties.title: Ca'Romè 2006 Maria di Brün  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Str. Rabaja, 86/88, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This is a subdued and somewhat neutral expression of Nebbiolo with measured aromas of black fruit, plum, black currant and moist earth. The wine is definitely more lively in the mouth where it picks up points thanks to its firm disposition and lingering flavors of blackberry and smoke.

properties.title: Quinta das Bandeiras 2005 Passagem Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: A new joint venture between winemaker Jorge Moreira and owner the Bergqvist family, both of Quinta de la Rosa. The vineyard is in the remote Douro Superior. You can certainly smell the dry heat in this young wine. To taste it has a Port-like smoothness overlying its dry tannins. The fruit is sweet, succulent, layered with blackberry jam and dark berries.

properties.title: Robert Biale 2006 Old Crane Vineyard Zinfandel (St. Helena)
properties.address: 4038 Big Ranch Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: A solid, comforting Zin, made in an appealing style for drinking now. Shows easy, slightly sweet flavors of black raspberries, cherries, currants, cassis and mocha. Nice with teriyaki beef, pork or chicken.

properties.title: Trentadue 2004 La Storia Petite Sirah (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 19170 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: This is a classic coastal California Petite Sirah. It's nearly black in color, and full-bodied and glyceriney, with high alcohol framing massive flavors of blackberries, black currants, dark unsweetened chocolate, coffee and spices. Bone dry, it will live for many years.

properties.title: Sextant 2010 Tannat (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 2324 CA-46, Paso Robles, CA 93446, USA
properties.descrption: This is a soft, lusciously fruity wine for drinking now. With its silky texture, it's full of jammy cherry and raisin flavors that finish hot in alcohol.

properties.title: Silvan Ridge 2009 Lazy River Vineyard Reserve Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 27012 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.descrption: This modest Pinot offers light strawberry fruit, a dash of cola, and a component of earth and stem that overtakes the finish. It hints at green tannins, with a bit of brown sugar sweetness, perhaps from aging in 30% new oak.

properties.title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2009 Má Partilha Merlot (Península de Setúbal)
properties.address: Estrada Nacional 10, 2925-901 Azeitão, Portugal
properties.descrption: Despite its alcohol and potential richness, this has as much green, herbal character as fruitiness. It's structured and juicy, and shows considerable acidity.

properties.title: Bodegas Navarro López 2011 Rojo Granrojo Garnacha (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
properties.address: Autovía A-4, km. 193, 13300, 13300, Cdad. Real, Spain
properties.descrption: Ripe, lightly spiced black cherry and berry aromas announce a good but basic wine. The palate is a bit tough in feel but it's solidly built. Candied, generic black-fruit flavors end simply, with modest syrupy sweetness.

properties.title: Rutherford Ranch 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 1680 Silverado Trail S, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This is a decent Zin for drinking now. It's dry and tannic, with briary flavors of wild forest fruits and spices. Some unripe green notes compromise the score.

properties.title: Snake River 2010 Arena Valley Vineyard Sangiovese
properties.address: 786 W Broad St, Boise, ID 83702, USA
properties.descrption: Hailing from the winery's Arena Valley Vineyard, this wine has notes of dried cranberry and currant. Cranberry juice-like flavors are accented by oaky spice.

properties.title: Telmo Rodríguez 2008 Altos Lanzaga Gran Viñedo  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: From a mediocre vintage, it seems as though the winery poured on the fully toasted oak to cover up marginal fruit. This smells like burnt meat and rubber, tastes charred and baked, and finishes blackened and overly toasty, with a choppy feel and hard tannins.

properties.title: Medici Ermete 2011 Concerto  (Lambrusco Reggiano)
properties.address: Via I. Newton, 13/A, 42124 Reggio nell'Emilia RE, Italy
properties.descrption: This dry sparkling red wine opens with an inky dark color and offers pulpy tones of raw fruit and blackberry jam with tart cherry and cranberry on the finish.

properties.title: Pago de Larrainzar 2008 Raso de Larrainzar Red (Navarra)
properties.address: Cam. de la Corona, S/N, 31240 Ayegui, Navarra, Spain
properties.descrption: This blend of Tempranillo, Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Garnacha is gamy on the nose, with aromas of tomato leaf, compost and cherry-pie filling. The palate is decidedly acidic, while flavors of zesty red fruits like red currant and sour plum come across herbal and a touch weedy.

properties.title: Goose Ridge 2011 Estate Bottled Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 16304 Dallas Rd, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.descrption: The oak, a mixture of French, American and Hungarian (with 50% new), takes the lead, with aromas of vanilla bean and toffee out in front of coffee and plum. The flavors are full bodied, sweet and generous, backed by grainy tannins.

properties.title: Domaine Houchart 2013 Red (Côtes de Provence)
properties.address: 1550 Hendersonville Rd Suite #102, Asheville, NC 28803, USA
properties.descrption: There is a definite touch of stalkiness here, perhaps a consequence of the vintage. It has black currant fruits and balanced acidity, needing a few more months to be developed. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Erik Banti 2012  Morellino di Scansano
properties.address: Localita' Fosso Dei Molini, Scansano, GR 58054, 58054 Scansano GR, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 85% Sangiovese, 10% Alicante Bouschet and 5% Merlot, this savory red delivers aromas and flavors of underbrush, black cherry, licorice and a hint of Mediterranean herb. It's easy drinking and balanced with lithe tannins.

properties.title: Flying Dreams 2011 Tempranillo (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19495 144th Ave NE A140, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Still quite locked up, this wine displays initial aromas of cocoa and vanilla (from 20% new American oak) along with plum, medicine cabinet and raspberry. Sweet fruit flavors are backed by firm tannins and mouthwatering acids.

properties.title: Radford Dale 2012 Frankenstein Pinotage (Stellenbosch)
properties.address: R44, Farm Rust en Vrede no 1322, Opposite Eikendal, Stellenbosch, Cape Town, 7600, South Africa
properties.descrption: Floral aromas of violet, carnation and rose water open the bouquet of this wine, framing the core of muddled black berries and cherries. The texture is tighter and more restrained than anticipated, with astringent tannins and prominent acidity lending a young, firm impression to the palate. Notes of leather and bramble carry the medium-length finish. Try after 2016.

properties.title: Armida 2012 Gold Mine Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 2201 Westside Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: From a three-acre vineyard once home to two gold mines, this wine is spicy and brawny in tannin weight, yet also soft and refined. Bright raspberry plays off juicy flavors of brown sugar and vanilla, finishing in a hint of black pepper. The substantive nature of the wine suggests further time in bottle, through 2020.

properties.title: Bouchaine 2012 Bacchus Collection Gee Vineyard Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.descrption: From a 16-acre, dry-farmed vineyard near the producer's Carneros winery, this opens with a yeasty aroma, followed by black cherry and pomegranate. Soft, high in acidity and well-integrated in terms of oak, its finish is lingering in cinnamon and dried herb.

properties.title: Peju 2011 Piccolo Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 8466 St Helena Hwy, Rutherford, CA 94573, USA
properties.descrption: A new proprietary blend comprised of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Petit Verdot, this fruit-forward wine has a lot to like, blessed by soft layers of crème de cassis and a layering of nutmeg. Mouthfillingly juicy, with good length, it offers structure and approachability at a fair price.

properties.title: Pondera 2011 Escapade Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19501 144th Ave NE # B400, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: This unusual blend holds 57% Mourvèdre, 34% Syrah, 5% Cabernet Sauvignon and 4% Malbec. It displays heaping amounts of black pepper along with aromas of dried herbs, vanilla and cherry. The style is elegant but with good concentration and a silky feel, with a tart uptick on the pepper and vanilla-filled finish.

properties.title: Sarah's Vineyard 2010 Besson Vineyard Syrah (Santa Clara Valley)
properties.address: 1204 W Steels Corners Rd, Cuyahoga Falls, OH 44223, USA
properties.descrption: Velvety and rich aromas of chocolate and dried plums are cut with a citrus tartness on the nose of this single-vineyard expression from a historic site near the Gilroy Golf Course. The refreshing if slightly reductive palate offers flavors of espresso and blueberry-crusted beef, enlivening the tongue before washing away.

properties.title: Henry Earl 2011 Merlot (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 25 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This wine offers abundant aromas of vanilla, coconut shavings, mocha and dried cherries. It's luscious with generous fruit and barrel flavors, with the barrel notes winning out and taking over on the vanilla-dominated finish.

properties.title: Hillinger 2013 Zweigelt (Burgenland)
properties.descrption: The dense blackcurrant fruit, both fresh and cooked, that dominates the nose belies the more elegant, pliable palate. There is richness of dark berries and a hint of tar and smoke, but the body remains fresh and supple on this medium-weight Zweigelt.

properties.title: Kamiak 2014 Palouse River Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: A pretty pale-salmon color, this blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon has aromas and flavors of cherry, watermelon and spice. It drinks dry, with the fruit flavors bringing a textured, fleshy feel.

properties.title: Kaiken 2014 Terroir Series Cabernet Sauvignon Malbec Petite Verdot Red (Mendoza)
properties.address: Roque Sáenz Peña 5516, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Edgy from the start, this blend of Cabernet, Malbec and Petit Verdot smells of asphalt and burnt toast. Pinching in feel, with hard tannins, this tastes roasted, leafy and like carob. Overall the flavors struggle to avoid earthy and rustic.

properties.title: Kiwi Cuvée 2014 Bin 518 Pinot Noir (Vin de France)
properties.descrption: The nose of this wine is all fruit—strawberry, raspberry and cherry abound. Flavor wise, the accessible palate offers more of the same, with light tannins and ample acidity to keep the mouthfeel fresh and the finish clean.

properties.title: La Bioca 2013 Lurens  (Barbaresco)
properties.address: Via Alba, 13/A, 12050 Serralunga d'Alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Raw oak, coconut and roasted coffee bean aromas carry over to the palate along with licorice and espresso but it lacks fruit richness. Astringent, grainy tannins clench the bracing finish.

properties.title: Lost Oak 2014 Bingham Family Vineyard Tempranillo (Texas High Plains)
properties.address: 8101 County Rd 802, Burleson, TX 76028, USA
properties.descrption: A mix of dark fruit and warm spice carries the medium-bodied palate. Soft tannins give an easy nature to this wine and the vanilla-cookie finish doesn't hurt either.

properties.title: Tercos 2015 Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Maza s/n y Manuel A. Saenz, Russel, M5517 Maipú, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Baked, spicy berry and dark plum aromas are leathery and a touch hot. Rather dense and soupy, with slightly rough tannins, this tastes of baked berry fruits, while the finish tastes lightly salty and feels rubbery.

properties.title: THP 2013 Stampede Red (Texas High Plains)
properties.address: 9953 West U.S, US-290, Hye, TX 78635, USA
properties.descrption: There's a solid grip to this blend of 54% Aglianico, 21% Montepulciano, 14% Tempranillo and 11% Barbera. Bramble berries and earthy geraniums give this medium-bodied red some interest.

properties.title: Cliff Creek 2011 Cabernet Franc (Southern Oregon)
properties.address: 1015 McDonough Rd, Gold Hill, OR 97525, USA
properties.descrption: Released late, this may have benefitted somewhat with the extra bottle age, but it's still showing substantial tannins. Tart, barely ripe berry fruit quickly rolls into a short, chalky finish.

properties.title: DanCin 2013 Tribute Red (Southern Oregon)
properties.address: 4477 S Stage Rd, Medford, OR 97501, USA
properties.descrption: Tribute is a blend of 43% Barbera, 43% Sangiovese and 14% Nebbiolo—a difficult enterprise at best, particularly with fruit from young vines. It's thin and generic, showing no distinct varietal character.

properties.title: Belles Vignes 2014 Grenache-Syrah-Marselan Red (Vin de France)
properties.address: Vignobles Alain Château、Belle Rive, 49190 Rochefort-sur-Loire, France
properties.descrption: Scents of violet, brambly berry and blackcurrant leaf lead the bouquet of this earthy blend, with a light gamy character in the background. The palate is bright and lively, with attractive freshness and fine tannins that result in a clean, juicy finish.

properties.title: Boffa 2013  Barbaresco
properties.address: Via Torino, 9, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This opens with muddled aromas of floral air freshener, ripe black plum, wet fur and a funky whiff of game. The rustic palate falls apart quickly, showing dried cranberry, a hint of dried herb and fleeting tannins.

properties.title: Burrell School Vineyards 2011 Spring Break Pichon Vineyard Syrah (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.descrption: Zesty peppercorns, underripe berries, Kalamata olive, green olive and crushed thyme show on the nose of this bottling. There's almost a touch of effervescence on the sip, where tart berries, lavender, green peppercorns and more Kalamata olive make for a fresh and fruity experience, which isn't much like Syrah.

properties.title: Casa Agricola Santos Jorge 2014 Toutalga Red (Alentejano)
properties.address: Herdade dos Machados Apartado 24, 7860-909 Moura, Portugal
properties.descrption: This is a young, fruity wine with fine acidity and plenty of red-fruit flavors. Light spice, generous tannins and a hint of wood all contribute to a balanced wine that is ready to drink.

properties.title: Veramar 2014 Estate Club Merlot (Virginia)
properties.address: 905 Quarry Rd, Berryville, VA 22611, USA
properties.descrption: The nose of this wine is all about oak, with toast and char leading the way. The palate follows suit yet shows a bit more fruit, with grilled red-berry flavors washing over a lithe, crisp palate.

properties.title: Testarossa 2012 Brosseau Vineyard Pinot Noir (Chalone)
properties.address: 300 College Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030, USA
properties.descrption: This begins with a reserved nose that unfolds into deep, black aromas of licorice, turned earth and graphite. Pomegranate and acai fruit flavors mix with red clay and touches of whiskey, but the tannins are powerful. Give it until at least 2018 to smooth out.

properties.title: MooBuzz 2012 Pinot Noir (Monterey)
properties.address: 100 Brotherhood Plaza Dr, Washingtonville, NY 10992, USA
properties.descrption: Deep black raspberry and slate make for a traditional nose on this solid-deal wine. It's refreshing and lively once sipped, with dark red fruits and a bit of brown spice.

properties.title: Pittacum 2010 Mencía (Bierzo)
properties.address: C. la Iglesia, 11, 24546 Arganza, León, Spain
properties.descrption: Reduced, foxy berry aromas come with a rubbery note of latex. The palate is full and chunky, with moderate flabby weight. Black-fruit and peppery flavors end in loamy, toasty, jammy fashion, so drink this full-bodied Mencía now.

properties.title: R2 2012 S&B Sanford & Benedict VIneyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.descrption: The Roessler brothers take a good spin through the historic Sanford & Benedict vines and present a wine with cherry, baked fennel and a bit of eucalyptus on the nose. It's fairly lean once sipped, but balanced well between pomegranate fruit and dark spices.

properties.title: Trueblood 2012 Pinot Noir (Carneros-Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: Light in color and texture, it offers inviting perfumed violet aromas before weavings of raspberry and just-ripe cherry take over on the palate. Approachable and easygoing, a wine to enjoy now.

properties.title: Dominio IV 2009 Midnight Skies Estate Tempranillo (Columbia Gorge (OR))
properties.address: 11570 NE Intervale Rd, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: Though already five years old, this wine still seems to need time. Notes of cocoa, coffee, pencil eraser and dusky spices are still coming into their own. The acidity is fresh with some dryness to the tannins that provides a bit of distraction but may just need some additional time to settle.

properties.title: Zeni 2011  Amarone della Valpolicella
properties.descrption: Aromas recall black plum, raisin, dark spice and floral notes. The palate offers blackberry, bitter prune and black pepper accents alongside tightly-wound tannins that leave a drying finish.

properties.title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2012 Vieilles Vignes  (Savigny-lès-Beaune)
properties.address: 49 Rue Henri Challand, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: This firm wine still needs to shed its youthful structure of tannin and bring out the underlying ripe fruits. It has weight, hints of juicy acidity and a medium-term potential. The end shows some of the natural concentration from old vines.

properties.title: Josetta Saffirio 2009 Brut Rosé  (Nebbiolo d'Alba)
properties.descrption: Made with Nebbiolo, this conveys the grape's trademark aromas of violet, rose and red berry. A touch of cinnamon adds interest to the wild cherry and crushed raspberry flavors while zesty acidity leaves a tangy finish.

properties.title: Adrás 2012 Mencía (Ribeira Sacra)
properties.address: 9970 Cienega Rd, Hollister, CA 95023, USA
properties.descrption: Mild strawberry and raspberry aromas show a touch of lactic-smelling oak. Zesty and energetic on the palate, this pumps out red-fruit and cocoa flavors in front of a juicy, fresh, slightly tangy finish.

properties.title: Artadi 2012 Viñedos de el Sequé Monastrell-Syrah (Alicante)
properties.address: Carretera de Logroño, s/n, 01300 Guardia, Álava, Spain
properties.descrption: Minerally blackberry aromas announce a tannic, firm palate. Flavors of dark, herbal berry fruits are earthy and stony, while a peppery, lightly herbal finish is solid and structured. This value-priced Monastrell-Syrah blend is fresh and well made.

properties.title: Carlos Serres 2011 Old Vines  (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Santo Domingo de la Calzada, 40, 26200 Haro, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy and perfumed berry aromas get this off to a good start. The palate is chewy and medium in size, with straightforward blackberry flavors backed by a blast of coffee. The finish dries out quickly, leaving a peppery aftertaste.

properties.title: Dominio IV 2011 Technicolor Bat Three Sleeps Vineyard Tempranillo-Syrah Red (Columbia Gorge (OR))
properties.address: 11570 NE Intervale Rd, Carlton, OR 97111, USA
properties.descrption: Though the blend leans heavily toward Tempranillo, it's the Syrah (16%) that shows itself with its notes of black pepper and smoked meat. The palate is on the lighter side of medium bodied, with tart, lively acidity and chalky firm tannins that need some time to settle. Best at the dinner table.

properties.title: Finca la Celia 2012 Pioneer Reserva Cabernet Franc (Uco Valley)
properties.address: Av. San Martín 972, M5500 EOL, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Leathery black-fruit aromas are not overly expressive but draw you in. This feels bright and juicy, with jumpy acidity. Flavors of boysenberry and blackberry finish long and fresh, with choppy acidity.

properties.title: Lynskeys Wairau Peaks 2000 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: Wairau Valley, New Zealand
properties.descrption: A big style that manages to avoid tasting rustic or heavy. Starts with baked pastry shell, black cherry and plum, then adds in hints of licorice and black pepper. Could use a touch more richness in the midpalate, but closes nicely, with fresh acidity that perks up the fruit flavors.

properties.title: Poliziano 1998  Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
properties.address: Via Fontago, 1, 53045 Montepulciano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Open and friendly, this is the epitome of a newly released wine that should sell well in restaurants and fly off the shelves of wine shops. Not only will it go nicely with pasta or grilled meat, it's properly balanced and solid on its own feet. Cherry is the predominant flavor, and on the finish there's vanilla and tannins that won't quit.

properties.title: Silvan Ridge 1998 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 27012 Briggs Hill Rd, Eugene, OR 97405, USA
properties.descrption: Starts with penetrating, inviting aromas of cherry cola, blackberry and hard crushed spices, with a lush dose of smoky oak and vanilla. It drinks a bit dense and closed now, with solid tannins and acids hiding the pretty core of cherry fruit. Age through 2004.

properties.title: Valley View 1999 Anna Maria - Old Stage Vineyard Merlot (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 1000 Upper Applegate Rd, Jacksonville, OR 97530, USA
properties.descrption: A pretty nose, plummy and rich, with a nice toasty, roasted finish. Elegant and medium bodied, in a ripe year like this the fruit gets past all unripe flavors and into some nice, slightly leafy, pretty fruit with hints of cherry tobacco.

properties.title: Biondi Santi 2000 Sassoalloro Sangiovese (Toscana)
properties.address: Unnamed Road, 53024, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This Sangiovese has a lot going for it: a sweet maple-tinged aroma, a pretty ruby color, round but snappy plum and raspberry flavors, and a long, layered finish. But in the end it doesn't really sing, it's a bit hollow at the core, and there's an oak-driven, buttered popcorn note on the finish that leaves a heavy, lasting flavor.

properties.title: Castello Banfi 1999 Cum Laude Sangiovese (Sant'Antimo)
properties.address: 1111 Cedar Swamp Rd, Glen Head, NY 11545, USA
properties.descrption: This is a new kitchen-sink offering from Banfi, featuring Cabernet, Merlot, Sangiovese and Syrah. It goes full bore on the red fruit and oak, with spicy berry aromas and cherry flavors. The tannins are pretty hard, and with ample acids, this young wine currently starches the cheeks. But in three years it should become a good to very good table wine.

properties.title: Morandé 2001 Terrarum Carmenère (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Rosario Nte 615, Las Condes, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: Rustic, as Carmenère should be, this single-valley offering is a good drink-with-barbecue bet. Bark, dark berries and chocolatey aromas show on the nose; earth and black fruit dominate the full, low-acid palate. Woodsy, briary notes and ample spice give oomph to the juicy berry finish.

properties.title: Paschal 2000 Merlot (Applegate Valley)
properties.descrption: This is a firm wine, with up-front flavors of plum and berry, enhanced with finishing licks of vanilla and white chocolate. A bit of Cabernet Sauvignon (8%) adds punch.

properties.title: Rowland 2000 Jill's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
properties.descrption: Smoky, meaty and spicy, this wine boasts plenty of oak influence. The red berry fruit is somewhat subdued, with the flavors centered on earth and spice. Though lean, the mouthfeel is admirably silky, and pretty cranberry shadings appear on the finish.

properties.title: Rancho Zabaco 1999 Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 3387 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Creamy and smooth, with vanilla and milk chocolate aromas and flavors that carry along the bouncy red-berry fruit for a supple ride. Contains 10% Petite Sirah.

properties.title: Valley View 1999 Anna Maria - Quail Run Merlot (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 1000 Upper Applegate Rd, Jacksonville, OR 97530, USA
properties.descrption: A softer, more forward style than the Old Stage, showing more density and soft tannins. Light cherry fruit, good balance, texture, weight. Some hints of wood, earth and mineral too.

properties.title: Boheme 2009 Taylor Ridge Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 3625 Main St, Occidental, CA 95465, USA
properties.descrption: Enormously attractive, this has a rich, creamy texture and complex flavors. Notes of raspberries, cherries, Dr. Pepper and persimmons flood the palate, riding a wave of spice, smoky oak and a beautiful touch of mushroomy earthiness. This is a first class Pinot Noir, with food-friendly elegance.

properties.title: San Rustico 2006 Gaso  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Via Pozzo, 2, 37020 Marano di Valpolicella VR, Italy
properties.descrption: This shows beautifully elegant aromas of spice, black pepper, crushed granite, dried spice and fresh forest berry. There is are recognizable notes of jammy red fruit and marmalade, but the bouquet remains tightly pulled together and balanced nonetheless. It imparts a crisp, clean sensation on the palate, with a long, polished finish.

properties.title: Louis Latour 2010 Château Corton Grancey  (Corton)
properties.address: 18 Rue des Tonneliers, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: A firm, powerful wine, its tannins still very dominant. Acidity is a factor, along with deep red-plum fruit. Some sweetness will develop in the next several years, although this concentrated and complex wine will also have a solid core of dry, structured tannin. Age for at least five years.

properties.title: Nicolis 2006 Ambrosan  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Via Villa Girardi, 29, 37029 San Pietro in Cariano VR, Italy
properties.descrption: This is a modern, plump rendition of Amarone, with soft lines and chewy aromas of black cherry, chocolate fudge, cinnamon and blackberry preserves that are immediate and upfront. The rich, velvety texture make this a great candidate for pairing with wintery cheese fondue.

properties.title: Olivier Leflaive 2010 Epenots Premier Cru  (Pommard)
properties.address: 10 Pl. du Monument, 21190 Puligny-Montrachet, France
properties.descrption: This is complex and powerful, with its energy directed equally at the concentrated tannins and at the ripe damson and plum fruits. It's going to be a delicious wine—the wood element smoothing the firm edge. Age for at least five years.

properties.title: Baxter 2009 Oppenlander Vineyard Pinot Noir (Mendocino)
properties.address: 8660 CA-128, Philo, CA 95466, USA
properties.descrption: Structured and fully developed, this showcases the strong 2009 vintage, the Oppenlander Vineyard and the brilliance that is Baxter. Marked by bright black-cherry fruit and a heady perfume of rose, this carries itself with elegance and a light touch. This is Pinot Noir purposely made to pair with food.

properties.title: Domaine Heresztyn 2010  Clos Saint-Denis
properties.address: 27 Rue Richebourg, 21220 Gevrey-Chambertin, France
properties.descrption: This is concentrated, but it's all structure at this stage. It has rich black fruits that lie under the dense tannins, with a potentially rich powerhouse of flavor. It needs at least six years of aging.

properties.title: Domaine Perrot-Minot 2010 Les Beaux-Monts Premier Cru  (Vosne-Romanée)
properties.address: 54 Rte des Grands Crus, 21220 Morey-Saint-Denis, France
properties.descrption: A minerally textured wine, this layers tannins and a dark, brooding character over the ripe black fruits. It has considerable power and richness, with intensity of fruit and spice, and a sweet, almost soft finish.

properties.title: Maculan 2009 Fratta Red (Veneto)
properties.address: Via Castelletto, 3, 36042 Breganze VI, Italy
properties.descrption: A blend of 65% Cabernet Sauvignon and 35% Merlot, this is a landmark bottling because many years ago it demonstrated that great international-style wines could be made elsewhere in Italy—not only in Tuscany. A celebrated star of the Veneto, this oak-aged red offers enormous density and intensity, with soft, velvety layers and bright aromas of red fruit, spice and dried sage. The finish is characterized by savory, herbal notes that are fresh and tantalizing.

properties.title: Southard 2009 Lawrence Vineyard Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 670 Tibbling Rd, Selah, WA 98942, USA
properties.descrption: Dark and bloody, this masterfully mixes layer upon layer of detail. Red meat, black olive, cassis and earth roll across the tongue, while hints of flower and chocolate linger in the nose. Complex, tart and earthy, this is as good as it gets in this price range.

properties.title: Summers 2009 Four-Acre Zinfandel (Calistoga)
properties.address: 10 Clay St #100, Oakland, CA 94607, USA
properties.descrption: Rich, blood warming and heady, this has vast and complex flavors of blackberry jam, licorice, bacon, spice and sweet, smoky sandalwood. It's hard to imagine a better wine to drink with barbecue.

properties.title: Terre Rouge 2009 Ascent Syrah (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 10801 Dickson Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Terre Rouge's loftiest undertaking every vintage, this Ascent is a blockbuster. It's gorgeously spicy and floral, with dark notes of pepper, violet and herb that will live long and prosper in time. Grapes used for this bottling are sourced from cool, high-elevation vineyards, providing the wine perfect balance between big, bold fruit and provocative acidity.

properties.title: Zenato 2007  Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
properties.address: Strada San Benedetto, 8, 37019 Peschiera del Garda VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Full, gorgeous and bright, this shows restraint and elegance, with lovely aromas of sweet cherry, blackberry pie, leather, tar and black licorice. In keeping with Valpolicella tradition, there is a touch of sweetness on the palate, but the quality of the fruit is clean and polished. Hold for 10 years or more.

properties.title: Chanson Père et Fils 2009 Clos des Fèves Premier Cru  (Beaune)
properties.address: 10 rue Paul Chanson, 10 Rue Collège, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: This is dark and wood laden, with sweet, rich fruit and a firm, dense structure. It has a full feel, and its opulence is likely to develop over the next 2–3 years.

properties.title: Dal Forno Romano 2007  Valpolicella Superiore
properties.address: Località Lodoletta, 1, 37031 Cellore d'Illasi VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Romano Dal Forno applies the same stringent quality standards on his so-called base wine as he does his top-tier Amarone. But referring to this Valpolicella Superiore as a “base wine” couldn't be more incorrect. In fact, this singular expression occupies its very own category in which the utmost attention is paid to the smallest details. It opens with dark, inky concentration and amazing intensity, with black cherry, barbecue spice, leather and tobacco.

properties.title: Domaine Drouhin-Laroze 2010 Lavaut Saint-Jacques Premier Cru  (Gevrey-Chambertin)
properties.address: 20 Rue Gaizot, 21220 Gevrey-Chambertin, France
properties.descrption: Structured, dense and packed with black fruits, this is complex wine. Yet with all of its ripeness, it offers a great line of freshness and a smoky wood flavor, with blackberry-like acidity on the finish. Age for five years or more.

properties.title: Bell 2006 Claret Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6200 Washington St, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Claret is the old-fashioned word for Bordeaux, but it has no legal meaning in the U.S. This Cabernet-based wine contains some Syrah, which gives a smoked meat or bacon note to the blackberries and black currants. It's delicious, if a little sweet.

properties.title: Ketcham Estate 2008 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: Fruit fans will exult in this jammy Pinot Noir. It floods the mouth with raspberries, cherries and cola, with an elaborate coating of sweet, smoky sandalwood. The richness is balanced with fine acidity. Best now and over the next year or so.

properties.title: Peter Franus 2007 Merlot (Napa Valley)
properties.descrption: A good red wine that does just what Merlot is supposed to do, be enjoyable now. It's softly fruity and immediately likeable, with pleasant cherry pie, blackberry, cocoa and sandalwood flavors.

properties.title: Peter Lehmann 2007 Clancy's - Shiraz - Cabernet Sauvignon - Merlot Red (Barossa)
properties.address: Para Rd, Tanunda SA 5352, Australia
properties.descrption: This medium-bodied Barossa blend displays supple tannins and a silky finish, making it immediately accessible. Hints of smoke and sweat and complexity to the currant aromas and flavors.

properties.title: Quinta do Crasto 2008 Flor de Crasto Red (Douro)
properties.address: Quinta do Crasto, 5060-063, Portugal
properties.descrption: This new baby from Crasto is an easygoing wine, full of berry fruits, gentle tannins. It is ready to drink, finishing softly and freshly.

properties.title: Snoqualmie 2007 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 660 Frontier Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: Snoqualmie can legitimately lay claim to being Washington's most consistent and reliable producer of mass market, value-priced wines. This tart and racy Syrah is a fine example of the quality—no frills, but no fudging either. It tastes like fruit—blueberries and boysenberries, with some leafy, herbal tannins. In perfect balance, it's a fine every day wine with more flavor interest than most ten buck merlots and cabs.

properties.title: Brutocao 2010 Contento Vineyard Primitivo (Mendocino)
properties.address: 13500 US-101, Hopland, CA 95449, USA
properties.descrption: This Primitivo opens with inviting peppery aromas, followed by bright fruit and spice overtones, along with a nice bead of acidity throughout. A good pizza and lasagna wine.

properties.title: Castelli del Grevepesa 2009 Clemente VII Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
properties.descrption: This Chianti Classico riserva offers black fruit aromas accented with spice, coffee and oak. The palate delivers black cherry, oak, vanilla and black pepper along with bracing tannins. It's a bit shy on fresh acidity and finishes on a drying, tannic note.

properties.title: Château Bois Cardon 2011  Médoc
properties.address: 2290 S French Rd, Lake Leelanau, MI 49653, USA
properties.descrption: An obviously wood aged wine, with burnt toast and spice dominant at this young stage. Happily, there is enough black currant fruit and fruity acidity underneath to support this overdose of wood. Give it time to fully integrate, and drink from 2016.

properties.title: Château de Paillet-Quancard 2010  Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.descrption: A rich and rounded wine whose tannins are well buried in the ripe blackberry fruits. It's a dark wine, solidly dry at the core with great swathes of juicy fruit around. It's almost ready to drink so try it out in 2014.

properties.title: Château d'Uza 2010  Graves
properties.descrption: A dry style of wine that only slowly reveals its juicy character to bring out a warmer, richer side. It also does show considerable toast and spiciness along with firm tannins all of which still need to fully integrate. So don't drink until 2016.

properties.title: Vinha Paz 2011 Colheita Red (Dão)
properties.address: Quinta da Leira, 3500-884 São João de Lourosa, Portugal
properties.descrption: A huge wine, as indicated by the alcohol, this is dark, dense and extracted. It has bitter chocolate and sweet licorice flavors, strong signs of the wood aging, along with juicy blackberry fruit. Powerful and concentrated, it needs to age. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Abacela 2009 Reserve South Face Block Syrah (Umpqua Valley)
properties.address: 12500 Lookingglass Rd, Roseburg, OR 97471, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from a single block of the winery's estate vineyard, it has notes of cranberry, black pepper, herbs and moist earth speckled with oak spices (30% new French). The palate has soft, sleek cherry flavors buffeted by firm tannins.

properties.title: Caldera 2011  Barbera d'Asti
properties.address: 11300 Cienega Rd, Hollister, CA 95023, USA
properties.descrption: This structured Barbera offers aromas of ripe cherry, raspberry and plum with light toasted notes. The palate delivers a tight core of black cherry with black pepper and licorice, layered with a hint of espresso. This still needs a year or two to fully unwind, so it's best after 2015.

properties.title: Casa da Passarella 2010 Casa da Passarella A Descoberta Colheita Red (Dão)
properties.address: R. Santo Amaro 3, 6290-093 Gouveia, Portugal
properties.descrption: Here's a smooth and juicy wine that has great black fruit aromas and flavors. It has good balance between the dry tannins and firm structure of Dão and the fruity character, meaning it is likely to develop over the medium term. Drink from 2015.

properties.title: Casca Wines 2009 Cape Roca Boat Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: A perfumed wine that is ripe and richly tannic, with the minerality of the Douro. It has weight, while also retaining elegance and rounded black fruits. Give this wine a few years, and drink from 2015.

properties.title: Castello d'Albola 2009  Chianti Classico
properties.descrption: Castello d'Albola's Chianti Classico has a typical fragrance of ripe berry accented with hints of violet and spice. The bright palate delivers ripe, red cherry and white pepper along with round tannins. Pair it with pasta topped with ragù or barbecued steaks.

properties.title: Château Arnaud 2011  Saint-Estèphe
properties.descrption: A fresh, fruity and sophisticated wine, this offers acidity balanced by dry tannins. It has juicy black currant fruits, hints of mint and a bright, smoky feel. The wine will obviously age, so drink from 2016.

properties.title: Chehalem 2011 Stoller Vineyards Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
properties.address: 31190 NE Veritas Ln, Newberg, OR 97132, USA
properties.descrption: The Stoller-sourced Pinot is forward and ripe, with pretty fruit flavors in a compact, light vintage. Cola, peach, black cherry and milk chocolate components swirl together, fading gently into a light finish. Drink over the next 2–3 years.

properties.title: Indomita 2011 Duette Cabernet Sauvignon-Carmenère (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Ruta 68, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Leathery, mossy aromas of dark-berry fruits lead to a bright, energetic, acid-driven palate with quality flavors of plum and spiced blackberry. This has zest and savory notes on the finish, and overall it's fresh in feel, tasty and not too demanding.

properties.title: Beaulieu Vineyard 2012 Coastal Estates Pinot Noir (California)
properties.descrption: Good price for a nice wine that shows some real Pinot character. The mouthfeel is light and silky, and fine acidity gives a bit to the red stone fruits and berries.

properties.title: Bodegas Aragonesas 2009 Castillo de Fuendejalon Crianza Red (Campo de Borja)
properties.address: Carr. de Magallón a la Almunia, S/N, 50529 Fuendejalón, Zaragoza, Spain
properties.descrption: Earthy berry and cola aromas are clean and ripe. This feels fresh on the tongue, with medium-level weight and power. Flavors run toward cassis and berry but fade quickly, with little to the finish. This is Garnacha with 25% Tempranillo.

properties.title: Turnbull 2010 Leopoldina Estate Grown Cabernet Franc (Oakville)
properties.address: 8210 St Helena Hwy, Oakville, CA 94562, USA
properties.descrption: There's a raisin skin bitterness and some raisiny, Port-like flavors to this Cabernet Franc, suggesting some of the grapes were roasted on the vine. Other than that, it's softly tannic and savory, with cherry pie and oak notes.

properties.title: Castle Rock 2011 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: Castle Rock is one of the most reliable sources of inexpensive Columbia Valley red wines. Ignore the generic label—what's inside the bottle is well-made. Light flavors of black cherry, soft tannins and a finishing flourish of mocha and red apple give this both lift and length.

properties.title: Doukénie 2010 Petit Verdot (Virginia)
properties.address: 14727 Mountain Rd, Hillsboro, VA 20132, USA
properties.descrption: A scent of juicy black plum commingles with notes of milk chocolate, game and sun-baked straw. Medium to full bodied, this wine is structured with lively acidity and leathery tannins. A bitterness that's akin to grapefruit pith adds tension to the finish.

properties.title: Palmer 2009 Proprietor's Reserve Cabernet Franc (North Fork of Long Island)
properties.address: 5120 Sound Ave, Riverhead, NY 11901, USA
properties.descrption: Hints of wet granite and tobacco lend a savory note to tart cranberry and cherry flavors in this earthy offering. Full bodied in style with layers of soft, fine-grained tannins, it has a bold earthy and leathery finish.

properties.title: Finca Las Moras 2011 Black Label Malbec (San Juan)
properties.address: Valle de Pedernal, 153, Provincia de San Juan, Argentina
properties.descrption: This deep-colored Malbec hits hard with cola and blackberry aromas. It's a muscular, oaky specimen on the palate, with noticeable tannins. Flavors of wood and toast are in the lead, followed by black fruits, clove and lemon rind. Drink now through 2016.

properties.title: Marqués de Riscal 2010 Próximo  (Rioja)
properties.address: C. Torrea Kalea, 1, 01340 Elciego, Álava, Spain
properties.descrption: Aromas of briny red fruits, dried cheese and brick dust set up a grabby, raw feeling palate with flavors of roasted berry fruits, cassis, rubber and earth. A standard finish with a touch of heat confirms that this is solid everyday stuff.

properties.title: Argiolas 2012 Serra Lori Red (Isola dei Nuraghi)
properties.address: Via Roma, 28/30, 09040 Serdiana CA, Italy
properties.descrption: From Sardinia, this is a delightful rosé made with native grapes. It offers strawberry, crushed cherry and myrtle berry aromas that carry over to the palate along with a slightly sweet finish.

properties.title: Cairdeas 2011 Consonance Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 31 Winesap Ave, Manson, WA 98831, USA
properties.descrption: This Bordeaux-style blend is bone dry and scented strongly with dried leaves, earth and herbs. The lightly-ripened fruit suggests pomegranate and rhubarb.

properties.title: Bodega NQN 2011 Picada 15 Malbec (Patagonia)
properties.address: Ruta Provincial N°7 y calle 15, Q8305 San Patricio del Chañar, Neuquén, Argentina
properties.descrption: Smoky berry aromas come with notes of rubber band and earth. A chunky, full-bodied, rubbery-feeling palate comes next, followed by herbal flavors of blackberry and blueberry. Prune, blueberry and hard spice flavors finish in Bordeaux style.

properties.title: Viña Bujanda 2010 Crianza  (Rioja)
properties.descrption: Graphite and vanilla aromas are offset by herbal, stemmy notes of hard spice and mint. The palate shows tomatoey acidity and flavors of pie cherry, tart plum, cherry tomato and vanilla. As might be expected given the precedings, the finish is cleansing and high in acid.

properties.title: Don & Sons 2011 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 3111 S Mingo Rd, Tulsa, OK 74146, USA
properties.descrption: Good Pinot Noir for the price. It's a little soda-poppy, with raspberry and cherry pie flavors, but the acidity is brisk, and the mouthfeel is nice and silky.

properties.title: Canonica a Cerreto 2010  Chianti Classico
properties.address: 53019 Castelnuovo Berardenga, Province of Siena, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 90% Sangiovese and 10% Merlot, this opens with aromas of forest floor, blue flower, black fruit, graphite and a balsamic note. The juicy palate delivers crushed black cherry, white pepper, clove and licorice alongside polished tannins. Drink through 2018.

properties.title: Bruliam 2013 Torrey Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 1200 American Way, Windsor, CA 95492, USA
properties.descrption: This wine intoxicates aromatically in wild cherry and strawberry before entering into an entirely different direction of feral earth. Softly smooth on the palate, it's enjoyable now and an interesting taste experience, with an unfussy finish.

properties.title: Gabriele Valeriani 2010 Morone  (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
properties.address: Via S. Gabriele, 190, 64045 Isola del Gran Sasso D'italia TE, Italy
properties.descrption: Earthy aromas of truffle, leather, tar, crushed plum and a hint of mocha lead the nose. The vibrant palate delivers black cherry, raspberry, graphite, tobacco and a licorice note alongside firm, polished tannins. Enjoy through 2018.

properties.title: Gabriele Valeriani 2011 Morone  (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
properties.address: Via S. Gabriele, 190, 64045 Isola del Gran Sasso D'italia TE, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of forest floor, spiced plum, blue flower and a whiff of leather entice in the glass. The savory palate offers juicy wild cherry, nectarine zest, cinnamon and grilled herb alongside firm, fine-grained tannins. Drink through 2017.

properties.title: Gehricke 2013 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.descrption: There's a lightness of being to this wine that makes it ethereal. Light in texture and body, layers of earthy strawberry and red cherry remain crisp and fresh on the palate, with a faint aroma of rose petal marking the bouquet.

properties.title: Goose Ridge 2012 g3 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 16304 Dallas Rd, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.descrption: Barrel aromas of vanilla, coconut and cocoa take the lead on this blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Mourvèdre, Cabernet Franc and Malbec, followed by dried cherry and plum. The cranberry and sour-cherry flavors are concentrated and disclose an intriguing mixture of tart and sweet.

properties.title: Hillinger 2013 Eveline Pinot Noir (Burgenland)
properties.address: Hill 1, 7093 Jois, Austria
properties.descrption: Nutty flavors of new oak signal a more international style of Pinot, but the underlying fruit speaks eloquently of ripe, red cherry and offers glimpses of raspberry. Subtle spice plays around the edges. The palate is rounded and soft but has a refreshing vein of acidity.

properties.title: J. Bookwalter 2012 Foreshadow Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1695 Malibu PR NE, Richland, WA 99352, USA
properties.descrption: Lighter in color, this blend of Conner Lee, Red Mountain Vineyard and Elephant Mountain fruit has aromas of freshly brewed coffee, dark chocolate, toasty barrel spices and red fruit, with the barrel notes taking the lead. It's silky-soft in feel, with generous raspberry flavors that show a pleasing sense of balance, all backed by a light squeeze of tannins.

properties.title: Johanneshof Reinisch 2013 Zweigelt (Thermenregion)
properties.address: Im Weingarten 1, 2523 Tattendorf, Austria
properties.descrption: All the characteristic pepperiness of Zweigelt swings enticingly on nose and palate of this fresh-faced wine. This is medium bodied, fruit-driven and made incredibly appetizing by white pepper notes that pervade and complement the cherry fruit. Vibrant fruit singles this out.

properties.title: L'Ecole No. 41 2012 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 41 Lowden School Rd, Lowden, WA 99360, USA
properties.descrption: Combined with 20% Grenache, this full-bodied, fruit-forward wine brings sweet aromas and flavors of raspberry jam and plum. Aged in mostly neutral oak, it possesses purity that carries through the finish.

properties.title: MacPhail 2012 The Flyer Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 6761 McKinley St, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: Intensely earthy, this wine hails predominantly from Susanna's Vineyard, a site in the heart of the Green Valley section of the larger Russian River Valley that's known for its elevation and coolness. Here, crisp raspberry and cherry do provide a sense of that coolness, but the wine develops into a substantial behemoth of full-bodied richness and weight, with a powerful, peppery finish.

properties.title: Merry Edwards 2012 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 2959 Gravenstein Hwy N, Sebastopol, CA 95472, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced from six different vineyards, this is a broadly pleasing wine, fruity in blackberry and raspberry that veers even into cranberry and cassis territory without getting bogged down. Substantial and lush, it's tightly woven in tannin and savory herb, ready to open itself over time. Patience will reward with more exotic interweavings of vanilla-cola and tea.

properties.title: Naggiar 2011 Estate Malbec (Sierra Foothills)
properties.address: 18261 Rosemary Ln, Grass Valley, CA 95949, USA
properties.descrption: This is a big, bold, but welcoming wine with tons of flavor, plenty of tannin but an almost silky texture that invites another sip. The deep red-black color goes almost to the rim. Aromas are like apple skin and red cherries and the flavor suggests blackberries. Its richness without heaviness helps it stand out from the pack.

properties.title: Netzl 2013 Rubin Zweigelt (Carnuntum)
properties.address: Rosenbergstraße 17, 2464 Göttlesbrunn, Austria
properties.descrption: Faint notes of peony and oak play above the red plum fruit, leading to a wonderfully peppery, oak-scented but nonetheless very refreshing red. This is an ambitious rendition of slender, fruity Zweigelt in oak that does justice to the peppery, fresh nature of this variety.

properties.title: Nittnaus Hans und Christine 2013 Heideboden Zweigelt (Burgenland)
properties.address: Untere Hauptstraße 49, 7122 Gols, Austria
properties.descrption: Zweigelt can do easy-drinking styles but in the right hands, it can also turn into something more elegant. That's the case here: This exudes sophistication. Subtle use of oak supports the supple structure and gives the ripe red cherry fruit a more velvety spin. While this is ready now, it may well get even better with a year or two in bottle.

properties.title: No Limit 2010 All-In Sawyer Lindquist Vineyard Syrah (Edna Valley)
properties.descrption: This wine shows roasted beef with blackberry crust, fresh-cracked black pepper and tarry asphalt on the nose. The asphalt and charred meat play strongly on the heavy-duty palate that also offers blackberry balsamic reduction. It's brawny and burly, perhaps too much so for the everyday drinker.

properties.title: Paddy Borthwick 2013 Paper Road Pinot Noir (Wairarapa)
properties.address: 116 Nicholson Road, Khandallah, Wellington 6035, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Has this property been making strides, or is it just the superb quality of the 2013 vintage? Either way, this is a wine worth trying. The cherry and spice flavors are spot on, as is the medium body, silky mouthfeel and long, crisp finish. Drink now–2020.

properties.title: Peregrine 2012 Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
properties.address: 2127 Gibbston Highway, RD1, Queenstown 9371, New Zealand
properties.descrption: This is textbook Central Otago Pinot, from the nuances of wild thyme to the bold cherry fruit and mouthwatering finish. This medium-bodied wine is structured enough to last several years, but soft enough to drink now.

properties.title: La Selva 2013  Morellino di Scansano
properties.address: 15 Florido Ave, La Selva Beach, CA 95076, USA
properties.descrption: Made with organically farmed grapes, this blend of Sangiovese and 10% Merlot highights earthy aromas of underbrush, moist earth and dark berry. The lively palate offers ripe black cherry, nectarine zest and a hint of ground pepper while ripe tannins provide the framework. Enjoy through 2016.

properties.title: Le Casalte 2010  Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
properties.address: Via del Termine, 2, 53045 Sant'Albino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of underbrush, leather, tar and game lead the nose. The earthy aromas carry over to the palate along with mature plum, juicy black cherry, truffle, tobacco and graphite. Smooth tannins soften up the wine's rustic, forward nature.

properties.title: Marion-Field 2014 The Harrison Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: Light in color, this wine brings aromas of peppermint, herb, sarsaparilla and spice. The flavors are light and transparent, showing a very pretty sense of styling.

properties.title: Nittnaus Anita und Hans 2015 Zweigelt (Burgenland)
properties.address: Untere Hauptstraße 49, 7122 Gols, Austria
properties.descrption: 2015's ripe red cherry fruit is presented here in a compact, taut, and concentrated package of freshness and verve. It has lovely pepper spice and ample freshness, giving focus to its lovely, crunchy, fresh cherry fruit.

properties.title: Producteurs Plaimont 2012 Cuvée 1907 Tannat-Cabernet (Madiran)
properties.address: 59 Av. des Mousquetaires, 32100 Condom, France
