It captures Zin's briary, brambly, spicy personality, with dense, wild forest-berry fruit, yet manages to be elegantly compact and even Cabernet-like in its tannin structure. A very classy wine that deserves a spot on the best wine lists.

properties.title: Casal do Conde 2011 Reserva Touriga Nacional-Cabernet Sauvignon (Tejo)
properties.address: R. do Sabugueiro 167, 2070, Portugal, Portugal
properties.descrption: Burned wood aromas reveal the smoky nature of this wine. Wood aging and a bitter chocolate character dominate. There is a question as to whether it can soften. Wait until 2017 at least.

properties.title: Château de Pizay 2012 Château de Saint Lager  (Brouilly)
properties.descrption: A typically light Brouilly that is fresh, full of cherry acidity and soft tannins. It has a juicy element, lightly herbal and with stalky, tight fruit at the end. Drink now.

properties.title: Château Lamothe-Vincent 2012  Bordeaux
properties.descrption: Simple and fruity, it has attractive red fruits, soft tannins and just the right amount of acidity. It will develop relatively quickly, so drink from 2015.

properties.title: Château Loyasson 2012  Bordeaux
properties.address: 3 Balestard, 33540 Sauveterre-de-Guyenne, France
properties.descrption: Obviously wood aged, with spice and toast flavors, this is a soft, black currant and berry flavored wine. It has light tannins that are already integrating with the fruit. Drink now and until 2018.

properties.title: Château Thuron 2005 Tradition  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 4 Turon, 33190 Pondaurat, France
properties.descrption: Dry and tannic, this totally structured wine has weight. However the fruit element has vanished leaving a dense wine, very firm and just given brightness by acidity. Drink now.

properties.title: Collier Falls 2011 Hillside Estate Primitivo (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.address: 4791 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: A bit rustic in style, it's got black currant, raisin and tobacco flavors and lots of peppery spiciness, and the finish is thoroughly dry. But there's a brusqueness to the tannins that makes it feel rough and edgy in the mouth.

properties.title: Derey Frères 2012 Vieilles Vignes  (Fixin)
properties.address: 1 Rue Jules Ferry, 21160 Couchey, France
properties.descrption: Light tannins accompany crisp red fruits. What it lacks in weight and complexity, it makes up for with a smooth texture, good acidity and a structure that will allow it age for another year.

properties.title: Hill Wine Company 2012 Black Dog Series Pinot Noir (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 6512 Washington St, Yountville, CA 94599, USA
properties.descrption: Pleasantly crisp raspberry, cola and oak flavors mark this easy to drink Pinot Noir. It has a good burst of acidity for balance, and feels silky in the mouth. Drink up.

properties.title: L. Tramier & Fils 2012 La Minée  (Bourgogne)
properties.address: 14 Rue de Chamerose, 71640 Mercurey, France
properties.descrption: While the aromas have rustic overtones, the wine itself goes down the red fruit path. It shows juicy cherry flavors, soft but present tannins and a good touch of spice and wood. There is an attractive smoky aftertaste. Drink in 2015.

properties.title: Case Paolin 2009 S. Carlo Red (Montello e Colli Asolani)
properties.descrption: This blend from northern Italy opens with aromas of currants, black berries and bell pepper. It offers restrained black fruit flavors layered with oak and espresso sensations. But overall, it is rather flat with an abrupt, astringent finish.

properties.title: Wetzel Estate 2010 Cellar Select Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 437 Nilan Hill Rd, Point Marion, PA 15474, USA
properties.descrption: Beet root and cherry flavors mixed with some barnyard scents lead into a modestly ripe wine with strong herbal components. The finish takes a turn into bitterness.

properties.title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Samora Tinto Red (Tejo)
properties.address: 701 W 11th St, Coffeyville, KS 67337, USA
properties.descrption: Full and round, this is a ripe blackberry-flavored wine. It has a touch of licorice, followed by juicy fruitiness and some acidity. The aftertaste, with its flavors of wood aging, suggests it could mature through 2015.

properties.title: Château Cayla 2012  Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 2290 S French Rd, Lake Leelanau, MI 49653, USA
properties.descrption: A bold and ripe wine, it's full of black currant fruits accompanied by wood and acidity. It's obviously young and will soften and calm into a smooth and rich wine. The finish brings out a dry character. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château de Pizay 2012  Régnié
properties.address: 443 Rte du Château, 69220 Belleville-en-Beaujolais, France
properties.descrption: From the light 2012 vintage, this is a bright and fruity wine with red cherries and soft tannins. Intense acidity gives the wine a fresh, crisp character. Drink now.

properties.title: Château des Lattes 2011  Médoc
properties.address: 1200 Dowdell Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: With black currant fruits dominant, this is an inherently fruity wine. The juicy feel makes the wine seem light, not yet quite connecting between fruit and a very dry tannic texture. Give it until 2016.

properties.title: Collier Falls 2011 Hillside Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
properties.descrption: A big, lusty Zin, it shows the tendency to overripeness that can mar the variety. While it's dry, it's rich in raisins and prunes, with a good tannin-acid structure that wants barbecued meat to play with.

properties.title: Vieil Armand 2009 Château Ollwiller Pinot Noir (Alsace)
properties.address: WUENHEIM FR, 1 Rte de Cernay, 68360 Soultz-Haut-Rhin, France
properties.descrption: Light in color, this is a soft, red fruited wine. It has red cherry flavors with a dry edge of fruit tannin and wood. The acidity and the juicy aftertaste give a really attractive finish.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2012 Fuller Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: This bottling was supervised by retired Tualatin founder Bill Fuller. It saw 80% new oak, and barrel flavors dominate the palate. Big bursts of vanilla and tobacco somewhat mask the light cherry fruit, giving the impression that the wine is a little out of balance.

properties.title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2012 Tualatin Estate Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: These old vines produce a powerful wine, that retains strong flavors of stem and earth despite the extra ripeness in 2012. The red berry fruit slides into suggestions of tomato juice.

properties.title: Trinity Hill 2011 The Trinity Red (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 2396 State Highway 50, Fernhill 4175, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Although this includes small amounts of Tempranillo, Malbec and Petit Verdot, this is basically a traditional Bordeaux-style blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc. It's fruit forward and approachable even now, with ample fruit flavors of black cherries and cassis. Drink now–2018.

properties.title: Cline 2012 Live Oak Vineyards Zinfandel (Contra Costa County)
properties.descrption: This has bright raspberry and almost-sweet blackberry flavors, full body, moderate tannins and a long warm finish. It tastes polished, soft and satiny smooth.

properties.title: Cubanisimo Vineyards 2011 Estate Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 1754 Best Rd NW, Salem, OR 97304, USA
properties.descrption: Much like its companion Rumba Pinot, this is light and tart, with sour cherry fruit. A whiff of smoke and streak of bell pepper come through in the finish, which is pleasant but quickly thins out.

properties.title: Domaine Loubejac 2013 Pinot Noir (Oregon)
properties.address: 17096 NE Woodland Loop Rd, Yamhill, OR 97148, USA
properties.descrption: A négociant effort, this was done entirely in stainless steel and neutral oak. Tart and light, it has simple strawberry fruit with a touch of spice. It offers no tricks, just straight-ahead Pinot at a modest price for Oregon.

properties.title: Fazio 2012 Torre dei Venti Nero d'Avola (Erice)
properties.descrption: Pretty aromas suggest ripe berry, spiced plum and a bit of eucalyptus. The polished palate offers mature blackberry and cinnamon alongside smooth but rather fleeting tannins.

properties.title: Feudo Disisa 2010 Vuaria Nero d'Avola (Monreale)
properties.address: SP30 KM 6, 90046 Monreale PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of blackcurrant, grilled pepper and oak lead the nose. The dense, extracted palate offers dried black cherry, mature blackberry, licorice, espresso and vanilla alongside firm tannins.

properties.title: Girolamo Russo 2013 Rosato Nerello Mascalese (Etna)
properties.address: via 95012 ct, Via Regina Margherita, 80, 95012 Passopisciaro CT, Italy
properties.descrption: This extremely pale rosato doesn't have a very expressive nose, but the lively palate delivers juicy white cherry, light raspberry and flinty mineral alongside crisp acidity.

properties.title: Dashwood 2012 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: 13 Waihopai Valley Road, Waihopai Valley 7276, New Zealand
properties.descrption: A light, floral style of Pinot Noir, this is marked by scents of roses and forest floor. The tannins are silky, leading to a fresh, vivacious finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Colosi 2012 Rosso Red (Terre Siciliane)
properties.descrption: A blend of Nero d'Avola and other Sicilian grapes, this features fruity aromas of dark berry and a whiff of graphite. The savory, straightforward palate offers up ripe black cherry and juicy blackberry, with notes of ground white pepper in the background. Soft tannins provide easy-drinking texture.

properties.title: Domaine Carneros 2012 Pinot Clair Pinot Noir (Carneros)
properties.address: 1240 Duhig Rd, Napa, CA 94559, USA
properties.descrption: A white Pinot Noir made from estate-grown grapes, this is a curious wine and perhaps an acquired taste, though it has found its fans via the winery. Akin to Chardonnay in its expressions of crème brûlée, tropical fruit basket and tangy apple, this wine is textured, bright in acidity and touched by oak.

properties.title: Feudo Disisa 2013 Nero d'Avola (Terre Siciliane)
properties.address: SP30 KM 6, 90046 Monreale PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas and flavors of blackberry, wild cherry and accents of licorice and ground pepper all come together in the glass. It's fresh, savory and extremely accessible with round tannins and a soft mouth feel. Drink through 2015.

properties.title: Feudo Maccari 2012 Maharis Syrah (Sicilia)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale 19 Noto-Pachino km 13,5, 96017 Noto, SR, Italy
properties.descrption: The nose isn't very expressive but the palate offers dried black cherry, coffee, mocha, oak, licorice and the heat of alcohol alongside velvety tannins. It lacks the fruit richness needed to stand up to the oak and evident alcohol.

properties.title: Feudo Maccari 2013 Nero d'Avola (Noto)
properties.address: Strada Provinciale 19 Noto-Pachino km 13,5, 96017 Noto, SR, Italy
properties.descrption: Blue flower, wet earth and dark berry aromas lead the nose. The juicy palate offers blackberry, black cherry and a hint of white pepper alongside soft tannins and bright acidity. Drink soon.

properties.title: Hovey 2007 Dalton Cuvée Petite Sirah Syrah (Calaveras County)
properties.address: 350 Main St A, Murphys, CA 95247, USA
properties.descrption: Sugary sweet, this blend has jammy flavors of raspberries and cherries, with a sprinkling of chocolate.

properties.title: Stefania 2007 Haut Tubee Red (California)
properties.address: 1800 Day Rd, Gilroy, CA 95020, USA
properties.descrption: Here's an everyday wine to drink with burgers and such. Tastes like an inexpensive wine served in a fast-food restaurant.

properties.title: Atwater 2007 Pinot Noir (Finger Lakes)
properties.address: 5055 NY-414, Burdett, NY 14818, USA
properties.descrption: A straightforward nose with honest raspberry fruit and an underlying green plum note. There's well-defined acidity and rounded tannins though a turnip note makes for a less than stellar ending. Drink now to 1 year.

properties.title: Kenneth Volk 2005 Starr Ranch Vineyard Tempranillo (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 5230 Tepusquet Rd, Santa Maria, CA 93454, USA
properties.descrption: Soft, simple and hot. Tastes like melted cherry pie filling, sprinkled with cocoa, anise and pepper, with a burning finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Bodegas Valdemar 2007 Conde de Valdemar  (Rioja)
properties.address: Calle Camino Viejo Logroño, 24, 01320 Oion, Araba, Spain
properties.descrption: Awfully bright and forward on the nose, but then tart, sheering and grating on the palate, with acidic raspberry flavors. Scratchy, edgy red wine. Fresh but that's where it ends.

properties.title: Maddalena 2005 Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: Los Angeles, CA 90033, USA
properties.descrption: Hot, soft and simple, with baked fruit flavors of cherries and red currants that turn raisiny on the finish. On the plus side, it's dry and silky.

properties.title: Alchemy Wine Productions 2006 Colson Canyon Syrah (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 28 Brookside Dr, Wilmington, DE 19804, USA
properties.descrption: Sugary and simple, with jammy raspberry, cherry and oak flavors that finish a bit hot and peppery.

properties.title: San Simeon 2005 Merlot (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 442 Slo San Simeon Rd, San Simeon, CA 93452, USA
properties.descrption: Soft, overripe and simple. Tastes like a melted chocolate-cherry brownie, with a drizzle of cassis.

properties.title: Château Mission Saint Vincent 2014  Bordeaux
properties.address: 14111 NE 145th St, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: The wine has fine potential. While the wood flavors are dominant, as it develops the ripe red-berry flavors that are there will fill out and bring their fruity acidity along. It is going to be ready to drink from 2017.

properties.title: Amalie Robert 2012 Wadenswil Clone Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: Medium weight and roundly fruity, this pleasant wine carries a touch of minerality. It's slightly dilute, and there is a suggestion of water cracker resonating through the finish.

properties.title: Amalie Robert 2015 Bellpine Pearl Red (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 13531 Bursell Rd, Dallas, OR 97338, USA
properties.descrption: Though labeled a white wine, this more properly may be called a rosé. It's a pale copper color, made from a mix of Pinot Noir and Pinot Meunier grapes that were pressed lightly to minimize color extraction prior to fermentation in stainless steel. It offers a mix of tree fruits, toasted nuts and tart acids.

properties.title: Delaforce 2014 Tinto Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: This lightly oaked wine is full of fruit, ripe with red berries and crisp with acidity, just hinting at Douro minerality. That makes for a balanced fruity wine that with its soft tannins is ready to drink.

properties.title: Quinta Vale Dona Maria 2014 Vintage  (Port)
properties.descrption: This Port comes from a good year for single-quinta vintages. Made in open stone lagars, it is a ripe, black-fruited wine, packed with sweet plums as well as raisins and figs. At this stage, the added brandy is very prominent and the wine needs time. It should be ready to drink for its fruit by 2018, for its maturity by 2026.

properties.title: Fontes da Cunha 2012 Mondeco Tinto Red (Dão)
properties.address: R. José Gomes Ferreira 113, 4150-598 Porto, Portugal
properties.descrption: Named after one of the old names for the Mondego River (which flows past the estate), this blend of the red grapes of the Dão, is aromatic, with a touch of barnyard as well as red fruits. Light wood aging has smoothed some of the fruit tannins and added spice. Drink now.

properties.title: Caves Transmontanas 2006 Vértice Bruto Pinot Noir (Douro)
properties.address: R. de São Domingos 22, 5070 Alijó, Portugal
properties.descrption: Disgorged in 2014, this pale rosé wine definitely has bottle age. You can taste it in the toasty character and in the acidity that has matured along with the wine. It is fresh rather than ripe—a wine that is now very ready to drink.

properties.title: Real Companhia Velha 2014 Quinta dos Aciprestes Red (Douro)
properties.descrption: This vineyard, characterized by its cypress trees (aciprestes), is north facing across the Douro river. This attractive wine is ripe and balanced with smoky tannins and generous red fruits. Dense and with touches of spice, it will be ready from 2017.

properties.title: Château Guibeau 2014  Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: 9 Guibeau O, 33570 Puisseguin, France
properties.descrption: Bridgitte and her husband Eric took over her family property in 2009, in 2014 producing a spicy and fruity wine. It has fine tannins and sweet red-berry fruit. The acidity and the balance are just right. Drink this attractive wine from 2018. They donate one percent of their turnover to an environmental charity and are (they say) one of only two wineries in the world who are members of “1% for the planet.”

properties.title: Château Tayet 2014 Cuvée Prestige  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: 291 Winery Rd SW, Floyd, VA 24091, USA
properties.descrption: A ripe wine that has red-berry fruits, slices of black plum and a full deck of tannins. It is concentrated and ripe, full of fruit and equally full of structure. Let the two soften and drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Timberlay 2014  Bordeaux Supérieur
properties.descrption: A crisp, red-fruit flavored wine that has sufficient structure to give it shape and density. It is fruity with spice from the wood aging. Acidity at the end keeps it fresh and bright. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Collina San Ponzio 2012  Barolo
properties.address: Via La Morra, 11, 12060 Barolo CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Here's a solid, straightforward Barolo that delivers aromas and flavors of ripe black cherry, raspberry compote, star anise, leather and menthol. You'll also detect the warmth of alcohol on the finish, while chewy tannins provide support. Drink 2017–2022.

properties.title: De Filippi 2010 Mariacristina Pas Dosé Metodo Classico Pinot Nero (Oltrepò Pavese)
properties.address: Frazione Fossa, 8, 27050 Oliva Gessi PV, Italy
properties.descrption: Toasted nut and bread crust aromas carry over to the bright palate along with mature apple, strawberry, citrus and a note of dried herb. Soft small bubbles lend elegance while fresh acidity lifts the finish.

properties.title: Decoy 2014 Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
properties.address: 1000 Lodi Ln, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: Red fruit dominates in this tightly woven, firmly tannic wine, blended with 9% Petite Sirah. Hints of charred campfire oak support black pepper, cinnamon and berry, the texture smooth and soft.

properties.title: Domaine Les Carmels 2014 Les Vendanges  (Cadillac Côtes de Bordeaux)
properties.address: 37300 Doud Rd # D, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.descrption: This is an attractive, ripe and fruity wine made from Merlot and Cabernet Franc vines. With soft tannins, it is juicy and crisp. There is a tight edge that will soften to produce a generous wine. Yorick and Sophie Lavaud's 13 acres are Agrocert-certified organic. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Tzuba 2010 Metzuda Syrah (Judean Hills)
properties.descrption: This deep ruby-colored wine has a bouquet of black cherry with hints of smoked meat and red bell pepper. Flavors of smoked meat and cherry pie with notes of orange peel never completely coalesce. There are some pleasant moments on the palate, but they don't all come together at the same time.

properties.title: Wildewood 2013 Hirschy Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.descrption: Diffuse and herbal, this has a slightly rustic bent, with overall herbaceousness. It smoothes out through the finish, though generally it just seems thin and under-ripe.

properties.title: Hedonismo 2012 Garnacha (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
properties.address: Domicilio Conocido s/n, 22785 Valle de Guadalupe, B.C., Mexico
properties.descrption: Hard-coated cherry aromas are slightly medicinal and candied. A chunky but fairly bright palate delivers cherry, plum and spice flavors along with mild heat on the finish. This is good, standard stuff.

properties.title: Chatham 2013 Church Creek Vintner's Blend Red (Virginia's Eastern Shore)
properties.address: 9232 Chatham Rd, Machipongo, VA 23405, USA
properties.descrption: Menthol and pepper ride over dark cherry and spicy plum aromas. The palate is tight and restrained, offering dusty cherry and redcurrant flavors that succumb to an ultimately green, stemmy finish.

properties.title: Feudi del Pisciotto 2012 Carolina Marengo Frappato (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Pisciotto, S.P. 31 km 2 Casella di posta n, 93015 Niscemi CL, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of toasted oak and lemon zest carry through to the one-dimensional, lean palate, along with confectionary notes.

properties.title: Oyster Bay 2012 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.descrption: Despite hints of sweaty plimsole that brought me back to primary school gym class, this wine boasts supple tannins, ample cherry fruit and a finely textured finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Alente 2013 Red (Alentejo)
properties.descrption: A smooth and rounded blend of Trincadeira and Aragonez, this is rich, soft and full in the mouth. Red berry fruits dominate this wood-aged wine, allowing spice and acidity to give a generous aftertaste. Drink now.

properties.title: Bougetz 2012 The Cairn Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
properties.address: 1021 Atlas Peak Rd suite c, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: Sourced from the Volamus Vineyard and aged in half new French oak, this has a leathery component. Tannic and big-boned, it's more savory than fruity, with a streak of mint lurking in the background.

properties.title: Scilio 2011 Orpheus Rosso  (Etna)
properties.address: Contrada Arrigo, 95015 Linguaglossa CT, Italy
properties.descrption: Funky aromas including game, scorched earth, a whiff of barnyard and a note of pressed violet take shape in the glass. The aromas carry over to the palate, alongside a rustic, overripe quality. It closes on a bitter note.

properties.title: Kudos 2013 Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 6310 S Grace Hill Rd, Whitewater, KS 67154, USA
properties.descrption: Diffuse and generic, this simple quaffer has easy-drinking flavors of strawberry soda.

properties.title: Le Casematte 2013 Rosematte Nerello Mascalese (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Corso, 98158 Messina ME, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with Nerello Mascalese, this opens with aromas that recall dried rose petal, magnolia and berry. The palate offers pink grapefruit, raw strawberry, saline and an herbaceous note alongside brisk acidity.

properties.title: Wine with Spirit 2013 Meet & Meat Red (Tejo)
properties.address: R. Nova da Trindade 8C, 1200-205 Lisboa, Portugal
properties.descrption: This youthful, soft wine has juicy acidity and a green, herbal character. It offers red berry fruits and enough crispness to cut through any steak. It's not for aging.

properties.title: Château Saint-Didier-Parnac 2012 Prieuré de Cénac Mission Malbec (Cahors)
properties.descrption: Black fruits and dry tannins are coming together well in this second wine of Château Saint-Didier Parnac. They make for a ripe wine with a light touch of berry fruits and attractive acidity. It will be ready to drink by 2017.

properties.title: Domaine de Gensac 2012 Piaffer Red (Gers)
properties.address: Domaine, 32100 Condom, France
properties.descrption: A blend that includes Syrah and Tannat as well as Bordeaux grapes, this is a wood-aged, ripe and rich wine. A tense streak of acidity heightens the effect of the black currant fruits. Spice at the end comes from the wood. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Edmeades 2012 Zinfandel (Mendocino)
properties.address: 18700 Geyserville Ave, Geyserville, CA 95441, USA
properties.descrption: This has what we're looking for in a good, dry red for dinner time, namely fruit aromas, tasty fruit flavors, full body and a firm texture of tannins and acidity. It makes a nice candidate for house red.

properties.title: Hafner 2008 Old Vienna Composition Ice Wine Eiswein Grand Cuvée Red (Burgenland)
properties.descrption: A mildly oxidative streak adds an extra dimension to the rich dried fruit notes that are heady with Medjool dates, raisins and figs, cut though with the sharpness of orange zest. Molasses and dark muscovado sugar appear in the background and virtually beg for slices of gingerbread and fruitcake.

properties.title: Villa Le Prata 2012 Tirso  (Rosso di Montalcino)
properties.descrption: Underbrush, leather, black pepper, clove and leather lead the nose on this brawny wine. The spicy palate offers allspice, anisette, concentrated black cherry and juicy raspberry alongside strapping tannins. It's one-dimensional but savory. Enjoy through 2015.

properties.title: Alexandria Nicole 2011 Quarry Butte Destiny Ridge Vineyard Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 158422 W, Sonova Rd, Prosser, WA 99350, USA
properties.descrption: A Cabernet Sauvignon-leaning Bordeaux-style blend, this has a healthy dash of Syrah (10%) added to the mix. It brings notes of jammy red fruit (cherry, raspberry) and herbs along with an assortment of barrel spice top notes, with tart flavors and somewhat unresolved tannins.

properties.title: Bindella 2012 Fossolupaio  (Rosso di Montepulciano)
properties.address: Via delle Tre Berte, 10/A, 53045 Montepulciano SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Floral and fragrant, this lively Rosso offers blue flower, leather and perfumed berry aromas over crunchy dark cherry, vanilla and cinnamon flavors. Straightforward and enjoyable, it's balanced with crisp acidity and supple tannins.

properties.title: Canalicchio di Sopra 2012  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Podere Canalicchio di Sopra, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: This warm Rosso starts with aromas of toast, woodland berries and cake spices. The juicy palate offers dense black cherry accented with notes of vanilla, mocha and clove alongside assertive tannins. Enjoy it soon.

properties.title: Canoe Ridge 2011 Reserve Cherry Street Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 45 E Main St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: There's much to enjoy in this unusual blend of Syrah, Merlot, Grenache, Cabernet Franc and Pinot Noir. It generally works, with fruit-focused notes of raspberries and plum accented by barrel spices of clove and toffee. The flavors are tart, tangy and precise, with chewy tannins providing the frame.

properties.title: Treleaven 2011 Reserve Cabernet Franc (Cayuga Lake)
properties.address: 658 Lake Rd, King Ferry, NY 13081, USA
properties.descrption: Violets mingle with notes of dark char and almond on this perfumed, nuanced Cabernet Franc. On the palate, delicate sour-cherry flavor flavors are subdued by swathes of earth and spice. Brisk in acidity, it finishes with a mouthful of penetrating but finely textured tannins.

properties.title: Twin Arches 2010 Merlot (California)
properties.address: 6635 Cavitt Stallman Rd, Granite Bay, CA 95746, USA
properties.descrption: This mellowed-out red is ready to drink now. A good level of flavor complexity and a layered texture that is smooth but firm with tannins make this medium-bodied Merlot tasty. It feels so soothing and appetizing that one forgives the fruit and spice notes for being subtle.

properties.title: Henry Fessy 2012  Chiroubles
properties.address: 644 Rte de Bel air, 69220 Belleville-en-Beaujolais, France
properties.descrption: This structured wine discloses dark tannins and a firm, dense character. The granite soil comes through strongly in the cool minerality and tight texture. It has weight and potential richness, but it does need to age. Drink from 2016.

properties.title: Col di Lamo 2011  Rosso di Montalcino
properties.address: Podere Grosseto, 28, 53024 Montalcino SI, Italy
properties.descrption: Rose, leather, black cherry and balsamic aromas lead the nose on this friendly wine. The savory palate delivers crushed red berry and white pepper alongside lithe tannins that give it an easy drinking texture.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2011 Reserve Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.descrption: This very limited reserve is from a particular block, and as with most block selections, it offers focused, somewhat constrained flavors. Precisely defined red berry fruit is set in a frame of vanilla, toast and coffee. It's a pleasant, albeit generic quaffer.

properties.title: Hightower 2011 Merlot (Red Mountain)
properties.address: 19418 E 583 PR NE, Benton City, WA 99320, USA
properties.descrption: In a challenging vintage, this shows excellent structure around rather light fruit. Strawberry and cherry come into play, with some well-managed tannic strength from the addition of Cabernet Sauvignon, Cab Franc and a splash of Malbec.

properties.title: Alente 2009 Trincadeira-Aragonez Red (Alentejo)
properties.descrption: An elegant wine that slides easily over the palate. Its red berry flavors have a firm edge that stiffens the initial softness. Its tannins and acidity make this a serious, food-friendly wine that could age.

properties.title: Casas del Toqui 2010 Terroir Selection Gran Reserva Syrah (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: Requínoa, Requinoa, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Piercing on the nose, with aromas of cola, graphite, juniper and blackberry. Feels thick, with meaty flavors of blackberry, boysenberry, herb and flower notes. Layered and relatively long on the finish. Impressive for under-$20 Chilean Syrah, with complexity and sauvage notes.

properties.title: Château du Cayrou 2009 No 46 Malbec (Cahors)
properties.descrption: With its wood aging, the ripe and concentrated Malbec adds an extra dryness to the rich flavor of black plums. The wine is dense, balanced with toast. It could be aged, but is ready to drink now.

properties.title: Domaine le Bout du Lieu 2007 Empyrée Malbec (Cahors)
properties.address: Rue du Bout du Lieu, 46140 Saint-Vincent-Rive-d'Olt, France
properties.descrption: A wood-dominated wine that is powerfully extracted. It is dense, with a bitter coffee character, followed by some juicy blackberry flavors. It is still all bare bones, very firm and dry.

properties.title: Kudos 2010 Reserve Pinot Noir
properties.address: 6310 S Grace Hill Rd, Whitewater, KS 67154, USA
properties.descrption: This has the classic flavors of many Oregon Pinot Noirs, a balanced mix of tangy red fruits, mineral, earth and more than a hint of stem. It's full bodied and detailed, with excellent balance, weaving threads of site and grape into a complex finish.

properties.title: Leone de Castris 2007 50th Vintage Riserva Red (Salice Salentino)
properties.address: 188 Parkside Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11226, USA
properties.descrption: Salice Salentino is a historic Italian red wine made with a blend of Negroamaro and Malvasia Nera. This interpretation shows off sun-ripened aromas of prune, raisin and cherry liqueur. The mouthfeel is plush and chewy, but also marked by a firm tannic backbone and lingering cinnamon and nutmeg.

properties.title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2010 Villa la Réserve Malbec (Vin de France)
properties.address: 9 Rue Ada Byron, 64000 Pau, France
properties.descrption: Although this is labeled Vin de France, this is effectively a Cahors wine. It's soft and rounded, with tannins that are already integrated already into blackberry jam flavors. Rich, with a hint of dried fruit, this is ready to drink in a year.

properties.title: Panther Creek 2008 Reserve Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 14455 Woodinville - Redmond Rd NE Suite B, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: A bit reduced when first opened, it throws off scents of burnt rubber, then slowly opens into a roundly fruity, lightly toasty Pinot with a firmly tannic base. Flavors of Dr. Pepper drift through the midpalate. Give it a good decanting and it's fine for near-term consumption.

properties.title: Quinta de Sant'Ana 2010 Tinto Red (Lisboa)
properties.address: R. Direita nº 3, 2665-113 Gradil, Portugal
properties.descrption: A solid, chunky wine whose tannins are still dominant. It has ripe black fruit flavors and a hint ofspice from wood aging. This is a wine that will develop well over the next 3–5 years.

properties.title: RoxyAnn 2008 Syrah (Rogue Valley)
properties.address: 3283 Hillcrest Rd, Medford, OR 97504, USA
properties.descrption: A solid example of the variety, with complex red and black fruits mixing it up with additional grace notes of coffee, sweet spice, toast and licorice. It's a balanced effort, with rather delicate tannins, and a finish that quits just a little early.

properties.title: Straight Line 2009 Pinot Noir (Mendocino County)
properties.descrption: From four acclaimed Mendocino County vineyards, Winemaker Jon Grant's Straight Line Pinot is heftier than his single-vineyard bottlings from sister label Couloir. A dense style of Pinot, this has smoke and oak to it, plenty of strawberry and plum, its tannins not resolved, yet it still exhibits a lush fullness and well-rounded elegance.

properties.title: Talamonti 2007 Tre Saggi  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: Contrada Palazzo, Loreto Aprutino, PE 65014, 65014 Loreto Aprutino PE, Italy
properties.descrption: Tre Saggi is steadily becoming a representative wine for the Abruzzo region in central Italy. It shows loads of ripe fruit and blackberry, with shadings of spice and leather. That tight, bitter close would pair with succulent grilled meats.

properties.title: Valle Reale 2006 San Calisto  (Montepulciano d'Abruzzo)
properties.address: Contrada S. Calisto, 65026 Popoli PE, Italy
properties.descrption: San Calisto is a rich, pulpy and concentrated wine, with an inky black appearance and savory aromas of black pepper, clove, leather, tobacco and loads of mature jammy blackberry. The finish is smooth, velvety and bright.

properties.title: Ferrari-Carano 2007 Prevail West Face Red (Alexander Valley)
properties.address: 8761 Dry Creek Rd, Healdsburg, CA 95448, USA
properties.descrption: Made from Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah, this interesting blend seems ready to drink now. It's soft and smooth in the mouth, with opulently ripe flavors of blackberries, chocolate, bacon, sweet oak, pepper and a touch of funk.

properties.title: Viña Casablanca 2009 Nimbus Single Vineyard Syrah (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Opens with lactic, slightly raisiny aromas that turn oakier and creamier with airing. Dense, rubbery and intense on the tongue, with dark flavors of blackberry and herb in the middle. Finishes long, earthy and slightly herbal, with tannic bite and grip. Drink now through 2014.

properties.title: Amalie Robert 2008 Estate Selection Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 13531 Bursell Rd, Dallas, OR 97338, USA
properties.descrption: As before, the Estate Selection is the bigger of the two Pinots from Amalie, textural and clean. Strawberry and raspberry fruit flavors hint at herb and stem, but all the details are in proportion and complement each other. Not for long aging, but drinking well right now.

properties.title: Caves Transmontanas 2008 Vertice Grand Reserva Tinto Red (Douro)
properties.address: R. de São Domingos 22, 5070 Alijó, Portugal
properties.descrption: A powerful—possibly too powerful—wine that pushes forward with its superconcentrated black-fruit flavors. It fills the palate with richness and juiciness; this is a wine for lovers of blockbusters.

properties.title: Straight Line 2010 Tempranillo (California)
properties.descrption: Earthy like a Pinot Noir at first, but bigger boned like Syrah, this Tempranillo (with 10% Graciano blended in) has brooding mushroom notes throughout, is quite savory and has a long, peppery finish. Still very young, its tightly wound tannins will let loose over time.

properties.title: Terre Rouge 2009 DTR Ranch Syrah (Fiddletown)
properties.descrption: The 2009 DTR Syrah won't be available until 2013 and is appropriately still tight, waiting to resolve itself into the superbly structured, bone-dry, savory wine it will become. There's a lot of minerality lurking between walls of black fruit and white pepper spice.

properties.title: Kanonkop 2013 Estate Wine Black Label Pinotage (Simonsberg-Stellenbosch)
properties.address: R44, Stellenbosch, 7600, South Africa
properties.descrption: What a bold and powerful selection this is. It opens with intense aromas of blackberry, black plum and boysenberry that are hit with spicy notes of black pepper, cured meat, leather and Thin Mint. The plush and concentrated palate is like crushed velvet in texture, with gripping yet balanced tannins to support the rich, dense black-fruit flavors. The finish transitions from black cherry and boysenberry fruit to menthol, followed by lingering cocoa nib and charred oak tones. Drink 2019–2024.

properties.title: Le Salette 2013 La Marega  (Amarone della Valpolicella Classico)
properties.address: Via Pio Brugnoli, 11, 37022 Fumane VR, Italy
properties.descrption: Alluring aromas of exotic spice, purple flower, dark-skinned berry and a balsamic note lead the nose. The concentrated palate delivers dried cherry, ripe plum, mint, licorice and a hint of game alongside velvety tannins that wrap around the finish. It nicely balances weight and finesse.

properties.title: Escarpment 2014 Pahi Single Vineyard Pinot Noir (Martinborough)
properties.address: Escarpment Cellar Door Peppers Parehua, New York Street West, Martinborough 5711, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Plummy yet cool, with a greenish, floral note that adds lift and interest to the dark-fruit aromas and flavors. This is a bit austere and dusty, but long on the finish, so drink 2018–2030.

properties.title: Gård 2013 Grand Klasse Reserve Lawrence Vineyards Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 19151 144th Ave NE d, Woodinville, WA 98072, USA
properties.descrption: Brooding aromas of huckleberry, orange peel and flowers are followed by seamless full-bodied palate-coating blue-fruit flavors. It's far from shy but delivers the goods.

properties.title: Presqu'ile 2014 Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
properties.address: 5391 Presquile Dr, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: Tart cranberry, wild thyme, olive and Indian spices show on the nose of this appellation blend, a great representation of the cool-climate styles this winery is known for. Kalamata olive and Mediterranean spices arise on the palate, with baked fig, orange rinds, preserved lemon and chaparral combining for a tagine-like expression.

properties.title: Roche de Bellene 2014 Vieilles Vignes  (Gevrey-Chambertin)
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: From a two-acre parcel of vines planted in 1950, this is a finely perfumed, rich wine. It has generous red fruits and an equally opulent ripe character. The tannins are there—a dry layer that is supporting the spice—as is a firm solid texture. Drink this wine (which is still developing) from 2019.

properties.title: Roche de Bellene 2014 Vieilles Vignes  (Nuits-St.-Georges)
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: Negociant Nicolas Potel has made a specialty of sourcing old vines. In this wine, they are between 44 and 54-years-old. The wine is rich and concentrated—dark with tannins and generous with black fruits. It is firm and obviously needs to age. Drink this sold wine from 2020.

properties.title: Roche de Bellene 2014 Vieilles Vignes  (Volnay)
properties.address: 39 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Nicolas, 21200 Beaune, France
properties.descrption: Vines planted in 1934 are behind this smooth and concentrated wine. It has red-berry crispness as well as a cool crisp texture from acidity and tannins. With aging potential, the wine is perfumed and still firm. Drink from 2019.

properties.title: Chalone Vineyard 2013 Estate Grown Pinot Noir (Chalone)
properties.address: 32020 Stonewall Canyon Rd, Soledad, CA 93960, USA
properties.descrption: Smashed black plums, mulberry and alpine strawberry show through the crushed rocks on the nose of this bottling that is lifted by a tarragon spice. Tangy blackberry and elderberry show on the palate, where wild thyme, oregano and peppercorns contribute to an intriguing sense of depth.

properties.title: Domaine Grosbois 2014 Clos du Noyer  (Chinon)
properties.address: Le Pressoir, 37220 Panzoult, France
properties.descrption: This wine comes from a single-parcel, walled vineyard on the north bank of the river Vienne. It is a ripe wine, with delicious cherry and spice flavors balanced with acidity and a firmly tannic core. The wine will age well, so drink now for the attractive fruit or wait until 2018.

properties.title: Gramercy 2013 Lagniappe Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 635 N 13th Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from a blend of top sites Red Willow and Forgotten Hills, this wine offers reserved aromas of berry, herb, smoked meat and pepper. The palate brings bright acid and intensity of flavor but with a sense of elegance that keeps you hanging on each sip.

properties.title: Morell-Lawrence 2014 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1489 W Rose St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Coming from Lawrence Vineyards, this wine offers aromas of orange peel, smoke, olive, blueberry, blackberry and wood spice. The blue-fruit flavors are full bodied and perfumed, showing a pleasing sense of balance and a lingering finish.

properties.title: Bodega Renacer 2013 Renacer R Cabernet Franc (Mendoza)
properties.address: Brandsen 1863, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Dark, dense and ripe from the start, this New World-style Cab Franc is showing raisin, vanilla and foresty aromas prior to a lush soft palate. Flavors of raisin, chocolate and blackberry are on the cusp of overripe and desiccated, while this finishes with flavors of licorice, peppercorn, beef jerky and chocolate. Drink this bulky soft-bodied red now through 2018.

properties.title: Bodegas Riojanas 2008 Monte Real Gran Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: Av. Don Ricardo Ruiz de Azcárraga, 1, 26350 Cenicero, La Rioja, Spain
properties.descrption: Cherry, plum and oaky aromas of vanilla work well together on this tight, slightly clampy and acidic Gran Reserva that's still showing youthful tannic pull. Ripe plum and spice flavors hint at raisin, while this finishes with grabby tannic intensity. Drink this through 2022.

properties.title: Corliss Estates 2012 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 511 N 2nd Ave, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Brooding aromas of barrel spices, red and black fruit, freshly brewed coffee and pencil lead are followed by an intense full palate. It displays a lot of layers to explore.

properties.title: Va Piano 2014 Stoney Vine Vineyard Black Label Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 1793 J B George Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Herb, stem, green olive and floral aromas lead to generous fruit and savory flavors that carry though the finish. It shows a lot of finesse and a beautiful sense of balance.

properties.title: Villa Maria 2013 Single Vineyard Braided Gravels Merlot (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 118 Montgomerie Road, Māngere, Manukau 2022, New Zealand
properties.descrption: This Merlot isn't as big or tannic as VM's 2014 Reserve, but it's close in quality. Cedary oak frames Bing cherry fruit on the nose, while the palate delivers a rich, creamy texture and additional complexity in the form of vanilla, licorice and raspberry. The long, velvety finish folds in hints of dark chocolate and espresso. Drink now–2025.

properties.title: Wilderotter 2013 Petite Sirah (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
properties.address: 19890 Shenandoah School Rd, Plymouth, CA 95669, USA
properties.descrption: Big and bright, this full-bodied wine is stuffed to bursting with lightly charred aromas and flavors of black pepper, blackberry and dark chocolate. A soothingly tannic texture matches the flavors in amplitude. The wine feels muscular but also light on its feet.

properties.title: Calera 2008 Reed Vineyard Pinot Noir (Mt. Harlan)
properties.address: 11300 Cienega Rd, Hollister, CA 95023, USA
properties.descrption: Calls to mind the 2006, which also was a ripe, fruity wine. If anything, the '08 is even sweeter. The alcohol is half a percent higher. It's succulent in raspberry and cherry jam, making it likeable now. But such are the tannins and acids that the wine should easily gain in the cellar over the next six years.

properties.title: Labouré-Roi 2008 La Futaille  (Gevrey-Chambertin)
properties.address: Rue Lavoisier, 21700 Nuits-Saint-Georges, France
properties.descrption: A heavily oaked wine that needs time for the toast to integrate. It does have the black fruit structure to back it up, so expect this complex wine to develop pleasurably over the next 5–6 years.

properties.title: Montes 2007 Alpha M Red (Santa Cruz)
properties.address: I-350, Millahue, Santa Cruz, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Impressive as always, with dense, meaty aromas of baked black fruits, compost and dried cheese. The palate is thick to the max, with chocolate, coconut and baked plum and berry flavors. Ultrarich on the finish, with warmth and density. Once again "M" shows how deep and rewarding high-end Chilean reds can be. Drink now through 2015.

properties.title: Pierre André 2007 Santenots  (Volnay)
properties.address: 30 Fbg Saint-Georges, 84350 Courthézon, France
properties.descrption: Ripe, sweet-fruited wine, its red berry fruits and opulent tannins giving a rounded feel. There is, as well, a good structure composed of acidity, licorice and wood. It needs 2–3 years still to really develop all its depth of flavor.

properties.title: Storybook Mountain 2008 Mayacamas Range Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3835 CA-128, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: Mountain-grown fruit gives this wine an exceptional intensity and purity of flavor. Tastes like the essence of blackberries, sprinkled with black pepper, anise and cocoa. As rich as it is, the finish is perfectly dry. There's a rusticity to the texture, but that's why Zinfandel is Zinfandel. Drink over the next six years, especially with barbecue or fine roasted meats and root vegetables.

properties.title: Storybook Mountain 2008 Eastern Exposures Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3835 CA-128, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: A first rate Zinfandel, as rich as they come, brimming with intense mountain fruit flavors of blackberries, black currants and cola, with Zin's black pepper and a savory taste of grilled Canadian bacon. Lush, smooth and tannic, it's a beautiful wine to drink now with beef stew or even a coq au vin-style dish.

properties.title: Finca Sophenia 2008 Synthesis The Blend Red (Tupungato)
properties.address: Km 12.5, Ruta 89, M5561 Tupungato, Gualtallary, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Deep berry, cola, mint and leather aromas are classy and not overdone. Feels lush and deep in the mouth, with blatant ripeness and toasty, oaky flavors of cola, coconut and blackberry. Finishes big but not that long or complex. Drink now through 2013; Malbec with Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot.

properties.title: Aresti 2007 Family Collection Red (Curicó Valley)
properties.address: Unnamed Road,, Río Claro, Maule, Chile
properties.descrption: This wine has traveled miles in the right direction compared to its early incarnations. It's piercing and potent up front, with cigar box, mocha, toast and coffee aromas in addition to fine flavors of tobacco, cassis, vanilla and lightly baked berry and cassis. Finishes wavy and long; 50% Syrah along with Merlot, Cab and Carmenère.

properties.title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2008 Adrianna Vineyard Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Cobos S/N, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Graphite and lead pencil aromas mix with toasty berry scents. It's solid and textured in the mouth, with creamy oak flavors alongside sawdust, milk chocolate and sweet berry notes. Deep and solid on the finish, but it trails behind Adrianna wines from recent vintages.

properties.title: Bodega Catena Zapata 2008 Argentino Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Cobos S/N, M5509 Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: A sniff is rewarded with sandalwood, dry spice and thick, jammy berry aromas. It's concentrated and well integrated on the palate, with ultraripe and sweet flavors of coconut, vanilla cream and berry fruit. Seems a touch flat and candied on the finish, with a final blast of sweetness.

properties.title: Highway 12 2006 Reserve Red (Sonoma Valley)
properties.address: 27 E Napa St Suite S, Sonoma, CA 95476, USA
properties.descrption: Give this Bordeaux blend a good, long decant before you pour. It's tight and young in tannins and acids, and the blackberry, cherry and currant flavors have a jammy edge. It's a well-made wine despite the rugged mouthfeel. Based on Merlot, its future is entirely unpredictable.

properties.title: Trivento 2009 Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: RP60 & Jerónimo Ruiz, M5517, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Quite bright, sweet and fruity, with a hint of cherry candy and blackberry on the bouquet and then a juicy, fresh palate with mild chocolate, raspberry and proper texture. For $11 this wine is more than competent; it's very good. 50,000 cases made.

properties.title: Costaripa 2008 Castelline  (Garda Classico)
properties.address: Via della Costa, 1/a, 25080 Moniga del Garda BS, Italy
properties.descrption: There's a lot of excitement surrounding the little-know Groppello grape that is a native of northern Italy. The variety delivers freshness and fruity intensity: This expression is extremely clean, polished and food-friendly.

properties.title: Domaines Astruc 2009 Reserve Merlot (Vin de Pays d'Oc)
properties.address: Prat Iches, 11300 Malras, France
properties.descrption: Dark chocolate and rich plum sauce add complexity to this black fruit-driven Merlot. Blackberry preserves and soft plum guts fill the mouth, with a touch of green pepper appearing on the finish. Medium weight with a creamy texture and a medium-length finish. Drink now.

properties.title: Fontanabianca 2007 Brunet  (Barbera d'Alba)
properties.address: via Bordini, 15, 12052 Neive CN, Italy
properties.descrption: This pretty vineyard-designate Barbera d'Alba delivers a fresh bouquet of floral, fruit and spice aromas. The wine is tonic and firm with a bright, crisp close.

properties.title: Hugh Hamilton 2009 The Mongrel Sangiovese Blend Sangiovese (McLaren Vale)
properties.address: 94 McMurtrie Rd, McLaren Vale SA 5171, Australia
properties.descrption: A lively, medium-bodied dry red for casual meals, this is a good example of Australian Sangiovese. Red berry fruit is backed by crisp acids and firmish tannins, making this a good candidate to pair with burgers or pizza. It's 85% Sangiovese, with the balance Merlot and Shiraz.

properties.title: :Nota Bene 2007 Miscela Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 9320 15th Ave S unit c, Seattle, WA 98108, USA
properties.descrption: A Bordeaux blend dominated by Cabernet Sauvignon, the Miscela starts strong with a complex bouquet of black fruits, toast, smoke, coffee grounds and pencil shavings. The alcohol, listed at 15.4%, does not intrude, yet somehow it seems to mute the complexity. As a result, the finish turns astringent, drying, with a layer of ash drifting over the fruit.

properties.title: Presqu'ile 2009 Rim Rock Vineyard Pinot Noir (San Luis Obispo County)
properties.address: 5391 Presquile Dr, Santa Maria, CA 93455, USA
properties.descrption: Tastes a little simple and candied, but it's so delicious, you can hardly stop sipping. Rich and ripe in cherry and raspberry Lifesaver fruit and pie filling, with plenty of sweet vanilla and spice. Drink now.

properties.title: Principiano Ferdinando 2009 Laura  (Barbera d'Alba)
properties.address: Via Alba, 47, 12065 Monforte d'Alba CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Laura is a plush and velvety Barbera d'Alba with bright berry and cherry tones followed by crisp, bright acidity. Pair this wine with gnocchi and creamy gorgonzola sauce.

properties.title: Azienda Agricola Cogno 2009 Vigna del Mandorlo  (Dolcetto d'Alba)
properties.address: Località Ravera, 2, 12060 Novello CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Vigna del Mandorlo Dolcetto d'Alba opens with bright freshness and loads of cherry, blueberry, raspberry and toasted almond. The wine shows freshness that is balanced by smooth, velvety tannins.

properties.title: Bonotto delle Tezze 2007 Barabane Red (Piave)
properties.address: Via Duca D'Aosta, 36, 31028 Vazzola TV, Italy
properties.descrption: This well-priced red blend (with a large Cabernet component) shows dark density and sweet aromas of mature cherry, chocolate and spice. It shows soft, mellow tannins with a touch of smoked bacon on the close.

properties.title: Bossy Boots 2014 Reserva Merlot (Maule Valley)
properties.descrption: Raw abrasive plum and berry aromas are grassy. This passable Merlot is rubbery and pinched in feel, with herbal generic berry flavors that finish with a weedy accent.

properties.title: Work 2012 Adrien's Blend Red (Napa Valley)
properties.address: 3190 CA-128, Calistoga, CA 94515, USA
properties.descrption: This pruney, baked and somewhat sour blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot presents itself as overly ripe.

properties.title: Cougar 2014 Estate Cask Reserve Sangiovese (Temecula Valley)
properties.address: 39870 De Portola Rd, Temecula, CA 92592, USA
properties.descrption: Light in the glass, this bottling is quite funky on the nose with reductive red cherry and tar notes. Flavors are sour, full of tart cherry and composting earth tones.

properties.title: Santa Ema 2014 Reserva Merlot (Maipo Valley)
properties.address: Izaga 1096, Isla de Maipo, Región Metropolitana, Chile
properties.descrption: From the outset this is woody and artificial in style. Aromas of milk chocolate and clove are strange and forced. In the mouth, this feels wiry but also gummy, with clove-heavy oak and tannic bite. In general, this is overly woody, candied and seemingly not natural.

properties.title: Finca Patagonia 2015 Expedicion Pinot Noir (Maule Valley)
properties.address: RN22, Río Negro, Argentina
properties.descrption: Aromas of chewing gum dust are not attractive. This feels flat, with zero edge and structure. Lightly oxidized flavors of generic berry leave one with nothing to latch on to.

properties.title: Santa Rita 2015 Secret Reserve Pinot Noir (Central Valley)
properties.address: 2923 Grand Ave, Los Olivos, CA 93441, USA
properties.descrption: A blast of fake-smelling clove is the dominant aroma on this sticky Pinot Noir. Clove returns as the singular flavor, while the finish is woody but not toasty or classy. This is uniquely one-dimensional, but in the wrong way.

properties.title: Casas del Toqui 2015 Barrel Series Reserva Pinot Noir (Cachapoal Valley)
properties.address: Requínoa, Requinoa, O'Higgins, Chile
properties.descrption: Rusty in color, with aromas of compost and rotten leaves, this isn't cutting it. A drawing hard palate and burnt-out flavors that match the nose make this a hard road to navigate.

properties.title: Loma Larga 2011 Brut Nature Limited Edition Cabernet Franc (Casablanca Valley)
properties.address: Camino Lo Ovalle km. 2.8, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Other than a strange note of mustard, there's little to say about the nose of this brut nature Cab Franc. It tastes of sauerkraut and mustard, while the finish tastes pickled, with an infusion of vinegar.

properties.title: Quinta do Noval 2001 Nacional Vintage  (Port)
properties.address: N322-3, 5085 Pinhão, Portugal
properties.descrption: Nacional Vintage Port comes from a small parcel of ungrafted vines on a series of terraces at the Noval estate. It is a legendary wine, produced only occasionally. This wine is still impressively young and shows that it will age for decades. With its dark black fruits and succulent tannins, it is powerful and concentrated. Drink this wine from 2021 and for many years.

properties.title: Alta Vista 2013 Single Vineyard Temis Malbec (Mendoza)
properties.address: Alzaga 3972, M5505 Chacras de Coria, Mendoza, Argentina
properties.descrption: Just when you think Alta Vista has gotten everything it can from Temis (see the 2012), this comes along to reset the benchmark. Ripe, round and lush on the nose, with full-force blackberry and prune aromas, this shows titanic grip, depth and ripeness on the palate. Flavors of raisin, chocolate and blackberry finish with hefty tannins and a smear of mocha flavor. Drink from 2018–2026.

properties.title: K Vintners 2012 The Hustler Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
properties.address: 820 Mill Creek Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: This is a unicorn wine that only gets made in exceptional years—the last time was a decade ago. Hailing from Morrison Lane, the oldest Syrah plantings in the valley, it brings mesmerizing aromas of blackberry, black fruit, moist earth and wet stone. The black-fruit flavors consume the palate, showing density, depth and exceptional length. It's a complete heart-stopper.

properties.title: Proprietà Sperino 2011  Lessona
properties.address: Via Orolungo, 34, 13853 Lessona BI, Italy
properties.descrption: Tilled earth, underbrush, rose petal, perfumed berry, aromatic herb and a balsamic note are some of the many alluring scents you'll find on this gorgeous red. The juicy palate is both earthy and loaded with finesse, doling out ripe dark cherry, raspberry, pipe tobacco, licorice and energizing mineral. Firm, polished tannins provide structure. It's already almost accessible but will continue to evolve and age beautifully. Drink from 2019 through 2029.

properties.title: Charles Smith 2013 Royal City Northridge Vineyard Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 35 S Spokane St, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: The aromas pop, with notes of stargazer lilies, brown stems, green olive and smoked meat, revealing more on each swirl. The fruit and savory flavors are rich and layered, earthshaking in their intensity, with a lengthy finish that only heightens the interest. It's a complete showstopper.

properties.title: Colombera & Garella 2013 Pizzaguerra  (Lessona)
properties.address: Via al Ticino 6, 6592 S. Antonino, Switzerland
properties.descrption: This stunning red is all about finesse and light. It opens with lovely scents of violet, rose, perfumed berry and balsamic aromas while the radiant, almost ethereal palate delivers crunchy red cherry, strawberry, white pepper and mineral intensity. It's impeccably balanced, with bright acidity and firm but elegant tannins. While it's so tempting now, hold for even more complexity. Drink 2018–2033.

properties.title: Sineann 2015 TFL Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
properties.address: 8400 Champoeg Rd NE, St Paul, OR 97137, USA
properties.descrption: This ultra reserve, made in half bottles only, is labeled the winery's best offering. It lives up to the claim, with stunningly rich and broad flavors of black fruits, dusty cedar, tobacco, tea and coffee. The rich and complex barrel flavors are beautifully integrated, seamless and proportioned, and power through a breathtaking finish that lasts for minutes. Drink now and over the next five years.

properties.title: Gaja 2013  Barbaresco
properties.address: Via Torino, 5, 12050 Barbaresco CN, Italy
properties.descrption: Perfumed berry, rose, fragrant blue flower, tilled earth, baking spice and a hint of new leather are just some of the aromas you'll find on this dazzling red. The polished, structured palate is loaded with finesse, delivering a wonderful depth of flavors including raspberry, dark cherry, licorice, mint and white pepper. Vibrant acidity and firm, refined tannins provide impeccable balance. It's still young and will develop even more complexity over the next 10–15 years. Drink 2020–2035.

properties.title: Robert Biale 2014 Limerick Lane Vineyard Zinfandel (Russian River Valley)
properties.address: 4038 Big Ranch Rd, Napa, CA 94558, USA
properties.descrption: This vineyard continues to impress in both this variety and others, this wine showing off its ability to offer fistfuls of red, blue and black fruit as juicy acidity signals freshness and ageability. A wooded undertone of brush and bramble meets swathes of lavender, licorice and ever-so-satisfying dark chocolate as the length of the wine goes on for days.

properties.title: Arpepe 2007 Sassella Vigna Regina Riserva  (Valtellina Superiore)
properties.address: Via del Buon Consiglio, 4, 23100 Sondrio SO, Italy
properties.descrption: This radiant, fragrant Nebbiolo opens with a potpourri of scents including aromatic herb, leather, cedar, pressed rose petal and dark spice. The luminous, subtle palate is loaded with finesse, delivering juicy red cherry, cinnamon, star anise, white pepper and pipe tobacco. It's impeccably balanced, with noble tannins and bright acidity. Drink now or hold for even more complexity. Drink through 2032.

properties.title: Quinta do Noval 2014 Vintage  (Port)
properties.address: N322-3, 5085 Pinhão, Portugal
properties.descrption: This beautifully perfumed wine has all the tannins that will allow it to age over many decades. It also offers the rich blackberry, dark plum and great structure that will support that aging. As so often, Noval has released a vintage when other major producers have held back. But this powerful wine fully justifies the decision. Drink from 2025 for the fruit, 2030 for the complexity.

properties.title: Pali 2014 Cargasacchi Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
properties.address: 2130 India St, San Diego, CA 92101, USA
properties.descrption: Plump and ripe Montmorency cherry kicks off the aromas on this bottling, followed by rain-on-slate minerality, slight hints of cola and a growing sense of sour cranberry. The palate also begins with riper red fruit before diving into extreme minerality and intriguing texture. Then comes tart plums and cranberries, all dusted by savory touches of white pepper. It's quite a ride.

properties.title: K Vintners 2013 The Hidden Northridge Vineyard Syrah (Wahluke Slope)
properties.address: 820 Mill Creek Rd, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of pomegranate, black fruit, herb and barrel spice lead to rich seamless palate-coating dark-fruit flavors. It's hedonistic but retains a sense of balance along with an unabashed deliciousness.

properties.title: Paul Durdilly 2011 Nouveau  (Beaujolais)
properties.address: 980 Chem. de Combefort, 69620 Val d'Oingt, France
properties.descrption: Bright red fruits in this attractive cherry and banana flavored wine. It has a soft tannic edge, laced with acidity and finishing spice.

properties.title: Cusumano 2009 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: SS 113, Km 307, Contrada San Carlo Contrada San Carlo, 90047 Partinico PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Cusumano is a terrific Sicilian estate that offers both high-end expressions and a consistent line of value wines. This well-priced Nero d'Avola is fresh, clear, fruit-forward and easy to drink.

properties.title: Spy Valley 2008 Satellite Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
properties.address: 37 Lake Timara Road West, Marlborough 7276, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Reflecting the difficulties of the vintage, this is a slightly edgy, coarsely textured wine, with sweet, oaky notes framing cherries and roasted beets. Try it with something slightly rustic, like beef stew.

properties.title: Basel Cellars 2008 Inspired Red Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 2901 Old Milton Hwy, Walla Walla, WA 99362, USA
properties.descrption: Quite light, suggesting fruit that was picked at less than optimal ripeness. This thin wine has tart red fruit, a streak of caraway seed and a finish with sweet cracker highlights.

properties.title: Bodegas Peñafiel 2008 Miros  (Ribera del Duero)
properties.address: Av. Valladolid Soria, km 311, 47300 Peñafiel, Valladolid, Spain
properties.descrption: Starts out odd and exotic, with blueberry and Middle Eastern spice aromas. Feels condensed and jammy, with full flavors of herbs, boysenberry and plum. Shows freshness along with simplicity, with finishing herbal notes of sage and tarragon. Contains 10% each Merlot and Cabernet.

properties.title: Botter 2010 Caleo Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Luigi Cadorna, 17, 30020 Fossalta di Piave VE, Italy
properties.descrption: Caleo opens with a bright, almost pungent note of almond paste, cassis and dried apple. Bramble, wild berry and almond skin appear on the easy finish.

properties.title: Cantine Barbera 2010 La Bambina Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: SP79, 92013 Menfi AG, Italy
properties.descrption: La Bambina is a fresh and easy-drinking Sicilian rosé (made from Nero d'Avola) that opens with a pretty peach-pink color and bright aromas of raspberry, white cherry and cassis. Try it with swordfish carpaccio.

properties.title: Corvo 2009 Terrae Dei Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: 900 Armour Dr, Lake Bluff, IL 60044, USA
properties.descrption: Terrae Dei is a simple wine with bright fruit and a clean, berry-driven palate. Pair this wine with spaghetti and sauce stewed with cubed bacon bits.

properties.title: Domaine Chasselay 2010 Les Grands Eparcieux  (Beaujolais)
properties.address: 123 Chem. de la Roche, 69380 Chatillon, France
properties.descrption: A ripe, fruity wine with a light structure of tannins and acidity, it has some density while remaining fruity and juicy. The red cherry fruit blends into the closing acidity.

properties.title: Kingston Family 2010 Alazan Pinot Noir (Casablanca & Leyda Valleys)
properties.address: Hijuela El Maitén S/N, Casablanca, Valparaíso, Chile
properties.descrption: Plum and cherry aromas turn herbal and piney with airing. Definitely a leaner, sharper Alazan than in the past, with body as well as piercing acidity. Black fruit flavors have an herbal undertone as the palate transitions to peppery spice. Bright and zingy; not much finish.

properties.title: Loriñon 2006 Reserva  (Rioja)
properties.address: 839 NE 3rd Ave, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33304, USA
properties.descrption: Smells full but reduced, with a foxy, candied leaning and aromas of vitamins and minerals. Feels big, bulky, grabby and thick, with baked blackberry and plum flavors. Full on the finish, with some heat.

properties.title: MandraRossa 2010 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: 92013 Menfi, AG, Italy
properties.descrption: A consistent wine, year in and year out, MandraRossa's fresh Nero d'Avola would pair perfectly with pizza or simple spaghetti and tomato sauce. It shows loads of cola, licorice, dark fruit and bright acidity on the close.

properties.title: Masseria del Feudo Grottarossa 2010 Il Giglio Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Grottarossa, snc, 93100 Caltanissetta CL, Italy
properties.descrption: This organic Nero d'Avola offers bold aromas of black cherry, cured meat, black espresso and tangy Indian spice.

properties.title: MICA Cellars 2010 Smith Road Vineyards, Rows 2–5 Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
properties.address: 3405 Carson Ct, Placerville, CA 95667, USA
properties.descrption: Loaded with dark cherry earth, this is a dense, drinkable Pinot Noir. From a tiny Watsonville-based producer who sources from all over the state to make a handful of different wines.

properties.title: Mineo Family Vineyards 2008 Damis Red (Sicilia)
properties.address: 17870 Oak Grove Rd, Ramona, CA 92065, USA
properties.descrption: A blend of Merlot, Petit Verdot and Syrah, Damis is a plump, jammy wine with bold aromas of strawberry and blackberry preserves, spice and toasted nut. It's an easy-drinking wine with a fresh, almost sour note on the close.

properties.title: Nicosia 2010 Fondo Filara Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Via Luigi Capuana, 65, 95039 Trecastagni CT, Italy
properties.descrption: A simple red wine, with cherry, cassis and prune. There's a touch of burnt almond on the close that is typical of this popular Sicilian grape variety.

properties.title: Feudi di San Gregorio 2013 Rubrato Aglianico (Irpinia)
properties.address: Località Cerza Grossa, 83050 Sorbo Serpico AV, Italy
properties.descrption: Fresh and juicy, this opens with alluring aromas of ripe plum, violet, sunbaked soil and dark spice. The bright, silky palate offers crushed blackberry, succulent cherry, clove and star anise alongside supple tannins. Enjoy through 2018.

properties.title: Galardi 2013 Terra di Lavoro Red (Campania)
properties.address: SP Sessa Mignano Km 8.9, 81037 Sessa Aurunca CE, Italy
properties.descrption: Aromas of ripe black-skinned fruit, prune, tobacco, earth and Asian spice float out of the glass. The subdued but refined palate offers mature plum, blackberry, cocoa and cinnamon alongside polished, fine-grained tannins. It has soft appeal but is already evolved and short on intensity and verve. It will, however, make enjoyable drinking over the next few years.

properties.title: Wild Hogge 2009 Tree Frog Cabernet Sauvignon-Syrah (Paso Robles)
properties.address: 30904 Bohan Dillon Rd, Cazadero, CA 95421, USA
properties.descrption: This blend of Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon, which is only sold in Bermuda, shows the tang of anise alongside cranberry, dried oregano and pencil lead on the nose. The palate's boysenberry fruit is leveled with black pepper, roasting herbs and a long finish that's quite intriguing.

properties.title: Morgante 2013 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Racalmare, 92020 Grotte AG, Italy
properties.descrption: This savory, straightforward red opens with attractive aromas of ripe plum, blue flower and a hint of baking spice. The juicy, easygoing palate includes ripe blackberry, spiced blueberry, star anise and a peppery note alongside round, velvety tannins. It's made to be drunk young so enjoy soon.

properties.title: Noviello 2013 Brava Red (Red Mountain)
properties.descrption: This wine is half Cabernet Sauvignon, with the rest equal parts Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc and Merlot. Golden raisin, medicinal notes and abundant barrel spice aromas lead to full but balanced flavors backed by grainy tannins.

properties.title: Soos Creek 2012 Champoux Vineyard Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 24012 172nd Ave SE, Kent, WA 98042, USA
properties.descrption: Equal parts Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot with the balance (6%) Cabernet Franc, this wine leans into the savory with abundant leafy herb, flower and plum aromas that are followed by supple, flavorful earth and tart cherry flavors. The palate delivers but the aromas don't seem to match up.

properties.title: Stonecroft 2014 Crofters Gimblett Gravels Syrah (Hawke's Bay)
properties.address: 121 Mere Road, Fernhill 4175, New Zealand
properties.descrption: Alan Limmer of Stonecroft was the first modern grower of Syrah in New Zealand, planting his first vines in 1984. While the winery has changed hands, it's still a good source for Syrah. This bottling is appropriately smoky and peppery, with hints of bacon fat and blueberries, and a lingering, softly dusty finish.

properties.title: Ballentine 2013 Estate Grown Merlot (St. Helena)
properties.address: 2820 St Helena Hwy, St Helena, CA 94574, USA
properties.descrption: This is a well-structured and elegant wine, despite its size. Bright red cassis and cherry play under tannins that hit on the back of the palate, taking a moment to soften. Herb and cedar mark the finish.

properties.title: Château Bernadotte 2013  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 2 Rte de Fournas, 33250 Saint-Sauveur, France
properties.descrption: Named after the Swedish royal family, this estate produces accessible wines. In 2013, the style continues with a wine that is fruity and softly tannic, emphasizing ripe blackberry flavors rather than too much structure. It will be ready to drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Cambon la Pelousse 2013  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 5 Chem. de Canteloup, 33460 Macau, Margaux, France
properties.descrption: Located just south of Margaux, this estate has produced an attractive wine that plays on the fruit of the vintage. The fresh black-currant character is enhanced by light flavors of wood aging. It will age for a few years, so drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Devise d'Ardilley 2013  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 5 lieu-dit Pateau, 33112 Saint-Laurent-Médoc, France
properties.descrption: Situated at the western end of the Pauillac plateau, this estate has produced a fresh and fruity wine that takes advantage of the year's black-currant flavors and doesn't have too much of a tannic structure. It will develop more and will be best from 2018.

properties.title: Château Grand-Puy Ducasse 2013  Pauillac
properties.address: 4 Quai Antoine Ferchaud, 33250 Pauillac, France
properties.descrption: In this wine, the initial extracted flavors have softened quickly to give an open, drinkable, fruity character. Blackberry fruits and acidity go with light tannins. It will be ready soon. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château la Croix Romane 2012  Lalande de Pomerol
properties.address: 1 bis Rue des Ecoles, 33500 Lalande-de-Pomerol, France
properties.descrption: In this Merlot-dominated wine, powerful wood flavors still show strongly against the fresh, juicy black-currant and berry fruits. As this combination ages, it will produce a ripe, full and always fruity wine with strong final acidity. Drink from 2018.

properties.title: Château Les Carmes Haut-Brion 2013  Pessac-Léognan
properties.address: 20 Rue des Carmes, 33000 Bordeaux, France
properties.descrption: With structure and fruit working well together, this ripe wine has good potential. It is still developing, with firm wood flavors as well as attractive acidity. Give it time and drink from 2019. The Philippe Starck-designed winery went into production in 2015; it's owned by developer Groupe Pichet.

properties.title: Château Maurac 2013  Haut-Médoc
properties.address: 33180 Saint-Seurin-de-Cadourne, France
properties.descrption: This wine is ripe, with dusty tannins and blackberry fruits. It is balanced, fresh with acidity while keeping a good layer of fruitiness. The tannins and structure will allow it to age although it should develop quickly. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Nardou 2012  Francs Côtes de Bordeaux
properties.address: Château Nardou, Nardou, 33570 Tayac, France
properties.descrption: This is a young and structured wine. Juicy black-currant flavors are still firmly backed up by tannins. Produced from old vines, it is dense although also with a fresh acidity that is already attractive. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Château Rousset-Caillau 2010 Cuvée Jean  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
properties.address: Rousset, 33540 Saint-Sulpice-de-Pommiers, France
properties.descrption: The top wine from this estate is this release from the powerful 2010 vintage. It has a dense structure, dark tannins and rich texture. Ripe black plum and dark fig flavors along with the dry core means the wine is still developing. Drink from 2017.

properties.title: Colosi 2014 Nero d'Avola (Terre Siciliane)
properties.address: Diramazione Viaria C, Giammoro, 98042 Pace del Mela ME, Italy
properties.descrption: Blue flower, sunbaked earth, Mediterranean brush and dark-skinned berry aromas lead the way on this easygoing red. The round, chewy palate offers juicy black cherry, raspberry jam and a white pepper note alongside rounded tannins. It's straightforward but savory and made to be enjoyed young.

properties.title: Columbia Crest 2013 Reserve Grenache (Horse Heaven Hills)
properties.address: 178810 WA-221, Paterson, WA 99345, USA
properties.descrption: Aromas of coffee, gravel and boysenberry are followed by pillowy-soft fruit and barrel flavors. It displays delicacy and nuance.

properties.title: Alessandro di Camporeale 2011 Kaid Vendemmia Tardiva Syrah (Sicilia)
properties.address: Contrada Mandranova, 90043 Camporeale PA, Italy
properties.descrption: Made with 100% late-harvested Syrah, this opens with subdued aromas of blackberry jam, cedar, ground pepper and a smoky note. On the moderately sweet palate, nutmeg accentuates both dried prune and fig.

properties.title: Cambridge & Sunset 2013 California Series Zinfandel (California)
properties.address: The Old Schools, Trinity Ln, Cambridge CB2 1TN, UK
properties.descrption: An especially tasty fruit character sets this full-bodied wine apart from the pack. It smells like black currants and tastes like raspberries and blueberries. Moderate tannins and acidity give it good texture and help the finish last.

properties.title: Mastroberardino 2014 Lacrimarosa Aglianico (Irpinia)
properties.address: Via Manfredi, 75-81, 83042 Atripalda AV, Italy
properties.descrption: Refreshing and fragrant, this is delicately perfumed with pressed wild flower, woodland berry and a smidge of Mediterranean herb. The vibrant, straightforward palate is full of ripe red cherry, crushed strawberry, cinnamon and orange peel alongside zesty acidity.

properties.title: Nine Hats 2013 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
properties.address: 3861 1st Ave S, Seattle, WA 98134, USA
properties.descrption: Cabernet Sauvignon (38%), Syrah (35%), Merlot (22%) and Sangiovese comprise this blend of declassified barrels. It displays aromas of mocha, barrel spices, dark berries and cranberry. The black-fruit flavors are ripe and generous, backed up by a firm lick of tannins.

properties.title: Michele Chiarlo 2012 Cannubi  (Barolo)
properties.address: Strada Nizza-Canelli, 99, 14042 Calamandrana AT, Italy
properties.descrption: Delicate scents of rose, chopped mint, dark spice and tilled soil aromas take shape in the glass. The firmly structured palate offers red cherry, pomegranate, licorice and white pepper set against a backbone of polished, fine-grained tannins. A coffee note closes the finish. Drink 2018–2027.

properties.title: Nervi 2009 Valferana  (Gattinara)
properties.address: Corso Vercelli, 117, 13045 Gattinara VC, Italy
properties.descrption: Ample aromas of dark berry, pipe tobacco, pressed violet and a balsamic note come together on this single-vineyard selection. On the structured palate, an energizing mineral vein wraps around mature black cherry, licorice, cinnamon and dried herb while a hint of game adds depth. This has years ahead of it. Drink 2018–2027.

properties.title: Podere ai Valloni 2009 Vigna Cristiana  (Boca)
properties.address: Str. della Traversagna, 1, 28010 Boca NO, Italy
properties.descrption: Graceful and fragrant, this boasts alluring scents of rose, aromatic herb, flint, red berry and culinary spice. The elegant palate delivers red cherry, strawberry, white pepper and star anise alongside bright acidity and firm, refined tannins. Drink 2018–2026.

properties.title: Sangenís I Vaqué 2001 Coranya Red (Priorat)
